analyzed: śrīḥ astu
bharata muni praṇītam nāṭya śāstram
atha prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
praṇamya śirasā devau pitāmaha maheśvarau
nāṭya śāstram pravakṣyāmi brahmaṇā yat udāhṛtam
samāpta japyam vratinam sva sutaiḥ parivāritam
anadhyāye kadācid tu bharatam nāṭya kovidam
munayaḥ paryupāsya enam ātreya pramukhāḥ purā
papracchuḥ te mahātmānaḥ niyata indriya buddhayaḥ
yaḥ yam bhagavatā samyak grathitaḥ veda sammitaḥ

original: nāṭyavedaṃ kathaṃ brahmannutpannaḥ kasya vā kṛte // BhN_1.4 //
analyzed: nāṭyavedam katham brahman utpannaḥ kasya vā kṛte
kati aṅgaḥ kiṃpramāṇaḥ ca prayogaḥ ca asya kīdṛśaḥ
sarvam etat yathātattvam bhagavan vaktum arhasi

original: teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā munīnāṃ bharato muniḥ /
analyzed: teṣām tu vacanam śrutvā munīnām bharataḥ muniḥ

original: pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ nāṭyavedakathāṃ prati // BhN_1.6 //
analyzed: pratyuvāca tatas vākyam nāṭya veda kathām prati
bhavadbhiḥ śucibhiḥ bhūtvā tathā avahita mānasaiḥ
śrūyatām nāṭya vedasya sambhavaḥ brahma nirmitaḥ
pūrvam kṛta yuge viprāḥ vṛtte svāyaṃbhuve ntare
tretā yuge tha samprāpte manoḥ vaivasvatasya tu
grāmya dharma pravṛtte tu kāma lobha vaśam gate
īrṣyā krodha ādi saṃmūḍhe loke sukhita duḥkhite
deva dānava gandharva yakṣa rakṣaḥ mahā uragaiḥ
jambudvīpe samākrānte lokapāla pratiṣṭhite
mahendra pramukhaiḥ devaiḥ uktaḥ kila pitāmahaḥ

original: krīḍanīyakamicchāmo dṛṣyaṃ śravyaṃ ca yadbhavet // BhN_1.11 //
analyzed: krīḍanīyakam icchāmaḥ dṛṣyam śravyam ca yat bhavet
na veda vyavahāraḥ yam saṃśrāvyaḥ śūdra jātiṣu
tasmāt sṛja aparam vedam pañcamam sārvavarṇikam
evam astu iti tān uktvā devarājam visṛjya ca
sasmāra caturaḥ vedān yogam āsthāya tattva vid

original: neme vedā yataḥ śrāvyāḥ strīśūdrādyāsu jātiṣu /
analyzed: na ime vedāḥ yatas śrāvyāḥ strī śūdra ādyāsu jātiṣu

original: vedamanyattataḥ srakṣye sarvaśrāvyaṃ tu pañcamam // BhN_1.13* //
analyzed: vedam anyat tatas srakṣye sarva śrāvyam tu pañcamam
dharmyam arthyam yaśasyam ca sa upadeśyam sa saṅgraham
bhaviṣyataḥ ca lokasya sarva karma anudarśakam
sarva śātrā artha sampannam sarva śilpa pravartakam

original: nāṭyākhyaṃ pañcamaṃ vedaṃ setihāsaṃ karomyaham // BhN_1.15 //
analyzed: nāṭya ākhyam pañcamam vedam sa itihāsam karomi aham
evam saṅkalpya bhagavān sarva vedān anusmaran
nāṭya vedam tatas cakre catur vedāṅga sambhavam
jagrāha pāṭhyam ṛgvedāt sāmabhyaḥ gītam eva ca
yajurvedāt abhinayān rasān ātharvaṇāt api
veda upavedaiḥ sambaddhaḥ nāṭya vedaḥ mahātmanā

original: evaṃ bhagavatā sṛṣṭo brahmaṇā sarvavedinā // BhN_1.18 //
analyzed: evam bhagavatā sṛṣṭaḥ brahmaṇā sarva vedinā
utpādya nāṭya vedam tu brahmā uvāca sureśvaram

original: itihāso mayā sṛṣṭaḥ sa sureṣu niyujyatām // BhN_1.19 //
analyzed: itihāsaḥ mayā sṛṣṭaḥ sa sureṣu niyujyatām
kuśalāḥ ye vidagdhāḥ ca pragalbhāḥ ca jita śramāḥ

original: teṣvayaṃ nāṭyasaṃjño hi vedaḥ saṃkrāmyatāṃ tvayā // BhN_1.20 //
analyzed: teṣu ayam nāṭya saṃjñaḥ hi vedaḥ saṃkrāmyatām tvayā
tat śṛtvā vacanam śakraḥ brahmaṇā yat udāhṛtam

original: prāñjaliḥ praṇato bhūtvā pratyuvāca pitāmaham // BhN_1.21 //
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ bhūtvā pratyuvāca pitāmaham

original: grahaṇe dhāraṇe jñāne prayoge cāsya sattama /
analyzed: grahaṇe dhāraṇe jñāne prayoge ca asya sattama

original: aśaktā bhagavan devā ayogyā nāṭyakarmaṇi // BhN_1.22 //
analyzed: aśaktāḥ bhagavan devāḥ ayogyāḥ nāṭya karmaṇi
ye ime veda guhya jñāḥ ṛṣayaḥ saṃśita vratāḥ

original: ete 'sya grahaṇe śaktāḥ prayoge dhāraṇe tathā // BhN_1.23 //
analyzed: ete sya grahaṇe śaktāḥ prayoge dhāraṇe tathā
śrutvā tu śakra vacanam mām āha ambujasambhavaḥ
tvam putra śata saṃyuktaḥ prayoktā asya bhava anagha
ājñāpitaḥ viditvā aham nāṭya vedam pitāmahāt
putrān adhyāpayāmāsa prayogam ca api tattvataḥ

original: śāṇḍilyaṃ caiva vātsyaṃ ca kohalaṃ dattilaṃ tathā /
analyzed: śāṇḍilyam ca eva vātsyam ca kohalam dattilam tathā
jaṭi lambaṣṭakau ca eva taṇḍum agniśikham tathā
saindhavam sa pulomānam śāḍvalim vipulam tathā

original: kapiñjaliṃ vādiraṃ ca yamadhūmrāyaṇau tathā // BhN_1.27 //
analyzed: kapiñjalim vādiram ca yama dhūmrāyaṇau tathā

original: kaidāriṃ śālikarṇaṃ ca dīrghagātraṃ ca śālikam // BhN_1.28 //
analyzed: kaidārim śālikarṇam ca dīrghagātram ca śālikam

original: kautsaṃ tāṇḍāyaniṃ caiva piṅgalaṃ citrakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: kautsam tāṇḍāyanim ca eva piṅgalam citrakam tathā

original: bandhulaṃ bhallakaṃ caiva muṣṭhikaṃ saindhavāyanam // BhN_1.29 //
analyzed: bandhulam bhallakam ca eva muṣṭhikam saindhavāyanam

original: taitilaṃ bhārgavaṃ caiva śuciṃ bahulameva ca /
analyzed: taitilam bhārgavam ca eva śucim bahulam eva ca

original: abudhaṃ budhasenaṃ ca pāṇḍukarṇaṃ sukeralam // BhN_1.30 //
analyzed: abudham budhasenam ca pāṇḍukarṇam sukeralam

original: ṛjukaṃ maṇḍakaṃ caiva śambaraṃ vañjulaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ṛjukam maṇḍakam ca eva śambaram vañjulam tathā

original: māgadhaṃ saralaṃ caiva kartāraṃ cogrameva ca // BhN_1.31 //
analyzed: māgadham saralam ca eva kartāram ca ugram eva ca
tuṣāram pārṣadam ca eva gautamam bādarāyaṇam

original: viśālaṃ śabalaṃ caiva sunāmaṃ meṣameva ca // BhN_1.32 //
analyzed: viśālam śabalam ca eva sunāmam meṣam eva ca

original: kāliyaṃ bhramaraṃ caiva tathā pīṭhamukhaṃ munim /
analyzed: kāliyam bhramaram ca eva tathā pīṭhamukham munim

original: nakhakuṭṭāśmakuṭṭau ca ṣaṭpadaṃ sottamaṃ tathā // BhN_1.33 //
analyzed: nakhakuṭṭa aśmakuṭṭau ca ṣaṭpadam sottamam tathā
pādukā upānahau ca eva śrutim cāṣa svaram tathā

original: agnikuṇḍājyakuṇḍau ca vitaṇḍya tāṇḍyameva ca // BhN_1.34 //
analyzed: agnikuṇḍa ājya kuṇḍau ca vitaṇḍya tāṇḍyam eva ca
kartara akṣam hiraṇya akṣam kuśalam dussaham tathā

original: lājaṃ bhayānakaṃ caiva bībhatsaṃ savicakṣaṇam // BhN_1.35 //
analyzed: lājam bhayānakam ca eva bībhatsam sa vicakṣaṇam
puṇḍrākṣam puṇḍranāsam ca api asitam sitam eva ca
vidyujjihvam mahājihvam śālaṅkāyanam eva ca

original: śyāmāyanaṃ māṭharaṃ ca lohitāṅgaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: śyāmāyanam māṭharam ca lohitāṅgam tathā eva ca

original: saṃvartakaṃ pañcaśikhaṃ triśikhaṃ śikhameva ca // BhN_1.37 //
analyzed: saṃvartakam pañcaśikham triśikham śikham eva ca
śaṅkhavarṇamukham śaṇḍam śaṅkukarṇam atha api ca

original: śakranemiṃ gabhastiṃ cāpyaṃśumāliṃ śaṭhaṃ tathā // BhN_1.38 //
analyzed: śakranemim gabhastim ca api aṃśumālim śaṭham tathā

original: vidyutaṃ śātajaṅghaṃ ca raudraṃ vīramathāpi ca /
analyzed: vidyutam śātajaṅgham ca raudram vīram atha api ca
pitāmaha ājñayā asmābhiḥ lokasya ca guṇa īpsayā
prayojitam putra śatam yathā bhūmi vibhāgaśaḥ

original: yo yasminkarmaṇi yathā yogyastasmin sa yojitaḥ // BhN_1.40 //
analyzed: yaḥ yasmin karmaṇi yathā yogyaḥ tasmin sa yojitaḥ
bhāratīm sātvatīm ca eva vṛīttim ārabhaṭīm tathā

original: samāśritaḥ prayogastu prayukto vai mayā dvijāḥ // BhN_1.41 //
analyzed: samāśritaḥ prayogaḥ tu prayuktaḥ vai mayā dvijāḥ
parigṛhya praṇamya atha brahmā vijñāpitaḥ mayā

original: athāha māṃ suraguruḥ kaiśikimapi yojaya // BhN_1.42 //
analyzed: athā āha mām suraguruḥ kaiśikim api yojaya

original: yacca tasyāḥ kṣamaṃ dravyaṃ tad brūhi dvijasattama /
analyzed: yat ca tasyāḥ kṣamam dravyam tat brūhi dvijasattama

original: evaṃ tenāsmyabhihitaḥ pratyuktaśca mayā prabhuḥ // BhN_1.43 //
analyzed: evam tena asmi abhihitaḥ pratyuktaḥ ca mayā prabhuḥ
dīyatām bhagavan dravyam kaiśikyāḥ samprayojakam
nṛtta aṅgahāra sampannā rasa bhāva kriyā ātmikā
dṛṣṭāḥ mayā bhagavataḥ nīlakaṇṭhasya nṛtyataḥ

original: aśakyā puruṣaiḥ sā tu prayoktuṃ strījanādṛte /
analyzed: aśakyā puruṣaiḥ sā tu prayoktum strī janāt ṛte
tatas sṛjat mahā tejāḥ manasā apsarasaḥ vibhuḥ
nāṭya alaṅkāra caturāḥ prādāt mahyam prayogataḥ

original: mañjukeśīṃ sukeśīṃ ca miśrakeśīṃ sulocanām // BhN_1.47 //
analyzed: mañju keśīm su keśīm ca miśra keśīm su locanām
saudāminīm deva dattām deva senām manoramām

original: sudatīṃ sundarīṃ caiva vidagdhāṃ vipulāṃ tathā // BhN_1.48 //
analyzed: sudatīm sundarīm ca eva vidagdhām vipulām tathā

original: sumālāṃ santatiṃ caiva sunandāṃ sumukhīṃ tathā /
analyzed: sumālām santatim ca eva sunandām sumukhīm tathā

original: māgadhīmarjunīṃ caiva saralāṃ keralāṃ dhṛtim // BhN_1.49 //
analyzed: māgadhīm arjunīm ca eva saralām keralām dhṛtim

original: nandāṃ sapuṣkalāṃ caiva kalamāṃ caiva me dadau /
analyzed: nandām sa puṣkalām ca eva kalamām ca eva me dadau
svātiḥ bhāṇḍa niyuktaḥ tu saha śiṣyaiḥ svayambhuvā
nārada ādyāḥ ca gandharvāḥ gāna yoge niyojitāḥ

original: evaṃ nāṭyamidaṃ samyagbuddhvā sarvaiḥ sutaiḥ saha // BhN_1.51 //
analyzed: evam nāṭyam idam samyak buddhvā sarvaiḥ sutaiḥ saha
svāti nārada saṃyuktaḥ veda vedāṅga kāraṇam
upasthitaḥ ham brahmāṇam prayoga artham kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: nāṭyasya grahaṇaṃ prāptaṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇyaham /
analyzed: nāṭyasya grahaṇam prāptam brūhi kim karavāṇi aham

original: etattu vacanaṃ śrutvā pratyuvāca pitāmahaḥ // BhN_1.53 //
analyzed: etat tu vacanam śrutvā pratyuvāca pitāmahaḥ
mahān ayam prayogasya samayaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ

original: ayaṃ dhvajamahaḥ śrīmān mahendrasya pravartate // BhN_1.54 //
analyzed: ayam dhvaja mahaḥ śrīmān mahā indrasya pravartate
atrā idānīm ayam vedaḥ nāṭya saṃjñaḥ prayujyatām
tatas tasmin dhvaja mahe nihata asura dānave
prahṛṣṭa amara saṃkīrṇe mahā indra vijaya utsave

original: pūrvaṃ kṛtā mayā nāndī hyāśīrvacasaṃyutā // BhN_1.56 //
analyzed: pūrvam kṛtā mayā nāndī hi āśīrvaca saṃyutā
aṣṭāṅga pada saṃyuktā vicitrā veda nirmitā
tad ante nu kṛtiḥ baddhā yathā daityāḥ suraiḥ jitāḥ
sampheṭa vidrava kṛtā chedya bhedya āhavālmikā
tatas brahma ādayaḥ devāḥ prayoga paritoṣitāḥ
pradaduḥ mad sutebhyaḥ tu sarva upakaraṇāni vai

original: prītastu prathamaṃ śakro dattavānsvaṃ dhvajaṃ śubham // BhN_1.59 //
analyzed: prītaḥ tu prathamam śakraḥ dattavān svam dhvajam śubham

original: brahmā kuṭilakaṃ caiva bhṛṅgāraṃ varuṇaḥ śubham /
analyzed: brahmā kuṭilakam ca eva bhṛṅgāram varuṇaḥ śubham
sūryaḥ chatram śivaḥ siddhim vāyuḥ vyajanam eva ca

original: viṣṇuḥ siṃhāsanaṃ caiva kubero mukuṭaṃ tathā /
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ siṃhāsanam ca eva kuberaḥ mukuṭam tathā

original: śrāvyatvaṃ prekṣaṇīyasya dadau devī sarasvatī // BhN_1.61 //
analyzed: śrāvya tvam prekṣaṇīyasya dadau devī sarasvatī
śeṣāḥ ye deva gandharvāḥ yakṣa rākṣasa pannagāḥ
tasmin sadasi abhipretān nānā jāti guṇa āśrayān

original: aṃśāṃśairbhāṣitaṃ bhāvān rasān rūpaṃ balaṃ tathā /
analyzed: aṃśa aṃśaiḥ bhāṣitam bhāvān rasān rūpam balam tathā
dattavantaḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ te mad sutebhyaḥ divaukasaḥ
evam prayoge prārabdhe daitya dānava nāśane

original: abhavankṣubhitāḥ sarve daityā ye tatra saṅgatāḥ // BhN_1.64 //
analyzed: abhavan kṣubhitāḥ sarve daityāḥ ye tatra saṅgatāḥ
virūpākṣa purogān ca vighnān protsāhya te bruvan
na kṣamiṣyāmahe nāṭyam etat āgamyatām iti
tatas taiḥ asuraiḥ sārdham vighnāḥ māyām upāśritāḥ

original: vācaśceṣṭāṃ smṛtiṃ caiva stambhayanti sma nṛtyatām // BhN_1.66 //
analyzed: vācaḥ ceṣṭām smṛtim ca eva stambhayanti sma nṛtyatām
tathā vidhvaṃsanam dṛṣṭvā sūtradhārasya devarāj
kasmāt prayoga vaiṣamyam iti uktvā dhyānam āviśat
athā apaśyat sadaḥ vighnaiḥ samantāt parivāritam
saha itaraiḥ sūtradhāram naṣṭa saṃjñam jaḍīkṛtam
utthāya tvaritam śakram gṛhītvā dhvajam uttamam
sarva ratna ujjvala tanuḥ locanaḥ
raṅga pīṭha gatān vighnān asurān ca eva
jarjarīkṛta dehān tān akarot jarjareṇa saḥ

original: nihateṣu ca sarveṣua vighneṣu saha dānavaiḥ /
analyzed: nihateṣu ca sarveṣu a vighneṣu saha dānavaiḥ

original: saṃprahṛṣya tato vākyamāhuḥ sarve divaukasaḥ // BhN_1.71 //
analyzed: saṃprahṛṣya tatas vākyam āhuḥ sarve divaukasaḥ
aho praharaṇam divyam idam āsāditam tvayā
jarjarīkṛta sarva aṅgāḥ yena ete dānavāḥ kṛtāḥ
yasmāt anena te vighnāḥ sa asurāḥ jarjarīkṛtāḥ
tasmāt jarjaraḥ evā iti nāmataḥ yam bhaviṣyati
śeṣāḥ ye ca eva hiṃsā artham upayāsyanti hiṃsakāḥ

original: dṛṣṭvaiva jarjaraṃ te 'pi gamiṣyantyevameva tu // BhN_1.74 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva jarjaram te gamiṣyanti evam eva tu
evam eva astu iti tatas śakraḥ provāca tān surān
rakṣā bhūtaḥ ca sarveṣām bhaviṣyati eṣa jarjaraḥ

original: prayoge prastute hyevaṃ sphīte śakramahe punaḥ /
analyzed: prayoge prastute hi evam sphīte śakra mahe punar

original: trāsaṃ sañjanayanti sma vighnāḥ śeṣāstu nṛtyatām // BhN_1.76 //
analyzed: trāsam sañjanayanti sma vighnāḥ śeṣāḥ tu nṛtyatām
dṛṣṭvā teṣām vyavasitam daityānām viprakāra jam

original: upasthito 'haṃ brahmāṇaṃ sutaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ // BhN_1.77 //
analyzed: upasthitaḥ ham brahmāṇam sutaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ
niścitāḥ bhagavan vighnāḥ nāṭyasya asya vināśane
asya rakṣā vidhim samyak ājñāpaya sureśvara
tatas ca viśvakarmāṇam brahmā uvāca prayatnataḥ
kuru lakṣaṇa saṃpannam nāṭya veśma mahāmate
cireṇa kālena viśvakarmā mahat śubham

original: sarvalakṣaṇasampannaṃ kṛtvā nāṭyagṛhaṃ tu saḥ // BhN_1.80 //
analyzed: sarva lakṣaṇa sampannam kṛtvā nāṭya gṛham tu saḥ
proktavān druhiṇam gatvā sabhāyān tu kṛtāñjalīḥ
sajjam nāṭya gṛham deva tat evā īkṣitum arhasi

original: tataḥ saha mahendreṇa suraiḥ sarvaiśca setaraiḥ /
analyzed: tatas saha mahā indreṇa suraiḥ sarvaiḥ ca sa itaraiḥ
āgataḥ tvaritaḥ dṛṣṭum druhiṇaḥ nāṭya maṇḍapam
dṛṣṭvā nāṭya gṛham brahmā prāha sarvān surān tatas
aṃśa bhāgaiḥ bhavadbhiḥ tu rakṣyaḥ yam nāṭya maṇḍapaḥ
rakṣaṇe maṇḍapasya atha viniyuktaḥ tu candramāḥ

original: lokapālāstathā dikṣu vidikṣvapi ca mārutāḥ // BhN_1.84 //
analyzed: lokapālāḥ tathā dikṣu vidikṣu api ca mārutāḥ
nepathya bhūmau mitraḥ tu nikṣiptaḥ varuṇaḥ mbare
vedikā rakṣaṇe vahniḥ bhāṇḍe sarva divaukasaḥ
varṇāḥ catvāraḥ eva atha stambheṣu viniyojitāḥ
ādityāḥ ca eva rudrāḥ ca sthitāḥ
bhūtāni śālāsu apsaraḥ tathā
sarva veśmasu yakṣiṇyaḥ mahī pṛṣṭhe mahā udadhiḥ

original: dvāraśālāniyuktau tu krutāntaḥ kāla eva ca /
analyzed: dvāra śālā niyuktau tu kruta antaḥ kālaḥ eva ca
sthāpitau dvāra patreṣu nāga mukhyau mahā balau
dehalyām yama daṇḍaḥ tu śūlam tasya upari sthitam

original: dvārapālau sthitau caubhau niyatirmṛtyureva ca // BhN_1.89 //
analyzed: dvārapālau sthitau ca ubhau niyatiḥ mṛtyuḥ eva ca
pārśve ca raṅgapīṭhasya mahendraḥ sthitavān svayam
sthāpitā mattavāraṇyām vidyut daitya niṣūdanī
stambheṣu mattavāraṇyāḥ sthāpitā paripālane
bhūta yakṣa piśāḥ ca guhyakāḥ ca mahā balāḥ
jarjare tu vinikṣiptam vajram daitya nibarhaṇam
tad parvasu vinikṣiptāḥ sura indrāḥ hi amita ojasaḥ
śiraḥ parva sthitaḥ brahmā dvitīye śaṅkaraḥ tathā

original: tṛtīye ca sthito viṣṇuścaturthe skanda eva ca // BhN_1.93 //
analyzed: tṛtīye ca sthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ caturthe skandaḥ eva ca
pañcame ca mahā nāgāḥ śeṣa vāsuki takṣakāḥ

original: evaṃ vighnavināśāya sthāpitā jarjare surāḥ // BhN_1.94 //
analyzed: evam vighna vināśāya sthāpitāḥ jarjare surāḥ

original: raṅgapīṭhasya madhye tu svayaṃ brahmā pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: raṅgapīṭhasya madhye tu svayam brahmā pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: iṣṭyarthaṃ raṅgamadhye tu kriyate puṣpamokṣaṇam // BhN_1.95 //
analyzed: iṣṭi artham raṅga madhye tu kriyate puṣpa mokṣaṇam
pātāla vāsinaḥ ye ca yakṣa guhyaka pannagāḥ
adhastāt raṅgapīṭhasya rakṣaṇe te niyojitāḥ
nāyakam rakṣati indraḥ tu nāyikām ca sarasvatī
vidūṣakam atha oṅkāraḥ śeśāḥ tu prakṛtiḥ haraḥ
yāni etāni niyuktāni daivatāni iha rakṣaṇe
etāni eva adhidaivāni bhaviṣyanti iti uvāca saḥ
etasmin antare devaiḥ sarvaiḥ uktaḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: sāmnā tāvadime vighnāḥ sthāpyantāṃ vacasā tvayā // BhN_1.99 //
analyzed: sāmnā tāvat ime vighnāḥ sthāpyantām vacasā tvayā

original: pūrvaṃ sāmaṃ prayoktavyaṃ dvitīyaṃ dānameva ca /
analyzed: pūrvam sāmam prayoktavyam dvitīyam dānam eva ca

original: tayorupari bhedastu tato daṇḍaḥ prayujyate // BhN_1.100 //
analyzed: tayoḥ upari bhedaḥ tu tatas daṇḍaḥ prayujyate

original: devānāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā vighnānuvāca ha /
analyzed: devānām vacanam śrutvā brahmā vighnān uvāca ha
kasmāt bhavantaḥ nāṭyasya vināśāya samutthitāḥ
brahmaṇaḥ vacanam śrutvā virūpākṣaḥ bravīt vacaḥ
daityaiḥ vighna gaṇaiḥ sārdham sāma pūrvam idam tatas
yaḥ yam bhagavatā sṛṣṭaḥ nāṭya vedaḥ sura icchayā
pratyādeśaḥ yam asmākam sura artham bhavatā kṛtaḥ
tat na etat evam kartavyam tvayā lokapitāmaha

original: yathā devastathā daityāstvattaḥ sarve vinirgatāḥ // BhN_1.104 //
analyzed: yathā devaḥ tathā daityāḥ tvattaḥ sarve vinirgatāḥ
vighnānām vacanam śrutvā brahmā vacanam abravīt

original: alaṃ vo manyunā daityā viṣādaṃ tyajatānaghāḥ // BhN_1.105 //
analyzed: alam vaḥ manyunā daityāḥ viṣādam tyajata anaghāḥ
bhavatām devatānām ca śubha aśubha vikalpakaḥ
karma bhāva anvaya apekṣī nāṭya vedaḥ mayā kṛtaḥ
na ekāntataḥ bhavatām devānām ca anubhāvanam
trailokya asya asya sarvasya nāṭyam bhāva anukīrtanam
kvacid dharmaḥ kvacid krīḍā kvacid arthaḥ kvacid śamaḥ
kvacid hāsyam kvacid yuddham kvacid kāmaḥ kvacid vadhaḥ
dharmaḥ dharma pravṛttānām kāmaḥ kāma upasevinām
nigrahaḥ durvinītānām vinītānām dama kriyā
klībānām dhārṣṭya jananam utsāhaḥ śūra māninām
abudhānām vibodhaḥ ca vaiduṣyam viduṣām api
īśvarāṇām vilāsaḥ ca sthairyam duḥkha arditasya ca
artha upajīvinām arthaḥ dhṛtiḥ udvega cetasām
nānā bhāva upasampannam nānā avasthā antara ātmakam
loka vṛtta anukaraṇam nāṭyam etat mayā kṛtam
uttama adhama madhyānām narāṇām karma saṃśrayam
etat raseṣu bhāveṣu sarva karma kriyāsu atha
sarva upadeśa jananam nāṭyam loke bhaviṣyati
duḥkha ārtānām śrama ārtānām śoka ārtānām tapasvinām
viśrānti jananam kāle nāṭyam etat bhaviṣyati
dharmyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam hitam buddhi vivardhanam
loka upadeśa jananam nāṭyam etat bhaviṣyati

original: na tajjñānaṃ na tacchilpaṃ na sā vidyā na sā kalā /
analyzed: na tat jñānam na tat śilpam na sā vidyā na sā kalā

original: nāsau yogo na tatkarma nāṭye 'smin yanna dṛśyate // BhN_1.116 //
analyzed: na asau yogaḥ na tat karma nāṭye smin yat na dṛśyate
tat nā atra manyuḥ kartavyaḥ bhavadbhiḥ amarān prati
saptadvīpā anukaraṇam nāṭyam etat bhaviṣyati
yena anukaraṇam nāṭyam etat tat yat mayā kṛtam
devānām asurāṇām ca rājñām atha kuṭumbinām

original: brahmarṣīṇāṃ ca vijñeyaṃ nāṭyaṃ vṛttāntadarśakam // BhN_1.118 //
analyzed: brahmarṣīṇām ca vijñeyam nāṭyam vṛttānta darśakam
yaḥ yam svabhāvaḥ lokasya sukha duḥkha samanvitaḥ
ṅga ādi abhinaya upetaḥ nāṭyam iti abhidhīyate
veda vidyā itihāsānām ākhyāna parikalpanam
vinoda karaṇam loke nāṭyam etat bhaviṣyati
śruti smṛti sat ācāra pariśeṣa artha kalpanam
vinoda jananam loke nāṭyam etat bhaviṣyati
etasmin antare devān sarvān āha pitāmahaḥ
kriyatām adya vidhivat yajanam nāṭya maṇḍape
bali pradānaiḥ homaiḥ ca mantra oṣadhi samanvitaiḥ
bhojyaiḥ bhakṣaiḥ ca pānaiḥ ca baliḥ samupakalpatām
martya loka gatāḥ sarve śubhām pūjām avāpsyatha

original: apūjayitvā raṅgaṃ tu naiva prekṣāṃ pravartayet // BhN_1.122 //
analyzed: a pūjayitvā raṅgam tu nā eva prekṣām pravartayet

original: apūjayitvā raṅgaṃ tu yaḥ prekṣāṃ kalpayiṣyati /
analyzed: a pūjayitvā raṅgam tu yaḥ prekṣām kalpayiṣyati

original: niṣphalaṃ tasya tat jñānaṃ tiryagyoniṃ ca yāsyati // BhN_1.123 //
analyzed: niṣphalam tasya tat jñānam tiryagyonim ca yāsyati
yajñena saṃmitam hi edadraṅga daivata pūjanam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kartavyam nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ
nartakaḥ ṛthapatiḥ vā api yaḥ pūjām na kariṣyati

original: na kārayiṣyantyanyairvā prāpnotyapacayaṃ tu saḥ // BhN_1.125 //
analyzed: na kārayiṣyanti anyaiḥ vā prāpnoti apacayam tu saḥ
yathāvidhim yathādṛṣṭam yaḥ tu pūjām kariṣyati

original: sa lapsyate śubhānarthān svargalokaṃ ca yāsyati // BhN_1.126 //
analyzed: sa lapsyate śubhān arthān svarga lokam ca yāsyati
evam uktvā tu bhagavān druhiṇaḥ saha devataiḥ
raṅga pūjām kuruśvā iti mām evam samacodayat
iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre nāṭyotpattiḥ nāma prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā papracchuḥ munayaḥ tatas
bhagavan śrotum icchāmaḥ yajanam raṅga saṃśrayam

original: atha vā yā kriyāstatra lakṣaṇaṃ yacca pūjanam /
analyzed: atha vā yāḥ kriyāḥ tatra lakṣaṇam yat ca pūjanam
bhaviṣyadbhiḥ naraiḥ kāryam katham tat nāṭya veśmani
iha ādiḥ nāṭya yogasya nāṭya maṇḍapaḥ eva hi
tasmāt tasya eva tāvat tvam lakṣaṇam vaktum arhasi

original: teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā munīnāṃ bharato 'bravīt /
analyzed: teṣām tu vacanam śrutvā munīnām bharataḥ bravīt

original: lakṣaṇaṃ pūjanaṃ caiva śrūyatāṃ nāṭyaveśmanaḥ // BhN_2.4 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam pūjanam ca eva śrūyatām nāṭya veśmanaḥ
divyānām mānasī sṛṣṭiḥ gṛheṣu upavaneṣu ca
yathā bhāva abhinirvartyāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ tu mānuṣāḥ

original: narāṇāṃ yatnataḥ kāryā lakṣaṇābhihitā kriyā // BhN_2.5 //
analyzed: narāṇām yatnataḥ kāryā lakṣaṇa abhihitā kriyā
śrūyatām tat yathā yatra kartavyaḥ nāṭya maṇḍapaḥ

original: tasya vāstu ca pūjā ca yathā yojyā prayatnataḥ // BhN_2.6 //
analyzed: tasya vāstu ca pūjā ca yathā yojyā prayatnataḥ
iha prekṣya gṛham dṛṣṭvā dhīmatā viśvakarmaṇā
trividhaḥ sanniveśaḥ ca śāstrataḥ parikalpitaḥ
vikṛṣṭaḥ catur aśraḥ ca tri aśraḥ ca eva tu maṇḍapaḥ

original: teṣāṃ trīṇi pramāṇāni jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ tathā'varam // BhN_2.8 //
analyzed: teṣām trīṇi pramāṇāni jyeṣṭham madhyam tathā avaram
pramāṇam eṣām nirdiṣṭam hasta daṇḍa samāśrayam

original: śataṃ cāṣṭau catuḥṣaṣṭirhastā dvātriṃśadeva ca // BhN_2.9 //
analyzed: śatam ca aṣṭau catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ hastāḥ dvātriṃśat eva ca
aṣṭa adhikam śatam jyeṣṭham catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ tu madhyamam

original: kanīyastu tathā veśma hastā dvātriṃśadiṣyate // BhN_2.10 //
analyzed: kanīyaḥ tu tathā veśma hastāḥ dvātriṃśat iṣyate

original: devānāṃ tu bhavejjyeṣṭhaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ madhyamaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: devānām tu bhavet jyeṣṭham nṛpāṇām madhyamam bhavet

original: śeṣāṇāṃ prakṛtīnāṃ tu kanīyaḥ saṃvidhīyate // BhN_2.11 //
analyzed: śeṣāṇām prakṛtīnām tu kanīyaḥ saṃvidhīyate
prekṣāgṛhāṇām sarveṣām praśastam madhyamam smṛtam

original: tatra pāṭhyaṃ ca geyaṃ ca sukhaśrāvyataraṃ bhavet // BhN_2.11* //
analyzed: tatra pāṭhyam ca geyam ca sukha śrāvyataram bhavet
prekṣāgṛhāṇām sarveṣām tri prakāraḥ vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
vikṛṣṭaḥ catur asraḥ ca tri asraḥ ca eva prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: kanīyastu smṛtaṃ tryasraṃ caturasraṃ tu madhyamam /
analyzed: kanīyaḥ tu smṛtam tri asram catur asram tu madhyamam
jyeṣṭham vikṛṣṭam vijñeyam nāṭya veda prayoktṛbhiḥ
pramāṇam yat ca nirdiṣṭam lakṣaṇam viśvakarmaṇā

original: prekṣāgṛhāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ taccaiva hi nibodhata // BhN_2.12 //
analyzed: prekṣāgṛhāṇām sarveṣām tat ca eva hi nibodhata

original: aṇū rajaśca vālaśca likṣā yūkā yavastathā /
analyzed: aṇuḥ rajaḥ ca vālaḥ ca likṣā yūkā yavaḥ tathā

original: aṅgulaṃ ca tathā hasto daṇḍaścaiva prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_2.13 //
analyzed: aṅgulam ca tathā hastaḥ daṇḍaḥ ca eva prakīrtitaḥ

original: aṇavo 'ṣṭau rajaḥ proktaṃ tānyaṣṭau vāla ucyate /
analyzed: aṇavaḥ ṣṭau rajaḥ proktam tāni aṣṭau vālaḥ ucyate

original: vālāstvaṣṭau bhavellikṣā yūkā likṣāṣṭakaṃ bhavet // BhN_2.14 //
analyzed: vālāḥ tu aṣṭau bhavet likṣā yūkā likṣa aṣṭakam bhavet
yūkāḥ tu aṣṭau yavaḥ jñeyaḥ yavāḥ tu aṣṭau tathā aṅgulam
aṅgulāni tathā hastaḥ caturviṃśatiḥ ucyate
catur hastaḥ bhavet daṇḍaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ tu pramāṇataḥ
anena eva pramāṇena vakṣyāmi eṣām vinirṇayam
catuḥṣaṣṭi karān kuryāt dīrgha tvena tu maṇḍapam

original: dvātriṃśataṃ ca vistāranmartyānāṃ yo bhavediha // BhN_2.17 //
analyzed: dvātriṃśatam ca yaḥ bhavet iha
atas ūrdhvam na kartavyaḥ kartṛbhiḥ nāṭya maṇḍapaḥ

original: yasmādavyaktabhāvaṃ hi tatra nāṭyaṃ vrajediti // BhN_2.18 //
analyzed: yasmāt avyakta bhāvam hi tatra nāṭyam vrajet iti
maṇḍape viprakṛṣṭe tu pāṭhyam uccārita svaram
anissaraṇa dharma tvāt visvara tvam bhṛśam vrajet
yaḥ ca api āsya gataḥ bhāvaḥ nānā dṛṣṭi samanvitaḥ

original: sa veśmanaḥ prakṛṣṭatvād vrajedavyaktatāṃ parām // BhN_2.20 //
analyzed: sa veśmanaḥ prakṛṣṭa tvāt vrajet avyakta tām parām
prekṣāgṛhāṇām sarveṣām tasmāt madhyamam iṣyate

original: yāvatpāṭhyaṃ ca geyaṃ ca tatra śravyataraṃ bhavet // BhN_2.21 //
analyzed: yāvat pāṭhyam ca geyam ca tatra śravyataram bhavet
prekṣāgṛhāṇām sarveṣām tri prakāraḥ vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
vikṛṣṭaḥ catur asraḥ ca tri asraḥ ca eva prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: kanīyastu smṛtaṃ tryasraṃ caturasraṃ tu madhyamam /
analyzed: kanīyaḥ tu smṛtam tri asram catur asram tu madhyamam
jyeṣṭham vikṛṣṭam vijñeyam nāṭya veda prayoktṛbhiḥ
devānām mānasī sṛṣṭiḥ gṛheṣu upavaneṣu ca

original: yatnabhāvābhiniṣpannāḥ sarve bhāvā hi mānuṣā // BhN_2.22 //
analyzed: yatna bhāva abhiniṣpannāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ hi mānuṣā
tasmāt deva kṛtaiḥ bhāvaiḥ na vispardheta mānuṣaḥ

original: mānuṣasya tu gehasya sampravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam // BhN_2.23 //
analyzed: mānuṣasya tu gehasya sampravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam
bhūmeḥ vibhāgam pūrvam tu parīkṣeta prayojaka

original: tato vāstu pramāṇena prārabheta śubhecchayā // BhN_2.24 //
analyzed: tatas vāstu pramāṇena prārabheta śubha icchayā

original: samā sthirā tu kaṭhinā kṛṣṇā gaurī ca yā bhavet /
analyzed: samā sthirā tu kaṭhinā kṛṣṇā gaurī ca yā bhavet
bhūmiḥ tatra eva kartavyaḥ kartṛbhiḥ nāṭya maṇḍapaḥ
prathamam śodhanam kṛtvā lāṅgalena samutkṛṣet
asthi kīla kapālāni tṛṇa gulmān ca śodhayet
śodhayitvā vasumatīm pramāṇam nirdiśet tatas
trīṇi uttarāṇi saumyam ca viśākhā api ca revatī
hasti tiṣya anurādhāḥ ca praśastāḥ nāṭya karmaṇi
puṣya nakṣatra yogena śuklam sūtram prasārayet

original: kārpāsaṃ bālbajaṃ vāpi mauñjaṃ vālkalameva ca /
analyzed: kārpāsam bālbajam vā api mauñjam vālkalam eva ca

original: sūtraṃ budhaistu kartavyaṃ yasya cchedo na vidyate // BhN_2.28 //
analyzed: sūtram budhaiḥ tu kartavyam yasya chedaḥ na vidyate
ardha chinne bhavet sūtre svāminaḥ maraṇam dhruvam
tri bhāga chinnayā rajvā rāṣṭra kopaḥ vidhīyate
chinnāyām tu catur bhāge prayoktuḥ nāśaḥ ucyate
hastāt prabhraṣṭayā vā api kaścid tu apacayaḥ bhavet
tasmāt nityam prayatnena rajju grahaṇam iṣyate

original: kāryaṃ caiva prayatnena mānaṃ nāṭyagṛhasya tu // BhN_2.31 //
analyzed: kāryam ca eva prayatnena mānam nāṭya gṛhasya tu
muhūrtena anukūlena tithyā su karaṇena ca
brāhmaṇān tarpayitvā tu puṇyāham vācayet tatas

original: śāntitoyaṃ tato dattvā tataḥ sūtraṃ prasārayet /
analyzed: śānti toyam tatas dattvā tatas sūtram prasārayet
catuṣṣaṣṭi karān kṛtvā dvidhā kuryāt punar ca tān

original: pṛṣṭhato yo bhavedbhāgo dvidhābhūtasya tasya tu /
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas yaḥ bhavet bhāgaḥ dvidhā bhūtasya tasya tu
samam ardha vibhāgena raṅga śīrṣam prakalpayet
paścime ca vibhāge nepathya gṛham ādiśet
vibhajya bhāgān vidhivat ya yathāvat anupūrvaśas
śubhe nakṣatra yoge ca maṇḍapasya niveśanam
śaṅkha dundubhi nirghoṣaiḥ mṛdaṅga paṇava ādibhiḥ
sarva ātodyaiḥ praṇuditaiḥ sthāpanam kāryam eva tu
utsāryāṇi tu aniṣṭāni pāṣaṇḍi āśramiṇaḥ tathā
kāṣāya vasanāḥ ca eva vikalāḥ ca eava ye narāḥ

original: niśāyāṃ ca baliḥ kāryā nānābhojanasaṃyutaḥ // BhN_2.38 //
analyzed: niśāyām ca baliḥ kāryā nānā bhojana saṃyutaḥ
gandha puṣpa phala upetāḥ diśaḥ daśa samāśritaḥ

original: pūrveṇa śuklānnayuto nīlānno dakṣiṇena ca // BhN_2.39 //
analyzed: pūrveṇa śukla anna yutaḥ nīla annaḥ dakṣiṇena ca
paścimena baliḥ pītaḥ raktaḥ ca eva uttareṇa tu

original: yādṛśaṃ diśi yasyāṃ tu daivataṃ parikalpitam // BhN_2.40 //
analyzed: yādṛśam diśi yasyām tu daivatam parikalpitam
tādṛśaḥ tatra dātavyaḥ baliḥ mantra puraskṛtaḥ
sthāpane brāhmaṇebhyaḥ ca dātavyam ghṛta pāyasam
madhuparkaḥ tathā rājñe kartṛbhyaḥ ca guḍa odanam

original: nakṣatreṇa tu kartavyaṃ mūlena sthāpanaṃ budhaiḥ // BhN_2.42 //
analyzed: nakṣatreṇa tu kartavyam mūlena sthāpanam budhaiḥ
muhūrtena anukūlena tithyā su karaṇena ca

original: evaṃ tu sthāpanaṃ kṛtvā bhittikarma prayojayet // BhN_2.43 //
analyzed: evam tu sthāpanam kṛtvā bhitti karma prayojayet
bhitti karmaṇi nirvṛtte stambhānām sthāpanam tatas
tithi nakṣatra yogena śubhena karaṇena ca

original: stambhānāṃ sthāpanaṃ kāryaṃ rohiṇyā śravaṇena vā /
analyzed: stambhānām sthāpanam kāryam rohiṇyā śravaṇena vā
ācāryeṇa su yuktena tri rātra upoṣitena ca

original: stambhānāṃ sthāpanaṃ kāryaṃ prāpte sūryodaye śubhe /
analyzed: stambhānām sthāpanam kāryam prāpte sūrya udaye śubhe
prathame brāhmaṇa stambhe sarpiḥ sarṣapa saṃskṛtaḥ
sarva śuklaḥ vidhiḥ kāryaḥ dadyāt pāyasam eva ca
tatas ca kṣatriya stambhe vastra mālya anulepanam
raktam pradātavyam dvijebhyaḥ ca guḍa odanam

original: vaiśyastambhe vidhiḥ kāryo digbhāge paścimottare // BhN_2.48 //
analyzed: vaiśya stambhe vidhiḥ kāryaḥ digbhāge paścimottare
sarvam prītam pradātavyam dvijebhyaḥ ca ghṛtaudanam
śūdra stambhe vidhiḥ kāryaḥ samyak pūrva uttara āśraye
nīla prāyam prayatnena kūsaram ca dvija aśanam
pūrva ukta brāhmaṇa stambhe śukla mālya anulepane
nikṣipet kanakam mūle karṇa ābharaṇa saṃśrayam

original: tāmraṃ cādhaḥ pradātavyaṃ stambhe kṣatriyasaṃjñake // BhN_2.51 //
analyzed: tāmram ca adhas pradātavyam stambhe kṣatriya saṃjñake
vaiśya stambhasya mūle tu rajatam sampradāpayet

original: śūdrastambhasya mūle tu dadyādāyasameva ca // BhN_2.52 //
analyzed: śūdra stambhasya mūle tu dadyāt āyasam eva ca
sarveṣu eva tu nikṣepyam stambha mūleṣu kāñcanam
svasti puṇya aha ghoṣeṇa jaya śabdena ca eva hi
stambhānām sthāpanam kāryam puṣpa mālā puraskṛtam
ratna dānaiḥ sa go dānaiḥ vastra dānaiḥ analpakaiḥ
brāhmaṇān tarpayitvā tu stambhān utthāpayet tatas
acalam ca api akampan ca tathā eva a valitam punar
stambhasya utthāpane samyak doṣāḥ hi ete prakīrtitāḥ

original: avṛṣṭiruktā calane valane mṛtyuto bhayam // BhN_2.56 //
analyzed: avṛṣṭiḥ uktā calane valane mṛtyutaḥ bhayam
kampane para cakrāt tu bhayam bhavati dāruṇam
doṣaiḥ etaiḥ vihīnam tu stambham utthāpayet śivam

original: pavitre brāhmaṇastambhe dātavyā dakṣiṇā ca gauḥ /
analyzed: pavitre brāhmaṇa stambhe dātavyā dakṣiṇā ca gauḥ

original: śeṣāṇāṃ bhojanaṃ kāryaṃ sthāpane kartṛsaṃśrayam // BhN_2.58 //
analyzed: śeṣāṇām bhojanam kāryam sthāpane kartṛ saṃśrayam
mantra pūtam ca tat deyam nāṭya ācāryeṇa dhīmatā
purohitam nṛpam ca eva bhojayet madhu pāyasaiḥ
kartṝn ā api tathā sarvān kṛsarām lavaṇa uttarām

original: sarvamevaṃ vidhiṃ kṛtvā sarvātodyaiḥ pravāditaiḥ // BhN_2.60 //
analyzed: sarvam evam vidhim kṛtvā sarva ātodyaiḥ pravāditaiḥ
abhimantrya yathānyāyam stambhān utthāpayet śuciḥ
yathā acalaḥ giriḥ meruḥ himavān ca mahā balaḥ
jaya āvahaḥ narendrasya tathā tvam acalaḥ bhava

original: stambhadvāraṃ ca bhittiṃ ca nepathyagṛhameva ca // BhN_2.62 //
analyzed: stambha dvāram ca bhittim ca nepathya gṛham eva ca
evam utthāpaya itad jñaḥ vidhi dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: raṅgapīṭhasya pārśve tu kartavyā mattavāraṇī // BhN_2.63 //
analyzed: raṅga pīṭhasya pārśve tu kartavyā mattavāraṇī
catu stambha samāyuktāḥ raṅga pīṭha pramāṇataḥ
adhyardha hasta utsedhena kartavyā mattavāraṇī
utsedhena tayoḥ tulyam kartavyam raṅga maṇḍapam

original: tasyāṃ mālyaṃ ca dhūpaṃ ca gandhaṃ vastraṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_2.65 //
analyzed: tasyām mālyam ca dhūpam ca gandham vastram tathā eva ca
nānā varṇāni deyāni tathā bhūta priyaḥ baliḥ

original: āyasaṃ tatra dātavyaṃ stambhānāṃ kuśailairadhaḥ // BhN_2.66 //
analyzed: āyasam tatra dātavyam stambhānām kuśailaiḥ adhas
bhojane kṛsarāḥ ca eva dātavyam brāhmaṇa aśanam
evam vidhi puraskāraiḥ kartavyā mattavāraṇī
raṅga pīṭham tatas kāryam vidhi dṛṣṭeṇa karmaṇā
raṅga śīrṣaḥ tu kartavyam ṣaṣ dāruka samanvitam
kāryam dvāra dvayam ca atra nepathya gṛhakasya tu

original: pūraṇe mṛttikā cātra kṛṣṇā deyā prayatnataḥ // BhN_2.69 //
analyzed: pūraṇe mṛttikā ca atra kṛṣṇā deyā prayatnataḥ
lāṅgalena samutkṛṣya nirloṣṭa tṛṇa śarkaram

original: lāṅgale śuddhavarṇo tu dhuryo yojyau prayatnataḥ // BhN_2.70 //
analyzed: lāṅgale tu dhuryau yojyau prayatnataḥ
kartāraḥ puruṣaḥ ca atra ye ṅga doṣa vivirjitāḥ
ahīna aṅgaiḥ ca voḍhavyā mṛttikā piṭakaiḥ navaiḥ
evaṃvidhaiḥ prakartavyam raṅga śīrṣam prayatnataḥ

original: kūrmapṛṣṭhaṃ na kartavyaṃ matsyapṛṣṭhaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_2.72 //
analyzed: kūrma pṛṣṭham na kartavyam matsya pṛṣṭham tathā eva ca
śuddha ādarśa tala ākāram raṅga śīrṣam praśasyate

original: ratnāni cātra deyāni pūrve vajraṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ // BhN_2.73 //
analyzed: ratnāni ca atra deyāni pūrve vajram vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: vaiḍūryaṃ dakṣiṇe pārśve sphaṭikaṃ paścime tathā /
analyzed: vaiḍūryam dakṣiṇe pārśve sphaṭikam paścime tathā

original: pravālamuttare caiva madhye tu kanakaṃ bhavet // BhN_2.74 //
analyzed: pravālam uttare ca eva madhye tu kanakam bhavet
evam raṅga śiraḥ kṛtvā dāru karma prayojayet
ūha pratyūha saṃyuktaḥ nānā śilpa prayojitam
nānā sañjavana upetam bahu vyāla upaśobhitam
sa sālabhañjikābhiḥ ca samantāt samalaṅkṛtam
nirvyūha kuhara upetam nānā grathita vedikam
nānā vinyāsa saṃyuktam citra jāla gavākṣakam
su pīṭha dhāriṇī yuktam kapota ālī samākulam
nānā kuṭṭima vinyastaiḥ stambhaiḥ ca api upaśobhitam
evam kāṣṭha vidhim kṛtvā bhitti karma prayojayet

original: stambhaṃ vā nāgadantaṃ vā vātāyanamathāpi vā // BhN_2.79 //
analyzed: stambham vā nāgadantam vā vātāyanam atha api vā

original: koṇaṃ vā sapratidvāraṃ dvāraviddhaṃ na kārayet /
analyzed: koṇam vā sa pratidvāram dvāra viddham na kārayet
kāryaḥ śaila guhā ākāraḥ dvi bhūmiḥ nāṭya maṇḍapaḥ
manda vātāyana upetaḥ nirvātaḥ dhīra śabdavān
tasmāt nivātaḥ kartavyaḥ kartṛbhiḥ nāṭya maṇḍapaḥ
gambhīra svara tā yena kutapasya bhaviṣyati
bhitti karma vidhim kṛtvā bhitti lepam pradāpayet
sudhā karma bahis tasya vidhātavyam prayatnataḥ
bhittiṣu atha viliptāsu parimṛṣṭāsu sarvatas
samāsu jāta śobhāsu citrakarma prayojayet
citrakarmaṇi ca ālekhyāḥ puruṣāḥ srī janāḥ tathā
latābandhāḥ ca kartavyāḥ caritam

original: evaṃ vikṛṣṭaṃ kartavyaṃ nāṭyaveśma prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_2.85 //
analyzed: evam vikṛṣṭam kartavyam nāṭya veśma prayoktṛbhiḥ
punar eva hi vakṣyāmi catur aśrasya lakṣaṇam

original: samantataśca kartavyā hastā dvātriṃśadeva tu // BhN_2.86 //
analyzed: samantataḥ ca kartavyāḥ hastāḥ dvātriṃśat eva tu
śubha bhūmi vibhāga sthaḥ nāṭya jñaiḥ nāṭya maṇḍapaḥ

original: yo vidhiḥ pūrvamuktastu lakṣaṇaṃ maṅgalāni ca // BhN_2.87 //
analyzed: yaḥ vidhiḥ pūrvam uktaḥ tu lakṣaṇam maṅgalāni ca
vikṛṣṭe tāni aśeṣāṇi catur aśre kārayet

original: caturaśraṃ samaṃ kṛtvā sūtreṇa pravibhajya ca // BhN_2.88 //
analyzed: catur aśram samam kṛtvā sūtreṇa pravibhajya ca

original: bāhyataḥ sarvataḥ kāryā bhittiḥ śliṣṭeṣṭakā dṛḍhā /
analyzed: bāhyatas sarvatas kāryā bhittiḥ śliṣṭa iṣṭakā dṛḍhā
tatra abhyantaratas kāryāḥ raṅga pīṭha upari sthitāḥ
daśa prayoktṛbhiḥ stambhāḥ śaktāḥ maṇḍapa dhāraṇe
stambhānām bāhyatas ca api sopāna ākṛti pīṭhakam
iṣṭakā dārubhiḥ kāryam prekṣakāṇām niveśanam
hasta pramāṇaiḥ utsedhaiḥ bhūmi bhāga samutthitaiḥ
raṅga pīṭha avalokyam tu kuryāt āsana jam vidhim
ṣaṭ anyān antare ca eva punar stambhān yathādiśam
vidhinā sthāpayeta ajñaḥ dṛḍhān maṇḍapa dhāraṇe
aṣṭau stambhān punar ca eva teṣām upari kalpayet
sthāpyam ca eva tatas pīṭham aṣṭa hasta pramāṇataḥ

original: viddhāsyamaṣṭahastaṃ ca pīṭhaṃ teṣu tato nyaset // BhN_2.94 //
analyzed: viddha āsyam aṣṭa hastam ca pīṭham teṣu tatas nyaset
tatra stambhāḥ pradātavyāḥ tad jñaiḥ maṇḍapa dhāraṇe
dhāraṇī dhāraṇāḥ te ca śāla strībhiḥ alaṅkṛtāḥ
nepathya gṛhakam ca eva tatas kāryam prayatnataḥ
dvāram ca ekam bhavet tatra raṅga pīṭha praveśanam
jana praveśanam ca anyat ābhimukhyena kārayet

original: raṅgasyābhimukhaṃ kāryaṃ dvitīyaṃ dvārameva tu // BhN_2.97 //
analyzed: raṅgasya abhimukham kāryam dvitīyam dvāram eva tu
aṣṭa hastam tu kartavyam raṅga pīṭham pramāṇataḥ
caturaśram sama talam vedikā samalaṅkṛtam
pūrva pramāṇa nirdiṣṭā kartavyā mattavāraṇī
catur stambha samāyuktā vedikāyāḥ tu pārśvatas

original: samunnataṃ samaṃ caiva raṅgaśīrṣaṃ tu kārayet /
analyzed: samunnatam samam ca eva raṅga śīrṣam tu kārayet

original: vikṛṣṭe tūnnataṃ kāryaṃ caturaśre samaṃ tathā // BhN_2.100 //
analyzed: vikṛṣṭe tu unnatam kāryam catur aśre samam tathā
evam etena vidhinā catur aśram gṛham bhavet

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi tryaśragehasya lakṣaṇam // BhN_2.101 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi tri aśra gehasya lakṣaṇam
tryaśram tri koṇam kartavyam nāṭya veśma prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: madhye trikoṇamevāsya raṅgapīṭhaṃ tu kārayet // BhN_2.102 //
analyzed: madhye tri koṇam eva asya raṅga pīṭham tu kārayet

original: dvāraṃ tainaiva koṇena kartavyaṃ tasya veśmanaḥ /
analyzed: dvāram tainā eva koṇena kartavyam tasya veśmanaḥ

original: dvitīyaṃ caiva kartavyaṃ raṅgapīṭhasya pṛṣṭhataḥ // BhN_2.103 //
analyzed: dvitīyam ca eva kartavyam raṅga pīṭhasya pṛṣṭhatas
vidhiḥ yaḥ catur aśrasya bhitti stambha samāśrayaḥ

original: sa tu sarvaḥ prayoktavyastryaśrasyāpi prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_2.104 //
analyzed: sa tu sarvaḥ prayoktavyaḥ tri aśrasya api prayoktṛbhiḥ
evam etena vidhinā kāryāḥ nāṭya gṛhāḥ budhaiḥ
punar eṣām pravakṣyāmi pūjām evam yathā vidhiḥ

original: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre maṇḍapavidhāno nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre maṇḍapavidhānaḥ nāma dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha tṛtīyaḥ udhyāyaḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpanne kṛte nāṭya gṛhe śubhe

original: gāvo vaseyuḥ saptāhaṃ saha japyaparairdvijaiḥ // BhN_3.1 //
analyzed: gāvaḥ vaseyuḥ sapta aham saha japya paraiḥ dvijaiḥ
tatas dhivāsayet veśma raṅga pīṭham tathā eva ca
mantra pūtena toyena prokṣita aṅgaḥ niśā āgame
yathāsthāna antara gataḥ dīkṣitaḥ prayataḥ śuciḥ
tri rātra upoṣitaḥ bhūtvā nāṭya ācāryaḥ hata ambaraḥ
namaskṛtya mahādevam sarva loka udbhavam bhavam

original: jagatpitāmahaṃ caiva viṣṇumindraṃ guhaṃ tathā // BhN_3.4 //
analyzed: jagat pitāmaham ca eva viṣṇum indram guham tathā

original: sarasvatīṃ ca lakṣmīṃ ca siddhiṃ medhāṃ dhṛtiṃ smṛtim /
analyzed: sarasvatīm ca lakṣmīm ca siddhim medhām dhṛtim smṛtim

original: somaṃ sūryaṃ ca maruto lokapālāṃstathāśvinau // BhN_3.5 //
analyzed: somam sūryam ca marutaḥ lokapālān tathā aśvinau
mitram agnim surān varṇān rudrān kālam kalim tathā

original: mṛtyuṃ ca niyatiṃ caiva kāladaṇḍaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_3.6 //
analyzed: mṛtyum ca niyatim ca eva kāladaṇḍam tathā eva ca
viṣṇu praharaṇam ca eva nāga rājam ca vāsukim
vajram vidyut samudrān ca gandharva apsarasaḥ munīn
bhūtān piśācān yakṣān ca guhyakān ca maheśvarān
asurān nāṭya vighnān ca tathā anyān daitya rākṣasān
tathā nāṭya kumārīḥ ca mahā grāmaṇyam eva ca
yakṣān ca guhyakān ca eva bhūta saṅghāḥ tathā eva ca
etān ca anyān ca devarṣīn praṇamya racita añjaliḥ
yathāsthāna antara gatān samāvāhya tatas vadet
bhavadbhiḥ naḥ niśāyām tu kartavyaḥ samparigrahaḥ
sāhāyyam ca eva dātavyam asmin nāṭye saha anugaiḥ
sampūjya sarvān ekatra kutapam samprayujya ca
jarjarāya prayuñjīta pūjām nāṭya prasiddhaye
tvam mahā indra praharaṇam sarva dānava sūdanam
nirmitaḥ sarva devaiḥ ca sarva vighna nibarhaṇa

original: nṛpasya vijayaṃ śaṃsa ripūṇāṃ ca parājayam /
analyzed: nṛpasya vijayam śaṃsa ripūṇām ca parājayam

original: gobrāhmaṇaśivaṃ caiva nāṭyasya ca vivardhanam // BhN_3.14 //
analyzed: go brāhmaṇa śivam ca eva nāṭyasya ca vivardhanam
evam kṛtvā yathānyāyam upāsyam nāṭya maṇḍape

original: niśāyāṃ tu prabhātāyāṃ pūjanaṃ prakramediha // BhN_3.15 //
analyzed: niśāyām tu prabhātāyām pūjanam prakramet iha

original: ārdrāyāṃ vā maghāyāṃ vā yāmye pūrveṣu vā triṣu /
analyzed: ārdrāyām vā maghāyām vā yāmye pūrveṣu vā triṣu
āśleṣā mūlayoḥ vā api kartavyam raṅga pūjanam

original: ācāryeṇa tu yuktena śucinā dīkṣitena ca /
analyzed: ācāryeṇa tu yuktena śucinā dīkṣitena ca

original: raṅgasyodyotanaṃ kāryaṃ devatānāṃ ca pūjanam // BhN_3.17 //
analyzed: raṅgasya udyotanam kāryam devatānām ca pūjanam
dina ante dāruṇe ghore muhūrte yama daivate

original: ācamya tu yathānyāyaṃ devatā vai niveśayat // BhN_3.18 //
analyzed: ācamya tu yathānyāyam devatāḥ vai niveśayat
raktāḥ pratisarāḥ sūtram rakta gandhāḥ ca pūjitāḥ

original: raktāḥ sumanasaścaiva yacca raktaṃ phalaṃ bhavet // BhN_3.19 //
analyzed: raktāḥ sumanasaḥ ca eva yat ca raktam phalam bhavet
yavaiḥ siddhārthakaiḥ lājaiḥ akṣataiḥ śāli taṇḍulaiḥ
nāgapuṣpasya cūrṇena vituṣābhiḥ priyaṅgubhiḥ
etaiḥ dravyaiḥ yutam kuryāt devatānām niveśanam
ālikhet maṇḍalam pūrvam yathāsthānam yathā vidhiḥ
samantastas ca kartavyam hastā ṣoḍaśa maṇḍalam

original: dvārāṇi cātra kurvīta vidhānena caturdiśam // BhN_3.22 //
analyzed: dvārāṇi ca atra kurvīta vidhānena caturdiśam

original: madhye caivātra kartavye dve rekhe tiryagūrdhvage /
analyzed: madhye ca eva atra kartavye dve rekhe tiryak ūrdhva ge
tayoḥ kakṣyā vibhāgena daivatāni niveśayat
padma upaviṣṭam brahmāṇam tasya madhye niveśayet

original: ādau niveśyo bhagavānsārdhaṃ bhūtagaṇaiḥ śivaḥ // BhN_3.24 //
analyzed: ādau niveśyaḥ bhagavān sārdham bhūta gaṇaiḥ śivaḥ
nārāyaṇaḥ mahā indraḥ ca skandaḥ sūryaḥ śvinau śaśī

original: sarasvatī ca lakṣmīśca śraddhā medhā ca pūrvataḥ // BhN_3.25 //
analyzed: sarasvatī ca lakṣmīḥ ca śraddhā medhā ca pūrvatas
pūrva dakṣiṇatas vahniḥ niveśyaḥ svāhayā saha
viśvedevāḥ sa gandharvāḥ rudrāḥ sarpa gaṇāḥ tathā
dakṣiṇena niveśyaḥ tu yamaḥ mitraḥ ca sa anugaḥ
pitṝn piśācān uragān guhyakān ca niveśayat
naiṝtyām rākṣasān ca eva bhūtāni ca niveśayat

original: paścimāyāṃ samudrāṃśca varuṇaṃ yādasāṃ patim // BhN_3.28 //
analyzed: paścimāyām samudrān ca varuṇam yādasām patim
vāyavyāyām diśi tathā sapta vāyūn niveśayet

original: tatraiva viniveśyastu garuḍaḥ pakṣibhiḥ saha // BhN_3.29 //
analyzed: tatra eva viniveśyaḥ tu garuḍaḥ pakṣibhiḥ saha
uttarasyām diśi tathā dhanadam

original: nāṭyasya mātṝśca tathā yakṣānatha saguhyakān // BhN_3.30 //
analyzed: nāṭyasya mātṝḥ ca tathā yakṣān atha sa guhyakān
tathā eva uttara pūrvāyām nandi ādyān ca gaṇeśvarān
brahmarṣi bhūta saṃghān ca yathābhāgam niveśayat

original: stambhe sanatkumāraṃ tu dakṣiṇe dakṣameva ca /
analyzed: stambhe sanatkumāram tu dakṣiṇe dakṣam eva ca
grāmaṇyam uttare stambhe pūjā artham
anena eava vidhānena yathāsthānam yathāvidhi
su prasādāni sarvāṇi daivatāni niveśayat

original: sthāne sthāne yathānyāyaṃ viniveśya tu devatāḥ /
analyzed: sthāne sthāne yathānyāyam viniveśya tu devatāḥ

original: tāsāṃ prakurvīta tataḥ pūjanaṃ tu yathārhataḥ // BhN_3.34 //
analyzed: tāsām prakurvīta tatas pūjanam tu yathārhataḥ
devatābhyaḥ tu dātavyam sita mālya anulepanam
gandharva vahni sūryobhyaḥ rakta mālya anulepanam

original: gandhaṃ mālyaṃ ca dhūpaṃ ca yathāvadanupūrvaśaḥ /
analyzed: gandham mālyam ca dhūpam ca yathāvat anupūrvaśas

original: datvā tataḥ prakurvīta baliṃ pūjāṃ yathāvidhiḥ // BhN_3.36 //
analyzed: da tvā tatas prakurvīta balim pūjām yathā vidhiḥ
brahmāṇam madu karpeṇa pāyasena sarasvatīm
śiva viṣṇu mahā indra ādyāḥ sampūjyāḥ modakaiḥ atha
ghṛtaudanena hutabhuj soma rkau tu guḍa odanaiḥ
viśvedevāḥ sa gandharvāḥ munayaḥ madhu pāyasaiḥ
yama mitrau ca sampūjyau apūpaiḥ modakaiḥ tathā
pitṝn piśācān uragān sarpiḥ kṣīreṇa tarpayet
pakvā anena tu māṃsena surā sīthu phala āsavaiḥ
arcayet bhūta saṃghān ca caṇakaiḥ palala āplutaiḥ
anena eva vidhānena sampūjyā mattavāraṇī

original: pakvāmena tu māṃsena sampūjyā rakṣasāṃ gaṇāḥ // BhN_3.41 //
analyzed: pakva āmena tu māṃsena sampūjyāḥ rakṣasām gaṇāḥ
dānavān pratipūjayet
śeṣān deva gaṇān tad jñaḥ sa apūpa utkārikā odanaiḥ
matsyaiḥ ca piṣṭa bhakṣyaiḥ ca sāgarān saritaḥ tathā

original: sampūjya varuṇaṃ cāpi dātavyaṃ ghṛtapāyasam // BhN_3.43 //
analyzed: sampūjya varuṇam ca api dātavyam ghṛta pāyasam
nānā phūla phalaḥ ca api munīn sampratipūjayet
vāyūn ca pakṣiṇaḥ ca eva vicitraiḥ bhakṣya bhojanaiḥ
mātṝḥ nāṭyasya sarvāḥ tāḥ dhanadam ca saha anugaiḥ
apūpaiḥ lājikā miśraiḥ bhakṣya bhojyaiḥ ca pūjayet
evam eṣām baliḥ kāryaḥ nānā bhojana saṃśrayaḥ
punar mantra vidhānena bali karma ca vakṣyate
devadeva mahābhāga sarva loka pitāmaha

original: mantrapūtamimaṃ sarvaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva me balim // BhN_3.47 //
analyzed: mantra pūtam imam sarvam pratigṛhṇīṣva me balim
devadeva mahābhāga gaṇeśa tripurāntaka
pragṛhyatām baliḥ deva mantra pūtaḥ mayā udyataḥ
nārāyaṇa amita gate padmanābha surottama
pragṛhyatām baliḥ deva mantra pūtaḥ mayā arpitaḥ
purandara amarapate vajrapāṇe śatakrato
pragṛhyatām baliḥ deva vidhi mantra puraskṛtaḥ
deva senāpate skanda bhagavan śaṅkara priya

original: baliḥ prītena manasā ṣaṇmukha pratigṛhyatām // BhN_3.51 //
analyzed: baliḥ prītena manasā ṣaṇmukha pratigṛhyatām
mahādeva mahāyogin devadeva surottama

original: saṃpragṛhya baliṃ deva rakṣa vighnātsadotthitāt // BhN_3.51* //
analyzed: saṃpragṛhya balim deva rakṣa vighnāt sadā utthitāt
devi deva mahābhāge sarasvati haripriye
pragṛhyatām baliḥ mātar mayā bhaktyā samarpitaḥ
nānā nimitta sambhūtāḥ paulastyāḥ sarve eva tu

original: rākṣasendrā mahāsatvāḥ pratigṛhṇīta me balim // BhN_3.53 //
analyzed: rākṣasa indrāḥ mahā satvāḥ pratigṛhṇīta me balim
lakṣmīḥ siddhiḥ matiḥ medhā sarva loka namaskṛtāḥ

original: mantrapūtamimaṃ devyaḥ pratigṛhṇantu me balim // BhN_3.54 //
analyzed: mantra pūtam imam devyaḥ pratigṛhṇantu me balim
sarva bhūta anubhāva jña loka jīvana māruta
pragṛhyatām baliḥ deva mantra pūtaḥ mayā udyataḥ
deva vaktra sura śreṣṭha dhūmaketo hutāśana

original: bhaktyā samudyato deva baliḥ samprati gṛhyatām // BhN_3.56 //
analyzed: bhaktyā samudyataḥ deva baliḥ samprati gṛhyatām
sarva grahāṇām pravara tejaḥ rāśe divākara

original: bhaktyā mayodyato deva baliḥ samprati gṛhyatām // BhN_3.57 //
analyzed: bhaktyā mayā udyataḥ deva baliḥ samprati gṛhyatām
sarva graha pate soma dvijarāja jagat priya
pragṛhyatām eṣa baliḥ mantra pūtaḥ mayā udyataḥ
mahā gaṇa īśvarāḥ sarve nandi īśvara purogamāḥ

original: pragṛtāṃ balirbhaktyā mayā samprati coditaḥ // BhN_3.59 //
analyzed: pragṛtām baliḥ bhaktyā mayā samprati coditaḥ
namaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pratigṛhṇantu imam balim
bhūtebhyaḥ ca namaḥ nityam yeṣām eṣa baliḥ priyaḥ

original: kāmapāla namo nityaṃ yasyāyaṃ te vidhiḥ kṛtaḥ // BhN_3.60 //
analyzed: kāmapāla namaḥ nityam yasya ayam te vidhiḥ kṛtaḥ
nāradaḥ tumbaruḥ ca eva viśvāvasu purogamāḥ

original: parigṛhṇantu me sarve gandharvā balimudyatam // BhN_3.61 //
analyzed: parigṛhṇantu me sarve gandharvāḥ balim udyatam
yamaḥ mitraḥ ca bhagavān īśvarau loka pūjitau

original: imaṃ me pratigṛhṇītāṃ baliḥ mantrapuraskṛtam // BhN_3.62 //
analyzed: imam me pratigṛhṇītām baliḥ mantra puraskṛtam
rasātala gatebhyaḥ ca pannagebhyaḥ namaḥ namaḥ

original: diśantu siddhiṃ nāṭyasya pūjitāḥ pāpanāśanāḥ // BhN_3.63 //
analyzed: diśantu siddhim nāṭyasya pūjitāḥ pāpa nāśanāḥ
sarva ambhasām patiḥ devaḥ varuṇaḥ haṃsa vāhanaḥ
pūjitaḥ prīta mānaḥ tu sa samudra nadīnadaḥ
vainateya mahā satva sarva pakṣi pate vibho
pragṛhyatām baliḥ deva mantra pūtaḥ mayā udyataḥ
sa guhyakaḥ sa yakṣaḥ ca pratigṛhṇātu me balim
namaḥ stu nāṭya mātṛbhyaḥ brāhmī ādyābhyaḥ namaḥ namaḥ
su mukhībhiḥ prasannābhiḥ baliḥ adya pragṛhyatām
rudra praharaṇam sarvam pratigṛhṇātu me balim
viṣṇu praharaṇam ca eva viṣṇu bhaktyā mayā udyatam
tathā kṛtāntaḥ kālaḥ ca sarva prāṇi vadha īśvarau

original: mṛtyuśca niyatiścaiva pratigṛhṇātu me balim // BhN_3.69 //
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ ca niyatiḥ ca eva pratigṛhṇātu me balim
yāḥ ca asyām mattavāraṇyām saṃśritāḥ vastu devatāḥ
mantra pūtam imam samyak pratigṛhṇantu me balim

original: anye ye devagandharvā diśo daśa samāśritāḥ /
analyzed: anye ye deva gandharvāḥ diśaḥ daśa samāśritāḥ
divya āntarikṣa ābhaumāḥ ca tebhyaḥ ca ayam baliḥ kṛtaḥ
kumbham salila sampūrṇam puṣpa mālā puraskṛtam

original: sthāpayedraṅgamadhye tu suvarṇaṃ cātra dāpayet // BhN_3.72 //
analyzed: sthāpayet raṅga madhye tu suvarṇam ca atra dāpayet

original: ātodyāni tu sarvāṇi kṛtvā vastrottarāṇi tu /
analyzed: ātodyāni tu sarvāṇi kṛtvā vastra uttarāṇi tu
gandhaiḥ mālyaiḥ ca dhūpaiḥ ca bhakṣyaiḥ bhojyaiḥ ca pūjayet
pūjayitvā tu sarvāṇi daivatāni yathākramam
jarjaraḥ tu abhisampūjyaḥ syāt tatas vighna jarjaraḥ

original: śvetaṃ śirasi vastraṃ syānnīlaṃ raudre ca parvaṇi /
analyzed: śvetam śirasi vastram syāt nīlam raudre ca parvaṇi

original: viṣṇuparvaṇi vai pītaṃ raktaṃ skandasya parvaṇi // BhN_3.74 //
analyzed: viṣṇu parvaṇi vai pītam raktam skandasya parvaṇi

original: mṛḍaparvaṇi citraṃ tu deyaṃ vastraṃ hitārthinā /
analyzed: mṛḍa parvaṇi citram tu deyam vastram hita arthinā
sadṛśam ca pradātavyam dhūpa mālya anulepanam
ātodyāni tu sarvāṇi vāsobhiḥ avaguṇṭhayet
gandhaiḥ mālyaiḥ ca dhūpaiḥ ca bhakṣya bhojaiḥ ca pūjayet
sarvam evam vidhim kṛtvā gandha mālya anulepanaiḥ
vighna jarjaraṇa artham tu jarjaram tu abhimantrayet
atra vighna vināśa artham pitāmaha mukhaiḥ suraiḥ
nirmitaḥ tvam mahā vīryaḥ vajra sāraḥ mahā tanuḥ
śiraḥ te rakṣatu sarvaiḥ deva guṇaiḥ

original: dvitīyaṃ ca haraḥ parva tṛtīyaṃ ca janārdanaḥ // BhN_3.79 //
analyzed: dvitīyam ca haraḥ parva tṛtīyam ca janārdanaḥ
caturtham ca kumāraḥ te pañcamam pannaga uttamaḥ

original: nityaṃ sarve 'pi pāntu tvāṃ surārthe ca śivo bhava // BhN_3.80 //
analyzed: nityam sarve pāntu tvām sura arthe ca śivaḥ bhava
nakṣatre bhijiti tvam hi prasūtaḥ hita sūdana

original: jayaṃ cābhyudayaṃ caiva pārthivasya samāvaha // BhN_3.81 //
analyzed: jayam ca abhyudayam ca eva pārthivasya samāvaha

original: jarjaraṃ pūjayitvaiavaṃ baliṃ sarvaṃ nividya ca /
analyzed: jarjaram pūjayitvā eavam balim sarvam nividya ca
agnau homam tatas kuryāt mantra āhu iti puraskṛtam
hutāśaḥ eva dīptābhiḥ ulkābhiḥ parimārjanam
nṛpateḥ nartakīnām ca kuryāt dīpti abhivardhanam
abhidyotya saha ātodyaiḥ nṛpatim nartakīḥ tathā
mantra pūtena toyena punar abhyukṣya tān vadet
mahā kule prasūtāḥ stha guṇa oghaiḥ ca api alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: yadvo janmaguṇopetaṃ tadvo bhavatu nityaśaḥ // BhN_3.85 //
analyzed: yat vaḥ janma guṇa upetam tat vaḥ bhavatu nityaśas
evam uktvā tatas vākyam nṛpa taiḥ bhūtaye budhaḥ
nāṭya yoga prasiddhi artham āśiṣaḥ samprayojayet
sarasvatī dhṛtiḥ medhā hrīḥ śrīḥ lakṣmīḥ smṛtiḥ matiḥ

original: pāntu vo mātaraḥ saumyāssiddhidāśca bhavantu vaḥ // BhN_3.87 //
analyzed: pāntu vaḥ mātaraḥ saumyāḥ siddhi dāḥ ca bhavantu vaḥ
homam kṛtvā yathānyāyam haviḥ mantra puraskṛtam
bhindyāt kumbham tatas ca eva nāṭya ācāryaḥ prayatnataḥ

original: abhinne tu bhavetkumbhe svāminaḥ śatruto bhayam /
analyzed: a bhinne tu bhavet kumbhe svāminaḥ śatrutaḥ bhayam

original: bhinne caiva tu vijñeyaḥ svāminaḥ śatrusaṃkṣayaḥ // BhN_3.89 //
analyzed: bhinne ca eva tu vijñeyaḥ svāminaḥ śatru saṃkṣayaḥ
bhinne kumbhe tatas ca eva nāṭya cāryaḥ prayatnataḥ

original: pragṛhya dīpikāṃ dīptāṃ sarvaṃ raṅgaṃ pradīpayet // BhN_3.90 //
analyzed: pragṛhya dīpikām dīptām sarvam raṅgam pradīpayet
kṣveḍitaiḥ sphoṭitaiḥ ca eva valgitaiḥ ca pradhāvitaiḥ

original: raṅgamadhye tu tāṃ dīptāṃ saśabdāṃ samprayojayet // BhN_3.91 //
analyzed: raṅga madhye tu tām dīptām sa śabdām samprayojayet
śaṅkha dundubhi nirghoṣaiḥ mṛdaṅga paṇavaiḥ tathā

original: sarvātodyaiḥ praṇaditai raṅge yuddhāni kārayet // BhN_3.92 //
analyzed: sarva ātodyaiḥ praṇaditaiḥ raṅge yuddhāni kārayet

original: tatra cchinnaṃ va bhinnaṃ ca dāritaṃ ca saśoṇitam /
analyzed: tatra chinnam bhinnam ca dāritam ca sa śoṇitam
kṣatam pradīptam āyastam nimittam siddhi lakṣaṇam
samyak iṣṭaḥ tu raṅgaḥ vai svāminaḥ śubham āvahet
purasya ā bāla vṛddhasya tathā jānapadasya ca
duriṣṭaḥ tu tathā raṅgaḥ daivataiḥ duradhiṣṭhitaḥ
nāṭya vidhvasanam kuryāt nṛpasya ca tathā aśubham
yaḥ evam vidhim utsṛjya yathā iṣṭam samprayojayet

original: prāpnotyapacayaṃ śīghraṃ tiryagyoniṃ ca gacchati // BhN_3.96 //
analyzed: prāpnoti apacayam śīghram tiryagyonim ca gacchati
yajñena sammitam hi etat raṅga daivata pūjanam

original: apūjayitvā raṅgaṃ tu naiva prekṣāṃ prayojayet // BhN_3.97 //
analyzed: a pūjayitvā raṅgam tu nā eva prekṣām prayojayet
pūjitāḥ pūjayanti ete mānitāḥ mānayanti ca
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kartavyam raṅga pūjanam
na tathā pradahati agniḥ prabhañjana samīritaḥ

original: yathā hyapaprayogastu prayukto dahati kṣaṇāt // BhN_3.99 //
analyzed: yathā hi apaprayogaḥ tu prayuktaḥ dahati kṣaṇāt
śāstra jñena vinītena śucinā dīkṣitena ca
nāṭya ācāryeṇa śāntena kartavyam raṅga pūjanam
sthāna bhraṣṭam tu yaḥ dadyāt balim udvigna mānasaḥ

original: mantrahīno yathā hotā prāyaścittī bhavettu saḥ // BhN_3.101 //
analyzed: mantra hīnaḥ yathā hotā prāyaścittī bhavet tu saḥ
iti ayam yaḥ vidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ raṅga daivata pūjane

original: nave nāṭyagṛhe kāryaḥ prekṣāyāṃ ca prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_3.102 //
analyzed: nave nāṭya gṛhe kāryaḥ prekṣāyām ca prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre raṅgadaivatapūjanaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre raṅgadaivatapūjanam nāma tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
atha caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: evaṃ tu pūjanaṃ kṛtvā mayā proktaḥ pitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: evam tu pūjanam kṛtvā mayā proktaḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: ājñāpaya prabho kṣipraṃ kaḥ prayogaḥ prayujyatām // BhN_4.1 //
analyzed: ājñāpaya prabho kṣipram kaḥ prayogaḥ prayujyatām
tatas smi uktaḥ bhagavatā yojaya amṛta manthanam
etat utsāha jananam sura prīti karam tathā
yaḥ yam samavakāraḥ tu dharma kāma artha sādhakaḥ

original: mayā prāggrathito vidvansa prayogaḥ prayujyatām // BhN_4.3 //
analyzed: mayā prāk grathitaḥ vidvan sa prayogaḥ prayujyatām
tasmin samavakāre tu prayukte deva dānavāḥ
hṛṣṭāḥ samabhavan sarve karma bhāva anudarśanāt
kasyacid tu atha kālasya mām āha ambujasambhavaḥ
nāṭyam sandarśayāmaḥ trinetrāya mahātmane
tatas sārdham suraiḥ gatvā vṛṣabhāṅka niveśanam
samabhyarcya śivam paścāt uvāca idam pitāmahaḥ
mayā samavākaraḥ tu yaḥ yam sṛṣṭaḥ surottama

original: śravaṇe darśane cāsya prasādaṃ kartumarhasi // BhN_4.7 //
analyzed: śravaṇe darśane ca asya prasādam kartum arhasi
paśyāmaḥ iti deveśaḥ druhiṇam vākyam abravīt

original: tato māmāha bhagavān sajjo bhava mahāmate // BhN_4.8 //
analyzed: tatas mām āha bhagavān sajjaḥ bhava mahāmate
tatas himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe nānā nāga samākule
bahu bhūta gaṇa ākīrṇe ramya kandara nirzhare
pūrvaraṅgaḥ kṛtaḥ pūrvam tatra ayam dvijasattamāḥ
tathā tripura dāhaḥ ca ḍima saṃjñaḥ prayojitaḥ
tatas bhūta gaṇāḥ hṛṣṭāḥ
mahādevaḥ ca su prītaḥ pitāmaham atha abravīt

original: aho nāṭyamidaṃ samyak tvayā sṛṣṭaṃ mahāmate /
analyzed: aho nāṭyam idam samyak tvayā sṛṣṭam mahāmate

original: yaśasyaṃ ca śubhārthaṃ ca puṇyaṃ buddhivivardhanam // BhN_4.12 //
analyzed: yaśasyam ca śubha artham ca puṇyam buddhi vivardhanam
mayā api idam smṛtam nṛtyam sandhyā kāleṣu nṛtyatā
nānā karaṇa saṃyuktaiḥ aṅgahāraiḥ vibhūṣitam
pūrvaraṅga vidhau asmin tvayā samyak prayojyatām
vardhamānaka yogeṣu gīteṣu āsāriteṣu ca
mahā gīteṣu ca eva arthān samyak eva abhineṣyasi

original: yaścāyaṃ pūrvaraṅgastu tvayā śuddhaḥ prayojitaḥ // BhN_4.15 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca ayam pūrvaraṅgaḥ tu tvayā śuddhaḥ prayojitaḥ
ebhiḥ vimiśritaḥ ca ayam citraḥ nāma bhaviṣyati
śrutvā maheśvara vacaḥ pratyuktaḥ tu svayaṃbhuvā
prayogam aṅgahārāṇām ācakṣva sura sattama
tatas taṇḍum samāhūya proktavān bhuvaneśvaraḥ
prayogam aṅgahārāṇām ācakṣva bharatāya vai

original: tato ye taṇḍunā proktāstvaṅgahārā mahātmanā // BhN_4.18 //
analyzed: tatas ye taṇḍunā proktāḥ tu aṅgahārāḥ mahātmanā
tān vaḥ karaṇa saṃyuktān vyākhyāsyāmi sa recakān
sthira hastaḥ ṅgahāraḥ tu tathā paryastakaḥ smṛtaḥ
sūci viddhaḥ tathā ca eva hi apaviddhaḥ tathā eva ca
ākṣiptakaḥ vijñeyaḥ tathā ca uddhaṭṭitaḥ smṛtaḥ
viṣkambhaḥ ca eva samproktaḥ tathā ca eva aparājitaḥ
viṣkambha apasṛtaḥ ca eva matta ākrīḍaḥ tathā eva ca
svastikaḥ recitaḥ ca eva pārśvasvastikaḥ eva ca
vṛścikāpasṛtaḥ proktaḥ bhramaraḥ ca tathā aparaḥ
mattaskhalitakaḥ ca eva madāt vilasitaḥ tathā
gati maṇḍalakaḥ jñeyaḥ paricchinnaḥ tathā eva ca
syāt tathā vaiśākha recitaḥ
vijñeyaḥ tathā ca eva api alātakaḥ
samproktaḥ vidyudbhrāntaḥ tathā eva ca
ūrūdvṛttaḥ tathā ca eva syāt ālīḍhaḥ tathā eva ca
recitaḥ ca api vijñeyaḥ tathā eva ācchuritaḥ smṛtaḥ
ākṣipta recitaḥ ca eva sambhrāntaḥ ca tathā aparaḥ
apasarpaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ tathā ca ardhanikuṭṭakaḥ
dvātriṃśat ete samproktāḥ aṅgahārāḥ tu nāmataḥ
eteṣām tu pravakṣyāmi prayogam karaṇa āśrayam
hasta pāda pracāraḥ ca yathā yojyaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: aṅgahāreṣu vakṣyāmi karaṇeṣu ca vai dvijāḥ /
analyzed: aṅgahāreṣu vakṣyāmi karaṇeṣu ca vai dvijāḥ
sarveṣām aṅgahārāṇām niṣpattiḥ karaṇaiḥ yatas
tāni atas sampravakṣyāmi nāmataḥ karmataḥ tathā
hasta pāda samāyogaḥ nṛtyasya karaṇam bhavet
dve nṛtta karaṇe ca eva bhavataḥ nṛttamātṛkā
dvābhyām tribhiḥ caturbhiḥ vā api aṅgahāraḥ tu mātṛbhiḥ

original: tribhiḥ kalāpakaṃ caiva caturbhiḥ ṣaṇḍakaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tribhiḥ kalāpakam ca eva caturbhiḥ ṣaṇḍakam bhavet

original: pañcaiva karaṇāni syuḥ saṅghātaka iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_4.32 //
analyzed: pañca eva karaṇāni syuḥ saṅghātakaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
ṣaḍbhiḥ vā saptabhiḥ vā api aṣṭabhiḥ navabhiḥ tathā
karaṇaiḥ iha saṃyuktāḥ aṅgahārāḥ prakīrtāḥ
eteṣām eva vakṣyāmi hasta pāda vikalpanam

original: talapuṣpapuṭaṃ pūrvaṃ vartitaṃ valitoru ca // BhN_4.34 //
analyzed: tala puṣpa puṭam pūrvam vartitam valita ūru ca
apaviddham sama nakham līnam svastika recitam
maṇḍalasvastikam ca eva nikuṭṭakam atha api ca
tathā eva ardhanikuṭṭam ca kaṭicchinnam tathā eva ca
ardharecitakam ca eva vakṣaḥsvastikam eva ca
unmattam svastikam ca eva pṛṣṭha svastikam eva ca

original: dikṣvastikamalātaṃ ca tathaiva ca kaṭīsamam // BhN_4.37 //
analyzed: dikṣu asti kamalātam ca tathā eva ca kaṭī samam
ākṣiptarecitam ca eva vikṣiptākṣiptakam tathā
ardha svastikam uddiṣṭam añcitam ca tathā aparam
bhujaṅgatrāsitam proktam ūrdhvajānu tathā eva ca

original: nikuñcitaṃ ca mattalli tvardhamattalli caiva hi // BhN_4.39 //
analyzed: nikuñcitam ca mattalli tu ardhamattalli ca eva hi
syāt recakanikkuṭṭam ca tathā pādāpaviddhakam

original: valitaṃ ghūrṇitaṃ caiva lalitaṃ ca tathāparam // BhN_4.40 //
analyzed: valitam ghūrṇitam ca eva lalitam ca tathā aparam
daṇḍa pakṣam tathā ca eva bhujaṅga trasta recitam

original: nūpuraṃ caiva samproktaṃ tathā vaiśākharecitam // BhN_4.41 //
analyzed: nūpuram ca eva samproktam tathā vaiśākha recitam
bhramaram caturam ca eva bhujaṅga āñcitam eva ca
daṇḍarecitakam ca eva tathā vṛścikakuṭṭitam
kaṭi bhrāntam tathā ca eva latā vṛścikam eva ca

original: chinnaṃ ca karaṇaṃ proktaṃ tathā vṛścikarecitam // BhN_4.43 //
analyzed: chinnam ca karaṇam proktam tathā vṛścikarecitam
vṛścikam vyaṃsitam ca eva tathā pārśvanikuṭṭakam
lalāṭa tilakam krāntam kuñcitam cakra maṇḍalam
uraḥ maṇḍalam ākṣiptam tathā tala vilāsitam
argalam ca atha vikṣiptam āvṛttam dola pādakam
vivṛttam vinivṛttam ca pārśva krāntam niśumbhitam
vidyutbhrāntam atikrāntam vivartitakam eva ca
gajakrīḍitakam ca eva talasaṃsphoṭitam tathā
garuḍaplutakam ca eva gaṇḍasūci tathā aparam
parivṛttam samuddiṣṭam pārśva jānu tathā eva ca

original: gṛdhrāvalīnakaṃ caiva sannataṃ sūcyathāpi ca // BhN_4.48 //
analyzed: gṛdhrāvalīnakam ca eva sannatam sūcī atha api ca
ardhasūcī iti karaṇam sūci viddham tathā eva ca

original: apakrāntaṃ ca samproktaṃ mayūralalitaṃ tathā // BhN_4.49 //
analyzed: apakrāntam ca samproktam mayūralalitam tathā
sarpitam daṇḍa pādam ca hariṇa plutam eva ca

original: preṅkholitaṃ nitambaṃ ca skhalitaṃ karihastakam // BhN_4.50 //
analyzed: preṅkholitam nitambam ca skhalitam kari hastakam
prasarpitakam uddiṣṭam siṃhavikrīḍatam tathā
siṃha ākarṣitam udvṛttam tathā upasṛtam eva ca
tala saṃghaṭṭitam ca eva janitam ca avahitthakam
niveśa melaka ākrīḍam ūru udvṛttam tathā eva ca
madaskhalitakam ca eva viṣṇukrāntam atha api ca
sambhrāntam atha viṣkambham udghaṭṭitam atha api ca
vṛṣabhakrīḍitam ca eva lolitam ca tathā aparam

original: nāgāpasarpitaṃ caiva śakaṭāsyaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_4.54 //
analyzed: nāga apasarpitam ca eva śakaṭāsyam tathā eva ca
gaṅgā avataraṇam ca eva iti uktam aṣṭa adhikam śatam
aṣṭottaraśatam hi etat karaṇānām mayā uditam

original: nṛtye yuddhe niyuddhe ca tatha gatiparikrame /
analyzed: nṛtye yuddhe niyuddhe ca gati parikrame
gati pracāre vakṣyāmi yuddha cārī vikalpanam
yatra tatra api saṃyojyam ācāryaiḥ nāṭya śaktinaḥ

original: prāyeṇa karaṇe kāryo vāmo vakṣaḥsthitaḥ karaḥ // BhN_4.57 //
analyzed: prāyeṇa karaṇe kāryaḥ vāmaḥ vakṣaḥ sthitaḥ karaḥ
caraṇasya anugaḥ ca api dakṣiṇaḥ tu bhavet karaḥ
kaṭi pārśva ūru saṃyutam
uraḥ pṛṣṭha udara upetam vakṣyamāṇam nibodhata

original: yāni sthānāni yāścāryo nṛtyahastāstathaiva ca // BhN_4.59 //
analyzed: yāni sthānāni yāḥ cāryaḥ nṛtya hastāḥ tathā eva ca
sā mātṛkā iti vijñeyā tad yogāt karaṇam bhavet
kaṭī karṇa samā yatra korpara aṃsa śiraḥ tathā
samunnatam uraḥ ca eva sauṣṭhavam nāma tat bhavet
vāme puṣpa puṭaḥ pārśve pādaḥ gra tala sañcaraḥ

original: tathā ca sannataṃ pārśvaṃ talapuṣpapuṭaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tathā ca sat natam pārśvam tala puṣpa puṭam bhavet
kuñcitau maṇibandhe tu vyāvṛtta parivartitau

original: hastau nipatitau corvorvartitaṃ karaṇaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: hastau nipatitau ca ūrvoḥ vartitam karaṇam tu tat
śuka tuṇḍau yadā hastau vyāvṛtta parivartitau
urū ca valitau yasmin valitorukam ucyate
āvartya śukatuṇḍa ākhyam ūru pṛṣṭhe nipātayet
vāma hataḥ ca vakṣaḥ sthaḥ upi apaviddham tu tat bhavet

original: śliṣṭau samanakhau padau karau cāpi pralimbitau // BhN_4.65 //
analyzed: śliṣṭau sama nakhau padau karau ca api pralimbitau

original: dehaḥ svābhāviko yatra bhavetsamanakhaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: dehaḥ svābhāvikaḥ yatra bhavet sama nakham tu tat
patākā añjali vakṣaḥ stham prasārita śirodharam
ca tat linam karaṇam smṛtam
svastikau recita āviddhau viśliṣṭau kaṭi saṃśritau
yatra tat karaṇam jñeyam budhaiḥ svastika recitam

original: svastikau tu karau kṛtvā prāṅgamukhordhvatalau samau // BhN_4.68 //
analyzed: svastikau tu karau kṛtvā prāṅga mukha ūrdhva talau samau

original: tathā ca maṇḍalaṃ sthānaṃ maṇḍalasvastikaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: tathā ca maṇḍalam sthānam maṇḍala svastikam tu tat
nikuṭṭitau yadā hastau sva bāhu śirasaḥ ntare

original: pādau nikuṭṭitau caiva jñeyaṃ tattu nikuṭṭakam /
analyzed: pādau nikuṭṭitau ca eva jñeyam tat tu nikuṭṭakam
añcitau bāhu śirasi hastaḥ tu abhimukha aṅguliḥ

original: paryāyaśaḥ kaṭiśchinnā bāhvoḥ śirasi pallavau // BhN_4.71 //
analyzed: paryāyaśaḥ kaṭiḥ chinnā bāhvoḥ śirasi pallavau
punar punar ca karaṇam kaṭicchinam tu tat bhavet
apaviddha karaḥ sūcyā pādaḥ ca eva nikuṭṭitaḥ
saṃnnatam yatra pārśvam ca

original: svastikau caraṇau yatra karau vakṣasi recitau // BhN_4.73 //
analyzed: svastikau caraṇau yatra karau vakṣasi recitau
nikuñcitam tathā vakṣaḥ vakṣaḥ svastikam eva tat

original: āñcitena tu pādena recitau tu karau yadā // BhN_4.74 //
analyzed: āñcitena tu pādena recitau tu karau yadā
unmatam karaṇam tat tu vijñeyam nṛtya kovidaiḥ

original: hastābhyāmatha pādābhyāṃ bhavataḥ svastikau yadā // BhN_4.75 //
analyzed: hastābhyām atha pādābhyām bhavataḥ svastikau yadā
tat svastikam iti proktam karaṇam karaṇa arthibhiḥ
vikṣipta ākṣipta bāhubhyām svastikau caraṇau yadā
apakrānta ardha sūcibhyām tad pṛṣṭha svastikam bhavet

original: pārśvayoragrataścaiva yatra śliṣṭaḥ karo bhavet // BhN_4.77 //
analyzed: pārśvayoḥ agratas ca eva yatra śliṣṭaḥ karaḥ bhavet
svastikau hasta pādābhyām tat dikṣvastikam ucyate

original: alātaṃ caraṇaṃ kṛtvā vyaṃsayeddakṣiṇaṃ karam // BhN_4.78 //
analyzed: alātam caraṇam kṛtvā vyaṃsayet dakṣiṇam karam
ūrdhva ja anukramam kuryāt alātakam iti smṛtam
svastika apasṛtaḥ pādaḥ karau nābhi kaṭi sthitau
pārśvam udvāhitam ca eva karaṇam tat kaṭī samam
hastau hṛdi bhavet vāmaḥ savyaḥ ca ākṣipta recitaḥ
recitaḥ ca apaviddhaḥ ca tat syāt ākṣiptarecitam

original: vikṣiptaṃ hastapādaṃ ca tasaivākṣepaṇaṃ punaḥ // BhN_4.81 //
analyzed: vikṣiptam hasta pādam ca tasā eva ākṣepaṇam punar
yatra tat karaṇam jñeyam vikṣipta ākṣipta ptakam dvijāḥ

original: svastikau caraṇau kṛtvā karihastaṃ ca dakṣiṇam // BhN_4.82 //
analyzed: svastikau caraṇau kṛtvā kari hastam ca dakṣiṇam
vakṣa sthāne tathā vāmam ardhasvastikam ādiśet

original: vyāvṛttaparivṛttastu sa eva tu karo yadā // BhN_4.83 //
analyzed: vyāvṛtta parivṛttaḥ tu saḥ eva tu karaḥ yadā
añcitaḥ nāsikā agre tu tat añcitam udāhṛtam
kuñcitam pādam utkṣipya tri aśram ūrum vivartayet
kaṭi jānu vivartāt ca bhujaṅga trāsitam bhavet
kuñcitam pādam utkṣipya janu stana samam nyaset
prayoga vaśa gau hastau ūrdhva jānu prakīrtitam

original: vṛścikaṃ caraṇaṃ kṛtvā karaṃ pārśve nikuñcayet // BhN_4.86 //
analyzed: vṛścikam caraṇam kṛtvā karam pārśve nikuñcayet

original: nāsāgre dakṣiṇaṃ caiva jñeyaṃ tattu nikuñcitam /
analyzed: nāsā agre dakṣiṇam ca eva jñeyam tat tu nikuñcitam
vāma dakṣiṇa pādābhyām ghūrṇamāna upasarpaṇaiḥ
udveṣṭita apaviddhaiḥ ca hastaiḥ mattallī udāhṛtam
skhalita apasṛtau pādau vāma hastaḥ ca recitaḥ
savya hastaḥ kaṭi sthaḥ syāt ardhamattalli tat smṛtam

original: recito dakṣiṇo hastaḥ pādaḥ savyo nikuṭṭitaḥ // BhN_4.89 //
analyzed: recitaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ hastaḥ pādaḥ savyaḥ nikuṭṭitaḥ
dolā ca eva bhavet vāmaḥ tad recita nikuṭṭitam

original: kāryau nābhitaṭe hastau prāṅmukhau khaṭakāmukhau // BhN_4.90 //
analyzed: kāryau nābhi taṭe hastau prāc mukhau khaṭakā mukhau
sūcī viddhau apakrāntau pādau pāda apaviddhake
apaviddhaḥ bhavet hastaḥ sūcī pādaḥ ca

original: tathā trikaṃ vivṛttaṃ ca valitaṃ nāma tadbhavet /
analyzed: tathā trikam vivṛttam ca valitam nāma tat bhavet

original: vartitāghūrṇitaḥ savyo hasto vāmaśca dolitaḥ // BhN_4.92 //
analyzed: vartita āghūrṇitaḥ savyaḥ hastaḥ vāmaḥ ca dolitaḥ

original: svastikāpasṛtaḥ pādaḥ karaṇaṃ ghūrṇitaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: svastika apasṛtaḥ pādaḥ karaṇam ghūrṇitam tu tat
kari hastaḥ bhavet vāmaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ ca vivartitaḥ

original: bahuśaḥ kuṭṭitaḥ pado jñeyaṃ tallalitaṃ budhaiḥ /
analyzed: bahuśas kuṭṭitaḥ padaḥ jñeyam tat lalitam budhaiḥ

original: ūrdhvajānuṃ vidhāyātha tasyopari latāṃ nyaset // BhN_4.94 //
analyzed: ūrdhva jānum vidhāya atha tasya upari latām nyaset
daṇḍa pakṣam tad proktam karṇam nṛtya vedibhiḥ
bhujañga trāsitam kṛtvā yatra ubhau api recitau
vāma pārśva sthtau hastau bhujaṅga trasta recitam

original: trikaṃ suvalitaṃ kṛtvā latārecitakau karau // BhN_4.96 //
analyzed: trikam su valitam kṛtvā latā recitakau karau

original: nūpurśca tathā pādaḥ karaṇE nūpure nyaset /
analyzed: nūpur ca tathā pādaḥ karaṇe nūpure nyaset

original: recitau hastapādau ca kaṭī grīvā ca recitā // BhN_4.97 //
analyzed: recitau hasta pādau ca kaṭī grīvā ca recitā
vaiśākha sthānakena etat bhave vaiśākha recitam

original: ākṣiptaḥ svastikaḥ pādaḥ karau codveṣṭitau tathā // BhN_4.98 //
analyzed: ākṣiptaḥ svastikaḥ pādaḥ karau ca udveṣṭitau tathā

original: trikasya valanāccaiva jñeyaṃ bhramarakaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: trikasya valanāt ca eva jñeyam bhramarakam tu tat

original: añcitaḥ syātkaro vāmaḥ savyaścatura eva tu // BhN_4.99 //
analyzed: añcitaḥ syāt karaḥ vāmaḥ savyaḥ caturaḥ eva tu
dakṣiṇaḥ kuṭṭitaḥ pādaḥ caturam tat prakīrtitam

original: bhujaṅgatrāsitaḥ pādo dakṣiṇo recitaḥ karaḥ // BhN_4.100 //
analyzed: bhujaṅga trāsitaḥ pādaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ recitaḥ karaḥ
latā ākhyaḥ ca karaḥ vāmaḥ bhujaṅga āñcitakam bhavet

original: vikṣiptaṃ hastapādaṃ tu samantādyatra daṇḍavat // BhN_4.101 //
analyzed: vikṣiptam hasta pādam tu samantāt yatra daṇḍa vat
recyate tat hi karaṇam jñeyam daṇḍaka recitam

original: vṛścikaṃ caraṇaṃ kṛtvā dvāvapyatha nikuṭṭitau // BhN_4.102 //
analyzed: vṛścikam caraṇam kṛtvā dvau api atha nikuṭṭitau
vidhātavyau karau tat tu jñeyam vṛścikakuṭṭitam

original: sūciṃ kṛtvāpaviddhaṃ ca dakṣiṇaṃ caraṇaṃ nyaset // BhN_4.103 //
analyzed: sūcim kṛtvā apaviddham ca dakṣiṇam caraṇam nyaset
recitā ca kaṭiḥ yatra kaṭi bhrāntam tat ucyate
añcitaḥ pṛṣṭhatas pādaḥ kuñcita ūrdhva tala aṅguliḥ
latā ākhyaḥ ca karaḥ vāmaḥ tat latā vṛścikam bhavet

original: alapadmaḥ kaṭīdeśe chinnā paryāyaśaḥ kaṭī // BhN_4.105 //
analyzed: alapadmaḥ kaṭī deśe chinnā paryāyaśaḥ kaṭī
vaiśākhasthānakena iha tat chinnam karaṇam bhavet

original: vṛścikaṃ caraṇaṃ kṛtvā svastikau ca karavubhau // BhN_4.106 //
analyzed: vṛścikam caraṇam kṛtvā svastikau ca karau ubhau
recitau viprakīrṇau ca karau vṛścika recitam
bāhu śīrṣa āñcitau hastau pādaḥ pṛṣṭha āñcitaḥ tathā
dūra sannata pṛṣṭham ca vṛścikam tat prakīrtitam

original: ālīḍhaṃ sthānakaṃ yatra karau vakṣasi recitau // BhN_4.108 //
analyzed: ālīḍham sthānakam yatra karau vakṣasi recitau

original: ūrdhvādho viprakīrṇau ca vyaṃsitaṃ karaṇaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: ūrdhva adhas viprakīrṇau ca vyaṃsitam karaṇam tu tat

original: hastau tu svastikau pārśve tathā pādo nikuṭṭitaḥ // BhN_4.109 //
analyzed: hastau tu svastikau pārśve tathā pādaḥ nikuṭṭitaḥ
yatra tat karaṇam jñeyam budhaiḥ pārśva nikuṭṭitam

original: vṛścikaṃ caraṇaṃ kṛtvā pādasyāṅguṣṭhakena tu // BhN_4.110 //
analyzed: vṛścikam caraṇam kṛtvā pādasya aṅguṣṭhakena tu
lalāṭe tilakam kuryāt lalāṭa tilakam tu tat

original: pṛṣṭhataḥ kuñcitaṃ kṛtvā vyatikrāntakramaṃ tataḥ // BhN_4.111 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas kuñcitam kṛtvā vyatikrānta kramam tatas

original: ākṣiptau ca karau kāryau krāntake karaṇe dvijāḥ /
analyzed: ākṣiptau ca karau kāryau krāntake karaṇe dvijāḥ

original: ādyaḥ pādo nataḥ kāryaḥ savyahastaśca kuñcitaḥ // BhN_4.112 //
analyzed: ādyaḥ pādaḥ nataḥ kāryaḥ savya hastaḥ ca kuñcitaḥ
uttānaḥ vāma pārśva sthaḥ tat kuñcitam udāhṛtam
pralambitābhyām bāhubhyām yat gātreṇa ānatena ca
abhyantara apaviddhaḥ syāt tat jñeyam cakra maṇḍalam
svastika apasṛtau pādau apaviddha kramau yadā
uromaṇḍalakau hastau uromaṇḍalikaḥ tu tat

original: ākṣiptaṃ hastapādaṃ ca kriyate yatra vegataḥ // BhN_4.115 //
analyzed: ākṣiptam hasta pādam ca kriyate yatra vegataḥ
ākṣiotam nāma karaṇam vijñeyam tat dvijottamāḥ
ūrdhva aṅguli talaḥ pādaḥ pārśvena ūrdhvam prasāritaḥ
prakuryāt añcita talau hastau tala vilāsite

original: pṛṣṭhataḥ prasṛtaḥ pādau dvau tālāvardhameva ca // BhN_4.117 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas prasṛtaḥ pādau dvau tālau ardham eva ca

original: tasyeva cānugo hastaḥ puratastvargalaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: tasya iva ca anugaḥ hastaḥ puratas tu argalam tu tat

original: vikṣiptaṃ hastapādaṃ ca pṛṣṭhataḥ pārśvato 'pi vā // BhN_4.118 //
analyzed: vikṣiptam hasta pādam ca pṛṣṭhatas vā
eka mārga gatam yatra tat vikṣiptam udāhṛtam

original: prasārya kuñcitaṃ pādaṃ punarāvartayet drutam // BhN_4.119 //
analyzed: prasārya kuñcitam pādam punar āvartayet drutam
prayoga vaśa gau hastau tat āvartam udāhṛtam

original: kuñcitaṃ pādamutkṣipya pārśvātpārśvaṃ tu ḍolayet // BhN_4.120 //
analyzed: kuñcitam pādam utkṣipya pārśvāt pārśvam tu
prayoga vaśagau hastau ḍolāpādam tat ucyate

original: ākṣiptaṃ hastapādaṃ ca trikaṃ caiva vivartayet // BhN_4.121 //
analyzed: ākṣiptam hasta pādam ca trikam ca eva vivartayet

original: recitau ca tathā hastau vivṛtte karaṇe dvijāḥ /
analyzed: recitau ca tathā hastau vivṛtte karaṇe dvijāḥ

original: sūcīviddhaṃ vidhāyātha trikaṃ tu vinivartayet // BhN_4.122 //
analyzed: sūcīviddham vidhāya atha trikam tu vinivartayet

original: karau ca recitau kāryau vinivṛtte dvijottamaḥ /
analyzed: karau ca recitau kāryau vinivṛtte dvijottamaḥ
pārśva krānta kramam kṛtvā purastāt atha pātayet
prayoga vaśagau hastau pārśvakrāntam tat ucyate

original: pṛṣṭhataḥ kuñcitaḥ pādau vakṣaścaiva samunnatam // BhN_4.124 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas kuñcitaḥ pādau vakṣaḥ ca eva samunnatam
tilake ca karaḥ sthāpyaḥ tat nistambhitam ucyate

original: pṛṣṭhato valitaṃ pādaṃ śiroghṛṣṭaṃ prasārayet // BhN_4.125 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas valitam pādam śiraḥ ghṛṣṭam prasārayet
sarvatas maṇḍala āviddham vidyut bhrāntam tat ucyate
atikrānta kramam kṛtvā purastāt saṃprasārayet
prayoga vaśa gau hastau atikrānte prakīrtitau

original: ākṣiptaṃ hastapādaṃ ca trikaṃ caiva vivartitam // BhN_4.127 //
analyzed: ākṣiptam hasta pādam ca trikam ca eva vivartitam
dvitīyaḥ recitaḥ hastaḥ vivartitakam eva tat

original: karṇe 'ñcitaḥ karo vāmo latāhastaśca dakṣiṇaḥ // BhN_4.128 //
analyzed: karṇe ñcitaḥ karaḥ vāmaḥ latā hastaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ
dolāpādaḥ tathā ca eva gajakrīḍitakam bhavet
drutam utkṣipya caraṇam purastāt atha pātayet
tala saṃsphoṭitau hastau tala saṃsphoṭite matau
pṛṣṭha prasāritaḥ pādaḥ latā recitakau karau
samunnatam śiraḥ ca eva garuḍaplutakam bhavet

original: sūcipādo nataṃ pārśvameko vakṣaḥsthitaḥ karaḥ // BhN_4.131 //
analyzed: sūci pādaḥ natam pārśvam ekaḥ vakṣaḥ sthitaḥ karaḥ
dvitīyaḥ ca āñcitaḥ gaṇḍe gaṇḍasūcī tat ucyate
ūrdhva apaveṣṭitau hastau sūcī pādaḥ vivartitaḥ
parivṛtta trikam ca eva parivṛttam tat ucyate

original: ekaḥ samasthitaḥ pāda ūrupṛṣṭhe sthito 'paraḥ // BhN_4.133 //
analyzed: ekaḥ samasthitaḥ pādaḥ ūru pṛṣṭhe paraḥ
muṣṭi hastaḥ ca vakṣaḥ sthaḥ pārśva jānu tat ucyate
pṛṣṭha prasāritaḥ pādaḥ jānukaḥ
yatra prasāritaḥ bāhū tat syāt gṛdhrāvalīnakam
utplutya caraṇau kāryau agratas svastika sthitau

original: sannatau ca tathā hastau sannataṃ tadudāhṛtam /
analyzed: sannatau ca tathā hastau sannatam tat udāhṛtam
kuñcitam pādam utkṣipya kuryāt agra sthitam bhuvi
prayoga vaśagau hastau sā sūcī parikīrtitā
ala padmaḥ śiraḥ hastaḥ sūcī pādaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ
yatra tat karaṇam ardhasūcī iti nāmataḥ

original: pādasūcyā yadā pādo dvitīyastu pravidhyate // BhN_4.138 //
analyzed: pāda sūcyā yadā pādaḥ dvitīyaḥ tu pravidhyate
kaṭi vakṣaḥ sthitau hastau sūcīvidham tat ucyate
kṛtvā ūru valitam pādam apakrānta kramam nyaset
prayoga vaśagau tat ucyate

original: vṛścikaṃ caraṇaṃ kṛtvā recitau ca tathā karau // BhN_4.140 //
analyzed: vṛścikam caraṇam kṛtvā recitau ca tathā karau

original: tathā trikaṃ vivṛttaṃ ca mayūralalitaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tathā trikam vivṛttam ca mayūralalitam bhavet
añcita apasṛtau pādau śiraḥ ca parivāhitam
recitau ca tathā hastau tat sarpitam udāhṛtam

original: nūpuraṃ caraṇaṃ kṛtvā daṇḍapādaṃ prasārayet // BhN_4.142 //
analyzed: nūpuram caraṇam kṛtvā daṇḍa pādam prasārayet
kṣipra āviddha karam ca eva daṇḍapādam tat ucyate
atikrānta kramam kṛtvā samutplutya nipātayet
jaṅghā āñcitā upari kṣiptā tat vidyāt hariṇaplutam

original: (see the cluster ṅghā. ā nev ligature may be added to represent this cluster)
analyzed: see the cluster ṅghā ā nev ligature may be added to represent this cluster
ḍolā pāda kramam kṛtvā samutplutya nipātayet
parivṛtta trikam ca eva tat preṅkholitam ucyate
bhujau ūrdhva viniṣkrāntau hastau ca abhimukha aṅgulī

original: baddhā cārī tatha caiva nitambe karaṇe bhavet /
analyzed: ca eva nitambe karaṇe bhavet
dolā pāda kramam kṛtvā hastau tad anugau

original: recitau ghūrṇitau vāpi skhalitaṃ karaṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: recitau ghūrṇitau vā api skhalitam karaṇam bhavet
ekaḥ vakṣaḥ sthitaḥ hastaḥ prodveṣṭita talaḥ paraḥ
añcitaḥ caraṇaḥ ca eva prayojyaḥ kari hastake

original: ekastu recito hasto latākhyastu tathā paraḥ // BhN_4.148 //
analyzed: ekaḥ tu recitaḥ hastaḥ latā ākhyaḥ tu tathā paraḥ
prasarpita talau pādau prasarpitakam eva tat

original: alātaṃ ca puraḥkṛtvā dvitīyaṃ ca drutakramam // BhN_4.149 //
analyzed: alātam ca puras kṛtvā dvitīyam ca druta kramam
hastau pāda anugau ca api siṃha vikrīḍite smṛtau
pṛṣṭha prasarpitaḥ pādaḥ tathā hastau nikuñcitau
punar tathā eva kartavyau siṃhākarṣtake dvijāḥ
ākṣipta hastam ākṣipta deham ākṣipta pādakam
advṛtta gātram iti etat udvṛtām karaṇam smṛtam
ākṣipta caraṇaḥ ca ekaḥ hastau tasya eva ca anugau

original: ānataṃ ca tatha gātraṃ tayopasṛtakaṃ bhavet
analyzed: ānatam ca gātram bhavet
dolā pāda kramam kṛtvā tala saṅghaṭṭitau karau
recayet ca karam vāmam tala saṅghaṭṭite sadā

original: eko vakṣaḥsthito hasto dvtīyaśca pralambitaḥ // BhN_4.154 //
analyzed: ekaḥ vakṣaḥ sthitaḥ hastaḥ dvtīyaḥ ca pralambitaḥ
tala agra saṃsthitaḥ pādaḥ janite karaṇe bhavet

original: janitaṃ karaṇaṃ kṛtvā hastau cābhimukhāṅgulī // BhN_4.155 //
analyzed: janitam karaṇam kṛtvā hastau ca abhimukha aṅgulī
ca eva jñeyam tat avahitthakam

original: karau vakṣaḥsthitau kāryāvurau nirbhugnameva ca // BhN_4.156 //
analyzed: karau vakṣaḥ sthitau kāryau urau nirbhugnam eva ca

original: maṇḍalasthānakaṃ caiva niveśaṃ karaṇaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: maṇḍala sthānakam ca eva niveśam karaṇam tu tat
tala sañcara pādābhyām utplutya patanam bhavet
saṃnatam valitam gātra melaka ākrīḍitam tu tat
karam āvṛtta karaṇam ūru pṛṣṭhe ñcitam nyaset
jaṅghā āñcitā tathā udvṛttā hi ūru udvṛttam tu tat bhavet

original: karau pralambitau kāryo śiraśca parivāhitam // BhN_4.159 //
analyzed: karau pralambitau kāryau śiraḥ ca parivāhitam
pādau ca mada skhalitake dvijāḥ

original: puraḥ prasāritaḥ pādaḥ kuñcito gaganonmukhaḥ // BhN_4.160 //
analyzed: puras prasāritaḥ pādaḥ kuñcitaḥ gagana unmukhaḥ

original: karau ca recitau yatra viṣṇukrāntaṃ taducyate /
analyzed: karau ca recitau yatra viṣṇukrāntam tat ucyate
karam āvartitam kṛtvā hi ūru pṛṣṭhe nikuñcayet

original: ūruścaiva tathāviddhaḥ sambhrāntaṃ karaṇaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: ūruḥ ca eva tathā āviddhaḥ sambhrāntam karaṇam tu tat

original: apaviddhaḥ karaḥ sūcyā pādaścaiva nikuṭṭitaḥ // BhN_4.162 //
analyzed: apaviddhaḥ karaḥ sūcyā pādaḥ ca eva nikuṭṭitaḥ

original: vakṣaḥsthaśca karo vāmo viṣkambhe karaṇe bhavet /
analyzed: vakṣaḥ sthaḥ ca karaḥ vāmaḥ viṣkambhe karaṇe bhavet
pādau uddhaṭṭitau kāryau tala saṅghaṭṭitau karau
nataḥ ca pārśvam kartavyam budhaiḥ uddhaṭṭite sadā

original: prayujyālātakaṃ pūrvaṃ hastau cāpi hi recayet // BhN_4.164 //
analyzed: prayujya alātakam pūrvam hastau ca api hi recayet
kuñcitau añcitau ca eva vṛṣabha krīḍite sadā

original: recitāvañcitau hastau lolitaṃ vartitaṃ śiraḥ // BhN_4.165 //
analyzed: recitau añcitau hastau lolitam vartitam śiraḥ
ubhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ yatra tat lolitam udāhṛtam
svastika apasṛtau pādau śiraḥ ca parivāhitam

original: recitau ca tathā hastau syātāṃ nāgāpasarpite /
analyzed: recitau ca tathā hastau syātām nāga apasarpite
niṣaṇṇa aṅgaḥ tu caraṇam prasārya tala sañcaram
udvāhitam uraḥ kṛtvā śakaṭāsyam prayojayet
ūrdhva aṅguli talau pādau tri patākau adhomukhau
hastau śiraḥ sannatam ca gaṅgā avataraṇam tu iti

original: yāni sthānāni yāścāryo vyāyāme kathitāni tu // BhN_4.169 //
analyzed: yāni sthānāni yāḥ cāryaḥ vyāyāme kathitāni tu
pāda pracāraḥ tu eṣām tu karaṇānām ayam bhavet

original: ye cāpi nṛttahastāstu gaditā nṛttakarmaṇi // BhN_4.170 //
analyzed: ye ca api nṛtta hastāḥ tu gaditāḥ nṛtta karmaṇi
teṣām samāsatas yogaḥ karaṇeṣu vibhāvyate

original: prāyeṇa karaṇe kāryo vāmo vakṣaḥsthitaḥ karaḥ // BhN_4.171 //
analyzed: prāyeṇa karaṇe kāryaḥ vāmaḥ vakṣaḥ sthitaḥ karaḥ
caraṇaḥ ca anugaḥ ca api dakṣiṇaḥ tu bhavet karaḥ

original: cāryaścaiva tu yāḥ proktā nṛttahastāstathaiva ca // BhN_4.172 //
analyzed: cāryaḥ ca eva tu yāḥ proktāḥ nṛtta hastāḥ tathā eva ca
sā mātṛkā iti vijñeyā tad bhedāt karaṇāni tu
aṣṭottaraśatam hi etat karaṇānām mayā uditam
atas param pravakṣyāmi hi aṅgahāra vikalpanam

original: prasāryotkṣipya ca karau samapādaṃ prayojayet // BhN_4.174 //
analyzed: prasārya utkṣipya ca karau sama pādam prayojayet
vyaṃsita apasṛtam savyam hastam ūrdhvam prasārayet

original: pratyālīḍhaṃ tataḥ kuryāt tathaiva ca nikuṭṭakam // BhN_4.175 //
analyzed: pratyālīḍham tatas kuryāt tathā eva ca nikuṭṭakam
ūru udvṛttam tatas kuryāt akṣiptam svastikam tatas

original: nitambaṃ kari hastaṃ ca kaṭicchinnaṃ ca yogataḥ // BhN_4.176 //
analyzed: nitambam kari hastam ca kaṭi chinnam ca yogatas
sthira hastaḥ bhavet eṣa tu aṅgahāraḥ hara priyaḥ
tala puṣpa apaviddhe dve vartitam saṃnikuṭṭikam
ūru udvṛttam tathā ākṣiptam uraḥ maṇḍalam eva ca

original: nitambaṃ karihastaṃ ca kaṭicchinnaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_4.178 //
analyzed: nitambam kari hastam ca kaṭi chinnam tathā eva ca
eṣa paryastakaḥ nāma hi aṅgahāraḥ hara udbhavaḥ

original: alapallavasūcīṃ ca kṛtvā vikṣiptameva ca // BhN_4.179 //
analyzed: ala pallava sūcīm ca kṛtvā vikṣiptam eva ca
āvartitam tatas kuryāt ca nikuṭṭakam
ūru udvṛttam tathā ākṣiptam uraḥ maṇḍalam eva ca
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam sūcī viddhaḥ bhavet ayam

original: apaviddhaṃ tu karaṇaṃ sūcīviddhaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_4.181 //
analyzed: apaviddham tu karaṇam sūcīviddham tathā eva ca
udveṣṭitena hastena trikam tu parivartayet

original: uromaṇḍalakau hastau kaṭicchinnaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_4.182 //
analyzed: uraḥ maṇḍalakau hastau kaṭi chinnam tathā eva ca
apaviddhaḥ ṅgahārāḥ ca vijñeyaḥ yam prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: karaṇaṃ nūpuraṃ kṛtvā vikṣiptālātake punaḥ // BhN_4.183 //
analyzed: karaṇam nūpuram kṛtvā vikṣipta alātake punar
punar ākṣiptakam kuryāt uromaṇḍalakam tathā

original: nitambaṃ karihastaṃ ca kaṭicchinnaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_4.184 //
analyzed: nitambam kari hastam ca kaṭi chinnam tathā eva ca
ākṣiptakaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ hi aṅgahāraḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
udveṣṭita apaviddhaḥ tu karaḥ pādaḥ nikuṭṭitaḥ
punar taina eva yogena vāma pārśve bhavet atha
uraḥ maṇḍalakau hastau nitambam kari hastakam
kartavyam sa kaṭicchinnam nṛtye tu uddhaṭṭite sadā

original: paryāyodveṣṭitau hastau pādau caiva nikuṭṭitau // BhN_4.187 //
analyzed: paryāya udveṣṭitau hastau pādau ca eva nikuṭṭitau
ca eva hi ūru udvṛttam tathā eva ca

original: caturaśraṃ karaṃ kṛtvā pādena ca nikuṭṭakam // BhN_4.188 //
analyzed: caturaśram karam kṛtvā pādena ca nikuṭṭakam
bhujaṅga trāsitam ca eva karam ca udviṣṭitam punar

original: paricchinnaṃ ca kartavyaṃ trikaṃ bhramarakeṇa tu // BhN_4.189 //
analyzed: paricchinnam ca kartavyam trikam bhramarakeṇa tu
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam viṣkambhe parikīrtitam

original: daṇḍapādaṃ karaṃ caiva vikṣipyākṣipya caiva hi // BhN_4.190 //
analyzed: daṇḍa pādam karam ca eva vikṣipya ākṣipya ca eva hi

original: vyaṃsitaṃ vāmahastaṃ ca saha pādena sarpayet /
analyzed: vyaṃsitam vāma hastam ca saha pādena sarpayet
nikuṭṭaka dvayam kāryam ākṣiptam maṇḍala urasi
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam kartavyam aparājite

original: kuṭṭitaṃ karaṇaṃ kṛtvā bhujaṅgatrāsitaṃ tathā // BhN_4.192 //
analyzed: kuṭṭitam karaṇam kṛtvā bhujaṅga trāsitam tathā
recitena tu hastena patākam hastam ādiśet
ākṣiptakam prayuñjīta hi uromaṇḍalakam tathā

original: trikaṃ suvalitaṃ kṛtvā nūpuraṃ karaṇaṃ tathā // BhN_4.194 //
analyzed: trikam su valitam kṛtvā nūpuram karaṇam tathā
bhujaṅga trāsitam savyam tathā vaiśākha recitam

original: ākṣiptakaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā paricchinnaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_4.195 //
analyzed: ākṣiptakam tatas kṛtvā paricchinnam tathā eva ca
bāhya bhramarakam kuryāt uraḥ maṇḍalam eva ca

original: nitambaṃ karihastaṃ ca kaṭicchinnaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_4.196 //
analyzed: nitambam kari hastam ca kaṭi chinnam tathā eva ca
matta ākrīḍaḥ bhavet eṣa hi aṅgahāraḥ harapriyaḥ

original: recitaṃ hastapādaṃ ca kṛtvā vṛścikameva ca // BhN_4.197 //
analyzed: recitam hasta pādam ca kṛtvā vṛścikam eva ca
