punar tena eva yogena vṛścikam samprayojayet

original: nikuṭṭakaṃ tathā caiva savyāsavyakṛtaṃ kramāt // BhN_4.198 //
analyzed: nikuṭṭakam tathā ca eva savya asavya kṛtam kramāt

original: pārśve tu svastikaṃ baddhvā kāryaṃ tvatha nikuṭṭakam // BhN_4.199 //
analyzed: pārśve tu svastikam baddhvā kāryam tu atha nikuṭṭakam

original: dvitīyasya ca pārśvasya vidhiḥ syādyameva hi /
analyzed: dvitīyasya ca pārśvasya vidhiḥ syāt yam eva hi
tatas ca karam āvartya hi ūru pṛṣṭhe nipātayet
ūru udvṛttam tatas kuryāt ākṣiptam punar eva hi

original: nitambaṃ karihastaṃ ca kaṭicchinnaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_4.201 //
analyzed: nitambam kari hastam ca kaṭi chinnam tathā eva ca
pārśvasvastikaḥ iti eṣa hi aṅgahāraḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: vṛścikaṃ karaṇaṃ kṛtvā latākhyaṃ hastameva ca // BhN_4.202 //
analyzed: vṛścikam karaṇam kṛtvā latā ākhyam hastam eva ca

original: tameva ca karaṃ bhūyo nāsāgre sannikuñcayet /
analyzed: tam eva ca karam bhūyas nāsā agre sannikuñcayet
tam eva udveṣṭitam kṛtvā nitambam parivartayet
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam vṛścika apasṛte bhavet

original: kṛtvā nūpurapādaṃ tu tathākṣiptakameva ca // BhN_4.204 //
analyzed: kṛtvā nūpura pādam tu tathā ākṣiptakam eva ca

original: paricchinnaṃ ca kartavyaṃ sūcīpādaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: paricchinnam ca kartavyam sūcī pādam tathā eva ca
nitambam kari hastam ca api uraḥ maṇḍalakam tathā

original: kaṭīcchinnaṃ tataścaiva bhramaraḥ sa tu saṃjñitaḥ /
analyzed: kaṭī chinnam tatas ca eva bhramaraḥ sa tu saṃjñitaḥ
kṛtvā karam āvartya dakṣiṇam
kapolasya pradeśe tu kāryam samyak nikuñcitam
apaviddham drutam ca eva tala saṃsphoṭa saṃyutam
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam mattaskhalitake bhavet

original: dolaiḥ karaiḥ pracalitaiḥ svastikāpasṛtaiḥ padaiḥ // BhN_4.208 //
analyzed: dolaiḥ karaiḥ pracalitaiḥ svastika apasṛtaiḥ padaiḥ
añcitaiḥ valitaiḥ hastaiḥ tala saṅghaṭṭitaiḥ tathā

original: nikuṭṭitaṃ ca kartavyamūrūdvṛtaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_4.209 //
analyzed: nikuṭṭitam ca kartavyam ūru udvṛtam tathā eva ca
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam madāt vilasite bhavet

original: maṇḍalaṃ sthānakaṃ kṛtvā tathā hastau ca recitau // BhN_4.210 //
analyzed: maṇḍalam sthānakam kṛtvā tathā hastau ca recitau
udghaṭṭitena pādena mattalli karaṇam bhavet

original: ākṣiptaṃ karaṇaṃ caiva hyuromaṇḍalameva ca // BhN_4.211 //
analyzed: ākṣiptam karaṇam ca eva hi uraḥ maṇḍalam eva ca
kaṭicchinnam tathā ca eva bhavet tu gati maṇḍale
sama pādam prayujya atha paricchinnam tu anantaram
āviddhena tu pādena bāhya bhramarakam tathā
vāma sūcyā tu atikrāntam bhujaṅga trāsitam tathā
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam paricchinne vidhīyate

original: śirasastūpari sthāpyau svastiakau vicyutau karau // BhN_4.214 //
analyzed: śirasaḥ tu upari sthāpyau svastiakau vicyutau karau

original: tataḥ savyaṃ karaṃ cāpi gātramānamya recayet /
analyzed: tatas savyam karam ca api gātram ānamya recayet
punar utthāpayet tatra gātram unnamya recitam

original: latākhyau ca karau kṛtvā vṛścikaṃ samprayojayet /
analyzed: latā ākhyau ca karau kṛtvā vṛścikam samprayojayet

original: recitaṃ karihastaṃ ca bhujaṅgatrāsitaṃ tathā // BhN_4.216 //
analyzed: recitam kari hastam ca bhujaṅga trāsitam tathā
ākṣiptakam prayuñjīta svastikam pādam eva ca
parāṅgmukha vidhiḥ bhūyas evam eva bhavet iha
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam

original: recitau saha gātreṇa hyapaviddhau karau yadā // BhN_4.218 //
analyzed: recitau saha gātreṇa hi apaviddhau karau yadā
punar tena eva deśena gātram unnamya recayet
kuryāt nūpura pādam ca bhujaṅga trāsitam tathā
recitam maṇḍalam ca eva bāhu śīrṣe nikuñcayet
ūru udvṛttam tathā ākṣiptam uraḥ maṇḍalam eva ca
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam kuryāt vaiśākha recite

original: ādyaṃ tu janitaṃ kṛtvā pādamekaṃ prasārayet // BhN_4.221 //
analyzed: ādyam tu janitam kṛtvā pādam ekam prasārayet
tathā eva alātakam kuryāt trikam tu parivartayet

original: añcitaṃ vāmahastaṃ ca gaṇḍadeśe nikuṭṭayet // BhN_4.222 //
analyzed: añcitam vāma hastam ca gaṇḍa deśe nikuṭṭayet
kaṭicchinnam tathā ca eva parāvṛtte prayojayet

original: svastikaṃ karaṇaṃ kṛtvā vyaṃsitau ca karau punaḥ // BhN_4.223 //
analyzed: svastikam karaṇam kṛtvā vyaṃsitau ca karau punar
alātakam prayuñjīta hi ūrdhva jānu nikuñcitam
ardhasūcī ca vikṣiptam udvṛtta ākṣiptake tathā
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam aṅgahāre hi alātake
nikuṭya vakṣasi karau ūrdhva jānu prayojayet
ākṣipta svastikam kṛtvā trikam tu parivartayet
uraḥ maṇḍalakau hastau nitambam kari hastakam
kaṭicchinnam tathā ca eva pārśvacchede vidhīyate
sūcī vāma padam dadhyāt vidyut bhrāntam ca dakṣiṇam

original: dakṣiṇena punaḥ sūcī vidyudbhrāntaṃ ca vāmataḥ /
analyzed: dakṣiṇena punar sūcī vidyut bhrāntam ca vāmatas

original: paricchinnaṃ tathā caiva hyatikrāntaṃ ca vāmakam // BhN_4.228 //
analyzed: paricchinnam tathā ca eva hi atikrāntam ca vāmakam
latākhyam sa kaṭicchinnam vidyudbhrāntaḥ ca sa smṛtaḥ

original: kṛtvā nūpurapādaṃ tu savyavāmau pralambitau // BhN_4.229 //
analyzed: kṛtvā nūpura pādam tu savya vāmau pralambitau
karau pārśve tatas tābhyām vikṣiptam samprayojayet

original: tābhyāṃ sūcī tathā caiva trikaṃ tu parivartayet // BhN_4.230 //
analyzed: tābhyām sūcī tathā ca eva trikam tu parivartayet
latā ākhyam sa kaṭicchinnam kurtāt udvṛttake sadā
ālīḍha vyaṃsitau hastau bāhu śīrṣe nikuṭṭayet
nūpuraḥ caraṇaḥ vāmaḥ tathā alātaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ
tena eva ākṣiptakam kuryāt uras maṇḍalakau karau
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam ālīḍhe samprayojayet

original: hastaṃ tu recitaṃ kṛtvā pārśvamānasya recayet // BhN_4.233 //
analyzed: hastam tu recitam kṛtvā pārśva mānasya recayet
punar tena eva yogena gātra mānasya recayet
recitam karaṇam kāryam uraḥ maṇḍalam eva ca
kaṭicchinnam tu kartavyam aṅgahāre tu recite

original: nūpuraṃ caraṇaṃ kṛtvā trikaṃ tu parivartayet // BhN_4.235 //
analyzed: nūpuram caraṇam kṛtvā trikam tu parivartayet
vyaṃsitena tu hastena trikam eva vivartayet

original: vāmaṃ cālātakaṃ kṛtvā sūcīmatraiva yojayet // BhN_4.236 //
analyzed: vāmam ca alātakam kṛtvā sūcīm atra eva yojayet
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam kuryāt ācchurite sadā

original: recitau svastikau pādau recitau svastikau karau // BhN_4.237 //
analyzed: recitau svastikau pādau recitau svastikau karau

original: kṛtvā viśleṣamevaṃ tu tenaiva vidhinā punaḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā viśleṣam evam tu tena eva vidhinā punar
punar utkṣepaṇam ca eva recitaiḥ eva kārayet
udvṛtta ākṣiptake ca eva hi uraḥ maṇḍalam eva ca

original: nitambaṃ karihastaṃ ca kaṭicchinnaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_4.239 //
analyzed: nitambam kari hastam ca kaṭi chinnam tathā eva ca
ākṣiptarecitaḥ hi eṣa karaṇānām vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: vikṣipta karaṇaṃ kṛtvā hastapādaṃ mukhāgamam // BhN_4.240 //
analyzed: vikṣipta karaṇam kṛtvā hasta pādam mukha āgamam
vāma sūci sahakṛtam vikṣipet vāmakam karam

original: vakṣaḥsthāne bhavetsavyo valitaṃ trikameva ca // BhN_4.241 //
analyzed: vakṣaḥ sthāne bhavet savyaḥ valitam trikam eva ca
nūpura ākṣiptake ca eva hi ardhasvastikam eva ca

original: nitambaṃ karihastaṃ ca hyuromaṇḍalakaṃ tathā // BhN_4.242 //
analyzed: nitambam kari hastam ca hi uraḥ maṇḍalakam tathā
kaṭi chinnam ca kartavyam sambhrānte nṛtta yoktṛbhiḥ

original: apakrāntakramaṃ kṛtvā vyaṃsitaṃ hastameva ca // BhN_4.243 //
analyzed: apakrānta kramam kṛtvā vyaṃsitam hastam eva ca
kuryāt udveṣṭitam ca eva hi ardha sūcīm tathā eva ca
vikṣiptam sa kaṭicchinnam udvṛtta ākṣiptake tathā
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam kartavyam apasarpite

original: kṛtvā nūpurapādaṃ ca drutamākṣipya ca kramam // BhN_4.245 //
analyzed: kṛtvā nūpura pādam ca drutam ākṣipya ca kramam

original: pādasya cānugau hastau trikaṃ ca parivartayet /
analyzed: pādasya ca anugau hastau trikam ca parivartayet
nikuṭya kara pādam ca api uraḥ maṇḍalakam punar
kari hastam kaṭi chinnam kāryam ardha nikuṭṭake
dvātriṃśat ete samproktāḥ hi aṅgahārāḥ dvijottamāḥ
caturaḥ recakān ca api gadataḥ me nibodhata

original: pādarecaka ekaḥ syāt dvitīyaḥ kaṭirecakaḥ // BhN_4.248 //
analyzed: pādarecakaḥ ekaḥ syāt dvitīyaḥ kaṭirecakaḥ
kara recakaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu caturthaḥ kaṇṭha recakaḥ
recita ākhyaḥ pṛthagbhāve valane ca abhidhīyate
udvāhanāt pṛthagbhāvāt calanāt ca api recakaḥ
pārśvāt pārśve tu gamanam skhalitaiḥ calitaiḥ padaiḥ
vividhaiḥ ca eva pādasya pādarecakaḥ ucyate
trikasya udvartanam ca eva chaṭī valanam eva ca
tathā apasarpaṇam ca eva kaṭirecakaḥ ucyate
udvartanam parikṣepaḥ vikṣepaḥ parivartanam

original: visarpaṇaṃ ca hastasya hastarecaka ucyate // BhN_4.249ab*4 //
analyzed: visarpaṇam ca hastasya hastarecakaḥ ucyate
udvāhanam sannamanam tathā pārśvasya sannatiḥ

original: bhramaṇaṃ cāpi vijñeyo grīvāyā recako budhaiḥ] // BhN_4.249ab*5 //
analyzed: bhramaṇam ca api vijñeyaḥ grīvāyāḥ recakaḥ budhaiḥ
recakaiḥ aṅgahāraiḥ ca nṛtyantam vīkṣya śaṅkaram
su kumāra prayogeṇa nṛtyantīm ca eva pārvatīm
mṛdañga bherī paṭahaiḥ bhāṇḍa ḍiṇḍima gomukhaiḥ
paṇavaiḥ daduraiḥ ca eva sarva ātodyaiḥ pravāditaiḥ
dakṣa yajñe vinihate sandhyā kāle maheśvaraḥ
nānā aṅgahāraiḥ prānṛtyat laya tāla vaśa anugaiḥ
piṇḍi bandhān tatas dṛṣṭvā nandi bhadra mukhāḥ gaṇāḥ
cakruḥ te nāma piṇḍīnām bandham āsām sa lakṣaṇam
īśvarasya īśvarī pinḍī nandinaḥ ca api paṭṭasī
caṇḍikāyāḥ bhavet piṇḍī tathā vai siṃhavāhinī
tārkṣya piṇḍī bhavet viṣṇoḥ padma piṇḍī svayaṃbhuvaḥ
śikhi piṇḍī kumārasya rūpa piṇḍī bhavet śriyaḥ

original: dhārāpiṇḍī ca jāhnavyāḥ pāśapiṇḍī yamasya ca /
analyzed: dhārāpiṇḍī ca jāhnavyāḥ pāśapiṇḍī yamasya ca

original: vāruṇī ca nadīpiṇḍī yākṣī syāddhanadasya tu // BhN_4.256 //
analyzed: ca
halapiṇḍī balasya api sarpapiṇḍī tu bhoginām
triśūla ākṛti saṃsthānā raudrī syāt andhakadviṣaḥ
evam anyāsu api tathā devatāsu yathākramam
dhvaja bhūtāḥ prayoktavyāḥ piṇḍī bandhāḥ su cihnitāḥ
recakāḥ aṅgahārāḥ ca ca
sṛṣṭvā bhagavatā dattāḥ taṇḍave munaye tadā
tena api hi tatas samyak gāna bhāṇḍa samanvitaḥ

original: nṛttaprayogaḥ sṛṣṭo yaḥ sa tāṇḍava iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: nṛtta prayogaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ yaḥ sa tāṇḍavaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
yadā prāpti artham arthānām tad jñaiḥ abhinayaḥ kṛtaḥ
kasmāt a nṛttam kṛtam hi etat kam svabhāvam apekṣate

original: na gītakārthasambaddhaṃ na cāpyarthasya bhāvakam // BhN_4.262 //
analyzed: na gītaka artha sambaddham na ca api arthasya bhāvakam
kasmāt nṛttam kṛtam hi etat gīteṣu āsāriteṣu ca
bharataḥ
atrā ucyate na khalu artham kañcid nṛttam apekṣate

original: kiṃ tu śobhāṃ prajanayediti nṛttaṃ pravartitam /
analyzed: kim tu śobhām prajanayet iti nṛttam pravartitam
prāyeṇa sarva lokasya nṛttam iṣṭam svabhāvataḥ
maṅgalam iti kṛtvā ca nṛttam etat prakīrtitam
vivāha prasava āvāha pramoda abhyuadaya ādiṣu
vinoda kāraṇam ca iti nṛttam etat pravartitam
atas ca eva pratikṣepāt bhūta saṅghaiḥ pravartitāḥ
ye gītaka ādau yujyante samyak nṛtta vibhāgakāḥ
devena ca api samproktaḥ taṇḍuḥ tāṇḍava pūrvakam
gīta prayogam āśritya nṛttam etat pravartyatām
prāyeṇa tāṇḍava vidhiḥ deva stuti āśrayaḥ bhavet
su kumāra prayogaḥ ca śṛṅgāra rasa sambhavaḥ
tasya taṇḍu prayuktasya tāṇḍavasya vidhi kriyām
vardhamānakam āsādya sampravakṣyami lakṣaṇam

original: kalānāṃ vṛddhimāsādya hyakṣarāṇāṃ ca vardhanāt // BhN_4.270 //
analyzed: kalānām vṛddhim āsādya hi akṣarāṇām ca vardhanāt
layasya vardhanāt ca api vardhamānakam ucyate
kṛttvā kutapa vinyāsam yathāvat dvijasattamāḥ
āsārita prayogaḥ tu tatas kāryaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
tatra tu upohanam kṛttvā tantrī gāna samanvitam
kāryaḥ praveśaḥ nartakyāḥ bhāṇḍa vādya samanvitaḥ

original: viśuddhakaraṇāyāṃ tu jātyāṃ vādyaṃ prayojayet // BhN_4.273 //
analyzed: viśuddha karaṇāyām tu jātyām vādyam prayojayet
gatyā vādya anusāriṇyā tasyāḥ cārīm prayojayet
vaiśākhasthānakena iha sarva recaka cāriṇī
puṣpa añjali dharā bhūtvā praviśet raṅga maṇḍapam

original: puṣpāñjaliṃ visṛjyātha raṅgapīṭhaṃ parītya ca // BhN_4.275 //
analyzed: puṣpa añjalim visṛjya atha raṅga pīṭham parītya ca
praṇamya devatābhyaḥ ca tatas bhinayam ācaret

original: yatrābhineyaṃ gītaṃ syāttatra vādyaṃ na yojayet // BhN_4.276 //
analyzed: yatra abhineyam gītam syāt tatra vādyam na yojayet
aṅgahāra prayoge tu bhāṇḍa vādyam vidhīyate

original: samaṃ raktaṃ vibhaktaṃ ca sphuṭaṃ śuddhaprahārajam // BhN_4.277 //
analyzed: samam raktam vibhaktam ca sphuṭam śuddha prahāra jam
nṛtta aṅga grāhi vādya jñaiḥ vādyam yojyam tu tāṇḍave

original: prayujya gītavādye tu niṣkrāmennartakī tataḥ // BhN_4.278 //
analyzed: prayujya gīta vādye tu niṣkrāmet nartakī tatas
anena eva vidhānena praviśanti aparāḥ pṛthak

original: anyāścānukrameṇātha piṇḍīṃ badhnanti yāḥ striyaḥ // BhN_4.279 //
analyzed: anyāḥ ca anukrameṇa atha piṇḍīm badhnanti yāḥ striyaḥ
tāvat paryastakaḥ kāryaḥ yāvat piṇḍī na badhyate

original: piṇḍīṃ baddhvā tataḥ sarvā niṣkrāmeyuḥ striyastu tāḥ // BhN_4.280 //
analyzed: piṇḍīm baddhvā tatas sarvāḥ niṣkrāmeyuḥ striyaḥ tu tāḥ
piṇḍībandheṣu vādyam tu kartavyam iha vādakaiaḥ
paryastaka pramāṇena citra ogha karaṇa anvitam
tatra upavāhanam bhūyas kāryam pūrvavat eva hi

original: tataścāsāritaṃ bhūyo gāyanaṃ tu prayojayet // BhN_4.282 //
analyzed: tatas ca āsāritam bhūyas gāyanam tu prayojayet
pūrveṇa eva vidhānena praviśet ca api nartakī
gītaka artham tu abhinayet dvitīyā sāritasya tu
tat eva ca punar vastu nṛttena api pradarśayet

original: āsārite samāpte tu niṣkrāmennartakī tataḥ // BhN_4.284 //
analyzed: āsārite samāpte tu niṣkrāmet nartakī tatas
pūrvavat praviśanti anyāḥ prayogaḥ syāt saḥ eva hi

original: evaṃ pade pade kāryo vidhirāsāritasya tu // BhN_4.285 //
analyzed: evam pade pade kāryaḥ vidhiḥ āsāritasya tu
bhāṇḍa vādya kṛte ca eva tathā gāna kṛte ca

original: ekā tu prathamaṃ yojyā dve dvitīyaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_4.286 //
analyzed: ekā tu prathamam yojyā dve dvitīyam tathā eva ca

original: tisro vastu tṛtīyaṃ tu catasrastu caturthakam /
analyzed: tisraḥ vaḥ tu tṛtīyam tu catasraḥ tu caturthakam
piṇḍīnām vidhayaḥ ca eva catvāraḥ samprakīrtitāḥ
piṇḍī śṛṅkhalikā ca eva bhedyakaḥ
piṇḍībandhaḥ tu piṇḍa tvāt gulmaḥ śṛṅkhalikā bhavet

original: jālopanaddhā ca latā sanṛtto bhedyakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: jālopanaddhā ca latā sa nṛttaḥ bhedyakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: piṇḍībandhaḥ kaniṣṭhe tu śṛṅkhalā tu layāntare // BhN_4.289 //
analyzed: piṇḍī bandhaḥ kaniṣṭhe tu śṛṅkhalā tu laya antare

original: madhyame ca latābandho jyeṣṭhe caivātha bhedyakaḥ /
analyzed: madhyame ca latā bandhaḥ jyeṣṭhe ca eva atha bhedyakaḥ

original: piṇḍīnāṃ vividhā yoniryantraṃ bhadrāsanaṃ tathā // BhN_4.290 //
analyzed: piṇḍīnām vividhā yoniḥ yantram bhadrāsanam tathā
śikṣā yogaḥ tathā ca eva prayoktavyaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: evaṃ prayogaḥ kartavyo vardhamāne tapodhanāḥ // BhN_4.291 //
analyzed: evam prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ vardhamāne tapodhanāḥ

original: gītānāṃ chandakānāṃ ca bhūyo vakṣyāmyahaṃ vidhim /
analyzed: gītānām chandakānām ca bhūyas vakṣyāmi aham vidhim

original: yāni vastunibaddhāni yāni cāṅgikṛtāni tu // BhN_4.292 //
analyzed: yāni vastunibaddhāni yāni ca aṅgikṛtāni tu
gītāni teṣām vakṣyāmi prayogam nṛtta vādyayoḥ
tatra avataraṇam kāryam nartakyāḥ sārvabhāṇḍikam
kṣepa pratikṣepa kṛtam bhāṇḍa upohana saṃskṛtam
prathamam tu abhineyam syat gītake sarvavastukam
tat eva ca punar vastu
yaḥ vidhiḥ pūrvam uktaḥ tu nṛtta abhinaya vādite
āsārita vidhau sa syāt gītānām vastukeṣu api

original: evaṃ vastunibandhānāṃ gītakānāṃ vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // BhN_4.296 //
analyzed: evam vastu nibandhānām gītakānām vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
śṛṇuta aṅga nibaddhānām gītānām api lakṣaṇam
yaḥ eva vastuka vidhiḥ nṛtta abhinaya vādite
tam eva aṅga nibaddheṣu chandakeṣu api yojayet
vādyam guru akṣara kṛtam tathā alpa akṣaram eva ca
mukhe sa upohane kuryāt varṇānām viprakarṣataḥ

original: yadā gītivaśādaṅgaṃ bhūyo bhūyo nivartate // BhN_4.299 //
analyzed: yadā gīti vaśāt aṅgam bhūyas bhūyas nivartate
tatra ādyam abhineyam syāt śeṣam nṛttena yojayet

original: yadā gītivaśādaṅgaṃ bhūyo bhūyo nivartate // BhN_4.300 //
analyzed: yadā gīti vaśāt aṅgam bhūyas bhūyas nivartate
tripāṇi laya saṃyuktam tatra vādyam prayojayet

original: yathā layastathā vādyaṃ kartavyamiha vādakaiḥ // BhN_4.301 //
analyzed: yathā layaḥ tathā vādyam kartavyam iha vādakaiḥ
tatam ca anugatam ca api ogham ca karaṇa anvitam

original: sthire tattvaṃ prayoktavyaṃ madhye cānugataṃ bhavet // BhN_4.301*1 //
analyzed: sthire tattvam prayoktavyam madhye ca anugatam bhavet
bhūyas ca oghaḥ prayoktavyaḥ tu eṣa vādya gataḥ vidhiḥ
chandogītakam āsādya tu aṅgāni parivartayet
eṣa kāryaḥ vidhiḥ nityam nṛtta abhinaya vādite
yāni vastu nibaddhāni teṣām ante grahaḥ bhavet

original: aṅgānāṃ tu parāvṛttāvādāveva graho mataḥ] // BhN_4.301*3 //
analyzed: aṅgānām tu parāvṛttau ādau eva grahaḥ mataḥ
evam eṣa vidhiḥ kāryaḥ gīteṣu āsāriteṣu api
deva stuti āśrayam hi etat sukumāram nibodhata
strīpuṃsayoḥ tu saṃlāpaḥ yaḥ tu kāma samudbhavaḥ
tat jñeyam sukumāram hi śṛṅgāra rasa sambhavam
yasyām yasyām avasthāyām nṛttam yojyam prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: tatsarvaṃṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tacca me śṛṇuta dvijāḥ // BhN_4.304 //
analyzed: tat sarvam saṃpravakṣyāmi tat ca me śṛṇuta dvijāḥ
aṅga vastu nivṛttau tu tathā varṇa nivṛttiṣu

original: tathā cābhudayasthāne nṛttaṃ tajjñaḥ prayojayet // BhN_4.305 //
analyzed: tathā ca abhudaya sthāne nṛttam tad jñaḥ prayojayet
yat tu saṃdṛśyate kiñcid dampatyoḥ madana āśrayam
nṛttam tatra prayoktavyam praharṣa artha guṇa udbhavam
yatra sannihite kānte ṛtu kāla ādi darśanam
gītaka artha abhisaṃbaddham nṛttam tatra api ca iṣyate
vipralabdhā vā kalaha antaritā api vā

original: yasminnaṅge tu yuvatirna nṛttaṃ tatra na yojayet // BhN_4.308 //
analyzed: yasmin aṅge tu yuvatiḥ na nṛttam tatra na yojayet
sakhī pravṛtte saṃlāpe tathā asannihite priye

original: na hi nṛttaṃ prayoktavyaṃ yasyā na proṣitaḥ priyaḥ // BhN_4.309 //
analyzed: na hi nṛttam prayoktavyam yasyāḥ na proṣitaḥ priyaḥ
dūtī āśrayam yadā tu syāt ṛtu kāla ādi darśanam

original: autsukyacintāsaṃbaddhaṃ na nṛttaṃ tatra yojayet] // BhN_4.309* //
analyzed: autsukya cintā saṃbaddham na nṛttam tatra yojayet
yasmin aṅge prasādam tu gṛhnīyāt nāyikā kramāt

original: tataḥprabhṛti nṛttaṃ tu śeṣeṣvaṅgeṣu yojayet // BhN_4.310 //
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti nṛttam tu śeṣeṣu aṅgeṣu yojayet
deva stuti āśraya kṛtam yat aṅgam tu bhavet atha
māheśvaraiḥ aṅgahāraiḥ uddhataiḥ tat prayojayet
yat tu śṛṅgāra saṃbaddham gānam strī puruṣa āśrayam
devī kṛtaiḥ aṅgahāraiḥ lalitaiḥ tat prayojayet
catuṣpadāḥ narkuṭake khañjake parigītake
vidhānam sampravakṣyāmi bhāṇḍa vādya vidhim prati

original: pādānte sannipāte tu tasyā bhāṇḍagraho bhavet // BhN_4.314 //
analyzed: pāda ante sannipāte tu tasyāḥ bhāṇḍagrahaḥ bhavet

original: yā dhruvā chandasā yaktā samapādā samākṣarā /
analyzed: yā dhruvā chandasā yaktā sama pādā sama akṣarā

original: tasyāḥ pādāvasāne tu pradeśinyā graho bhavet // BhN_4.315 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ pāda avasāne tu pradeśinyāḥ grahaḥ bhavet
kṛtvā ekam parivartam tu gānasya abhinayasya ca

original: punaḥ pādanivṛttiṃ tu bhāṇḍavādyena yojayet // BhN_4.316 //
analyzed: punar pāda nivṛttim tu bhāṇḍa vādyena yojayet
aṅga vastu nivṛtau tu varṇa antara nivṛttiṣu
tathā upasthāpane ca eva bhāṇḍa vādyam prayojayet
ye pi ca antara mārgāḥ syuḥ tantri vāc karaṇaiḥ kṛtāḥ

original: teṣu sūcī prayoktavyā bhāṇḍena saha tāṇḍave // BhN_4.318 //
analyzed: teṣu sūcī prayoktavyā bhāṇḍena saha tāṇḍave
maheśvarasya caritam yaḥ idam samprayojayet
sarva pāpa viśuddha ātmā śiva lokam sa gacchati
evam eṣa vidhiḥ sṛr dṛ
ṣṭaḥ tāṇḍavasya prayogataḥ
bhūyas kim kathyatām anyat nāṭya veda vidhim prati

original: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre tāṇḍavalakṣaṇaṃ nāma caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre tāṇḍavalakṣaṇam nāma caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha pūrvaraṅgavidhānaḥ nāma pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā nāṭya santāna kāraṇam
punar eva abruvan vākyam ṛṣayaḥ hṛṣṭa mānasāḥ

original: yathā nāṭyasya janmedaṃ jarjarasya ca sambhavaḥ /
analyzed: yathā nāṭyasya janma idam jarjarasya ca sambhavaḥ

original: vighnānāṃ śamanaṃ caiva daivatānāṃ ca pūjanam // BhN_5.2 //
analyzed: vighnānām śamanam ca eva daivatānām ca pūjanam
tat asmābhiḥ śrutam sarvam gṛhītvā ca avadhāritam
nikhilena yathātattvam icchāmaḥ veditum punar
pūrvaraṅgam mahā tejaḥ sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
yathā buddhyāmahe brahman tathā vyākhyātum arhasi

original: teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā munīnāṃ bharato muniḥ /
analyzed: teṣām tu vacanam śrutvā munīnām bharataḥ muniḥ
pratyuvāca punar vākyam pūrvaraṅga vidhim prati
pūrvaraṅgam mahābhāgāḥ gadataḥ me nibodhata
pādabhāgāḥ kalāḥ ca eva parivartāḥ tathā eva ca
yasmāt raṅge prayogaḥ yam pūrvam eva prayujyate
tasmāt ayam pūrvaraṅgaḥ vijñeyaḥ dvijasattamāḥ
asya aṅgāni tu kāryāṇi yathāvat anupūrvaśas
pāṭhya yoga kṛtaiḥ tathā
pratyāhāraḥ vataraṇam tathā hi ārambhaḥ eva ca
āśrāvaṇā vaktrapāṇiḥ tathā ca parighaṭṭanā
saṅghoṭanā tatas kāryā mārga āsāritam eva ca
jyeṣṭha madhya kaniṣṭhāni tathā eva asāratāni ca
etāni tu bahis gītāni antar yavanikā gataiḥ
prayoktṛbhiḥ prayojyāni tantrī bhāṇḍa kṛtāni ca
tatas sarvaiḥ tu kutapaiḥ saṃyuktāni iha kārayet

original: vighaṭya vai yavanikāṃ nṛttapāṭhyakṛtāni tu // BhN_5.12 //
analyzed: vighaṭya vai yavanikām nṛtta pāṭhya kṛtāni tu
gītānām madraka ādīnām yojyam ekam tu gītakam
vardhamānam atha api iha tāṇḍavam yatra yujyate
tatas ca utthāpanam kāryam parivartanam eva ca

original: nāndī śuṣkāvakṛṣṭā ca raṅgadvāraṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_5.14 //
analyzed: nāndī śuṣka avakṛṣṭā ca raṅga dvāram tathā eva ca

original: cāri caiva tataḥ kāryā mahācārī tathaiva ca /
analyzed: cāri ca eva tatas kāryā mahācārī tathā eva ca

original: trikaṃ prarocanāṃ cāpi pūrvaraṅge bhavanti hi // BhN_5.15 //
analyzed: trikam prarocanām ca api pūrvaraṅge bhavanti hi
etāni aṅgāni kāryāṇi pūrvaraṅga vidhau dvijāḥ
eteṣām lakṣaṇam aham vyākhyāsyāmi anupūrvaśas

original: kutapasya tu vinyāsaḥ pratyāhāra iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kutapasya tu vinyāsaḥ pratyāhāraḥ iti smṛtaḥ
tathā avataraṇam proktam gāyikānām niveśanam
parigīta kriyā ārambhaḥ ārambhaḥ iti kīrtitaḥ
ātodya rañjana artham tu bhavet āśrāvaṇā vidhiḥ
vādya vṛtti vibhāga artham vaktrapāṇiḥ vidhīyate
tantrī ojaḥ karaṇa artham tu bhavet ca parighaṭṭanā
tathā pāṇi vibhāga artham bhavet saṃghoṭanā vidhiḥ
tantrī bhāṇḍa samāyogāt mārga āsāritam iṣyate
kalā pāta vibhāga artham bhavet āsārita kriyā
kīrtanāt devatānām ca jñeyaḥ gīta vidhiḥ tathā
atas param pravakṣyami hi utthāpana vidhi kriyām
yasmāt utthāpayanti atra prayogam nāndi pāṭhakāḥ
pūrvam eva tu raṅge smin tasmāt utthāpanam smṛtam
yasmāt ca lokapālānām parivṛtya caturdiśam
vandanāni prakurvanti tasmāt ca parivartanam
āśīrvacana saṃyuktā nityam yasmāt prayujyate
deva dvija nṛpa ādīnām tasmāt nāndī iti saṃjñitā
atra śuṣka akṣaraiḥ eva hi avakṛṣṭā dhruvā yatas
tasmāt śuṣka avakṛṣṭā iyam jarjara śloka darśi tā
yasmāt abhinayaḥ tu atra prathamam hi avatāryate
raṅga dvāram atas jñeyam vāc aṅga abhinaya ātmakam
śṛṅgārasya pracaraṇāt cārī samparikīrtitā
raudra pracaraṇāt ca api mahācārī iti kīrtitā
vidūṣakaḥ sūtradhāraḥ tathā vai pāripārśvakaḥ

original: yatra kurvanti sañjalpaṃ taccāpi trigataṃ matam // BhN_5.28 //
analyzed: yatra kurvanti sañjalpam tat ca api trigatam matam
upakṣepeṇa kāvyasya hetu yukti samāśrayā

original: siddhenāmantraṇā yā tu vijñeyā sa prarocanā // BhN_5.29 //
analyzed: siddhena āmantraṇā yā tu vijñeyā sa prarocanā
atas param pravakṣyāmi hi āśrāvaṇa vidhi kriyām
bahis gīta vidhau samyak utpattim kāraṇam tathā
citra dakṣiṇa vṛtau tu sapta rūpe pravartite
sa upohane sa nirgīte deva stuti abhinandite
nārada ādyaiḥ tu gandharvaiḥ sabhāyām deva dānavāḥ
nirgītam śrāvitāḥ samyak laya tāla samanvitam
tat śrutvā tu sukham gānam deva stuti abhinanditam
abhavan kṣubhitāḥ sarve mātsaryāt daitya rākṣasāḥ
sampradhārya ca te nyonyam iti avocan avasthitāḥ

original: nirgītaṃ tu savāditramidaṃ gṛhṇīmahe vayam // BhN_5.34 //
analyzed: nirgītam tu sa vāditram idam gṛhṇīmahe vayam
sapta rūpeṇa santuṣṭāḥ devāḥ karma anukīrtanāt

original: vayaṃ gṛhṇīma nirgītaṃ tuṣyāmo 'traiva sarvadā // BhN_5.35 //
analyzed: vayam gṛhṇīma nirgītam tuṣyāmaḥ u trā eva sarvadā

original: te tatra tuṣṭā daityāstu sādhayanti punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: te tatra tuṣṭāḥ daityāḥ tu sādhayanti punar punar

original: ruṣṭāścāpi tato devāḥ pratyabhāṣanta nāradam // BhN_5.36 //
analyzed: ruṣṭāḥ ca api tatas devāḥ pratyabhāṣanta nāradam

original: ete tuṣyanti nirgīte dānavā saha rākṣasaiḥ /
analyzed: ete tuṣyanti nirgīte dānavā saha rākṣasaiḥ

original: praṇaśyatu prayogo 'yaṃ kathaṃ vā manyate bhavān // BhN_5.37 //
analyzed: praṇaśyatu prayogaḥ yam katham vā manyate bhavān
devānām vacanam śrutvā nāradaḥ vākyam abravīt
dhātuvādi āśraya kṛtam nirgītam mā praṇaśyatu
kintu upohana saṃyuktam dhātuvādya vibhūṣitam
bhaviṣyati idam nirgītam sapta rūpa vidhānataḥ
nirgītena avabaddhāḥ ca daitya dānava rākṣasāḥ

original: na kṣobhaṃ na vighātaṃ ca kariṣyantīha toṣitāḥ // BhN_5.40 //
analyzed: na kṣobham na vighātam ca kariṣyanti iha toṣitāḥ
evam nirgītam etat tu daityānām spardhayā dvijāḥ
devānām bahu mānena bahis gītam iti smṛtam
dhātubhiḥ citravīṇāyām guru laghu akṣara anvitam
varṇa alaṅkāra saṃyuktam prayoktavyam budhaiḥ atha
nirgītam geyate yasmāt apadam varṇa yojanāt

original: asūyayā ca devānāṃ bahirgītamidaṃ smṛtam // BhN_5.43 //
analyzed: asūyayā ca devānām bahis gītam idam smṛtam
nirgītam yat mayā proktam sapta rūpa samanvitam
utthāpana ādikam yat ca tasya kāraṇam ucyate
āśrāvaṇāyām yuktāyām daityāḥ tuṣyanti nityaśas

original: vaktrapāṇau kṛte caiva nityaṃ tuṣyanti dānavāḥ // BhN_5.45 //
analyzed: vaktra pāṇau kṛte ca eva nityam tuṣyanti dānavāḥ
parighaṭṭanayā tuṣṭāḥ yuktāyām rākṣasām gaṇāḥ

original: saṅghoṭanakriyāyāṃ ca tuṣyantyapi ca guhyakāḥ // BhN_5.46 //
analyzed: saṅghoṭana kriyāyām ca tuṣyanti api ca guhyakāḥ
mārgāsāritam āsādya tuṣṭāḥ yakṣāḥ bhavanti hi
gītakeṣu prayukteṣu devāḥ tuṣyanti nityaśas
vardhamāne prayukte tu rudraḥ tuṣyati sa anugaḥ

original: tathā cotthāpane yukte brahmā tuṣṭo bhavediha // BhN_5.48 //
analyzed: tathā ca utthāpane yukte brahmā tuṣṭaḥ bhavet iha
tuṣyanti lokapālāḥ ca prayukte parivartane

original: nāndīprayoge 'tha kṛte prīto bhavati candramāḥ // BhN_5.49 //
analyzed: nāndīprayoge tha kṛte prītaḥ bhavati candramāḥ
yuktāyām avakṛṣṭāyām prītāḥ nāgāḥ bhavanti hi

original: tathā śuṣkāvakṛṣṭāyāṃ prītaḥ pitṛgaṇo bhavet // BhN_5.50 //
analyzed: tathā śuṣka avakṛṣṭāyām prītaḥ pitṛ gaṇaḥ bhavet

original: raṅgadvāre prayukte tu viṣṇuḥ prīto bhavediha /
analyzed: raṅgadvāre prayukte tu viṣṇuḥ prītaḥ bhavet iha

original: jarjarasya prayoge tu tuṣṭā vighnavināyakāḥ // BhN_5.51 //
analyzed: jarjarasya prayoge tu tuṣṭāḥ vighna vināyakāḥ
tathā ca āryā prayuktāyām umā tuṣṭā bhavet iha

original: mahācāryā prayuktāyāṃ tuṣṭo bhūtagaṇo bhavet // BhN_5.52 //
analyzed: mahā ācāryā prayuktāyām tuṣṭaḥ bhūta gaṇaḥ bhavet
āśrāvaṇa ādi cāri antam etat daivata pūjanam

original: pūrvaraṅge mayā khyātaṃ tathā cāṅgavikalpanam // BhN_5.53 //
analyzed: pūrvaraṅge mayā khyātam tathā ca aṅga vikalpanam

original: devastuṣyanti yo yena yasya yanmanasaḥ priyam /
analyzed: devaḥ tuṣyanti yaḥ yena yasya yat manasaḥ priyam

original: tattathā pūrvaraṅge tu mayā prokaṃ dvijottamāḥ // BhN_5.54 //
analyzed: tat tathā pūrvaraṅge tu mayā prokam dvijottamāḥ
sarva daivata pūjā arham sarva daivata pūjanam
dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam pūrvaraṅga pravartanam
daitya dānava tuṣṭi artham sarveṣām ca divaukasām
nirgītāni sa gītāni pūrvaraṅga kṛtāni tu

original: [yā vidyā yāni śilpāni yā gatiryaśca ceṣṭitam /
analyzed: yā vidyā yāni śilpāni yā gatiḥ yaḥ ca ceṣṭitam
lokālokasya jagataḥ tat asmin nāṭaka āśraye
nirgītānām sa gītānām vardhamānasya ca eva hi

original: dhruvāvidhāne vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇaṃ karma caiva hi // BhN_5.57 //
analyzed: dhruvā vidhāne vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam karma ca eva hi
prayujya gītaka vidhim vardhamānam atha api ca

original: gītakānte tataścāpi kāryā hyutthāpanī dhruvā // BhN_5.58 //
analyzed: gītakānte tatas ca api kāryā hi utthāpanī dhruvā

original: adau dve ca caturthaṃ cāpyaṣṭamaikādaśe tathā /
analyzed: adau dve ca caturtham ca api aṣṭama ekādaśe tathā
guru akṣarāṇi jānīyat pāde hi ekādaśe tathā

original: catuṣpadā bhavetsā tu caturaśrā tathaiva ca /
analyzed: catuṣpadā bhavet sā tu caturaśrā tathā eva ca
caturbhiḥ sannipātaiḥ ca trilayā triyatiḥ tathā
parivartāḥ ca catvāraḥ pāṇayaḥ trayaḥ eva ca

original: jātyā caiva hi viślokā tāṃ ca tālena yojayet // BhN_5.61 //
analyzed: jātyā ca eva hi viślokā tām ca tālena yojayet

original: śamyā tu dvikalā kāryā talo dvikala eva ca /
analyzed: śamyā tu dvi kalā kāryā talaḥ dvi kalaḥ eva ca
punar ca eka kalā śamyā sannipātaḥ kalā trayam
evam aṣṭa kalaḥ kāryaḥ sannipātaḥ

original: catvāraḥ sannipātāśca parivartaḥ sa ucyate // BhN_5.63 //
analyzed: catvāraḥ sannipātāḥ ca parivartaḥ saḥ ucyate
pūrvam sthita layaḥ kāryaḥ parivartaḥ vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: tṛtīye sannipāte tu tasyā bhāṇḍagraho bhavet // BhN_5.64 //
analyzed: tṛtīye sannipāte tu tasyāḥ bhāṇḍagrahaḥ bhavet
ekasmin parivarte tu gate prāpte dvitīyake
kāryam madhyalaye tad jñaiḥ sūtradhāra praveśanam
puṣpa añjalim samādāya rakṣā maṅgala saṃskṛtāḥ
śuddha vastrāḥ sumanasaḥ tathā ca adbhuta dṛṣṭayaḥ
sthānam tu vaiṣṇavam kṛtvā sauṣṭhava aṅga puraskṛtam

original: dīkṣitāḥ śucayaścaiva praviśeyuḥ samaṃ trayaḥ // BhN_5.67 //
analyzed: dīkṣitāḥ śucayaḥ ca eva praviśeyuḥ samam trayaḥ
bhṛṅgāra jarjara dharau bhavetām pāripārśvikau

original: madhye tu sūtrabhṛttābhyāṃ vṛttaḥ pañcapadīṃ vrajet // BhN_5.68 //
analyzed: madhye tu sūtra bhṛt tābhyām vṛttaḥ pañcapadīm vrajet
padāni pañca gaccheyuḥ brahmaṇaḥ yajana icchayā
padānām ca api vikṣepam vyākhyāsyāmi anupūrvaśas
tri tāla antara viṣkambham utkṣipet caraṇam śanais
pārśva utthāna utthitam ca eva tad madhye pātayet punar
evam pañcapadīm gatvā sūtradhāraḥ saha itaraḥ

original: sūcīṃ vāmapade dadyādvikṣepaṃ dakṣiṇena ca // BhN_5.71 //
analyzed: sūcīm vāma pade dadyāt vikṣepam dakṣiṇena ca
puṣpa añjali apavargaḥ ca kāryaḥ brāhme maṇḍale

original: raṅgapīṭhasya madhye tu svayaṃ brahmā pratiṣṭhitaḥ // BhN_5.72 //
analyzed: raṅgapīṭhasya madhye tu svayam brahmā pratiṣṭhitaḥ
tatas sa lalitaiḥ hastaiḥ abhivandya pitāmaham

original: abhivādāni kāryāṇi trīṇi hastena bhūtale // BhN_5.73 //
analyzed: abhivādāni kāryāṇi trīṇi hastena bhū tale
kāla prakarṣa hetoḥ ca pādānām pravibhāgataḥ
dvitīyaḥ parivartaḥ tu kāryaḥ madhya laya āśritaḥ

original: tataḥ paraṃ tṛtīye tu maṇḍalasya pradakṣiṇam // BhN_5.75 //
analyzed: tatas param tṛtīye tu maṇḍalasya pradakṣiṇam
bhavet ācamanam ca eva jarjara grahaṇam tathā
utthāya maṇḍalāt tūrṇam dakṣiṇam pādam uddharet

original: vedhaṃ tenaiva kurvīta vikṣepaṃ vāmakena ca /
analyzed: vedham tena eva kurvīta vikṣepam vāmakena ca

original: punaśca dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ pārśvasaṃsthaṃ samuddharet // BhN_5.77 //
analyzed: punar ca dakṣiṇam pādam pārśva saṃstham samuddharet
tatas ca vāma vedhaḥ tu vikṣepaḥ dakṣiṇasya ca
iti anena vidhānena samyak kṛtvā pradikṣaṇam
bhṛṅgāra bhṛtam āhūya śaucam ca api samācaret

original: yathānyāyaṃ tu kartavyā tena hyācamanakriyā // BhN_5.79 //
analyzed: yathānyāyam tu kartavyā tena hi ācamana kriyā
ātma prokṣaṇam eva adbhiḥ kartavyam tu yathākramam
prayatna kṛta śaucena sūtradhāreṇa yatnataḥ
sannipāta samam grāhyaḥ jarjaraḥ vighna jarjaraḥ
pradakṣiṇa ādyaḥ vijñeyaḥ jarjara grahaṇa antakaḥ

original: tṛtīyaḥ parivartastu vijñeyo vai drute laye /
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ parivartaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ vai drute laye

original: gṛhītvā jarjaraṃ tvaṣṭau kalā japyaṃ prayojayet // BhN_5.82 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā jarjaram tu aṣṭau kalāḥ japyam prayojayet
vāma vedham tatas kuryāt vikṣepam dakṣiṇasya ca

original: tataḥ pañcapadīṃ caiva gacchettu kutaponmukhaḥ // BhN_5.83 //
analyzed: tatas pañcapadīm ca eva gacchet tu kutapa unmukhaḥ
vāma vedhaḥ tu tatra api vikṣepaḥ dakṣiṇasya tu
jarjara grahaṇa ādyaḥ yam kutapa abhimukha antakaḥ
caturthaḥ parivartaḥ tu kāryaḥ druta laye punar
kara pāda nipātāḥ tu bhavnti atra tu ṣoḍaśa
tri aśre dvādaśa pātāḥ tu bhavanti kara pādayoḥ

original: vandanānyatha kāryāṇi trīṇi hastena bhūtale // BhN_5.86 //
analyzed: vandanāni atha kāryāṇi trīṇi hastena bhū tale
ātma prokṣaṇam adbhiḥ ca tri aśre na eva vidhīyate
evam utthāpanam kāryam tatas tu parivartanam
caturaśram laye madhye sannipātaiḥ atha aṣṭabhiḥ

original: yasyā laghūni sarvāṇi kevalaṃ naidhanaṃ guru // BhN_5.88 //
analyzed: yasyāḥ laghūni sarvāṇi kevalam naidhanam guru
bhavet atijagatyām tu sā dhruvā parivartanī

original: vārtikena tu mārgeṇa vādyenānugatena ca // BhN_5.89 //
analyzed: vārtikena tu mārgeṇa vādyena anugatena ca
lalitaiḥ pāda vinyāsaiḥ vandyāḥ devāḥ yathādiśam

original: dvikalaṃ pādapatanaṃ pādacāryā gataṃ bhavet // BhN_5.90 //
analyzed: dvi kalam pāda patanam pādacāryāḥ gatam bhavet
vāma pādena vedhaḥ tu kartavyaḥ nṛtta yoktṛbhiḥ
dvi tāla antara viṣkambhaḥ vikṣepaḥ dakṣiṇasya ca
tatas pañcapadīm gacchet atikrāntaiḥ padaratha
tatas bhivādanam kuryāt devatānām yathādiśam
vandeta prathamam pūrvām diśam śakra adhidaivatām
dvitīyām dakṣiṇām āśām vandeta yama devatām
vandeta paścimām āśām tatas varuṇa daivatām
caturthīm uttarām āśām vandeta dhanada āśrayām

original: diśāṃ tu vandanaṃ kṛtvā vāmavedhaṃ prayojayet /
analyzed: diśām tu vandanam kṛtvā vāmavedham prayojayet
dakṣiṇena ca kartavyam vikṣepa parivartanam
prāc mukhaḥ tu tatas kuryāt puruṣa strī napuṃsakaiḥ
tripadyā sūtrabhṛt rudra brahma upendra abhivādanam

original: dakṣiṇaṃ tu padaṃ puṃso vāmaṃ strīṇāṃ prakīrtitam /
analyzed: dakṣiṇam tu padam puṃsaḥ vāmam strīṇām prakīrtitam
punar dakṣiṇam eva syāt na ati utkṣiptam napuṃsakam
vandeta pauruṣeṇa īśam strī padena janārdanam
napuṃsakpadena api tathā eva ambuja sambhavam
parivartanam evam syāt tasya ante praviśet tatas
caturthakāraḥ puṣpāṇi pragṛhya vidhi pūrvakam
yathāvat tena kartavyam pūjanam jarjarasya tu

original: kutapasya ca sarvasya sūtradhārasya caiva hi // BhN_5.100 //
analyzed: kutapasya ca sarvasya sūtradhārasya ca eva hi
tasya bhāṇḍa samaḥ kāryaḥ tad jñaiḥ gati parikramaḥ

original: na tatra gānaṃ kartavyaṃ tatra stobhakriyā bhavet // BhN_5.101 //
analyzed: na tatra gānam kartavyam tatra stobha kriyā bhavet

original: caturthakāraḥ pūjāṃ tu sa kṛtvāntarhito bhavet /
analyzed: caturtha kāraḥ pūjām tu sa kṛtvā antarhitaḥ bhavet

original: tato geyāvakṛṣṭā tu caturaśrā sthitā dhruvā // BhN_5.102 //
analyzed: tatas geyā avakṛṣṭā tu caturaśrā sthitā dhruvā

original: guruprāyā tu sā kāryā tathā caivāvapāṇikā /
analyzed: guru prāyā tu sā kāryā tathā ca eva avapāṇikā
sthāyi varṇa āśraya upetā kalā aṣṭaka vinirmitā
caturtham pañcamam ca eva saptamam ca aṣṭamam tathā

original: laghūni pāde paṅktyāntu sāvakṛṣṭā dhruvā smṛtā] // BhN_5.103* //
analyzed: laghūni pāde paṅktyān tu sā avakṛṣṭā dhruvā smṛtā
sūtradhāraḥ paṭhet tatra madhyamam svaram āśritaḥ
nāndīm padaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ vā api alaṅkṛtām
namaḥ stu sarva devebhyaḥ dvijātibhyaḥ śubham tathā

original: jitaṃ somena vai rājñā śivaṃ gobrāhmaṇāya ca // BhN_5.105 //
analyzed: jitam somena vai rājñā śivam go brāhmaṇāya ca
brahma uttaram tathā eva astu hatāḥ brahma dviṣaḥ tathā

original: praśāstvimāṃ mahārājaḥ pṛthivīṃ ca sasāgarām // BhN_5.106 //
analyzed: praśāstu imām mahā rājaḥ pṛthivīm ca sa sāgarām
rāṣṭram pravardhatām ca eva raṅgasya āśā samṛddhyatu
prekṣā kartuḥ mahān dharmaḥ bhavatu brahma bhāṣitaḥ
kāvya kartuḥ yaśaḥ ca astu dharmaḥ ca api pravardhatām

original: ijyayā cānayā nityaṃ prīyantāṃ devatā iti // BhN_5.108 //
analyzed: ijyayā ca anayā nityam prīyantām devatāḥ iti
nāndī pada antareṣu eṣu hi evam ārya iti nityaśas
vadetām samyak uktābhiḥ vāgbhiḥ tau pāripārśvikau
evam nāndī vidhātavyā yathāvat lakṣaṇa anvitā
tatas śuṣka avakṛṣṭā syāt jarjara śloka darśikā
navam guru ākṣarāṇi ādau ṣaṣ laghūni guru trayam

original: śuṣkāvakṛṣṭā tu bhavetkalā hyaṣṭau pramāṇataḥ // BhN_5.111 //
analyzed: śuṣka avakṛṣṭā tu bhavet kalā hi aṣṭau pramāṇataḥ
yathā

original: digle digle digle digle jambukapalitakate tecām /
analyzed: digle digle digle digle jambuka palitaka te
kṛtvā śuṣka avakṛṣṭām tu yathāvat dvijasattamāḥ
tatas ślokam paṭhet ekam gambhīra svara saṃyutam

original: devastotraṃ puraskṛtya yasya pūjā pravartate // BhN_5.113 //
analyzed: deva stotram puraskṛtya yasya pūjā pravartate

original: rājño vā yatra bhaktiḥ syādatha vā brahmaṇasstavam /
analyzed: rājñaḥ vā yatra bhaktiḥ syāt atha vā brahmaṇaḥ stavam

original: gaditvā jarjaraślokaṃ raṅgadvāre ca yatsmṛtam // BhN_5.114 //
analyzed: gaditvā jarjara ślokam raṅga dvāre ca yat smṛtam
paṭhet anyam punar ślokam jarjarasya vināśanam

original: jarjaraṃ namayitvā tu tataścārīṃ prayojayet // BhN_5.115 //
analyzed: jarjaram namayitvā tu tatas cārīm prayojayet
pāripārśvikayoḥ ca syāt paścimena apasarpaṇam

original: aṅkitā cātra kartavyā dhruvā madhyalayānvitā // BhN_5.116 //
analyzed: aṅkitā ca atra kartavyā dhruvā madhya laya anvitā
caturbhiḥ sannipātaiḥ ca caturaśrā pramāṇataḥ

original: ādyamantyaṃ caturthaṃ ca pañcamaṃ ca tathā guru // BhN_5.117 //
analyzed: ādyam antyam caturtham ca pañcamam ca tathā guru

original: yasyāṃ hrasvāni śeṣāṇi sā jñeyā tvaṅkitā budhaiḥ /
analyzed: yasyām hrasvāni śeṣāṇi sā jñeyā tu aṅkitā budhaiḥ

original: asyāḥ prayogaṃ vakṣyāmi yathā pūrvaṃ maheśvaraḥ // BhN_5.118 //
analyzed: asyāḥ prayogam vakṣyāmi yathā pūrvam maheśvaraḥ
saha umayā

original: kṛtvā'vahitthaṃ sthānaṃ tu vāmaṃ cādhomukhaṃ bhujam // BhN_5.119 //
analyzed: kṛtvā avahittham sthānam tu vāmam ca adhomukham bhujam
caturaśram uraḥ kāryam añcitaḥ ca api mastakaḥ

original: nābhipradeśe vinyasya jarjaraṃ ca tulādhṛtam // BhN_5.120 //
analyzed: nābhi pradeśe vinyasya jarjaram ca tulā dhṛtam
vāma pallava hastena pādaiḥ tāla antara utthitaiḥ
gacchet pañcapadīm ca eva sa vilāsa aṅga ceṣṭitaiḥ
vāma vedhaḥ tu kartavyaḥ vikṣepaḥ dakṣiṇasya ca
śṛṅgāra rasa saṃyuktām paṭhet āryām vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: cārīślokaṃ gaditvā tu kṛtvā ca parivartanam /
analyzed: cārī ślokam gaditvā tu kṛtvā ca parivartanam

original: taireva ca padaḥ kāryaṃ paścimenāpasarpaṇam // BhN_5.123 //
analyzed: taiḥ eva ca padaḥ kāryam paścimena apasarpaṇam
pāripārśvika haste tu nyasya jarjaram uttamam
mahācārīm tatas ca eva prayuñjīta yathāvidhi
caturaśrā dhruvā tatra tathā druta laya anvitā
caturbhiḥ sannipātaiḥ ca kalāḥ hi aṣṭau pramāṇataḥ

original: ādyaṃ caturthamantyaṃ ca saptamaṃ daśamaṃ guru /
analyzed: ādyam caturtham antyam ca saptamam daśamam guru

original: laghu śeṣaṃ dhruvāpāde caturviṃśatike bhavet // BhN_5.126 //
analyzed: laghu śeṣam dhruvā pāde caturviṃśatike bhavet
yathā
pāda tala āhati pātita śailam kṣobhita bhūta samagra samudram

original: tāṇḍavanṛtyamidaṃ pralayānte pātu jagatsukhadāyi harasya // BhN_5.127 //
analyzed: tāṇḍava nṛtyam idam pralaya ante pātu jagat sukha dāyi harasya
bhāṇḍa unmukhena kartavyam pāda vikṣepaṇam tatas
sūcīm kṛtvā punar kuryāt vikṣepa parivartanam
atikrāntaiḥ sa lalitaiḥ pādaiḥ druta laya anvitaiḥ
tri tāla antaram utkṣepaiḥ gacchet pañcapadīm tatas
tatra api vāma vedhaḥ tu vikṣepaḥ dakṣiṇasya ca

original: taireva ca padaiḥ kāryaṃ prāṅmukhenāpasarpaṇam // BhN_5.130 //
analyzed: taiḥ eva ca padaiḥ kāryam prāc mukhena apasarpaṇam

original: punaḥ padāni trīṇyeva gacchetprāṅmukha eva tu /
analyzed: punar padāni trīṇi eva gacchet prāc mukhaḥ eva tu

original: tataśca vāmavedhaḥ syādvikṣepo dakṣiṇasya ca // BhN_5.131 //
analyzed: tatas ca vāma vedhaḥ syāt vikṣepaḥ dakṣiṇasya ca
tatas raudra rasam ślokam pāda saṃharaṇam paṭhet
tasya ante tu tripadyā atha vyāharet pāripārśvikau
tayoḥ āgamane kāryam gānam narkuṭakam budhaiḥ

original: tathā ca bhāratībhede trigataṃ samprayojayet // BhN_5.133 //
analyzed: tathā ca bhāratī bhede trigatam samprayojayet
vidūṣakaḥ tu ekapadām sutradhāra smitāvahām
asambaddha kathā prāyām kuryāt kathanikā tatas
vitaṇḍām gaṇḍa saṃyuktām tālikām ca prayojayet
kaḥ tiṣṭhati jitam kena iti ādi kāvya prarūpiṇīm
pāripārśvaka sañjalpaḥ vidūṣaka virūpitaḥ
sthāpitaḥ sūtradhāreṇa trigatam samprayujyate
prarocanā ca kartavyā siddhena upanimatraṇam
raṅga siddhau punar kāryam kāvya vastu nirūpaṇam
sarvam eva vidhim kṛtvā sūcīvedha kṛtaiḥ atha
pādaiḥ anāviddha gataiḥ niṣkrāmeyuḥ samam trayaḥ
evam eṣa prayoktavyaḥ pūrvaraṅgaḥ yathāvidhi
catur aśraḥ dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ tri aśram ca api nibodhata
ayam eva prayogaḥ syāt aṅgāni etāni ca eva hi

original: tālapramāṇaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ kevalaṃ tu viśeṣakṛt // BhN_5.138 //
analyzed: tāla pramāṇam saṃkṣiptam kevalam tu viśeṣa kṛt

original: śamyā tu dvikalā kāryā tālo hyekakalastathā /
analyzed: śamyā tu dvi kalā kāryā tālaḥ hi eka kalaḥ tathā
punar ca eka kalā śamyā sannipātaḥ kalā dvayam
anena hi pramāṇena kalā tāla laya anvitaḥ
kartavyaḥ pūrvaraṅgaḥ tu pi utthāpana ādikaḥ
ādyam caturtham daśamam aṣṭamam naidhanam guru

original: yasyāstu jāgate pāde sā tryaśrotthāpinī dhruvā // BhN_5.141 //
analyzed: yasyāḥ tu jāgate pāde sā tri aśra utthāpinī dhruvā
vādyam gati pracāraḥ ca dhruvā tālaḥ tathā eva ca
saṃkṣiptāni eva kāryāṇi tri aśre nṛtta pravedibhiḥ
vādya gīta pramāṇena kuryāt aṅga viceṣṭitam
vistīrṇam atha saṃkṣiptam dvi pramāṇa vinirmitam
hasta pāda pracāraḥ tu dvi kalaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: caturaśre parikrānte pātāḥ syuḥ ṣoḍaśaiva tu // BhN_5.144 //
analyzed: caturaśre parikrānte pātāḥ syuḥ ṣoḍaśa eva tu
tri aśre dvādaśa pātāḥ tu bhavanti kara pādayoḥ
etat pramāṇam vijñeyam ubhayoḥ pūrvaraṅgayoḥ

original: kevalaṃ parivarte tu gamane tripadī bhavet /
analyzed: kevalam parivarte tu gamane tripadī bhavet
digvandane pañcapadī caturaśre vidhīyate
ācārya buddhyā kartavyaḥ tri aśraḥ tāla pramāṇataḥ

original: tasmānna lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ punaruktaṃ bhavedyataḥ // BhN_5.147 //
analyzed: tasmāt na lakṣaṇam proktam punar uktam bhavet yatas
evam eṣa prayoktavyaḥ pūrvaraṅgaḥ dvijottamāḥ
tri aśraḥ ca catur aśraḥ ca śuddhaḥ bhāratī upāśrayaḥ
evam tāvat ayam śuddhaḥ pūrvaraṅgaḥ mayā uditaḥ
citra tvam asya vakṣyāmi yathākāryam prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: vṛtte hyutthāpane viprāḥ kṛte ca parivartane /
analyzed: vṛtte hi utthāpane viprāḥ kṛte ca parivartane
caturtha kāra dattābhiḥ sumanobhiḥ alaṅkṛte
udāttaiḥ gānaiḥ gandharvaiḥ parigīte pramāṇataḥ
deva dundubhayaḥ ca eva ninadaiyuḥ bhṛśam yatas
siddhāḥ kusuma mālābhiḥ vikireyuḥ samantataḥ
aṅgahāraiḥ ca devyaḥ tāḥ upanṛtyeyuḥ agratas
yaḥ tāṇḍava vidhiḥ proktaḥ piṇḍī samanvitaḥ
recakaiḥ aṅgahāraiḥ ca nyāsa upanyāsa saṃyutaḥ
nāndī padānām madhye tu ekaikasmin pṛthak pṛthak
prayoktavyaḥ budhaiḥ samyak citra bhāvam abhīpsubhiḥ

original: evaṃ kṛtvā yathānyāyaṃ śuddhaṃ citraṃ prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: evam kṛtvā yathānyāyam śuddham citram prayatnataḥ
tatas param prayuñjīta nāṭakam lakṣaṇa anvitam
tatas tu antarhitāḥ sarvāḥ bhaveyuḥ divya yoṣitaḥ

original: niṣkrāntāsu ca sarvāsu nartakīṣu tataḥ param // BhN_5.156 //
analyzed: niṣkrāntāsu ca sarvāsu nartakīṣu tatas param
pūrvaraṅge prayoktavyam aṅga jātam atas param

original: evaṃ śuddho bhaveccitraḥ pūrvaraṅgo vidhānataḥ // BhN_5.157 //
analyzed: evam śuddhaḥ bhavet citraḥ pūrvaraṅgaḥ vidhānataḥ
kāryaḥ na ati prasaṅgaḥ nṛtā gīta vidhim prati

original: gīte vādye ca nṛtte ca pravṛtte 'tiprasaṅgataḥ // BhN_5.158 //
analyzed: gīte vādye ca nṛtte ca pravṛtte tiprasaṅgataḥ
khedaḥ bhavet prayoktṝṇām prekṣakāṇām tathā eva ca
khinnānām rasa bhāveṣu spaṣṭa tā na upajāyate
tatas śeṣa prayogaḥ tu na rāga janakaḥ bhavet
lakṣanena vinā bāhya lakṣaṇāt vistṛtam bhavet
loka śāstra anusāreṇa tasmāt nāṭyam pravartate

original: tryaśraṃ vā caturaśraṃ vā śuddhaṃ citramathāpi vā // BhN_5.160 //
analyzed: tri aśram vā catur aśram vā śuddham citram atha api vā
prayujya raṅgāt niṣkrāmet sūtradhārḥ sahānugaḥ
deva pārthiva raṅgānām āśīrvacana saṃyutām
kaveḥ nāma guṇa upetām vastu upakṣepa rūpikām
laghu varṇa pada upetām vṛttaiḥ citraiḥ alaṅkṛtām
antar yavanikā saṃsthaḥ kuryāt āśrāvaṇām tatas

original: āśrāvanāvasāne ca nāndīṃ kṛtvā sa sūtradhṛt /
analyzed: āśrāvana avasāne ca nāndīm kṛtvā sa sūtradhṛt

original: punaḥ praviśya raṅgaṃ tu kuryātprastāvanāṃ tataḥ) // BhN_5.161*3 //
analyzed: punar praviśya raṅgam tu kuryāt prastāvanām tatas

original: prayujya vidhinaivaṃ tu pūrvara~gaṃ prayogataḥ // BhN_5.161 //
analyzed: prayujya vidhinā evam tu pūrva ragam prayogataḥ
sthāpakaḥ praviśet tatra sūtradhāra guṇa ākṛtiḥ

original: sthānaṃ tu vaiṣṇavaṃ kṛtvā sauṣṭhavāñgapuraskṛtam // BhN_5.162 //
analyzed: sthānam tu vaiṣṇavam kṛtvā sauṣṭhava añga puraskṛtam
praviśya raṅgam taiḥ eva sūtradhāra padaiḥ vrajet

original: śthāpakṣya praveśe tu kartavya'rthānugā dhruvā // BhN_5.163 //
analyzed: praveśe tu kartavī artha anugā dhruvā
tri aśrā vā catur aśrā vā tajjñaiḥ madhya laya anvitā
kuryāt anantaram cārīm devarahmaṇaśaṃsinīm
su vākya madhuraiḥ

original: prasādya raṅgaṃ vidhivatkavernāma ca kīrtayet // BhN_5.165 //
analyzed: prasādya raṅgam vidhivat kaveḥ nāma ca kīrtayet
tatas kuryāt kāvya prakhyāpana āśrayām
uddhātyaka ādi kartavyam kāvya upakṣepaṇa āśryam
divye divya āśrayaḥ bhūtvā mānuṣe mānuṣa āśrayaḥ

original: divyamānuṣasaṃyoge divyo vā mānuṣo 'pi vā // BhN_5.167 //
analyzed: divya mānuṣa saṃyoge divyaḥ vā mānuṣaḥ vā
mukha bīja anu sadṝśam nānā mārga samāśrayam
āāvidhaiḥ upakṣepaiḥ kāvya upakṣepaṇam bhavet
prastāvya evam tu niṣkrāmet kāvya prastāvakaḥ tatas
evam eṣa prayoktavyaḥ pūrvaraṅgaḥ yathāvidhi

original: ya imaṃ pūrvaraṅgaṃ tu vidhinaiva prayojayet /
analyzed: yaḥ imam pūrvaraṅgam tu vidhinā eva prayojayet
na aśubham prāpnuyāt kiñcid svarga lokam ca gacchati
yaḥ ca api vidhim utsṛjya yathā iṣṭam samprayojayet

original: prāpnotyapacayaṃ ghoraṃ tiryaggyoniṃ ca gacchati // BhN_5.171 //
analyzed: prāpnoti apacayam ghoram tiryaggyonim ca gacchati
na tathā agniḥ pradahati prabhañjana samīrataḥ

original: yathā hyaprayogastu prayukto dahati kṣaṇāt // BhN_5.172 //
analyzed: yathā hi aprayogaḥ tu prayuktaḥ dahati kṣaṇāt
iti eva avanti pāñcāla dākṣiṇātya auḍhra māgadhaiḥ
pūrvaraṅgaḥ tu dvi pramāṇa vinirmitaḥ

original: eṣa vaḥ kathito viprāḥ pūrvaraṅgāśrito vidhiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ kathitaḥ viprāḥ pūrvaraṅga āśritaḥ vidhiḥ

original: bhūyaḥ kiṃ kathyatāṃ samyaṅnāṭyavedavidhiṃ prati // BhN_5.174 //
analyzed: bhūyas kim kathyatām samyak nāṭya veda vidhim prati

original: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre pūrvaraṅgaprayogo nāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre pūrvaraṅgaprayogaḥ nāma pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pūrvaraṅga vidhim śrutvā punar āhuḥ mahattamāḥ

original: bharataṃ munayaḥ sarve praśnānpañcābhidhatsva naḥ // BhN_6.1 //
analyzed: bharatam munayaḥ sarve praśnān pañca abhidhatsva naḥ

original: ye rasā iti paṭhyante nāṭye nāṭyavicakṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: ye rasāḥ iti paṭhyante nāṭye nāṭya vicakṣaṇaiḥ
rasa tvam kena vai teṣām etat ākhyātum arhasi

original: bhāvāścaiva kathaṃ proktāḥ kiṃ vā te bhāvayantyapi /
analyzed: bhāvāḥ ca eva katham proktāḥ kim vā te bhāvayanti api

original: saṃgrahaṃ kārikāṃ caiva niruktaṃ caiva tatvataḥ // BhN_6.3 //
analyzed: saṃgraham kārikām ca eva niruktam ca eva tatvataḥ

original: teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā munīnāṃ bharato muniḥ /
analyzed: teṣām tu vacanam śrutvā munīnām bharataḥ muniḥ
pratyuvāca punar vākyam rasa bhāva vikalpanam
aham vaḥ kathayiṣyāmi nikhilena tapodhanāḥ

original: saṃgrahaṃ kārikāṃ caiva niruktaṃ ca yathākramam // BhN_6.5 //
analyzed: saṃgraham kārikām ca eva niruktam ca yathākramam
na śakyam asya nāṭyasya gantum antam kathañcana
kasmāt bahu tvāt jñānānām śilpānām vā api anantataḥ

original: ekasyāpi na vai śakyastvanto jñānārṇavasya hi /
analyzed: ekasya api na vai śakyaḥ tu antaḥ jñāna arṇavasya hi
gantum kim punar anyeṣām jñānānām artha tattvataḥ
kintu alpa sūtra grantha artham anumāna prasādhakam
nāṭyasya asya pravakṣyāmi rasa bhāva ādi saṅgraham
vistareṇa upadiṣṭānām arthānām sūtra bhāṣyayoḥ

original: nibandho yo samāsena saṅgrahaṃ taṃ vidurbudhāḥ // BhN_6.9 //
analyzed: nibandhaḥ samāsena saṅgraham tam viduḥ budhāḥ
rasāḥ bhāvāḥ hi abhinayāḥ dharmī vṛtti pravṛttayaḥ

original: siddhiḥ svarāstathātodyaṃ gānaṃ raṅgaśca saṅgrahaḥ // BhN_6.10 //
analyzed: siddhiḥ svarāḥ tathā ātodyam gānam raṅgaḥ ca saṅgrahaḥ
alpa abhidhānena arthaḥ yaḥ samāsena ucyate budhaiḥ
sūtrataḥ sā anumatavyā kārikā artha pradarśinī
nānā nāma āśraya utpannam nighaṇṭu nigama anvitam
dhātvartha hetu saṃyuktam nānā siddhānta sādhitam
sthāpitaḥ rthaḥ bhavet yatra samāsena artha a sūcakaḥ
dhātvartha vacanena iha niruktam tat pracakṣate

original: saṅgraho yo mayā proktaḥ samāsena dvijottamāḥ /
analyzed: saṅgrahaḥ yaḥ mayā proktaḥ samāsena dvijottamāḥ

original: vistaraṃ tasya vakṣyāmi saniruktaṃ sakārikam // BhN_6.14 //
analyzed: vistaram tasya vakṣyāmi sa niruktam sa kārikam
śṛṅgāra hāsya karuṇāḥ raudra vīra bhayānakāḥ

original: bībhatsādbhutasaṃjñau cetyaṣṭau nāṭye rasāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_6.15 //
analyzed: bībhatsa adbhuta saṃjñau ca iti aṣṭau nāṭye rasāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ete hyaṣṭau rasāḥ proktā druhinena mahātmanā /
analyzed: ete hi aṣṭau rasāḥ proktāḥ druhinena mahātmanā
punar ca bhāvān vakṣyāmi sthāyi sañcāri sattva jān
rati hāsaḥ ca śokaḥ ca krodha utsāhau bhayam tathā
jugupsā vismayaḥ ca iti sthāyibhāvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
nirveda glāni śaṅkā ākhyāḥ tathā asūyā madaḥ śramaḥ

original: ālasyaṃ caiva dainyaṃ ca cintāmohaḥ smṛtirdhṛtiḥ // BhN_6.18 //
analyzed: ālasyam ca eva dainyam ca cintā mohaḥ smṛtiḥ dhṛtiḥ

original: vrīḍā capalatā harṣa āvego jaḍatā tathā /
analyzed: vrīḍā capala tā harṣaḥ āvegaḥ jaḍa tā tathā

original: garvo viṣāda autsukyaṃ nidrāpasmāra eva ca // BhN_6.19 //
analyzed: garvaḥ viṣādaḥ autsukyam nidrā apasmāraḥ eva ca
suptam vibodhaḥ marṣaḥ ca api avahittham atha ugra tā
matiḥ vyādhiḥ tathā unmādaḥ tathā maraṇam eva ca
trāsaḥ ca eva vitarkaḥ ca vijñeyāḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ
trayastriṃśat amī bhāvāḥ samākhyātāḥ tu nāmataḥ
stambhaḥ svedaḥ tha romāñcaḥ svarabhedaḥ tha vepathuḥ

original: vaivarṇyamaśru pralaya ityaṣṭau sātvikāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_6.22 //
analyzed: vaivarṇyam aśru pralayaḥ iti aṣṭau sātvikāḥ smṛtāḥ
āṅgikau vācikaḥ ca eva hi āhāryaḥ sātvikaḥ tathā
catvāraḥ bhinayāḥ hi ete vijñeyāḥ nāṭya saṃśrayāḥ
loka dharmī nāṭya dharmī dharmī iti dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: bhāratī sātvatī caiva kaiśikyārabhaṭī tathā // BhN_6.24 //
analyzed: bhāratī sātvatī ca eva kaiśikī ārabhaṭī tathā

original: catasro vṛttayo hyetā yāsu nāṭyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: catasraḥ vṛttayaḥ hi etāḥ yāsu nāṭyam pratiṣṭhitam

original: āvantī dākṣiṇātyā ca tathā caivoḍhramāgadhī // BhN_6.25 //
analyzed: āvantī dākṣiṇātyā ca tathā
pāñcāla madhyamā ca iti vijñeyāḥ tu pravṛttayaḥ

original: daivikī mānuṣī caiva siddhiḥ syāddvividhaiva tu // BhN_6.26 //
analyzed: daivikī mānuṣī ca eva siddhiḥ syāt dvividhā eva tu
śārīrāḥ ca eva vaiṇāḥ ca sapta ṣaḍja ādayaḥ svarāḥ
niṣāda ṛṣabha gāndhāra madhya pañcama dhaivatāḥ

original: tataṃ caivāvanaddhaṃ ca ghanaṃ suṣirameva ca // BhN_6.27 //
analyzed: tatam ca eva avanaddham ca ghanam suṣiram eva ca
caturvidham ca vijñeyam ātodyam lakṣaṇa anvitam

original: tataṃ tantrīgataṃ jñeyamavanaddhaṃ tu pauṣkaram // BhN_6.28 //
analyzed: tatam tantrī gatam jñeyam avanaddham tu pauṣkaram

original: ghanastu tālo vijñeyaḥ suṣiro vaṃśa eva ca /
analyzed: ghanaḥ tu tālaḥ vijñeyaḥ suṣiraḥ vaṃśaḥ eva ca
praveśa ākṣepa niṣkrāma prāsādikam atha antaram
gānam pañcavidham jñeyam dhruvā yoga samanvitam
catur asraḥ vikṛṣṭaḥ ca raṅgaḥ tri aśraḥ ca kīrtitaḥ
evam eṣaḥ lpa sūtra arthaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ nāṭya saṃgrahaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi sūtra grantha vikalpanam
tatra rasān eva tāvat ādau abhivyākhyāsyāmaḥ
na hi rasāt ṛte kaścid arthaḥ pravartate
tatra vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāri saṃyogāt rasa niṣpattiḥ
kaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
atra āha yathā hi nānā vyañjana oṣadhi dravya saṃyogāt rasa niṣpattiḥ tathā nānā bhāva upagamāt rasa niṣpattiḥ

original: yathā hi guḍādibhirdravyairvyañjanairauṣadhibhiśca ṣāḍavādayo rasā nirvartyante tathā nānābhāvopagatā api sthāyino bhāvā rasatvamāpnuvantīti
analyzed: yathā hi guḍa ādibhiḥ dravyaiḥ vyañjanaiḥ auṣadhibhiḥ ca ṣāḍava ādayaḥ rasāḥ nirvartyante tathā nānā bhāva upagatāḥ api sthāyinaḥ bhāvāḥ rasa tvam āpnuvanti iti
atra āha rasaḥ iti kaḥ padārthaḥ

original: yathā hi nānāvyañjanasaṃskṛtamannaṃ bhuñjāna rasānāsvādayanti sumanasaḥ puruṣa harṣādīṃścādhigacchanti
analyzed: yathā hi nānā vyañjana saṃskṛtam annam bhuñjāna rasān āsvādayanti sumanasaḥ harṣa ādīn ca adhigacchanti

original: tathā nānābhāvābhinayavyañjitān vāgaṅgasattopetān sthāyibhāvānāsvādayanti sumanasaḥ prekṣakāḥ

harṣa ādīn ca adhigacchanti
tasmāt nāṭya rasāḥ iti abhivyākhyātāḥ
atra anuvaṃśyau ślokau bhavataḥ
yathā bahu dravya yutaiḥ vyañjanaiḥ bahubhiḥ yutam

original: āsvādayanti bhuñjānā bhaktaṃ bhaktavido janāḥ // BhN_6.32 //
analyzed: āsvādayanti bhuñjānāḥ bhaktam bhakta vidaḥ janāḥ
bhāva abhinaya saṃbaddhān sthāyi bhāvān tathā budhāḥ

kim rasebhyaḥ bhāvānām abhinirvṛttiḥ uta aho bhāvebhyaḥ rasānām iti

original: dṛśyate hi bhāvebhyo rasānāmabhinirvṛttirna tu rasebhyo bhāvānāmabhinirvṛttiriti /
analyzed: dṛśyate hi bhāvebhyaḥ rasānām abhinirvṛttiḥ na tu rasebhyaḥ bhāvānām abhinirvṛttiḥ iti

nānā abhinaya sambaddhān bhāvayanti

nānā dravyaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ vyañjanam bhāvyate yathā

original: evaṃ bhāvā bhāvayanti rasānabhinayaiḥ saha // BhN_6.35 //
analyzed: evam bhāvāḥ bhāvayanti rasa anabhinayaiḥ saha

original: na bhāvahīno 'sti raso na bhāvo rasavarjitaḥ /

paraspara kṛtā siddhiḥ tayoḥ abhinaye bhavet

original: evaṃ bhāvā rasāścaiva bhāvayanti parasparam // BhN_6.37 //
analyzed: evam bhāvāḥ rasāḥ ca eva bhāvayanti parasparam
yathā bījāt bhavet vṛkṣaḥ vṛkṣāt puṣpam phalam yathā

original: tathā mūlaṃ rasāḥ sarve tebhyo bhāvā vyavasthitāḥ // BhN_6.38 //
analyzed: tathā mūlam rasāḥ sarve tebhyaḥ bhāvāḥ vyavasthitāḥ
rasānām utpatti varṇa daivata nidarśanāni abhivyākhyāsyāmaḥ
teṣām utpatti hetavaḥ catvāraḥ rasāḥ

original: tadyathā śṛṅgāro raudrau vīro bībhatsa iti / atra
analyzed: tat yathā śṛṅgāraḥ raudrau vīraḥ bībhatsaḥ iti atra
śṛṅgārāt hi bhavet hāsyaḥ raudrāt ca karuṇaḥ rasaḥ
vīrāt ca eva adbhuta utpattiḥ bībhatsāt ca bhayānakaḥ
śṛṅgāra anukṛtiḥ yā tu sa hāsyaḥ tu prakīrtitaḥ

original: raudrasyaiva ca yatkarma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ // BhN_6.40 //
analyzed: raudrasya eva ca yat karma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇaḥ rasaḥ
vīrasya api ca yat karma saḥ dbhutaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: bībhatsadarśanaṃ yacca jñeyaḥ sa tu bhayānakaḥ // BhN_6.41 //
analyzed: bībhatsa darśanam yat ca jñeyaḥ sa tu bhayānakaḥ
atha varṇāḥ

original: śyāmo bhavati śṛṅgāraḥ sito hāsyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: śyāmaḥ bhavati śṛṅgāraḥ sitaḥ hāsyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: kapotaḥ karuṇaścaiva rakto raudraḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_6.42 //
analyzed: kapotaḥ karuṇaḥ ca eva raktaḥ raudraḥ prakīrtitaḥ
gauraḥ vīraḥ tu vijñeyaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca eva bhayānakaḥ
nīla varṇaḥ tu bībhatsaḥ pītaḥ ca eva adbhutaḥ smṛtaḥ
atha daivatāni
śṛṅgāraḥ viṣṇu devatyaḥ hāsyaḥ pramatha daivataḥ
bībhatsasya mahākālaḥ kāladevaḥ bhayānakaḥ
vīraḥ mahendradevaḥ syāt adbhutaḥ brahmadaivataḥ
etam eteṣām rasānām utpatti varṇa daivatāni abhivyākhyātāni
idānīm anubhāva vibhāva vyabhicāri saṃyuktānām lakṣaṇa nidarśanāni abhivyākhyāsyāmaḥ
sthāyibhāvān ca rasa tvam upaneṣyāmaḥ
tatra śṛṅgāraḥ nāma rati sthāyibhāva prabhavaḥ

original: yatkiñcilloke śuci medhyamujjvalaṃ darśanīyaṃ vā tacchṛṅgāreṇopamīyate /
analyzed: yat kiñcid loke śuci medhyam ujjvalam darśanīyam vā tat śṛṅgāreṇa upamīyate
yaḥ tāvat ujjvala veṣaḥ sa śṛṅgāravān iti ucyate

original: yathā ca gotrakulācārotpannānyāptopadeśasiddhāni puṃsāṃ nāmāni bhavanti tathaiveṣāṃ rasānāṃ bhāvānāṃ ca nāṭyāśritānāṃ cārthānāmācārotpannānyoptopadeśasiddhāni  #
analyzed: yathā ca gotra kula ācāra utpannāni āpta upadeśa siddhāni puṃsām nāmāni bhavanti tathā eva iṣām rasānām bhāvānām ca nāṭya āśritānām ca arthānām ācāra utpannāni opta upadeśa siddhāni
nāmāni
evam eṣaḥ ācāra siddhaḥ hṛdya ujjvala veṣa ātmaka tvāt śṛṅgāraḥ rasaḥ
sa ca strī puruṣa hetukaḥ uttama yuva prakṛtiḥ
tasya dve adhiṣṭhāne sambhogaḥ vipralambhaḥ ca
tatra sambhogaḥ tāvat
ṛtu mālya anulepana alaṅkāra iṣṭa jana viṣaya vara bhavana upabhoga upavana gamana anubhavana śravaṇa darśana krīḍā līlā ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate
tasya nayana cāturya bhrū kṣepa kaṭākṣa sañcāra lalita madhura aṅgahāra vākya ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
vyabhicāriṇaḥ ca asya ālasya augrya jugupsā varjyāḥ
vipralambha kṛtaḥ tu nirveda glāni śaṅkā asūyā śrama cintā autsukya nidrā svapna vibodha vyādhi unmāda mada apasmāra jāḍya maraṇa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinetavyaḥ
atra āha

original: yadyayaṃ ratiprabhavaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ kathamasya karuṇāśrayiṇo bhāvā bhavanti /
analyzed: yadi ayam rati prabhavaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ katham asya karuṇā āśrayiṇaḥ bhāvāḥ bhavanti
atrā ucyate
pūrvam eva abhihitam sambhoga vipralambha kṛtaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ iti
vaiśika śāstra kāraiḥ ca daśa avasthaḥ bhihitaḥ
tāḥ ca sāmānya abhinaye vakṣyāmaḥ
karuṇaḥ tu śāpa kleśa vinipatita iṣṭa jana vibhava nāśa vadha bandha samutthaḥ nirapekṣa bhāvaḥ
autsukya cintā samutthaḥ sāpekṣa bhāvaḥ vipralambha kṛtaḥ
evam anyaḥ karuṇaḥ vipralambhaḥ iti
evam eṣa sarva bhāva saṃyuktaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ bhavati
api ca
sukha prāyeṣu sampannaḥ ṛtumālī ādi sevakaḥ

original: puruṣaḥ pramadāyuktaḥ śṛṅgāra iti saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_6.46 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ pramadā yuktaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
api ca atra sūtra artha anuviddhe ārye bhavataḥ
ṛtu mālya alaṅkāraiḥ priya jana gāndharva kāvya sevābhiḥ
upavana gamana vihāraiḥ śṛṅgāra rasaḥ samudbhavati
nayana vadana prasādaiḥ smita madhura vacaḥ dhṛti pramodaiḥ ca
madhuraiḥ ca aṅga vihāraiḥ tasya abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
atha hāsyaḥ nāma hāsa sthāyibhāva ātmakaḥ
sa ca vikṛta para veṣa alaṅkāra dhārṣṭya laulya kuha kāsat pralāpa vyaṅga darśana doṣa udāharaṇa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate
tasya uṣṭha nāsā kapola spandana dṛṣṭi vyākośa ākuñcana sveda āsya rāga pārśva grahaṇa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
vyabhicāriṇaḥ ca asya avahittha ālasya tandrā nidrā svapna prabodha ādayaḥ
dvividhaḥ ca ayam ātma sthaḥ para sthaḥ ca
yadā svayam hasati tadā ātma sthaḥ

original: yadā tu paraṃ hāsayati tadā parasthaḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu param hāsayati tadā para sthaḥ
atra anuvaṃśye ārye bhavataḥ
viparita alaṅkāraiḥ vikṛta acara abhidhāna veṣaiḥ ca
vikṛtaiḥ artha viśeṣaiḥ hasati iti rasaḥ smṛtaḥ hāsyaḥ
vikṛta ācāraiḥ vākyaiḥ aṅga vikāraiḥ ca vikṛta veṣaiḥ ca

original: hāsayati janaṃ yasmāttasmajjjñeyo raso hāsyaḥ // BhN_6.50 //
analyzed: hāsayati janam yasmāt tasmat jñeyaḥ rasaḥ hāsyaḥ
strī nīca prakṛtau eṣa bhūyiṣṭham dṛśyate rasaḥ

smita hasite jyeṣṭhānām madhyānām vihasita upahasite ca

atra ślokāḥ
īṣat vikasitaiḥ gaṇḍaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ sauṣṭhava anvitaiḥ

utphulla ānana netram tu gaṇḍaiḥ vikasitaiḥ atha

atha madhyamānām
ākuñcita akṣi gaṇḍam yat sa svanam madhuram tathā

original: kālāgataṃ sāsyarāgaṃ tadvai vihasitaṃ bhavet // BhN_6.56 //

asthāna hasitam yat tu sa aśru netram tathā eva ca
bhavet

kara upagūḍha pārśvam ca tat ca ati hasitam bhavet

uttama adhama madhyānām evam tāni prayojayet
iti eṣa sva samutthaḥ tathā para samutthaḥ ca vijñeyaḥ

atha karuṇaḥ nāma śoka sthāyibhāva prabhavaḥ
sa ca śāpa kleśa vinipatita iṣṭa jana viprayoga vibhava nāśa vadha bandha vidrava upaghāta vyasana saṃyoga ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samupajāyate
tasya aśru pāta paridevana mukha śoṣaṇa vaivarṇya srasta gātra tā niśśvāsa smṛti lopa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
vyabhicāriṇaḥ ca asya nirveda glāni cintā autsukya āvega bhrama moha śrama bhaya viṣāda dainya vyādhi jaḍa tā unmāda apasmāra trāsa ālasya maraṇa stambha vepathu vaivarṇya aśru svara bheda ādayaḥ
atra ārye bhavataḥ
iṣṭa vadha darśanāt vā vipriya vacanasya saṃśravāt vā api
ebhiḥ bhāva viśeṣaiḥ karuṇaḥ nāma saṃbhavati
sa svana ruditaiḥ moha āgamaiḥ ca paridaivataiḥ vilapitaiḥ ca
abhineyaḥ karuṇa rasaḥ deha āyāsa abhighātaiḥ ca
atha raudraḥ nāma krodha sthāyibhāva ātmakaḥ
rakṣaḥ dānava uddhata manuṣya prakṛtiḥ
saṃgrāma hetukaḥ
sa ca krodha ādharṣaṇa adhikṣepa anṛta vacana upaghāta vāc pāruṣya abhidroha mātsarya ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate
tasya ca tāḍana pāṭana pīḍā chedana praharaṇa āharaṇa śastra saṃpāta saṃprahāra rudhira ākarṣaṇa ādyāni karmāṇi
punar ca rakta nayana bhrukuṭi karaṇa danta uṣṭha pīḍana gaṇḍa sphuraṇa hasta agra niṣpeṣa ādiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
bhāvāḥ ca asya a sammoha utsāha āvega amarṣa capala tā augrya garva sveda vepathu romāñca gadgada ādayaḥ
atra āha
yat abhihitam rakṣaḥ dānava ādīnām raudraḥ rasaḥ
kim anyeṣām na asti

asti anyeṣām api raudraḥ rasaḥ

kasmāt
bahu bāhavaḥ bahu mukhāḥ proddhūta vikīrṇa piṅgala śirojāḥ
rakta udvṛtta vilocanāḥ bhīma asita rūpiṇaḥ ca eva

original: yacca kiñcitsamārambhate svabhāvaceṣṭitaṃ vāgaṅgādikaṃ tatsarvaṃ raudramevaiṣām /
analyzed: yat ca kiñcid samārambhate svabhāva ceṣṭitam vāc aṅga ādikam tat sarvam raudram eva eṣām
