original: teṣāṃ cānukāriṇo ye puruṣasteṣāmapi saṅgrāmasamprahārakṛto raudro raso 'numantavyaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām ca anukāriṇaḥ ye puruṣaḥ teṣām api saṅgrāma samprahāra kṛtaḥ raudraḥ rasaḥ numantavyaḥ
atra anuvaṃśye ārye bhavataḥ
yuddha prahāra ghātana vikṛta chedana vidāraṇaiḥ ca eva
saṃṅgrāma sambhrama ādyaiḥ ebhiḥ sañjāyate raudraḥ
nānā praharaṇa mokṣaiḥ śiraḥ kabandha bhuja kartanaiḥ ca eva
ebhiḥ ca artha viśeṣaiḥ asya abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
iti raudra rasaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ raudra vāc aṅga ceṣṭitaḥ
śastra prahāra bhūyiṣṭhaḥ ugra karma kriyā ātmakaḥ
atha vīraḥ nāma uttama prakṛtiḥ utsāha ātmakaḥ
sa ca asaṃmoha adhyavasāya na vinaya bala parākrama śakti pratāpa prabhāva ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate
tasya sthairya dhairya śaurya tyāga vaiśāradya ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
bhāvāḥ ca asya dhṛti mati garva āvega augrya āmarṣa smṛti romāñca ādayaḥ
atra ārye rasa vicāra mukhe
utsāha adhyavasāyāt a viṣādi tvāt a vismaya a mohāt
vividhāt artha viśeṣāt vīra rasaḥ nāma sambhavati
sthiti dhairya vīrya garvaiḥ utsāha parākrama prabhāvaiḥ ca
vākyaiḥ ca ākṣepa kṛtaiḥ vīra rasaḥ samyak abhineyaḥ
atha bhayānakaḥ nāma bhaya sthāyibhāva ātmakaḥ
sa ca vikṛta rava sattva darśana śivā ulūka trāsa udvega śūnya āgāra araṇya gamana sva jana vadha bandha darśana śruti kathā ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate
tasya pravepita kara caraṇa nayana capala pulaka mukha vaivarṇya svara bheda ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
bhāvāḥ ca asya stambha sveda gadgada romāñca vepathu svarabheda vaivarṇya śaṅkā moha dainya āvega cāpala jaḍa tā trāsa apasmāra maraṇa ādayaḥ
atra āryāḥ
vikṛta rava sattva darśana saṃgrāma araṇya śūnya gṛha gamanāt
guru nṛpayoḥ aparādhāt kṛtakaḥ ca bhayānakaḥ jñeyaḥ
gātra mukha dṛṣṭi bhedaiḥ ūrustambha abhivīkṣaṇa udvegaiḥ
sanna mukha śoṣa hṛdaya spandana roma udgamaiḥ ca bhayam
etat svabhāva jam syāt sattva samuttham tathā eva kartavyam

original: punarebhireva bhāvaiḥ kṛtakaṃ mṛduceṣṭitaiḥ kāryam // BhN_6.71 //
analyzed: punar ebhiḥ eva bhāvaiḥ kṛtakam mṛdu ceṣṭitaiḥ kāryam
kara caraṇa vepathu stambha gātra hṛdaya prakampena
śuṣka uṣṭha tālu kaṇṭhaiḥ bhayānakaḥ nityam abhineyaḥ
atha bībhatsaḥ nāma jugupsā sthāyibhāva ātmakaḥ
sa ca ahṛdya apriya a coṣya aniṣṭa śravaṇa darśana kīrtana ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate
tasya sarva aṅga saṃhāra mukha vikūṇana ullekhana niṣṭhīvana udvejana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
bhāvāḥ ca asya apasmāra udvega āvega moha vyādhi maraṇa ādayaḥ
atra anuvaṃśye ārye bhavataḥ
anabhimata darśanena ca gandha rasa sparśa śabda doṣaiḥ ca
udvejanaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ bībhatsa rasaḥ samudbhavati
mukha netra vikūṇanayā nāsā pracchādana avanamita āsyaiḥ
avyakta pāda patanaiḥ bībhatsaḥ samyak abhineyaḥ
atha adbhutaḥ nāma vismaya sthāyibhāva ātmakaḥ
sa ca divya jana darśana īpsita manoratha avāpti upavana devakula ādi gamana sabhā vimāna māyā indrajāla sambhāvanā ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate
tasya nayana vistāra a nimeṣa prekṣaṇa romāñca aśru sveda harṣa sādhuvāda dāna prabandha hāhākāra bāhu vadana cela aṅguli bhramaṇa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
bhāvāḥ ca asya stambha aśru sveda gadgada romāñca āvega sambhrama jaḍa tā pralaya ādayaḥ
atra anuvaṃśye ārye bhavataḥ

original: yattvātiśayārthayuktaṃ vākyaṃ śilpaṃ ca karmarūpaṃ vā /
analyzed: yat tva atiśaya artha yuktam vākyam śilpam ca karma rūpam vā
tat sarvam adbhuta rase vibhāva rūpam hi vijñeyam
sparśa graha ullukasanaiḥ hāhākāraiḥ ca sādhuvādaiḥ ca
vepathu gadgada vacanaiḥ sveda ādyaiḥ abhinayaḥ tasya
śṛṅgāram trividham vidyāt dvāc naipathya kriyā ātmakam
aṅga naipathya vākyaiḥ ca hāsya raudrau tridhā smṛtau
dharma upaghāta jaḥ ca eva tathā artha apacaya udbhavaḥ
tathā śoka kṛtaḥ ca eva karuṇaḥ trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ
dāna vīram dharma vīram yuddha vīram tathā eva ca

original: rasaṃ vīramapi prāha brahmā trividhameva hi // BhN_6.79 //
analyzed: rasam vīram api prāha brahmā trividham eva hi
vyājāt ca eva aparādhāt ca vitrāsitakam eva ca
punar bhayānakam ca eva vidyāt trividham eva hi

original: bībhatsaḥ kṣobhajaḥ śuddha udvegī syāt dvitīyakaḥ /
analyzed: bībhatsaḥ kṣobha jaḥ śuddha udvegī syāt dvitīyakaḥ
viṣṭhā kṛmibhiḥ udvegī kṣobha jaḥ rudhira ādi ajaḥ
divyaḥ ca ānanda jaḥ ca eva dvidhā khyātaḥ dbhutaḥ rasaḥ
atha śāntaḥ nāma śama sthāyibhāva ātmakaḥ mokṣa pravartakaḥ
sa tu tattva jñāna vairāgya āśaya śuddhi ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasya yama niyama adhyātma dhyāna dhāraṇa upāsana sarva bhūta dayā liṅga grahaṇa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
vyabhicāṇaḥ ca asya nirveda smṛti dhṛti sarva āśrama śauca stambha romāñca ādayaḥ
atra āryāḥ ślokāḥ ca bhavanti
mokṣa adhyātma samutthaḥ tattva jñāna artha hetu saṃyuktaḥ
naiḥśreyasa upadiṣṭaḥ śānta rasaḥ nāma sambhavati
buddhīndriya karmendriya saṃrodha adhyātma saṃsthita upetaḥ
sarva prāṇi sukha hitaḥ śāntarasaḥ nāma vijñeyaḥ

original: na yatra duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na dveṣo nāpi matsaraḥ /
analyzed: na yatra duḥkham na sukham na dveṣaḥ na api matsaraḥ

original: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sa śāntaḥ prathito rasaḥ // BhN_6.82*3 //
analyzed: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sa śāntaḥ prathitaḥ rasaḥ
bhāvāḥ vikārāḥ rati ādyāḥ śāntaḥ tu prakṛtiḥ mataḥ
vikāraḥ prakṛtaiḥ jātaḥ punar tatra eva līyate

original: svaṃ svaṃ nimittamāsādya śāntādbhāvaḥ pravartate // BhN_6.82*4 //
analyzed: svam svam nimittam āsādya śāntāt bhāvaḥ pravartate
punar nimitta apāye ca śānte eva upalīyate
evam nava rasāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ nāṭya jñaiḥ lakṣaṇa anviatāḥ
evam ete rasāḥ jñeyāḥ tu aṣṭau lakṣaṇa lakṣitāḥ

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhāvānāmapi lakṣaṇam // BhN_6.83 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi bhāvānām api lakṣaṇam
iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre rasa adhyāyaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ
atha saptamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
bhāvān idānīm vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
atra āha
bhāvāḥ iti kasmāt

original: kiṃ bhavantīti bhāvāḥ kiṃ vā bhāvayantīti bhāvāḥ /
analyzed: kim bhavanti iti bhāvāḥ kim vā bhāvayanti iti bhāvāḥ
ucyate
vāc aṅga sattva upetān ān kāvya arthān bhāvayanti iti bhāvāḥ iti

original: bhū iti karaṇe dhātustathā ca bhāvitaṃ vāsitaṃ kṛtamityanarthāntaram /
analyzed: iti karaṇe dhātuḥ tathā ca bhāvitam vāsitam kṛtam iti anarthāntaram
loke pi ca prasiddham

original: aho hyanena gandhena rasena vā sarvameva bhāvitamiti /
analyzed: aho hi anena gandhena rasena vā sarvam eva bhāvitam iti
tat ca vyāpti artham
ślokāḥ ca atra
vibhāvena āhṛtaḥ yaḥ rthaḥ hi anubhāvaiḥ tu gamyate

original: vāgaṅgasattvābhinayaiḥ sa bhāva iti saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_7.1 //
analyzed: vāc aṅga sattva abhinayaiḥ sa bhāvaḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
vāc aṅga mukha rāgeṇa sattvena abhinayena ca
kaveḥ antargatam bhāvam bhāvayan bhāvaḥ ucyate
nānā abhinaya sambaddhān bhāvayanti rasān imān
yasmāt tasmāt amī bhāvāḥ vijñeyāḥ nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ
atha vibhāvaḥ iti kasmāt
ucyate
vibhavaḥ vijñāna arthaḥ
vibhāvaḥ kāraṇam nimittam hetuḥ iti paryāyāḥ
vibhāvyate nena vāc aṅga sattva abhinayāḥ iti atas vibhāvaḥ
yathā vibhāvitam vijñātam iti anarthāntaram
atra ślokaḥ
bahavaḥ rthāḥ vibhāvyante vāc aṅga abhinaya āśrayāḥ

original: anena yasmāttenāyaṃ vibhāva iti saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_7.4 //
analyzed: anena yasmāt tena ayam vibhāvaḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
atha anubhāvaḥ iti kasmāt
ucyate
anubhāvyate nena vāc aṅga sattva kṛtaḥ bhinayaḥ iti
atra ślokaḥ
vāc aṅga abhinayena iha yatas tu arthaḥ nu bhāvyate
śākhā aṅga upāṅga saṃyuktaḥ tu anubhāvaḥ tatas smṛtaḥ

original: evaṃ te vibhāvānubhāvasaṃyuktā bhāvā iti vyākhyātāḥ /
analyzed: evam te vibhāva anubhāva saṃyuktāḥ bhāvāḥ iti vyākhyātāḥ
atas hi eṣām bhāvānām siddhiḥ bhavati
tasmāt eṣām bhāvānām vibhāva anubhāva saṃyuktānām lakṣaṇa nidarśanāni abhivyākhyāsyāmaḥ
tatra vibhāva anubhāvau loka prasiddhau
loka svabhāva anugata tvāt ca tayoḥ lakṣaṇam nā ucyate tiprasaṅga nivṛti artham
bhavati ca atra ślokaḥ
loka svabhāva saṃsiddhāḥ lokayātrā anugāminaḥ
anubhāvāḥ vibhāvāḥ ca jñeyāḥ tu abhinaye budhaiḥ
tatra aṣṭau bhāvāḥ sthāyinaḥ
trayastriṃśat vyabhicāriṇaḥ
aṣṭau sātvikāḥ iti bhedāḥ
evam ete kāvya rasa abhivyakti hetavaḥ ekonapañcāśat bhāvāḥ pratyavagantavyāḥ
ebhyaḥ ca sāmānya guṇa yogena rasāḥ niṣpadyante
atra ślokaḥ
yaḥ rthaḥ hṛdaya saṃvādī tasya bhāvaḥ rasa udbhavaḥ

original: śarīraṃ vyāpyate tena śuṣkaṃ kāṣṭhamivāgninā // BhN_7.7 //
analyzed: śarīram vyāpyate tena śuṣkam kāṣṭham iva agninā
atra āha yadi

original: kāvyārthasaṃśritairvibhāvānubhāvavyañjitairekonapañcāśadbhāvaiḥ sāmānyaguṇayogenābhiniṣpadyante rasāstatkathaṃ sthāyina eva bhāvā rasatvamāpnuavanti
analyzed: kāvya artha saṃśritaiḥ vibhāva anubhāva vyañjitaiḥ ekonapañcāśat bhāvaiḥ sāmānya guṇa yogena abhiniṣpadyante rasāḥ tat katham sthāyinaḥ eva bhāvāḥ rasa tvam āpnuavanti
ucyate

original: yathā hi samānalakṣaṇāstulyapāṇipādodaraśarīrāḥ samānāṅgapratyaṅgā api puruṣāḥ kulaśīlavidyākarmaśilpavicakṣaṇatvādrājatvamāpnuvanti
analyzed: yathā hi samāna lakṣaṇāḥ tulya pāṇi pāda udara śarīrāḥ samāna aṅga pratyaṅgāḥ api puruṣāḥ kula śīla vidyā karma śilpa vicakṣaṇa tvāt rāja tvam āpnuvanti
tatra eva ca anye lpabuddhayaḥ teṣām eva anucarāḥ bhavanti
tathā
vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāriṇaḥ sthāyi bhāva an upāśritāḥ bhavanti
bahu āśraya tva asvāmi bhūtāḥ sthāyinaḥ bhāvāḥ
tadvat sthānīya puruṣa guṇa bhūtāḥ anye bhāvāḥ tān guṇa tayā śrayante
sthāyibhāvāḥ rasa tvam āpnuvanti
parijana bhūtāḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ bhāvāḥ
atra āha
kaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti

original: yathā narendro bahujanaparivāro 'pi sa eva nāma labhate nānyaḥ sumahānapi puruṣaḥ tathā vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriparivṛtaḥ sthāyī bhāvo rasanāma  #
analyzed: yathā narendraḥ saḥ eva nāma labhate na anyaḥ su mahān api puruṣaḥ tathā vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāri parivṛtaḥ sthāyī bhāvaḥ rasa nāma
labhate
bhavati ca atra ślokaḥ

original: yathā narāṇāṃ nṛpatiḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ ca yathā guruḥ /
analyzed: yathā narāṇām nṛpatiḥ śiṣyāṇām ca yathā guruḥ

original: evaṃ hi sarvabhāvānāṃ bhāvaḥ sthāyi mahāniha // BhN_7.8 //
analyzed: evam hi sarva bhāvānām bhāvaḥ sthāyi mahān iha
lakṣaṇam khalu pūrvam abhihitam eṣām rasa saṃjñakānām
idānīm bhāva sāmānya lakṣaṇam abhidhāsyāmaḥ
tatra sthāyibhāvān vakṣyāmaḥ
ratiḥ nāma pramoda ātmikā ṛtu mālya anulepana ābharaṇa bhojana vara bhavana anubhavana a prātikūlya ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tām abhinayet smita vadana madhura kathana bhrū kṣepa kaṭākṣa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra ślokaḥ
iṣṭa artha viṣaya prāptyā ratiḥ iti upajāyate
saumya tvāt abhineyā sā vāc mādhurya aṅga ceṣṭitaiḥ
hāsaḥ nāma para ceṣṭā anukaraṇa kuhaka asambaddha pralāpa paurobhāgya maurkhya ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tam abhinayet pūrva uktaiḥ hasita ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
bhavati ca atra ślokaḥ
para ceṣṭā anukaraṇāt hāsaḥ samupajāyate
smita hāsa ati hasitaiḥ abhineyaḥ sa paṇḍitaiḥ
śokaḥ nāma iṣṭa jana viyoga vibhava nāśa vadha bandha duḥkha anubha navana ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasya asra pāta paridevita vilapita vaivarṇya svarabheda srasta gātra tā bhūmi patana sa svana rudita ākrandita dīrgha niḥśvasita jaḍa tā unmāda moha maraṇa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ
prayoktavyaḥ
ruditam atra trividham ānanda jam ārti jam īrṣyā samudbhavam ca iti
bhavanti ca atra āryāḥ
ānande pi ārti kṛtam trividham ruditam sadā budhaiḥ jñeyam
tasya tu abhinaya yogān vibhāva gatitaḥ pravakṣyāmi
harṣa utphulla kapolam sa anusmaraṇāt apāṅga visṛta asram
romāñca gātram anibhṛtam ānanda samudbhavam bhavati
paryāpta vimukta asram sa svanam asvastha gātra gati ceṣṭam
bhūmi nipāta nivartita vilapitam iti ārti jam bhavati
prasphurita oṣṭha kapolam sa śiraḥ kampam tathā sa niḥśvāsam
bhrukuṭī kaṭa akṣa kuṭilam strīṇām īrṣyā kṛtam bhavati
strī nīca prakṛtiṣu eṣa śokaḥ vyasana sambhavaḥ
dhairyeṇa uttama madhyānām nīcānām ruditena ca
krodhaḥ nāma ādharṣaṇa ākruṣṭa kalaha vivāda pratikūla ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
asya vikṛṣṭa nāsā puṭa udvṛtta nayana saṃdaṣṭha uṣṭha puṭa gaṇḍa sphuraṇa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
ripu jaḥ guru jaḥ ca eva praṇayi prabhavaḥ tathā

original: bhṛtyajaḥ kṛtakaśceti krodhaḥ pañcavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhN_7.15 //
analyzed: bhṛtyajaḥ kṛtakaḥ ca iti krodhaḥ pañcavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ
atra āryāḥ bhavanti
bhṛkuṭī kuṭila utkaṭa mukhaḥ sandaṣṭha uṣṭhaḥ spṛśan kareṇa karam

original: kruddhaḥ svabhujāprekṣī śatrau niryantraṇaṃ ruṣyet // BhN_7.16 //
analyzed: kruddhaḥ sva bhuja aprekṣī śatrau niryantraṇam ruṣyet
kiñcid avāṅ mukha dṛṣṭiḥ sa asra sveda apamārjana paraḥ ca
avyakta ulbaṇa ceṣṭaḥ gurau vinaya yantritaḥ ruṣyet
alpa pratara vicāraḥ vikiran aśrūṇi apāṅga vikṣepaiḥ
sa bhrukuṭi sphurita uṣṭhaḥ praṇaya upagatām priyā ruṣyet
atha parijane tu roṣaḥ tarjana nirbhartsana akṣi vistāraiḥ
viprekṣaṇaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ abhineyaḥ krūra tā rahitaḥ
kāraṇam avekṣamāṇaḥ prāyeṇa āyāsa liṅga saṃyuktaḥ

original: vīrarasāntaracārī kāryaḥ kṛtako bhavati kopaḥ // BhN_7.20 //
analyzed: vīra rasa antara cārī kāryaḥ kṛtakaḥ bhavati kopaḥ
utsāhaḥ nāma uttama prakṛtiḥ
sa ca aviṣāda śakti dhairya śaurya ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate
tasya dhairya tyāga vaiśāradya ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
atra ślokaḥ
asammoha ādibhiḥ vyaktaḥ vyavasāya naya ātmakaḥ
utsāhaḥ tu abhineyaḥ syāt apramāda utthita ādibhiḥ
bhayam nāma strī nīca prakṛtikam
guru rāja aparādha śvāpada śūnya āgāra aṭavī parvata gahana gaja ahi darśana nirbhartsana kāntāra durdina niśā andhakara ulūka naktañcara ārāva śravaṇa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ
samutpadyate
tasya prakampita kara caraṇa hṛdaya kampana stambha mukha śoṣa jihvā parilehana sveda vepathu trāsa sa paritrāṇa anveṣaṇa dhāvana utkṛṣṭa ādibhiḥ anubhavaiḥ abhinayaḥ
prayoktavyaḥ
atra ślokāḥ
guru rāja aparādhena raudrāṇām ca api darśanāt

original: śravaṇādapi ghorāṇāṃ bhayaṃ mohena jāyate // BhN_7.22 //
analyzed: śravaṇāt api ghorāṇām bhayam mohena jāyate
gātra kampana vitrāsaiḥ vaktra śoṣaṇa sambhramaiḥ
visphārita aikṣaṇaiḥ kāryam abhineya kriyā guṇaiḥ
sattva vitrāsana udbhūtam bhayam utpadyate nṛṇām
srasta aṅga akṣi nimeṣaiḥ tat abhineyam tu nartakaiḥ
atra āryā bhavati
kara caraṇa hṛdaya kampaiḥ mukha śoṣaṇa vadana lehana stambhaiḥ
sambhrānta vadana vepathu saṃtrāsa kṛtaiḥ abhinayaḥ sya
jugupsā nāma strī nīca prakṛtikā
sā ca ahṛdya darśana śravaṇa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasyāḥ sarva aṅga saṅkoca niṣṭhīvana mukha vikūṇana hṛllekhā ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
bhavati ca atra ślokaḥ
nāsā pracchādanena iha gātra saṅkocanena ca
udvejanaiḥ sa hṛllekhaiḥ jugupsām abhinirdiśet
vismayaḥ nāma māyā indrajāla mānuṣa karma atiśaya citra pusta śilpa vidyā atiśaya ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasya nayana vistāra a nimeṣa prekṣita bhrū kṣepa roma harṣaṇa śiraḥ kampa sādhuvāda ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
bhavati ca atra ślokaḥ
siddhisthāne tu asau sādhyaḥ praharṣa pulaka ādibhiḥ
evam ete sthāyinaḥ bhāvāḥ rasa saṃjñāḥ pratyavagantavyāḥ
vyabhicāriṇaḥ idānīm vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
atra āha
vyabhicāriṇaḥ iti kasmāt
ucyate
vi abhi iti etau upasargau
caraḥ iti gati arthaḥ dhātuḥ
vividham ābhimukhyena raseṣu caranti iti vyabhicāriṇaḥ
vāc aṅga sattva upetāḥ prayoge rasān nayanti iti vyabhicāriṇaḥ
atra āha
katham nayanti iti
ucyate
loka siddhāntaḥ eṣaḥ

original: yathā sūrya idaṃ dinaṃ nakṣatraṃ vā nayatīti /
analyzed: yathā sūryaḥ idam dinam nakṣatram vā nayati iti

original: na ca tena bāhubhyāṃ skandhena vā nīyate /
analyzed: na ca tena bāhubhyām skandhena vā nīyate
kim tu loka prasiddham etat

original: yathedaṃ sūryo nakṣatraṃ dina vā nayatīti /
analyzed: yathā idam sūryaḥ nakṣatram vā nayati iti
evam ete vyabhicāriṇaḥ iti avagantavyāḥ
tān iha saṅgraha abhihitān trayastriṃśat vyabhicāriṇaḥ bhāvān varṇayiṣyāmaḥ
tatra nirvedaḥ nāma dāridrya vyādhi avamāna adhikṣepa ākruṣṭa krodha tāḍana iṣṭa jana viyoga tattva jñāna ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate strī nīca ku sattvānām
rudita niḥśvasita ucchvasita sampradhāraṇa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ tam abhinayet
atra ślokaḥ
dāridrya iṣṭa viyoga ādyaiḥ nirvedaḥ nāma jāyate
sampradhāraṇa niḥśvāsaiḥ tasya tu abhinayaḥ bhavet
atra anuvaṃśye ārye bhavataḥ
iṣṭa jana viprayogāt dāridryāt vyādhitaḥ tathā duḥkhāt

original: ṛddhiṃ parasya dṛṣṭvā nirvedo nāma sambhavati // BhN_7.29 //
analyzed: ṛddhim parasya dṛṣṭvā nirvedaḥ nāma sambhavati
bāṣpa paripluta nayanaḥ punar ca niḥśvāsa na dīna mukha netraḥ

original: yogīva dhyānaparo bhavati hi nirvedavānpuruṣaḥ // BhN_7.30 //
analyzed: yogī iva dhyāna paraḥ bhavati hi nirvedavān puruṣaḥ
glāniḥ nāma vānta virikta vyādhi tapaḥ niyama upavāsa manaḥ tāpa atiśaya madana sevana ati vyāyāma adhva gamana kṣudh pipāsā nidrā cheda ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasyāḥ kṣāma vākya nayana kapola udara manda pada utkṣepaṇa vepana anutsāha tanu gātra vaivarṇya svarabhedābhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
atra ārye bhavataḥ

original: vāntaviriktavyādhiṣu tapasā jarasā ca jāyate glāniḥ /
analyzed: vānta virikta vyādhiṣu tapasā jarasā ca jāyate glāniḥ
kārśyena sā abhineyā manda bhramaṇena kampena
gaditaiḥ kṣāma kṣāmaiḥ netra vikāraiḥ ca dīna sañcāraiḥ
ślatha bhāvena aṅgānām muhur muhur nirdiśet glānim
śaṅkā nāma sandeha ātmikā strī nīca prabhavā
caurya abhigrahaṇa nṛpa aparādha pāpa karma karaṇa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasyāḥ muhur muhur avalokana avakuṇṭhana mukha śoṣaṇa jihvā lehana mukha vaivarṇya svarabheda vepathu śuṣka uṣṭha kaṇṭha āyāsa sādharmya ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ
prayoktavyaḥ
caurya ādi janitā śaṅkā prāyas kāryā bhayānake
atra ākāra saṃvaraṇam api kecid icchanti
tat ca kuśalaiḥ upādhibhiḥ iṅgitaiḥ ca upalakṣyam
atra ārye bhavataḥ

original: dvividhā śaṅkā kāryāhyātmasamutthā ca parasamutthā ca /
analyzed: dvividhā śaṅkā kāryā ahi ātma samutthā ca para samutthā ca

original: yā tatrātmasamutthā sā jñeyā dṛṣṭiceṣṭābhiḥ // BhN_7.34 //
analyzed: yā tatra ātma samutthā sā jñeyā dṛṣṭi ceṣṭābhiḥ
kiñcid pravepita aṅgaḥ tu adhomukhaḥ vīkṣate ca pārśvāni
guru sajjamāna jihvaḥ śyāma āsyaḥ śaṅkitaḥ puruṣaḥ
asūyā nāma nānā aparādha dveṣa para aiśvarya saubhāgya medhā vidyā līlā ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasyāḥ ca pariṣadi doṣa prakhyāpana guṇa upaghāta īrṣyā cakṣuḥ pradāna adhomukha bhrukuṭī kriyā avajñāna kutsana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
atra ārye bhavataḥ
para saubhāgya īśvara tā medhā līlā samucchrayān dṛṣṭvā
utpadyate hi asūyā kṛta aparādhaḥ bhavet yaḥ ca
bhrukuṭi kuṭila utkaṭa mukhaiḥ sa īrṣyā krodha parivṛtta netraiḥ ca
guṇa nāśana vidveṣaiḥ tatra abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
madaḥ nāma madya upayogāt utpadyate
sa ca trividhaḥ pañca vibhāvaḥ ca
atra āryāḥ bhavanti
jñeyaḥ tu madaḥ trividhaḥ taruṇaḥ madhyaḥ tathā avakṛṣṭaḥ ca
karaṇam pañcavidham syāt tasya abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ

original: kaścinmatto gāyati roditi kaścittathā hasati kaścit /
analyzed: kaścid mattaḥ gāyati roditi kaścid tathā hasati kaścid
paruṣa vacana abhidhāyī kaścid kaścid tathā svapiti

original: uttamasattvaḥ śete hasati ca gāyati ca madhyamaprakṛtiḥ /
analyzed: uttama sattvaḥ śete hasati ca gāyati ca madhyama prakṛtiḥ
paruṣa vacana abhidhāyī rodati api ca adhama prakṛtiḥ
smita vacana madhura rāgaḥ hṛṣṭa tanuḥ kiñcid ākulita vākyaḥ
sukumāra āviddha gatiḥ taruṇa madaḥ tu uttama prakṛtiḥ
skhalita āghūrṇita nayanaḥ srasta vyākulita bāhu vikṣepaḥ
kuṭila vyāviddha gatiḥ madhyama daḥ madhyama prakṛtiḥ
naṣṭa smṛtiḥ hata gatiḥ chardita hikkā kaphaiḥ su bībhatsaḥ
guru sajjamāna jihvaḥ niṣṭhīvati ca adhama prakṛtiḥ
raṅge pibataḥ kāryā mada vṛddhiḥ nāṭya yogam āsādya

original: kāryo madakṣayo vai yaḥ khalu pītvā praviṣṭaḥ syāt // BhN_7.44 //
analyzed: kāryaḥ mada kṣayaḥ vai yaḥ khalu pītvā praviṣṭaḥ syāt
santrāsāt śokāt vā bhayāt praharṣāt ca kāraṇa upagatāt

original: utkramyāpi hi kāryo madapraṇāśaḥ kramāttajjñaiḥ // BhN_7.45 //
analyzed: utkramya api hi kāryaḥ mada praṇāśaḥ kramāt tad jñaiḥ
ebhiḥ bhāva viśeṣaiḥ madaḥ drutam sampraṇāśam upayāti
abhyudaya sukhaiḥ vākyaiḥ yathā eva śokaḥ kṣayam yāti
śramaḥ nāma adhva vyāyāma sevana ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasya gātra parimardana saṃvāhana niḥśvasita vijṛmbhita manda pada utkṣepaṇa nayana vadana vikūṇana sītkara ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
atra āryā
nṛtta adhva vyāyāmāt narasya sañjāyate śramaḥ nāma
niḥśvāsa kheda gamanaiḥ tasya abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
ālasyam nāma kheda vyādhi garbha svabhāva śrama sauhitya ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate strī nīcānām
tat abhinayet sarva karma anabhilāṣa śayana āsana nidrā tandrī sevana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra āryā
ālasyam tu abhineyam kheda apagatam svabhāva jam ca api
āhāra varjitānām ārambhāṇām anārambhāt
dainyam nāma daurgatya manaḥ tāpa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasya adhṛti śiraḥ roga gātra gaurava anya manaska tā mṛjā parivarjana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
atra āryā
cintā autsukya samutthā duḥkha ādyā bhavati dīna tām puṃsām
sarva mṛjā parihāraiḥ vividhaḥ bhinayaḥ bhavet tasya
cintā nāma aiśvarya bhraṃśa iṣṭa dravya apahāra dāridrya ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate
tām abhinayet niḥśvasita ucchvasita santāpa dhyāna adhomukha cintana tanu kārśya ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra ārye bhavataḥ
aiśvarya bhraṃśa iṣṭa dravya kṣaya jā bahu prakārā tu
hṛdaya vitarka upagatā nṝṇām cintā samudbhavati
sa ucchvāsaiḥ niḥśvasitaiḥ santāpaiḥ ca eva hṛdaya śūnya tayā
abhinetavyā cintā mṛjā vihīnaiḥ adhṛtyā ca
mohaḥ nāma daiva upaghāta vyasana abhighāta vyādhi bhaya āvega pūrva vaira anusmaraṇa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasya niścaitanya bhramaṇa patana āghūrṇana ādarśana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
atra ślokaḥ tāvat āryā ca
asthāne taskarān dṛṣṭvā trāsanaiḥ vividhaiḥ api
tad pratīkāra śūnyasya mohaḥ samupajāyate
vyasana abhighāta bhaya pūrva vaira saṃsmaraṇa roga jaḥ mohaḥ
sarva indriya sammohāt tasya abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
smṛtiḥ nāma sukha duḥkha kṛtānām bhāvānām anusmaraṇam
sā ca svāsthya jaghanya rātri nidrā cheda samāna darśana udāharaṇa cintā abhyāsa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tām abhinayet śiraḥ kampana avalokana bhrū samunnamana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra ārye bhavataḥ
sukha duḥkham atikrāntam tathā mati vibhāvitam yathāvṛttam

original: ciravismṛtaṃ smarati yaḥ smṛtimāniti veditavyo 'sau // BhN_7.54 //
analyzed: cira vismṛtam smarati yaḥ smṛtimān iti veditavyaḥ sau
svāsthya abhyāsa samutthā śruti darśana sambhavā smṛtiḥ nipuṇaiḥ
śiraḥ udvāhana kampaiḥ bhū kṣepaiḥ ca abhinetavyā
dhṛtiḥ nāma śaurya vijñāna śruti vibhava śauca ācāra guru bhakti adhika manoratha artha lābha krīḍā ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tām abhinayet prāptānām viṣayāṇām upabhogāt aprāpta atīta upahṛta vinaṣṭānām anuśocana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra ārye bhavataḥ
vijñāna śauca vibhava śruti śakti samudbhavā dhṛtiḥ sadbhiḥ

original: bhayaśokaviṣadādyai rahitā tu sadā prayoktavyā // BhN_7.56 //
analyzed: bhaya śoka viṣada ādyaiḥ rahitā tu sadā prayoktavyā
prāptānām upabhogaḥ śabda rasa sparśa rūpa gandhānām

original: aprāptaiśca na śoko yasyāṃ hi bhaved dhṛtiḥ sā tu // BhN_7.57 //
analyzed: aprāptaiḥ ca na śokaḥ yasyām hi bhavet dhṛtiḥ sā tu
vrīḍā nāma akārya karaṇa ātmikā
sā ca guru vyatikramaṇa avajñāna pratijñāta anirvahana paścāttāpa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tām nigūḍha vadana adhomukha vicintana ūrvī lekhana vastra aṅgulīyaka sparśa nakha nikṛntana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayet
atra ārye bhavataḥ
kiñcid akāryam kurvan evam yaḥ dṛśyate śucibhiḥ anyaiḥ

original: paścāttāpena yuto vrīḍita iti veditavyo 'sau // BhN_7.58 //
analyzed: paścāttāpena yutaḥ vrīḍitaḥ iti veditavyaḥ sau
lajjā nigūḍha vadanaḥ bhūmim vilikhan nakhān ca vinikṛntan
vastra aṅgulīyakānām saṃsparśam vrīḍitaḥ kuryāt
capala tā nāma rāga dveṣa mātsarya āmarṣa apratikūlya ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasyāḥ ca vāc pāruṣya nirbhartsana vadha bandha samprahāra tāḍana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
atra āryā bhavati

original: avimṛśya tu yaḥ kāryaṃ puruṣo vadhatāḍanaṃ samārabhate /
analyzed: a vimṛśya tu yaḥ kāryam puruṣaḥ vadha tāḍanam samārabhate

original: aviniścitakāritvātsa tu khalu capalo budhairjñeyaḥ // BhN_7.60 //
analyzed: aviniścita kāri tvāt sa tu khalu capalaḥ budhaiḥ jñeyaḥ
harṣaḥ nāma manoratha lābha iṣṭa jana samāgamana manaḥ paritoṣa deva guru rāja bhartṛ prasāda bhojana ācchādana lābha upabhoga ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tam abhinayet nayana vadana prasāda priya bhāṣaṇa āliṅgana kaṇṭakita pulakita asra sveda ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra ārye bhavataḥ

original: aprāpye prāpye vā labdhe 'rthe priyasamāgame vā'pi /
analyzed: a prāpye prāpye vā labdhe rthe priya samāgame vā api
hṛdaya manoratha lābhe harṣaḥ sañjāyate puṃsām
nayana vadana priya bhāṣā āliṅganaiḥ ca romāñcaiḥ
lalitaiḥ ca aṅga vihāraiḥ sveda ādyaiḥ abhinayaḥ tasya
āvegaḥ nāma utpāta vāta varṣā kuñjara udbhramaṇa priya apriya śravaṇa vyasana abhighāta ādiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tatra utpāta kṛtaḥ nāma vidyut ulkā nirghāta prapatana candra sūrya uparāga ketu darśana kṛtaḥ
tam abhinayet sarva aṅga srasta tā vaimanasya mukha vaivarṇya viṣāda vismaya ādibhiḥ
vāta kṛtam punar avakuṇṭhana akṣi parimārjana vastra saṅgūhana tvarita gamana ādibhiḥ
varṣa kṛtam punar sarva aṅga sampiṇḍana pradhāvana channa āśraya mārgaṇa ādibhiḥ
agni kṛtam tu dhūma ākula netra tā aṅga saṅkocana vidhūnana atikrānta apakrānta ādibhiḥ
kuñjara udbhramaṇa kṛtam nāma tvarita apasarpaṇa cañcala gamana bhaya stambha vepathu paścāt avalokana vismaya ādibhiḥ
priya śravaṇa kṛtam nāma abhyutthāna āliṅgana vastra ābharaṇa pradāna aśru pulakita ādibhiḥ
apriya śravaṇa kṛtam nāma bhūmi patana viṣama vivartana paridhāvana vilāpana ākrandana ādibhiḥ
vyasana abhighāta jam tu sahasā apasarpaṇa śastra carma varma dhāraṇa gaja turaga ratha ārohaṇa sampradhāraṇa ādibhiḥ
evam aṣṭa vikalpaḥ yam āvegaḥ sambhrama ātmakaḥ
stheryeṇa uttama madhyānām nīcānām ca apasarpaṇaiḥ
atra ārye bhavataḥ
apriya nivedanāt vā sahasā hi avadhārita ari vacanasya
śastra kṣepāt trāsāt āvegaḥ nāma sambhavati
apriya nivedana ādyaḥ viṣāda bhāva āśrayaḥ nubhāvasya
sahasāri darśanāt ced paharaṇa parighaṭṭanaiḥ kāryaḥ
jaḍa tā nāma sarva kārya apratipattiḥ
iṣṭa aniṣṭa śravaṇa darśana vyādhi ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tām abhinayet a kathana a vibhāṣaṇa tūṣṇīmbhāva a pratibhā nimeṣa nirīkṣaṇa paravaśa tva ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra āryā bhavati

original: iṣṭaṃ vā'niṣṭaṃ vā sukhaduḥkhe vā na vetti yo mohāt /
analyzed: iṣṭam vā aniṣṭam vā sukha duḥkhe vā na vetti yaḥ mohāt

original: tūṣṇīkaḥ paravaśago bhavati sa jaḍasaṃjñitaḥ puruṣaḥ // BhN_7.66 //
analyzed: tūṣṇīkaḥ para vaśa gaḥ bhavati sa jaḍa saṃjñitaḥ puruṣaḥ
garvaḥ nāma aiśvarya kula rūpa yauvana vidyā bala dhana lābha ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasya asūyā avajñā gharṣaṇa anuttara dāna asambhāṣaṇa aṅga avalokana vibhrama apahasana vāc pāruṣya guru vyatikramaṇa adhikṣepa vacana viccheda ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ
atra āryā bhavati
vidyā avāpte rūpāt aiśvaryāt atha dhana āgamāt vā api

original: garvaḥ khalu nīcānāṃ dṛṣṭyaṅgavicāraṇaiḥ kāryaḥ // BhN_7.67 //
analyzed: garvaḥ khalu nīcānām dṛṣṭi aṅga vicāraṇaiḥ kāryaḥ
viṣādaḥ nāma kārya anistaraṇa daiva vyāpatti samutthaḥ
tam abhinayet sahāya anveṣaṇa upāya cintana utsāha vighāta vaimanasya niḥśvasita ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ uttama madhyamānām
adhamānām tu viparidhāvana ālokana mukha śoṣaṇa sṛkva parilehana nidrā niḥśvasita dhyāna ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra āryā ślokau
kārya anistaraṇāt vā caurya abhigrahaṇa rāja doṣāt vā
daivāt artha vipatteḥ bhavati viṣādaḥ sadā puṃsām
vaicitrya upāya cintābhyām kāryaḥ uttama madhyayoḥ
nidrā niḥśvasita dhyānaiḥ adhamānām tu yojayet
autsukyam nāma iṣṭa jana viyoga anusmaraṇa udyāna darśana ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tasya dīrgha niḥśvasita adhomukha vicintana nidrā tandrī śayana abhilāṣa ādibhiḥ anubhavaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
atra āryā bhavati
iṣṭa janasya viyogāt autsukyam jāyate hi anusmṛtyā
cintā nidrā tandrī gātra guru tvaiḥ abhinayaḥ sya
nidrā nāma daurbalya śrama klama mada ālasya cintā ati āhāra svabhāva ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tām abhinayet vadana gaurava śarīra avalokana netra ghūraṇana gātra vijṛmbhana māndya ucchvasita sanna gātra tā akṣi nimīlana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra ārye bhavataḥ
ālasyāt daurbalyāt klamāt śramāt cintanāt svabhāvāt ca

original: rātrau jāgaraṇādapi nidrā puruṣasya sambhavati // BhN_7.71 //
analyzed: rātrau jāgaraṇāt api nidrā puruṣasya sambhavati
tām mukha gaurava gātra pratilolana nayana mīlana jaḍa tvaiḥ
jṛmbhaṇa gātra vimardaiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayet prājñaḥ
apasmāraḥ nāma deva yakṣa nāga brahmarākṣasa bhūta preta piśāca grahaṇa anusmarana ucchiṣṭa śūnya āgāra sevana aśuci kāla antara aparipatana vyādi ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ
tasya sphurita niḥśvasita utkampita dhāvana patana sveda stambha vadana phena jihvā parilehana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
atra ārye bhavataḥ
bhūta piśāca grahaṇa anusmaraṇa ucchiṣṭa śūnya gṛha gamanāt
kāla antara atipātāt aśuceḥ ca bhavati apasmāraḥ
sahasā bhūmau patanam pravepanam vadana phena mokṣaḥ ca
niḥsaṃjñasya utthānam rūpāṇi etāni apasmāre
suptam nāma nidrā abhibhava viṣaya upagamana kṣiti tala śayana prasāraṇa anukarṣaṇa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate nidrā samuttham
tad ucchvasita āsanna gātra akṣi nimīlana sarva indriya sammohana utsvapnāyita ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayet
atra ārye bhavataḥ
nidrā abhibhava indriya uparamaṇa mohāiḥ havet suptam
akṣi nimīlana ucchvasanaiḥ svapnāyita jalpitaiḥ kāryaḥ
sa ucchvāsaiḥ niḥśvāsaiḥ manda akṣi nimīlanena niśceṣṭaḥ
sarva indriya sammohāt suptam svapnaiḥ ca yuñjīta
vibodhaḥ nāma āhāra pariṇāma nidrā cheda svapna anta tīvra śabda śravaṇa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tam abhinayet jṛmbhaṇa akṣi parimardana śayana mokṣaṇa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra āryā bhavati
āhāra vipariṇāmāt śabda sparśa ādibhiḥ ca sambhūtaḥ
pratibodhaḥ tu abhineyaḥ jṛmbhaṇa vadana akṣi parimardaiḥ
amarṣaḥ nāma vidyā aiśvarya śaurya bala adhikaiḥ adhikṣiptasya avamānitasya vā samutpadyate
tam abhinayet śiraḥ kampana prasvedana adhomukha cintana dhyāna adhyavasāya upāya sahāya anveṣaṇa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra ślokau
ākṣiptānām sabhā madhye vidyā śaurya bala adhikaiḥ
nṝṇām utsāha saṃyogāt amarṣaḥ nāma jāyate
utsāha adhyavasāyābhyām adhomukha vicintanaiḥ
śiraḥ prakampa sveda ādyaiḥ tam prayuñjīta paṇḍitaḥ
avahittham nāma ākāra pracchādana ātmakam
tat ca lajā bhaya apajaya gaurava jaihmaya ādibhiḥ vibhāviḥ samutpadyate
tasya anyathā kathana avalokita kathā bhaṅga kṛtaka dhairya ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
atra ślokaḥ bhavati
dhārṣṭya jaihmya ādi sambhītam avahittham bhayatmakam
tat ca a gaṇanayā kāryam na atīva uttara bhāṣaṇāt
ugra tā caurya abhigrahāṇa nṛpa aparādha asat pralāpa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate
tām ca vadha bandhana tāḍana nirbhatsana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayet
atra āryā bhavati
caurya abhigrahana vaśāt nṛpa aparādhāt atha ugra tā bhavti
vadha bandha tāḍana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayaḥ tasyāḥ
bhavati ca atra ślokaḥ
nānā śātrā artha bodhena matiḥ saṃjāyate nṛṇām
śiṣya upadeśa artha kṛtaḥ tasyāḥ tu abhinayaḥ bhavet
vyādhiḥ nāma vāta pitta kapha sannipāta prabhavaḥ
tasya jvara ādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ
jvaraḥ tu dvividhaḥ sa śītaḥ sa dāhaḥ ca
tatra saśītaḥ nāma pravepita sarva aṅga upkampana nikuñcana agni abhilāṣa romāñca hanu valana nāsā vikūnana mukha śoṣaṇa paridevita ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhineyaḥ
sa dāhaḥ nāma vikṣipta aṅga kara caraṇa bhūmi abhilāṣa anulepana śīta abhilāṣa paridevana mukha śoṣa utkruṣṭa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
ye ca anye vyādhayaḥ te khalu mukha vikūṇana gātra stambha srasta akṣi niḥśvasana stanita utkruṣṭa vepana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhineyāḥ
atra ślokaḥ bhavati
samāsatas tu vyādhīnām kartavyaḥ bhinayaḥ budhaiḥ
srasta aṅga gātra vikṣepaiḥ tathā mukha vikūṇanaiḥ
unmādaḥ nāma iṣṭa jana viyoga vibhava nāśa abhighāta vāta pitta śleṣma prakopa ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate

tam animitta hasita rudita utkruṣṭa asambaddha pralāpa śayita upaviṣṭa utthita pradhāvita nṛtta gīta paṭhita bhasma pāṃsva vadhūlana tṛṇa nirmālya ku cela cīra ghaṭaka kapāla śarāva ābharaṇa dhāraṇa upabhogaiḥ anekaiḥ ca anavasthitaiḥ ceṣṭā anukaraṇa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayet
atra ārye bhavataḥ
iṣṭa jana vibhava nāśāt abhighātāt vāta pitta kapha kopāt
vividhāt citta vikārāt unmādaḥ nāma sambhavati
animitta rudita hasita upaviṣṭa gīta pradhāvita utkruṣṭaiḥ
anyaiḥ ca vikāraiḥ akṛtaiḥ unmādam samprayuñjīta
maraṇam nāma vyādhi jam abhighāta jañca
tatra yat āntra yakṛt śūla doṣa vaiṣamya gaṇḍa piṭaka jvara viṣūcikā ādibhiḥ utpadyate tat vyādhi prabhavam
abhighāta jam tu śastra ahi daṃśa viṣa pāna śvāpada gaja turaga ratha paśu yāna pāta vināśa prabhavam
etayoḥ abhinaya viśeṣān vakṣyāmaḥ
tatra vyādhi jam viṣaṇṇa gātra avyāyata aṅga viceṣṭita nimīlita nayana hikkā śvāsa upeta anavekṣita parijana avyakta akṣara kathana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ abhinayet
atra ślokaḥ bhavati
vyādhīnām eka bhāvaḥ hi maraṇa abhinayaḥ smṛtaḥ
viṣaṇṇa gātraiḥ niśceṣṭaiḥ indriayaiḥ ca vivarjitaḥ
abhighāta je tu nānā prakāra abhinaya viśeṣāḥ
śastra kṣata ahi daṣṭa viṣa pīta gaja ādi patita śvāpada hatāḥ

original: yathā tatra śastrakṣate tāvatsahasā bhūmipatanavepanasphuraṇādibhirabhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ /
analyzed: yathā tatra śastra kṣate tāvat sahasā bhūmi patana vepana sphuraṇa ādibhiḥ abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ
ahi daṣṭa viṣa pītayoḥ viṣa yogaḥ yathā kārśya vepathu vidāha hikkā phena skandhabhaṅga jaḍa tā maraṇāni iti aṣṭau viṣa vegāḥ
atra ślokau bhavataḥ

original: kārśyaṃ tu prathame vege dvitīye vepathurbhavet /
analyzed: kārśyam tu prathame vege dvitīye vepathuḥ bhavet

original: dāhaṃ tṛtīye hikkāṃ ca caturthe samprayojayet // BhN_7.87 //
analyzed: dāham tṛtīye hikkām ca caturthe samprayojayet
phenam ca pañcame kuryāt ṣaṣṭhe skandhasya bhañjanam

original: jaḍatāṃ saptame kuryādaṣṭame maraṇaṃ bhavet // BhN_7.88 //
analyzed: jaḍa tām saptame kuryāt aṣṭame maraṇam bhavet
atra āryā bhavati
śvāpada gaja turaga ratha udbhavam tu paśu yāna patana jam vā api
śāstra kṣata vat kuryāt anavekṣita gātra sañcāram
iti eva maraṇam jñeyam nānā avasthā antara ātmakam
prayoktavyam budhaiḥ samyak yathā bhava aṅga ceṣṭitaiḥ
trāsaḥ nāma vidyut ulkā aśani pāta nirghāta ambudhara mahāsattva paśu rava ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate
tam abhinayet saṃkṣipta aṅga utkampana vepathu stambha romāñca gadgada pralāpa ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra ślokaḥ bhavati
mahābhairava nāda dyaiḥ trāsaḥ samupajāyate
srasta aṅga akṣi nimeṣaiḥ ca tasya tu abhinayaḥ bhavet
vitarkaḥ nāma sandeha vimarśa vipratipatti ādibhiḥ vibhāvaiḥ utpadyate
tam abhinayet vividha vicārita praśna sampradhāraṇa mantra saṅgūhana ādibhiḥ anubhāvaiḥ
atra ślokaḥ bhavati
vicāraṇā ādi sambhūtaḥ sandeha atiśaya ātmakaḥ
vitarkaḥ saḥ bhineyaḥ tu śiraḥ bhrū kṣepa kampanaiḥ

original: evamete trayastriṃśadvyabhicāriṇo bhāvā deśakālāvasthānurūpyeṇāmagataparagatamadhyasthā uttamamadhyamādhamaiḥ strīpuṃsaiḥ svaprayogavaśādupapādyā  #
analyzed: evam ete trayastriṃśat vyabhicāriṇaḥ bhāvāḥ deśa kāla avasthā ānurūpyeṇa āma gata para gata madhya sthāḥ uttama madhyama adhamaiḥ strīpuṃsaiḥ sva prayoga vaśāt upapādyā  /
iti
trayastriṃśat ime bhāvāḥ vijñeyāḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ
sāttvikān tu punarbhāvān pravakṣyāmi anupūrvaśas
atra āha
kim anye bhāvāḥ sattvena vinā abhinīyante yasmāt ucyate
ete sāttvikāḥ iti
atrā ucyate
iha hi sattvam nāma manaḥ prabhavam
tat ca samāhita manaḥ tvāt ucyate
manasaḥ samādhau sattva niṣpattiḥ bhavati

original: tasya ca yo 'sau svabhāvo romāñcāśruvaivarṇyādilakṣaṇo yathābhāvopagataḥ sa na śakyo 'nyamanasā kartumiti /
analyzed: tasya ca yaḥ sau svabhāvaḥ romāñca aśru vaivarṇya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ yathā bhāva upagataḥ sa na śakyaḥ nyamanasā kartum iti
loka svabhāva anukaraṇa tvāt ca nāṭyasya sattvam īpsitam
kaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: iha hi nāṭyādharmipravṛttāḥ sukhaduḥkhakṛtā bhāvāstathā sattvaviśuddhāḥ kāryā yathā sarūpā bhavanti /
analyzed: iha hi nāṭya adharmi pravṛttāḥ sukha duḥkha kṛtāḥ bhāvāḥ tathā sattva viśuddhāḥ kāryāḥ yathā sarūpāḥ bhavanti

original: tatra duḥkhaṃ nāma rodanātmakaṃ tatkathamaduḥkhitena sukhaṃ ca praharṣātmakamasukhitena vābhineyam /
analyzed: tatra duḥkham nāma rodana ātmakam tat katham aduḥkhitena sukham ca praharṣa ātmakam asukhitena vā abhineyam

original: etadevāsya sattvaṃ yat duḥkhitena sukhitena vā'śruromāñcau darśiyitavyau iti kṛtvā sāttvikā bhāvā ityabhivyākhyātāḥ /
analyzed: etat eva asya sattvam yat duḥkhitena sukhitena vā aśru romāñcau iti kṛtvā sāttvikāḥ bhāvāḥ iti abhivyākhyātāḥ
te ime
stambhaḥ svedaḥ tha romāñcaḥ svarabhedaḥ tha vepathuḥ
vaivarṇyam aśru pralayaḥ iti aṣṭau sāttvikāḥ matāḥ
atra āryāḥ
tatra
krodha bhaya harṣa lajā duḥkha śrama roga tā apaghātebhyaḥ
vyāyāma klama dharmaiḥ svedaḥ sampīḍanāt ca eva
harṣa bhaya śoka vismaya viṣāda roṣa ādi sambhavaḥ stambhaḥ
śīta bhaya harṣa roṣa sparśa jarā roga jaḥ kampaḥ
ānanda amarṣābhyām dhūma añjana jṛmbhaṇāt bhayāt śokāt
animeṣa prekṣaṇataḥ śītāt rogāt bhavet aśru
śīta krodha bhaya śrama roga klama tāpa jam ca vaivarṇyam
sparśa bhaya śīta harṣāt krodhāt rogāt ca romāñcaḥ
svarabhedaḥ bhaya harṣa krodha jarā raukṣya roga mada janitaḥ
śrama mūrcha mada nidrā abhighāta moha ādibhiḥ pralayaḥ

original: evamete budhairjñeyā bhāvā hyaṣṭau tu sāttvikāḥ /
analyzed: evam ete budhaiḥ jñeyāḥ bhāvāḥ hi aṣṭau tu sāttvikāḥ
karma ca eṣām pravakṣyāmi rasa bhāva anubhāvakam
niḥsaṃjñaḥ niṣprakampaḥ ca sthitaḥ śūnya jaḍa ākṛtiḥ
skanna gātra tayā ca eva stambham tu abhinayet budhaḥ
vyajana grahaṇāt ca api sveda apanayanena ca
svedasya abhinayaḥ yojyaḥ tathā vāta abhilāṣataḥ
muhur kaṇṭikita tvena tathā ullukasanena ca

original: pulakena ca romāñcaṃ gātrasparśena darśayet // BhN_7.103 //
analyzed: pulakena ca romāñcam gātra sparśena darśayet
svarabhedaḥ bhinetavyaḥ bhinna gadgada nisvanaiḥ
vepanāt sphuraṇāt kampāt vepathum sampradarśayet
mukha varṇa parāvṛttyā nāḍī pīḍana yogataḥ
vaivarṇyam abhinetavyam prayatnāt tat hi duṣkaram
bāṣpa ambu pluta netra tvāt netra saṃmārjanena ca
muhur aśru kaṇā pātaiḥ asram tu abhinayet budhaḥ
niśceṣṭaḥ niṣprakampa tvāt avyakta śvasitāt api
mahīnipatanāt ca api pralaya abhinayaḥ bhavet
ekonapañcāśat ime yathāvat bhāvāḥ tri avasthāḥ gaditāḥ mayā iha

original: bhūyaśca ye yatra rase niyojyāstān śrotumarhanti ca vipramukhyāḥ // BhN_7.108 //
analyzed: bhūyas ca ye yatra rase niyojyāḥ tān śrotum arhanti ca vipra mukhyāḥ
atra ślokāḥ
śaṅkā vyādhiḥ tathā aglāniḥ cintā asūyā bhayam tathā
vismayaḥ ca vitarkaḥ ca stambhaḥ capala tā tathā
romāñca harṣau nidrā ca tathā unmāda madau api
svedaḥ ca eva avahittham ca pralayaḥ vepathuḥ tathā
viṣāda śrama nirvedāḥ garva āvegau dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
matiḥ mohaḥ vibodhaḥ ca suptam autsukya varjite

original: krodhāmarṣau ca hāsaśca śoko 'pasmāra eva ca /
analyzed: krodha amarṣau ca hāsaḥ ca śokaḥ upasmāraḥ eva ca

original: dainyaṃ ca maraṇaṃ caiva ratirutsāhasaṃyutā // BhN_7.108*4 //
analyzed: dainyam ca maraṇam ca eva ratiḥ utsāha saṃyutā
trāsa vaivarṇya ruditaiḥ svarabhedaḥ ca

original: jaḍatā ca tathā ṣaṭ ca catvāriṃśatprakīrtitāḥ] // BhN_7.108*5 //
analyzed: jaḍa tā ca tathā ṣaṭ ca catvāriṃśat prakīrtitāḥ
ālasya augrya jugupsā ākhyaiḥ evam bhāvaiḥ tu varjitāḥ

original: udbhāvayanti śṛṅgāraṃ sarve bhāvāḥ svasaṃjñayā // BhN_7.109 //
analyzed: udbhāvayanti śṛṅgāram sarve bhāvāḥ sva saṃjñayā
yathāvasaram ete hi sthāyi sañcāri sattva jāḥ
uddīpayanti śṛṅgāram rasam āsādya saṃjñitam

original: glāniḥ śaṅkā hyasūyā ca śramaścapalatā tathā /
analyzed: glāniḥ śaṅkā hi asūyā ca śramaḥ capala tā tathā

original: suptaṃ nidrāvahitthaṃ ca hāsye bhāvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // BhN_7.110 //
analyzed: suptam nidrā avahittham ca hāsye bhāvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: nirvedaścaiva cintā ca dainyaṃ glānyāsrameva ca
analyzed: nirvedaḥ ca eva cintā ca dainyam glānya asram eva ca

original: jaḍatā maraṇaṃ caiva vyādhiśca karuṇe smṛtāḥ // BhN_7.111 //
analyzed: jaḍa tā maraṇam ca eva vyādhiḥ ca karuṇe smṛtāḥ
sūyā mada utsāhau āvegaḥ marṣaḥ eva ca
krodhaḥ capalatā augryam ca vijñeyāḥ raudra sambhavāḥ
asammohaḥ tathā utsāhaḥ āvegaḥ harṣaḥ eva ca

original: matiścaiva tathogratvamamarṣo mada eva ca // BhN_7.113 //
analyzed: matiḥ ca eva tathā ugra tvam amarṣaḥ madaḥ eva ca
romāñcaḥ svarabhedaḥ ca sūyā dhṛtiḥ tathā

original: garvaścaiva vitarkaśca vīre bhāvā bhavanti hi // BhN_7.114 //
analyzed: garvaḥ ca eva vitarkaḥ ca vīre bhāvāḥ bhavanti hi
svedaḥ ca vepathuḥ ca eva romāñcaḥ gadgadaḥ tathā

original: trāsaśca maraṇaścaiava vaivarṇyaṃ ca bhayānake // BhN_7.115 //
analyzed: trāsaḥ ca vaivarṇyam ca bhayānake
apasmāraḥ tathā unmādaḥ viṣādaḥ madaḥ eva ca
mṛtyuḥ vyādhiḥ bhayam ca eva bhāvāḥ bībhatsa saṃśrayāḥ
stambhaḥ svedaḥ ca mohaḥ ca romāñcaḥ vismayaḥ tathā

original: āvego jaḍatā harṣo mūrchā caivādbhutāśrayāḥ // BhN_7.117 //
analyzed: āvegaḥ jaḍa tā harṣaḥ mūrchā ca eva adbhuta āśrayāḥ
ye tu ete sāttvikāḥ bhāvāḥ nānā abhinaya saṃśritāḥ

original: raseṣveteṣu sarve te jñeyā nāṭyaprayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_7.118 //
analyzed: raseṣu eteṣu sarve te jñeyāḥ nāṭya prayoktṛbhiḥ
na hi eka rasa jam kāvyam kiñcid asti prayogataḥ

original: bhāvo vāpi raso vāpi pravṛttirvṛttireva ca // BhN_7.119 //
analyzed: bhāvaḥ vā api rasaḥ vā api pravṛttiḥ vṛttiḥ eva ca
bahūnām samavetānām rūpam yasya bhavet bahu

original: sa mantavyo rasaḥ sthāyī śeṣāḥ sañcāriṇo matāḥ // BhN_7.119*1 //
analyzed: sa mantavyaḥ rasaḥ sthāyī śeṣāḥ sañcāriṇaḥ matāḥ

original: dīpayantaḥ pravartante ye punaḥ sthāyinaṃ rasam /
analyzed: dīpayantaḥ pravartante ye punar sthāyinam rasam

original: te tu sañcāriṇo jñeyāste hi sthāyitvamāgatāḥ // BhN_7.119*2 //
analyzed: te tu sañcāriṇaḥ jñeyāḥ te hi sthāyi tvam āgatāḥ
vibhāva anubhāva yutaḥ hi aṅga vastu samāśrayaḥ

original: saṃcāribhistu saṃyuktaḥ sthāyyeva tu raso bhavet // BhN_7.119*3 //
analyzed: saṃcāribhiḥ tu saṃyuktaḥ sthāyī eva tu rasaḥ bhavet
sthāyī sattva atirekeṇa prayoktavyaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
sañcārī ākāra mātreṇa sthāyī yasmāt avasthitaḥ
ye tu ete sāttvikāḥ bhāvāḥ nānā abhinaya yojitāḥ

original: raseṣveteṣu sarveṣu te jñeyā nāṭyakovidaiḥ // BhN_7.119*5 //
analyzed: raseṣu eteṣu sarveṣu te jñeyāḥ nāṭya kovidaiḥ
na hi eka rasa jam kāvyam na eka bhāva eka vṛttikam

original: vimarde rāgamāyāti prayuktaṃ hi prayatnataḥ // BhN_7.119*6 //
analyzed: vimarde rāgam āyāti prayuktam hi prayatnataḥ

original: bhāvā vā'pi rasā vā'pi pravṛttirvṛttireva vā /
analyzed: bhāvāḥ vā api rasāḥ vā api pravṛttiḥ vṛttiḥ eva vā
bībhatsa adbhuta śāntānām traividhyam na atra kathyate
ṣaṇṇām rasānām traividhyam nānā bhāva arasa anvitam
sattva prayojitaḥ hi arthaḥ virājate

original: viditvā hi virājante loke citraṃ hi durlabham] // BhN_7.119*8 //
analyzed: viditvā hi virājante loke citram hi durlabham
nānā bhāva artha saṃpannāḥ sthāyi sattva abhicāriṇaḥ

original: puṣpāvakīrṇāḥ kartavyāḥ kāvyeṣu hi rasā budhaiḥ // BhN_7.120 //
analyzed: puṣpa avakīrṇāḥ kartavyāḥ kāvyeṣu hi rasāḥ budhaiḥ

original: evaṃ rasāśca bhāvāśca vyavasthā nāṭake smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: evam rasāḥ ca bhāvāḥ ca vyavasthāḥ nāṭake smṛtāḥ
yaḥ evam etān jānāti sa gacchet siddhim uttamām

original: iti śrībhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre bhāvavyañjako nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre bhāvavyañjakaḥ nāma saptamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
aṣṭamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: bhāvānāṃ ca rasānāṃ ca samutthānaṃ yathākramam /

atra ślokau
abhi pūrvaḥ tu ṇīm dhātuḥ ābhimukhya artha nirṇaye

śākhā aṅga upāṅga saṃyuktaḥ tasmāt abhinayaḥ smṛtaḥ

nāṭyam hi asmin pratiṣṭhitam
āṅgikaḥ vācikaḥ ca eva hi āhāryaḥ sāttvikaḥ tathā
jñeyaḥ tu abhinayaḥ viprāḥ caturdhā parikalpitaḥ

śiraḥ hasta kaṭī dakṣaḥ pārśva pāda samanvitaḥ
aṅga pratyaṅga saṃyuktaḥ ṣaṣ aṅgaḥ nāṭya saṃgrahaḥ

original: dhṛtau harṣe salalitā smṛtau tarke ca tarkitā // BhN_8.93 //
analyzed: dhṛtau harṣe sa lalitā smṛtau tarke ca tarkitā
ālhā ādiṣu ardha mukulāḥ gandha sparśa sukha ādiṣu

original: vibhrāntā dṛṣṭirāvege sambhrame vibhrame tathā // BhN_8.94 //
analyzed: vibhrāntā dṛṣṭiḥ āvege sambhrame vibhrame tathā
viluptā capala unmāda duḥkha ārti maraṇa ādiṣu
ākekarāḥ durāloke viccheda preakṣiteṣu ca
vibodha garva āmarśa augrya matiṣu syāt vikośi tā

original: trastā trāse bhaved dṛṣṭirmadirā ca madeṣviti // BhN_8.96 //
analyzed: trastā trāse bhavet dṛṣṭiḥ madirā ca madeṣu iti
ṣaṭatriṃśat dṛṣṭayaḥ hi etāḥ yathāvat samudāhṛtāḥ

original: rasajānāṃ tu dṛṣṭīnāṃ bhāvajānāṃ tathaiava ca // BhN_8.97 //
analyzed: rasa jānām tu dṛṣṭīnām bhāva jānām ca
tārāpuṭa bhruvām karma gadataḥ me nibodhata
bhramaṇam valanam pātaḥ calanam sampraveśanam
vivartanam samudvṛttam niṣkrāmaḥ prākṛtam tathā
puṭa antar maṇḍala āvṛttiḥ tārayoḥ bhramaṇam smṛtam

original: valanaṃ gamanaṃ tryasraṃ pātanaṃ srastatā tathā /
analyzed: valanam gamanam tri asram pātanam srasta tā tathā
calanam kampanam jñeyam praveśaḥ ntaḥpraveśanam
vivartanam kaṭākṣaḥ tu samudvṛttam samunnatiḥ

original: niṣkrāmo nirgamaḥ proktaḥ prākṛtaṃ tu svabhāvajam // BhN_8.101 //
analyzed: niṣkrāmaḥ nirgamaḥ proktaḥ prākṛtam tu svabhāva jam
atha eṣām rasa bhāveṣu viniyogam nibodhata
bhramaṇam calana udvṛtte niṣkrāmaḥ vīra raudrayoḥ
niṣkrāmaṇam saṃvalanam kartavyam tu bhayānake
hāsya bībhatsayoḥ ca api praveśanam iha iṣyate
pātanam karuṇe kāryam niṣkrāmaṇam atha adbhute

original: prākṛtaṃ śeṣabhāveṣu śṛṅgāre ca vivartitam // BhN_8.104 //
analyzed: prākṛtam śeṣa bhāveṣu śṛṅgāre ca vivartitam
svabhāva siddham eva etat karmam loka kriyā āśrayam

original: evaṃ raseṣu bhāveṣu tārākarmāṇi yojayet // BhN_8.105 //
analyzed: evam raseṣu bhāveṣu tārā karmāṇi yojayet
atha atrā eva pravakṣyāmi darśanasya tu
samam sācaynuvṛtte ca hi ālokita vilokite
pralokita ullokite ca api avalokitam eva ca

original: samatāraṃ ca saumyaṃ ca yaddṛṣṭaṃ tat samaṃ smṛtam // BhN_8.107 //
analyzed: sama tāram ca saumyam ca yat dṛṣṭam tat samam smṛtam

original: pakṣmāntaragatatāraṃ ca tryasraṃ sācīkṛtaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: pakṣma antara gata tāram ca tri asram sācīkṛtam tu tat
rūpa nirvarṇanā yuktam anuvṛttam iti smṛtam
sahasā darśanam yat syāt tat ālokitam ucyate

original: vilokitaṃ pṛṣṭatastu pārśvābhyāṃ tu pralokitam // BhN_8.109 //
analyzed: vilokitam pṛṣṭatas tu pārśvābhyām tu pralokitam
ūrdhvam ullokitam jñeyam avalokitam api adhas
iti eṣu darśana vidhiḥ sarva bhāva rasa āśrayaḥ
puṭa karma nibodhata

original: unmeṣaśca nimeṣaśca prasṛtaṃ kuñcitaṃ samam // BhN_8.111 //
analyzed: unmeṣaḥ ca nimeṣaḥ ca prasṛtam kuñcitam samam
vivartitam sa sphuritam pihitam sa vitāḍitam

original: viśleṣaḥ puṭayoryastu sa tūnmeṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_8.112 //
analyzed: viśleṣaḥ puṭayoḥ yaḥ tu sa tu unmeṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
samāgamaḥ nimeṣaḥ syāt āyāmaḥ prasṛtam bhavet

original: āku~citaṃ kuñcitaṃ syāt samaṃ svābhāvikaṃ smṛtam // BhN_8.113 //
analyzed: ākucitam kuñcitam syāt samam svābhāvikam smṛtam
vivartitam samudvṛttam sphuritam spanditam tathā

original: sthagitaṃ pihitaṃ proktamāhataṃ tu vitāḍitam // BhN_8.114 //
analyzed: sthagitam pihitam proktam āhatam tu vitāḍitam
rasa bhāveṣu viniyogam nibodhata

original: krodhe vivartitaṃ kāryo nimeṣonmeṣaṇaiḥ saha // BhN_8.115 //
analyzed: krodhe vivartitam kāryaḥ nimeṣa unmeṣaṇaiḥ saha

original: vismayārtheṣu harṣe ca vīre ca prasṛtaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: vismaya artheṣu harṣe ca vīre ca prasṛtam smṛtam

original: aniṣṭadarśane gandhe rase sparśe ca kuñcitam // BhN_8.116 //
analyzed: aniṣṭa darśane gandhe rase sparśe ca kuñcitam

original: śṛṅgāre ca samaṃ kāryamīrṣyāsu sphuritaṃ tathā /
analyzed: śṛṅgāre ca samam kāryam īrṣyāsu sphuritam tathā
supta mūrcchita vāta uṣṇa dhūma varṣa añjana ārtiṣu
netra roge ca pihitam abhighāte vitāḍitam
iti evam rasa bhāveṣu tārakā puṭayoḥ vidhiḥ
kārya anugatam asya eva bhruvoḥ karma nibodhata

original: utkṣepaḥ pātanaścaiva bhrukuṭī caturaṃ bhruvoḥ // BhN_8.119 //
analyzed: utkṣepaḥ pātanaḥ ca eva bhrukuṭī caturam bhruvoḥ

original: kuñcitaṃ recitaṃ caiva sahajaṃ ceti saptadhā /
analyzed: kuñcitam recitam ca eva sahajam ca iti saptadhā
bhruvoḥ unnatiḥ utkṣepaḥ samam ekaikaśas vā
anena eva krameṇa eva pātanam syāt adhomukham
bhruvoḥ mūla samutkṣepāt bhrukuṭī parikīrtitā
caturam kicid ucchvāsāt madhura āyatayā bhruvoḥ
ekasyāḥ ubhayoḥ vā api mṛdu bhaṅgaḥ tu kuñcitam
ekasyāḥ eva lalitāt utkṣepāt recitam bhruvaḥ

original: sahajātaṃ tu sahajaṃ karma svābhāvikaṃ smṛtam // BhN_8.123 //
analyzed: sahajātam tu sahajam karma svābhāvikam smṛtam
atha eṣām sampravakṣyāmi rasa bhāva prayojanam

original: kope vitarke helāyāṃ līlādau sahaje tathā // BhN_8.124 //
analyzed: kope vitarke helāyām līlā ādau sahaje tathā
śravaṇe darśane ca eva bhruvam ekām samutkṣipet

original: utkṣepo vismaye harṣe roṣe caiava dvayorapi // BhN_8.125 //
analyzed: utkṣepaḥ vismaye harṣe roṣe dvayoḥ api
āsūyita jugupsāyām hāsye ghrāṇe ca pātanam

original: krodhasthāneṣu dīpteṣu yojayet bhrukuṭiṃ budhaḥ // BhN_8.126 //
analyzed: krodha sthāneṣu dīpteṣu yojayet bhrukuṭim budhaḥ

original: śṛṅgāre lalite saumye sukhe sparśe prabodhane /
analyzed: śṛṅgāre lalite saumye sukhe sparśe prabodhane

original: evaṃ vidheṣu bhāveṣu caturaṃ tu prayojayet // BhN_8.127 //
analyzed: evaṃvidheṣu bhāveṣu caturam tu prayojayet
strī puruṣayoḥ ca saṃlāpe nānā avasthā antara ātmake
moṭṭāyite kuṭṭamite vilāse kilakiñcite

original: nikuñcitaṃ tu kartavyaṃ nṛtte yojyaṃ tu recitam /
analyzed: nikuñcitam tu kartavyam nṛtte yojyam tu recitam

original: anāviddheṣu bhāveṣu vidyāt svābhāvikaṃ budhaḥ // BhN_8.129 //
analyzed: an āviddheṣu bhāveṣu vidyāt svābhāvikam budhaḥ

original: ityevaṃ tu bhruvaḥ proktaṃ nāsākarma nibodhata /
analyzed: iti evam tu bhruvaḥ proktam nāsā karma nibodhata

original: natā mandā vikṛṣṭā ca socchvāsā ca vikūṇitā // BhN_8.130 //
analyzed: natā mandā vikṛṣṭā ca sa ucchvāsā ca vikūṇitā

original: svābhāvikā ceti budhaiḥ ṣaḍvidhā nāsikā smṛtā /
analyzed: svābhāvikā ca iti budhaiḥ ṣaḍvidhā nāsikā smṛtā

original: natā muhuḥśliṣṭapuṭā mandā tu nibhṛtā smṛtā // BhN_8.131 //
analyzed: natā muhur śliṣṭa puṭā mandā tu nibhṛtā smṛtā
vikṛṣṭa utphullita puṭā sa ucchvāsā kṛṣṭa mārutā

original: vikūṇitā saṃkucitā samā svābhāvikā smṛtā // BhN_8.132 //
analyzed: vikūṇitā saṃkucitā samā svābhāvikā smṛtā
nāsikā lakṣaṇam hi etat viniyogam nibodhata
mada utkampa samāyukte nārīṇām anurodhane

original: niḥśvāse ca natā kāryā nāsikā nāṭyayoktṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: niḥśvāse ca natā kāryā nāsikā nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ

original: vicchinnamandarudite socchvāse ca natā smṛtā // BhN_8.134 //
analyzed: vicchinna manda rudite sa ucchvāse ca natā smṛtā
nirvega autsukya cintāsu mandā śoke ca yojayet

original: tīvragandhe vikṛṣṭāṃ tau raudre vīre tathaiva ca // BhN_8.135 //
analyzed: tīvra gandhe vikṛṣṭām tau raudre vīre tathā eva ca
iṣṭa ghrāṇe tathā ucchvāse dīrgha ucchvāsām prayojayet
vikūṇitā ca kartavyā jugupsāyām asūyā ādiṣu

original: kāryā śeṣu bhāveṣu tajñaiḥ svābhāvikā tathā /
analyzed: kāryā śeṣu bhāveṣu svābhāvikā tathā

original: kṣāmaṃ phullaṃ ca ghūrṇaṃ ca kampitaṃ kuñcitaṃ samam // BhN_8.137 //
analyzed: kṣāmam phullam ca ghūrṇam ca kampitam kuñcitam samam
ṣaḍvidham gaṇḍam uddiṣṭam tasya lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: kṣāmaṃ cāvanataṃ jñeyaṃ phullaṃ vikasitaṃ bhavet // BhN_8.138 //
analyzed: kṣāmam ca avanatam jñeyam phullam vikasitam bhavet
vitatam ghūrṇam atra uktam kampitam sphuritam bhavet

original: syāt kuñcitaṃ saṃkuñcitaṃ samaṃ prākṛtamucyate // BhN_8.139 //
analyzed: syāt kuñcitam saṃkuñcitam samam prākṛtam ucyate
gaṇḍayoḥ lakṣaṇam proktam viniyogam nibodhata

original: kṣāmaṃ duḥkheṣu kartavyaṃ praharṣe phullameva ca // BhN_8.140 //
analyzed: kṣāmam duḥkheṣu kartavyam praharṣe phullam eva ca
pūrṇam utsāha garveṣu romaharṣeṣu kampitam

original: kuñcitaṃ ca saromāñcaṃ sparśe śīte bhaye jvare // BhN_8.141 //
analyzed: kuñcitam ca sa romāñcam sparśe śīte bhaye jvare
prākṛtam śeṣa bhāveṣu gaṇḍakarma bhavet iti

original: vivartanaṃ kampanaṃ ca visargo vinigūhanam // BhN_8.142 //
analyzed: vivartanam kampanam ca visargaḥ vinigūhanam

original: sandaṣṭakaṃ samudgaṃ ca ṣaṭ karmāṇyadharasya tu /
analyzed: sandaṣṭakam samudgam ca ṣaḍ karmāṇi adharasya tu

original: vikūṇitaṃ vivartastu vepanaṃ kampanaṃ smṛtam // BhN_8.143 //
analyzed: vikūṇitam vivartaḥ tu vepanam kampanam smṛtam
viniṣkrāmaḥ visargaḥ tu praveśaḥ vinigūhanam
sandaṣṭakam dvijaiardaṣṭam samudgaḥ sahaja unnati
iti oṣṭha lakṣaṇam proktam viniyogam nibodhata
asūyā vedanā avajñā bhaya ādiṣu vivartanam
kampanam vepanam śīta bhaya roṣa java ādiṣu

original: strīaṇāṃ vilāse vivvoke visargo rañjane tathā // BhN_8.146 //
analyzed: vilāse visargaḥ rañjane tathā
vinigūhanam āyāse sandaṣṭam krodha karmasu
samudgaḥ tu anukampāyām cumbane ca abhinandane
iti oṣṭha karmāṇi uktāni cibukasya nibodhata

original: kuṭṭanaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ chinnaṃ cukkitaṃ lehanaṃ samam // BhN_8.148 //
analyzed: kuṭṭanam khaṇḍanam chinnam cukkitam lehanam samam

original: daṣṭaṃ ca dantakriyayā cibukaṃ tviha lakṣyate /
analyzed: daṣṭam ca danta kriyayā cibukam tu iha lakṣyate

original: kuṭṭanaṃ dantasaṃgharṣaḥ saṃsphoṭaḥ khaṇḍanaṃ muhuḥ // BhN_8.149 //
analyzed: kuṭṭanam danta saṃgharṣaḥ saṃsphoṭaḥ khaṇḍanam muhur
chinnam tu gāḍha saṃśleṣaḥ cukkitam dūra vicyutiḥ

original: lehanaṃ jihvayā lehaḥ kiñcit śleṣaḥ samaṃ bhavet // BhN_8.150 //
analyzed: lehanam jihvayā lehaḥ kiñcid śleṣaḥ samam bhavet
dantaiḥ daṣṭe dhare daṣṭam iti eṣām viniyojanam
bhaya śītajvara krodha grastānām kuṭṭanam bhavet
japa adhyayana saṃlāpa bhakṣya yoge ca khaṇḍanam

original: chinnaṃ vyādhau bhaye śīte vyāyāme rudite mṛte // BhN_8.152 //
analyzed: chinnam vyādhau bhaye śīte vyāyāme rudite mṛte

original: jṛmbhaṇe cukkitaṃ kāryaṃ tathā lehye ca lehanam /
analyzed: jṛmbhaṇe cukkitam kāryam tathā lehye ca lehanam
samam svabhāva bhāveṣu sandaṣṭam krodha karmasu
iti danta uṣṭha jihvānām karaṇāt cibuka kriyā

original: vidhutaṃ vinivṛttaṃ ca nirbhugnaṃ bhugnameva ca // BhN_8.154 //
analyzed: vidhutam vinivṛttam ca nirbhugnam bhugnam eva ca
vivṛtam ca tathā udvāhi karmāṇi atra āsya jāni tu
vyāvṛttam vinivṛttam syāt vidhutam tiryak āyatam
avāṅmukha tvam nirbhugnam vyābhugnam kiñcid āyatam
viśliṣṭa uṣṭham ca vivṛtam udvāhi utkṣiptam eva ca
vinivṛttam asūyāyām īrṣyā krodha kṛtena ca

original: avajñāvivṛtādau ca strīṇā kāryā prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_8.157 //
analyzed: avajñā vivṛta ādau ca strīṇā kāryā prayoktṛbhiḥ
vidhutam vāraṇe ca eva na evam iti evamādiṣu
nirbhugnam ca api vijñeyam gambhīra ālokana ādiṣu

original: bhugnaṃ lajānvite yojyaṃ yatīnāṃ tu svabhāvajam /
analyzed: bhugnam lajā anvite yojyam yatīnām tu svabhāva jam
nirveda autsukya cintāsu naye ca vinimantraṇe
vivṛttam ca api vijñeyam hāsya śoka bhaya ādiṣu
strīṇām udvāhi līlāyām garve gacchati anādare

original: eva nāmeti kāryaṃ ca kopavākye vicakṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: eva nāma iti kāryam ca kopa vākye vicakṣaṇaiḥ
samam sāci anuvṛtta ādi yat ca dṛṣṭi vikalpitam
tad jñaiḥ tena anusāreṇa kāryam tad anugam mukham
atha atas mukha rāgaḥ tu caturdhā parikīrtitaḥ
svābhāvikaḥ prasannaḥ ca raktaḥ śyāmaḥ rtha saṃśrayaḥ
svābhāvikaḥ tu kartavyaḥ svabhāva abhinaya āśrayaḥ
madhyastha ādiṣu bhāveṣu mukha rāgaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
prasannaḥ tu adbhute kāryaḥ hāsya śṛṅgārayoḥ tathā
vīra raudra mada ādyeṣu raktaḥ syāt karuṇe tathā

original: bhayānake sabībhatse śyāmaṃ sañjāyate mukham // BhN_8.1655 //
analyzed: bhayānake sa bībhatse śyāmam sañjāyate mukham
evam bhāva rasa artheṣu mukha rāgam prayojayet
śākhā aṅga upāṅga saṃyuktaḥ kṛtaḥ pi abhinayaḥ śubhaḥ
mukha rāga vihīnaḥ tu na eva śobhā anvitaḥ bhavet
śarīra abhinayaḥ mukha rāga samnvitaḥ
dviguṇām labhate śobhām rātrau iva niśākaraḥ
nayana abhinayaḥ syāt nānā bhāva rasa asphuṭaḥ
mukha rāga anvitaḥ yasmāt nāṭyam atra pratiṣṭhitam
yathā netram prasarpeta mukha bhū dṛṣṭi saṃyutam
tathā bhāva rasa upetam mukha rāgam prayojayet
iti evam mukha rāgaḥ tu proktaḥ bhāva rasa āśrayaḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi grīvākarmāṇi vai dvijāḥ /
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi grīvā karmāṇi vai dvijāḥ

original: samā natonnatā tryasrā recitā kuñcitāñcitā // BhN_8.171 //
analyzed: samā nata unnatā tri asrā recitā kuñcitā āñcitā

original: valitā ca nivṛttā ca grīvā navavidhārthataḥ /
analyzed: valitā ca nivṛttā ca grīvā navavidhā arthataḥ
samā svābhāvikī
natā natā asya alaṅkāra bandhe kaṇṭha avalambane
unnata abhyunnata mukhī grīvā ca ūrdhva niveśane
tri asrā pārśva gatā jñeyā skandhabhāre duḥkhite
recitāḥ vidhuta bhrāntāḥ hāve matha nṛttayoḥ
kuñcita ākuñcite mūrdhni dhārite gala rakṣaṇe
añcita apasṛta udbandha keśa karṣa ūrdhva darśane
pārśva unmukhī syāt valitā grīvā bhedaiḥ ca vīkṣaṇe
nivṛtā abhimukhībhūtā sva sthāna abhimukha ādiṣu
ityādi loka bhāva arthāḥ grīvā bhaṅgaiḥ anekadhā

original: grīvākarmāṇi sarvāṇi śiraḥ karmānugāni hi // BhN_8.177 //
analyzed: grīvā karmāṇi sarvāṇi śiraḥ karma anugāni hi
śirasaḥ karmaṇaḥ karma grīvāyāḥ sampravartate
iti etat lakṣaṇam proktam śīrṣa upāṅga samāśrayam

original: aṅgakarmāṇi śeṣāṇi gadato me nibodhata // BhN_8.179 //
analyzed: aṅga karmāṇi śeṣāṇi gadataḥ me nibodhata

original: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāśtre upāṅgavidhānaṃ nāma aṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāśtre upāṅgavidhānam nāma aṣṭamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha navamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
evam etat śiraḥ netra bhru nāsā uṣṭha kapola jam
karma lakṣaṇa saṃyaktam upāṅgānām mayā uditam
hasta ūra pārśva jaṭhara kaṭī jaṅghā ūru pādataḥ

original: lakṣaṇaṃ sampravakṣyāmi viniyogaṃ ca tattvataḥ // BhN_9.2 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam sampravakṣyāmi viniyogam ca tattvataḥ
hasta ādīnām pravakṣyāmi karma nāṭya prayojakam

original: yathā yenābhineyaṃ ca tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // BhN_9.3 //
analyzed: yathā yena abhineyam ca tat me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
patākaḥ tri patākaḥ ca tathā vai kartarīmukhaḥ
ardhacandraḥ hi arālaḥ ca śukatuṇḍaḥ tathā eva ca
muṣṭiḥ ca śikhara ākhyaḥ ca kapitthaḥ khaṭakāmukhaḥ

original: sūcyāsyaḥ padmakośaśca tathā vai sarpaśīrṣakaḥ // BhN_9.5 //
analyzed: sūcyāsyaḥ padmakośaḥ ca tathā vai sarpaśīrṣakaḥ
mṛgaśīrṣaḥ paraḥ jñeyaḥ hasta abhinaya yoktṛbhiḥ
caturaḥ bhramaraḥ tathā
haṃsāsyaḥ haṃsapakṣaḥ ca sandaṃśaḥ mukulaḥ tathā
ūrṇanābhaḥ tāmracūḍa caturviṃśatiḥ īritāḥ
asaṃyutāḥ saṃyutāḥ ca gadataḥ me nibodhata
añjaliḥ ca kapotaḥ ca karkaṭaḥ svastikaḥ tathā
khaṭakā vardhamānaḥ ca hi utsaṃgaḥ niṣadhaḥ tathā

original: dolaḥ puṣpapuṭaścaiva tathā makara eva ca // BhN_9.9 //
analyzed: dolaḥ puṣpapuṭaḥ ca eva tathā makaraḥ eva ca
gajadantaḥ vahitthaḥ ca vardhamānaḥ tathā eva ca

original: ete tu saṃyutā hastā mayā proktāstrayodaśa // BhN_9.10 //
analyzed: ete tu saṃyutāḥ hastāḥ mayā proktāḥ trayodaśa
nṛtta hastān atas ca ūrdhva gadataḥ me nibodhata

original: caturasrau tathodvṛttau tathā talamukhau smṛtau // BhN_9.11 //
analyzed: catur asrau tathā udvṛttau tathā tala mukhau smṛtau
svastikau viprakīrṇau ca api arāla khaṭakā mukhau
āviddha vakrau sūci āsyau recitau ardha recitau

original: uttānāvañcitau vāpi pallavau ca tathā karau /
analyzed: uttānau añcitau vā api pallavau ca tathā karau

original: nitambau cāpi vijñeyau keśabandhau tathaiva ca // BhN_9.13 //
analyzed: nitambau ca api vijñeyau keśabandhau tathā eva ca

original: samproktau karihastau ca latākhyau ca tathaiva ca /
analyzed: samproktau kari hastau ca lata ākhyau ca tathā eva ca
pakṣa vañcitakau ca eva pakṣa pradyotakau tathā

original: jñeyo garuḍapakṣau ca haṃsapakṣau tathaiva ca /
analyzed: jñeyaḥ garuḍa pakṣau ca haṃsa pakṣau tathā eva ca
ūrdhva maṇḍalinau ca eva pārśva maṇḍalinau tathā
uraḥ maṇḍalinau ca eva uraḥ pārśva ardha maṇḍalau
muṣṭika svastikau ca api nalinī padma kośakau
alapadmau ulbanau ca lalitau valitau tathā
saptaṣaṣṭi karāḥ hi ete nāmataḥ bhihitāḥ mayā
yathā lakṣaṇam eteṣām karmāṇi ca nibodhata

original: prasāritāḥ samāḥ sarvā yasyāṅgulyo bhavanti hi /
analyzed: prasāritāḥ samāḥ sarvāḥ yasya aṅgulyaḥ bhavanti hi

original: kuñcitaśca tathāṅguṣṭhaḥ sa patāka iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_9.18 //
analyzed: kuñcitaḥ ca tathā aṅguṣṭhaḥ sa patākaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: eṣa prahārapāte pratāpana nodane praharṣe ca /
analyzed: eṣa prahāra pāte pratāpana nodane praharṣe ca
garve pi aham iti tad jñaiḥ lalāṭa deśa utthitaḥ kāryaḥ
eṣaḥ gni varṣa dhārā nirūpaṇe puṣpa vṛṣṭi patane ca
saṃyuta karaṇaḥ kāryaḥ pravirala calita aṅguliḥ hastaḥ
svastika vicyuti karaṇāt pallava puṣpa upahāra śaṣpāṇi

original: viracitamurvīsaṃsthaṃ yad dravya tacca nirddeśyam // BhN_9.21 //
analyzed: yat tat ca nirddeśyam
svastika vicyuti karaṇāt punar eva adhomukhena kartavyam

original: saṃvṛtavivṛtaṃ pālyaṃ channaṃ nibiḍaṃ ca gopyaṃ ca // BhN_9.22 //
analyzed: saṃvṛta vivṛtam pālyam channam nibiḍam ca gopyam ca
asya eva ca aṅgulībhiḥ adhomukha prasthita utthita calābhiḥ
vāyu ūrmi vega velā kṣobhaḥ ca oghaḥ ca kartavyaḥ
utsāhanam bahu tathā mahā jana prāṃśu puṣkara prahatam
pakṣa utkṣepa abhinayam recaka karaṇena ca abhinayet

original: parighṛṣṭatalasthena tu dhautaṃ mṛditaṃ pramṛṣṭapiṣṭe ca /
analyzed: parighṛṣṭa tala sthena tu dhautam mṛditam pramṛṣṭapiṣṭe ca
punar eva śaila dhāraṇam udghāṭanam eva ca abhinayet
evam eṣa prayoktavyaḥ strīpuṃsa abhinaye karaḥ
patākābhyām tu hastābhyām abhineyaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
daśa ākhyaḥ ca śata ākhyaḥ ca sahasra ākhyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi tripatākasya lakṣaṇam // BhN_9.27 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi tripatākasya lakṣaṇam
patāke tu yadā vakrā anāmikā tu aṅguliḥ bhavet

original: tripatākaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ karma cāsya nibodhata // BhN_9.28 //
analyzed: tripatākaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ karma ca asya nibodhata
āvāhanam avataraṇam visarjanam vāraṇam praveśaḥ ca

original: unnāmanaṃ praṇāmo nidarśanaṃ vividhavacanaṃ ca // BhN_9.29 //
analyzed: unnāmanam praṇāmaḥ nidarśanam vividha vacanam ca
maṅgalya dravyāṇām sparśaḥ sanniveśaḥ ca
uṣṇīṣa mukuṭa dhāraṇam nāsā āsya śrotra saṃvaraṇam
asya eva ca aṅgulībhyām adhomukha prasthita utthita calābhyām
laghu pavana srotaḥ bhujaga bhramara ādikān kuryāt
aśru pramārjane tilaka viracanam rocanayā ālambhakam ca
tri patākā anāmikayā sparśanam alakasya kāryam ca
svastikau tri patākau tu gurūṇām pāda vandane
vicyutau calita avasthau kāryau udvāha darśane
paraspara agra saṃśliṣṭau kartavyau nṛpa darśane

original: tiryak svastikasmbaddhau syātāṃ tau grahadarśane // BhN_9.34 //
analyzed: tiryak svastika smbaddhau syātām tau graha darśane
tapasvi darśane kāryau ūrdhvau ca api parāṅmukhau
paraspara abhimukhau ca kartavyau vara darśane
uttāna adhomukhau kāryau agre vaktrasya saṃsthitau
vaḍavā anala saṅgrāma makarāṇām ca darśane
vānara plavana ūrmayaḥ
pavanaḥ ca striyaḥ ca eva nāṭye nāṭya vicakṣaṇaiḥ
saṃmukha prasṛta aṅguṣṭhaḥ kāryaḥ bāla indu darśane

original: parāṅgmukhastu kartavyo yāne nṛṇāṃ prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_9.38 //
analyzed: parāṅgmukhaḥ tu kartavyaḥ yāne nṛṇām prayoktṛbhiḥ
tripatāke yadā haste bhavet pṛṣṭha avalokanī
tarjanī madhyamāyāḥ ca tadā asau kartarī mukhaḥ
pathi caraṇa racana rañjana raṅgaṇa karaṇāni adhomukhena eva

original: ūrdhvamukhena tu kuryāt daṣṭaṃ śṛṅgaṃ ca lekhyaṃ ca // BhN_9.40 //
analyzed: ūrdhva mukhena tu kuryāt daṣṭam śṛṅgam ca lekhyam ca
nyastam
bhinna valitena kuryāt kartari āsya aṅguli mukhena

original: saṃyutakaraṇo va syādasaṃyuto vā prayujyate tajjñaiḥ /
analyzed: saṃyuta karaṇaḥ syāt asaṃyutaḥ vā prayujyate tad jñaiḥ
ruru camara mahiṣa sura gaja vṛṣa gopura śaila śikhareṣu
yasya aṅgulyaḥ tu vinatāḥ saha aṅguṣṭhena cāpa vat

original: so 'rdhacandro hi vijñeyaḥ karaḥ karmāsya vakṣyate // BhN_9.43 //
analyzed: saḥ ṛdhacandraḥ hi vijñeyaḥ karaḥ karma asya vakṣyate
etena bāla taravaḥ śaśi lekhā ambu kalaśa valayāni

original: nirghāṭanamāyastaṃ madhyaupamyaṃ ca pīnaṃ ca // BhN_9.44 //
analyzed: nirghāṭanam āyastam madhya aupamyam ca pīnam ca
raśanā jaghana kaṭīnām ānana tala patra kuṇḍala ādīnām
kartavyaḥ nārīṇām abhinaya yogaḥ ṛdhacandreṇa
ādyā dhanuḥ natā kāryā kuñcita aṅguṣṭhakaḥ tathā
śeṣāḥ bhinna ūrdhva valitāḥ hi arāle ṅgulayaḥ kare
etena sattva śauṇḍīrya vīrya dhṛti kānti divya gāmbhīyram

original: āśīrvādāśca tathā bhāvā hitasaṃjñakāḥ kāryāḥ // BhN_9.47 //
analyzed: āśīrvādāḥ ca tathā bhāvāḥ hita saṃjñakāḥ kāryāḥ
etena punar strīṇām keśānām saṃgraha utkarṣau

original: sarvāṅgikaṃ tathaiva ca nirvarṇanamātmanaḥ kāryam // BhN_9.48 //
analyzed: sarva āṅgikam tathā eva ca nirvarṇanam ātmanaḥ kāryam
kautuka vivāha yogam pradakṣiṇena eva saṃprayogam ca
aṅguli agra svastika yogān parimaṇḍalena eva

original: prādkṣiṇya parimaṇḍalaṃ ca kuryān mahājanaṃ caiva /
analyzed: prādkṣiṇya parimaṇḍalam ca kuryāt mahājanam ca eva

original: yacca mahītalaracitaṃ dravyaṃ taccābhineyaṃ syāt // BhN_9.50 //
analyzed: yat ca mahī tala racitam dravyam tat ca abhineyam syāt
āhvāne ca nivāraṇa nirmāṇe ca api aneka vacane ca

original: svedasyā cāpanayane gandhāghrāṇe śubhaḥ śubhe caiṣa // BhN_9.51 //
analyzed: svedasya ā ca apanayane gandha āghrāṇe śubhaḥ śubhe ca eṣa
tri patāka hasta jāni tu pūrvam yāni abhihitāni karmāṇi

original: tāni tvarālayogāt strībhiḥ samyak prayojyāni // BhN_9.52 //
analyzed: tāni tvarāla yogāt strībhiḥ samyak prayojyāni
arālasya yadā vakrā anāmikā tu aṅguliḥ bhavet

original: śukatuṇḍastu sa karaḥ karma cāsya nibodhata // BhN_9.53 //
analyzed: śukatuṇḍaḥ tu sa karaḥ karma ca asya nibodhata

original: etena tvabhineyaṃ nāhaṃ na tvaṃ na kṛtyamiti cārye /
analyzed: etena tu abhineyam na aham na tvam na kṛtyam iti ca ārye

original: āvāhane visarge dhigiti vacane ca sāvajñam // BhN_9.54 //
analyzed: āvāhane visarge dhik iti vacane ca sa avajñam
aṅgulyaḥ yasya hastasya tala madhye gra saṃsthitāḥ

original: tāsāmupari cāṅguṣṭhaḥ saḥ muṣṭiriti saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_9.55 //
analyzed: tāsām upari ca aṅguṣṭhaḥ saḥ muṣṭiḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ

original: eṣa prahāre vyāyāme nirgame pīḍane tathā /
analyzed: eṣa prahāre vyāyāme nirgame pīḍane tathā
saṃvāhane si yaṣṭīnām kunta daṇḍa grahe tathā
asya eva tu yadā muṣṭeḥ ūrdhva uṅguṣṭhaḥ prayujyate

original: hastaḥ sa śikharo nāma tadā jñeyaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_9.57 //
analyzed: hastaḥ sa śikharaḥ nāma tadā jñeyaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
raśmi kuśa aṅkuśa dhanuṣām tomara śakti pramokṣaṇe ca eva
adhara uṣṭha pāda rañjanam alakasya utkṣepaṇam ca eva
asya eva śikhara ākhyasya hi aṅguṣṭhaka nipīḍitā

original: yadā pradeśinī vakrā sa kapitthastadā smṛtaḥ // BhN_9.59 //
analyzed: yadā pradeśinī vakrā sa kapitthaḥ tadā smṛtaḥ
asi cāpa cakra tomara kunta gadā śakti vajra bāṇāni

original: śastrāṇyabhineyāni tu kāryaṃ satyaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca // BhN_9.60 //
analyzed: śastrāṇi abhineyāni tu kāryam satyam ca pathyam ca
utkṣipta vakrā tu yadā anāmikā sa kanīyasī

original: asyaiva tu kapitthasya tadāso khaṭakāmukhaḥ // BhN_9.61 //
analyzed: asya eva tu kapitthasya khaṭakāmukhaḥ
hotram havyam chatram pragraha parikarṣaṇam vyajanakam ca

original: ādarśadhāraṇaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ tathā peṣaṇaṃ caiva // BhN_9.62 //
analyzed: ādarśa dhāraṇam khaṇḍanam tathā peṣaṇam ca eva
āyata daṇḍa grahaṇam muktā prālamba saṃgraham ca eva
sraj dāma puṣpa mālā vastra anta ālambanam ca eva
manmatha śarāva karṣṇa puṣpa vacaya pratoda kāryāṇi
aṅkuśa rajva ākarṣaṇa strī darśanam eva kāryam ca
khaṭaka ākhye yadā haste tarjanī samprasāritā

original: hastaḥ sūcīmukho nāma tadā jñeyaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_9.65 //
analyzed: hastaḥ sūcīmukhaḥ nāma tadā jñeyaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: asya vividhān yogān vakṣyāmi samāsataḥ pradeśinyāḥ /
analyzed: asya vividhān yogān vakṣyāmi samāsatas pradeśinyāḥ
ūrdhva nata lola kampita vijṛṃbhita udvāhita calāyāḥ
cakram taḍit patākā mañjaryaḥ karṇa cūlikāḥ ca eva
kuṭilagatayaḥ ca sarve nirdeśyāḥ sādhuvādāḥ ca
bāla uraga balya vadhū padīpa vallī latā śikhaṇḍāḥ ca
paripatana vakra maṇḍalam abhineyāni ūrdhva lolitayā
vadana āmyāse kuñcita vijṛmbhitā vākya rūpaṇe kāryā
bhūyas ca ūrdhva viracitā tārā ghoṇā eka daṇḍa yaṣṭiṣu ca

original: vinatāḥ ca punaḥ kāryā daṃṣṭriṣu ca tathāsyayogena // BhN_9.69 //
analyzed: vinatāḥ ca punar kāryāḥ daṃṣṭriṣu ca tathā āsya yogena

original: praṇatontee ca kārye hyādye dīrghe ca divase ca // BhN_9.70 //
analyzed: ca kārye hi ādye dīrghe ca divase ca
śravaṇa abhyāse vakrā vijṛmbhaṇā vākya rūpaṇa avasare

original: meti vadeti ca yojyā prasāritotkampitottānā // BhN_9.71 //
analyzed: mā iti vada iti ca yojyā prasārita utkampita uttānā
kāryā rova darśana sveda rūpaṇe ca eva
kuntala kuṇḍala aṅgada gaṇḍa āśraye bhinaya

original: garve 'hamiti lalāṭe ripudarśane tathaiva ca krodhe /
analyzed: garve ham iti lalāṭe ripu darśane tathā eva ca krodhe
nirdeśe karṇa kaṇḍu nayane ca eva

original: saṃyuktā saṃyoge kāryā viśleṣitā viyoge ca /
analyzed: saṃyuktā saṃyoge kāryā viśleṣitā viyoge ca
kalahe svastika yupatām paraspara utpīḍitāḥ bandhe
dvābhyām tu vā ātma pārśve dakṣiṇatas nina niśā avasānāni
abhimukha parāṅmukhābhyām viśliṣṭābhyām prayuñjīta
punar api ca bhramita agra rūpā śilāvarta yantra śaileṣu

original: pariveṣaṇe tathaiva hi kāryā cādhomukhī nityam // BhN_9.76 //
analyzed: pariveṣaṇe tathā eva hi kāryā ca adhomukhī nityam
śliṣṭā lalāṭa paṭṭeṣu adhomukhī śambhu rūpaṇe
śakasya api uttānā tad jñaiḥ tiryak sthitā kāryā
dvābhyām sandarśayet nityam sampūrṇa candra maṇḍalam

original: śliṣṭā lalāṭe śakrasya kāryā hyuttānasaṃśrayā // BhN_9.78 //
analyzed: śliṣṭā lalāṭe śakrasya kāryā hi uttāna saṃśrayā
parimaṇḍalam bhramita tayā maṇḍalam ādarśayet ca candrasya
hara nayane ca lalāṭe śakrasya pyuk uttānā
yasya aṅgulyaḥ tu vitatāḥ saha aṅguṣṭhena kuñcitāḥ

original: ūrdhvā hyasaṃgatāgrāśca sa bhavet padmakośakaḥ // BhN_9.80 //
analyzed: ūrdhvāḥ hi asaṃgata agrāḥ ca sa bhavet padma kośakaḥ
bilva kapittha phalānām grahaṇe kuca darśanaḥ ca nārīṇām

original: grahaṇe hyāmiṣalābhe bhavanti tāḥ kuñcitāgrāstu // BhN_9.81 //
analyzed: grahaṇe hi āmiṣa lābhe bhavanti tāḥ kuñcita agrāḥ tu
bahu jāti bījapūrakam āmiṣa khaṇḍam ca nirdeśyam
deva arcana bali haraṇe samudgake sāgra piṇḍa dāne ca
kāryaḥ puṣpa prakaraḥ ca padma kośena hastena
maṇibandhana viśliṣṭābhyām pravirala calita aṅguli karābhyām
kāryaḥ vivartitābhyām vikasita kamala utpala a vinayaḥ

original: aṅgulyaḥ saṃhatāḥ sarvāḥ sahāṅguṣṭhena yasya ca /
analyzed: aṅgulyaḥ saṃhatāḥ sarvāḥ saha aṅguṣṭhena yasya ca

original: tathā nimnatalaścaiva sa tu sarpaśirāḥ karaḥ // BhN_9.84 //
analyzed: tathā nimna talaḥ ca eva sa tu sarpa śirāḥ karaḥ
eṣaḥ salila pradāne bhuja gatau toya secane ca eva
āsphoṭane ca yojyaḥ kari kumbha āsphālana ādyeṣu
adhomukhīnām sarvāsām aṅgulīnām samāgamaḥ
sa bhavet mṛgaśīrṣakaḥ
iha sāmpratam asti adya śakteḥ ca ullāsane kṣapāte ca

original: svedāpamārjaneṣu ca kuṭṭamite pracalitastu bhavet // BhN_9.87 //
analyzed: sveda apamārjaneṣu ca kuṭṭa mite pracalitaḥ tu bhavet
tretāgni saṃsthitā madhyā tarjanyā aṅguṣṭhakā yadā
nāmikā vakrā yadāḥ ca ūrdhvā kanīyasī
etena taruṇa phalāni nānāvidhāni ca laghūni
kāryāni roṣa jāni strī vacāni aṅguli kṣepaiḥ
marakata vaidūrya ādeḥ pradarśanam sumanasām ca kartavyam
grāhyam marālapadam iti tad jñaiḥ eva prayogeṣu
āvartitāḥ kara tale yasya aṅgulyaḥ bhavanti hi
pārśva āgata vikīrṇāḥ ca sa bhavet alapallavaḥ
pratiṣedha kṛte yojyaḥ kasya tvat na asti śūnya vacaneṣu
punar ātma upanyāsaḥ strīṇām etena kartavyaḥ

original: tisraḥ prasāritā yatra tathā cordhvā kanīyasī /
analyzed: tisraḥ prasāritāḥ yatra tathā ca ūrdhvā kanīyasī

original: tāsāṃ madhye sthitoṅguṣṭhaḥ sa karaścaturasmṛtaḥ // BhN_9.93 //
analyzed: tāsām madhye sthita uṅguṣṭhaḥ sa karaḥ catura smṛtaḥ
naya vinaya niyama su nituṇa bāla ātura satya kaitava artheṣu

original: vākye yukte pathye satye praśame ca viniyojyaḥ // BhN_9.94 //
analyzed: vākye yukte pathye satye praśame ca viniyojyaḥ
ekena dvābhyām vā kiñcid maṇḍala kṛtena hastena
vikṛta vicārita caritam vitarkitam lajjitam ca eva
nayana aupamyam padma dala rūpaṇam hariṇa karṇa nirdeśaḥ
saṃyuta karaṇena eva tu careṇa etāni kurvīta

original: līlā ratī ruci ca smṛtibuddhivibhāvanāḥ kṣamāṃ puṣṭiṃ ca /
analyzed: līlā ratī ruci ca smṛti buddhi vibhāvanāḥ kṣamām puṣṭim ca

original: sañjñāmātraṃ praṇayaṃ vicāraṇaṃ saṅgataṃ śaucam // BhN_9.97 //
analyzed: sañjñā mātram praṇayam vicāraṇam saṅga tam śaucam

original: cāturyaṃ mādhuryaṃ dākṣiṇyaṃ mārdavaṃ sukhaṃ śīlam /
analyzed: cāturyam mādhuryam dākṣiṇyam mārdavam sukham śīlam

original: praśnaṃ vārtāyuktiṃ veṣaṃ mṛduśādvalaṃ stokam // BhN_9.98 //
analyzed: praśnam vārtā yuktim veṣam mṛdu śādvalam stokam

original: vibhavāvibhau surataṃ guṇāguṇau yauvanaṃ gṛhān dārān /
analyzed: vibhava avibhau suratam guṇa aguṇau yauvanam gṛhān dārān
nānā varṇāḥ ca tathā catureṇa evam prayuñjīta

original: sitamūrdhvena tu kuryāt raktaṃ pītaṃ ca maṇḍalakṛtena /
analyzed: sitam ūrdhvena tu kuryāt raktam pītam ca maṇḍala kṛtena

original: parimuditena tu nīlaṃ varṇāścatureṇa hastena // BhN_9.100 //
analyzed: parimuditena tu nīlam varṇāḥ catureṇa hastena
madhyamāṅguṣṭha sandaṃśaḥ vakrā ca eva pradeśinī

original: ūrdhvamanye prakīrṇe ca dvyaṅgulyau bhramare kare // BhN_9.101 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam anye prakīrṇe ca dvi aṅgulyau bhramare kare
padma utpala kumudānām anyeṣām ca eva dīrghavṛntānām
puṣpāṇām grahaṇa vidhiḥ kartavyaḥ karṇa puraḥ ca
vicyutaḥ ca sa śabdaḥ ca kāryaḥ nirbhatsana ādiṣu

original: bālālāpe ca śīghre ca tāle viśvāsane tathā // BhN_9.103 //
analyzed: bāla ālāpe ca śīghre ca tāle viśvāsane tathā
tarjanī madhyamā aṅguṣṭhāḥ tretāgni sthāḥ nirantarāḥ
bhaveyuḥ haṃsa vaktrasya śeṣe dve samprasārite
ślakṣṇa alpa śithila lāghava nissāra arthe mṛdu tva yogeṣu
kāryaḥ bhinaya viśeṣaḥ kiñcid prasyandita agreṇa
samāḥ prasāritāḥ tisraḥ tathā ca ūrdhvā kanīyasī

original: aṅguṣṭhaḥ kuñcitaścaiva haṃsapakṣa iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_9.106 //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhaḥ kuñcitaḥ ca eva haṃsapakṣaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: eṣa ca nivāpasalile dātavye gaṇḍasaṃśraye caiva /
analyzed: eṣa ca nivāpa salile dātavye gaṇḍa saṃśraye ca eva
kāryaḥ pratigraha ācamana bhojana artheṣu viprāṇām
āliṅgane mahā stambha darśane roma harṣaṇe ca eva
sparśe nulepana arthe yojyaḥ saṃvāhane ca eva
punar eva ca nārīṇām stanāntara sthena vibhrama viśeṣāḥ

original: kāryā yathārasaṃ syurduḥkhe hanudhāraṇe caiva // BhN_9.109 //
analyzed: kāryāḥ yathārasam syuḥ duḥkhe hanu dhāraṇe ca eva
tarjanī aṅguṣṭha sandaṃśaḥ tu hi arālasya yathā bhavet

original: ābhugnatalamadhyasthaḥ sa sandaṃśa iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_9.110 //
analyzed: ābhugna tala madhya sthaḥ sa sandaṃśaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
sandaṃśaḥ trividhaḥ hi agra jaḥ mukha jaḥ tathā
tathā pārśva gataḥ ca eva rasa bhāva upabṛṃhitaḥ
puṣpa apacaya grathane grahaṇe tṛṇa parṇa keśa sūtrāṇām
śalya avayava grahaṇa apakarṣaṇe ca agra sandaṃśaḥ
vṛntāt puṣpa uddharaṇam varti śalākā ādi pūraṇam

original: dhigiti ca vacanaṃ roṣe mukhasandaṃśasya karmāṇi // BhN_9.113 //
analyzed: dhik iti ca vacanam roṣe mukha sandaṃśasya karmāṇi
yajñopavīta dhāraṇa vedhana guṇa sūkṣma bāṇa lakṣyeṣu

original: yoge dhyāne stoke saṃyuktakaraṇastu kartavyaḥ // BhN_9.114 //
analyzed: yoge dhyāne stoke saṃyukta karaṇaḥ tu kartavyaḥ
peśala kutsā asūyā doṣa vacane ca vāma hastena
kiñcid vivartita kara agraḥ prayujyate pārśvasandaṃśaḥ
ālekhya netra rañjana vitarkavanta pravāla racane ca

original: niṣpīḍanaṃ tathālaktakasya kārya ca nārībhiḥ // BhN_9.116 //
analyzed: niṣpīḍanam tathā alaktakasya ca nārībhiḥ
samāgata agrāḥ sahitāḥ yasya aṅgulyaḥ bhavanti hi

original: ūrdhvā haṃsamukhasyeva sa bhavenmukulaḥ karaḥ // BhN_9.117 //
analyzed: ūrdhvā haṃsa mukhasya iva sa bhavet mukulaḥ karaḥ
deva arccana bali karaṇe padma utpala kumuda rūpaṇe ca eva

original: viṭacumbane ca kāryo vikutsite viprakīrṇaśca // BhN_9.118 //
analyzed: viṭa cumbane ca kāryaḥ vikutsite viprakīrṇaḥ ca
bhojana hiraṇya gaṇanā mukha saṃkoca pradāna śīghreṣu

original: mukulitakusumeṣu ca tathā tajjñaireṣa prayoktavyaḥ // BhN_9.119 //
analyzed: mukulita kusumeṣu ca tathā tad jñaiḥ eṣa prayoktavyaḥ
padmakośasya hastasya hi aṅgulyaḥ kuñcitāḥ yadā
ūrṇanābhaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ keśa caurya graha ādiṣu
śiraḥ kaṇḍūyane ca eva kuṣṭha vyādhi nirūpaṇe
saṃha vyāghreṣu abhinayaḥ prastara grahaṇe tathā
madhyamāṅguṣṭha sandaṃśaḥ vakrā ca eva pradeśinī
śeṣe tala sthe kartavye tāmra cūla kare ṅgulī
vicyutaḥ ca sa śabdaḥ ca kāryaḥ nirbhatsana ādiṣu

original: tāle viśvasane caiva śīghrārthe saṃjñiteṣu ca // BhN_9.123 //
analyzed: tāle viśvasane ca eva śīghra arthe saṃjñiteṣu ca

original: tathā kalāsu kāṣṭhāsu nimeṣe tu kṣaṇe tathā /
analyzed: tathā kalāsu kāṣṭhāsu nimeṣe tu kṣaṇe tathā

original: eśa eva karaḥ kāryo bālālāpanimantraṇe // BhN_9.124 //
analyzed: eśaḥ eva karaḥ kāryaḥ bāla ālāpa nimantraṇe
athavā aṅgulyaḥ saṃhitāḥ vakrāḥ upari uṅguṣṭha pīḍitāḥ

original: prasāritā kanīṣṭhāca tāmracūḍaḥ karaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhN_9.125 //
analyzed: prasāritā tāmracūḍaḥ karaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: śataṃ sahasraṃ lakṣaṃ ca kareṇaikena yojayet /
analyzed: śatam sahasram lakṣam ca kareṇa ekena yojayet
kṣipra mukta aṅgulībhiḥ tu sphuliṅgān vipruṣaḥ tathā

original: asaṃyutāḥ karā hyete mayā proktā dvijottamāḥ /
analyzed: asaṃyutāḥ karāḥ hi ete mayā proktāḥ dvijottamāḥ

original: ataśca saṃyutān hastān gadato me nibodhata // BhN_9.127 //
analyzed: atas ca saṃyutān hastān gadataḥ me nibodhata
patākābhyām tu hastābhyām saṃśleṣāt añjaliḥ smṛtaḥ

original: devatānāṃ gurūṇāṃ ca mitrāṇāṃ cābhivādane // BhN_9.128 //
analyzed: devatānām gurūṇām ca mitrāṇām ca abhivādane
sthānāni asya punar trīṇi vakṣaḥ vaktram śiraḥ tathā
devatānām śiraḥ sthaḥ tu gurūṇām āsya saṃsthitaḥ

original: vakṣasthaścaiva mitrāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ tvaniyato bhavet // BhN_9.129 //
analyzed: vakṣa sthaḥ ca eva mitrāṇām strīṇām tu aniyataḥ bhavet
ubhābhyām api hastābhyām anyaḥ pārśva saṃgrahāt

original: hastaḥ kapotako nāma karma cāsya nibodhata // BhN_9.130 //
analyzed: hastaḥ kapotakaḥ nāma karma ca asya nibodhata
eṣa vinaya abhyupagame praṇāma karaṇe guroḥ ca sambhāṣe

original: śīte bhaye ca kāryo vakṣaḥsthaḥ kampitaḥ strībhiḥ // BhN_9.131 //
analyzed: śīte bhaye ca kāryaḥ vakṣaḥ sthaḥ kampitaḥ strībhiḥ
ayam eva aṅguli parighṛṣyamāṇa muktaḥ tu khinna vākyeṣu

original: etāvaditi ca kāryo nedānīṃ kṛtyamiti cārthe // BhN_9.132 //
analyzed: etāvat iti ca kāryaḥ na idānīm kṛtyam iti ca arthe
aṅgulyaḥ yasya hastasya hi anyonya antara nissṛtāḥ

original: sa karkaṭa iti jñeyaḥ karaḥ karma ca vakṣyate // BhN_9.133 //
analyzed: sa karkaṭaḥ iti jñeyaḥ karaḥ karma ca vakṣyate
eṣa madana aṅgamarde supta utthita vijṛmbhaṇe bṛhat dehe
hanu dhāraṇe ca yojyaḥ śaṅkha grahaṇe rtha tattva jñaiḥ
maṇibandha vinyastau arālau strī prayojitau
uttānau vāma pārśva sthau svastikaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: svastikavicyuitikaraṇād diśo ghanāḥ khaṃ vanaṃ samudrāśca /
analyzed: svastika vicyuiti karaṇāt diśaḥ ghanāḥ kham vanam samudrāḥ ca

original: ṛtavo mahī tathaughaṃ vistīrṇaṃ cābhineyaṃ syāt // BhN_9.136 //
analyzed: ṛtavaḥ mahī tathā ogham vistīrṇam ca abhineyam syāt
khaṭakaḥ khaṭake nyastaḥ khaṭakāvardhamānakaḥ

original: śṛṅgārārtheṣu yoktavyaḥ praṇāmakaraṇe tathā // BhN_9.137 // anye
analyzed: śṛṅgāra artheṣu yoktavyaḥ praṇāma karaṇe tathā anye
kumudī tālavṛnteṣu kartavyaḥ chatra dharaṇe iti
arālau tu viparyastau uttānau vardhamānakau

original: utsaṅga iti vijñeyaḥ sparśasya grahaṇe karaḥ // BhN_9.139 //
analyzed: utsaṅgaḥ iti vijñeyaḥ sparśasya grahaṇe karaḥ
sa niṣpeṣa kṛte ca eva roma amarṣa kṛte ca
niṣpīḍitaḥ punar ca eva strīṇām īrṣyā kṛte bhavet

original: mukulaṃ tu yadā hastaṃ kapitthaḥ pariceṣṭayet /
analyzed: mukulam tu yadā hastam kapitthaḥ pariceṣṭayet

original: sa mantavyastadā hasto niṣadhau nāma nāmataḥ // BhN_9.141 //
analyzed: sa mantavyaḥ tadā hastaḥ niṣadhau nāma nāmataḥ

original: saṃgrahaparigrahau dhāraṇaṃ ca samayaśca satyavacanaṃ ca /
analyzed: saṃgraha parigrahau dhāraṇam ca samayaḥ ca satya vacanam ca
saṅkṣepaḥ saṃkṣiptam nipīḍitena abhinetavyam
śikharaḥ tu yadā hastaḥ mṛgaśīrṣeṇa pīḍitaḥ

original: niṣadho nāma vijñeyaḥ sa bhayārte vidhīyate // BhN_9.143 //
analyzed: niṣadhaḥ nāma vijñeyaḥ sa bhaya ārte vidhīyate
gṛhītvā vāma hastena karpura abhyantare bhujam

original: dakṣiṇaṃ cāpi vāmasya karpurābhyantare nyaset // BhN_9.144 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇam ca api vāmasya karpura abhyantare nyaset

original: sa cāpi dakṣiṇo hastaḥ samyaṅ muṣṭīkṛto bhavet /
analyzed: sa ca api dakṣiṇaḥ hastaḥ samyak muṣṭīkṛtaḥ bhavet

original: ityeṣa niṣadho hastaḥ karma cāsya nibodhata // BhN_9.145 //
analyzed: iti eṣa niṣadhaḥ hastaḥ karma ca asya nibodhata
etena dhairya mada garva sauṣṭhava autsukya vikrama āṭopāḥ
abhimāna avaṣṭambhaḥ stambha sthairya ādayaḥ kāryāḥ

original: jñeyo vai niṣadho nāma haṃsapakṣau parāṅgamukhau /
analyzed: jñeyaḥ vai niṣadhaḥ nāma haṃsa pakṣau para aṅga mukhau
jālavātāyana ādīnām prayoktavyaḥ bhighaṭṭane

original: aṃsau praśithilau muktau patākau tu pralambitau /
analyzed: aṃsau praśithilau muktau patākau tu pralambitau

original: yadā bhavetāṃ karaṇe sa dola iti saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_9.148 //
analyzed: yadā bhavetām karaṇe sa dolaḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
saṃbhrama viṣāda mūrcchita mada abhighāte tathā eva ca āvege

original: vyādhiplute ca śastrakṣate ca kāryo 'bhinayogaḥ // BhN_9.149 //
analyzed: vyādhi plute ca śastra kṣate ca kāryaḥ bhina yogaḥ
yaḥ tu sarpaśirāḥ proktaḥ tasya aṅguli nirantaraḥ

original: dvitīyaḥ pārśvasaṃśliṣṭaḥ sa tu puṣpapuṭaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhN_9.150 //
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ pārśva saṃśliṣṭaḥ sa tu puṣpapuṭaḥ smṛtaḥ
dhānya phala puṣpa sadṛśāni anena nānāvidhāni yuktāni
grāhyāṇi upaneyāni ca toya ānayana apanayane ca
patākau tu yadā hastau ūrrdhā aṅguṣṭhau adhomukhau

original: uparyupari vinyastau tadā sa makaraḥ karaḥ // BhN_9.152 //
analyzed: upari upari vinyastau tadā sa makaraḥ karaḥ
siṃha vyāla dvipi pradarśanam nakra makara matsyānām
ye ca anye kravyādāḥ hi abhineyāḥ te rtha yogena
kūrpara aṃsa ucitau hastau yadā āstām sarpa śīrṣakau

original: gajadantaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ karma cāsya nibodhata // BhN_9.154 //
analyzed: gaja dantaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ karma ca asya nibodhata
eva ca vadhu varāṇam udvāhe ca ati bhāra yoge ca

original: staṃbhagrahaṇe ca tathā śailaśilotpāṭane caiva // BhN_9.155 //
analyzed: staṃbha grahaṇe ca tathā śaila śilā utpāṭane ca eva
śukatuṇḍau karau kṛtvā vakṣasi abhimukha āñcitau
śanais adhomukha āviddhau saḥ vahitthaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: daurbalye niḥśvasite gātrāṇāṃ darśane tanutve ca /
analyzed: daurbalye niḥśvasite gātrāṇām darśane tanu tve ca
utkaṇṭhite ca tad jñaiḥ abhinaya yogaḥ tu kartavyaḥ
mukulaḥ tu yadā hastaḥ kapittha pariveṣṭitaḥ

original: vardhamānaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ karma cāsya nibodhata // BhN_9.158 //
