analyzed: vardhamānaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ karma ca asya nibodhata

original: saṃgrahaparigrahau dhāraṇaṃ ca samayaśca satyavacaṃ ca /
analyzed: saṃgraha parigrahau dhāraṇam ca samayaḥ ca satyavacam ca
saṃkṣepataḥ tu saṃkṣiptam nipīḍitena abhinetavyam
jñeyaḥ vai vardhamānaḥ tu para aṅga mukhau
jālavātāyana ādīnām prayoktavyaḥ vighāṭane

original: uktā hyete dvividhā hyasaṃyutāḥ saṃyutāśca saṃkṣepāt /
analyzed: uktāḥ hi ete dvividhāḥ hi asaṃyutāḥ saṃyutāḥ ca saṃkṣepāt

original: abhinayakarāstu ye tviha te 'nyatrāpyarthataḥ sādhyāḥ // BhN_9.161 //
analyzed: abhinaya karāḥ tu ye tu iha te nyatra api arthataḥ sādhyāḥ
ākṛtyā ceṣṭayā cihnaiḥ jātyā vijñāya tat punar

original: svayaṃ vitarkya kartavyaṃ hastābhinayanaṃ budhaiḥ // BhN_9.162 //
analyzed: svayam vitarkya kartavyam hasta abhinayanam budhaiḥ
na asti kaścid ahastaḥ tu nāṭye rthaḥ bhinayam prati

original: yasya yad dṛśyate rūpaṃ bahuśastanmayoṣitam // BhN_9.163 //
analyzed: yasya yat dṛśyate rūpam bahuśas tat mayā uṣitam
anye ca api artha saṃyuktāḥ laukikāḥ ye karāḥ tu iha
chandataḥ te niyoktavyāḥ rasa bhāva viceṣṭitaiḥ
deśam kālam prayogam ca api artha yuktim avekṣya ca

original: hastā hyete prayoktavyāḥ nṛṇāṃ strīṇāṃ viśeṣataḥ // BhN_9.165 //
analyzed: hastāḥ hi ete prayoktavyāḥ nṛṇām strīṇām viśeṣataḥ

original: sarveṣāmeva hastānāṃ yāni karmāṇi santi hi /
analyzed: sarveṣām eva hastānām yāni karmāṇi santi hi
tāni aham saṃpravakṣyāmi rasa bhāva kṛtāni tu
utkarṣaṇam vikarṣaṇam tathā ca eva apakarṣaṇam
parigrahaḥ nigrahaḥ ca āhvānam nodanam eva ca
saṃśleṣaḥ ca viyogaḥ ca rakṣaṇam mokṣaṇam tathā
vikṣepa dhūnane ca eva visargaḥ tarjanam tathā

original: chedanaṃ bhedanaṃ caiva sphoṭanaṃ moṭanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: chedanam bhedanam ca eva sphoṭanam moṭanam tathā

original: tāḍanaṃ ceti vijñeyaṃ tajjñaiḥ karma karān prati // BhN_9.169 //
analyzed: tāḍanam ca iti vijñeyam tad jñaiḥ karma karān prati
uttānaḥ pārśva gaḥ ca eva tathā adhomukhaḥ eva ca
hasta pracāraḥ trividhaḥ nāṭya tattva samāśrayaḥ
sarve hasta pracārāḥ ca prayogeṣu yathā vidhiḥ
netra bhrū mukha rāgaiḥ ca kartavyā budhaiḥ

original: karaṇaṃ karma sthānaṃ pracāyuktiṃ kriyāṃ ca saṃprekṣya /
analyzed: karaṇam karma sthānam pracā yuktim kriyām ca saṃprekṣya
hasta abhinaya tajjñaiḥ kāryaḥ loka upacāreṇa
uttāmānām karāḥ kāryāḥ lalāṭa kṣetra cāriṇaḥ
vakṣaḥsthāḥ ca eva madhyānām adhamām adhas gatā
jyeṣṭhe su alpa pracārāḥ syuḥ madhye madhya vicāriṇaḥ

original: adhameṣu prakīrṇāśca hastāḥ kāryā prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_9.174 //
analyzed: adhameṣu prakīrṇāḥ ca hastāḥ kāryā prayoktṛbhiḥ
lakṣaṇa vyañjitāḥ hastāḥ kāryāḥ tu uttama madhyamaiḥ
loka kriyā svabhāvena nīcaiḥ api artha saṃśrayāḥ
athavā anyādṛśam prāpya prayogam kālam eva ca

original: viparītāśrayā hastāḥ prayoktavyā budhairna vā // BhN_9.176 //
analyzed: viparīta āśrayāḥ hastāḥ prayoktavyāḥ budhaiḥ na vā
viṣaṇṇe mūrcchite bhīte jugupsā śoka pīḍite

original: glāne svapne vihaste ca niśceṣṭe tandrite jaḍe // BhN_9.177 //
analyzed: glāne svapne vihaste ca niśceṣṭe tandrite jaḍe
vyādhi graste jarā ārte ca bhaya ārte śīta viplute

original: matte pramatte conmatte cintāyāṃ tapasi sthite // BhN_9.178 //
analyzed: matte pramatte ca unmatte cintāyām tapasi sthite
hima varṣa hate baddhe variṇā plava saṃśrite

original: svapnāyite ca saṃbhrānte natasaṃsphoṭane tathā // BhN_9.179 //
analyzed: svapnāyite ca saṃbhrānte nata saṃsphoṭane tathā

original: na hastābhinayaḥ kāryaḥ kāryaḥ sattvasya saṃgrahaḥ /
analyzed: na hasta abhinayaḥ kāryaḥ kāryaḥ sattvasya saṃgrahaḥ
tathā kāku viśeṣaḥ ca nānā bhava rasa anvitaḥ
yatra vyagrau ubhau hastau tat tat dṛṣṭi vilokanaiḥ
vācaka abhinayam kuryāt virāma airtha darśakaiḥ
uttānaḥ pārśva gaḥ ca eva tathā adhomukhaḥ eva ca
pracāraḥ trividhaḥ ṅgānām nāṭya nṛtta samāśrayaḥ
uttānaḥ vartulaḥ tri aśraḥ sthitaḥ dhomukhaḥ eva ca
pañca prakārāḥ hastasya nāṭya nṛtta samāśrayāḥ
evam jñeyāḥ karāḥ hi ete na abhinaya saṃśritāḥ

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi hastān nṛttasamāśrayān // BhN_9.184 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi hastān nṛtta samāśrayān
vakṣasoḥ ṣṭa aṅgula sthau tu prāc mukhau khaṭakā mukhau
samāna kūrpara aṃsau tu catur asrau prakīrtitau
haṃsa pakṣa kṛtau hastau vyāvṛtau tālavṛnta vat
udvṛttau iti vijñeyau athavā tālavṛntakau
catur astra sthitau hastau haṃsa pakṣa kṛtau tathā
tiryak sthitau ca abhimukhau jñeyau tāla mukhau iti
tau eva maṇibandha ante svastika ākṛti saṃsthitau
svastikau iti vikhyātau vicyutau viprakīrṇakau
alapallava saṃsthānau urdhva āsyau padma kośakau
arāla khaṭaka ākhyau ca api arāla khaṭakā mukhau
maṇibandha ante hi arālau vicyutau ubhau
jñeyau prayoktṛbhiḥ nitya marāla khaṭakau iti
bhuja aṃsa kūrpara agraiḥ tu kuṭila āvartitau karau
para aṅga mukha tala āviddhau jñeyau āviddha vakrakau
hastau tu sarpa śirasau madhyamā aṅguṣṭhakau yadā

original: tiryakprasāritāsyau ca tadā sūcīmukhau smṛtau // BhN_9.192 //
analyzed: tiryak prasārita āsyau ca tadā sūcīmukhau smṛtau
sarpa śīrṣau yadā hastau bhavetām svastika sthitau
madhya prasārita aṅguṣṭhau jñeyau sūcīmukhau tadā
recitau ca api vijñeyau haṃsa pakṣau druta bhramau
prasārita uttāna talau recitau iti saṃjñitau
catur asraḥ bhavet vāmaḥ savya hastaḥ ca recitaḥ
vijñeyau nṛtta tattva jñaiḥ dharā cita saṃjñakau

original: añcitau kūrparāṃsau tu tripatākau karau kṛtau /
analyzed: añcitau kūrpara aṃsau tu tri patākau karau kṛtau
kiñcid tiryak gatau etau smṛtau uttana vañcitau
maṇibandha muktau tu patākau pallavau smṛtau
bāhu śīrṣāt viniṣkrāntau nitambau iti kīrtitau
keśa deśāt viniṣkrāntau paripārśva utthitau yadā
keśa bandhau tu karava ācārya sammatau
tiryak prasāritau ca eva pārśva saṃsthau tathā eva ca

original: latākhyau ca karau jñeyau nṛttābhinayanaṃ prati // BhN_9.199 //
analyzed: latā ākhyau ca karau jñeyau nṛtta abhinayanam prati
samunnataḥ latā hastaḥ pārśvāt pārśva vilolitaḥ
tripatāko paraḥ karṇe kari hastaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
kaṭi śīrṣa niviṣṭa agrau tri patākau yadā karau

original: pakṣavañcitakau hastau tadā jñeyau prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_9.201 //
analyzed: pakṣa vañcitakau hastau tadā jñeyau prayoktṛbhiḥ
tau eva tu parāvṛttau pakṣa pradyotakau smṛtau
adhomukha tala āviddhau jñeyau garuḍa pakṣakau
haṃsa pakṣa kṛtau hastau vyāvṛtta parivartitau
tathā prasārita bhujau daṇḍa pakṣau iti smṛtau
ūrdhva maṇḍalinau hastau ūrdhva deśa vivartanāt
tau eva pārśva vinyastau pārśva maṇḍalinau smṛtau
udveṣṭitau bhavet ekau dvitīyaḥ ca apaveṣṭitaḥ
bhramitau urasaḥ sthāne hi uraḥ maṇḍalinau smṛtau
ala pallava kāra alāvu rodva bhramaṇa kramāt
pārśvāvartaḥ ca vijñeyau uraḥ pārśva ardha maṇḍalau
hastau tu maṇībandha ante kuñcitau añcitau yadā

original: khaṭakākhyau tu tau syātāṃ muṣṭikasvastikau tadā // BhN_9.207 //
analyzed: khaṭaka ākhyau tu tau syātām muṣṭika svastikau tadā
padma kośau yadā hastau vyāvṛtta parivartitau

original: nalinīpadmakośau tu tadā jñeyau prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_9.208 //
analyzed: nalinī padmakośau tu tadā jñeyau prayoktṛbhiḥ
karau udveṣṭita agrau tu pravidhāya āla pallavau
ūrdhvaprasarita āviddhau kartavyau ulbaṇau iti

original: pallavau ca śirodeśe saṃprāptau lalitau smṛtau /
analyzed: pallavau ca śiraḥ deśe saṃprāptau lalitau smṛtau
karpūra svastika gatau latā ākhyau valitau iti
karaṇe tu prayoktavyaḥ nṛtta hastaḥ viśeṣataḥ
tathā artha abhinaye ca eva patākāyāḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
bhavet teṣām prayogaḥ rtha vaśāt punar

original: prādhānyena punaḥ saṃjñā nāṭye nṛtte kareṣviha // BhN_9.212 //
analyzed: prādhānyena punar saṃjñā nāṭye nṛtte kareṣu iha
viyutāḥ saṃyutāḥ ca eva nṛtta hastāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi karān karaṇasaṃśrayān // BhN_9.213 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi karān karaṇa saṃśrayān
sarveṣām eva hastānām nāṭya hasta nideśibhiḥ

original: vidhātavyā prayatnena karaṇaṃ tu caturvidham // BhN_9.214 //
analyzed: vidhātavyā prayatnena karaṇam tu caturvidham
apaveṣṭitam ekam syāt udveṣṭitam atha aparam

original: vyāvartitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu caturthaṃ parivartitam // BhN_9.215 //
analyzed: vyāvartitam tṛtīyam tu caturtham parivartitam
āveṣṭyante yat aṅgulyaḥ tarjana ādyāḥ yathākramam
abhyantareṇa karaṇam tat āveṣṭitam ucyate
udveṣṭyante yat aṅgulyaḥ tarjanī ādyāḥ bahis mukham
kramaśas karaṇam viprāḥ tat udveṣṭitam ucyate
āvartyante kaniṣṭhā ādyāḥ hi aṅgulyaḥ bhyantareṇa tu

original: yathā krameṇa karaṇaṃ tad vyāvartitamucyate // BhN_9.218 //
analyzed: yathā krameṇa karaṇam tat vyāvartitam ucyate
udvartyante kaniṣṭha ādyāḥ bāhyatas kramaśas yadā
aṅgulyaḥ karaṇam viprāḥ tat uktam parivartitam
nṛtte bhinaya yoge vā pāṇibhiḥ vartana āśraye
mukha bhru netra yuktāni karaṇāni prayojayet
tiryak tathā ūrdhva saṃsthaḥ hi adhomukhaḥ ca añcitaḥ upaviddhaḥ tu
maṇḍala gatiḥ tathā svastikaḥ ca pṛṣṭha anusāri ca

original: udveṣṭitaḥ prasārita ityete vai smṛtāḥ prakārāstu /
analyzed: udveṣṭitaḥ prasāritaḥ iti ete vai smṛtāḥ prakārāḥ tu

original: bāhvoriti karaṇagatā vijñeyā nityaṃ nṛttaprayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_9.222 //
analyzed: bāhvoḥ iti karaṇa gatā vijñeyā nityam nṛtta prayoktṛbhiḥ
hastānām karaṇa vidhiḥ mayā samāsena nigaditaḥ viprāḥ
atas ūrdhvam vyākhyāsye hṛdaya udara pārśva karmāṇi
ābhugnam atha nirbhugnam tathā ca eva prakampitam

original: udvāhitaṃ samaṃ caiva uraḥ pañcavidhaṃ smṛtam // BhN_9.224 //
analyzed: udvāhitam samam ca eva uraḥ pañcavidham smṛtam
nimnam unnata pṛṣṭham ca vyābhugna aṃsam ślatham kvacid

original: ābhugnaṃ taduro jñeyaṃ karma cāsya nibodhata // BhN_9.225 //
analyzed: ābhugnam tat uraḥ jñeyam karma ca asya nibodhata
saṃbhrama viṣāda mūrcchā śoka bhaya vyādhi hṛdaya śalyeṣu
kāryam śīta sparśe varṣe lāja anvite rtha vaśāt

original: stabdhaṃ ca nimnapṛṣṭhaṃ ca nirbhugnāṃsaṃ samunnatam /
analyzed: stabdham ca nimna pṛṣṭham ca nirbhugna aṃsam samunnatam

original: uro nirbhugnametaddhi karma cāsya nibodhata // BhN_9.227 //
analyzed: uraḥ nirbhugnam etat hi karma ca asya nibodhata

original: stambhe mānagrahaṇe vismayadṛṣṭe ca satyavacane ca /
analyzed: stambhe māna grahaṇe vismaya dṛṣṭe ca satya vacane ca

original: ahamiti ca darpavacane garvotseke tu kartavyam // BhN_9.228 //
analyzed: aham iti ca darpa vacane garva utseke tu kartavyam
dīrgha niśvasite ca eva jṛmbhaṇe moṭane tathā

original: bibboke ca punaḥ strīṇāṃ tadvijñeyaṃ prayoktṛbhiḥ ] // BhN_9.229 //
analyzed: bibboke ca punar strīṇām tat vijñeyam prayoktṛbhiḥ
ūrdhva utkṣepaiḥ uraḥ yatra nirantara kṛtaiḥ kṛtam
prakampitam tu vijñeyam uraḥ nāṭya prayoktṛbhiḥ
hasita rudita ādi saṃbhrama bhaya śrama vyādhi pīḍita artheṣu
nānā bhāva upagatam kāryam uraḥ nāṭya yogeṣu
hasita ruditeṣu kārye śrame bhaye śvasa kāśayoḥ ca eva
hikkā duḥkhe ca tathā nāṭya jñaiḥ artha yogena
udvāhitam ūrdhva gatam uraḥ jñeyam prayoktṛbhiḥ
dīrgha ucchvasana tā loke jṛmbhana ādiṣu ca īkṣyate
sarvaiḥ sa sauṣṭhavaiḥ añgaiḥ caturasra kṛtaiḥ kṛtam

original: uraḥ saman. tu vijñeyaṃ svasthaṃ sauṣṭhavasaṃyutam // BhN_9.234 //
analyzed: uraḥ saman tu vijñeyam svastham sauṣṭhava saṃyutam
etat uktam maya samyak arasaḥ tu vikalpanam

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi pārśvayoriha lakṣaṇam // BhN_9.235 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi pārśvayoḥ iha lakṣaṇam
natam samunnatam ca eva

original: tathāpasṛtamevaṃ tu pārśvayoḥ karma pañcadhā // BhN_9.236 //
analyzed: tathā apasṛtam evam tu pārśvayoḥ karma pañcadhā
kaṭiḥ bhavet tu vyābhugnā pārśvam ābhugnam eva ca
tathā eva apasṛta aṃsam ca kiñcid pārśva natam smṛtam

original: tasyaiva cāparaṃ pārśvaṃ viparītaṃ tu yuktitaḥ /
analyzed: tasya eva ca aparam pārśvam viparītam tu yuktitaḥ
kaṭī pārśva bhuja aṃsaiḥ ca abhyunnataiḥ utam bhavet
āyāmanāt ubhayatas syāt prasāritam
parivarta atrikasya api vivartitam iha iṣyate
vivartita apanayanāt bhavet apasṛtam punar
pārśva lakṣaṇam iti uktam viniyogam nibodhata
upasarpe natam kāryam unnatam ca apasarpaṇe
prasāritam praharṣa ādau parivṛtte vivartitam
vinivṛtte tu apasṛtam pārśvam artha vaśāt bhavet
etāni pārśva karmāṇi jaṭharasya nibodhata

original: kṣāmaṃ khalvaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ ca samproktamudaraṃ tridhā /
analyzed: kṣāmam khalvam ca pūrṇam ca samproktam udaram tridhā

original: tanu kṣāmaṃ nataṃ khalvaṃ pūrṇamādhmātamucyate // BhN_9.243 //
analyzed: tanu kṣāmam natam khalvam pūrṇam ādhmātam ucyate

original: kṣāmaṃ hāsye 'tha rudite niḥśvāse jṛmbhane bhavet /
analyzed: kṣāmam hāsye rudite niḥśvāse jṛmbhane bhavet

original: vyādhite tapasi śrānte kṣudhārte khalvamiṣyate // BhN_9.244 //
analyzed: vyādhite tapasi śrānte kṣudhā ārte khalvam iṣyate
pūrṇam ucchvasite sthūle vyādhita ati aśana ādiṣu

original: ityetadudaraṃ proktaṃ kaṭyāḥ karma nibodhata // BhN_9.245 //
analyzed: iti etat udaram proktam kaṭyāḥ karma nibodhata
anye tu
kṣāmam khalvam samam pūrṇam udaram syāt caturvidham

original: chinā caiva nivṛttā ca recitā kampitā tathā /
analyzed: chinā ca eva nivṛttā ca recitā kampitā tathā

original: udvāhitā caiva kaṭī nāṭye nṛtte ca pañcadhā // BhN_9.246 //
analyzed: udvāhitā ca eva kaṭī nāṭye nṛtte ca pañcadhā
kaṭī madhyasya valanāt śinā saṃparikīrtitā
parāṅgmukhasya abhimukhī nivṛttā syāt nivartitā
sarvatas bhramaṇāt ca api vijñeyā recitā kaṭī

original: tiryaggatāgatā kṣiptā kaṭī jñeyā prakampitā // BhN_9.248 //
analyzed: tiryaggatā āgatā kṣiptā kaṭī jñeyā prakampitā
nitamba pārśva udvahanāt śaneiḥ udvāhitā kaṭī

original: kaṭīkarma mayā proktaṃ viniyogaṃ nibodhata // BhN_9.249 //
analyzed: kaṭī karma mayā proktam viniyogam nibodhata
chinnāḥ vyāyāma sambhrānta vyāvṛtta prekṣaṇa ādiṣu

original: nivṛttā vartane caiva recitā bhramaṇādiṣu // BhN_9.250 //
analyzed: nivṛttāḥ vartane ca eva recitāḥ bhramaṇa ādiṣu
kubja vāmana nīcānām gatau kāryā prakampitā

original: sthūleṣūdvāhiotā yojyā strīṇāṃ līlāgateṣu ca // BhN_9.251 //
analyzed: sthūleṣu udvāhiotā yojyā strīṇām līlā gateṣu ca
kampanam valanam ca eva stambhana udvartane tathā
nivartanam ca pañca etāni ūrukarmāṇi kārayet
namana unnamanāt pārṣṇeḥ muhur syāt ūru kampanam

original: gacchedabhyantaraṃ jānu yatra tadvalanaṃ smṛtam // BhN_9.253 //
analyzed: gacchet abhyantaram jānu yatra tat valanam smṛtam
stambhanam ca api vijñeyam apaviddha kriyā ātmakam
valita āviddha karaṇāt ūrvoḥ udvartanam smṛtam
pārṣṇiḥ abhyantaram gacchet yatra tat tu nivartanam

original: gatiṣvadhamapātraṇāṃ bhaye cāpi hi kampanam // BhN_9.255 //
analyzed: gatiṣu adhama pātraṇām bhaye ca api hi kampanam

original: valanaṃ caiva hi kartavyaṃ strīṇāṃ svairaparikrame /
analyzed: valanam ca eva hi kartavyam strīṇām svaira parikrame

original: sādhvase ca viṣāde ca stambhanaṃ tu prayojayet // BhN_9.256 //
analyzed: sādhvase ca viṣāde ca stambhanam tu prayojayet
vyāyāme tāṇḍave ca eva kāryam udvartanam budhaiḥ
nivartanam tu kartavyam sambhra ādi paribhrame
yathādarśanam anyat ca lokāt grāhyam prayoktṛbhiḥ
iti ūru roḥ lakṣaṇam proktam jaṅghāyāḥ tu nibodhata
āvartitam natam kṣiptam udvāhitam atha api ca

original: parivṛttaṃ tathā caiva jaṅghākarmāṇi pañcadhā // BhN_9.259 //
analyzed: parivṛttam tathā ca eva jaṅghā karmāṇi pañcadhā
vāmaḥ dakṣiṇa pārśvena dakṣiṇaḥ ca api vāmataḥ
pādaḥ yatra vrajet viprāḥ tat āvartitam ucyate
jaṅghā svastika yogena kramāt āvartitam nayet
jānunaḥ kuñcanāt ca eva natam jñeyam prayoktṛbhiḥ
vikṣepāt ca eva jaṅghāyāḥ kṣiptam iti abhidhīyate
natam syāt jānu namanāt kṣiptam vikṣepaṇāt bahi
udvāhitam ca vijñeyam ūrdhvam ūdvāhanāt api
pratīpa nayanam yat tu parivṛttam tat ucyate
āvartitam prayoktavyam vidūṣaka parikrame

original: nataṃ cāpi hi kartavyaṃ sthānāsanagatādiṣu // BhN_9.263 //
analyzed: natam ca api hi kartavyam sthāna āsana gata ādiṣu
kṣiptam vyāyāma yogeṣu tāṇḍave ca prayujyate
tathā ca udvāhitam kuryāt āviddha gamana ādiṣu
tāṇḍaveṣu prayoktavyam parivṛttam prayoktṛbhiḥ
iti etat jaṅghayoḥ karma pādayoḥ tu nibodhata
udghaṭṭitaḥ samaḥ ca eva tathā agra tala sañcaraḥ

original: añcitaḥ kuñcitaścaiva pādaḥ pañcavidha smṛtaḥ // BhN_9.266 //
analyzed: añcitaḥ kuñcitaḥ ca eva pādaḥ smṛtaḥ
sthitvā pāda tala agreṇa pārṣṇiḥ bhūmau nipātyate

original: yasya pādasya karaṇe bhavedudghaṭṭitastu saḥ // BhN_9.267 //
analyzed: yasya pādasya karaṇe bhavet udghaṭṭitaḥ tu saḥ
ayam udveṣṭita karaṇe tu anukaraṇa artham prayogam āsādya
druta madhyama pracāraḥ sakṛt asakṛdā prayoktavyaḥ

original: svabhāvaracite bhūmau samasthāne ca yo bhavet /
analyzed: svabhāva racite bhūmau sama sthāne ca yaḥ bhavet

original: samaḥ pādaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ svabhāvābhinayāśrayaḥ // BhN_9.269 //
analyzed: samaḥ pādaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ svabhāva abhinaya āśrayaḥ
sthira svabhāva abhinaye nānā karaṇa saṃśraye

original: calitaśca punaḥ kāryo vidhijñaiḥ pādarecite // BhN_9.270 //
analyzed: calitaḥ ca punar kāryaḥ vidhi jñaiḥ pāda recite
samasya eva yadā pārṣṇiḥ pādasya abhyantare bhavet
bahis pārśva sthitaḥ ṅguṣṭhaḥ tri aśra pādaḥ tu sa smṛtaḥ
tyaktvā kṛtvā
sama padam sthānam aśvakrānte tathā eva ca
syāt viklava ādiṣu artheṣu tri aśraḥ pādaḥ yathā vidhiḥ
asya eva sama pādasya pārṣṇiḥ abhyantare bhavet

original: tryaśrapādaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sthānakādiṣu saṃśrayaḥ // BhN_9.273 //
analyzed: tri aśra pādaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sthānaka ādiṣu saṃśrayaḥ
utkṣiptā tu bhavet pārṣṇiḥ prasṛta uṅguṣṭhakaḥ tathā
aṅgulyaḥ ca āñcitāḥ sarvā pāde
todana nikuṭṭane sthita niśumbhane bhūmi tāḍane bhramaṇe
vikṣepa vividha recaka pārṣṇi kṛta āgamanam etena
pārṣṇiḥ yasya āñcitā bhūmau pādam agra talam tathā

original: aṅgulyaścāñcitāḥ sarvāḥ sa pādastvañcitaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhN_9.276 //
analyzed: aṅgulyaḥ ca añcitāḥ sarvāḥ sa pādaḥ tu añcitaḥ smṛtaḥ
pāda agra tala sañcāre vartita udvartite tathā

original: eva pādāhate kāryo nānābhramarakeṣu ca // BhN_9.277 //
analyzed: eva pāda āhate kāryaḥ nānā bhramarakeṣu ca
utkṣiptā yasya pārṣṇī syāt aṅgulyaḥ kuṅcitāḥ tathā

original: tathā kuñcitamadhyaśca sa pādaṃ kuñcitaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhN_9.278 //
analyzed: tathā kuñcita madhyaḥ ca sa pādam kuñcitaḥ smṛtaḥ
udatta gamane ca eva vartita udvartite tathā
utkṣiptā tu bhavet pārṣṇiḥ aṅguṣṭha agreṇa saṃsthitaḥ
vāmaḥ ca eva svabhāva sthaḥ sūcīpādaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
nṛtte nūpura karaṇe prayogaḥ tasya kīrtyate
atikrānta krame ca eva pādam etam prayojayet
pāda jaṅghā ūru karaṇam karma kārya prayoktṛbhiḥ
pādasya karaṇam sarva jaṅghā ūru kṛtam iṣyate

original: yathā pādaḥ pravarteta tathaivoruḥ pravartate // BhN_9.282 //
analyzed: yathā pādaḥ pravarteta tathā eva ūruḥ pravartate
anayoḥ samāna karaṇāt pāda cārī prayojayet

original: ityetadaṅgajaṃ proktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ karma caiva hi // BhN_9.283 //
analyzed: iti etat aṅga jam proktam lakṣaṇam karma ca eva hi
atas param pravakṣyāmi cārī vyāyāma lakṣaṇam

original: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre aṅgābhinayo nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre aṅgābhinayaḥ nāma navamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha daśamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: evaṃ pādasya jaṅghāyā ūrvoḥ kaṭyāstathaiva ca /
analyzed: evam pādasya jaṅghāyāḥ ūrvoḥ kaṭyāḥ tathā eva ca
samāna karaṇe ceṣṭā sā cārī iti abhidhīyate
vidhāna upagatāḥ ca āryaḥ vyāyacchante parasparam
yasmāt aṅga samāyuktāḥ tasmāt vyāyāmaḥ ucyate
eka pāda pracāraḥ yaḥ sā cārī iti abhisaṃjñitā

original: dvipādakramaṇaṃ yattu karaṇaṃ nāma tadbhavet // BhN_10.3 //
analyzed: dvi pāda kramaṇam yat tu karaṇam nāma tat bhavet
karaṇānām samāyogaḥ khaṇḍam iti abhidhīyate
khaṇḍaiḥ tribhiḥ caturbhiḥ vā saṃyuktam maṇḍalam bhavet
cārībhiḥ prasṛtam nṛttam cārībhiḥ ceṣṭitam tathā

original: cārībhiḥ śastramokṣaśca cāryo yuddhe ca kīrtitāḥ // BhN_10.5 //
analyzed: cārībhiḥ śastra mokṣaḥ ca cāryaḥ yuddhe ca kīrtitāḥ
yat etat prastutam nāṭyam tat cārīṣu eva saṃjñitam

original: nahi cāryā vinā kiñcinnāṭye 'ṅgaṃ saṃpravartate // BhN_10.6 //
analyzed: nahi cāryā vinā kiñcid nāṭye ṅgam saṃpravartate
tasmāt cārī vidhānasya sampravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam

original: yā yasmiṃstu yathā yojyā nṛtte yuddhe gatau tathā // BhN_10.7 //
analyzed: yā yasmin tu yathā yojyā nṛtte yuddhe gatau tathā
sama pādā sthita āvartā śakaṭa āsyā tathā eva ca
adhyardhikā cāṣa gatiḥ vicyavā ca tathā aparā
eḍaka ākrīḍitā baddhā uru dvṛttā tathā aḍḍitā

original: utspanditā ca janitā syanditā cāpasyanditā // BhN_10.9 //
analyzed: utspanditā ca janitā syanditā ca apasyanditā
sama utsarita mattallī mattallī ca iti ṣoḍaśa

original: etā bhaumyaḥ smṛtāścāryaḥ śṛṇutākāśikīḥ punaḥ // BhN_10.10 //
analyzed: etāḥ bhaumyaḥ smṛtāḥ ca āryaḥ śṛṇuta ākāśikīḥ punar
atikrāntā hi apakrāntā pārśvakrāntā tathā eva ca

original: ūrdhvajānuśca sūcī ca tathā nūpurapādikā // BhN_10.11 //
analyzed: ūrdhva jānuḥ ca sūcī ca tathā nūpura pādikā
tathā ākṣiptā āviddha udvṛtta saṃjñite

original: vidyudbhrāntā hyalātā ca bhujaṅgatrāsitā tathā // BhN_10.12 //
analyzed: vidyudbhrāntā hi alātā ca bhujaṅgatrāsitā tathā

original: mṛgaplutā ca daṇḍā ca bhramarī ceti ṣoḍaśa /
analyzed: mṛgaplutā ca daṇḍā ca bhramarī ca iti ṣoḍaśa

original: ākāśikyaḥ smṛtā hyetā lakṣaṇaṃ ca nibodhata // BhN_10.13 //
analyzed: ākāśikyaḥ smṛtāḥ hi etāḥ lakṣaṇam ca nibodhata
pādaiḥ nirantara kṛtaiḥ tathā sama nakhaiḥ api

original: samapādā smṛtā cārī vijñeyā sthānasaṃśrayā // BhN_10.14 //
analyzed: samapādā smṛtā cārī vijñeyā sthāna saṃśrayā
bhūmi ghṛṣṭena pādena kṛtvā abhyantara maṇḍalam

original: punarutsādayedanyaṃ sthitāvarttā tu sā smṛtā // BhN_10.15 //
analyzed: punar utsādayet anyam sthitāvarttā tu sā smṛtā
niṣaṇṇa aṅgaḥ tu caraṇam prasārya tala sañcaram
udvāhitam uraḥ kṛtvā śakaṭāsyām prayojayet
savyasya pṛṣṭhatas vāmaḥ caraṇaḥ tu yadā bhavet

original: tasyāpasarpaṇaṃ caiva jñeyā sādhyardhikā budhaiḥ // BhN_10.17 //
analyzed: tasya apasarpaṇam ca eva jñeyā sādhyardhikā budhaiḥ
pādaḥ prasāritaḥ savyaḥ punar ca eva upasarpitaḥ

original: vāmaḥ savyāpasarpī ca cāṣagatyāṃ vidhīyate // BhN_10.18 //
analyzed: vāmaḥ savya apasarpī ca cāṣa gatyām vidhīyate
vicyavāt sama pādāyāḥ vicyavām samprayojayet
nikuṭṭayan tala agreṇa pādasya dharaṇī talam
tala sañcara pādābhyām utplutya patanam tu yat

original: paryāyataśca kriyate eḍakākrīḍitā tu sā // BhN_10.20 //
analyzed: paryāyataḥ ca kriyate eḍakā krīḍitā tu sā
anyonya jaṅghā saṃvegāt kṛtvā tu svastikam tatas

original: ūrubhyām valanaṃ yasmāt sā baddhā cāryudāhṛtā // BhN_10.21 //
analyzed: ūrubhyām valanam yasmāt sā baddhā cārī udāhṛtā
tala sañcara pādasya pārṣṇiḥ bāhya unmukhī yadā

original: jaṅghāñcitā tathodvṛttā ūrudvṛtteti sā smṛtā // BhN_10.22 //
analyzed: jaṅghā āñcitā tathā udvṛttā ūru dvṛttā iti sā smṛtā
agratas pṛṣṭhatas vā api pādaḥ tu tala sañcaraḥ

original: dvitīyapādo nirghṛṣṭaḥ yasyāṃ syādaḍḍitā tu sā // BhN_10.23 //
analyzed: dvitīya pādaḥ nirghṛṣṭaḥ yasyām syāt aḍḍitā tu sā
śanais pādaḥ nivarteta bāhyena abhyantareṇa ca
yad recaka anusāreṇa sā cārī utsyanditā smṛtā
muṣṭi hastaḥ ca vakṣaḥ sthaḥ karaḥ pravartitaḥ
talasañcarapādaḥ ca janitā cārī udāhṛtā
pañca tāla antaram pādam prasārya syanditām nyaset
dvitīyena tu pādena tathā apasyanditām api
tala sañcara pādābhyām ghūrṇamāna upasarpaṇaiḥ
vyāyāme samudāhṛtā
ubhābhyām api pādābhyām ghūrṇamāna upasarpaṇaiḥ
udveṣṭita apaviddhaiḥ ca hastaiḥ mattallī udāhṛtā
etāḥ bhaumyaḥ smṛtāḥ ca aryaḥ niyuddha karaṇa āśrayāḥ
ākāśakīnām cārīṇām sampravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam
kuñcitam pādam utkṣipya puratas samprasārayet

original: utkṣipya pātayeccainamatikrāntā tu sā smṛtā // BhN_10.30 //
analyzed: utkṣipya pātayet ca enam atikrāntā tu sā smṛtā
ūrubhyām valanam kṛtvā kuñcitam pādam uddharet

original: pārśve vinikṣipeccainamapakrāntā tu sā smṛtā // BhN_10.31 //
analyzed: pārśve vinikṣipet ca enam apakrāntā tu sā smṛtā
kuñcitam pādam utkṣipya pārśvena utpatanam nyaset
udghaṭṭitena pādena pārśva krāntā vidhīyate
kuñcitam pādam utkṣipya jānu stana samam nyaset

original: dvitīyaṃ ca kramāt stabdhamūrdhvajānuḥ prakīrtitā // BhN_10.33 //
analyzed: dvitīyam ca kramāt stabdham ūrdhva jānuḥ prakīrtitā
kuñcitam pādam utkṣipya jānu ūrdhvam samprasārayet
pātayet ca agra yogena sā sūcī parikīrtitā
pṛṣṭhatas hi añcitam kṛtvā pādam agra talena tu
drutam niryātayet bhūmau cārī nūpura pādikā
kuñcitam pādam utkṣipya pārśvāt pārśvam tu dolayet

original: pātayedañcitaṃ caivaṃ dolapādā tu sā smṛtā // BhN_10.36 //
analyzed: pātayet añcitam ca evam dolapādā tu sā smṛtā
kuñcitam pādam utkṣipya ākṣipya tu añcitam nyaset

original: jaṅghāsvastikasaṃyuktā cākṣiptā nāma sā smṛtā // BhN_10.37 //
analyzed: jaṅghā svastika saṃyuktā ca ākṣiptā nāma sā smṛtā
svastikasya agratas pādaḥ kuñcitaḥ tu prasāritaḥ

original: nipatedañcitāviddha āviddhā nāma sā smṛtā // BhN_10.38 //
analyzed: nipatet añcitāviddhaḥ āviddhā nāma sā smṛtā
pādam āviddham āveṣṭya samutkṣipya nipātayet

original: parivṛttya dvitīyaṃ ca sodvṛttā cāryudāhṛtā // BhN_10.39 //
analyzed: parivṛttya dvitīyam ca sā udvṛttā cārī udāhṛtā
pṛṣṭhatas valitam pādam śiraḥ ghṛṣṭam prasārayet

original: sarvato maṇḍalāviddhaṃ vidyudbhrāntā tu sā smṛtā // BhN_10.40 //
analyzed: sarvatas maṇḍala āviddham vidyut bhrāntā tu sā smṛtā
pṛṣṭhaḥ prasāritaḥ pādaḥ valitaḥ bhyantarīkṛtaḥ
pārṣṇi prapatitaḥ ca eva hi alātā samprakīrtitā
kuñcitam pādam utkṣipya tri aśram ūrum vivartayet
kaṭi jānu vivartāt ca bhujaṅga trāsitā bhavet
atikrānta kramam kṛtvā samutplutya nipātayet
jaṅghā āñcitā upari kṣiptā sā jñeyā hariṇa plutā
nūpuram caraṇam kṛtvā puratas samprasārayet

original: kṣipramāviddhakaraṇaṃ daṇḍapādā tu sā smṛtā // BhN_10.44 //
analyzed: kṣipram āviddha karaṇam daṇḍapādā tu sā smṛtā
atikrānta kramam kṛtvā trikam tu parivartayet
dvitīya pāda bhramaṇāt talena bhramarī smṛtā
ākāśikyaḥ smṛtāḥ hi etāḥ lalita aṅga kriyā ātmakāḥ
dhanuḥ vajra asi śastrāṇām prayoktavyā prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: agragau pṛṣṭhagau vāpi hyanugau cāpi yogataḥ /
analyzed: agra gau pṛṣṭha gau vā api hi anugau ca api yogataḥ

original: pādayostu dvijā hastau kartavyau nāṭyayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_10.47 //
analyzed: pādayoḥ tu dvijāḥ hastau kartavyau nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ
yatas pādaḥ tatas hastaḥ yatas hastaḥ tatas trikam

original: pādasya nirgamaṃ jñātvā tathopāṅgāni yojayet // BhN_10.48 //
analyzed: pādasya nirgamam jñātvā tathā upāṅgāni yojayet
pāda cāryām yathā pādaḥ dharaṇīm eva gacchati

original: evaṃ hastaścaritvā tu kaṭideśaṃ samāśrayet // BhN_10.49 //
analyzed: evam hastaḥ caritvā tu kaṭi deśam samāśrayet
etāḥ ca aryaḥ mayā proktāḥ lalita aṅga kriyā ātmakāḥ
sthānāni āsām pravakṣyāmi sarva śastra vimokṣaṇe

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ samapādaṃ ca vaiśākhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tathā /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam sama pādam ca vaiśākham maṇḍalam tathā

original: pratyālīḍhaṃ tathālīḍhaṃ sthānānyetāni ṣaṇ nṛṇāṃ // BhN_10.51 //
analyzed: pratyālīḍham tathā ālīḍham sthānāni etāni ṣaḍ nṛṇām
dvau tālau ardhatālaḥ ca pādayoḥ antaram bhavet
tayoḥ samasthitaḥ tu ekaḥ tryaśraḥ paraḥ
kiñcid añcita jaṅgham ca sauṣṭhava aṅga puraskṛtam
vaiṣṇavam sthānam etat hi viṣṇuḥ atra adhidaivatam
sthānena anena kartavyaḥ saṃllāpaḥ tu svabhāva jaḥ
nānā kārya antara apetaiḥ nṛbhiḥ uttama madhyamaiḥ
cakrasya mokṣaṇe ca eva dhāraṇe dhanuṣaḥ tathā
dhairya dāna aṅga līlāsu tathā krodhe prayojayet
idam eva viparyastam praṇaya krodhaḥ iṣyate
upālambha kṛte ca eva praṇaya udvegayoḥ tathā
śaṅkā asūyā ugra tā cintā mati smṛtiṣu ca eva hi
dainye capala tā yoge garva abhīṣṭeṣu śaktiṣu
sama pāde samau pādau tāla mātra antara sthitau
svabhāva sauṣṭhava upetau brahmā ca atra adhidaivatam
anena kāryam sthānena vipra maṅgala dhāraṇam

original: rūpaṇe pakṣiṇāṃ caiva varaṃ kautukameva ca /
analyzed: rūpaṇe pakṣiṇām ca eva varam kautukam eva ca
sva sthānam syandana sthānām vimāna sthāyinām api
liṅga sthānām vrata sthānām sthānam etat tu kārayet
tālāḥ trayaḥ ṛdha tālaḥ ca pādayoḥ antaram bhavet
tālān trīn ardha tālān ca niṣaṇṇa ūrum prakalpayet

original: tryaśrau vakṣaḥsthitau caiva tatra pādo prayojayet // BhN_10.62 //
analyzed: tri aśrau vakṣaḥ sthitau ca eva tatra pādau prayojayet
vaiśākha sthānam etat hi skandaḥ ca atra adhidaivatam
sthānena anena kartavyam aśvānām vāhanam budhaiḥ
vyāyāma nirgamaḥ ca eva sthūla pakṣi nirūpaṇam

original: śarāṇāṃ ca samutkṣepo vyāyāmakaraṇe tathā // BhN_10.64 //
analyzed: śarāṇām ca samutkṣepaḥ vyāyāma karaṇe tathā
recakeṣu ca kartavyam idam eva prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: aindre tu maṇḍale pādau catustālāntarasthitau // BhN_10.65 //
analyzed: aindre tu maṇḍale pādau catur tāla antara sthitau

original: tryaśrau pakṣaḥsthitau caiva kaṭijānū samau tathā /
analyzed: tri aśrau pakṣaḥ sthitau ca eva kaṭi jānū samau tathā
dhanuḥ vajra asi śastrāṇi maṇḍalena prayojayet
vāhanam kuñjarāṇām tu sthūla pakṣi nirūpaṇam

original: asyaiva dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ pañca tālān prasārya tu // BhN_10.67 //
analyzed: asya eva dakṣiṇam pādam pañca tālān prasārya tu
ālīḍham sthānakam kuryāt rudraḥ ca atra adhidaivatam

original: anena kāryaṃ sthānena vīraraudrakṛtaṃ tu yat // BhN_10.68 //
analyzed: anena kāryam sthānena vīra raudra kṛtam tu yat
uttara uttara sañjalpaḥ roṣa amarṣa kṛtaḥ tu yaḥ

original: mallānāñcaiva saṃpheṭaḥ śatrūṇāṃ ca nirūpaṇam // BhN_10.69 //
analyzed: mallānām ca eva saṃpheṭaḥ śatrūṇām ca nirūpaṇam
tathā abhidravaṇam ca eva śastrāṇām ca eva mokṣaṇam

original: kuñcitaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vāmaṃ pādaṃ prasārya ca // BhN_10.70 //
analyzed: kuñcitam dakṣiṇam kṛtvā vāmam pādam prasārya ca
ālīḍhaparivartaḥ tu pratyālīḍham iti smṛtam
ālīḍha saṃhitam śastram pratyālīḍhena mokṣayet
nānā śastra vimokṣaḥ hi kāryaḥ nena prayoktṛbhiḥ
nyāyāt ca eva hi vijñeyāḥ catvāraḥ śastra mokṣaṇe
bhārataḥ sātvataḥ ca eva kaiśikaḥ

original: bhārate tu kaṭīcchedyaṃ pādacchedyaṃ tu sātvate // BhN_10.73 //
analyzed: bhārate tu kaṭī chedyam pāda chedyam tu sātvate
vakṣasaḥ vārṣagaṇye tu śiraḥ chedyan tu kaiśike
ebhiḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ nyāyaiḥ nānā cārī samutthitaiḥ
pravicārya prayoktavyam nānā śastra vimokṣaṇe
nyāya āśritaiḥ aṅgahāraiḥ nyāyāt ca eva samutthitaiḥ
yasmāt yuddhāni vartante tasmāt nyāyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
vāma haste vinikṣipya kheṭakam śastra pheṭakam
śastram ādāya hastena pravicāram atha ācaret

original: prasārya ca karau samyak punarākṣipya caiva hi // BhN_10.77 //
analyzed: prasārya ca karau samyak punar ākṣipya ca eva hi

original: kheṭakaṃ bhrāmayet paścāt pārśvāt pārśvamathāpi ca /
analyzed: kheṭakam bhrāmayet paścāt pārśvāt pārśvam atha api ca
śiraḥ parigamaḥ ca api kāryaḥ śastreṇa yoktṛbhiḥ
kapolasya antare vā api śastrasya udveṣṭanam tathā
punar ca khaḍga hastena lalitā udveṣṭitena ca
kheṭakena ca kartavyaḥ śiraḥ parigamaḥ budhaiḥ

original: evaṃ pracāraḥ kartavyo bhārate śastramokṣaṇe // BhN_10.80 //
analyzed: evam pracāraḥ kartavyaḥ bhārate śastra mokṣaṇe
sātvate ca pravakṣyāmi pravicāram yathā vidhiḥ

original: sa eva pravicārastu khaḍgakheṭakayoḥ smṛtaḥ // BhN_10.81 //
analyzed: saḥ eva pravicāraḥ tu khaḍga kheṭakayoḥ smṛtaḥ

original: kevalaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ śastraṃ kartavyaṃ khalu sātvate /
analyzed: kevalam pṛṣṭhatas śastram kartavyam khalu sātvate

original: gatiśca vārṣagaṇye 'pi sātvatena krameṇa tu // BhN_10.82 //
analyzed: gatiḥ ca vārṣagaṇye sātvatena krameṇa tu
śastra kheṭakayoḥ ca api bhramaṇam saṃvidhīyate
śiraḥ parigamaḥ tadvat śastrasya iha bhavet tathā
urasi udveṣṭanam kāryam śastrasya aṃśe punar

original: bhārate pravicāro 'yaṃ kartavyaḥ sa tu kaiśike // BhN_10.84 //
analyzed: bhārate pravicāraḥ yam kartavyaḥ sa tu kaiśike

original: vibhramayya tathā śastraṃ kevalaṃ mūrdhni pātayet /
analyzed: vibhramayya tathā śastram kevalam mūrdhni pātayet
pravicārā prayoktavyāḥ hi evam ete ṅga līlayā
dhanuḥ vajra asi śastrāṇām prayoktavyāḥ vimokṣaṇe

original: na bhedyaṃ nāpi tu cchedyaṃ na cāpi rudhirasrutiḥ // BhN_10.86 //
analyzed: na bhedyam na api tu chedyam na ca api rudhira srutiḥ

original: raṅge praharaṇe kāryo na cāpi vyaktaghātanam /
analyzed: raṅge praharaṇe kāryaḥ na ca api vyakta ghātanam

original: saṃjñāmātreṇa kartavyaṃ śastrāṇāṃ mokṣaṇaṃ budhaiḥ // BhN_10.87 //
analyzed: saṃjñā mātreṇa kartavyam śastrāṇām mokṣaṇam budhaiḥ
athavā abhinaya upetam kuryāt chedyam vidhānataḥ
aṅga sauṣṭhava saṃyuktaiḥ aṅgahāraiḥ vibhūṣitam
vyāyāmam kārayet samyak laya tāla samanvitam

original: sauṣṭhave hi prayatnastu kāryo vyāyāmasevibhiḥ // BhN_10.89 //
analyzed: sauṣṭhave hi prayatnaḥ tu kāryaḥ vyāyāma sevibhiḥ
sauṣṭhave lakṣaṇam proktam vartana ākrama yojitam

original: śobhā sarvaiva nityaṃ hi sauṣṭhavaṃ samupāśritā // BhN_10.90 //
analyzed: śobhā sarvā eva nityam hi sauṣṭhavam samupāśritā
acañcalam akubjam ca āsanna gātram atha api ca
na ati uccam cala pādam ca sauṣṭhava aṅgam prayojayet
kaṭī karṇa samā yatra kūrpara aṃsa śiraḥ tathā
samunnatam uraḥ ca eva sauṣṭhavam nāma tat bhavet
nahi sauṣṭhava hīna aṅgaḥ śobhate nāṭya nṛttayoḥ

original: atra nityaṃ prayatno hi vidheyo madhyamottamaiḥ // BhN_10.93 //
analyzed: atra nityam prayatnaḥ hi vidheyaḥ madhyama uttamaiḥ

original: nāṭyaṃ nṛttaṃ ca sarvaṃ hi sauṣṭhave saṃpratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: nāṭyam nṛttam ca sarvam hi sauṣṭhave saṃpratiṣṭhitam
kaṭīnām abhicarau hastau vakṣaḥ ca eva samunnatam
vaiṣṇavam sthānam iti aṅgam catur aśram udāhṛtam
parimārjanam ādānam sandhānam mokṣaṇam tathā
dhanuṣaḥ tu prayoktavyam karaṇam tu caturvidham
saṃmārjanam parāmarṣam ādānam grahaṇam kriyā
sandhānam śara vinyāsaḥ vikṣepaḥ mokṣaṇam bhavet
taila abhyaktena gātreṇa yavāgū mṛditena ca
vyāyāmam kārayet śrīmān bhittau ākālike tathā
yogyāyām mātṛkā bhittiḥ tasmāt bhittim samāśrayet
bhittau prasārita aṅgam tu vyāyāmam kārayet naram

original: balārthaṃ ca niṣeveta nasyaṃ bastividhiṃ tathā // BhN_10.99 //
analyzed: bala artham ca niṣeveta nasyam basti vidhim tathā

original: snigdhānyanyāni ca tathā rasakaṃ pānakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: snigdhāni anyāni ca tathā rasakam pānakam tathā

original: āhāre 'dhiṣṭhitāḥ prāṇāḥ prāṇe yogyāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // BhN_10.100 //
analyzed: āhāre dhiṣṭhitāḥ prāṇāḥ prāṇe yogyāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
tasmāt yogyā prasidhi artham āhāre yatnavān bhavet
aśuddha kāyam praklāntam atīva kṣudh pipāsitam

original: atipītaṃ tathā bhuktaṃ vyāyāmaṃ naiva kārayet /
analyzed: ati pītam tathā bhuktam vyāyāmam na eva kārayet
acalaiḥ madhuraiḥ gātraiḥ caturaśreṇa vakṣasā
vyāyāmam kārayet dhīmān naram aṅga kriyā ātmakam
evam vyāyāma saṃyoge kāryaḥ cārīkṛtaḥ vidhiḥ
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi maṇḍalānām vikalpanam

original: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre cārīvidhāno nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ /
analyzed: iti bharatīye nāṭya śāstre cārīvidhānaḥ nāma daśamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha ekādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
etāḥ ca āryaḥ mayā proktāḥ yathāvat śastra mokṣaṇe
cārī saṃyoga jāni iha maṇḍalāni nibodhata
atikrāntam vicitram ca tathā lalita sañcaram
sūcī viddham daṇḍa pādam vihṛta alātake tathā
vāma bandham sa lalitam krāntam ca ākāśa gāmi ca
maṇḍalāni dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ
bhūmi gāni nibodhata
bhramara āskandite syātām āvartam ca tatas param
samākranditam api āhuḥ eḍakākrīḍitam tathā
aḍḍitam śakaṭa āsyam ca tathā adhyardhakam eva ca

original: piṣṭakuṭṭaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ tathā cāṣagataṃ punaḥ // BhN_11.5 //
analyzed: piṣṭakuṭṭam ca vijñeyam tathā cāṣa gatam punar
etāni api daśa uktāni bhūmi gāni iha nāmataḥ

original: ādyaṃ pādaṃ ca janitaṃ kṛtvodvāhitamācaret // BhN_11.6 //
analyzed: ādyam pādam ca janitam kṛtvā udvāhitam ācaret

original: alātaṃ vāmakaṃ caiva pārśvakrāntaṃ ca dakṣiṇam /
analyzed: alātam vāmakam ca eva pārśvakrāntam ca dakṣiṇam

original: sūcīvāmaṃ punaścaiva pārśvakrāntaṃ ca dakṣiṇam // BhN_11.7 //
analyzed: sūcī vāmam punar ca eva pārśva krāntam ca dakṣiṇam
sūcīm vāma kramam dadyāt apakrāntam ca dakṣiṇam

original: sūcīvāmaṃ punaścaiva trikaṃ ca parivartayet // BhN_11.8 //
analyzed: sūcī vāmam punar ca eva trikam ca parivartayet
tathā dakṣiṇam udvṛttam alātam ca eva vāmakam

original: paricchinnaṃ tu kartavyaṃ bāhyabhramarakeṇa hi // BhN_11.9 //
analyzed: paricchinnam tu kartavyam bāhya bhramarakeṇa hi
atikrāntam punar vāmam daṇḍa pādam ca dakṣiṇam

original: vijñeyametad vyāyāme tvatikrāntaṃ tu maṇḍalam // BhN_11.10 //
analyzed: vijñeyam etat vyāyāme tu atikrāntam tu maṇḍalam

original: ādyaṃ tu janitaṃ kṛtvā tenaiva ca nikuṭṭakam /
analyzed: ādyam tu janitam kṛtvā tena eva ca nikuṭṭakam

original: āspanditaṃ tu vāmena pārśvakrāntaṃ ca dakṣiṇam // BhN_11.11 //
analyzed: āspanditam tu vāmena pārśva krāntam ca dakṣiṇam
vāmam sūcī padam dadyāt apakrāntam ca dakṣiṇam
bhujaṅga trāsitam vāmam atikrāntam ca dakṣiṇam
udvṛttam dakṣiṇam ca eva alātam ca eva atra vāmakam

original: pārśvakrāntaṃ punaḥ savyaṃ sūcīvāmakramaṃ tathā // BhN_11.13 //
analyzed: pārśva krāntam punar savyam sūcī vāma kramam tathā
vikṣepaḥ dakṣiṇasya syāt apakrāntam ca vāmakam

original: bāhyabhramarakaṃ caiva vikṣepaṃ caiva yojayet // BhN_11.14 //
analyzed: bāhya bhramarakam ca eva vikṣepam ca eva yojayet
vijñeyam etat vyāyāme vicitram nāma maṇḍalam
kṛtvā ūrdhva jānu caraṇam ādyam sūcīm prayojayet
apakrāntaḥ punar vāmaḥ ādyaḥ pārśva gataḥ bhavet
vāma sūcīm punar dadyāt trikam ca parivartayet
pārśva krāntam punar ca ādyam atikrāntam ca vāmakam
sūcī vāma kramam kṛtvā hi apakrāntaḥ ca vāmakam
pārśva krāntam punar ca ādyam atikrāntam ca vāmakam

original: paricchinnaṃ ca kartavyaṃ bāhyabhramaṇakena hi // BhN_11.18 //
analyzed: paricchinnam ca kartavyam bāhya bhramaṇakena hi
eṣa cārī prayogaḥ tu kāryaḥ lalita sañcaraiḥ
sūcī vāma padam dadyāt trikam ca parivartayet
pārśva krāntaḥ punar ca ādyaḥ eva ca
sūcīm ādyam punar dadyāt atikrāntam ca vāmakam
pārśva krāntam punar ca ādyam sūcī viddhe tu maṇḍale

original: ādyastu janito bhūtvā sa ca daṇḍakramo bhavet // BhN_11.21 //
analyzed: ādyaḥ tu janitaḥ bhūtvā sa ca daṇḍakramaḥ bhavet
vāma sūcīm punar dadyāt trikam ca parivartayet
udvṛttaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ ca syāt alātaḥ ca eva vāmakaḥ
pārśvakrāntaḥ punar ca ādyaḥ bhujaṅga trāsitaḥ tathā
atikrāntaḥ punar vāmaḥ daṇḍa pādaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ
vāma sūcī trika āvartaḥ daṇḍa pāde tu maṇḍale

original: ādyaṃ tu janitaṃ kṛtvā tenaiva ca nikuṭṭakam // BhN_11.24 //
analyzed: ādyam tu janitam kṛtvā tena eva ca nikuṭṭakam

original: āspanditaṃ ca vāmena hyudvṛttaṃ dakṣiṇena ca /
analyzed: āspanditam ca vāmena hi udvṛttam dakṣiṇena ca

original: alātaṃ vāmakaṃ pādaṃ sūcīṃ dadyāttu dakṣiṇam // BhN_11.25 //
analyzed: alātam vāmakam pādam sūcīm dadyāt tu dakṣiṇam
pārśva krāntaḥ punar vāmaḥ ākṣiptaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ tathā

original: samāvartya trikaṃ caiva daṇḍapādaṃ prasārayet // BhN_11.26 //
analyzed: samāvartya trikam ca eva daṇḍa pādam prasārayet
sūcī vāma padam dadyāt trikam tu parivartayet
bhujaṅgatrāsitaḥ ca ādyaḥ ca
eṣa cārī prayogaḥ tu vihṛte maṇḍale bhavet

original: sūcīmādyakramaṃ kṛtvā cā'pakrāntaṃ ca vāmakam // BhN_11.28 //
analyzed: sūcīm ādya kramam kṛtvā ca apakrāntam ca vāmakam
pārśvakrāntaḥ tatas ca ādyaḥ pyalātaḥ ca eva vāmakaḥ
bhrāntvā cārībhiḥ etābhiḥ paryāyeṇa atha maṇḍalam
ṣaṣ saṃkhyam sapta saṃkhyam ca lalitaiḥ pāda vikramaiḥ
adhikuryāt apakrāntam atikrāntam ca vāmakam
apakrantaḥ punar ca ādyaḥ tikrāntaḥ eva ca
pādabhramarakaḥ ca syāt alāte khalu maṇḍale
sūcīm ādya kramam kṛtvā hi apakrāntam ca vāmakam
ādyaḥ daṇḍa kramaḥ ca eva sūcīpādaḥ tu vāmakaḥ
kāryaḥ trika vivartaḥ ca pārśva krāntaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ

original: ākṣiptaṃ vāmakaṃ kuryāt daṇḍapārśvaṃ ca dakṣiṇam // BhN_11.33 //
analyzed: ākṣiptam vāmakam kuryāt daṇḍa pārśvam ca dakṣiṇam

original: urudvṛttaṃ ca tenaiva kartavyaṃ dakṣiṇena tu /
analyzed: uru dvṛttam ca tena eva kartavyam dakṣiṇena tu

original: sūcīvāmakramaṃ kṛtvā trikaṃ ca parivartayet // BhN_11.34 //
analyzed: sūcī vāma kramam kṛtvā trikam ca parivartayet
alātaḥ ca bhavet vāmaḥ pārśva krāntaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ

original: atikrāntaḥ punarvāmo vāmabandhe tu maṇḍale // BhN_11.35 //
analyzed: atikrāntaḥ punar vāmaḥ vāma bandhe tu maṇḍale
sūcīm ādya kramam kṛtvā hi apakrāntam ca vāmakam

original: pārśvakrāntaḥ punaścādyo bhujaṅgatrāsitaḥ sa ca // BhN_11.36 //
analyzed: pārśva krāntaḥ punar ca ādyaḥ bhujaṅga trāsitaḥ sa ca
atikrāntaḥ punar vāmaḥ ākṣiptaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ tathā
atikrāntaḥ punar vāmaḥ uru dvṛttaḥ tathā eva ca
alātaḥ ca punar vāmaḥ pārśva krāntaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ
sūcī vāmam punar dadyāt apakrāntaḥ tu dakṣiṇaḥ
atikrāntaḥ punar vāmaḥ kāryaḥ lalita saṃjñakaḥ

original: eṣa pādaprasārastu lalite maṇḍale bhavet // BhN_11.39 //
analyzed: eṣa pāda prasāraḥ tu lalite maṇḍale bhavet
sūcī vāma kramam kṛtvā hi apakrāntaḥ ca vāmakam
pārśva krāntam punar ca ādyam vāma pārśva kramam tathā
bhrāntvā cārībhiḥ etābhiḥ paryāyeṇa atha maṇḍalam

original: vāmasūcīṃ tato dadyādapakrāntaṃ ca dakṣiṇam // BhN_11.41 //
analyzed: vāma sūcīm tatas dadyāt apakrāntam ca dakṣiṇam
svabhāva gamane hi etat maṇḍalam saṃvidhīyate
krāntam etat tu vijñeyam nāmataḥ nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ
etāni ākāśa gāmīni jñeyāni evam daśa eva tu

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi bhaumānāmiha lakṣaṇam // BhN_11.43 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi bhaumānām iha lakṣaṇam
ādyaḥ tu janitaḥ kāryaḥ vāmaḥ ca aspanditaḥ bhavet
śakaṭāsyaḥ punar ca ādyaḥ vāmaḥ ca api prasāritaḥ
ādyaḥ bhramarakaḥ kāryaḥ trikam ca parivartayet
āskanditaḥ punar vāmaḥ śakaṭa āsyaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ

original: vāmaḥ pṛṣṭhāpasarpī ca dadyād bhramarakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: vāmaḥ pṛṣṭha apasarpī ca dadyāt bhramarakam tathā
saḥ eva aspanditaḥ kāryaḥ tu etat bhramara maṇḍalam
ādyaḥ bhramarakaḥ kāryaḥ vāmaḥ ca eva aḍḍitaḥ bhavet
kāryaḥ trika vivarttaḥ ca śakaṭa āsyaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ
uru dvṛttaḥ saḥ eva syāt vāmaḥ ca eva apasarpitaḥ
kāryaḥ trika vivarttaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ spanditaḥ bhavet
śakaṭa āsyaḥ bhavet vāmaḥ tat eva āsphoṭanam bhavet
etat āspanditam nāma vyāyāme yuddha maṇḍalam
ādyaḥ tu janitam kṛtvā vāmaḥ ca eva nikuṭṭakam

original: śakaṭāsyaḥ punaścādya urudvṛttaḥ sa eva tu // BhN_11.50 //
analyzed: śakaṭāsyaḥ punar ca ādyaḥ uru dvṛttaḥ saḥ eva tu
pṛṣṭha apasarpī vāmaḥ ca sa ca cāṣa gatiḥ bhavet
āspanditaḥ punar dakṣaḥ śakaṭa āsyaḥ ca vāmakaḥ
ādyaḥ bhramarakaḥ ca eva trikam ca parivartayet
pṛṣṭha apasarpī vāmaḥ ca iti āvartam maṇḍalam bhavet

original: samapādaṃ budhaḥ kṛtvā sthānaṃ hastau prasārayet /
analyzed: sama pādam budhaḥ kṛtvā sthānam hastau prasārayet
nirantarau ūrdhva talau āveṣṭya udveṣṭya ca eva hi
kaṭī taṭe vinikṣipya ca ādyam āvarttayet kramāt
yathākramam punar vāmam āvartena prasārayet
cārayā ca anayā bhrāntvā paryāyeṇa atha maṇḍalam
sama utsaritam etat tu kāryam vyāyāma maṇḍalam
pādaiḥ tu bhūmi saṃyuktaiḥ sūcī viddhaiḥ tathā eva ca
eḍaka ākrīḍitaiḥ ca eva tūrṇaiḥ trika vivartitaiḥ
sūcīviddha apaviddhaiḥ ca krameṇa āvṛttya maṇḍalam
eḍakākrīḍitam vidyāt khaṇḍa maṇḍala saṃjñitam
savyam udghaṭṭitam kṛtvā tena eva āvartam ācaret
tena eva askanditaḥ kāryaḥ śakaṭa āsyaḥ ca vāmakaḥ

original: ādyaḥ pṛṣṭhāpasarpī ca sa ca cāṣagatirbhavet /
analyzed: ādyaḥ pṛṣṭha apasarpī ca sa ca cāṣa gatiḥ bhavet
aḍḍitaḥ ca punar vāmaḥ ādyaḥ ca eva apasarpitaḥ

original: vāmo bhramarakaḥ kārya ādya āskandito bhavet /
analyzed: vāmaḥ bhramarakaḥ kāryaḥ ādyaḥ āskanditaḥ bhavet
tena eva āsphoṭanam kuryāt etat aḍḍita maṇḍalam

original: ādyaṃ tu janitaṃ kṛtvā tenaiva ca nikuṭṭakam /
analyzed: ādyam tu janitam kṛtvā tena eva ca nikuṭṭakam

original: sa eva śakaṭāsyaśca vāmaścāskandito bhavet // BhN_11.61 //
analyzed: saḥ eva śakaṭa āsyaḥ ca vāmaḥ ca a skanditaḥ bhavet
vijñeyam śakaṭāsyam tu vyāyāme yuddha maṇḍalam
pādaiḥ ca śakaṭa āsya sthaiḥ paryāyeṇa atha maṇḍalam

original: ādyastu janito bhūtvā sa evāskandito bhavet /
analyzed: ādyaḥ tu janitaḥ bhūtvā saḥ eva āskanditaḥ bhavet
apasarpī punar vāmaḥ śakaṭa āsyaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ
bhrāntvā cārībhiḥ etābhiḥ paryāyeṇa atha maṇḍalam
adhyardham etat vijñeyam niyuddhe ca api maṇḍalam
sūcīm ādya kramam kṛtvā hi apakrāntam ca vāmakam
bhujaṅga trāsitaḥ ca ādyaḥ evam eva tu vāmakaḥ
bhujaṅga trāsitaiḥ bhrāntvā pādaiḥ api ca maṇḍalam

original: piṣṭakuṭṭaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cārībhirmaṇḍalaṃ budhaiḥ // BhN_11.66 //
analyzed: piṣṭakuṭṭam ca vijñeyam cārībhiḥ maṇḍalam budhaiḥ
sarvaiḥ cāṣa gataiḥ pādaiḥ paribhrāmya tu maṇḍalam
etat cāṣa gatam vidyāt niyuddhe ca api maṇḍalam
nānā cārī samutthāni maṇḍalāni samāsatas

original: uktānyataḥ paraṃ caiva samacārīṇi yojayet // BhN_11.68 //
analyzed: uktāni atas param ca eva sama cārīṇi yojayet
samacārī prayogaḥ yaḥ tat samam nāma maṇḍalam
ācārya buddhyā tāni iha kartavyāni prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: etāni khaṇḍāni samaṇḍalāni yuddhe niyuddhe ca parikrame ca /
analyzed: etāni khaṇḍāni sa maṇḍalāni yuddhe niyuddhe ca parikrame ca
līlā aṅga mādhurya puraskṛtāni kāryāṇi vādya anugatāni tajjñaiḥ

original: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre maṇḍalavidhānaṃ nāma ekādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
analyzed: iti bharatīye nāṭya śāstre maṇḍalavidhānam nāma ekādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
atha dvādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ gati pracāra
evam vyāyāma saṃyoge kāryam maṇḍala kalpanam

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi gatīstu prakṛtisthitāḥ // BhN_12.1 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi gatīḥ tu prakṛti sthitāḥ
tatra upavahanam kṛtvā bhāṇḍa vādya puraskṛtam
yathā mārga rasa upetam prakṛtīnām praveśane
dhruvāyām saṃprayuktāyām paṭe ca eva apakarṣite
kāryaḥ praveśaḥ pātrāṇām nānā artha rasa sambhavaḥ

original: sthānaṃ tu vaiṣṇavaṃ kṛtvā hyuttame madhyame tathā /
analyzed: sthānam tu vaiṣṇavam kṛtvā hi uttame madhyame tathā
samunnatam samam ca eva catur asram uraḥ tathā

original: bāhuśīrṣe prasanne ca nātyutkṣipte ca kārayet /
analyzed: bāhu śīrṣe prasanne ca na ati utkṣipte ca kārayet
grīvā pradeśaḥ kartavyaḥ mayūra āñcita mastakaḥ
karṇāt aṣṭa aṅgula sthe ca bāhu śīrṣe prayojayet
urasaḥ ca api cibukam catur aṅgula saṃsthitam
hastau tathā eva kartavyau kaṭī nābhi taṭa sthitau
dakṣiṇaḥ nābhi saṃsthaḥ tu vāmaḥ kaṭi taṭa sthitaḥ
pādayoḥ antaram kāryam dvau tālau ardham eva ca
pāda utkṣepaḥ tu kartavyaḥ sva pramāṇa vinirmitaḥ
catur tālaḥ dvi tālaḥ ca api eka tālaḥ tathā eva ca

original: catustālastu devānāṃ pārthivānāṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_12.9 //
analyzed: catur tālaḥ tu devānām pārthivānām tathā eva ca
dvi tālaḥ ca eva madhyānām tālaḥ strī nīca liṅginām
dvi kalaḥ tathā hi eka kalaḥ smṛtaḥ
catuṣkalaḥ hi uttamānām madhyānām dvi kalaḥ bhavet

original: tathā caikakalaḥ pādo nīcānāṃ saṃprakīrtitaḥ // BhN_12.11 //
analyzed: tathā ca eka kalaḥ pādaḥ nīcānām saṃprakīrtitaḥ

original: sthitaṃ madhyaṃ drutaṃ caiva samavekṣya layatrayam /
analyzed: sthitam madhyam drutam ca eva samavekṣya laya trayam
yathā prakṛti nāṭya jñaḥ gatim evam prayojayet
dhairya upapannā gatiḥ uttamānām madhyā gatiḥ madhyama sammatānām

original: drutā gatiśca pracurādhamānāṃ layatrayaṃ sattvavaśena yojyam // BhN_12.13 //
analyzed: drutā gatiḥ ca pracura adhamānām laya trayam sattva vaśena yojyam

original: eṣa eva tu vijñeyaḥ kalātālalaye vidhiḥ /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva tu vijñeyaḥ kalā tāla laye vidhiḥ
punar gati pracārasya prayogam śruṇuta anaghāḥ
svabhāvāt tu uttama gatau kāryam jānu kaṭī samam
yuddha cārī prayogeṣu jānu stana samam nyaset
pārśva krāntaiḥ sa lalitaiḥ pādaiḥ vādya anvitaiḥ atha

original: raṅgakoṇonmukhaṃ gacchet samyak pañcapadāni ca // BhN_12.16 //
analyzed: gacchet
vāma vedham tatas kuryāt vikṣepam dakṣiṇena tu

original: parivṛtya dvitīyaṃ tu gacchet koṇaṃ tataḥ param // BhN_12.17 //
analyzed: parivṛtya dvitīyam tu gacchet koṇam tatas param
tatra api vāma vedhaḥ tu vikṣepaḥ dakṣiṇena ca

original: tato bhāṇḍonmukho gacchet tānyeva tu padāni ca // BhN_12.18 //
analyzed: tatas bhāṇḍa unmukhaḥ gacchet tāni eva tu padāni ca
evam gata āgataiḥ kṛtvā padānām iha viṃśatim

original: vāmavedhaṃ tataḥ kuryāt vikṣepaṃ dakṣiṇasya ca // BhN_12.19 //
analyzed: vāma vedham tatas kuryāt vikṣepam dakṣiṇasya ca

original: raṅge vikṛṣṭe bharatena kāryo gatāgataiḥ pādagatipracāraḥ /
analyzed: raṅge vikṛṣṭe bharatena kāryaḥ gata āgataiḥ pāda gati pracāraḥ
tri aśraḥ trikoṇe catur asra raṅge gati pracāraḥ catur asre eva

original: yaḥ samaiḥ saṃhito gacchettatra kāryo layāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ samaiḥ saṃhitaḥ gacchet tatra kāryaḥ laya āśrayaḥ
dvi kalaḥ tathā eva eka kalaḥ punar
atha madhyama nīcaiḥ tu gacchet yaḥ parivāritaḥ

original: catuṣkalamathārdhaṃ ca tathā caikakalaṃ punaḥ // BhN_12.22 //
analyzed: catuṣkalam atha ardham ca tathā ca eka kalam punar
daitya dānava yakṣāṇām nṛpa pannaga rakṣasām
catur tāla pramāṇena kartavyā atha gatiḥ budhaiḥ
divaukasām tu sarveṣām madhyamā gatiḥ iṣyate

original: tatrāpi coddhatā ye tu teṣāṃ devaiḥ samā gatiḥ // BhN_12.24 //
analyzed: tatra api ca uddhatāḥ ye tu teṣām devaiḥ samā gatiḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
yadā manuṣyāḥ rājānaḥ teṣām deva gatiḥ katham

original: atrocyate kathaṃ naiṣā gatī rājñāṃ bhaviṣyati // BhN_12.25 //
analyzed: atrā ucyate katham na eṣā gatiḥ rājñām bhaviṣyati

original: iha prakṛtayo divyā divyamānuṣya eva ca /
analyzed: iha prakṛtayaḥ divyāḥ divya mānuṣyaḥ eva ca

original: mānuṣya iti vijñeyā nāṭyanṛttakriyāṃ prati // BhN_12.26 //
analyzed: mānuṣyaḥ iti vijñeyāḥ nāṭya nṛtta kriyām prati
devānām prakṛtiḥ divyā rājñām vai divya mānuṣī

original: yā tvanyā lokaviditā mānuṣī sā prakīrtitā // BhN_12.27 //
analyzed: yā tu anyā loka viditā mānuṣī sā prakīrtitā
deva aṃśa jāḥ tu rājānaḥ veda adhyātmasu kīrtitāḥ

original: evaṃ devānukaraṇe doṣo hyatra na vidyate // BhN_12.28 //
analyzed: evam deva anukaraṇe doṣaḥ hi atra na vidyate
ayam vidhiḥ tu kartavyaḥ svacchanda gamanam prati
saṃbhrama utpāta roṣeṣu pramāṇam na vidhīyate
sarvāsām prakṛtīnām tu avasthā antara saṃśrayā
uttama adhama madhyānām gatiḥ kāryā prayoktṛbhiḥ
catur ardha kalam vā syāt tad ardha kalam eva ca
avasthā antaram āsādya kuryāt gati viceṣṭitam

original: jyeṣṭhe catuṣkalaṃ hyatra madhyame dvikalaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: jyeṣṭhe catuṣkalam hi atra madhyame dvi kalam bhavet

original: dvikalā cottame yatra madhye tvekakalā bhavet // BhN_12.32 //
analyzed: dvi kalā ca uttame yatra madhye tu eka kalā bhavet
kalikam madhyame yatra nīceṣu ardha kalam bhavet
evam ardha ardha hīnam tu jaḍānām saṃprayojayet

original: jvarārte ca kṣudhārte ca tapaḥśrānte bhayānvite /
analyzed: jvara ārte ca kṣudhā ārte ca tapaḥ śrānte bhaya anvite
vismite ca avahitthe ca tathā autsukya samanvite

original: śṛṅgāre caiva śoke ca svacchandagamane tathā /
analyzed: śṛṅgāre ca eva śoke ca svacchanda gamane tathā
gatiḥ sthita layā kārya adhika lā antara pāti tā
punar cintā anvite ca eva gatiḥ kāryā catuṣkalā

original: asvasthakāmite caiva bhaye vitrāsite tathā // BhN_12.36 //
analyzed: asvastha kāmite ca eva bhaye vitrāsite tathā

original: āvege caiva harṣe ca kārye yacca tvarānvitam /
analyzed: āvege ca eva harṣe ca kārye yat ca tvarā anvitam
aniṣṭa śravaṇe ca eva kṣepe ca adbhuta darśane
api ca ātyāyike kārye duḥkhite śatru mārgaṇe
aparāddha anusaraṇe śvāpada anugatau tathā
eteṣu evam gatim prājñaḥ vikalām saṃprayojayet

original: uttamānāṃ gatiryā tu na tāṃ madhyeṣu yojayet // BhN_12.39 //
analyzed: uttamānām gatiḥ yā tu na tām madhyeṣu yojayet

original: yā gatirmadhyamānāṃ tu na tāṃ nīceṣu yojayet /
analyzed: yā gatiḥ madhyamānām tu na tām nīceṣu yojayet
gatiḥ śṛṅgāriṇī kāryā svastha kāmita sambhavā
dūtī darśita mārgaḥ tu praviśet raṅga maṇḍalam
sūcayā ca api abhinayam kuryāt artha samāśrayam
hṛdyaiḥ gandhaiḥ tathā vastraiḥ alaṅkāraiḥ ca bhūṣitaḥ
nānā puṣpa sugandhābhiḥ mālābhiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ
gacchet sa lalitaiḥ pādaiḥ atikrānta sthitaiḥ tathā
tathā sauṣṭhava saṃyuktaiḥ laya tāla vaśa anugaiḥ
pādayoḥ anugau hastau nityam kāryau prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: utkṣipya hastaṃ pātena pādayośca viparyayāt // BhN_12.44 //
analyzed: utkṣipya hastam pātena pādayoḥ ca viparyayāt
pracchanna kāmite ca eva gatim bhūyas nibodhata
visarjita janaḥ srastaḥ tathā dūtī sahāyavān
nirvāṇa dīpaḥ na atyartham bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca vibhūṣitaḥ
velā sadṛśa vastraḥ ca saha dūtyā śanais tathā
vrajet pracchanna kāmaḥ tu pādaiḥ niśśabda manda gaiḥ
śabda śaṃkī utsukaḥ ca syāt avalokana tatparaḥ
vepamāna śarīraḥ ca śaṃkitaḥ praskhalan muhur

original: rase raudre tu vakṣyāmi daityarakṣogaṇān prati // BhN_12.48 //
analyzed: rase raudre tu vakṣyāmi daitya rakṣaḥ gaṇān prati

original: eka eva rasasteṣāṃ sthāyī raudro dvijottamāḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva rasaḥ teṣām sthāyī raudraḥ dvijottamāḥ
nepathya raudraḥ vijñeyaḥ tu aṅga raudraḥ tathā eva ca
tathā svabhāva jaḥ ca eva tridhā raudraḥ prakalpitaḥ
rudhira klinna dehaḥ yaḥ rudhira ārdra mukhaḥ tathā
tathā piśita hastaḥ ca raudraḥ nepathya jaḥ tu saḥ
bahu bāhuḥ bahu mukhaḥ nānā praharaṇa ākulaḥ
sthūlakāyaḥ tathā prāṃśuḥ aṅga raudraḥ prakīrtitaḥ
rakta akṣaḥ piṅga keśaḥ ca asitaḥ vikṛta svaraḥ
rūkṣaḥ nirbhartsana paraḥ raudraḥ saḥ yam svabhāva jaḥ
catur tāla antara utkṣiptaiḥ pādaiḥ tu antara pātitaiḥ

original: gatirevaṃ prakartavyā teṣāṃ ye cāpi tadvidhāḥ /
analyzed: gatiḥ evam prakartavyā teṣām ye ca api tadvidhāḥ

original: ahṛdyā tu mahī yatra śmaśānaraṇakaśmalā // BhN_12.54 //
analyzed: ahṛdyā tu mahī yatra śmaśāna raṇa kaśmalā
gatim tatra prayuñjīta bībhatsa abhinayam prati
kvacid āsanna patitaiḥ vikṛṣṭa patitaiḥ kvacid
elaka ākrīḍitaiḥ pādaiḥ upari upari pātitaiḥ
teṣām eva anugaiḥ hastaiḥ bībhatse gatiḥ iṣyate
atha vīre ca karttavyā pāda vikṣepa saṃyutā
druta pracāra adhiṣṭhānā nānā cārī samākulā
pārśva krāntaiḥ drutāviddhaiḥ sūcī viddhaiḥ tathā eva ca
kalā kāla gataiḥ pādaiḥ āvege yojayet gatim
uttamānām ayam prāyas proktaḥ gati parikramaḥ

original: madhyānāmadhamānāṃ ca gatiṃ vakṣyāmyahaṃ punaḥ // BhN_12.59 //
analyzed: madhyānām adhamānām ca gatim vakṣyāmi aham punar
vismaye ca eva harṣe ca vikṣipta pada vikramān

original: āsādya tu rasaṃ hāsyametaccānyaṃ ca yojayet // BhN_12.60 //
analyzed: āsādya tu rasam hāsyam etat ca anyam ca yojayet
punar ca karuṇe kāryā gatiḥ sthira padaiḥ atha
bāṣpa ambuḥ uddha nayanaḥ sanna gātraḥ tathā eva ca
utkṣipta pātita karaḥ tathā sa svana rodanaḥ
gacchet tathā adhyadhikayā pratyagra apriya saṃśraye

original: eṣā strīṇāṃ prayoktavyā nīcasattve tathaiva ca /
analyzed: eṣā strīṇām prayoktavyā nīca sattve tathā eva ca

original: uttamānāṃ tu kartavyā sadhairyā bāṣpasaṅgatā // BhN_12.63 //
analyzed: uttamānām tu kartavyā sa dhairyā bāṣpa saṅga tā
niḥśvāsaiḥ āyata utsṛṣṭaiḥ tathā eva ūrdhva nirīkṣitaiḥ

original: na tatra sauṣṭhavaṃ kāryaṃ na pramāṇaṃ tathāvidham // BhN_12.64 //
analyzed: na tatra sauṣṭhavam kāryam na pramāṇam tathāvidham
madhyānām api sattva jñāḥ gatiḥ yojyā vidhānataḥ
uraḥ pāta hata utsāhaḥ śoka vyākula cetanaḥ
na ati utkṣiptaiḥ padaiḥ gacchet iṣṭa bandhu nipātane
gāḍha prahāre kāryā ca śithila aṅga bhuja āśrayā
vighūṇita śarīrā ca gatiḥ cūrṇa padaiḥ atha
śītena ca abhibhūtasya varṣeṇa abhidrutasya ca
gatiḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ kāryā strī nīca prakṛtau atha

original: piṇḍīkṛtya tu gātrāṇi teṣāṃ caiva prakampanam // BhN_12.68 //
analyzed: piṇḍīkṛtya tu gātrāṇi teṣām ca eva prakampanam
karau vakṣasi nikṣipya kubjībhūtaḥ tathā eva ca
danta uṣṭha sphuraṇam ca eva cibukasya prakampanam
kāryam śanais ca kartavyam śīta abhinayane gatau

original: tathā bhayānake caiva gatiḥ kāryā vicakṣaṇaiḥ // BhN_12.70 //
analyzed: tathā bhayānake ca eva gatiḥ kāryā vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: strīṇāṃ kāpuruṣāṇāṃ ca ye cānye sattvavarjitāḥ /
analyzed: strīṇām kāpuruṣāṇām ca ye ca anye sattva varjitāḥ

original: visphārite cale netre vidhutaṃ ca śirastathā // BhN_12.71 //
analyzed: visphārite cale netre vidhutam ca śiraḥ tathā
bhaya saṃyuktayā dṛṣṭyā pārśvayoḥ ca vilokanaiḥ
drutaiḥ cūrṇa padaiḥ ca eva baddhvā hastam kapotakam
pravepita śarīraḥ ca śuṣka uṣṭhaḥ skhalitam vrajet

original: eṣānukaraṇe kāryā tarjane trāsane tathā // BhN_12.73 //
analyzed: eṣā anukaraṇe kāryā tarjane trāsane tathā

original: sattvaṃ ca vikṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca vikṛtaṃ svaram /
analyzed: sattvam ca vikṛtam dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca vikṛtam svaram

original: eṣā strīṇāṃ prakarttavyā nṛṇāṃ cākṣiptavikramā // BhN_12.74 //
analyzed: eṣā strīṇām prakarttavyā nṛṇām ca ākṣipta vikramā
kvacid āsanna patitaiḥ vikṛṣṭa patitaiḥ kvacid
elaka ākrīḍitaiḥ pādaiḥ upari upari pātitaiḥ
eṣām eva anugaiḥ hastaiḥ gatim bhīteṣu yojayet

original: vaṇijāṃ sacivānāṃ ca gatiḥ kāryā svabhāvajā // BhN_12.76 //
analyzed: vaṇijām sacivānām ca gatiḥ kāryā svabhāva jā
kṛtvā nābhi taṭe hastam uttāna khaṭakā mukham
ādyam cārālam uttānam kuryāt pārśvam stanāntare

original: na niṣaṇṇaṃ na ca stabdhaṃ na cāpi parivāhitam /
analyzed: na niṣaṇṇam na ca stabdham na ca api parivāhitam

original: kṛtvā gātraṃ tathā gacchettena caiva krameṇa tu // BhN_12.78 //
analyzed: kṛtvā gātram tathā gacchet tena ca eva krameṇa tu
atikrāntaiḥ padaiḥ viprāḥ dvi tāla antara gāmibhiḥ

original: yatīnāṃ śramaṇānāṃ ca ye cānye tapasi sthitāḥ // BhN_12.79 //
analyzed: yatīnām śramaṇānām ca ye ca anye tapasi sthitāḥ

original: teṣāṃ kāryā gatirye tu naiṣṭhikaṃ vratamāśritāḥ /
analyzed: teṣām kāryā gatiḥ ye tu naiṣṭhikam vratam āśritāḥ
ālola cakṣuḥ ca bhavet yuga mātra nirīkṣaṇaḥ
upasthita smṛtiḥ ca eva gātram sarvam vidhāya ca
acañcala manāḥ ca eva yathāvat liṅgam āśritaḥ
vinīta veṣaḥ ca bhavet kaṣāya vasanaḥ tathā

original: prathamaṃ samapādena sthitvā sthānena vai budhaḥ // BhN_12.82 //
analyzed: prathamam sama pādena sthitvā sthānena vai budhaḥ

original: hastaṃ ca caturaṃ kṛtvā tathā caikaṃ prasārayet /
analyzed: hastam ca caturam kṛtvā tathā ca ekam prasārayet

original: prasannaṃ vadanaṃ kṛtvā prayogasya vaśānugaḥ // BhN_12.83 //
analyzed: prasannam vadanam kṛtvā prayogasya vaśa anugaḥ
a niṣaṇṇena gātreṇa gatim gacchet vyatikramāt

original: uttamānāṃ bhavedeṣā liṅgināṃ ye mahāvratāḥ // BhN_12.84 //
analyzed: uttamānām bhavet eṣā liṅginām ye mahā vratāḥ
ebhiḥ eva viparyastaiḥ guṇaiḥ anyeṣu yojayet

original: tathā vratānugāvasthā hyanyeṣāṃ liṅgināṃ gatiḥ // BhN_12.85 //
analyzed: tathā vrata anuga avasthā hi anyeṣām liṅginām gatiḥ
vibhrāntā vā api udāttā vā vibhrānta nibhṛtā api vā
śakaṭa āsya sthitaiḥ pādaiḥ atikrāntaiḥ tathā eva ca
kāryā pāśupatānām ca gatiḥ uddhata gāminī

original: andhakāre 'tha yāne ca gatiḥ kāryā prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_12.87 //
analyzed: andhakāre tha yāne ca gatiḥ kāryā prayoktṛbhiḥ
bhūmau visarpitaiḥ pādaiḥ hastaiḥ mārga pradarśibhiḥ
ratha sthasya api kartavyā gatiḥ cūrṇapadaiḥ atha

original: samapādaṃ tathā sthānaṃ kṛtvā rathagatiṃ vrajet /
analyzed: sama pādam tathā sthānam kṛtvā ratha gatim vrajet

original: dhanurgṛhītvā caikena tathā caikena kūbaram // BhN_12.89 //
analyzed: dhanuḥ gṛhītvā ca ekena tathā ca ekena kūbaram
sūtaḥ ca asya bhavet evam pratoda pragraha ākulaḥ
vāhanāni vicitrāṇi kartavyāni vibhāgaśaḥ
drutaiḥ cūrṇa padaiḥ ca eva gantavyam raṅga maṇḍale

original: vimānasthasya kartavyā hyeṣaiva syandinī gatiḥ // BhN_12.91 //
analyzed: vimāna sthasya kartavyā hi eṣā eva syandinī gatiḥ
āroḍhum udvahet gātram kiñcid syāt unmukha sthitam
asya eva vaiparītyena kuryāt ca api avarohaṇam
adhas valokanaiḥ ca eva maṇḍala āvartanena ca
ākāśagamane ca eva kartavyā nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ
sthānena sama pādena tathā cūrṇa padaiḥ api
vyomnaḥ ca avataret yaḥ tu tasya etām kārayet gatim
ṛju āyata unnata nataiḥ kuṭila āvartitaiḥ atha
bhraśyataḥ ca tathā ākāśāt apaviddha bhujā gatiḥ
vikīrṇa vasanā ca eva tathā bhū gata locanā
prāsāda druma śaileṣu nadī nimna unnateṣu ca
ārohaṇa avataraṇam ca kāryam artha vaśāt budhaiḥ
prāsāda ārohaṇam kāryam atikrāntaiḥ padaiḥ atha

original: udvāhya gātraṃ pādaṃ ca sopāne nikṣipennaraḥ /
analyzed: udvāhya gātram pādam ca sopāne nikṣipet naraḥ
tathā avataraṇam ca eva gātram ānamya recayet

original: prāsāde yanmayā proktaḥ pratāraḥ kevalo bhavet /
analyzed: prāsāde yat mayā proktaḥ pratāraḥ kevalaḥ bhavet
kiñcid nata agra kāyā tu pratāre gatiḥ iṣyate
jala pramāṇa apekṣā tu jala madhye gatiḥ bhavet
toye lpe vasana utkarṣaḥ prājye pāṇi vikarṣaṇaiḥ
prasārya bāhum ekaikam muhur bāri vikarṣaṇaiḥ

original: tiryak prasāritā caiva hiyamāṇā ca vāriṇā // BhN_12.101 //
analyzed: tiryak prasāritā ca eva hiyamāṇā ca vāriṇā
aśeṣa aṅga ākula ādhūta vadanā gatiḥ iṣyate
nausthasya api prayoktavyā drutaiḥ cūrṇa padaiḥ gatiḥ
atikrāntena pādena dvitīyena āñcitena ca
prāsāda ārohaṇe yat tu tat eva adriṣu kārayet
kevalam ūrdhva nikṣepam adriṣu aṅgam bhavet atha

original: drume cārohaṇaṃ kāryamatikrāntaiḥ sthitaiḥ padaiḥ // BhN_12.104 //
analyzed: drume ca ārohaṇam kāryam atikrāntaiḥ sthitaiḥ padaiḥ
sūcī viddhaiḥ apakrāntaiḥ pārśva krāntaiḥ tathā eva ca
etat eva avataraṇam saritsu api niyojayet
anena eva vidhānena kartavyam gati ceṣṭitam
saṃjñā mātreṇa kartavyāni etāni vidhi pūrvakam

original: kasmānmṛta iti prokte kiṃ kartavyaṃ prayoktṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: kasmāt mṛtaḥ iti prokte kim kartavyam prayoktṛbhiḥ
aṅkuśa grahaṇāt nāgam khalīna grahaṇāt hayam
pragraha grahaṇāt yānam evam eva apareṣu api

original: aśvayāne gatiḥ kāryā vaiśākhasthānakena tu // BhN_12.108 //
analyzed: aśva yāne gatiḥ kāryā vaiśākhasthānakena tu
yathā cūrṇa padaiḥ citraiḥ upari upari pātitaiḥ

original: pannagānāṃ gatiḥ kāryā pādaiḥ svastikasaṃjñitaiḥ // BhN_12.109 //
analyzed: pannagānām gatiḥ kāryā pādaiḥ svastika saṃjñitaiḥ
pārśva krāntam padam kuryāt svastikam recayet iha
viṭasya api tu kartavyā gatiḥ lalita vikramā
pādaiḥ ākuñcitaiḥ kiñcid tāla abhyantara pātitaiḥ
sva sauṣṭhava samāyuktau tathā hastau pada anugau
khaṭakau ardhamānau tu kṛtvā viṭa gatim vrajet
kañcukīyasya kartavyā vayaḥ vasthā viśeṣataḥ
a vṛddhasya prayoga jñaḥ gatim evam prayojayet
ardha tāla utthitaiḥ pādaiḥ viṣkambhaiḥ ṛjubhiḥ tathā
samudvahan iva aṅgāni paṅka lagnaḥ iva vrajet

original: atha vṛddhasya kartavyā gatiḥ kampitadehikā // BhN_12.114 //
analyzed: atha vṛddhasya kartavyā gatiḥ kampita dehikā
viṣkambhana kṛta prāṇā manda utkṣipta pada kramā
kṛśasya api abhineyā vai gatiḥ manda parikramā
vyādhi graste jvara ārte ca tapaḥ śrānte kṣudhā anvite
viṣkambhana kṛta prāṇaḥ kṛśaḥ kṣāma udaraḥ tathā
kṣāma svara kapolaḥ ca dīna netraḥ tathā eva ca
śanais utkṣepaṇam ca eva kartavyam hasta pādayoḥ

original: kampanaṃ caiva gātrāṇāṃ kleśanaṃ ca tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kampanam ca eva gātrāṇām kleśanam ca tathā eva ca
dūra adhvānam gatasya api gatiḥ manda pada kramā
vikūṇanam ca gātrasya jānunoḥ ca vimardanam
sthūlasya api tu kartavyā gatiḥ deha anukarṣiṇī
samudvahana bhūyiṣṭhā manda utkṣipta pada kramā
viṣkambha gāmī ca bhavet niḥśvāsa bahulaḥ tathā
śrama sveda abhibhūtaḥ ca vrajet cūrṇa padaiḥ tathā

original: mattānāṃ tu gatiḥ kāryā made taruṇamadhyame // BhN_12.121 //
analyzed: mattānām tu gatiḥ kāryā made taruṇa madhyame
vāma dakṣiṇa pādābhyām ghūrṇamāna apasarpaṇaiḥ
avakṛṣṭe pade ca eva hi anavasthita pādikā
vighūrṇita śarīrā ca karaiḥ praskhalitaiḥ tathā
unmattasya api kartavyā gatiḥ tu aniyata kramā
bahu cārī samāyuktā loka anukaraṇa āśrayā
rūkṣa sphuṭita keśaḥ ca rajaḥ dhvasta tanuḥ tathā
animitta prakathanaḥ bahu bhāṣī vikāravān

original: gāyatyakasmāddhasati saṅge cāpi na sajjate // BhN_12.125 //
analyzed: gāyati akasmāt hasati saṅge ca api na sajjate

original: nṛtyatyapi ca saṃhṛṣṭo vādayatyapi vā punaḥ /
analyzed: nṛtyati api ca saṃhṛṣṭaḥ vādayati api vā punar
kadācid dhāvati javāt kadācid avatiṣṭhate
kadācid upaviṣṭaḥ tu śayānaḥ syāt kadācana
nānā cīra dharaḥ ca eva rathyāsu aniyata ālayaḥ

original: unmatto bhavati hyevaṃ tasyaitāṃ kārayed gatim /
analyzed: unmattaḥ bhavati hi evam tasya etām kārayet gatim
sthitvā nūpura pādena daṇḍa pādam prasārayet

original: baddhāṃ cārīṃ tathā caiva kṛtvā svastikameva ca /
analyzed: baddhām cārīm tathā ca eva kṛtvā svastikam eva ca

original: anena cārīyogena paribhrāmya tu maṇḍalam // BhN_12.129 //
analyzed: anena cārī yogena paribhrāmya tu maṇḍalam
bāhya bhramarakam ca eva raṅga koṇe prasārayet

original: trikaṃ sulalitaṃ kṛtvā latākhyaṃ hastameva ca // BhN_12.130 //
analyzed: trikam su lalitam kṛtvā latā ākhyam hastam eva ca
viparyaya gataiḥ hastaiḥ padbhyām saha gatiḥ bhavet

original: trividhā tu gatiḥ kāryā khañjapaṅgukavāmanaiḥ // BhN_12.131 //
analyzed: trividhā tu gatiḥ kāryā khañja paṅguka vāmanaiḥ
vikala aṅga prayogeṇa kuhaka abhinayam prati

original: ekaḥ khañjagatau nityaṃ stabdho vai caraṇo bhavet // BhN_12.132 //
analyzed: ekaḥ khañja gatau nityam stabdhaḥ vai caraṇaḥ bhavet
tathā dvitīyaḥ kāryaḥ tu pādaḥ gra tala sañcaraḥ
stabdhena utthāpanam kāryam aṅgasya caraṇena tu
gamanena niṣaṇṇaḥ syāt anyena caraṇena tu

original: itareṇa niṣīdecca krameṇānena vai vrajet // BhN_12.134 //
analyzed: itareṇa niṣīdet ca krameṇa anena vai vrajet
eṣā khañja gatiḥ kāryā tala śalya kṣateṣu ca
pādena agra tala sthena hi añcitena vrajet tathā
niṣaṇṇa dehā paṅgoḥ tu nata jaṅghā tathā eva ca
sarva saṅkucita aṅgā ca vāmane gatiḥ iṣyate

original: na tasya vikramaḥ kāryo vikṣepaścaraṇasya ca /
analyzed: na tasya vikramaḥ kāryaḥ vikṣepaḥ caraṇasya ca

original: sodvāhitā cūrṇapadā sā kāryā kuhanātmikā // BhN_12.137 //
analyzed: sā udvāhitā cūrṇapadā sā kāryā kuhanā ātmikā
vidūṣakasya api gatiḥ hāsya traya samanvitā

original: aṅgavākyakṛtaṃ hāsyaṃ hāsyaṃ nepathyajaṃ smṛtam // BhN_12.138 //
analyzed: aṅga vākya kṛtam hāsyam hāsyam nepathya jam smṛtam
danturaḥ khalatiḥ kubjaḥ khañjaḥ ca vikṛta ānanaḥ

original: ya īdṛśaḥ praveśaḥ syādaṅgahāsyaṃ tu tadbhavet // BhN_12.139 //
analyzed: yaḥ īdṛśaḥ praveśaḥ syāt aṅgahāsyam tu tat bhavet
yadā tu baka vat gacchet ullokita vilokitaiḥ
anya āyata pada tvāt ca aṅga hāsyaḥ bhavet sa tu
kārya hāsyam tu vijñeyam asaṃbaddha prabhāṣaṇāt
anarthakaiḥ vikāraiḥ ca tathā ca aślīla bhāṣitaiḥ
cīra carma maśī bhasma gairika ādyaiḥ tu maṇḍitaḥ

original: yastādṛśo bhavedviprā hāsyo nepathyajastu saḥ // BhN_12.142 //
analyzed: yaḥ tādṛśaḥ bhavet viprāḥ hāsyaḥ nepathya jaḥ tu saḥ

original: tasmāttu prakṛtiṃ jñātvā bhāvaḥ kāryastu tattvataḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tu prakṛtim jñātvā bhāvaḥ kāryaḥ tu tattvataḥ
gati pracāram vibhajet nānā avasthā antara ātmakam
svabhāvajāyām vinyasya kuṭilam vāmake kare

original: tadā dakṣiṇahaste ca kuryāccaturakaṃ punaḥ // BhN_12.144 //
analyzed: tadā dakṣiṇa haste ca kuryāt caturakam punar
pārśvam ekam śiraḥ ca eva caraṇaḥ tathā
paryāyaśaḥ
svabhāva jā tu tasya eṣā gatiḥ anyā vikāra jā

original: alābhalābhāt muktasya stabdhā tasya gatirbhavet // BhN_12.146 //
analyzed: alābha lābhāt muktasya stabdhā tasya gatiḥ bhavet

original: kāryā caiva hi nīcānāṃ ceṭādīnāṃ parikramāt /
analyzed: kāryā ca eva hi nīcānām ceṭa ādīnām parikramāt

original: adhamā iti ye khyātā nānāśīlāśca te punaḥ // BhN_12.147 //
analyzed: adhamāḥ iti ye khyātāḥ nānā śīlāḥ ca te punar
pārśva sekam śiraḥ ca eva karaḥ sa caraṇaḥ tathā
śakārasya api kartavyā gatiḥ cañcala dehikā
gatau nameta ceṭānām dṛṣṭiḥ ca ardha vicāriṇī
vastra ābharaṇa saṃsparśaiḥ muhur muhur avekṣitaiḥ
gātraiḥ vikāra vikṣiptaiḥ lamba vastra srajā tathā
sa garvitā cūrṇa padā śakārasya gatiḥ bhavet

original: jātyā nīceṣu yoktavyā vilokanaparā gatiḥ // BhN_12.150 //
analyzed: jātyā nīceṣu yoktavyā vilokana parā gatiḥ
a saṃsparśāt ca lokasya sva aṅgāni vinigūhya ca
mlecchānām jātayaḥ yāḥ tu pulinda śabara ādayaḥ
teṣām deśa anusāreṇa kāryam gati viceṣṭitam

original: pakṣiṇāṃ śvāpadānāṃ ca paśūnāṃ ca dvijottamāḥ // BhN_12.152 //
analyzed: pakṣiṇām śvāpadānām ca paśūnām ca dvijottamāḥ
sva sva jāti samutthena svabhāvena gatiḥ bhavet

original: siṃharkṣavānarāṇāṃ ca gatiḥ kāryā prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_12.153 //
analyzed: siṃha ṛkṣa vānarāṇām ca gatiḥ kāryā prayoktṛbhiḥ
yā kṛtā narasiṃhena viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā

original: ālīḍhasthānakaṃ kṛtvā gātraṃ tasyaiva cānugam // BhN_12.154 //
analyzed: ālīḍha sthānakam kṛtvā gātram tasya eva ca anugam
jānu upari karam hi ekam aparam vakṣasi sthitam

original: avalokya diśaḥ kṛtvā cibukaṃ bāhumastake // BhN_12.155 //
analyzed: avalokya diśaḥ kṛtvā cibukam bāhu mastake
gantavyam vikramaiḥ viprāḥ pañca tāla antara utthitaiḥ
niyuddha samaye ca eva raṅga avataraṇe tathā
siṃha ādīnām prayoktavyā gatiḥ eṣā prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: śeṣāṇāmarthayogena gatiṃ sthānaṃ ca yojayet // BhN_12.157 //
analyzed: śeṣāṇām artha yogena gatim sthānam ca yojayet
vāhana artha prayogeṣu raṅga avataraṇeṣu ca

original: evametāḥ prayoktavyā narāṇāṃ gatayo budhaiḥ // BhN_12.158 //
analyzed: evam etāḥ prayoktavyāḥ narāṇām gatayaḥ budhaiḥ

original: noktā yā yā mayā hyatra grāhyāstāstāśca lokataḥ /
analyzed: na uktāḥ yāḥ yāḥ mayā hi atra grāhyāḥ tāḥ tāḥ ca lokataḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi strīṇāṃ gativiceṣṭitam // BhN_12.159 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi strīṇām gati viceṣṭitam
strīṇām sthānāni kāryāṇi gatiṣu ābharaṇeṣu ca

original: āyataṃ cāvahitthaṃ ca aśvakrāntamathāpi ca // BhN_12.160 //
analyzed: āyatam ca avahittham ca aśvakrāntam atha api ca
sthānāni etāni nārīṇām atha lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: vāmaḥ svabhāvato yatra pādo viracitaḥ samaḥ // BhN_12.161 //
analyzed: vāmaḥ svabhāvataḥ yatra pādaḥ viracitaḥ samaḥ
tāla mātra antare nyastaḥ tri aśraḥ paraḥ
prasannam ānanam uraḥ samam yatra samunnatam
latā nitamba gau hastau sthānam jñeyam tat āyatam

original: dakṣiṇastu samaḥ pādaḥ tryaśraḥ pakṣasthito 'paraḥ // BhN_12.163 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇaḥ tu samaḥ pādaḥ tri aśraḥ paraḥ
vāmaḥ samunnata kaṭiḥ ca āyate sthānake bhavet

original: āvāhane visarge ca tathā nirvarṇaneṣu ca // BhN_12.164 //
analyzed: āvāhane visarge ca tathā nirvarṇaneṣu ca
cintāyām ca avahitthe ca sthānam etat prayojayet
raṅgāvataraṇa ārambhaḥ puṣpa añjali visarjanam
manmatha īrṣyā udbhavam kopam tarjanī aṅguli moṭanam
niṣedha garva gāmbhīrya maunam māna avalambanam
sthāne smin saṃvidhātavyam diś antara nirūpaṇam

original: samo yatra sthito vāmastryaśraḥ pakṣasthito 'paraḥ // BhN_12.167 //
analyzed: samaḥ yatra sthitaḥ vāmaḥ tri aśraḥ pakṣa sthitaḥ paraḥ
samunnata kaṭiḥ vāmaḥ tu avahittham tu tat bhavet
puras vicalitaḥ tri aśraḥ tad anya upasṛtaḥ samaḥ
pādaḥ tāla antara nyastaḥ trikam īṣat samunnatam
pāṇiḥ latā ākhyaḥ yatra ekaḥ tad anyaḥ tu nitamba gaḥ
avahittham samākhyātam sthānam āgama bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: strīṇāmetat smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ saṃlāpe tu svabhāvaje // BhN_12.170 //
analyzed: strīṇām etat smṛtam sthānam saṃlāpe tu svabhāva je

original: niścaye paritoṣe ca vitarke cintane tathā /
analyzed: niścaye paritoṣe ca vitarke cintane tathā
sthānam etat prayoktavyam bhartuḥ mārga vilokane
pādaḥ samasthitaḥ ca ekaḥ ekaḥ ca agra tala āñcitaḥ
sūcīviddham aviddham vā tat aśvakrāntam ucyate
skhalitam ghūrṇitam ca eva galita ambara dhāraṇam
kusuma stabaka ādānam parirakṣaṇam eva ca
vitrāsanam sa lalitam taru śākhā avalambanam
sthāne smin saṃvidhānīyam strīṇām etat prayoktṛbhiḥ
śākhā avalambane kāryam stabaka grahaṇe tathā
viśrāmeṣu atha devānām narāṇām ca artha yogataḥ
sthānakam tāvat eva syāt yāvat ceṣṭā pravartate

original: bhagnaṃ ca sthānakaṃ nṛtte cārī cetsamupasthitā /
analyzed: bhagnam ca sthānakam nṛtte cārī ced samupasthitā

original: evaṃ sthānavidhiḥ kāryaḥ strīṇāṃ nṛṇāmathāpi ca // BhN_12.177 //
analyzed: evam sthāna vidhiḥ kāryaḥ strīṇām nṛṇām atha api ca
punar ca āsām pravakṣyāmi gatim prakṛti saṃsthitām

original: kṛtvāvahitthaṃ sthānaṃ tu vāmaṃ cādhomukhaṃ karam // BhN_12.178 //
analyzed: kṛtvā avahittham sthānam tu vāmam ca adhomukham karam
nābhi pradeśe vinyasya savyam ca khaṭakā mukham
tatas sa lalitam pādam tāla mātra samutthitam
dakṣiṇam vāma pādasya bāhya pārśve vinikṣipet

original: tenaiva samakālaṃ ca latākhyaṃ vāmakaṃ bhujam // BhN_12.180 //
analyzed: tena eva sama kālam ca latā ākhyam vāmakam bhujam
dakṣiṇam vinamet pārśvam nyaset nābhi taṭe tatas

original: nitambe dakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā hastaṃ codveṣṭya vāmakam // BhN_12.181 //
analyzed: nitambe dakṣiṇam kṛtvā hastam ca udveṣṭya vāmakam

original: tato vāmapadaṃ dadyāt latāhastaṃ ca dakṣiṇam /
analyzed: tatas vāma padam dadyāt latā hastam ca dakṣiṇam
līlayā udvāhitena atha śirasā anugatena ca
kiñcid natena gātreṇa gacchet pañcapadīm tatas

original: yo vidhiḥ puruṣāṇāṃ tu raṅgapīṭhaparikrame // BhN_12.183 //
analyzed: yaḥ vidhiḥ puruṣāṇām tu raṅga pīṭha parikrame

original: sa eva pramadānāṃ vai kartavyo nāṭyayoktṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva pramadānām vai kartavyaḥ nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ

original: ṣaṭkalaṃ tu na kartavyaṃ tathāṣṭakalameva ca // BhN_12.184 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ kalam tu na kartavyam tathā aṣṭa kalam eva ca
pādasya patanam tad jñaiḥ khedanam tat bhavet striyāḥ
sayauvanānām nārīṇām evam kāryā gatiḥ budhaiḥ
sthavīyasīnām etāsām sampravakṣyāmi aham gatim

original: kṛtvāpaviddhaṃ sthānantu vāmaṃ nyasya kaṭītaṭe // BhN_12.186 //
analyzed: kṛtvā apaviddham sthānam tu vāmam nyasya kaṭī taṭe
ādyam cārālam uttānam kuryāt nābhi stana antare

original: na niṣaṇṇaṃ na ca stabdhaṃ na cāpi parivāhitam // BhN_12.187 //
analyzed: na niṣaṇṇam na ca stabdham na ca api parivāhitam

original: kṛtvā gātraṃ tato gacchettenaiveha krameṇa tu /
analyzed: kṛtvā gātram tatas gacchet tena evā iha krameṇa tu
preṣyāṇām api kartavyā gatiḥ udbhrānta gāminī
kvacid unnamitaiḥ gātraiḥ āviddha bhuja vikramā

original: sthānaṃ kṛtvāvahitthaṃ ca vāmaṃ cādhomukhaṃ bhujam // BhN_12.189 //
analyzed: sthānam kṛtvā avahittham ca vāmam ca adhomukham bhujam
nābhi pradeśe vinyasya savyam ca khaṭakā mukham
ardhanārī gatiḥ kāryā strīpuṃsābhyām vimiśritā
udātta lalitaiḥ gātraiḥ pādaiḥ līlā samanvitaiḥ
yā pūrvam eva abhihitā hi uttamānām gatiḥ mayā

original: strīṇāṃ kāpuruṣāṇāṃ ca tato 'rdhārdhaṃ tu yojayet /
analyzed: strīṇām kāpuruṣāṇām ca tatas ṛdha ardham tu yojayet
madhyama uttama nīcānām nṛṇām yat gati ceṣṭitam
strīṇām tat eva kartavyā lalitaiḥ pada vikramaiḥ
bālānām api kartavyā svacchanda pada vikramā

original: na tasyāḥ sauṣṭhavaṃ kāryaṃ na pramāṇaṃ prayoktṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: na tasyāḥ sauṣṭhavam kāryam na pramāṇam prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: tṛtīyā prakṛtiḥ kāryā nāmnā caiva napuṃsakā // BhN_12.194 //
analyzed: tṛtīyā prakṛtiḥ kāryā nāmnā ca eva
nara svabhāvam utsṛjya strī gatim tatra yojayet
viparyayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ puruṣa strī napuṃsake
svabhāvam ātmanaḥ tyaktvā tad bhāva gamanāt iha

original: vyājena krīḍayā vāpi tathā bhūyaṃ ca vañcanāt // BhN_12.196 //
analyzed: vyājena krīḍayā vā api tathā bhūyam ca vañcanāt

original: strī puṃsaḥ prakṛtiṃ kuryāt strībhāvaṃ puruṣo 'pi ca /
analyzed: strī puṃsaḥ prakṛtim kuryāt strī bhāvam ca

original: dhairyodāryeṇa sattvena buddhyā tadvacca karmaṇā // BhN_12.197 //
analyzed: dhairya udāryeṇa sattvena buddhyā tadvat ca karmaṇā
strī pumāṃsam tu abhinayet veṣa vākya viceṣṭitaiḥ
strī veṣa bhāṣitaiḥ yuktam preṣita apreṣitaiḥ tathā
mṛdu sanna gatiḥ ca eva pumān strī bhāvam ācaret
jāti hīnāḥ ca yāḥ nāryaḥ pulinda śabara aṅganāḥ
yāḥ ca api tāsām kartavyā tad jāti sadṛśī gatiḥ

original: vratasthānāṃ tapaḥsthānāṃ liṅgasthānāṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_12.200 //
analyzed: vrata sthānām tapaḥ sthānām liṅga sthānām tathā eva ca
kha sthānām ca eva nārīṇām sama pādam prayojayet

original: uddhatā ye 'ṅgahārāḥ syuḥ yāścāryo maṇḍalāni ca // BhN_12.201 //
analyzed: uddhatāḥ ye ṅgahārāḥ syuḥ yāḥ cāryaḥ maṇḍalāni ca
tāni nāṭya prayoga jñaiḥ na kartavyāni yoṣitām

original: tathāsanavidhiḥ kāryo nṛṇāṃ strīṇāṃ viśeṣataḥ // BhN_12.202 //
analyzed: tathā āsana vidhiḥ kāryaḥ nṛṇām strīṇām viśeṣataḥ
nānā bhāva samāyuktaḥ tathā ca śayana āśrayaḥ
viṣkambhita āñcitau pādau trikam kiñcid samunnatam
hastau kaṭi ūru vinyastau svasthe syāt upaveśane
pādaḥ prasāritaḥ kiñcid ekaḥ ca eva āsana āśrayaḥ
śiraḥ pārśva natam ca eva sa cinte upaveśane
cibuka upāśritau hastau bāhu śīrṣa āśritam śiraḥ
sampraṇaṣṭa indriya manāḥ śoka autsukya upaveśane

original: prasārya bāhū śithilau tathā śropāśrayāśritaḥ // BhN_12.206 //
analyzed: prasārya bāhū śithilau tathā śropāśraya āśritaḥ
moha mūrcchā mada glāni viṣādeṣu upaveśayet
sarva piṇḍīkṛta aṅgaḥ tu saṃyuktaiḥ pāda jānubhiḥ
vyādhi vrīḍita nidrāsu dhyāne ca upaviśet naraḥ

original: tathā cotkaṭikaṃ sthānaṃ sphikpārṣṇīnāṃ samāgamaḥ // BhN_12.208 //
analyzed: tathā ca utkaṭikam sthānam sphic pārṣṇīnām samāgamaḥ

original: pitrye nivāpe japye ca sandhyāsvācamane 'pi ca /
analyzed: pitrye nivāpe japye ca sandhyāsu ācamane ca

original: viṣkambhitaṃ punaścaivaṃ jānuṃ bhūmau nipātayet // BhN_12.209 //
analyzed: viṣkambhitam punar ca evam jānum bhūmau nipātayet
priyā prasādane kāryam homa ādi karaṇeṣu ca
mahī gatābhyām jānubhyām adhomukham avasthitam
deva abhigamane ca eva ruṣitānām prasādane

original: śoke cākrandane tīvre mṛtānāṃ caiva darśane // BhN_12.211 //
analyzed: śoke ca ākrandane tīvre mṛtānām ca eva darśane

original: trāsane ca kusattvānāṃ nīcānāṃ caiva yācane /
analyzed: trāsane ca ku sattvānām nīcānām ca eva yācane

original: homayajñakriyāyāṃ ca preṣyāṇāṃ caiva kārayet // BhN_12.212 //
analyzed: homa yajña kriyāyām ca preṣyāṇām ca eva kārayet
munīnām niyameṣu eṣa bhavet āsana jaḥ vidhiḥ
tathā āsana vidhiḥ kāryaḥ vividhaḥ nāṭaka āśrayaḥ
strīṇām ca puruṣāṇām ca bāhyaḥ ca abhyantaraḥ tathā
ābhyantaraḥ tu nṛpateḥ bāhyaḥ bāhya gatasya ca

original: devānāṃ nṛpatīnāṃ ca dadyāt siṃhāsanaṃ dvijaḥ /
analyzed: devānām nṛpatīnām ca dadyāt siṃhāsanam dvijaḥ
purodhasām amātyānām bhavet vetrāsanam tathā
muṇḍāsanam ca dātavyam senānī yuvarājayoḥ
kāṣṭha āsanam dvijātīnām kumārāṇām kutha āsanam
evam rāja sabhām prāpya kāryaḥ tu āsana jaḥ vidhiḥ
strīṇām ca api āsana vidhim sampravakṣyāmi aham punar
siṃhāsanam tu rājñīnām devīnām muṇḍam āsanam
purodhaḥ mātya patnīnām dadyāt vetra āsanam tathā

original: bhoginīnāṃ tathā caiva vastraṃ carma kutho 'pi vā /
analyzed: bhoginīnām tathā ca eva vastram carma vā
brāhmaṇī tāpasīnām ca paṭṭāsanam atha api ca
veśyānām ca pradātavyam āsanam ca mayūrakam

original: śeṣāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ tu bhaved bhūmyāsanaṃ dvijāḥ // BhN_12.220 //
analyzed: śeṣāṇām pramadānām tu bhavet bhūmi āsanam dvijāḥ
evam ābhyantaraḥ jñeyaḥ bāhyaḥ ca āsana jaḥ vidhiḥ
tathā sva gṛha vārtāsu chandena āsanam iṣyate
niyama stha munīnām ca bhavet āsana jaḥ vidhiḥ
liṅginām āsana vidhiḥ kāryaḥ vrata samāśrayaḥ
bruṣī muṇḍa āsana prāyam vetra āsanam atha api ca

original: home yajñakriyāyāṃ ca pitrye 'rthe ca prayojayet // BhN_12.223 //
analyzed: home yajña kriyāyām ca pitrye rthe ca prayojayet
sthānīyāḥ ye ca puruṣāḥ kula vidyā samanvitāḥ
teṣām āsana satkāraḥ karttavyaḥ iha pārthivaiḥ
same samāsanam dadyāt madhye madhyamam āsanam

original: atirikte 'tiriktaṃ ca hīne bhūmyāsanaṃ bhavet // BhN_12.225 //
analyzed: atirikte tiriktam ca hīne bhūmi āsanam bhavet
upādhyāyasya nṛpateḥ gurūṇām agratas budhaiḥ
bhūmi āsanam tathā kāryam athavā kāṣṭham āsanam
nau nāga ratha yāneṣu bhūmi kāṣṭha āsaneṣu ca
sahāsanam na duṣyeta guru upādhyāya pārthivaiḥ
ākuñcitam samam ca eva prasārita vivartane

original: udvāhitaṃ nataṃ caiva śayane karma kīrtyate // BhN_12.228 //
analyzed: udvāhitam natam ca eva śayane karma kīrtyate
sarvaiḥ ākuñcitaiḥ aṅgaiḥ śayyā viddhe tu jānunī
sthānam ākuñcitam nāma śīta ārtānām prayojayet
uttānita mukham ca eva srasta mukta karam tathā

original: samaṃ nāma prasuptasya sthānakaṃ saṃvidhīyate // BhN_12.230 //
analyzed: samam nāma prasuptasya sthānakam saṃvidhīyate
ekam bhujam upādhāya samprasārita jānukam

original: sthānaṃ prasāritaṃ nāma sukhasuptasya kārayet // BhN_12.231 //
analyzed: sthānam prasāritam nāma sukha suptasya kārayet
adhomukha sthitam ca eva vivartitam iti smṛtam
śastra kṣata mṛta utkṣipta matta unmatteṣu kārayet
aṃsa upari śiraḥ kṛtvā karpūra kṣobham eva ca

original: udvāhitaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ līlayā veśane prabhoḥ // BhN_12.233 //
analyzed: udvāhitam tu vijñeyam līlayā veśane prabhoḥ
īṣat prasārite jaṅghe yatra srastau karau ubhau
ālasya śrama khedeṣu natam sthānam vidhīyate

original: gatiprācārastu mayodito 'yaṃ noktaśca yaḥ so 'rthavaśena sādhyaḥ /
analyzed: gati prācāraḥ tu mayā uditaḥ yam na uktaḥ ca yaḥ saḥ ṛtha vaśena sādhyaḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ raṅgaparikramasya vakṣyāmi kakṣyāṃ pravibhāgayuktām // BhN_12.235 //
analyzed: atas param raṅga parikramasya vakṣyāmi kakṣyām pravibhāga yuktām

original: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre gatipracāro nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre gatipracāraḥ nāma dvādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: ye tu pūrvaṃ mayā proktāstrayo vai nāṭyamaṇḍapāḥ /
analyzed: ye tu pūrvam mayā proktāḥ trayaḥ vai nāṭya maṇḍapāḥ

original: teṣāṃ vibhāgaṃ vijñāya tataḥ kakṣyāṃ prayojayet // BhN_13.1 //
analyzed: teṣām vibhāgam vijñāya tatas kakṣyām prayojayet
ye nepathya gṛha dvāre mayā pūrvam prakīrtite

original: tayorbhāṇḍasya vinyāso madhye kāryaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_13.2 //
analyzed: tayoḥ bhāṇḍasya vinyāsaḥ madhye kāryaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
kakṣyā vibhāgaḥ nirdeśyaḥ raṅga pīṭha parikramāt

original: parikrameṇa raṅgasya kakṣyā hyanyā vidhīyate // BhN_13.3 //
analyzed: parikrameṇa raṅgasya kakṣyā hi anyā vidhīyate
kakṣyā vibhāge jñeyāni gṛhāṇi nagarāṇi ca
udyāna ārāma saritaḥ tu āśramāḥ aṭavī tathā
pṛthivī sāgarāḥ ca eva trailokyam sa carācaram
varṣāṇi sapta dvīpāḥ ca parvatāḥ vividhāḥ tathā
alokaḥ ca eva lokaḥ ca rasātalam atha api ca
daitya nāga ālayāḥ ca eva gṛhāṇi bhavanāni ca

original: nagare vā vane vāpi varṣe vā parvate 'pi vā /
analyzed: nagare vā vane vā api varṣe vā parvate vā

original: yatra vārtā pravarteta tatra kakṣyāṃ pravartayet // BhN_13.7 //
analyzed: yatra vārtā pravarteta tatra kakṣyām pravartayet

original: bāhyaṃ vā madhyamaṃ vāpi tathaivābhyantaraṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: bāhyam vā madhyamam vā api tathā eva abhyantaram punar

original: dūraṃ vā sannikṛṣṭaṃ vā deśaṃ tu parikalpayet // BhN_13.8 //
analyzed: dūram vā sannikṛṣṭam vā deśam tu parikalpayet
pūrva praviṣṭāḥ ye raṅgam jñeyāḥ te bhyantarāḥ budhaiḥ

original: paścātpraviṣṭā vijñeyāḥ kakṣyābhāge tu bāhyataḥ // BhN_13.9 //
analyzed: paścāt praviṣṭāḥ vijñeyāḥ kakṣyā bhāge tu bāhyatas
teṣām tu darśana icchuḥ yaḥ praviśet raṅga maṇḍapam
dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ kuryāt ātma nivedanam

original: yato mukhaṃ bhavedbhāṇḍaṃ dvāraṃ nepathyakasya ca /
analyzed: yatas mukham bhavet bhāṇḍam dvāram nepathyakasya ca

original: sā mantavyā tu dik pūrvā nāṭyayoge na nityaśaḥ // BhN_13.11 //
analyzed: sā mantavyā tu diś pūrvā nāṭya yoge na nityaśas

original: niṣkrāmedyaśca tasmādvai sa tenaiva tathā vrajet /
analyzed: niṣkrāmet yaḥ ca tasmāt vai sa tena eva tathā vrajet

original: yatastasya kṛtaṃ tena puruṣeṇa nivedanam // BhN_13.12 //
analyzed: yatas tasya kṛtam tena puruṣeṇa nivedanam
niṣkrāntaḥ ṛtha vaśāt ca api praviśet yadi tat gṛham

original: yataḥ prāptaḥ sa puruṣastena mārgeṇa niṣkramet // BhN_13.13 //
analyzed: yatas prāptaḥ sa puruṣaḥ tena mārgeṇa niṣkramet
athavā artha vaśāt ca api tena eva saha gacchati

original: tathaiva praviśet gehamekākī sahito 'pi vā // BhN_13.14 //
analyzed: tathā eva praviśet geham ekākī vā
