tayoḥ ca api praviśatoḥ kakṣyām anyām vinirdiśet

original: parikrameṇa raṅgasya tvanyā kakṣyā vidhīyate // BhN_13.15 //
analyzed: parikrameṇa raṅgasya tu anyā kakṣyā vidhīyate
samaiḥ ca sahitaḥ gacchet nīcaiḥ ca parivāhitaḥ

original: atha prekṣaṇikāścāpi vijñeyā hyagrato gatau // BhN_13.16 //
analyzed: atha prekṣaṇikāḥ ca api vijñeyāḥ hi agratas gatau
sā eva bhūmiḥ tu bahubhiḥ vikṛṣṭā syāt parikramaiḥ

original: madhyā vā sannikṛṣṭā vā teṣāmevaṃ vikalpayet // BhN_13.17 //
analyzed: madhyāḥ vā sannikṛṣṭāḥ vā teṣām evam vikalpayet

original: nagare vā vane vāpi sāgare parvate 'pi vā /
analyzed: nagare vā vane vā api sāgare parvate vā

original: divyānāṃ gamanaṃ kāryaṃ dvīpe varṣeṣu vā punaḥ // BhN_13.18 //
analyzed: divyānām gamanam kāryam dvīpe varṣeṣu vā punar
ākāśena vimānena māyayā api atha vā punar
vividhābhiḥ kriyābhiḥ vā nānā arthābhiḥ prayogataḥ
nāṭake channa veṣāṇām divyānām bhūmi sañcaraḥ

original: mānuṣe kāraṇādeṣāṃ yathā bhavati darśanam // BhN_13.20 //
analyzed: mānuṣe kāraṇāt eṣām yathā bhavati darśanam

original: bhārate tvatha haime vā harivarṣa ilāvṛte /
analyzed: bhārate tu atha haime vā harivarṣe ilāvṛte

original: ramye kiṃpuruṣe vāpi kuruṣūttarakeṣu vā // BhN_13.21 //
analyzed: ramye kiṃpuruṣe vā api kuruṣu uttarakeṣu vā
divyānām chanda gamanam sarva varṣeṣu kīrtitam
bhārate mānuṣāṇām ca gamanam saṃvidhīyate
gacchet yadi vikṛṣṭaḥ tu deśa kāla vaśāt naraḥ
aṅka chede tam anyasmin nirdiśet hi praveśake

original: ahnaḥ pramāṇaṃ gatvā tu kāryalābhaṃ vinirdiśed /
analyzed: ahnaḥ pramāṇam gatvā tu kārya lābham vinirdiśet

original: tathālābhe tu kāryasya aṅkacchedo vidhīyate // BhN_13.24 //
analyzed: tathā alābhe tu kāryasya aṅka chedaḥ vidhīyate

original: kṣaṇo muhūrto yāno vā divaso vāpi nāṭake /
analyzed: kṣaṇaḥ muhūrtaḥ yānaḥ vā divasaḥ vā api nāṭake
eka aṅke sa vidhātavyaḥ bījasya artha vaśa anugaḥ

original: aṅkacchede tu nirvṛttaṃ māsaṃ vā varṣameva vā /
analyzed: aṅka chede tu nirvṛttam māsam vā varṣam eva vā
na ūrdhvam varṣāt prakartavyam kāryam aṅka samāśrayam

original: evaṃ tu bhārate varṣe kakṣyā kāryā prayogataḥ /
analyzed: evam tu bhārate varṣe kakṣyā kāryā prayogataḥ

original: mānuṣāṇāṃ gatiryā tu divyānāntu nibodhata // BhN_13.27 //
analyzed: mānuṣāṇām gatiḥ yā tu divyānām tu nibodhata
himavat pṛṣṭha saṃsthe tu kailāse parvata uttame
yakṣāḥ ca guhyakāḥ ca eva dhanada anucarāḥ ca ye
rakṣaḥ piśāca bhūtāḥ ca sarve haimavatāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: hemakūṭe ca gandharvā vijñeyāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ // BhN_13.29 //
analyzed: hemakūṭe ca gandharvāḥ vijñeyāḥ sa apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ
sarve nāgāḥ ca niṣadhe śeṣa vāsuki takṣakāḥ

original: mahāmerau trayastriṃśad jñeyā devagaṇā budhaiḥ // BhN_13.30 //
analyzed: mahāmerau trayastriṃśat jñeyāḥ deva gaṇāḥ budhaiḥ
nīle tu vaiḍūrya maye siddhāḥ brahmarṣayaḥ tathā
daityānām dānavānām ca śvetaparvataḥ iṣyate
pitaraḥ ca api vijñeyā śṛṅgavantam samāśritāḥ

original: ityete parvatāḥ śreṣṭhā divyāvāsāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // BhN_13.32 //
analyzed: iti ete parvatāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ divya āvāsāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
teṣām kakṣyā vibhāgaḥ ca jambūdvīpe bhavet ayam

original: teṣāṃ na ceṣṭitaṃ kāryaṃ svaiḥ svaiḥ karmaparākramaiḥ // BhN_13.33 //
analyzed: teṣām na ceṣṭitam kāryam svaiḥ svaiḥ karma parākramaiḥ
paricchacche
da viśeṣaḥ tu teṣām mānuṣa loka vat

original: sarve bhāvāśca divyānāṃ kāryā mānuṣasaṃśrayāḥ // BhN_13.34 //
analyzed: sarve bhāvāḥ ca divyānām kāryāḥ mānuṣa saṃśrayāḥ
teṣām tu animiṣa tvam yat tat na kāryam prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: iha bhāvā rasāścaiva dṛṣṭāveva pratiṣṭhitāḥ // BhN_13.35 //
analyzed: iha bhāvāḥ rasāḥ ca eva dṛṣṭau eva pratiṣṭhitāḥ
dṛṣṭyā hi sūcitaḥ bhāvaḥ punar aṅgaiḥ vibhāvyate

original: evaṃ kakṣyāvibhāgastu mayā prokto dvijottamāḥ // BhN_13.36 //
analyzed: evam kakṣyā vibhāgaḥ tu mayā proktaḥ dvijottamāḥ
punar ca eva pravakṣyāmi pravṛttīnām tu lakṣaṇam
caturvidhā pravṛttiḥ ca proktā nāṭya prayogataḥ

original: āvantī dākṣiṇātyā ca pāñcālī coḍhramāgadhī // BhN_13.37 //
analyzed: āvantī dākṣiṇātyā ca pāñcālī ca ūḍhramāgadhī
atra āha pravṛttiḥ iti kasmāt
ucyate pṛthivyām
nānā deśa veṣa bhāṣā ācāra vārtāḥ prakhyāpayati iti vṛttiḥ
pravṛttiḥ ca nivedane
atra āha yathā pṛthivyām bahavaḥ
deśāḥ santi
katham āsām caturvidha tvam upapannam
samāna lakṣaṇaḥ ca āsām prayogaḥ ucyate
satyam etat
samāna lakṣaṇaḥ āsām prayogaḥ kintu
nānā deśa veṣa bhāṣā ācāraḥ lokaḥ iti kṛtvā loka anumatena
vṛtti saṃśritasya nāṭyasya vṛttīnām mayā
caturvidha tvam abhihitam bhāratī sāttvatī kaiśikī ārabhaṭī
ca iti vṛtti saṃśritaiḥ ca prayogaiḥ abhihitāḥ deśāḥ yatas
pravṛtti catuṣṭayam abhinirvṛttam prayogaḥ ca utpāditaḥ tatra
dākṣiṇātyāḥ tāvat bahu nṛtta gīta vādyā kaiśikī prāyāḥ
catura madhura lalita aṅga abhinayāḥ ca tat yathā

original: eteṣu ye śritā deśāḥ sa jñeyo dakṣiṇāpathaḥ // BhN_13.38 //
analyzed: eteṣu ye śritāḥ deśāḥ sa jñeyaḥ dakṣiṇāpathaḥ
kosalāḥ aggstośalāḥ ca eva kaliṅgāḥ yavanāḥ khasāḥ
draviḍa andhra mahārāṣṭrāḥ vaiṣṇāḥ vai vāna vāsa jāḥ
dakṣiṇasya samudrasya tathā vindhyasya ca antare

original: ye deśāsteṣu yuñjīta dākṣiṇātyāṃ tu nityaśaḥ // BhN_13.40 //
analyzed: ye deśāḥ teṣu yuñjīta dākṣiṇātyām tu nityaśas
āvantikāḥ vaidiśikāḥ saurāṣṭrāḥ mālavāḥ tathā
saindhavāḥ tu atha sauvīrāḥ āvartāḥ sārbudeyakāḥ
dāśārṇāḥ traipurāḥ ca eva tathā vai mārtikāvatāḥ
kurvanti āvantikīm ete pravṛttim nityam eva tu
sāttvatīm kaiśikīm ca eva vṛttim eṣām samāśritā

original: bhavet pryogo nāṭye 'tra sa tu kāryaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_13.43 //
analyzed: bhavet pryogaḥ nāṭye sa tu kāryaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
aṅgāḥ vaṅgāḥ kaliṅgāḥ ca vatsāḥ ca eva ūḍhra māgadhāḥ
pauṇḍrāḥ nepālakāḥ ca eva antargiri bahirgirāḥ
tathā plavaṅgamāḥ jñeyāḥ maladāḥ mallavartakāḥ
brahmottara prabhṛtayaḥ bhārgavāḥ mārgavāḥ tathā
prājyotiṣāḥ pulindāḥ ca vaidehāḥ tāmraliptakāḥ
prāṅgāḥ prāvṛtayaḥ ca eva yuñjanti iha uḍhra māgadhīm

original: anye 'pi deśāḥ prācyāṃ ye purāṇe samprakīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: anye deśāḥ prācyām ye purāṇe samprakīrtitāḥ
teṣu prayujyate hi eṣā pravṛttiḥ coḍhramāgadhī
saurasenāḥ ca kāśmīrāḥ hastināpurāḥ
śalyakāḥ ca eva madra kauśīnarāḥ tathā
himavat saṃśritāḥ ye tu gaṅgāyāḥ ca uttarām diśam

original: ye śritā vai janapadāsteṣu pāñcālamadhyamāḥ // BhN_13.49 //
analyzed: ye śritāḥ vai janapadāḥ teṣu pāñcāla madhyamāḥ
pāñcāla madhyamāyām tu sāttvatī ārabhaṭī smṛtā
prayogaḥ tu alpa gīta arthaḥ āviddha gati vikramaḥ
dvidhā kriyā bhavati āsām raṅga pīṭha parikrame
pradakṣiṇa pradeśā ca tathā ca api apradakṣiṇā
āvantī dākṣiṇātyā ca pradakṣiṇa parikrame
apasavya pradeśāḥ tu pāñcālī ca ūḍhra māgadhī
āvantyām dākṣiṇātyāyām pārśva dvāram atha uttaram

original: pāñcālyāmoḍhramāgadhyāṃ yojyaṃ dvāraṃ tu dakṣiṇam // BhN_13.53 //
analyzed: pāñcālyām oḍhramāgadhyām yojyam dvāram tu dakṣiṇam
ekībhūtāḥ punar ca etāḥ prayoktavyāḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
pārṣadam deśa kālau vā api artha yuktim avekṣya ca

original: yeṣu deśeṣu yā kāryā pravṛttiḥ parikīrtitā /
analyzed: yeṣu deśeṣu yā kāryā pravṛttiḥ parikīrtitā

original: tadvṛttikāni rūpāṇi teṣu tajjñaḥ prayojayet // BhN_13.55 //
analyzed: tad vṛttikāni rūpāṇi teṣu tad jñaḥ prayojayet
ekībhūtāḥ punar tu etāḥ nāṭaka ādau bhavanti hi
avekṣya vṛtti bāhulyam tat tat karma samācaret
sārthe bāhulyam ekasya śeṣāṇām atha buddhimān
yeṣām anyasya bāhulyam pravṛttim pūrayet tadā
prayogaḥ dvividhaḥ ca eva vijñeyaḥ nāṭaka āśrayaḥ
sukumāraḥ tathā āviddhaḥ nāṭya yukti samāśrayaḥ
yat tu āviddha aṅgahāram tu chedya bhedya āhava ātmakam
māyā indrajāla bahulam pusta nepathya saṃyutam
puruṣaiḥ bahubhiḥ yuktam alpa strīkam tathā eva ca
sāttvatī ārabhaṭī yuktam nāṭyam āviddha saṃjñitam
ḍimaḥ samavakāraḥ ca vyāyaḥ gehāmṛgau tathā
etāni āviddha saṃjñāni vijñeyāni prayoktṛbhiḥ
eṣām prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ daitya dānava rākṣasaiḥ

original: uddhatā ye ca puruṣāḥ śauryavīryabalānvitāḥ // BhN_13.62 //
analyzed: uddhatāḥ ye ca puruṣāḥ śaurya vīrya bala anvitāḥ
nāṭakam sa prakaraṇam bhāṇaḥ vīthi aṅkanāṭike
su kumāra prayogāṇi mānuṣeṣu āśritāḥ tu ye
atha bāhya prayogeṣu prekṣāgṛha vivarjite
vidikṣu api bhavet raṅgaḥ kadācid bhartuḥ ājñayā

original: pṛṣṭha kutapaṃ nāṭye yuktā yato mukhaṃ bharatāḥ /
analyzed: kutapam nāṭye yuktāḥ yatas mukham bharatāḥ

original: sā pūrvā mantavyā prayogakāle tu nāṭyajñaiḥ // BhN_13.65 //
analyzed: sā pūrvā mantavyā prayoga kāle tu nāṭya jñaiḥ
dvārāṇi ṣaḍ ca eva bhavanti ca asya
raṅgasya diś bhāga viniścitāni
nāṭya prayogeṇa khalu praveśe

original: prācyāṃ pratīcyāṃ ca diśi praveśaḥ // BhN_13.66 //
analyzed: prācyām pratīcyām ca diśi praveśaḥ
vidhānam utkramya yathā ca raṅge
vinā pramāṇāt vidiśaḥ prayoge
yasmāt sa mṛdaṅga bhāṇḍam
prācīm diśam tām manasā adhyavasyet
vayaḥ nurūpaḥ veśaḥ veśaḥ nurūpaḥ ca gati pracāraḥ
gati pracāra anugataḥ ca pāṭhyam
pāṭhya anurūpa abhinayaḥ ca kāryaḥ

original: dharmī yā dvividhā proktā mayā pūrvaṃ dvijottamāḥ /
analyzed: dharmī yā dvividhā proktā mayā pūrvam dvijottamāḥ

original: laukikī nāṭyadharmī ca tayorvakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam // BhN_13.69 //
analyzed: laukikī nāṭya dharmī ca tayoḥ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam
svabhāva bhāva upagatam śuddham tu avikṛtam tathā
svabhāva abhinaya upetam nānā strī puruṣa āśrayam

original: yadīdṛśaṃ bhavennāṭyaṃ lokadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.71 //
analyzed: yadi īdṛśam bhavet nāṭyam loka dharmī tu sā smṛtā
ati vākya kriyā upetam ati sattva atibhāvakam
līlā aṅgahāra abhinayam nāṭya lakṣaṇa lakṣitam
svara alaṅkāra saṃyuktam asvastha puruṣa āśrayam

original: yadīdṛśaṃ bhavennāṭyaṃ nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.73 //
analyzed: yadi īdṛśam bhavet nāṭyam nāṭya dharmī tu sā smṛtā
loka prasiddham yadā nāṭye prayujyate

original: mūrtimat sābhilāṣañca nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.74 //
analyzed: mūrtimat sa abhilāṣañca nāṭya dharmī tu sā smṛtā
āsanna uktam tu yat vākyam na śṛṇvanti parasparam

original: anuktaṃ śrūyate vākyaṃ nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.75 //
analyzed: anuktam śrūyate vākyam nāṭya dharmī tu sā smṛtā
śaila yāna vimānāni carma varma āyudha dhvajāḥ

original: mūrtimantaḥ prayujyante nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.76 //
analyzed: mūrtimantaḥ prayujyante nāṭya dharmī tu sā smṛtā
yaḥ ekām bhūmikām kṛtvā kurvīta eka antare parām

original: kauśalyādekakatvādvā nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.77 //
analyzed: kauśalyāt ekaka tvāt vā nāṭya dharmī tu sā smṛtā

original: yā gamyā pramadā bhūtvā gamyā bhūmiṣu yujyate /
analyzed: yā gamyā pramadā bhūtvā gamyā bhūmiṣu yujyate

original: gamyā bhūmiṣvagamyā ca nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.78 //
analyzed: gamyā bhūmiṣu agamyā ca nāṭya dharmī tu sā smṛtā
lalitaiḥ aṅga vinyāsaiḥ tathā utkṣipta pada kramaiḥ

original: nṛtyate gamyate yacca nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.79 //
analyzed: nṛtyate gamyate yat ca nāṭya dharmī tu sā smṛtā
yaḥ yam svabhāvaḥ lokasya sukha duḥkha kriyā ātmakaḥ

original: so 'ṅgābhinayasaṃyukto nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.80 //
analyzed: ṅga abhinaya saṃyuktaḥ nāṭya dharmī tu sā smṛtā
yaḥ ca itihāsa veda arthaḥ brahmaṇā samudāhṛtaḥ

original: divyamānuṣaratyarthaṃ nāṭyadharmī tu sā smṛtā // BhN_13.81 //
analyzed: divya mānuṣa rati artham nāṭya dharmī tu sā smṛtā
yaḥ ca kakṣyā vibhāgaḥ yam nānā vidhi samāśritaḥ

original: raṅgapīṭhagataḥ prokto nāṭyadharmī tu sā bhavet // BhN_13.82 //
analyzed: raṅgapīṭha gataḥ proktaḥ nāṭya dharmī tu sā bhavet
nāṭya dharmī pravṛttam hi sadā nāṭyam prayojayet
na hi aṅga abhinayāt kiñcid ṛte rāga pravartate
sarvasya sahajaḥ bhāvaḥ sarvaḥ hi abhinayaḥ rthataḥ
aṅga alaṅkāra ceṣṭābhiḥ nāṭya dharmī prakīrtitā

original: evaṃ kakṣyāvibhāgastu dharmī yuktaya eva ca /
analyzed: evam kakṣyā vibhāgaḥ tu dharmī yuktayaḥ eva ca
vijñeyāḥ nāṭya tattva jñaiḥ prayoktavyāḥ ca tattvataḥ

original: ukto mayehābhinayo yathāvat śākhākṛto yaśca kṛto 'ṅgahāraiḥ /
analyzed: uktaḥ mayā iha abhinayaḥ yathāvat śākhā kṛtaḥ yaḥ ca kṛtaḥ ṅgahāraiḥ
punar ca vākya abhinayam yathāvat vakṣye svara vyañjana varṇa yuktam

original: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre karayuktidharmīvyañjako nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bharatīye nāṭya śāstre karayuktidharmīvyañjakaḥ nāma trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha caturdaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: yo vāgabhinayaḥ prokto mayā pūrvaṃ dvijottamāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vāc abhinayaḥ proktaḥ mayā pūrvam dvijottamāḥ
lakṣaṇam tasya vakṣyāmi svara vyañjana sambhavam

original: vāci yatnastu kartavyo nāṭyasyeyaṃ tanuḥ smṛtā /
analyzed: vāci yatnaḥ tu kartavyaḥ nāṭyasya iyam tanuḥ smṛtā
aṅga nepathya sattvāni vākya artham vyañjayanti hi
vāc mayāni iha śāstrāṇi vāc niṣṭhāni tathā eva ca

original: tasmādvācaḥ paraṃ nāsti vāg hi sarvasya kāraṇam // BhN_14.3 //
analyzed: tasmāt vācaḥ param na asti vāc hi sarvasya kāraṇam
āgama nāma ākhyāta nipāta upasarga samāsa taddhitaiḥ yuktaḥ
sandhi vacana vibhakti upagraha niyuktaḥ vācika abhinayaḥ

original: dvividhaṃ hi smṛtaṃ pāṭhyaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā /
analyzed: dvividham hi smṛtam pāṭhyam saṃskṛtam prākṛtam tathā
tayoḥ vibhāgam vakṣyāmi yathāvat anupūrvaśas
vyañjanāni svarāḥ ca eva vibhaktayaḥ
nāma ākhyāta upasargāḥ ca nipātāḥ taddhitāḥ tathā
etaiḥ aṅgaiḥ samāsaiḥ ca nānā dhātu samāśrayam

original: vijñeyaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ pāṭhyaṃ prayogañca nibodhata // BhN_14.7 //
analyzed: vijñeyam saṃskṛtam pāṭhyam prayogañca nibodhata
akāra ādyāḥ svarāḥ jñeyāḥ aukāra antāḥ caturdaśa
hakāra antāni ka ādīni vyañjanāni viduḥ budhāḥ

original: tatra svarāścaturdaśa - a ā i ī u ū ṛ ṝ ḷ ḹ e ai
analyzed: tatra svarāḥ caturdaśa a ā i ī u ū ṛ ḷ ḷ ḷ e ai
o au iti svarāḥ jñeyāḥ

original: kādīni vyañjanāni yathā - ka kha ga gha ṅa ca cha ja jha
analyzed: ka ādīni vyañjanāni yathā ka kha ga gha ṅa ca cha ja jha

original: ña ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa ta tha da dha na pa pha ba bha ma ya ra la va
analyzed: ña ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa ta tha da dha na pa pha ba bha ma ya ra la va

original: śa ṣa sa ha iti vyañjanavargaḥ /
analyzed: śa ṣa sa ha iti vyañjana vargaḥ

original: varge varge samākhyātau dvau varṇau prāgavasthitau /
analyzed: varge varge samākhyātau dvau varṇau prāk avasthitau

original: aghoṣā iti ye tvanye saghoṣāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ // BhN_14.9 //
analyzed: aghoṣāḥ iti ye tu anye sa ghoṣāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ
aṣṭau sthānāni varṇānām uraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiraḥ tathā

original: jihvāmūlaśca dantāśca nāsikoṣṭhau ca tālu ca // BhN_14.10 //
analyzed: jihvā mūlaḥ ca dantāḥ ca nāsikā uṣṭhau ca tālu ca
a ku ha visarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyāḥ
i cu ya śāstālavyāḥ
ṛ ṭu ra ṣā mūrdhanyāḥ

original: ḷ tu la sā dantyāḥ / u
analyzed: ḷ tu la sā dantyāḥ u
pūpadhmānīyāḥ oṣṭhyāḥ
pa phaḥ iti pa phābhyām prāk
ardha visarga sadṛśaḥ upadhmānīyaḥ
ka khaḥ iti ka khābhyām
prāk ardha visarga sadṛśaḥ jihvamūlīyaḥ
e ai kaṇṭhya tālavyau
o au kaṇṭhya oṣṭhyau
vakāraḥ dantī oṣṭhyaḥ
ṅa ña ṇa na mā
anunāsikāḥ
visarjanīyaḥ aurasyaḥ iti eke
sarva varṇānām mukham sthānam iti apare

original: dvau dvau varṇau tu vargādyau śaṣasāśca trayo 'pare /
analyzed: dvau dvau varṇau tu varga ādyau śa ṣa sāḥ ca pare
aghoṣāḥ ghoṣavantaḥ tu tatas nye parikīrtitāḥ
ete ghoṣa aghoṣāḥ kaṇṭhya oṣṭhyāḥ dantya jihvā anunāsikyāḥ
ūṣmāṇaḥ tālavyāḥ visarjanīyāḥ ca boddhavyāḥ

original: gaghaṅa jajhaña ḍaḍhaṇa dadhana babhama tathaiva yaralavā matā ghoṣāḥ /
analyzed: gaghaṅa jajhaña ḍaḍhaṇa dadhana babhama tathā eva yaralavāḥ matāḥ ghoṣāḥ

original: kakha cacha ṭaṭha tatha papha iti vargeṣvaghoṣāḥ syuḥ // BhN_14.13 //
analyzed: ka kha ca cha ṭa ṭha ta tha pa pha iti vargeṣu a ghoṣāḥ syuḥ
ka kha ga ghaṅāḥ kaṇṭha sthāḥ tālu sthānāḥ tu ca cha ja jhañāḥ
mūrdhanyāḥ tatha dadhanāḥ ca eva danta sthāḥ

original: paphababhamāstvoṣṭhyāḥ syuḥ dantyā ḷlasā ahau ca kaṇṭhasthau /
analyzed: papha babha māḥ tvoṣṭhyāḥ syuḥ dantyāḥ ḷ lasāḥ ahau ca kaṇṭha sthau

original: tālavyā icuyaśā syurṛṭuraṣā mūrdhasthitā jñeyāḥ // BhN_14.15 //
analyzed: tālavyāḥ syuḥ ṛ ṭu ra ṣāḥ mūrdha sthitāḥ jñeyāḥ

original: ḷḹ dantyau oau kaṇṭhoṣṭhyau eaikārau ca kaṇṭhatālavyau /
analyzed: ḷḥ dantyau oau kaṇṭha uṣṭhyau e ai kārau ca kaṇṭha tālavyau
kaṇṭhyaḥ visarjanīyaḥ jihvā mūlam udbhavaḥ ka khayoḥ
pa phayoḥ oṣṭha sthānam bhavet ukāraḥ svaraḥ vivṛtaḥ

original: spṛṣṭāḥ kādyā māntāḥ śaṣasahakārāstathā vivṛtāḥ // BhN_14.17 //
analyzed: spṛṣṭāḥ ka ādyāḥ ma antāḥ śa ṣa saha kārāḥ tathā vivṛtāḥ
antasthāḥ saṃvṛta jāḥ ṅaña ṇa namāḥ nāsikā udbhavāḥ jñeyāḥ
ūṣmāṇaḥ ca śa ṣa sahāḥ ya ra la va varṇāḥ tathā eva ca antaḥsthāḥ
jihvāmūlīyaḥ kaḥ paḥ upadhmānīya saṃjñayā jñeyaḥ

original: kacaṭatapā svaritāḥ syuḥ khachaṭhathaphā syuḥ sadā kramyāḥ // BhN_14.19 //
analyzed: ka ca ṭa ta pā svaritāḥ syuḥ kha cha ṭha tha phā syuḥ sadā kramyāḥ
vidyāt gha jha ḍha dha bhān pāṭhya saṃprayoge tu

original: vedyo visarjanīyo jihvāsthāne sthito varṇaḥ // BhN_14.20 //
analyzed: vedyaḥ visarjanīyaḥ jihvā sthāne sthitaḥ varṇaḥ

original: ete vyañjanavarṇāḥ samāsataḥ saṃjñayā mayā kathitāḥ /
analyzed: ete vyañjana varṇāḥ samāsatas saṃjñayā mayā kathitāḥ
śabda viṣaya prayoge svarān tu bhūyas pravakṣyāmi

original: yasmin sthāne sa samo vijñeyo yaḥ savarṇasaṃjño 'sau /
analyzed: yasmin sthāne sa samaḥ vijñeyaḥ yaḥ savarṇa saṃjñaḥ sau

original: ya ime svarāścaturdaśa nirdiṣṭāstatra vai daśa samānāḥ /
analyzed: ye ime svarāḥ caturdaśa nirdiṣṭāḥ tatra vai daśa samānāḥ

original: pūrvo hrasvaḥ teṣāṃ paraśca dīrgho 'vagantavyaḥ // BhN_14.22 //
analyzed: pūrvaḥ hrasvaḥ teṣām paraḥ ca dīrghaḥ vagantavyaḥ
ittham vyañjana yogaiḥ svaraiḥ ca sa ākhyāta nāmapada vihitaiḥ
kāvya nibandhāḥ ca syuḥ dhātu nipāta upasargāḥ tu
ebhiḥ vyañjana vargaiḥ nāma ākhyāta upasarga nipātaiḥ
taddhita sandhi vibhaktibhiḥ adhiṣṭhitaḥ śabdaḥ iti uktaḥ
pūrva ācāryaiḥ uktam śabdānām lakṣaṇam samāsa yogena
vistaraśaḥ punar eva prakaraṇa vaśāt saṃpravakṣyāmi
artha pradhānam nāma syāt ākhyātam tu kriyā kṛtam
dyotayanti upasargāḥ tu viśeṣam bhāva saṃśrayam
tat prāhuḥ saptavidham ṣaṣ kāraka saṃyutam prathita sādhyam
nirdeśa saṃpradāna apadāna prabhṛti saṃjñābhiḥ
nāma ākhyāta artha viṣayam viśeṣam dyotayanti te
pṛthak tatra upasargebhyaḥ nipātāḥ niyame cyute
saṃprati atīta kāla kriyā ādi saṃyojitam prathita sādhyam
vacanam na agata yuktam su sadṛśa saṃyojana vibhaktam
pañca śata dhātu yuktam pañcaguṇam pañcavidham idam vā api
sva ādi adhikāra guṇaiḥ artha viśeṣaiḥ vibhūṣita nyāsam
prātipadika artha liṅgaiḥ yuktam pañcavidham idam jñeyam
ākhyātam pāṭhya kṛtam jñeyam nānā artha āśraya viśeṣam
vacanam nāma sametam puruṣa vibhaktam tat ākhyātam
prātipadika artha yuktān dhātvarthān upasṛjanti ye svārthaiḥ
upasargāḥ hi upadiṣṭāḥ tasmāt saṃskāra śāstre smin
prātipadika artha yogāt dhātu chandaḥ nirukta yuktyā ca
yasmāt nipatanti pade tasmāt proktāḥ nipātāḥ tu
pratyaya vibhāga janitāḥ prakarṣa saṃyoga satva vacanaiḥ ca
yasmāt pūrayate rthān pratyayaḥ uktaḥ tatas tasmāt
loke prakṛti pratyaya vibhāga saṃyoga satva vacanaiḥ ca
tān tān pūrayate rthān teṣu yaḥ taddhitaḥ tasmāt

original: ekasya bahūnāṃ vā dhātorliṅgasya vā padānāṃ vā /
analyzed: ekasya bahūnām vā dhātoḥ liṅgasya vā padānām vā

original: vibhajantyarthaṃ yasmāt vibhaktayastena tāḥ proktāḥ // BhN_14.36 //
analyzed: vibhajanti artham yasmāt vibhaktayaḥ tena tāḥ proktāḥ

original: viśiṣṭāstu svarā yatra vyañjanaṃ vāpi yogataḥ /
analyzed: viśiṣṭāḥ tu svarāḥ yatra vyañjanam vā api yogataḥ

original: sandhīyate pade yasmāttasmāt sandhiḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_14.37 //
analyzed: sandhīyate pade yasmāt tasmāt sandhiḥ prakīrtitaḥ
varṇa pada krama siddhaḥ pada eka yogāt ca varṇa yogāt ca

original: sandhīyate ca yasmāttasmāt sandhiḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ // BhN_14.38 //
analyzed: sandhīyate ca yasmāt tasmāt sandhiḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ
lupta vibhaktiḥ nāmnām eka artham saṃharat samāsaḥ pi
tatpuruṣa ādika saṃjñaiḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ viprāḥ
ebhiḥ śabda vidhānaiḥ vistāra vyañjana artha saṃyuktaiḥ

original: padabandhāḥ kartavyā nibaddhabandhāstu cūrṇā vā // BhN_14.40 //
analyzed: pada bandhāḥ kartavyāḥ nibaddha bandhāḥ tu cūrṇāḥ vā

original: vibhaktyantaṃ padaṃ jñeyaṃ nibaddhaṃ cūrṇameva ca /
analyzed: vibhakti antam padam jñeyam nibaddham cūrṇam eva ca
tatra cūrṇa padasya iha san nibodhata lakṣaṇam
a nibaddha padam chandaḥ vidhāna a niyata akṣaram
artha apekṣi akṣara syūtam jñeyam cūrṇa padam budhaiḥ
nibaddha akṣara saṃyuktam yati cheda samanvitam

original: nibaddhaṃ tu padaṃ jñeyaṃ pramāṇaniyatātmakam // BhN_14.43 //
analyzed: nibaddham tu padam jñeyam pramāṇa niyata ātmakam
evam nānā artha saṃyuktaiḥ pādaiḥ varṇa vibhūṣitaiḥ
caturbhiḥ tu bhavet yuktam chandaḥ vṛtta abhidhāna vat
ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ smṛtā anyebhiḥ pādaiḥ chandasi saṃkhyayā
tathā viṣamam eva ca
chandaḥ yuktam samāsena trividham vṛttam iṣyate
nānā vṛtti viniṣpannā śabdasya eṣā tanūḥ smṛtā
chandaḥ hīnaḥ na asti na chandaḥ śabda varjitam
tasmāt tu ubhya saṃyogaḥ nāṭyasya udyotakaḥ smṛtaḥ
eka akṣaram bhavet uktam atyuktam dvi akṣaram bhavet
madhyam tri akṣaram iti āhuḥ pratiṣṭhā catur akṣarā

original: supratiṣṭhā bhavet pañca gāyatrī ṣaḍ bhavediha /
analyzed: su pratiṣṭhā bhavet pañca gāyatrī ṣaṣ bhavet iha
sapta akṣarā bhavet uṣṇih aṣṭa akṣarā anuṣṭubh ucyate
nava akṣarā tu bṛhatī paṅktiḥ ca eva daśa akṣarā
ekādaśa akṣarā triṣṭubh jagatī dvādaśa akṣarā
trayodaśā atijagatī śakvarī tu caturdaśā
atiśakvarī pañcadaśā ṣoḍaśa aṣṭiḥ prakīrtitā
atyaṣṭiḥ syāt saptadaśā dhṛtiḥ aṣṭādaśa akṣarā
ekonaviṃśatiḥ dhṛtiḥ kṛtiḥ viṃśatiḥ eva ca
prakṛtiḥ ca ekaviṃśatyā dvāviṃśati ākṛtiḥ tathā

original: vikṛtiḥ syāt trayoviṃśā caturviṃśā ca saṃkṛtiḥ // BhN_14.53 //
analyzed: vikṛtiḥ syāt trayoviṃśā caturviṃśā ca saṃkṛtiḥ
pañcaviṃśati atikṛtiḥ ṣaḍviṃśati utkṛtiḥ bhavet
atas dhika akṣaram chandaḥ mālāvṛttam tat iṣyate

original: chandasāṃ tu tathā hyete bhedāḥ prastārayogataḥ /
analyzed: chandasām tu tathā hi ete bhedāḥ prastāra yogataḥ
asaṃkhyeya pramāṇāni vṛttāni āhuḥ atas budhāḥ
gāyatrī prabhṛti tu eṣām pramāṇam saṃvidhīyate

original: prayogajāni sarvāṇi prāyaśo na bhavanti hi // BhN_14.56 //
analyzed: prayoga jāni sarvāṇi prāyaśas na bhavanti hi
vṛttāni ca catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ gāyatryām kīrtitāni tu
śatam viṃśatiḥ aṣṭau ca vṛttāni uṣṇihī atha ucyate
ṣaṭpañcāśat śate dve ca vṛttānām api anuṣṭubhi

original: śatāni pañca vṛtānāṃ bṛhatyāṃ dvādaśaiva ca // BhN_14.58 //
analyzed: śatāni pañca vṛtānām bṛhatyām dvādaśa eva ca
paṅktyām sahasram vṛttānām caturviṃśatiḥ eva ca

original: traiṣṭubhe dve sahasre ca catvāriṃśattathāṣṭa ca // BhN_14.59 //
analyzed: traiṣṭubhe dve sahasre ca catvāriṃśat tathā aṣṭa ca
sahasrāṇi api catvāri navatiḥ ca ṣaḍ uttarā
jagatyām sama varṇānām vṛttānām iha sarvaśas

original: aṣṭau sahasrāṇi śataṃ dvyadhikā navatiḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭau sahasrāṇi śatam dvi adhikā navatiḥ punar
jagatyām atipūrvāyām vṛttānām parimāṇataḥ
śatāni trīṇi aśītiḥ ca sahasrāṇi api ṣoḍaśa

original: vṛttāni caiva catvāri śakvaryāḥ parisaṃkhyayā // BhN_14.62 //
analyzed: vṛttāni ca eva catvāri śakvaryāḥ parisaṃkhyayā

original: dvātriṃśacca sahasrāṇi sapta caiva śatāni ca /
analyzed: dvātriṃśat ca sahasrāṇi sapta ca eva śatāni ca
aṣṭau ṣaṣṭiḥ ca vṛttāni hi āśrayanti atiśakvarīm
pañca ṣaṣṭi sahasrāṇi sahasra ardham ca saṃkhyayā

original: ṣaṭtriṃśaccaiva vṛttāni hyaṣṭyāṃ nigaditāni ca // BhN_14.64 //
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat ca eva vṛttāni hi aṣṭyām nigaditāni ca
ekatriṃśat sahasrāṇi vṛttānām ca dvisaptatiḥ
tathā śata sahasran ca chandāṃsi atyaṣṭi saṃjñite
dhṛtyām api hi piṇḍena vṛttāni ākalpitāni tu

original: tajjñaiḥ śatasahasre dve śatamekaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_14.66 //
analyzed: tad jñaiḥ śata sahasre dve śatam ekam tathā eva ca
dviṣaṣṭiḥ ca sahasrāṇi catvāriṃśat ca yogataḥ

original: catvāri caiva vṛttāni samasaṃkhyāśrayāṇi tu // BhN_14.67 //
analyzed: catvāri ca eva vṛttāni sama saṃkhyā āśrayāṇi tu
atidhṛtyām sahasrāṇi caturviṃśatiḥ eva ca
tathā śata sahasrāṇi pañca vṛtta śata dvayam
aṣṭāśītiḥ ca vṛttāni vṛtta jñaiḥ kathitāni ca

original: kṛtau śatasahasrāṇi daśa proktāni saṃkhyayā // BhN_14.69 //
analyzed: kṛtau śata sahasrāṇi daśa proktāni saṃkhyayā
catvāriṃśat tathā ca aṣṭau sahasrāṇi śatāni ca
pañca ṣaṭsaptatiḥ ca eva vṛttānām parimāṇataḥ
tathā śata sahasrāṇām prakṛtau viṃśatiḥ bhavet

original: sapta vai gaditāstvatra navatiścaiva saṃkhyayā // BhN_14.71 //
analyzed: sapta vai gaditāḥ tu atra navatiḥ ca eva saṃkhyayā
sahasrāṇi śatam ca ekam dvipañcāśat tathā eva ca
vṛttāni parimāṇena vṛtta jñaiḥ gaditāni tu
catvāriṃśat tathā ekam ca lakṣāṇām atha saṃkhyayā
tathā ca iha sahasrāṇi navatiḥ catur uttarā
śata trayam samākhyātam hi ākṛtyām catur uttaram
jñeyā śata sahasrāṇām aśītiḥ tri adhikā budhaiḥ

original: aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇi vṛttānāṃ ṣaṭ śatāni ca /
analyzed: aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇi vṛttānām ṣaḍ śatāni ca

original: aṣṭau caiva tu vṛttāni vikṛtyāṃ gaditāni tu // BhN_14.75 //
analyzed: aṣṭau ca eva tu vṛttāni vikṛtyām gaditāni tu
tathā śata sahasrāṇi saptaṣaṣṭiḥ ca saptatiḥ

original: sapta caiva sahasrāṇi ṣoḍaśe dve śate tathā // BhN_14.76 //
analyzed: sapta ca eva sahasrāṇi ṣoḍaśe dve śate tathā
koṭiḥ ca evā iha vṛttāni saṃkṛtau kathitāni vai
koṭi trayam ca abhikṛtyām pañcatriṃśadbhiḥ anvitam
pañcāśadbhiḥ sahasraiḥ ca caturbhiḥ adhikaiḥ tathā

original: catuṣṭayaṃ śatānām ca dvātriṃśadbhiḥ samanvitam // BhN_14.78 //
analyzed: catuṣṭayam śatānām ca dvātriṃśadbhiḥ samanvitam
ṣaṭ koṭayaḥ tathā utkṛtyām lakṣāṇām ekasaptatiḥ
catuṣṣaṣṭi śatāni aṣṭau sahasrāṇi aṣṭa ca eva hi
uktāt utkṛti paryanta vṛtta saṃkhyām vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: etena ca vikalpena vṛtteṣveteṣu nirdiśet // BhN_14.80 //
analyzed: etena ca vikalpena vṛtteṣu eteṣu nirdiśet
sarveṣām chandasām evam vṛttāni kathitāni vai

original: tisraḥ koṭayo daśa tathā sahasrāṇāṃ śatāni tu // BhN_14.81 //
analyzed: tisraḥ koṭayaḥ daśa tathā sahasrāṇām śatāni tu

original: catvāriṃśattathā dve ca sahasrāṇi daśaiva tu /
analyzed: catvāriṃśat tathā dve ca sahasrāṇi daśa eva tu

original: saptabhiḥ sahitānyeva sapta caiva śatāni ca // BhN_14.82 //
analyzed: saptabhiḥ sahitāni eva sapta ca eva śatāni ca
ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ iha anyāni vyākhyātāni samāsatas
samāni gaṇanā yuktim āśritya kathitāni vai
sarveṣām chandasām evam trikaiḥ vṛttam prayojayet
jñeyāḥ ca aṣṭau trikāḥ tatra saṃjñābhiḥ sthānam acśaram
trīṇi akṣarāṇi vijñeyaḥ trikaḥ ṃśaḥ parikalpitaḥ
guru laghu akṣara kṛtaḥ sarva vṛtteṣu nityaśas
guru pūrvaḥ bhakāraḥ syāt makāre tu guru trayam
jakāraḥ guru madhya sthaḥ sakāraḥ ntya guruḥ tathā
laghu madhya sthitaḥ rephaḥ takāraḥ ntya laghuḥ paraḥ

original: laghupūrvo yakārastu nakāre tu laghutrayam // BhN_14.87 //
analyzed: laghu pūrvaḥ yakāraḥ tu nakāre tu laghu trayam
ete hi aṣṭau trikāḥ prājñaiḥ vijñeyāḥ brahma sambhavāḥ
lāghava artham punar amī chandaḥ jñānam avekṣya ca
ebhiḥ vinirgatāḥ ca anyāḥ sama ādayaḥ
asvarāḥ sa svarāḥ ca eva procyante vṛtta lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: gurvekaṃ giti vijñeyaṃ tathā laghu liti smṛtam /
analyzed: guru ekam giti vijñeyam tathā laghu liti smṛtam
niyataḥ pada vicchedaḥ yatiḥ iti abhidhīyate
guru dīrgham plutam ca eva saṃyoga param eva ca

original: sānusvāravisargaṃ ca tathāntyañca laghu kvacit // BhN_14.91 //
analyzed: sa anusvāra visargam ca tathā antyam ca laghu kvacid

original: gāyatryāṃ dvau trikau jñeyau uṣṇik caikādhikākṣarā /
analyzed: gāyatryām dvau trikau jñeyau uṣṇih ca eka adhika akṣarā

original: anuṣṭup dvyadhikā caiva bṛhatyāṃ ca trikāstrayaḥ // BhN_14.92 //
analyzed: anuṣṭubh dvi adhikā ca eva bṛhatyām ca trikāḥ trayaḥ
eka akṣara adhikā paṅktiḥ triṣṭubh ca dvi adhika akṣarā

original: catustrikā tu jagatī saikātijagatī punaḥ // BhN_14.93 //
analyzed: catur trikā tu jagatī sā ekā atijagatī punar
eka adhika akṣara aṣṭiḥ ca dvi adhikā atyaṣṭiḥ ucyate
ṣaṣ trikāḥ tu dhṛtiḥ proktā sā ekā ca atidhṛtiḥ tathā

original: kṛtiśca dvyadhikā proktā prakṛtyāṃ sapta vai trikāḥ // BhN_14.95 //
analyzed: kṛtiḥ ca dvi adhikā proktā prakṛtyām sapta vai trikāḥ
ākṛtiḥ tu adhikā ekena dvi adhikā vikṛtiḥ tathā

original: aṣṭatrikāḥ saṃkṛtau syāt saikā cābhikṛtiḥ punaḥ // BhN_14.96 //
analyzed: aṣṭatrikāḥ saṃkṛtau syāt sā ekā ca abhikṛtiḥ punar
utkṛtiḥ dvi adhikā ca eva vijñeyā gaṇa mānataḥ

original: gurvekaṃ ga iti proktaṃ guruṇī gāviti smṛtau /
analyzed: guru ekam gaḥ iti proktam guruṇī gau iti smṛtau

original: laghvekaṃ la iti jñeyaṃ laghunī lāviti smṛtau // BhN_14.97 //
analyzed: laghu ekam laḥ iti jñeyam laghunī lau iti smṛtau
saṃpad virāma pādāḥ ca daivata sthānam akṣaram

original: varṇaḥ svaro vidhirvṛttamiti chandogato vidhiḥ // BhN_14.98 //
analyzed: varṇaḥ svaraḥ vidhiḥ vṛttam iti chandogataḥ vidhiḥ

original: naivātiriktaṃ hīnaṃ vā yatra saṃpadyate kramaḥ /
analyzed: na eva atiriktam hīnam vā yatra saṃpadyate kramaḥ
vidhāne chandasām eṣa saṃpad iti abhisaṃjñitaḥ

original: yatrārthasya samāptiḥ syāt sa virāma iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yatra arthasya samāptiḥ syāt sa virāmaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
pādaḥ ca padyateḥ dhātoḥ caturbhāgaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
agni ādi daivatam proktam sthānam dvividham ucyate
śarīra āśraya saṃbhūtam diś āśrayam atha api ca
śārīram mantra saṃbhūtam chandaḥ gāyatra saṃjñitam

original: kruṣṭe madhyaṃ dinaṃ proktaṃ traiṣṭubhaṃ parikīrtyate // BhN_14.102 //
analyzed: kruṣṭe madhyam dinam proktam traiṣṭubham parikīrtyate
tṛtīyasavanam ca api śīrṣaṇyam jāgatam hi yat

original: hrasvaṃ dīrghaṃ plutañcaiva trividhañcākṣaraṃ smṛtam // BhN_14.103 //
analyzed: hrasvam dīrgham plutam ca eva trividham ca akṣaram smṛtam
śveta ādayaḥ tathā varṇāḥ vijñeyāḥ chandasām iha

original: tāraścaiva hi mandraśca madhyamastrividhaḥ svaraḥ // BhN_14.104 //
analyzed: tāraḥ ca eva hi mandraḥ ca madhyamaḥ trividhaḥ svaraḥ
dhruvā vidhāne ca eva asya saṃpravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam
vidhiḥ gaṇa kṛtaḥ ca eva tathā eva artha kṛtaḥ bhavet

original: chandato yasya pāde syāddhīnaṃ vā'dhikameva vā /
analyzed: chandataḥ yasya pāde syāt hīnam vā adhikam eva vā

original: akṣaraṃ nicṛditi proktaṃ bhūrik ceti dvijottamāḥ // BhN_14.106 //
analyzed: akṣaram nicṛt iti proktam ca iti dvijottamāḥ
akṣarābhyām sadā dvābhyām adhikam hīnam eva vā

original: tacchando nāmato jñeyaṃ svarāḍiti virāḍapi // BhN_14.107 //
analyzed: tat chandaḥ nāmataḥ jñeyam svarāj iti virāj api
sarveṣām eva vṛttānām tad jñaiḥ jñeyāḥ gaṇāḥ trayaḥ

original: divyo divyetaraścaiva divyamānuṣa eva ca // BhN_14.108 //
analyzed: divyaḥ divyetaraḥ ca eva divya mānuṣaḥ eva ca
gāyatrī uṣṇih anuṣṭubh ca bṛhatī paṅktiḥ eva ca

original: triṣṭup ca jagatī caiva divyo 'yaṃ prathamo gaṇaḥ // BhN_14.109 //
analyzed: triṣṭubh ca jagatī ca eva divyaḥ yam prathamaḥ gaṇaḥ
tathā atijagatī ca eva śakvarī ca atiśakvarī
aṣṭiḥ atyaṣṭiḥ api ca dhṛtiḥ ca atidhṛtiḥ gaṇaḥ
kṛtiḥ ca prakṛtiḥ ca eva hi ākṛtiḥ vikṛtiḥ tathā
saṃkṛti abhikṛtī ca eva utkṛtiḥ divya mānuṣā
eteṣām chandasām bhūyas prastāra vidhi saṃśrayam
lakṣaṇam saṃpravakṣyāmi naṣṭam uddiṣṭam eva ca
kṣara nirdiṣṭaḥ mātrā uktaḥ ca tathā eva hi

original: dvikau glāviti varṇoktau miśrau cetyapi mātrikau // BhN_14.113 //
analyzed: dvikau glau iti varṇa uktau miśrau ca iti api mātrikau
guroḥ adhastāt ādyasya prastāre laghu vinyaset
agratas tu samādeyāḥ guravaḥ pṛṣṭhatas tathā
prathamam gurubhiḥ varṇaiḥ laghubhiḥ tu avasāna jam
vṛttam tu sarva chandassu prastāra vidhiḥ eva tu
guru adhastāt laghum nyasya tathā dvi dvi yathā uditam
nyasyet prastāra mārgaḥ yam akṣara uktaḥ tu nityaśas
mātrā saṃkhyā vinirdiṣṭaḥ gaṇaḥ mātrā vikalpitaḥ

original: miśrau glāviti vijñeyau pṛthak lakṣyavibhāgataḥ // BhN_14.117 //
analyzed: miśrau glau iti vijñeyau pṛthak lakṣya vibhāgataḥ
mātrā gaṇaḥ guruḥ ca eva laghunī ca eva lakṣite
āryāṇām tu catur mātrā prastāraḥ parikalpitaḥ
gītaka prabhṛtīnām tu pañca mātraḥ gaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
vaitālīyam puraskṛtya ṣaṣ mātra ādyāḥ tathā eva ca
tri akṣarāḥ tu trikāḥ jñeyāḥ laghu guru akṣara anvitāḥ
mātrā gaṇa vibhāgaḥ tu guru laghu akṣara āśrayaḥ
antyāt dvi guṇitāt rūpāt dvi dvis ekam guroḥ bhavet

original: dviguṇāñca laghoḥ kṛtvā saṃkhyāṃ piṇḍena yojayet // BhN_14.121 //
analyzed: dviguṇān ca laghoḥ kṛtvā saṃkhyām piṇḍena yojayet
ādyam sarva guru jñeyam vṛttantu sama saṃjñitam

original: kośaṃ tu sarvalaghvantyaṃ miśrarūpāṇi sarvataḥ // BhN_14.122 //
analyzed: kośam tu sarva laghu antyam miśra rūpāṇi sarvatas

original: vṛttānāṃ tu samānānāṃ saṃkhyāṃ saṃyojya tāvatīm /
analyzed: vṛttānām tu samānānām saṃkhyām saṃyojya tāvatīm
rāśyūnām ardha viṣamām samāsāt abhinirdiśet

original: ekādikāṃ tathā saṃkhyāṃ chandaso viniveśya tu /
analyzed: eka ādikām tathā saṃkhyām chandasaḥ viniveśya tu

original: yāvat pūrṇantu pūrveṇa pūrayeduttaraṃ gaṇam // BhN_14.124 //
analyzed: yāvat pūrveṇa pūrayet uttaram gaṇam

original: samānāṃ viṣamāṇāṃ ca saṃguṇayya tathā sphuṭam /
analyzed: samānām viṣamāṇām ca saṃguṇayya tathā sphuṭam
rāśyūnām abhijānīyāt viṣamāṇām samāsatas

original: evaṃ kṛtvā tu sarveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvapūraṇam /
analyzed: evam kṛtvā tu sarveṣām pareṣām pūrva pūraṇam
kramāt naidhanam ekaikam pratilomam visarjayet
sarveṣām chandasām evam laghu akṣara viniścayam
jānīta sama vṛttānām saṃkhyām saṃkṣepataḥ tathā
vṛttasya parimāṇam tu chitvā ardhena yathākramam

original: nyasellaghu yathā saikamakṣaraṃ guru cāpyatha // BhN_14.128 //
analyzed: nyaset laghu yathā sa ekam akṣaram guru ca api atha
evam vinyasya vṛttānām naṣṭa uddiṣṭa vibhāgataḥ
guru laghu akṣarāṇi iha sarva chandassu darśayet
iti chandāṃsi yāni iha mayā uktāni dvijottamāḥ
vṛttāni eteṣu nāṭye smin prayojyāni nibodhata

original: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre vācikābhinaye chandovidhānaṃ nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bharatīye nāṭya śāstre vācikābhinaye chandovidhānam nāma caturdaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha pañcadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
chandāṃsi evam hi yāni iha mayā uktāni dvijottamāḥ

original: vṛttāni teṣu nāṭye 'smin prayojyāni nibodhata // BhN_15.1 //
analyzed: vṛttāni teṣu nāṭye smin prayojyāni nibodhata

original: ādye punarantye dve dve guruṇī cet /
analyzed: ādye punar antye dve dve guruṇī ced
sā syāt tanu madhyā gāyatra samutthā
yathā
saṃtyakta vibhūṣā bhraṣṭa añjana netrā
hasta arpita gaṇḍā kim tvam tanu madhyā
laghugaṇa ādau bhavati catuṣkaḥ
guru yugam antye makaraka śīrṣā
yathā
svayam upayāntam bhajasi na kāntam
bhaya kari kim tvam makaraka śīrṣā
eka mātram ṣaṭke syāt dvitīyam pāde

original: khyātarūpā vṛtte sā mālinī nāmnā // BhN_15.6 //
analyzed: khyāta rūpā vṛtte sā mālinī nāmnā
ṣaṣ akṣara kṛte pāde laghu yatra dvitīyakam

original: śeṣāṇi tu gurūṇi syurmālinī sā matā yathā // BhN_15.7 //
analyzed: śeṣāṇi tu gurūṇi syuḥ mālinī sā matā yathā
snāna gandha ādhikyaiḥ vastra bhūṣā yogaiḥ
vyaktam eva asau tvam mālinī prakhyātā

original: dvitīyaṃ pañcamaṃ caiva laghu yatra pratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: dvitīyam pañcamam ca eva laghu yatra pratiṣṭhitam

original: śeṣāṇi ca gurūṇi syurmālatī nāma sā yathā // BhN_15.9 //
analyzed: śeṣāṇi ca gurūṇi syuḥ mālatī nāma sā yathā
śobhate baddhayā ṣaṭpada āviddhayā
mālatī mālayā māninī līlayā

original: dvitīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ ca pañcamaṃ ca yadā laghu /
analyzed: dvitīyam ca caturtham ca pañcamam ca yadā laghu

original: yasyāḥ saptākṣare pāde jñeyā sā tūddhatā yathā // BhN_15.11 //
analyzed: yasyāḥ sapta akṣare pāde jñeyā sā tu uddhatā yathā

original: sau trikau yadi pāde hyantimaśca gakāraḥ /
analyzed: sau trikau yadi pāde hi antimaḥ ca gakāraḥ
uṣṇih utthita pādā uddhatā khalu nāmnā
danta kṛnta kṛta astram vyākula alaka śobham
śaṃsati iva tava āsyam nirdayam rata yuddham

original: ādau dve nidhane caiva guruṇī yatra vai sadā /
analyzed: ādau dve nidhane ca eva guruṇī yatra vai sadā

original: pāde saptākṣare jñeyā nāmnā bhramaramālikā // BhN_15.14 //
analyzed: pāde sapta akṣare jñeyā nāmnā bhramaramālikā
pāde pāde niviṣṭau samyak viracitau tsau

original: antye yadi gakāraḥ sā tu bhramaramālā // BhN_15.15 //
analyzed: antye yadi gakāraḥ sā tu bhramara mālā
yathā
nānā kusuma citre prāpte surabhi māse

original: eṣā bhramati mattā kānte bhramaramālā // BhN_15.16 //
analyzed: eṣā bhramati mattā kānte bhramara mālā

original: ādyaṃ tṛtīyamantyaṃ ca pañcamaṃ saptamaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ādyam tṛtīyam antyam ca pañcamam saptamam tathā

original: gurūṇyaṣṭākṣare pāde siṃhalekheti sā yathā // BhN_15.17 //
analyzed: gurūṇi aṣṭa akṣare pāde siṃhalekhā iti sā yathā
jātu yasya gau na
pāde saṃsthitaḥ sama svarūpe
tām anuṣṭubh āśraya sthām vāvadanti siṃhalekhām

original: tanmano mama praviṣṭaṃ vṛttamadya siṃhalekham // BhN_15.19 //
analyzed: tat manaḥ mama praviṣṭam vṛttam adya siṃhalekham

original: caturthaṃ ca dvitīyaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhamaṣṭamameva ca /
analyzed: caturtham ca dvitīyam ca ṣaṣṭham aṣṭamam eva ca
gurūṇi aṣṭa akṣare pāde yatra tat matta ceṣṭitam

original: yadā tu jātparau ralau gakāra eva ca sthitaḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu jāt parau ra lau gakāraḥ eva ca sthitaḥ
anuṣṭubh udbhavam tadā vadanti matta ceṣṭitam
yathā
cara avaghūrṇita īkṣaṇam vilambita ākula alakam

original: asaṃsthitaiḥ padaiḥ priyā karoti mattaceṣṭitam // BhN_15.22 //
analyzed: asaṃsthitaiḥ padaiḥ priyā karoti matta ceṣṭitam
aṣṭa akṣara kṛte pāde sarvāṇi eva bhavanti hi

original: gurūṇi yasminsā nāmnā vidyunmāleti kīrtitā // BhN_15.23 //
analyzed: gurūṇi yasmin sā nāmnā vidyunmālā iti kīrtitā

original: mau gau cāntyau yasyāḥ pāde pādasyānte vicchedaśca /
analyzed: mau gau ca antyau yasyāḥ pāde pādasya ante vicchedaḥ ca
sā ca anuṣṭubh chandasi uktā nityam sadbhiḥ vidyunmālā
sa ambhaḥ bhāraiḥ ānānadbhiḥ śyāma ambhodaiḥ vyāpte vyomni
āditya aṃśu spardhinī eṣā dikṣu bhrāntā vidyut mālā

original: pañcamaṃ saptamaṃ cāntyaṃ guru pāde 'ṣṭake tathā /
analyzed: pañcamam saptamam ca antyam guru pāde ṣṭake tathā
chandaḥ jñaiḥ jñeyam etat tu vṛttam citta vilāsitam
smita vaśa viprakāśaiḥ daśana padaiḥ amībhiḥ
vara tanu pūrṇa candram tava mukham āvṛṇoti
nava akṣara kṛte pāde trīṇi syuḥ naidhanāni ca

original: gurūṇi yasyāḥ sā nāmnā jñeyā madhukarī yathā // BhN_15.28 //
analyzed: gurūṇi yasyāḥ sā nāmnā jñeyā madhukarī yathā
ṣaḍ iha yadi laghūni syuḥ nidhana gatam akāraḥ ced
budhajanabṛhatīsaṃsthā bhavati madhukarī nāmnā
kusumitam abhipaśyantī vividha taru gaṇaiḥ channam
vanam atiśaya gandha āḍhyam bhramati madhukarī hṛṣṭā
daśa akṣara kṛte pāde trīṇi ādau trīṇi na aidhane

original: yasyā gurūṇi sā jñeyā paṅktirutpalamālikā // BhN_15.31 //
analyzed: yasyāḥ gurūṇi sā jñeyā paṅktiḥ utpala mālikā

original: trīṇyādau yadi hi gurūṇi syuścatvāro yadi laghavo madhye /
analyzed: trīṇi ādau yadi hi gurūṇi syuḥ catvāraḥ yadi laghavaḥ madhye
paṅktau anta gatam akāraḥ syāt vijñeyā kuvalayamālā ākhyā
yathā
asmin te śirasi tadā kānte vaiḍūrya sphaṭika suvarṇa āḍhye

original: śobhāṃ svāṃ na vahati tāṃ baddhā suśliṣṭā kuvalayamāleyam // BhN_15.33 //
analyzed: śobhām svām na vahati tām baddhā su śliṣṭā kuvalaya mālā iyam

original: dvitīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ ca ṣaṣṭamaṣṭamameva ca /
analyzed: dvitīyam ca caturtham ca ṣaṣṭam aṣṭamam eva ca

original: hrasvaṃ daśākṣare pāde yatra sā śikhisāriṇī // BhN_15.34 //
analyzed: hrasvam daśa akṣare pāde yatra sā śikhisāriṇī

original: jau trikau hi pādagau tu yasya gau ca saṃśritau tathā samau stau /
analyzed: jau trikau hi pāda gau tu yasya gau ca saṃśritau tathā samau stau
paṅkti yoga su pratiṣṭhita aṅgī sā mayūrasāriṇī iti nāmnā
yathā
na eva te sti saṃgamaḥ manuṣyaiḥ nā api kāma bhoga cihnam anyat

original: garbhiṇīva dṛśyase hyanārye kiṃ mayūrasāriṇī tvamevam // BhN_15.36 //
analyzed: garbhiṇī iva dṛśyase hi anārye kim mayūra sāriṇī tvam evam

original: ādyaṃ caturthamantyaṃ ca saptamaṃ daśamaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ādyam caturtham antyam ca saptamam daśamam tathā

original: gurūṇi traiṣṭubhe pāde yatra syurdodhakaṃ tu tat // BhN_15.37 //
analyzed: gurūṇi traiṣṭubhe pāde yatra syuḥ dodhakam tu tat

original: bhau tu bhagāviti yasya gaṇāḥ syuḥ syācca yatistricaturbhirathā'smin /
analyzed: bhau tu bha gau iti yasya gaṇāḥ syuḥ syāt ca yatiḥ tri caturbhiḥ atha asmin

original: traiṣṭubhameva hi tatkhalu nāmnā dodhakavṛttamiti pravadanti // BhN_15.38 //
analyzed: traiṣṭubham eva hi tat khalu nāmnā dodhaka vṛttam iti pravadanti
yathā
praskhalita a prapada pravicāyam matta vighūrṇita gātra vilāsam

original: paśya vilāsini kuñjarametaṃ dodhakavṛttamayaṃ prakaroti // BhN_15.39 //
analyzed: paśya vilāsini kuñjaram etam dodhaka vṛtta mayam prakaroti

original: ādau dvau pañcamaṃ caivāpyaṣṭamaṃ naidhanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ādau dvau pañcamam ca eva api aṣṭamam naidhanam tathā

original: guruṇyekādaśe pāde yatra tanmoṭakaṃ yathā // BhN_15.40 //
analyzed: guruṇi ekādaśe pāde yatra tat moṭakam yathā
eṣaḥ mbuda tulya nisvana ravaḥ kṣīvaḥ skhalamāna vilamba gatiḥ

original: śrutvā ghanagarjitamadritaṭe vṛkṣān pratimoṭayati dviradaḥ // BhN_15.41 //
analyzed: śrutvā ghana garjitam adri taṭe vṛkṣān pratimoṭayati dviradaḥ

original: navamaṃ saptamaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca bhavellaghu /
analyzed: navamam saptamam ṣaṣṭham tṛtīyam ca bhavet laghu

original: sarvāsvavasthāsu ca kāmatantre yogyāsi kiṃ vā bahunendravajrā // BhN_15.43 //
analyzed: sarvāsu avasthāsu ca kāmatantre yogyā asi kim vā bahunā indravajrā
ebhiḥ eva tu saṃyuktā laghubhiḥ traiṣṭubhī yadā
upendra vajrā vijñeyā laghu ādau iha kevalam

original: priye śriyā varṇaviśeṣaṇena smitena kāntyā sukumārabhāvaiḥ /
analyzed: priye śriyā varṇa viśeṣaṇena smitena kāntyā sukumāra bhāvaiḥ

original: amī guṇā rūpaguṇānurūpā bhavanti te kiṃ tvamupendravajrā // BhN_15.45 //
analyzed: amī guṇāḥ rūpa guṇa anurūpāḥ bhavanti te kim tvam upendra vajrā

original: ādyaṃ tṛtīyamantyaṃ ca saptamaṃ navamaṃ tathā /
analyzed: ādyam tṛtīyam antyam ca saptamam navamam tathā

original: gurūṇyekādaśe pāde yatra sā tu rathoddhatā // BhN_15.46 //
analyzed: gurūṇi ekādaśe pāde yatra sā tu ratha uddhatā

original: kiṃ tvayā subhaṭa dūravarjitaṃ nātmano na suhṛdāṃ priyaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: kim tvayā su bhaṭa dūra varjitam na ātmanaḥ na suhṛdām priyam kṛtam

original: yatpalāyanaparāyaṇasya te yāti dhūliradhunā rathoddhatā // BhN_15.47 //
analyzed: yat palāyana parāyaṇasya te yāti dhūliḥ adhunā ratha uddhatā
yathā

original: kiṃ tvayā kumatisaṅgayā sadā nājñayeva suhṛdāṃ priyaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: kim tvayā kumati saṅgayā sadā na ājñayā iva suhṛdām priyam kṛtam

original: yad gṛhādvacanaroṣakampitā yāti tūrṇamabalā rathoddhatā // BhN_15.48 //
analyzed: yat gṛhāt vacana roṣa kampitā yāti tūrṇam abalā ratha uddhatā

original: ādyaṃ tṛtīyamantyaṃ ca saptamaṃ daśamaṃ guru /
analyzed: ādyam tṛtīyam antyam ca saptamam daśamam guru

original: yasyāstu traiṣṭubhe pāde vijñeyā svāgatā hi sā // BhN_15.49 //
analyzed: yasyāḥ tu traiṣṭubhe pāde vijñeyā svāgatā hi sā
yathā
adya me saphalam āyata netre jīvitam madana saṃśraya bhāvam

original: āgatāsi bhavanaṃ mama yasmātsvāgataṃ tava varoru niṣīda // BhN_15.50 //
analyzed: āgatā asi bhavanam mama yasmāt svāgatam tava vara ūru niṣīda

original: ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca navamaṃ caiva laghunī traiṣṭubhe yadi /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham ca navamam ca eva laghunī traiṣṭubhe yadi

original: gurūṇyanyāni pāde tu sā jñeyā śālinī yathā // BhN_15.51 //
analyzed: gurūṇi anyāni pāde tu sā jñeyā śālinī yathā

original: duḥśīlaṃ vā nirguṇaṃ vāparaṃ vā loke dhairyādapriyaṃ na bravīṣi /
analyzed: duḥśīlam vā nirguṇam vā aparam vā loke dhairyāt apriyam na bravīṣi

original: tasmācchīlaṃ sādhuhetoḥ suvṛttaṃ mādhuryātsyātsarvathā śālinī tvam // BhN_15.52 //
analyzed: tasmāt śīlam sādhu hetoḥ su vṛttam mādhuryāt syāt sarvathā śālinī tvam

original: tṛtīyaṃ caiva ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca navamaṃ dvādaśaṃ tathā /
analyzed: tṛtīyam ca eva ṣaṣṭham ca navamam dvādaśam tathā

original: gurūṇi jāgate pāde yatra tattoṭakaṃ bhavet // BhN_15.53 //
analyzed: gurūṇi jāgate pāde yatra tat toṭakam bhavet

original: yadi so 'tra bhavettu samudrasamastriṣu cāpi tathā niyamena yatiḥ /
analyzed: yadi bhavet tu samudra samaḥ triṣu ca api tathā niyamena yatiḥ

original: satataṃ jagatīvihitaṃ hi tataṃ gaditaṃ khalu toṭakavṛttamidam // BhN_15.54 //
analyzed: satatam jagatī vihitam hi tatam gaditam khalu toṭaka vṛttam idam
yathā
kim idam kapaṭa āśraya durviṣaham bahu śāṭhya mathā ulbaṇa rūkṣa katham
sva jana priya sat jana bheda karam nanu toṭaka vṛttam idam kuruṣe

original: ādyaṃ tṛtīyamantyaṃ ca pañcamaṃ ṣaṣṭhameva ca /
analyzed: ādyam tṛtīyam antyam ca pañcamam ṣaṣṭham eva ca

original: tathopāntyaṃ jagatyāṃ ca guru cetkumudaprabhā // BhN_15.56 //
analyzed: tathā upāntyam jagatyām ca guru ced kumudaprabhā

original: yau trikau tathā nyau yadi khalu pāde ṣaḍbhireva varṇairyadi ca yatiḥ syāt /
analyzed: yau trikau tathā nyau yadi khalu pāde ṣaḍbhiḥ eva varṇaiḥ yadi ca yatiḥ syāt

original: nityasaṃniviṣṭā jagatividhāne nāmataḥ prasiddhā kumudanibhā sā // BhN_15.57 //
analyzed: nitya saṃniviṣṭā jagati vidhāne nāmataḥ prasiddhā kumuda nibhā sā
yathā
manmathena viddhā sa lalita bhāvā nṛtta gīta yogā pravikasita akṣī

original: nindyamadya kiṃ tvaṃ vigalitaśobhā candrapādayuktā kumudavatī ca // BhN_15.58 //
analyzed: nindyam adya kim tvam vigalita śobhā candra pāda yuktā kumudavatī ca
mata antare

original: yadi khalu pāde nyau trikau yathā yau yatirapi varṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhireva cetsyāt /
analyzed: yadi khalu pāde nyau trikau yathā yau yatiḥ api varṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ eva ced syāt

original: jagatividhāne nityasaṃniviṣṭā kumudanibhā sā nāmataḥ prasiddhā // BhN_15.59 //
analyzed: jagati vidhāne nitya saṃniviṣṭā kumudanibhā sā nāmataḥ prasiddhā
yathā

original: kumudanibhā tvaṃ kāmabāṇaviddhā kimasi natabhrūḥ śītavātadagdhā /
analyzed: kumuda nibhā tvam kāma bāṇa viddhā kim asi nata bhrūḥ śīta vāta dagdhā

original: mṛdunalinīvāpāṇḍuvaktraśobhā kathamapi jātā hyagrataḥ sakhīnām // BhN_15.60 //
analyzed: mṛdu nalinī vā āpāṇḍu vaktra śobhā katham api jātā hi agratas sakhīnām
dvādaśa akṣarake pāde saptamam daśamam laghu

original: ādau pañcākṣaracchedaścandralekhā tu sā yathā // BhN_15.61 //
analyzed: ādau pañca akṣara chedaḥ candralekhā tu sā yathā

original: vaktraṃ saumyaṃ te padmapatrāyatākṣaṃ kāmasyāvāsaṃ sunāsoccaprahāsam /
analyzed: vaktram saumyam te padma patra āyata akṣam kāmasya āvāsam su nāsā ucca prahāsam

original: kāmasyāpīdaṃ kāmamāhartukāmaṃ kānte kāntyā tvaṃ candralekheva bhāsi // BhN_15.62 //
analyzed: kāmasya api idam kāmam āhartu kāmam kānte kāntyā tvam candra lekhā iva bhāsi

original: tṛtīyamantyaṃ navamaṃ pañcamaṃ ca yadā guru /
analyzed: tṛtīyam antyam navamam pañcamam ca yadā guru

original: dvādaśākṣarake pāde yatra sā pramitākṣarā // BhN_15.63 //
analyzed: dvādaśa akṣarake pāde yatra sā pramitā akṣarā
yathā
smita bhāṣiṇī hi acapala aparuṣā nibhṛta apavāda vimukhī satatam

original: api kasyacidyuvatirasti sukhā pramitākṣarā sa hi pumāñjayati // BhN_15.64 //
analyzed: api kasyacid yuvatiḥ asti sukhā pramita akṣarā sa hi pumān jayati
dvitīyam antyam daśamam caturtham pañcama aṣṭame

original: gurūṇi dvādaśe pāde vaṃśasthā jagatī tu sā // BhN_15.65 //
analyzed: gurūṇi dvādaśe pāde vaṃśa sthā jagatī tu sā

original: yadi trikau jtau bhavatastu pādatastathaiva ca jrāvavasānasaṃsthitau /
analyzed: yadi trikau bhavataḥ tu pādataḥ tathā eva ca jrau avasāna saṃsthitau

original: tadā hi vṛttaṃ jagatīpratiṣṭhitaṃ vadanti vaṃśasthamitīha nāmataḥ // BhN_15.66 //
analyzed: tadā hi vṛttam jagatī pratiṣṭhitam vadanti vaṃśa stham iti iha nāmataḥ

original: na me priyā tvaṃ bahumānavarjitāṃ priyaṃ priyā te paruṣābhibhāṣiṇī /
analyzed: na me priyā tvam bahu māna varjitām priyam priyā te paruṣa abhibhāṣiṇī

original: tathā ca paśyāmyahamadya vigrahaṃ dhruvaṃ hi vaṃśasthagatiṃ kariṣyati // BhN_15.67 //
analyzed: tathā ca paśyāmi aham adya vigraham dhruvam hi vaṃśa stha gatim kariṣyati

original: caturthamantyaṃ daśamaṃ saptamaṃ ca yadā guru /
analyzed: caturtham antyam daśamam saptamam ca yadā guru

original: bhaveddhi jāgate pāde tadā syāddhariṇaplutā // BhN_15.68 //
analyzed: bhavet hi jāgate pāde tadā syāt hariṇa plutā
paruṣa vākya kaśā abhihitā tvayā bhaya vilokana pārśva nirīkṣaṇā
vara tanuḥ pratata pluta sarpaṇaiḥ anukaroti gataiḥ hariṇa plutam

original: saptamaṃ navamaṃ cāntyamupāntyaṃ ca yadā guru /
analyzed: saptamam navamam ca antyam upāntyam ca yadā guru

original: dvādaśākṣarake pāde kāmadatteti sā yathā // BhN_15.70 //
analyzed: dvādaśa akṣarake pāde kāmadattā iti sā yathā

original: karajapadavibhūṣitā yathā tvaṃ sudati daśanavikṣatādharā ca /
analyzed: karaja pada vibhūṣitā yathā tvam sudati daśana vikṣata adharā ca

original: gatirapi caraṇāvalagnamandā tvamasi mṛganibhākṣi kāmadattā // BhN_15.71 //
analyzed: gatiḥ api caraṇa avalagna mandā tvam asi mṛga nibha akṣi kāma dattā

original: ādyaṃ caturthaṃ daśamaṃ saptamaṃ ca yadā laghu /
analyzed: ādyam caturtham daśamam saptamam ca yadā laghu

original: pāde tu jāgate yasyā aprameyā tu sā yathā // BhN_15.72 //
analyzed: pāde tu jāgate yasyāḥ aprameyā tu sā yathā

original: na te kācidanyā samā dṛśyate strī nṛloke viśiṣṭā guṇairadvitīyaiḥ /
analyzed: na te kācid anyā samā dṛśyate strī nṛ loke viśiṣṭā guṇaiḥ advitīyaiḥ

original: trilokyāṃ guṇajjñān samāhṛtya sarvān jagatyaprameyāsi sṛṣṭā vidhātrā // BhN_15.73 //
analyzed: trilokyām guṇa jjñān samāhṛtya sarvān jagatī aprameyā asi sṛṣṭā vidhātrā
dvitīyam pañcamam ca eva hi aṣṭam ekādaśe yathā

original: pāde yatra laghūni syuḥ padminī nāma sā yathā // BhN_15.74 //
analyzed: pāde yatra laghūni syuḥ padminī nāma sā yathā

original: rāstrikāḥ sāgarākhyā niviṣṭā yadā syāt trike ca trike yuktarūpā yatiḥ /
analyzed: rāḥ trikāḥ sāgara ākhyāḥ niviṣṭāḥ yadā syāt trike ca trike yukta rūpā yatiḥ

original: sanniviṣṭā jagatyāstatassā budhair nāmataścāpi saṃkīrtyate padminī // BhN_15.75 //
analyzed: sanniviṣṭā jagatyāḥ tatas sā budhaiḥ nāmataḥ ca api saṃkīrtyate padminī
deha toya āśayā vaktra padma ujjvalā netra bhṛṅga ākulā danta haṃsa smitā

original: keśapāśacchadā cakravākastanī padminīva priye bhāsi me sarvadā // BhN_15.76 //
analyzed: keśa pāśa chadā cakravāka stanī padminī iva priye bhāsi me sarvadā
phulla padma ānanā tvam dvirepha īkṣaṇā keśa patra chadā cakravāka stanī

original: pītatoyāvalī baddhakāñcīguṇā padminīva priye bhāsi nīre sthitā // BhN_15.77 //
analyzed: pīta toya āvalī baddha kāñcī guṇā padminī iva priye bhāsi nīre sthitā

original: ādau ṣaṭ daśamaṃ caiva pāde yatra laghūnyatha /
analyzed: ādau ṣaṣ daśamam ca eva pāde yatra laghūni atha

original: śeṣāṇi tu gurūṇi syurjāgate puṭasaṃjñitā // BhN_15.78 //
analyzed: śeṣāṇi tu gurūṇi syuḥ jāgate puṭa saṃjñitā

original: yadi caraṇaniviṣṭau nau tathā myau yatividhirapi yuktyāṣṭābhiriṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: yadi caraṇa niviṣṭau nau tathā myau yati vidhiḥ api yuktyā aṣṭābhiḥ iṣṭaḥ

original: bhavati ca jagatīsthaḥ sarvadāsau ya iha hi puṭavṛttaṃ nāmatastu // BhN_15.79 //
analyzed: bhavati ca jagatī sthaḥ sarvadā asau yaḥ iha hi puṭavṛttam nāmataḥ tu
upavana salilānām bāla padmaiḥ bhramara parabhṛtānām kaṇṭha nādaiḥ

original: madanamadavilāsaiḥ kāminīnāṃ kathayati puṭavṛttaṃ puṣpamāsaḥ // BhN_15.80 //
analyzed: madana mada vilāsaiḥ kāminīnām kathayati puṭavṛttam puṣpamāsaḥ
dvitīya antye caturtham ca navama ekādaśe guru

original: vicchedo 'tijagatyāṃ tu caturbhiḥ sā prabhāvatī // BhN_15.81 //
analyzed: tijagatyām tu caturbhiḥ sā prabhāvatī

original: kathaṃ nvidaṃ kamalaviśālalocane gṛhaṃ dhanaiḥ pihitakare divākare /
analyzed: katham nu idam kamala viśāla locane gṛham dhanaiḥ pihita kare divākare
a cintayantī abhinava varṣa vidyutaḥ tvam āgatā su tanu yathā prabhāvatī
trīṇi ādau aṣṭamam ca eva daśamam naidhana dvayam
gurūṇi ati jagatyām tu tribhiḥ chedaiḥ praharṣiṇī
bhāva sthaiḥ madhura kathaiḥ su bhāṣitaiḥ tvam sa āṭopa skhalita vilambitaiḥ gataiḥ ca

original: śobhāḍhyairharasi manāṃsi kāmukānāṃ suvyaktaṃ hyatijagatī praharṣiṇī ca // BhN_15.84 //
analyzed: śobhā āḍhyaiḥ harasi manāṃsi kāmukānām su vyaktam hi ati jagatī praharṣiṇī ca

original: ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca saptamaṃ caiva daśamaikādaśe laghu /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham ca saptamam ca eva daśama ekādaśe laghu
trayodaśa akṣare pāde jñeyam matta mayūrakam
vidyut naddhāḥ sa indradhanuḥ añjita dehāḥ vāta uddhūtāḥ śveta valākā kṛta śobhāḥ

original: ete meghā garjitanādojjvalacihnāḥ prāvṛṭkālaṃ mattamayūrāḥ kathayanti // BhN_15.86 //
analyzed: ete meghāḥ garjita nāda ujjvala cihnāḥ prāvṛṣ kālam matta mayūrāḥ kathayanti

original: ādau dve caturthaṃ caiva cāṣṭamaikādaśe guru /
analyzed: ādau dve caturtham ca eva ca aṣṭama ekādaśe guru

original: antyopāntye ca śakvaryā vasantatilakā yathā // BhN_15.87 //
analyzed: antya upāntye ca śakvaryāḥ vasanta tilakāḥ yathā
citraiḥ vasanta kusumaiḥ kṛta keśa hastā sraj dāma mālya racanā su vibhūṣita aṅgī
nānā vasantaka vibhūṣita karṇa pāśā sākṣāt vasanta tilakā iva vibhāti nārī

original: pañcādau śakvarī pāde gurūṇi trīṇi naidhane /
analyzed: pañca ādau śakvarī pāde gurūṇi trīṇi na edhane

original: pañcākṣarādau ca yatirasaṃbādhā tu sā yathā // BhN_15.89 //
analyzed: pañcākṣara ādau ca yatiḥ asaṃbādhā tu sā yathā
yathā

original: mānālokajñaḥ sutabalakulaśīlāḍhyo yasminsammānaṃ na sadṛśamanu paśyeddhi /
analyzed: māna āloka jñaḥ suta bala kula śīla āḍhyaḥ yasmin sammānam na sadṛśam anu paśyet hi

original: gacchettaṃ tyaktvā drutagatiraparaṃ deśaṃ kīrṇā nānārthairavaniriyamasaṃbādhā // BhN_15.90 //
analyzed: gacchet tam tyaktvā druta gatiḥ aparam deśam kīrṇā nānā arthaiḥ avaniḥ iyam asaṃbādhā
catvāri ādau gurūṇi syuḥ daśama ekādaśe tathā

original: antyopāntye ca śakvaryāḥ pāde tu śarabhā yathā // BhN_15.91 //
analyzed: antya upāntye ca śakvaryāḥ pāde tu śarabhāḥ yathā

original: eṣā kāntā vrajati lalitā vepamānā gulmaiścchannaṃ vanamabhinavaiḥ saṃpraviddham /
analyzed: eṣā kāntā vrajati lalitā vepamānā gulmaiḥ channam vanam abhinavaiḥ saṃpraviddham

original: hā hā kaṣṭaṃ kimidamiti no vedmi mūḍho vyaktaṃ kānte śarabhalalitāntvaṃ karoṣi // BhN_15.92 //
analyzed: hā hā kaṣṭam kim idam iti no vedmi mūḍhaḥ vyaktam kānte śarabha lalita antvam karoṣi

original: adau ṣaṭ daśamaṃ caiva laghu caiva trayodaśam /
analyzed: adau ṣaṣ daśamam ca eva laghu ca eva trayodaśam

original: yatrātiśakvare pāde jñeyā nāndīmukhī tu sā // BhN_15.93 //
analyzed: yatra ati śakvare pāde jñeyā nāndīmukhī tu sā
yathā

original: na khalu tava kadācitkrodhatāmrāyatākṣaṃ bhrukuṭivalitabhaṅgaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ mayāsyam /
analyzed: na khalu tava kadācid krodha tāmra āyata akṣam bhrukuṭi valita bhaṅgam dṛṣṭa pūrvam mayā āsyam

original: kimiha bahubhiruktairyā mamecchā hṛdisthā tvamasi madhuravākyā devi nāndīmukhīva // BhN_15.94 //
analyzed: kim iha bahubhiḥ uktaiḥ yā mama icchā hṛdisthā tvam asi madhura vākyā devi nāndīmukhī iva

original: ādyaṃ caturthaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca naidhanaṃ ca yadā guru /
analyzed: ādyam caturtham ṣaṣṭham ca naidhanam ca yadā guru

original: ṣoḍaśākṣarake pāde yatrebhalalitaṃ tu tat // BhN_15.95 //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa akṣarake pāde yatra ibha lalitam tu tat

original: bhrau yadi nāśca nityamiha viracitacaraṇaḥ gaśca tathā vai bhavati nidhanamupagataḥ /
analyzed: yadi nāḥ ca nityam iha viracita caraṇaḥ gaḥ ca tathā vai bhavati nidhanam upagataḥ

original: syādapi cāṣṭimeva yadi satatamanugataṃ tatkhalu vṛttamagravṛṣabhagajavilasitam // BhN_15.96 //
analyzed: syāt api ca aṣṭim eva yadi satatam anugatam tat khalu vṛttam agra vṛṣabha gaja vilasitam
kāla toyadharaiḥ su dhīra dhana paṭu paṭaha ravaiḥ sarja kadamba nīpa kuṭaja kusuma surabhiḥ
kanda lasa indragopaka racitam avani talam vīkṣya karoti asau vṛṣabha gaja vilasitam
ādyāt parāṇi vai pañca dvādaśam sa trayodaśaḥ

original: antyopāntye ca dīrghāṇi lalitapravaraṃ hi tat // BhN_15.98 //
analyzed: antya upāntye ca dīrghāṇi lalita pravaram hi tat

original: yadā ymau pādasthau bhavata iha cetstau tathā gau tathā ṣaḍbhiścānyairyatirapi ca varṇairyathā syāt /
analyzed: yadā ymau pāda sthau bhavataḥ iha ced stau tathā gau tathā ṣaḍbhiḥ ca anyaiḥ yatiḥ api ca varṇaiḥ yathā syāt

original: tadapyaṣṭau nityaṃ samanugatamevoktamanyaiḥ prayogajñairvṛttaṃ pravaralalitaṃ nāmatastu // BhN_15.99 //
analyzed: tat api aṣṭau nityam samanugatam eva uktam anyaiḥ prayoga jñaiḥ vṛttam pravaralalitam nāmataḥ tu
yathā

original: nakhālīḍhaṃ gātraṃ daśanakhacitaṃ coṣṭhagaṇḍaṃ śiraḥ puṣponmiśraṃ pravilulitakeśālakāntam /
analyzed: nakha ālīḍham gātram daśa nakha citam ca uṣṭha gaṇḍam śiraḥ puṣpa unmiśram pravilulita keśa alaka antam

original: gatiḥ khinnā ceyaṃ vadanamapi saṃbhrāntanetram aho ślāghyaṃ vṛttaṃ pravaralalitaṃ kāmaceṣṭam // BhN_15.100 //
analyzed: gatiḥ khinnā ca iyam vadanam api saṃbhrānta netram aho ślāghyam vṛttam pravara lalitam kāma ceṣṭam
ādyāt parāṇi pañca atha dvādaśam sa trayodaśam

original: antyaṃ saptadaśe pāde śikhariṇyāṃ gurūṇi ca // BhN_15.101 //
analyzed: antyam saptadaśe pāde śikhariṇyām gurūṇi ca

original: caturbhistasyaiva pravaralalitasya trikagaṇair yadā lau gaścānte bhavati caraṇe 'tyaṣṭigadite /
analyzed: caturbhiḥ tasya eva pravara lalitasya trika gaṇaiḥ yadā lau gaḥ ca ante bhavati caraṇe tyaṣṭi gadite

original: yadā ṣaḍbhiścchedo bhavati yadi mārgeṇa vihitas tadā vṛtteṣveṣā khalu śikhariṇī nāma gaditā // BhN_15.102 //
analyzed: yadā ṣaḍbhiḥ chedaḥ bhavati yadi mārgeṇa vihitaḥ tadā vṛtteṣu eṣā khalu śikhariṇī nāma gaditā
yathā

original: mahānadyā bhogaṃ pulinamiva bhāti te jaghanaṃ tathāsyaṃ netrāḍhyaṃ bhramarasahitaṃ paṅkajamiva /
analyzed: mahā nadyāḥ bhogam pulinam iva bhāti te jaghanam tathā āsyam netra āḍhyam bhramara sahitam paṅkajam iva

original: gatirmandā ceyaṃ sutanu tava ceṣṭā sulalitā stanābhyāṃ tābhyāṃ tvaṃ śikhariṇi supīnāsi vanite // BhN_15.103 //
analyzed: gatiḥ mandā ca iyam su tanu tava ceṣṭā su lalitā stanābhyām tābhyām tvam śikhariṇi su pīnā asi vanite
yatra pañca laghūni ādau trayodaśa caturdaśe
ṣoḍaśa ekādaśe ca eva tat syāt vṛṣabha ceṣṭitam

original: yadi hi caraṇe nsau slau gaḥ kramādviniveśitār yadi khalu yatiḥ ṣaḍbhirvarṇairstathā daśabhiḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: yadi hi caraṇe yadi khalu yatiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ varṇaiḥ stathā daśabhiḥ punar

original: yadi vihitaṃ syādatyaṣṭiḥ prayogasukhāśrayaṃ vṛṣabhalalitaṃ vṛttaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā hariṇīti vā // BhN_15.105 //
analyzed: yadi vihitam syāt atyaṣṭiḥ prayoga sukha āśrayam vṛṣabhalalitam vṛttam jñeyam tathā hariṇī iti vā
yathā

original: jaladhararavaṃ śrutvā śrutvā madocchrayadarpito vilikhitamahīśṛṅgākṣepairvṛṣaiḥ pratinardya ca /
analyzed: jaladhara ravam śrutvā śrutvā mada ucchraya darpitaḥ vilikhita mahī śṛṅga ākṣepaiḥ vṛṣaiḥ pratinardya ca

original: svayuvativṛto goṣṭhādgoṣṭhaṃ prayāti ca nirbhayo vṛṣabhalalitaṃ citraṃ vṛttaṃ karoti ca śādvale // BhN_15.106 //
analyzed: sva yuvati vṛtaḥ goṣṭhāt goṣṭham prayāti ca nirbhayaḥ vṛṣabha lalitam citram vṛttam karoti ca śādvale

original: catvāryādau ca daśamaṃ guru yatra trayodaśaṃ caturdaśaṃ tathāntye dve caikādaśamathāpi ca // BhN_15.107 //
analyzed: catvāri ādau ca daśamam guru yatra trayodaśam caturdaśam tathā antye dve ca ekādaśam atha api ca

original: yadā saptadaśe pāde śeṣāṇi ca laghūnyatha /
analyzed: yadā saptadaśe pāde śeṣāṇi ca laghūni atha

original: bhavanti yasminsā jñeyā śrīdharī nāmato yathā // BhN_15.108 //
analyzed: bhavanti yasmin sā jñeyā śrīdharī nāmataḥ yathā

original: mo bhnau ca syuścaraṇaracitāstau gurū ca praviṣṭāśchedaḥ śiṣṭo yadi ca daśabhiḥ syāttathānyaiścaturbhiḥ /
analyzed: maḥ bhnau ca syuḥ caraṇa racitāḥ tau gurū ca praviṣṭāḥ chedaḥ śiṣṭaḥ yadi ca daśabhiḥ syāt tathā anyaiḥ caturbhiḥ

original: atyaṣṭau ca pratiniyamitā varṇataḥ spaṣṭarūpā sā vijñeyā dvijamunigaṇaiḥ śrīdharī nāmatastu // BhN_15.109 //
analyzed: ati aṣṭau ca pratiniyamitāḥ varṇataḥ spaṣṭa rūpā sā vijñeyā dvija muni gaṇaiḥ śrīdharī nāmataḥ tu

original: snānaiścūrṇaiḥ sukhasurabhibhirgandhavāsaiśca dhūpaiḥ puṣpaiścānyaiḥ śirasi racitairvastrayogaiśca taistaiḥ /
analyzed: snānaiḥ cūrṇaiḥ sukha surabhibhiḥ gandha vāsaiḥ ca dhūpaiḥ puṣpaiḥ ca anyaiḥ śirasi racitaiḥ vastra yogaiḥ ca taiḥ taiḥ
nānā ratnaiḥ kanaka khacitaiḥ aṅga saṃbhoga saṃsthaiḥ vyaktam kānte kamala nilayā śrīdharī iva atibhāsi

original: ādyaṃ caturthaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca daśamaṃ naidhanaṃ guru /
analyzed: ādyam caturtham ṣaṣṭham ca daśamam naidhanam guru
tat vaṃśa patra patitam daśabhiḥ saptabhiḥ yatiḥ

original: yathā eṣa gajo 'drimastakataṭe kalabhaparivṛtaḥ krīḍati vṛkṣagulmagahane kusumabhiranate /
analyzed: yathā eṣa gajaḥ dri mastaka taṭe kalabha parivṛtaḥ krīḍati vṛkṣa gulma gahane kusumabhiḥ anate

original: megharavaṃ niśamya muditaḥ pavanajavasamaḥ sundari vaṃśapatrapatitaṃ punarapi kurute // BhN_15.112 //
analyzed: megha ravam niśamya muditaḥ pavana java samaḥ sundari vaṃśa patra patitam punar api kurute
dvitīyam antyam ṣaṣṭham ca api aṣṭamam dvādaśam tathā
caturdaśam pañcadaśam pāde saptadaśa akṣare

original: bhavanti yatra dīrghāṇi śeṣāṇi ca laghūnyatha /
analyzed: bhavanti yatra dīrghāṇi śeṣāṇi ca laghūni atha

original: vilambitagatiḥ sā tu vijñeyā nāmato yathā // BhN_15.114 //
analyzed: vilambita gatiḥ sā tu vijñeyā nāmataḥ yathā

original: yadā dviruditau hi pādamabhisaṃśritau jsau trikau tathaiva ca punastayornidhanamāśritau yau lagau /
analyzed: yadā dvis uditau hi pādam abhisaṃśritau jsau trikau tathā eva ca punar tayoḥ nidhanam āśritau yau lagau

original: tadaṣṭiratipūrvikā yatirapi svabhāvādyathā vilambitagatistadā nigaditā dvijairnāmataḥ // BhN_15.115 //
analyzed: tad aṣṭi rati pūrvikā yatiḥ api svabhāvāt yathā vilambita gatiḥ tadā nigaditā dvijaiḥ nāmataḥ
yathā
vighūrṇita vilocanā pṛthu vikīrṇa hārā punar pralamba raśanā calat skhalita pāda manda klamā

original: na me priyamidaṃ janasya bahumānarāgeṇa yanmadena vivaśā vilambitagatiḥ kṛtā tvaṃ priye // BhN_15.116 //
analyzed: na me priyam idam janasya bahu māna rāgeṇa yat madena vivaśā vilambita gatiḥ kṛtā tvam priye
pañca ādau pañcadaśakam dvādaśa ekādaśe guru

original: caturdaśaṃ tathāntye dve citralekhā dhṛtau smṛtā // BhN_15.117 //
analyzed: caturdaśam tathā antye dve citralekhā dhṛtau smṛtā
yathā nānā ratna āḍhyaiḥ bahubhiḥ adhikam bhūṣaṇaiḥ aṅga saṃsthaiḥ nānā gandha āḍhyaiḥ madana janakaiḥ aṅgarāgaiḥ vicitraiḥ

original: keśaiḥ snānāḍhyaiḥ kusumabharitairvastrarāgaiśca taistaiḥ kānte saṃkṣepāt kimiha bahunā citralekheva bhāsi // BhN_15.118 //
analyzed: keśaiḥ snāna āḍhyaiḥ kusuma bharitaiḥ vastra rāgaiḥ ca taiḥ taiḥ kānte saṃkṣepāt kim iha bahunā citra lekhā iva bhāsi
antyam saptadaśam ca eva ṣoḍaśam sa caturdaśam

original: trayodaśaṃ dvādaśaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhamaṣṭamameva ca // BhN_15.119 //
analyzed: trayodaśam dvādaśam ca ṣaṣṭham aṣṭamam eva ca
trīṇi ādau ca gurūṇi syuḥ yasmin tu ekonaviṃśake

original: pāde laghūni śeṣāṇi śārdūlakrīḍitaṃ tu tat // BhN_15.120 //
analyzed: pāde laghūni śeṣāṇi śārdūla krīḍitam tu tat

original: msau jsau tau guru ca prayoganiyatā yasminniviṣṭāstrikā ādyā cāntyayatiścatustrikayutā jñeyā parā saptabhiḥ /
analyzed: tau guru ca prayoga niyatāḥ yasmin niviṣṭāḥ trikāḥ ādyā ca antya yatiḥ catur trika yutā jñeyā parā saptabhiḥ

original: nityaṃ yatpadamāśritā hyatidhṛtirnityaṃ kavīnāṃ priyaṃ tajjñeyaṃ khalu vṛttajātinipuṇaiḥ śārdūlavikrīḍitam // BhN_15.121 //
analyzed: nityam yat padam āśritā hi ati dhṛtiḥ nityam kavīnām priyam tat jñeyam khalu vṛtta jāti nipuṇaiḥ śārdūla vikrīḍitam
yathā
nānā śastra śataghni tomara hatāḥ prabhraṣṭa sarva āyudhāḥ nirbhinna udara pāda bāhu vadanāḥ nirṇāśitāḥ śatravaḥ

original: dhairyotsāhaparākramaprabhṛtibhistaistairvicitrairguṇair vṛttaṃ te ripughāti bhāti samare śārdūlavikrīḍitam // BhN_15.122 //
analyzed: dhairya utsāha parākrama prabhṛtibhiḥ taiḥ taiḥ vicitraiḥ guṇaiḥ vṛttam te ripu ghāti bhāti samare śārdūla vikrīḍitam

original: tāvattvaṃ vijitendriyaḥ śubhamate sarvātmanā pratyahaṃ dāne śīlavidhau ca yojaya manaḥ svargāpavargāpaham /
analyzed: tāvat tvam vijita indriyaḥ śubha mate sarva ātmanā pratyaham dāne śīla vidhau ca yojaya manaḥ svarga apavarga apaham

original: yāvad vyādhijarāpracaṇḍanakharo vyāyatsaṭābhirbhṛśaṃ mṛtyuste na karoti jīvitamṛgaiḥ śārdūlavikrīḍitam // BhN_15.123 //
analyzed: yāvat vyādhi jarā pracaṇḍa nakharaḥ vyāyat saṭābhiḥ bhṛśam mṛtyuḥ te na karoti jīvita mṛgaiḥ śārdūla vikrīḍitam

original: catvāryādau ca ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca saptamaṃ sacaturdaśam /
analyzed: catvāri ādau ca ṣaṣṭham ca saptamam sa caturdaśam

original: tathā pañcadaśaṃ caiva ṣiḍaśaṃ naidhanaṃ tathā // BhN_15.124 //
analyzed: tathā pañcadaśam ca eva ṣiḍaśam naidhanam tathā

original: etāni ca gurūṇi syuḥ śeṣāṇi tu laghūnyatha /
analyzed: etāni ca gurūṇi syuḥ śeṣāṇi tu laghūni atha

original: pāde yatra kṛtau jñeyā nāmnā suvadanā tu sā // BhN_15.125 //
analyzed: pāde yatra kṛtau jñeyā nāmnā suvadanā tu sā

original: mrau mnau ybhau lgau ca samyagyadi ca viracitāḥ pāde kramavaśād vicchedaḥ saptabhiḥ syātpunarapi ca yatiḥ saptākṣarakṛtā /
analyzed: ca samyak yadi ca viracitāḥ pāde krama vaśāt vicchedaḥ saptabhiḥ syāt punar api ca yatiḥ sapta akṣara kṛtā

original: yadyeṣā saṃśritā syātkṛtimapi ca punaḥ śliṣṭākṣarapadā vidvadbhirvṛttajātau tata iha gaditā nāmnā suvadanā // BhN_15.126 //
analyzed: yadī eṣā saṃśritā syāt kṛtim api ca punar śliṣṭa akṣara padā vidvadbhiḥ vṛtta jātau tatas iha gaditā nāmnā suvadanā
yathā

original: netre līlālasānte kamaladalanibhe bhrūcāpavinate raktoṣṭhaṃ pīnamadhyaṃ samasahitaghanāḥ snigdhāśca daśanāḥ /
analyzed: netre līlā alasa ante kamala dala nibhe bhrū cāpa vinate rakta uṣṭham pīna madhyam sama sahita ghanāḥ snigdhāḥ ca daśanāḥ

original: karṇāvaṃsapralambau cibukamapi nataṃ ghoṇā surucirā vyaktaṃ tvaṃ martyaloke varatanu vihitāsyekā suvadanā // BhN_15.127 //
analyzed: karṇau aṃsa pralambau cibukam api natam ghoṇā su rucirā vyaktam tvam martya loke vara tanu vihitā asi ekā su vadanā

original: catvāryādau tathā ṣaṣṭhaṃ saptamaṃ ca caturdaśam /
analyzed: catvāri ādau tathā ṣaṣṭham saptamam ca caturdaśam

original: aṣṭādaśaṃ saptadaśaṃ tathā pañcadaśaṃ punaḥ // BhN_15.128 //
analyzed: aṣṭādaśam saptadaśam tathā pañcadaśam punar
antya upāntye gurūṇi atra laghūni anyāni sarvadā

original: ekaviṃśatike pāde sragdharā nāma sā yathā // BhN_15.129 //
analyzed: ekaviṃśatike pāde sragdharā nāma sā yathā

original: mrau mnau yau yaśca samyagyadi hi viracitāḥ syustrikāḥ pādayoge varṇaiḥ pūrvopadiṣṭairyatirapi ca punaḥ saptabhiḥ saptabhiḥ syāt /
analyzed: samyak yadi hi viracitāḥ syuḥ trikāḥ pāda yoge varṇaiḥ pūrva upadiṣṭaiḥ yatiḥ api ca punar saptabhiḥ saptabhiḥ syāt

original: vṛttaṃ samyagyadi syātprakṛtimanugataṃ tatvavidbhiḥ pradiṣṭaṃ vijñeyaṃ vṛttajātau kavijanadayitā sragdharā nāmatastu // BhN_15.130 //
analyzed: vṛttam samyak yadi syāt prakṛtim anugatam tatva vidbhiḥ pradiṣṭam vijñeyam vṛtta jātau kavi jana dayitā sragdharā nāmataḥ tu
yathā

original: cūtāśokāravindaiḥ kuravakatilakaiḥ karṇikāraiḥ śirīṣaiḥ punnāgaiḥ pārijātairvakulakuvalayaiḥ kiṃśukaiḥ sātimuktaiḥ /
analyzed: cūta aśoka aravindaiḥ kuravaka tilakaiḥ karṇikāraiḥ śirīṣaiḥ punnāgaiḥ pārijātaiḥ vakula kuvalayaiḥ kiṃśukaiḥ sa atimuktaiḥ

original: etairnānāprakāraiḥ bahulasurabhibhirviprakīrṇaiśca taistair vāsantaiḥ puṣpavṛndairnaravara vasudhā sragdharevādya bhāti // BhN_15.131 //
analyzed: etaiḥ nānā prakāraiḥ bahula surabhibhiḥ viprakīrṇaiḥ ca taiḥ taiḥ vāsantaiḥ puṣpa vṛndaiḥ nara vara vasudhā sragdharā iva adya bhāti

original: caturthamādyaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca daśamaṃ dvādaśaṃ tathā /
analyzed: caturtham ādyam ṣaṣṭham ca daśamam dvādaśam tathā

original: ṣoḍaśāṣṭādaśe caiva naidhanaṃ ca gurūṇyatha // BhN_15.132 //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa aṣṭādaśe ca eva naidhanam ca gurūṇi atha
dvāviṃśati akṣare pāde śeṣāṇi ca laghūni atha

original: bhavanti yatra tajjñeyaṃ bhadrakaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_15.133 //
analyzed: bhavanti yatra tat jñeyam bhadrakam nāmataḥ yathā

original: bhrau caraṇe yadā viniyatau trikau kramavaśādathātikṛtividhau nrau ca tataḥ paraṃ ca rucirāvanantarakṛtau nagāvapi punaḥ /
analyzed: caraṇe yadā viniyatau trikau krama vaśāt atha atikṛti vidhau ca tatas param ca rucirau anantara kṛtau nagau api punar

original: tacca daśāṣṭavarṇaracitā caturṣvapi tathā yatiśca satataṃ bhadrakavṛttameva khalu nāṭyayogakuśalairbudhairnigaditam // BhN_15.134 //
analyzed: tat ca daśa aṣṭa varṇa racitā caturṣu api tathā yatiḥ ca satatam bhadraka vṛttam eva khalu nāṭya yoga kuśalaiḥ budhaiḥ nigaditam
utplutam eka hasta caraṇam dvitīya kara recitam vaṃśa mṛdaṅga vādya madhuram vicitra karaṇa anugam bahuvidham

original: bhadrakametadadya subhage vidagdhagaticeṣṭitaiḥ sulalitair nṛtyasi vibhramākulapadaṃ viviktarasabhāvitaṃ śaśimukhi // BhN_15.135 //
analyzed: bhadrakam etat adya subhage vidagdha gati ceṣṭitaiḥ su lalitaiḥ nṛtyasi vibhrama ākula padam vivikta rasa bhāvitam śaśi mukhi
antyam ekonaviṃśam ca saptamam sa trayodaśam

original: ekādaśaṃ saptadaśaṃ pañcamaṃ ca gurūṇyatha // BhN_15.136 //
analyzed: ekādaśam saptadaśam pañcamam ca gurūṇi atha
śeṣāṇi ca laghūni syuḥ vikṛtyāḥ caraṇe budhaiḥ

original: vṛttaṃ tadaśvalalitaṃ vijñeyaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_15.137 //
analyzed: vṛttam tat aśvalalitam vijñeyam nāmataḥ yathā

original: yadi ca nakāra ādiracitaḥ pade viracito 'nta eva lagau yadi ca nabhau tridhā ca nihitau krameṇa khalu madhyāvapi tathā /
analyzed: yadi ca nakāraḥ ādi racitaḥ pade viracitaḥ ntaḥ eva lagau yadi ca nabhau tridhā ca nihitau krameṇa khalu madhyau api tathā

original: yadi ca samāśritaṃ hi vikṛtiṃ yatiśca daśabhistathaikasahitais tata iha kīrtitaṃ munigaṇairviśuddhacaritaistadaśvalalitam // BhN_15.138 //
analyzed: yadi ca samāśritam hi vikṛtim yatiḥ ca daśabhiḥ tathā eka sahitaiḥ tatas iha kīrtitam muni gaṇaiḥ viśuddha caritaiḥ tat aśvalalitam
vividha turaṅga nāga ratha yodha saṅkula malam balam samuditam śara śata śakti kunta paridhā asi yaṣṭi vitatam bahu praharaṇam

original: ripuśatamuktaśastraravabhītaśaṅkitabhaṭaṃ bhayākuladiśaṃ kṛtamabhivīkṣya saṃyugamukhe samarpitaguṇaṃ tvayāśvalalitam // BhN_15.139 //
analyzed: ripu śata mukta śastra rava bhīta śaṅkita bhaṭam bhaya ākula diśam kṛtam abhivīkṣya saṃyuga mukhe samarpita guṇam tvayā aśva lalitam
ṣaṣ ādau aṣṭamam ca eva hi ekādaśa caturdaśe

original: viṃśaṃ saptadaśaṃ caiva trayoviṃśaṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_15.140 //
analyzed: viṃśam saptadaśam ca eva trayoviṃśam tathā eva ca

original: etāni ca laghūni syuḥ śeṣāṇyatha gurūṇi ca /
analyzed: etāni ca laghūni syuḥ śeṣāṇi atha gurūṇi ca

original: caturviṃśatike pāde meghamāleti sā yathā // BhN_15.141 //
analyzed: caturviṃśatike pāde megha mālā iti sā yathā

original: yadi khalu caraṇasthitau nau trikau kṛtikāravyāstathā rāḥ syuḥ kramāt /
analyzed: yadi khalu caraṇa sthitau nau trikau kṛti kāravyāḥ tathā rāḥ syuḥ kramāt

original: bhavati yadi yatistathā saptabhiḥ saptabhistriṣvato 'nyā yatiḥ pañca vidyāttathā // BhN_15.142 //
analyzed: bhavati yadi yatiḥ tathā saptabhiḥ saptabhiḥ triṣu atas nyāḥ yatiḥ pañca vidyāt tathā
pavana bala samāhṛtā tīvra gambhīra nādā balākā āvalī mekhalā kṣitidhara sadṛśa ucca rūpā mahā nīla dhūmāñjana ābha ambu garbha udbhavā

original: surapatidhanurujjvalābaddhakakṣyā taḍiddyotasannāhapaṭṭījvalā gaganatalavisāriṇī prāvṛṣaṇyā dṛḍhaṃ meghamālādhikaṃ śobhate // BhN_15.143 //
analyzed: surapati dhanuḥ ujjvala ābaddha kakṣyā taḍit dyota sannāha paṭṭī jvalā gagana tala visāriṇī prāvṛṣaṇyā dṛḍham megha mālā adhikam śobhate

original: ādyaṃ caiva caturthaṃ ca pañcamaṃ ṣaṣṭhameva ca /
analyzed: ādyam ca eva caturtham ca pañcamam ṣaṣṭham eva ca

original: navamaṃ daśamaṃ caiva naidhanaṃ ca bhavedguru // BhN_15.144 //
analyzed: navamam daśamam ca eva naidhanam ca bhavet guru
laghūni anyāni śeṣāṇi pāde syuḥ pañcaviṃśake

original: vṛttajjñaiḥ sā tu vijñeyā krauñcapādīti nāmataḥ // BhN_15.145 //
analyzed: vṛtta jñaiḥ sā tu vijñeyā krauñcapādī iti nāmataḥ

original: bhmau yadi pāde sbhāvapi ceṣṭāvabhikṛtirapi ca hi yadi khalu vihitā nāśca samudrāḥ syurviniviṣṭā yadi ca khalu guru bhavati nidhanagatam /
analyzed: yadi pāde ca iṣṭau abhikṛtiḥ api ca iṣṭau abhikṛtiḥ api ca hi yadi khalu vihitāḥ nāḥ ca samudrāḥ syuḥ viniviṣṭāḥ yadi ca khalu guru bhavati nidhana gatam

original: pañcabhirādau chedamupetā punarapi yatiriha yadi khalu daśabhiḥ krauñcapadeyaṃ vṛttavidhāne suragaṇapitṛgaṇamunigaṇavihitā // BhN_15.146 //
analyzed: pañcabhiḥ ādau chedam upetā punar api yatiḥ iha yadi khalu daśabhiḥ krauñca padā iyam vṛtta vidhāne sura gaṇa pitṛ gaṇa muni gaṇa vihitā

original: yaḥ kila dākṣaṃ vidrutasomaṃ kratuvaramacamasamapagatakalaśaṃ pātitayūpaṃ kṣiptacaṣālaṃ vicayanamasamidhamapaśukacarukam /
analyzed: yaḥ kila dākṣam vidruta somam kratu varam a camasam apagata kalaśam pātita yūpam kṣipta caṣālam vicayanam a samidham a paśuka carukam

original: kārmukamuktenāśu cakāra vyapagatasuragaṇapitṛgaṇamiṣuṇā nityamasau te daityagaṇāriḥ pradahatu makhamiva ripugaṇamakhilam // BhN_15.147 //
analyzed: kārmuka muktena āśu cakāra vyapagata sura gaṇa pitṛ gaṇam iṣuṇā nityam asau te daitya gaṇa ariḥ pradahatu makham iva ripu gaṇam akhilam

original: yā kapilākṣī piṅgalakeśī kaliruciranudinamanunayakaṭhinā dīrghatarābhiḥ sthūlasirābhiḥ parivṛtavapuratiśayakuṭilagatiḥ /
analyzed: yā kapila akṣī piṅgala keśī kali ruciḥ anudinam anunaya kaṭhinā dīrghatarābhiḥ sthūla sirābhiḥ parivṛta vapuḥ atiśaya kuṭila gatiḥ

original: āyatajaṅghā nimnakapolā laghutarakucayugaparigatahṛdayā sā parihāryā krauñcapadā strī dhruvamiha niravadhisukhamabhilaṣatā // BhN_15.148 //
analyzed: āyata jaṅghā nimna kapolā laghutara kuca yuga parigata hṛdayā sā parihāryā krauñca padā strī dhruvam iha niravadhi sukham abhilaṣatā
aṣṭāv ādau gurūṇi syuḥ tathā ca ekonaviṃśakam

original: ekaviṃśaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ caturviṃśaṃ sanaidhanam // BhN_15.149 //
analyzed: ekaviṃśam ca vijñeyam caturviṃśam sa naidhanam

original: etāni guru saṃkhyāni śeṣāṇi ca laghūnyatha /
analyzed: etāni guru saṃkhyāni śeṣāṇi ca laghūni atha
ṣaḍviṃśati akṣare pāde tat bhujaṅga vijṛmbhitam

original: yasyāṃ mau to nāḥ strau nityaṃ praticaraṇamatha
analyzed: yasyām mau taḥ nāḥ strau nityam praticaraṇam atha
gaditakāḥ trikāḥ hi anupūrvaśas
ṣaḍviṃśatyām eka ūnāyām ca yadi hi
khalu yatiḥ abhidhā caturbhiḥ atha aṣṭābhiḥ
paścāt antyau l gau saṃyojyau yadi bhavati
manuja dayitām samāśritam utkṛtim
nāmnā vṛttam loke khyātam kavi vadana
vikasana param bhujaṅga vijṛmbhitam
yathā
rūpa upetām devaiḥ sṛṣṭām sa mada gaja
vilasita gatim nirīkṣya tilottamām
prādakṣiṇyāt prāptām draṣṭum bahu vadana
śiraḥ kṛtavān hariḥ
dīrgham niśvasya antar gūḍham stana vadana
jaghana rucirām nirīkṣya tathā punar
pṛṣṭhe nyastam deva indreṇa pravara maṇi
kanaka valayam bhujaṅga vijṛmbhitam
daṇḍakam nāma vijñeyam utkṛteḥ adhikataram

original: meghamālādikaṃ tatsyānnau cādau kāguhā trikāḥ // BhN_15.153 //
analyzed: meghamālā ādikam tat syāt nau ca ādau kāguhā trikāḥ
yathā
mudita janapada ākulā sphīta sasya ākarā bhūta dhātrī bhavantam samabhyarcati
dvirada kara vilupta hintāla tālī vanāḥ tvām namasyanti vindhya ādayaḥ parvatāḥ
sphuṭita kalaśā śukti nigīrṇa muktā phalaiḥ ūrmi hastaiḥ namasyanti vaḥ sāgarāḥ

original: muditajalacarākulāḥ saṃprakīrṇamalāḥ kīrtayantīva kīrtiṃ mahānimnagāḥ // BhN_15.154 //
analyzed: mudita jalacara ākulāḥ saṃprakīrṇa malāḥ kīrtayanti iva kīrtim mahā nimnagāḥ
etāni sama vṛttāni mayā uktāni dvijottamāḥ
viṣama ardha samānām tu punar vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam
yatra pādāḥ tu viṣamāḥ nānā vṛtta samudbhavāḥ

original: grathitāḥ pādayogena tad vṛttaṃ viṣamaṃ smṛtam // BhN_15.156 //
analyzed: grathitāḥ pāda yogena tat vṛttam viṣamam smṛtam

original: dvau samaṃ dvau ca viṣamau vṛtte 'rdhaviṣame tathā /
analyzed: dvau samam dvau ca viṣamau vṛtte rdha viṣame tathā
sarva pādaiḥ ca viṣamaiḥ vṛttam viṣamam ucyate
hrasva ādyam atha dīrgha ādyam dīrgham hrasvam atha api vā
yugma ūja viṣamaiḥ pādaiḥ vṛttam ardha samam bhavet

original: pāde siddhe samaṃ siddhaṃ viṣamaṃ sārvapādikam /
analyzed: pāde siddhe samam siddham viṣamam sārvapādikam
dvayoḥ ardha samam vidyāt eṣa chedaḥ tu pādataḥ
chedāḥ tu ye mayā proktā sama vṛtta vikalpitaḥ
trikaiḥ viṣama vṛttānām saṃpravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam

original: dvitīye caraṇe ca syādityanuṣṭup samāsataḥ // BhN_15.161 //
analyzed: dvitīye caraṇe ca syāt iti anuṣṭubh samāsatas

original: sau gau tu prathame pāde srau lgau cāpi dvitīyake /
analyzed: sau gau tu prathame pāde srau l gau ca api dvitīyake

original: yugme 'rdhaviṣame pāde jñeyā pathyā tu sā trikaiḥ // BhN_15.162 //
analyzed: yugme ṛdha viṣame pāde jñeyā pathyā tu sā trikaiḥ

original: priyadānaratā pathyā dayite tvaṃ priyāsi me // BhN_15.163 //
analyzed: priya dāna ratā pathyā dayite tvam priyā asi me

original: mrau gau tu prathame pāde ysau lgau ca dvitīyake /
analyzed: m rau gau tu prathame pāde y sau l gau ca dvitīyake

original: pāde bhau lgau tṛtīye ca caturthe tu tasau lagau // BhN_15.164 //
analyzed: pāde bhau lgau tṛtīye ca caturthe tu ta sau la gau

original: naivācāro na te mitraṃ na saṃbandhiguṇapriyā /
analyzed: na eva ācāraḥ na te mitram na saṃbandhi guṇa priyā

original: sarvathā sarvaviṣamā pathyā na bhavasi priye // BhN_15.165 //
analyzed: sarvathā sarva viṣamā pathyā na bhavasi priye

original: pathyā hi viparītā sā vijñeyā nāmato yathā // BhN_15.166 //
analyzed: pathyā hi viparītā sā vijñeyā nāmataḥ yathā

original: kṛtena ramaṇasya kiṃ sakhi roṣeṇa te 'pyartham /
analyzed: kṛtena ramaṇasya kim sakhi roṣeṇa te pi artham

original: viparītā na pathyāsi tvaṃ jaḍe kena mohitā // BhN_15.167 //
analyzed: viparītā na pathyā asi tvam jaḍe kena mohitā
caturthāt akṣarāt yatra tri laghu syāt ayuktataḥ

original: anuṣṭupcapalā sā tu vijñeyā nāmato yathā // BhN_15.168 //
analyzed: anuṣṭubh capalā sā tu vijñeyā nāmataḥ yathā

original: na khalvasyāḥ priyatamaḥ śrotavyaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ sakhyā /
analyzed: na khalu asyāḥ priyatamaḥ śrotavyam vyāhṛtam sakhyā

original: nāradasya pratikṛtiḥ kathyate capalā hīyam // BhN_15.169 //
analyzed: nāradasya pratikṛtiḥ kathyate capalā hi iyam

original: vipulā tu yuji jñeyā laghutvātsaptamasya tu /
analyzed: vipulā tu yuji jñeyā laghu tvāt saptamasya tu
sarvatra saptamasya eva keṣāṃcid vipulā yathā
saṃkṣiptā vajra madhye hi hema kumbha nibha stanī

gaṅgā iva megha upagame āplāvita vasundharā
kūla vṛkṣān ārujantī sravantī vipulā balāt

eka rātrau para gṛham corī bandhanam arhasi
evam vividha yogāḥ tu pathyā pādāḥ bhavanti hi
yugma ūja viṣamaiḥ pādaiḥ śeṣaiḥ anyaiḥ trikaiḥ yathā

prathamāt akṣarāt yatra caturthāt prāk laghuḥ smṛtaḥ
pathyā pādam samāsthāpya trīṇi ante tu gurūṇi atha

rati saṃbhoga khinnam te darśanīyataram vaktram
iti eṣā sarva viṣamā nāmataḥ nuṣṭubh ucyate

asaṃsthita padā su vihvala aṅgī mada skhalita ceṣṭitaiḥ manojñā

original: kva yāsyasi varoru suratakāle viṣamā kiṃ vānavāsikā tvam // BhN_15.180 //
analyzed: kva yāsyasi vara ūru surata kāle viṣamā kim vānavāsikā tvam

original: sjau sgau ca prathame pāde tathā caiva tṛtīyake /
analyzed: ca prathame pāde tathā ca eva tṛtīyake

original: ketumatyāṃ gaṇāḥ proktāḥ bhrau ngau gaśca sadā budhaiḥ // BhN_15.181 //
analyzed: ketumatyām gaṇāḥ proktāḥ bhrau n gau gaḥ ca sadā budhaiḥ

original: kimidaṃ ruṣāpahṛtaśobhaṃ ketumatīsamaṃ vada mukhaṃ te // BhN_15.182 //
analyzed: kim idam ruṣā apahṛta śobham ketumatī samam vada mukham te

original: vaktrasyāparapūrvasya cādau nau ro lagau trikāḥ /
analyzed: vaktrasya apara pūrvasya ca ādau nau raḥ lagau trikāḥ

original: najau rajau dvitīye ca śeṣāgraṃ punareva tu // BhN_15.183 //
analyzed: na jau ra jau dvitīye ca śeṣa agram punar eva tu

original: prathame ca tṛtīye nau ralau gaśca prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: prathame ca tṛtīye nau ra lau gaḥ ca prakīrtitaḥ

original: gaṇāścāparavaktre tu najau jrau dvicaturthayoḥ // BhN_15.184 //
analyzed: gaṇāḥ ca apara vaktre tu na jau j rau dvi caturthayoḥ

original: kimidamaparavaktrameva te śaśivadane 'dya mukhaṃ parāṅmukham // BhN_15.185 //
analyzed: kim idam apara vaktram eva te śaśi vadane mukham parāṅmukham

original: nau yau tu prathame pāde njau jrau gaśca tathāpare /
analyzed: nau yau tu prathame pāde n jau j rau gaḥ ca tathā apare

original: yatra tatpuṣpitāgrā syādyadi śeṣaṃ tu pūrvavat // BhN_15.186 //
analyzed: yatra tat puṣpita agrā syāt yadi śeṣam tu pūrvavat

original: madhukaraparigīyamānaśabdaṃ varatanu paśya vanaṃ supuṣpitāgram // BhN_15.187 //
analyzed: madhukara parigīyamāna śabdam vara tanu paśya vanam su puṣpita agram

original: sjau slau cādau yathā nsau jgau bhnau jlau gaśca tathā punaḥ /
analyzed: s jau s lau ca ādau yathā n sau j gau bh nau j lau gaḥ ca tathā punar

original: sjau sjau gaśca trikā hyete udgatāyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // BhN_15.188 //
analyzed: trikāḥ hi ete udgatāyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
tava romarājiḥ atibhāti su tanu madanasya mañjarī
nābhi kamala vivara utpatitā bhramara āvalī iva kusumāt samudgatā

original: sjau slau ca tato nsau jgau nau sau ceti tṛtīyake /
analyzed: s jau s lau ca tatas n sau j gau nau sau ca iti tṛtīyake

original: sjau sjau gaśca caturthe tu lalitāyā gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_15.190 //
analyzed: s jau s jau gaḥ ca caturthe tu lalitāyāḥ gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

pravikasita kamala kānti mukhī pravibhāsi devī surata śrama āturā
evam etāni vṛttāni samāni viṣamāṇi ca
nāṭaka ādyeṣu kāvyeṣu prayoktavyāni sūribhiḥ
santi anyāni api vṛttāni yāni uktāni iha piṇḍaśas

original: na ca tāni prayojyāni na śobhāṃ janayanti hi // BhN_15.193 //
analyzed: na ca tāni prayojyāni na śobhām janayanti hi
yāni atas pratiṣiddhāni gītake tāni yojayet

original: dhruvāyoge tu vakṣyāmi teṣāṃ caiva vikalpanam // BhN_15.194 //
analyzed: dhruvā yoge tu vakṣyāmi teṣām ca eva vikalpanam
vṛtta lakṣaṇam evam tu samāsena mayā uditam

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi hyāryāṇāmapi lakṣaṇam // BhN_15.195 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi hi āryāṇām api lakṣaṇam

original: pathyā ca vipulā caiva caṣalā mukhato 'parā /
analyzed: pathyā ca vipulā ca eva caṣalā mukhatas parā

original: jaghane capalā caiva āryāḥ pañca prakīrtitāḥ // BhN_15.196 //
analyzed: jaghane capalā ca eva āryāḥ pañca prakīrtitāḥ
āsām tu saṃpravakṣyāmi yati mātrā vikalpanam
lakṣaṇam niyamam ca eva vikalpa guṇa saṃśrayam
yatiḥ chedaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ catur mātraḥ gaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: dvitīyāntyau yujau pādāvayujau tvaparau smṛtau // BhN_15.198 //
analyzed: dvitīya antyau yujau pādau ayujau tu aparau smṛtau
guru madhya vihīnaḥ tu catur gaṇa samanvitaḥ
ayuj gaṇaḥ vidhātavyaḥ yuj gaṇaḥ tu yathā īpsitaḥ
ṣaṣṭhaḥ vai dvi vikalpaḥ tu naidhanaḥ hi eka saṃsthitaḥ
