original: paścādardhe tu ṣaṣṭhaḥ syādekamātrastu kevalaḥ // BhN_15.200 //
analyzed: paścāt ardhe tu ṣaṣṭhaḥ syāt eka mātraḥ tu kevalaḥ

original: dvivikalpastu ṣaṣṭho yo gurumadhyo bhavettu saḥ /
analyzed: dvi vikalpaḥ tu ṣaṣṭhaḥ yaḥ guru madhyaḥ bhavet tu saḥ
tathā sarva laghuḥ ca eva yati saṃjñā samāśritā
dvitīya ādi laghuḥ jñeyaḥ saptame pañcame yatiḥ

original: prathamādirathāntye ca pañcame vā vidhīyate // BhN_15.202 //
analyzed: prathama ādi ratha antye ca pañcame vā vidhīyate

original: gaṇeṣu triṣu pādasya yasyāḥ pathyā tu sā bhavet /
analyzed: gaṇeṣu triṣu pādasya yasyāḥ pathyā tu sā bhavet

original: ataśca vipulānyā tu vijñeyā yatilakṣaṇā // BhN_15.203 //
analyzed: atas ca vipulā anyā tu vijñeyā yati lakṣaṇā
ayujaḥ sarva guravaḥ guru madhyāḥ gaṇāḥ yujaḥ

original: yasyāḥ syuḥ pādayoge tu vijñeyā capalā hi sā // BhN_15.204 //
analyzed: yasyāḥ syuḥ pāda yoge tu vijñeyā capalā hi sā
triṃśat ādye tu vijñeyāḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ ca apare
ubhayoḥ ardhayoḥ jñeyaḥ mātrā piṇḍaḥ vibhāgaśaḥ
triṃśat tasyāḥ ca yadi syuḥ etāni dviguṇāni tu
trīṇi akṣarāṇi ca anyāni nyasya saṃkhyā vibhāgaśaḥ
etāni laghu saṃjñāni nirdiṣṭāni samāsatas
sarveṣām ca evam āryāṇām akṣarāṇām yathākramam
ardha aṣṭama gaṇa ardhā ca savavāryā prakīrtitā
ṣaṣṭhaḥ ca dvi vikalpaḥ tu naidhane hi eka saṃsthitaḥ

original: paścādvā yo gaṇaḥ ṣaṣṭha ekamātraḥ sa ucyate /
analyzed: paścāt vā yaḥ gaṇaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ eka mātraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: dvivikalpastu yaḥ ṣaṣṭho gurumadhyo bhavettu saḥ // BhN_15.209 //
analyzed: dvi vikalpaḥ tu yaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ guru madhyaḥ bhavet tu saḥ
yathā sarva laghuḥ ca eva yatiḥ saṃkhyā samāśritā

original: sā dvitīyā dvilaghukā saptame prathame yatiḥ // BhN_15.210 //
analyzed: sā dvitīyā dvi laghukā saptame prathame yatiḥ
guru madhya vihīnaḥ tu catur gaṇa samanvitaḥ

original: ayuggaṇo vidhātavyaḥ yuggaṇastu sa eva ca // BhN_15.211 //
analyzed: ayuj gaṇaḥ vidhātavyaḥ yuj gaṇaḥ tu saḥ eva ca

original: prathamatṛtīyau pādau dvādaśamātrau bhavettu sā pathyā /
analyzed: prathama tṛtīyau pādau dvādaśa mātrau bhavet tu sā pathyā
vipulā anyā khalu gaditā pūrva udita lakṣaṇa upetā
pathyā yathā
rakta mṛdu padma netrā sita dīrgha bahula mṛdu keśī

original: kasya tu pṛthumṛdujaghanā tanubāhvaṃ sodarī pathyā // BhN_15.213 //
analyzed: kasya tu pṛthu mṛdu jaghanā sodarī pathyā
vipulā yathā
vipula jaghana vadana stana nayanaiḥ tāmra adhara uṣṭha kara caraṇaiḥ
āyata nāsā gaṇḍaiḥ lalāṭa karṇaiḥ śubhā kanyā
dvitīyaḥ ca caturthaḥ ca guru madhya gataḥ bhavet
ubhayoḥ ardhayoḥ yatra vijñeyā capalā yathā
udbhaṭa gāminī paruṣa bhāṣiṇī kāma cihna kṛta veṣā
jānāti māṃsa yuktā surā priyā sarvatas capalā

original: pūrvārdhe lakṣaṇaṃ hyetadasyāḥ sa ca mukhena tu /
analyzed: pūrva ardhe lakṣaṇam hi etat asyāḥ sa ca mukhena tu

original: paścimārdhe tu capalā yasyāḥ sā jaghanena tu // BhN_15.217 //
analyzed: paścima ardhe tu capalā yasyāḥ sā jaghanena tu
mukha capalā yathā

original: āryāmukhe tu capalā tathāpi cāryā na me yataḥ sā kim /
analyzed: āryā mukhe tu capalā tathā api ca āryā na me yatas sā kim

original: dakṣā gṛhakṛtyeṣu tathā duḥkhe bhavati duḥkhārtā // BhN_15.218 //
analyzed: dakṣā gṛha kṛtyeṣu tathā duḥkhe bhavati duḥkha ārtā
jaghana capalā yathā
vara mṛga nayane capalā asi vara ūru śaśāṅka darpaṇa nibha āsye
kāmasya sāra bhūte na pūrva mada cāru jaghanena
ubhayoḥ ardhayoḥ etat lakṣaṇam dṛśyate yadi

original: vṛttajñaiḥ sā tu vijñeyā sarvataścapalā sakhi // BhN_15.220 //
analyzed: vṛtta jñaiḥ sā tu vijñeyā sarvatas capalā sakhi
kāryau dvādaśa mātrau ca pādau ādyau tṛtīyakau

original: aṣṭādaśa dvitīyaṃ ca tathā pañcadaśottamā // BhN_15.221 //
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa dvitīyam ca tathā pañcadaśa uttamā
catur pañca prakārāṇām catuṣkāṇām viśeṣataḥ
prastāra yogam āsādya bāhulyam saṃpradarśayet
pañcapañcāśat ādyā tu triṃśat ādyā tathā eva ca
āryā tu akṣara piṇḍena vijñeyā atra prayoktṛbhiḥ
triṃśataḥ tu atha varṇebhyaḥ laghu varṇa trayam bhavet

original: śeṣāṇi gurusaṃkhyāni hyevaṃ sarvatra nirdiśet // BhN_15.224 //
analyzed: śeṣāṇi guru saṃkhyāni hi evam sarvatra nirdiśet
sarveṣām eva ca āryāṇām akṣarāṇām yathākramam
sarveṣām jāti vṛttānām pūrvam uttara saṃkhyayā
vikalpa gaṇanām kṛtvā saṃkhyā piṇḍena nirdiśet
āryā gītiḥ atha āryā eva kevalam tu aṣṭabhiḥ gaṇaiḥ
itara arthe jaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ tu na laghu gaṇaḥ iṣyate
vṛttaiḥ evam tu vividhaiḥ nānā chandaḥ samudbhavaiḥ
kāvya bandhāḥ tu kartavyāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat lakṣaṇa anvitāḥ
iti bharatīye nāṭya śāstre chandovicitiḥ nāma pañcadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha ṣoḍaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
vibhūṣaṇam ca akṣara saṃhatiḥ ca śobhā abhimānau guṇa kīrtanam ca
protsāhana udāharaṇe niruktam hetuḥ
sārūpya mithyā adhyavasāya siddhi pada uccaya ākranda manorathāḥ ca
ākhyāna yāḥ ca apratiṣedha pṛcchāḥ dṛṣṭānta nirbhāsana saṃśayāḥ ca

original: āśīḥ priyoktiḥ kapaṭaḥ kṣamā ca prāptiśca paścāttapanaṃ tathaiva /
analyzed: āśīḥ priya uktiḥ kapaṭaḥ kṣamā ca prāptiḥ ca paścāttapanam tathā eva
artha anuvṛttiḥ hi upapatti yuktī kāryaḥ nunītiḥ paridevanam ca

original: ṣaṭtriṃśadetāni hi lakṣaṇāni proktāni vai bhūṣaṇasaṃmitāni /
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat etāni hi lakṣaṇāni proktāni vai bhūṣaṇa saṃmitāni

original: kāvyeṣu bhāvārthagatāni tajjñaiḥ samyag prayojyāni yathārasaṃ tu // BhN_16.4 //
analyzed: kāvyeṣu bhāva artha gatāni tad jñaiḥ samyak prayojyāni yathārasam tu
alaṅkāraiḥ guṇaiḥ ca eva bahubhiḥ samalaṅkṛtam
bhūṣaṇaiḥ iva vinyastaiḥ tat bhūṣaṇam iti smṛtam
yatra alpaiḥ akṣaraiḥ śliṣṭaiḥ vicitram upavarṇyate
tam api akṣara saṅghātam vidyāt lakṣaṇa saṃjñitam
siddhaiḥ arthaiḥ samam kṛtvā hi asiddhaḥ rthaḥ prasādhyate
yatra ślakṣṇa vicitra arthā sā śobhā iti abhidhīyate
dhāryamāṇaḥ tu bahubhiḥ vacanaiḥ kārya yuktibhiḥ

original: na yaḥ paryavatiṣṭheta so 'bhimānastu saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_16.8 //
analyzed: na yaḥ paryavatiṣṭheta saḥ bhimānaḥ tu saṃjñitaḥ
kīrtyamānaiḥ guṇaiḥ yatra vividha artha samudbhavaiḥ

original: doṣā na parikathyante tajjñeyaṃ guṇakīrtanam // BhN_16.9 //
analyzed: doṣāḥ na parikathyante tat jñeyam guṇa kīrtanam
loke guṇa atiriktānām bahūnām yatra nāmabhiḥ
ekaḥ yaḥ tu vijñeyam guṇa kīrtanam
utsāha jananaiḥ spaṣṭaiḥ arthaiḥ opamya saṃśrayaiḥ

original: prasiddhairupagūḍhaṃ ca jñeyaṃ protsāhanaṃ budhaiḥ // BhN_16.11 //
analyzed: prasiddhaiḥ upagūḍham ca jñeyam protsāhanam budhaiḥ
yatra ekasya api śabdasya darśanāt su bahūni api
yānti siddhim anuktāni tat udāharaṇam smṛtam

original: niruktaṃ dvividhaṃ proktaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva vā /
analyzed: niruktam dvividham proktam tathyam ca atathyam eva vā
siddhi prasādhitam tathyam atathyam ca aprasādhitam
guṇa anuvādaḥ hīnānām uttamaiḥ upamā kṛtaḥ

original: uttamārthaviśeṣo yaḥ sa cāpyatiśayaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhN_16.14 //
analyzed: uttama artha viśeṣaḥ yaḥ sa ca api atiśayaḥ smṛtaḥ
bahūnām bhāṣamāṇānām ekasya artha vinirṇayāt
siddha upamāna vacanam hetuḥ iti abhisaṃjñitaḥ
apadeśaḥ tu parokṣaḥ yasmāt utpadyate nukaraṇena
lakṣaṇa samāna karaṇāt sārūpyam tat tu nirdeśyam
a bhūta pūrvaiḥ yatra arthaiḥ tulyasya arthasya nirṇayaḥ
sa mithyā adhyavasāyaḥ tu procyate kāvya lakṣaṇe

original: bahūnāṃ tu pradhānānāṃ madhye yannāma kīrtyate /
analyzed: bahūnām tu pradhānānām madhye yat nāma kīrtyate
ekārtha sādhana kṛtam sā siddhiḥ iti kīrtyate
guṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ eka arthaiḥ padaiḥ yaḥ saṃpraśasyate
pada uccayam tu tat vidyāt nānā artha grathana ātmakam
ātma bhāvam upanyasya para sādṛśya yuktibhiḥ

original: tīvrārthabhāṣaṇaṃ yatsyādākrandaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ // BhN_16.20 //
analyzed: tīvra artha bhāṣaṇam yat syāt ākrandaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ
hṛdaya sthasya bhāvasya su spaṣṭa artha pradarśanam
anya apadeśa kathanaiḥ manorathaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
apṛṣṭaiḥ athavā pṛṣṭaiḥ nirṇayaḥ kriyate tu yaḥ
ākhyānam iti tat jñeyam lakṣaṇam nāṭaka āśrayam
ādau yat krodha jananam ante harṣa pravardhanam

original: yattu priyaṃ punarvākyaṃ sā yāñcā parikīrtitā // BhN_16.23 //
analyzed: yat tu priyam punar vākyam sā parikīrtitā
kāryeṣu viparīteṣu yadi kiñcid pravartate

original: nivāryate ca kāryajjñaiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_16.24 //
analyzed: nivāryate ca pratiṣedhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
yatra ākāra udbhavaiḥ vākyaiḥ ātmānam athavā param
pṛcchan iva abhidhatte rtham sā pṛcchā iti abhisaṃjñitā
vidvān pūrva upalabdhau yat sama tvam upapādayet

original: nidarśanakṛtastajjñaiḥ sa dṛṣṭānta iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_16.26 //
analyzed: nidarśana kṛtaḥ tad jñaiḥ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
aneka yuktimat vākyam aneka artha prasādhakam
aneka vākya saṃyuktam tat nirbhāsanam ucyate
a parijñāta tattva artham yatra vākyam samāpyate
saḥ na eka tvāt vicārāṇām saṃśayaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
yatra śāstra artha sampannām manoratha samudbhavām
a prārthanīyām anyām vā viduḥ tām āśiṣam budhāḥ
ādau yat krodha jananam ante harṣa pravardhanam
tat priyam vacanam jñeyam āśīrvāda samanvitam
chala yuktyā tu anyeṣām abhisandhāna abhibhāva kaṃkapaṭam
dvi tri prayoga yuktaḥ vijñeyaḥ kapaṭa saṅghātaḥ
durjana udāhṛtaiḥ rūkṣaiḥ sabhā madhye titāḍitaḥ

original: akrodhaḥ krodhajananairvākyairyaḥ sā kṣamā bhavet // BhN_16.32 //
analyzed: akrodhaḥ krodha jananaiḥ vākyaiḥ yaḥ sā kṣamā bhavet
dṛṣṭvā eva avayavam kañcid bhāvaḥ yatra anumīyate
prāptim tām abhijānīyāt lakṣaṇam nāṭaka āśrayam
akāryam sahasā kṛtvā a kṛtvā kāryam atha api vā

original: santāpo manaso yastu paścāttāpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_16.34 //
analyzed: santāpaḥ manasaḥ yaḥ tu paścāttāpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
praśrayeṇa artha saṃyuktam yat parasya anuvartanam
snehāt dākṣiṇya yogāt vā sa anuvṛttiḥ tu saṃjñitā

original: prāptānāṃ yatra doṣāṇāṃ kriyate śamanaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: prāptānām yatra doṣāṇām kriyate śamanam punar

original: sā jñeyā hyupapattistu lakṣaṇaṃ nāṭakāśrayam // BhN_16.36 //
analyzed: sā jñeyā hi upapattiḥ tu lakṣaṇam nāṭaka āśrayam
sādhyate yaḥ ṛtha sambandhaḥ mahadbhiḥ samavāyataḥ
paraspara ānukūlyena sā yuktiḥ parikīrtitā
yatra apasārayan doṣam guṇam arthena yojayet

original: guṇābhivādaṃ doṣān vā kāryaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ viduḥ // BhN_16.38 //
analyzed: guṇa abhivādam doṣān vā kāryam tad lakṣaṇam viduḥ
apūrva krodha janitam aparādham pramṛjya yat
sevā artham madhuram vākyam anunītiḥ prakīrtitā
doṣaiḥ yat anya nāma uktaiḥ prasiddha arthaiḥ prayojayet

original: anyatrārthena sambaddhaṃ jñeyaṃ tat paridevanam // BhN_16.40 //
analyzed: anyatra arthena sambaddham jñeyam tat paridevanam

original: upamā rūpakaṃ caiva dīpakaṃ yamakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: upamā rūpakam ca eva dīpakam yamakam tathā
alaṅkārāḥ tu vijñeyā catvāraḥ nāṭaka āśrayāḥ
yat kiñcid kāvya bandheṣu sādṛśyena upamīyate

original: upamā nāma sā jñeyā guṇākṛtisamāśrayā // BhN_16.42 //
analyzed: upamā nāma sā jñeyā guṇa ākṛti samāśrayā
ekasya ekena sā kāryā hi anekena athavā punar
anekasya tathā ekena bahūnām bahubhiḥ tathā
tulyam te śaśinā vaktram iti ekena eka saṃśrayā

original: śaśāṅkavat prakāśante jyotīṃṣīti bhavettu yā // BhN_16.44 //
analyzed: śaśāṅka vat prakāśante jyotīṃṣi iti bhavet tu yā
ekasya aneka viṣayā sā upamā parikīrtitā
śyena barhiṇa bhāsānām tulya artham iti yā bhavet
ekasya bahubhiḥ sāmyāt upamā nāṭaka āśrayā

original: bahūnāṃ bahubhirjñeyā ghanā iva gajā iti // BhN_16.46 //
analyzed: bahūnām bahubhiḥ jñeyāḥ ghanāḥ iva gajāḥ iti

original: praśaṃsā caiva nindā ca kalpitā sadṛśī tathā /
analyzed: praśaṃsā ca eva nindā ca kalpitā sadṛśī tathā

original: yā kiñcitsadṛśī jñeyā sopamā pañcadhā budhaiḥ // BhN_16.47 //
analyzed: yā kiñcid sadṛśī jñeyā sā upamā pañcadhā budhaiḥ
praśaṃsā yathā

original: dṛṣṭvā tu tāṃ viśālākṣīṃ tutoṣa manujādhipaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu tām viśāla akṣīm tutoṣa manuja adhipaḥ

original: munibhiḥ sādhitāṃ kṛcchrāt siddhiṃ mūrtimatīmiva // BhN_16.48 //
analyzed: munibhiḥ sādhitām kṛcchrāt siddhim mūrtimatīm iva
nindā yathā
sā tam sarva guṇaiḥ hīnam sasvaje karkaśa chavim

original: vane kaṇṭakinaṃ vallī dāvadagdhamiva drumam // BhN_16.49 //
analyzed: vane kaṇṭakinam vallī dāva dagdham iva drumam
kalpitā yathā
kṣarantaḥ dāna salilam lālā manthara gāminaḥ

original: mataṅgajā virājante jaṅgamā iva parvatāḥ // BhN_16.50 //
analyzed: mataṅga jāḥ virājante jaṅgamāḥ iva parvatāḥ
sadṛśī yathā
yat tvayā adya kṛtam karma pari citta anurodhinā
sadṛśam tat tava eva syāt ati mānuṣa karmaṇaḥ
kiñcid sadṛśī yathā
sampūrṇa candra vadanā nīlotpala dala īkṣaṇā
matta mātaṅga gamanā samprāptā iyam sakhī mama
upamāyāḥ budhaiḥ ete bhedāḥ jñeyāḥ samāsatas

original: śeṣā ye lakṣaṇairnoktāste grāhyāḥ kāvyalokataḥ // BhN_16.53 //
analyzed: śeṣāḥ ye lakṣaṇaiḥ na uktāḥ te grāhyāḥ kāvya lokataḥ
nānā adhikaraṇa arthānām śabdānām saṃpradīpakam
eka vākyena saṃyuktam tat dīpakam ucyate
prasṛtam madhuram ca api guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ alaṅkṛtam
kāvye yat nāṭake viprāḥ tat dīpakam iti smṛtam
yathā

original: sarāṃsi haṃsaiḥ kusumaiśca vṛkṣā mattairdvirephaiśca saroruhāṇi /
analyzed: sarāṃsi haṃsaiḥ kusumaiḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ mattaiḥ dvirephaiḥ ca saroruhāṇi

original: goṣṭhībhirudyānavanāni caiva tasminnaśūnyāni sadā kriyante // BhN_16.56 //
analyzed: goṣṭhībhiḥ udyāna vanāni ca eva tasmin a śūnyāni sadā kriyante
sva vikalpena racitam tulya avayava lakṣaṇam

original: kiñcitsādṛśyasampannaṃ yadrūpaṃ rūpakaṃ tu tat // BhN_16.57 //
analyzed: kiñcid sādṛśya sampannam yat rūpam rūpakam tu tat
nānā dravya anurāga ādyaiḥ yat aupamya guṇa āśrayam
rūpa nirvarṇana āyuktam tat rūpakam iti smṛtam
yathā
padma ānanāḥ tāḥ kumuda prahāsāḥ vikāsi nīlotpala cāru netrāḥ
vāpī striyaḥ haṃsa kulaiḥ naḥ svanadbhiḥ virejuḥ anyonyam iva āhvayantyaḥ
śabda abhyāsaḥ tu yamakam pada ādiṣu vikalpitam
viśeṣa darśanañca asya gadataḥ me nibodhata
pādāntayamakam ca eva kāñcīyamakam eva ca
samudgayamakam ca eva vikrāntayamakam tathā
yamakam cakravālam ca sandaṣṭayamakam tathā
pada ādi yamakam ca eva hi āmreḍitam atha api ca
catur vyavasitam ca eva mālāyamakam eva ca
etādṛśavidham jñeyam yamakam nāṭaka āśrayam
caturṇām yatra pādānām ante syāt samam akṣaram

original: tadvai pādāntayamakaṃ vijñeyaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_16.64 //
analyzed: tat vai pāda anta yamakam vijñeyam nāmataḥ yathā
dinakṣayāt saṃhṛta raśmi maṇḍalam
divi iva lagnam tapanīya maṇḍalam
vibhāti tāmram divi sūrya maṇḍalam
yathā taruṇyāḥ stana bhāra maṇḍalam
lokānām prabhaviṣṇuḥ daitya indra gadā nipātana sahiṣṇuḥ
jayati sura daitya jiṣṇuḥ bhagavān asura vara mathana kārī viṣṇuḥ

original: pādasyānte tathā cādau syātāṃ yatra same pade /
analyzed: pādasya ante tathā ca ādau syātām yatra same pade
tat kāñcīyamakam ca eva vijñeyam sūribhiḥ yathā
yāmam yāmam candravatīnām dravatīnām
vyaktā avyaktā sā arajanīnām rajanīnām
phulle phulle sambhramare vā abhramare vā

original: rāmā rāmā vismayate ca smayate ca // BhN_16.68 //
analyzed: rāmā rāmā vismayate ca smayate ca
ardhena ekena yat vṛttam sarvam eva samāpyate
samudgayamakam nāma tat jñeyam paṇḍitaiḥ yathā
śobhate pravara kānana hastī
śobhate pravara kānana hastī

original: ekaikaṃ pādamutkramya dvau pādau sadṛśau yadi /
analyzed: ekaikam pādam utkramya dvau pādau sadṛśau yadi
vikrāntayamakam nāma tat vijñeyam idam yathā

original: sa pūrvaṃ vāraṇo bhūtvā dviśṛṅga iva parvataḥ /
analyzed: sa pūrvam vāraṇaḥ bhūtvā dvi śṛṅgaḥ iva parvataḥ
abhavat danta vaikalyāt viśṛṅgaḥ iva parvataḥ
pūrvasya antena pādasya parasya ādiḥ yadā samaḥ

original: cakravaccakravālaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ nāmato yathā // BhN_16.73 //
analyzed: cakra vat cakravālam tu vijñeyam nāmataḥ yathā
tulyāt pāda dvayāt antyāt ekena ādiḥ yadā samaḥ
sarvatra cakravālam tu tat vijñeyam budhaiḥ yathā

original: śailā yathā śatrubhirāhatā hatā hatāśca bhūyastvanupuṅkhapuṅkhagaiḥ /
analyzed: śailāḥ yathā śatrubhiḥ āhatāḥ hatāḥ hatāḥ ca bhūyas tu anu puṅkha puṅkha gaiḥ
khagaiḥ ca sarvaiḥ yudhi sañcitāḥ citāḥ citā adhirūḍhāḥ nihitāḥ talaiḥ talaiḥ

original: ādau dvau yatra pādau tu bhavetāmakṣare samau /
analyzed: ādau dvau yatra pādau tu bhavetām akṣare samau
sandaṣṭayamakam nāma vijñeyam tat budhaiḥ yathā

original: paśya paśya ramaṇasya me guṇān yena yena vaśagāṃ karoti mām /
analyzed: paśya paśya ramaṇasya me guṇān yena yena vaśa gām karoti mām

original: yena yena hi sameti darśanaṃ tena tena vaśagāṃ karoti mām // BhN_16.77 //
analyzed: yena yena hi sameti darśanam tena tena vaśa gām karoti mām

original: ādau pādasya tu yatra syāt samāveśaḥ samākṣaraḥ /
analyzed: ādau pādasya tu yatra syāt samāveśaḥ sama akṣaraḥ
pāda ādi yamakam nāma tat vijñeyam budhaiḥ yathā

original: viṣṇuḥ sṛjati bhūtāni viṣṇuḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ sṛjati bhūtāni viṣṇuḥ saṃharate prajāḥ
viṣṇuḥ prasūte trailokyam viṣṇuḥ loka adhidaivatam
pādasya antam padam yatra dvis dvis ekam iha ucyate

original: jñeyamāmreḍitaṃ nāma yamakaṃ tatra sūribhiḥ // BhN_16.80 //
analyzed: jñeyam āmreḍitam nāma yamakam tatra sūribhiḥ

original: vijṛmbhitaṃ niḥśvasitaṃ muhurmuhuḥ kathaṃ vidheyaṃ smaraṇaṃ pade pade /
analyzed: vijṛmbhitam niḥśvasitam muhur muhur katham vidheyam smaraṇam pade pade

original: yathā ca te dhyānamidaṃ punaḥ punardhuvaṃgatā te rajanī vinā vinā // BhN_16.81 //
analyzed: yathā ca te dhyānam idam punar punar dhuvaṃgatā te rajanī vinā vinā

original: sarve pādāḥ samā yatra bhavanti niyatākṣarāḥ /
analyzed: sarve pādāḥ samāḥ yatra bhavanti niyata akṣarāḥ
catur vyavasitam nāma tat vijñeyam budhaiḥ yathā
vāraṇānām ayam eva kālaḥ vāraṇānām ayam eva kālaḥ
vāraṇānām ayam eva kālaḥ vāraṇānām ayam eva kālaḥ
nānā rūpaiḥ svaraiḥ yuktam yatra ekam vyañjanam bhavet
tat mālāyamakam nāma vijñeyam paṇḍitaiḥ yathā

original: lalī balī halī mālī khelī mālī salī jalī /
analyzed: lalī balī halī mālī khelī mālī salī jalī

original: khalo balo 'balo mālī musalī tvābhirakṣatu // BhN_16.85 //
analyzed: khalaḥ balaḥ balaḥ mālī musalī tvā abhirakṣatu

original: asau hi rāmā rativigrahapriyā rahaḥpragalbhā ramaṇaṃ manogatam /
analyzed: asau hi rāmā rati vigraha priyā rahaḥ pragalbhā ramaṇam manogatam

original: ratena rātriṃ ramayet pareṇa vā na cedudeṣyattaruṇaḥ paro ripuḥ // BhN_16.86 //
analyzed: ratena rātrim ramayet pareṇa vā na ced udeṣyat taruṇaḥ paraḥ ripuḥ
na puṣkara akṣaḥ kṣataja ukṣita akṣaḥ kṣarat kṣatevyaḥ kṣatajaṃdurīkṣaḥ

original: kṣatairgavākṣairiva saṃvṛtājñaḥ sākṣāt sahasrākṣa ivāvabhāti // BhN_16.87 //
analyzed: kṣataiḥ gavākṣaiḥ iva saṃvṛta ājñaḥ sākṣāt sahasrākṣaḥ iva avabhāti
ebhiḥ artha kriyā apekṣaiḥ kāryam kāvyam tu lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kāvye doṣān guṇāṃstathā // BhN_16.88 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi kāvye doṣān guṇān tathā
gūḍha artham arthāntaram artha hīnam bhinna artham eka artham abhipluta artham

original: nyāyāvapetaṃ viṣamaṃ visandhi śabdacyutaṃ vai daśa kāvyadoṣāḥ // BhN_16.89 //
analyzed: nyāya avapetam viṣamam visandhi śabda cyutam vai daśa kāvya doṣāḥ
paryāya śabda abhihatam gūḍha artham abhisaṃjñitam
a varṇyam varṇyate yatra tat artha antaram iṣyate
artha hīnam tu asambaddham sa avaśeṣa artham eva ca
bhinna artham abhivijñeyam asabhyam grāmyam eva ca
vivakṣitaḥ nyaḥ eva arthaḥ yatra anya arthena bhidyate

original: bhinnārthaṃ tadapi prāhuḥ kāvyaṃ kāvyavicakṣaṇāḥ // BhN_16.92 //
analyzed: bhinna artham tat api prāhuḥ kāvyam kāvya vicakṣaṇāḥ
a viśeṣa abhidhānam yat tat ekārtham iti smṛtam

original: abhiplutārthaṃ vijñeyaṃ yat padena samasyate // BhN_16.93 //
analyzed: abhipluta artham vijñeyam yat padena samasyate
nyāyāt apetam vijñeyam pramāṇa parivarjitam

original: vṛttabhedo bhavedyatra viṣamaṃ nāma tadbhavet // BhN_16.94 //
analyzed: vṛtta bhedaḥ bhavet yatra viṣamam nāma tat bhavet
an upaśiṣṭa śabdam yat tat visandhi iti kīrtitam
śabda cyutam ca vijñeyam aśabda svara yojanāt
ete doṣāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ sūribhiḥ nāṭaka āśrayāḥ
guṇāḥ viparyayāt eṣām mādhurya audārya lakṣaṇāḥ
śleṣaḥ prasādaḥ samatā samādhiḥ mādhuryam ojaḥ pada saukumāryam

original: arthasya ca vyaktirudāratā ca kāntiśca kāvyasya guṇā daśaite // BhN_16.97 //
analyzed: arthasya ca vyaktiḥ udāra tā ca kāntiḥ ca kāvyasya guṇāḥ daśā ete
īpsitena artha jātena sambaddhānām parasparam

original: śliṣṭatā yā padānāṃ hi śleṣa ityabhidhīyate // BhN_16.98 //
analyzed: śliṣṭa tā yā padānām hi śleṣaḥ iti abhidhīyate
vicāra gahanam yat syāt sphuṭan ca eva svabhāvataḥ

original: svataḥ supratibaddhañca śliṣṭaṃ tat parikīrtyate // BhN_16.99 //
analyzed: svatas su pratibaddham ca śliṣṭam tat parikīrtyate
api anuktaḥ budhaiḥ yatra śabdaḥ rthaḥ vā pratīyate
sukha śabda artha saṃyogāt prasādaḥ parikīrtyate
na ati cūrṇa padaiḥ yuktāḥ na ca vyartha abhidāyibhiḥ

original: durbodhanaiśca na kṛtā samatvāt samatā matā // BhN_16.101 //
analyzed: durbodhanaiḥ ca na kṛtā sama tvāt sama tā matā
anyonya sadṛśāḥ yatra tathā hi anyonya bhūṣaṇāḥ

original: alaṅkārā guṇāścaiva samāḥ syuḥ samatāṃ matāḥ // BhN_16.102 //
analyzed: alaṅkārāḥ guṇāḥ ca eva samāḥ syuḥ sama tām matāḥ
abhiyuktaiḥ viśeṣaḥ tu yaḥ rthasya iha upalakṣyate

original: tena cārthena sampannaḥ samādhiḥ parikīrtyate // BhN_16.103 //
analyzed: tena ca arthena sampannaḥ samādhiḥ parikīrtyate
upamāsu iha dṛṣṭānām arthānām yatnataḥ tathā
prāptānām ca ati saṃkṣepāt samādhiḥ nirṇayaḥ yatas

original: bahuśo yacchrutaṃ vākyamuktaṃ vāpi punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: bahuśas yat śrutam vākyam uktam vā api punar punar
na udvejayati yasmāt hi tat mādhuryam iti smṛtam
samāsavadbhiḥ vividhaiḥ vicitraiḥ ca padaiḥ yutam
sa anusvāraiḥ udāraiḥ ca tat ojaḥ parikīrtyate
avagītaḥ pi hīnaḥ pi syāt udātta avabhāsakaḥ
yatra śabda artha sampattiḥ tat ojaḥ parikīrtitam
sukha prayojyaiḥ yat śabdaiḥ yuktam su śliṣṭa sandhibhiḥ
su kumāra artha saṃyuktam saukumāryam tat ucyate
su prasiddha abhidhānā tu loka karma vyavasthitā

original: yā kriyā kriyate kāvye sārthavyaktiḥ pratīyate // BhN_16.109 //
analyzed: yā kriyā kriyate kāvye sā artha vyaktiḥ pratīyate
yasya artha anupraveśena manasā parikalpyate
anantaram prayogaḥ tu sārtha vyaktiḥ udāhṛtā
divya bhāva parītam yat śṛṅgāra adbhuta yojitam
aneka bhāva saṃyuktam udāra tvam prakīrtitam
aneka artha viśeṣaiḥ yat sūktaiḥ sauṣṭhava saṃyutaiḥ
upetam ati citra arthaiḥ udāttam tat ca kīrtyate
yat manaḥ śrotra viṣayam āhlādayati hi indu vat

original: līlādyarthopapannāṃ vā tāṃ kāntiṃ kavayo viduḥ // BhN_16.113 //
analyzed: līlā ādi artha upapannām vā tām kāntim kavayaḥ viduḥ
yaḥ manaḥ śrotra viṣayaḥ prasāda janakaḥ bhavet

original: śabdabandhaḥ prayogeṇa sa kānta iti bhaṇyate // BhN_16.114 //
analyzed: śabdabandhaḥ prayogeṇa sa kāntaḥ iti bhaṇyate
evam ete hi alaṅkārāḥ guṇāḥ doṣāḥ ca kīrtitāḥ
prayogam eṣām ca punar vakṣyāmi rasa saṃśrayam
laghu akṣara prāya kṛtam upamā rūpaka āśrayam

original: kāvyaṃ kāryaṃ tu nāṭyajñaiḥ vīraraudrādbhutāśrayam // BhN_16.116 //
analyzed: kāvyam kāryam tu nāṭya jñaiḥ vīra raudra adbhuta āśrayam
guru akṣara prāya kṛtam bībhatse karuṇe tathā
kadācid raudra vīrābhyām yadā āgharṣaṇa jam bhavet
rūpa dīpaka saṃyuktam āryā vṛtta samāśrayam

original: śṛṅgāre ca rase vīre kāvyaṃ syānnāṭakāśrayam // BhN_16.118 //
analyzed: śṛṅgāre ca rase vīre kāvyam syāt nāṭaka āśrayam
uttara uttara saṃyuktam vīre kāvyam tu yat bhavet

original: jagatyatijagatyāṃ vā saṃkṛtyāṃ vāpi tadbhavet // BhN_16.119 //
analyzed: jagatī atijagatyām vā saṃkṛtyām vā api tat bhavet
tathā eva yuddha sampheṭau utkṛtyām saṃprakīrtitau
karuṇe śakvarī jñeyā tathā evā atidhṛtiḥ bhavet
yat vīre kīrtitam chandaḥ tat raudre pi prayojayet
śeṣāṇām artha yogena chandaḥ kāryaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
yat chandaḥ pūrvam uddiṣṭam viṣama ardha same samam
udāra madhuraiḥ śabdaiḥ tat kāryam tu rasa anugam

original: śabdānudāramadhurān pramadābhidheyān nāṭyāśrayeṣu kṛtiṣu prayayeta kartum /
analyzed: śabdān udāra madhurān pramadā abhidheyān nāṭya āśrayeṣu kṛtiṣu prayayeta kartum

original: tairbhūṣitā bahu vibhānti hi kāvyabandhāḥ padmākarā vikasitā iva rājahaṃsaiḥ // BhN_16.123 //
analyzed: taiḥ bhūṣitāḥ bahu vibhānti hi kāvya bandhāḥ padma ākarāḥ vikasitāḥ iva rājahaṃsaiḥ
trividham hi akṣaram kāryam kavibhiḥ nāṭaka āśrayam
hrasvam dīrgham plutam ca eva rasa bhāva vibhāvakam
eka mātram bhavet hrasvam dvi mātram dīrgham iṣyate

original: plutaṃ caiva trimātraṃ syādakṣaraṃ svarayojanāt // BhN_16.125 //
analyzed: plutam ca eva tri mātram syāt akṣaram svara yojanāt

original: smṛte cāsūyite caiva tathā ca paridevite /
analyzed: smṛte ca asūyite ca eva tathā ca paridevite
paṭhatām brāhmaṇānām ca plutam akṣaram iṣyate
akāraḥ tu smṛte kāryam ūkāraḥ ca api

original: paridevite tu hākāra Oṃkāro 'dhyayane tathā // BhN_16.127 //
analyzed: paridevite tu hākāraḥ oṃkāraḥ dhyayane tathā
hrasva dīrgha plutāni iha yathābhāvam yathārasam
kāvya yogeṣu sarveṣu hi akṣarāṇi prayojayet

original: cekrīḍitaprabhṛtibhirvikṛtaistu śabdaiḥ yuktā na bhānti lalitā bharataprayogāḥ /
analyzed: cekrīḍita prabhṛtibhiḥ vikṛtaiḥ tu śabdaiḥ yuktāḥ na bhānti lalitāḥ bharata prayogāḥ

original: yajñakriyeva rurucarmadhuraiḥ kṛtāktaiḥ veśyā dvijairiva kamaṇḍaludaṇḍahastaiḥ // BhN_16.129 //
analyzed: yajña kriyā iva ruru carma dhuraiḥ kṛta aktaiḥ veśyā dvijaiḥ iva kamaṇḍalu daṇḍa hastaiḥ
mṛdu lalita padārtham gūḍha śabda artha hīnam budha jana sukha bhogyam yuktimat nṛtta yogyam

original: bahurasakṛtamārgaṃ sandhisandhānayuktaṃ bhavati jagati yogyaṃ nāṭakaṃ prekṣakāṇām // BhN_16.130 //
analyzed: bahu rasa kṛta mārgam sandhi sandhāna yuktam bhavati jagati yogyam nāṭakam prekṣakāṇām
anubandhaḥ
bhūṣaṇa akṣara saṅghātau śobhā udāharaṇe tathā
hetu saṃśaya dṛṣṭāntāḥ prāpta abhiprāyaḥ eva ca
nidarśanam niruktam ca siddhiḥ ca atha viśeṣaṇam
guṇa atipāta atiśayau tulya tarkaḥ pada uccayaḥ
dṛṣṭam ca eva upadiṣṭam ca vicāraḥ tad viparyayaḥ

original: bhraṃśaścānunayo mālā dākṣiṇyaṃ garhaṇaṃ tathā // BhN_16.133 //
analyzed: bhraṃśaḥ ca anunayaḥ mālā dākṣiṇyam garhaṇam tathā
arthāpattiḥ prasiddhiḥ ca pṛcchā sārūpyam eva ca
manorathaḥ ca leśaḥ ca guṇa kīrtanam
jñeyāni anukta siddhiḥ ca priyam vacanam eva ca
ṣaṭtriṃśat lakṣaṇāni eva kāvya bandheṣu nirdiśet
alaṅkāraiḥ guṇaiḥ ca eva bahubhiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
bhūṣaṇaiḥ iva citra arthaiḥ tat bhūṣaṇam iti smṛtam
yatra alpaiḥ akṣaraiḥ śliṣṭaiḥ vicitram upavarṇyate
tam api akṣara saṅghātam vidyāt lakṣaṇa saṃjñitam
siddhaiḥ arthaiḥ samam kṛtvā hi asiddhaḥ rthaḥ prayujyate

original: yatra śliṣṭā vicitrārthā sā śobhetyabhidhīyate // BhN_16.138 //
analyzed: yatra śliṣṭā vicitra arthā sā śobhā iti abhidhīyate
yatra tulya artha yuktena vākyena abhipradarśanāt
sādhyante nipuṇaiḥ arthāḥ tat udāharaṇam smṛtam
yat prayojana sāmarthyāt vākyam iṣṭa artha sādhakam

original: samāsoktaṃ manogrāhi sa heturiti saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_16.140 //
analyzed: samāsa uktam manogrāhi sa hetuḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
a parijñāta tattva artham vākyam yatra samāpyate

original: anekatvādvicārāṇāṃ sa saṃśaya iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_16.141 //
analyzed: aneka tvāt vicārāṇām sa saṃśayaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
sarva loka manogrāhi yaḥ tu pakṣa artha sādhakaḥ

original: hetornidarśanakṛtaḥ sa dṛṣṭānta iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_16.142 //
analyzed: hetoḥ nidarśana kṛtaḥ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
dṛṣṭvā eva avayavān kāṃścid bhāvaḥ yatra anumīyate
prāptim tām api jānīyāt lakṣaṇam nāṭaka āśrayam
abhūta pūrvaḥ yaḥ pi arthaḥ sādṛśyāt parikalpitaḥ

original: lokasya hṛdayagrāhī so 'bhiprāya iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_16.144 //
analyzed: lokasya hṛdaya grāhī saḥ bhiprāyaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
yatra arthānām prasiddhānām kriyate parikīrtanam
para apekṣā ādi udāsa artham tat nidarśanam ucyate
niravadyasya vākyasya pūrva ukta artha prasiddhaye

original: yaducyate tu vacanaṃ niruktaṃ tadudāhṛtam // BhN_16.146 //
analyzed: yat ucyate tu vacanam niruktam tat udāhṛtam
bahūnām ca pradhānānām nāma yatra abhikīrtyate
abhipreta artha siddhi artham sā siddhiḥ abhidhīyate

original: siddhān bahūn pradhānārthān uktvā yatra prayujyate /
analyzed: siddhān bahūn pradhāna arthān uktvā yatra prayujyate
viśeṣa yuktam vacanam vijñeyam tat viśeṣaṇam
guṇa abhidhānaiḥ vividhaiḥ viparīta artha yojitaiḥ
guṇa atipātaḥ madhuraiḥ niṣṭhura arthaiḥ bhavet atha
bahūn guṇān kīrtayitvā sāmānya jana sambhavān

original: viśeṣaḥ kīrtyate yastu jñeyaḥ so 'tiśayo budhaiḥ // BhN_16.150 //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ kīrtyate yaḥ tu jñeyaḥ saḥ tiśayaḥ budhaiḥ
rūpakaiḥ upasābhiḥ vā tulya arthaiḥ su prayojitaiḥ
apratyakṣa artha saṃsparśaḥ tulya tarkaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: bahūnāṃ ca prayuktānāṃ padānāṃ bahubhiḥ padaiḥ /
analyzed: bahūnām ca prayuktānām padānām bahubhiḥ padaiḥ

original: uccayaḥ sadṛśārtho yaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ padoccayaḥ // BhN_16.152 //
analyzed: uccayaḥ sadṛśa arthaḥ yaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ pada uccayaḥ
yathādeśam yathākālam yathārūpam ca varṇyate

original: yatpratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā dṛṣṭaṃ tadvarṇato 'pi vā // BhN_16.153 //
analyzed: yat pratyakṣam parokṣam vā dṛṣṭam vā
parigṛhya tu śāstra artham yat vākyam abhidhīyate
vidvat manoharam su antam upadiṣṭam tat ucyate
pūrva āśaya samāna arthaiḥ apratyakṣa artha sādhanaiḥ
aneka upādhi saṃyuktaḥ vicāraḥ parikīrtitaḥ
vicārasya anyathā bhāvaḥ tathā dṛṣṭa upadiṣṭayoḥ

original: sandehātkalpyate yastu sa vijñeyo viparyayaḥ // BhN_16.156 //
analyzed: sandehāt kalpyate yaḥ tu sa vijñeyaḥ viparyayaḥ
vācyam artham parityajya dṛṣṭa ādibhiḥ anekadhā

original: anyasminneva patanādiha bhraṃśaḥ sa iṣyate // BhN_16.157 //
analyzed: anyasmin eva patanāt iha bhraṃśaḥ saḥ iṣyate
ubhayoḥ prīti jananaḥ viruddha abhiniviṣṭayoḥ
arthasya sādhakaḥ ca eva vijñeyaḥ nunayaḥ budhaiḥ
īpsita artha prasiddhi artham kīrtyate yatra sūribhiḥ
prayojanāni anekāni sā mālā iti abhisaṃjñitā
hṛṣṭaiḥ prasanna vadanaiḥ yat parasya anuvartanam
kriyate vākya ceṣṭābhiḥ tat dākṣiṇyam iti smṛtam
yatra saṃkīrtayan doṣam guṇam arthena darśayet

original: guṇātipātād doṣādvā garhaṇaṃ nāma tadbhavet // BhN_16.161 //
analyzed: guṇa atipātāt doṣāt vā garhaṇam nāma tat bhavet
artha antarasya kathane yatra anyaḥ rthaḥ pratīyate
vākya mādhurya sampannā sā arthāpattiḥ udāhṛtā
vākyaiḥ sa atiśayaiḥ uktāḥ vākya arthasya prasādhakaiḥ
loka prasiddhaiḥ bahubhiḥ prasiddhiḥ iti kīrtitā
yatra ākāra udbhavaiḥ vākyaiḥ ātmānam athavā param
pṛcchyate ca abhidhatte rtham sā pṛcchā iti abhisaṃjñitā
dṛṣṭa śruta anubhūta artha kathana ādi samudbhavam
sādṛśyam kṣobha jananam sārūpyam iti saṃjñitam
hṛdaya sthasya vākyasya gūḍha arthasya vibhāvakam

original: anyāpadeśaiḥ kathanaṃ manoratha iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_16.166 //
analyzed: anya apadeśaiḥ kathanam manorathaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
yat vākyam vākya kuśalaiḥ upāyena abhidhīyate

original: sadṛśārthābhiniṣpattyāḥ sa leśa iti kīrtitaḥ // BhN_16.167 //
analyzed: sadṛśa artha abhiniṣpattyāḥ sa leśaḥ iti kīrtitaḥ
para doṣaiḥ vicitra arthaiḥ yatra ātmā parikīrtyate

original: adṛṣṭo 'pyanyo 'pi vā kaścit sa tu kṣobha iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_16.168 //
analyzed: vā kaścid sa tu kṣobhaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
loke guṇa atiriktānām guṇānām yatra nāmabhiḥ

original: eko 'pi śabdyate tattu vijñeyaṃ guṇakīrtanam // BhN_16.169 //
analyzed: śabdyate tat tu vijñeyam guṇa kīrtanam
prastāvena eva śeṣaḥ rthaḥ kṛtsnaḥ yatra pratīyate
vacanena vinā anukta siddhiḥ sā parikīrtitā
yat prasannena manasā pūjyam pūjayitum vacaḥ
hṛṣṭa prakāśana artham tu sā priya uktiḥ udāhṛtā
etāni kāvyasya ca lakṣaṇāni ṣaṭtriṃśat uddeśa nidarśanāni

original: prabandhaśobhākaraṇāni tajjñaiḥ samyak prayojyāni rasāyanāni // BhN_16.172 //
analyzed: prabandha śobhā karaṇāni tad jñaiḥ samyak prayojyāni rasāyanāni

original: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre vāgabhinaye kāvyalakṣaṇo nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bharatīye nāṭya śāstre vāgabhinaye kāvyalakṣaṇaḥ nāma ṣoḍaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha aṣṭādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
varttayiṣyāmi aham viprāḥ daśa rūpa vikalpanam

original: nāmataḥ karmataścaiva tathā caiva prayogataḥ // BhN_18.1 //
analyzed: nāmataḥ karmataḥ ca eva tathā ca eva prayogataḥ
nāṭakam sa prakaraṇam aṅkaḥ vyāyogaḥ eva ca

original: bhāṇaḥ samavakāraśca vīthī prahasanaṃ ḍimaḥ // BhN_18.2 //
analyzed: bhāṇaḥ samavakāraḥ ca vīthī prahasanam ḍimaḥ
īhāmṛgaḥ ca vijñeyāḥ daśā ime nāṭya lakṣaṇe
eteṣām lakṣaṇam aham vyākhyāsyāmi anupūrvaśas
sarveṣām eva kāvyānām mātṛkāḥ vṛttayaḥ smṛtāḥ
ābhyaḥ vinisṛtam hi etat daśa rūpam prayogataḥ
jātibhiḥ śrutibhiḥ ca eva svarāḥ grāma tvam āgatāḥ

original: yathā tathā vṛttibhedaiḥ kāvyabandhā bhavanti hi // BhN_18.5 //
analyzed: yathā tathā vṛtti bhedaiḥ kāvyabandhāḥ bhavanti hi

original: grāmau pūrṇasvarau dvau tu yathā vai ṣaḍjamadhyamau /
analyzed: grāmau pūrṇa svarau dvau tu yathā vai ṣaḍja madhyamau
sarva vṛtti viniṣpannau kāvya bandhau tathā tu imau

original: jñeyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ caiva tathā nāṭakameva ca /
analyzed: jñeyam prakaraṇam ca eva tathā nāṭakam eva ca
sarva vṛtti viniṣpannam nānā bandha samāśrayam
vīthī samavakāraḥ ca tathā ihāmṛgaḥ eva ca

original: utsṛṣṭikāṅko vyāyogo bhāṇaḥ prahasanaṃ ḍimaḥ // BhN_18.8 //
analyzed: utsṛṣṭikā aṅkaḥ vyāyogaḥ bhāṇaḥ prahasanam ḍimaḥ
kaiśikī vṛtti hīnāni rūpāṇi etāni kārayet
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi kāvya bandha vikalpanam
prakhyāta vastu viṣayam prakhyāta udātta nāyakam ca eva
rājarṣi vaṃśya caritam tathā eva divya āśraya upetam
nānā vibhūtibhiḥ yutam ṛddhi vilāsa ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ ca eva

original: aṅkapraveśakāḍhyaṃ bhavati hi tannāṭakaṃ nāma // BhN_18.11 //
analyzed: aṅkapraveśaka āḍhyam bhavati hi tat nāṭakam nāma
nṛpatīnām yat caritam nānā rasa bhāva ceṣṭitam bahudhā

original: sukhaduḥkhotpattikṛtaṃ bhavati hi tannāṭakaṃ nāma // BhN_18.12 //
analyzed: sukha duḥkha utpatti kṛtam bhavati hi tat nāṭakam nāma
asya avasthā upetam kāryam prasamīkṣya bindu vistārāt

original: kartavyo 'ṅkaḥ so 'pi tu guṇānvitaṃ nāṭyatattvajñaiḥ // BhN_18.13 //
analyzed: kartavyaḥ ṅkaḥ tu guṇa anvitam nāṭya tattva jñaiḥ

original: aṅka iti rūḍhiśabdo bhāvaiśca rasaiśca rohayatyarthān /
analyzed: aṅke iti rūḍhi śabdaḥ bhāvaiḥ ca rasaiḥ ca rohayati arthān
nānā vidhāna yuktaḥ yasmāt tasmāt bhavet aṅkaḥ
aṅka samāptiḥ kāryā kāvya chedena bīja saṃhāraḥ

original: vastuvyāpī binduḥ kāvyasamuttho 'tra nityaṃ syāt // BhN_18.15 //
analyzed: vastu vyāpī binduḥ nityam syāt

original: yatrārthasya samāptiryatra ca bījasya bhavati saṃhāraḥ /
analyzed: yatra arthasya samāptiḥ yatra ca bījasya bhavati saṃhāraḥ
kiñcid avalagna binduḥ saḥ ṅkaḥ iti sadā avagantavyaḥ
ye nāyakāḥ nigaditāḥ teṣām pratyakṣa carita saṃyogaḥ
nānā avasthā upetaḥ kāryaḥ tu aṅkaḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ tu
nāyaka devī guru jana purohita amātya sārthavāhānām

original: naikarasāntaravihito hyaṅka iti sa veditavyastu // BhN_18.18 //
analyzed: na eka rasa antara vihitaḥ hi aṅkaḥ iti sa veditavyaḥ tu

original: pañcākṣarā daśaparā hyaṅkāḥ syurnāṭake prakaraṇe ca /
analyzed: pañca akṣarāḥ daśa parāḥ hi aṅkāḥ syuḥ nāṭake prakaraṇe ca

original: niṣkrāmaḥ sarveṣāṃ yasminnaṅkaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ // BhN_18.19 //
analyzed: niṣkrāmaḥ sarveṣām yasmin aṅkaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ
krodha prasāda śokāḥ vidrava udvāhau
adbhuta sambhava darśanam aṅke pratyakṣa jāni syuḥ
eka divasa pravṛttaḥ kāryaḥ tu aṅkaḥ rtha bījam adhikṛtya
āvaśyaka kāryāṇām avirodhena prayogeṣu
eka aṅkena kadācid bahūni kāryāṇi yojayet dhīmān
āvaśyaka avirodhena tatra kāvyāni kāryāṇi

original: raṅgaṃ tu ye praviṣṭāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhavati tatra niṣkrāmaḥ /
analyzed: raṅgam tu ye praviṣṭāḥ sarveṣām bhavati tatra niṣkrāmaḥ
bīja artha yukti yuktam kṛtvā kāvyam yathā artha rasam
na bahūni iha kāryāṇi tu eka aṅke viniyojayet

original: āvaśyakānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ virodho hi tathā bhavet // BhN_18.24 //
analyzed: āvaśyakānām kāryāṇām virodhaḥ hi tathā bhavet
jñātvā divasa avasthām kṣaṇa yāma muhūrta lakṣaṇa upetām
vibhajet sarvam aśeṣam pṛthak pṛthak kāvyam aṅkeṣu
divasa avasāna kāryam yadi aṅke na upapadyate sarvam
aṅka chedam kṛtvā praveśakaiḥ tat vidhātavyam
viprakṛṣṭam tu yaḥ deśam gacchet kārya vaśa anugaḥ
aṅka chede saṃkṣepāt nirdiśet tam praveśakaiḥ
sannihita nāyakaḥ ṅkaḥ kartavyaḥ nāṭake prakaraṇe vā
parijana kathā anubandhaḥ praveśakaḥ nāma vijñeyaḥ
prakaraṇa nāṭaka viṣaye pañca ādyāḥ daśa parāḥ bhavanti aṅkāḥ
aṅka antara sandhiṣu ca praveśakāḥ teṣu tāvantaḥ
anayoḥ antara vihitaḥ praveśakaḥ ṛthakriyām samabhivīkṣya
saṃkṣepa arthaḥ sandhiṣu arthānām saṃvidhātavyaḥ
aṅka chedam kṛtvā māsa kṛtam varṣa sañcitam vā api

original: tatsarvaṃ kartavyaṃ varṣādūrdhvaṃ na tu kadācit // BhN_18.31 //
analyzed: tat sarvam kartavyam varṣāt ūrdhvam na tu kadācid
yaḥ kaścid kārya vaśāt gacchati puruṣaḥ prakṛṣṭam adhvānam
tatra api aṅka chedaḥ kartavyaḥ
aṅka antara anusārī saṃkṣepa artham adhikṛtya bindūnām
prakaraṇa nāṭaka viṣaye praveśakaḥ saṃvidhātavyaḥ
na uttama madhyama puruṣaiḥ ācaritaḥ na api udātta vacana kṛtaḥ
prākṛta bhāṣā ācāraḥ prayogam āśritya kartavyaḥ
kāla utthāna gatiḥ asau vyākhyā saṃrambha kārya viṣayāṇām
artha abhidhāna yuktaḥ praveśakaḥ syāt aneka arthaḥ

original: bahvāśrayamapi kāryaṃ praveśakaiḥ saṃkṣipecca sandhiṣu vā /
analyzed: bahu āśrayam api kāryam praveśakaiḥ saṃkṣipet ca sandhiṣu vā
bahu cūrṇa padaiḥ yuktam janayati khedam prayogasya
yatra arthasya samāptiḥ na bhavati aṅke prayoga bāhulyāt
vṛttānta su alpa kathaiḥ praveśakaiḥ saḥ abhidhātavyaḥ
yuddham rājya bhraṃśaḥ maraṇam nagara uparodhanam ca eva

original: pratyakṣāṇi tu nāṅke praveśakaiḥ saṃvidheyāni // BhN_18.38 //
analyzed: pratyakṣāṇi tu na aṅke praveśakaiḥ saṃvidheyāni

original: aṅke praveśake ca prakaraṇamāśritya nāṭake vāpi /
analyzed: aṅke praveśake ca prakaraṇam āśritya nāṭake vā api

original: na vadhaḥ kartavyaḥ syādyo 'bhyudayī nāyakaḥ khyātaḥ // BhN_18.39 //
analyzed: na vadhaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt yaḥ bhyudayī nāyakaḥ khyātaḥ

original: apasaraṇameva kāryaṃ grahaṇaṃ vā sandhireva vā yojyaḥ /
analyzed: apasaraṇam eva kāryam grahaṇam vā sandhiḥ eva vā yojyaḥ
kāvya śleṣaiḥ bahubhiḥ yathārasam nāṭya tattva jñaiḥ

original: na mahājanaparivāraṃ kartavyaṃ nāṭakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vā /
analyzed: na mahā jana parivāram kartavyam nāṭakam prakaraṇam vā

original: ye tatra kāryapuruṣāścatvāraḥ pañca vā te syuḥ // BhN_18.41 //
analyzed: ye tatra kārya puruṣāḥ catvāraḥ pañca vā te syuḥ
kāryam go puccha agram kartavyam kāvya bandham āsādya

original: ye codāttā bhāvāste sarve pṛṣṭhataḥ kāryāḥ // BhN_18.42 //
analyzed: ye ca udāttāḥ bhāvāḥ te sarve pṛṣṭhatas kāryāḥ
sarveṣām kāvyānām nānā rasa bhāva yukti yuktānām

original: nirvahaṇe kartavyo nityaṃ hi raso 'dbhutastajjñaiḥ // BhN_18.43 //
analyzed: nirvahaṇe kartavyaḥ nityam hi rasaḥ dbhutaḥ tajjñaiḥ
nāṭaka lakṣaṇam etat mayā samāsena kīrtitam vidhivat
prakaraṇam atas param aham lakṣaṇa yuktyā pravakṣyāmi

original: yatra kavirātmaśaktyā vastu śarīraṃ ca nāyakaṃ caiva /
analyzed: yatra kaviḥ ātma śaktyā vastu śarīram ca nāyakam ca eva
autpattikam prakurute prakaraṇam iti tat budhaiḥ jñeyam
yat anārṣam atha āhāryam kāvyam prakaroti abhūta guṇa yuktam
utpanna bīja vastu prakaraṇam iti tat api vijñeyam

original: yannāṭake mayoktaṃ vastu śarīraṃ ca vṛttibhedāśca /
analyzed: yat nāṭake mayā uktam vastu śarīram ca vṛtti bhedāḥ ca

original: tatprakaraṇe 'pi yojyaṃ salakṣaṇaṃ sarvasandhiṣu tu // BhN_18.47 //
analyzed: tad prakaraṇe yojyam sa lakṣaṇam sarva sandhiṣu tu
vipra vaṇij ṣacivānām purohita amātya sārthavāhānām

original: caritaṃ yannaikavidhaṃ jñeyaṃ tatprakaraṇaṃ nāma // BhN_18.48 //
analyzed: caritam yat na ekavidham jñeyam tat prakaraṇam nāma
na udātta nāyaka kṛtam na divya caritam na rāja sambhogam
bāhya jana saṃprayuktam tat jñeyam prakaraṇam tad jñaiḥ
dāsa viṭa śreṣṭhi yutam veśa strī upacāra kāraṇa upetam

original: mandakulastrīcaritaṃ kāvyaṃ kāryaṃ prakaraṇe tu // BhN_18.50 //
analyzed: manda kula strī caritam kāvyam kāryam prakaraṇe tu
saciva śreṣṭhi brāhmaṇa purohita amātya sārthavāhānām

original: gṛhavārtā yatra bhavenna tatra veśyāṅganā kāryā // BhN_18.51 //
analyzed: gṛha vārtā yatra bhavet na tatra veśyā aṅganā kāryā

original: yadi veśayuvatiyuktaṃ na kulastrī saṅgamo 'pi syāt /
analyzed: yadi veśa yuvati yuktam na kula strī syāt
atha kula jana prayuktam na veśa yuvatiḥ bhavet tatra
yadi vā kāraṇa yuktyā veśa kula strī kṛta upacāraḥ syāt

original: avikṛtabhāṣācāraṃ tatra tu pāṭhyaṃ prayoktavyam // BhN_18.53 //
analyzed: avikṛta bhāṣā ācāram tatra tu pāṭhyam prayoktavyam
madhyamapuruṣaiḥ nityam yojyaḥ viṣkambhakaḥ tra tattva jñaiḥ
saṃskṛta vacana anugataḥ saṃkṣepa arthaḥ praveśaka vat

original: śuddhaḥ saṃkīrṇo vā dvividho viṣkambhako 'pi kartavyaḥ /
analyzed: śuddhaḥ saṃkīrṇaḥ vā dvividhaḥ kartavyaḥ
madhyama pātraḥ śuddhaḥ saṃkīrṇaḥ nīca madhya kṛtaḥ
aṅka antarāla vihitaḥ praveśakaḥ ṛthakriyām samabhivīkṣya
saṃkṣepāt sandhīnām arthānām ca eva kartavyaḥ
anayoḥ ca bandha yogāt anyaḥ bhedaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ kāryaḥ

original: prakhyātastvitaro vā nāṭakayoge prakaraṇe vā // BhN_18.57 //
analyzed: prakhyātaḥ tu itaraḥ vā nāṭaka yoge prakaraṇe vā
prakaraṇa nāṭaka bhedāt utpādyam vastu nāyakam nṛpatim
antaḥpura saṅgītaka kanyām adhikṛtya kartavyā
strī prāyā catur aṅkā lalita abhinaya ātmikā su vihita aṅgī
bahu nṛtta gīta pāṭhyā rati sambhoga ātmikā ca eva
rāja upacāra yuktā prasādana krodha dambha saṃyuktā
antar bhāva gatā hi eṣā bhāvayoḥ ubhayoḥ yatas

original: ata eva daśaitāni rūpāṇītyuditāni vai // BhN_18.61 //
analyzed: atas eva daśa etāni rūpāṇi iti uditāni vai
prakaraṇa nāṭaka lakṣaṇam uktam viprāḥ mayā samāsena

original: vakṣyāmyataḥ paramahaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yuktyā samavakāram // BhN_18.62 //
analyzed: vakṣyāmi atas param aham lakṣaṇam yuktyā samavakāram
deva asura bīja kṛtaḥ prakhyāta udātta nāyakaḥ ca eva
tryaṅkaḥ tathā trikapaṭaḥ trividravaḥ syāt triśṛṅgāraḥ
dvādaśa nāyaka bahulaḥ hi aṣṭādaśa nāḍikā pramāṇaḥ ca
vakṣyāmi asya aṅka vidhim yāvatyaḥ nāḍikāḥ yatra
aṅkaḥ tu sa prahasanaḥ sa vidravaḥ sa kapaṭaḥ sa vīthīkaḥ
dvādaśa nāḍī vihitaḥ prathamaḥ kāryaḥ kriyā upetaḥ
kāryaḥ tathā dvitīyaḥ samāśritaḥ nāḍikāḥ catasraḥ tu
vastu samāpana vihitaḥ dvi nāḍikaḥ syāt tṛtīyaḥ tu
nāḍī saṃjñā jñeyā mānam kālasya yat muhūrta ardham
tat nāḍikā pramāṇam yathoktam aṅkeṣu saṃyojyam
yā nāḍikā iti saṃjñā kāla vibhāge kriyā abhisaṃpannā

original: kāryā ca sā prayatnādyathā krameṇaiva śāstroktā // BhN_18.68 //
analyzed: kāryā ca sā prayatnāt yathā krameṇa eva śāstra uktā
aṅkaḥ ṅkaḥ tu anya arthaḥ kartavyaḥ kāvya bandham āsādya
artham hi samavakāre hi a pratisambandham icchanti
yuddha jala sambhavaḥ vā vāyu agni gaja indra saṃbhrama kṛtaḥ vā
nagara uparodha jaḥ vā vijñeyaḥ vidravaḥ trividhaḥ
vastu gata krama vihitaḥ deva vaśāt vā para prayuktaḥ vā
sukha duḥkha utpatti kṛtaḥ trividhaḥ kapaṭaḥ vijñeyaḥ
trividhaḥ ca atra vidhi jñaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak kārya vihita arthaḥ

original: śṛṅgāraḥ kartavyo dharme cārthe ca kāme ca // BhN_18.72 //
analyzed: śṛṅgāraḥ kartavyaḥ dharme ca arthe ca kāme ca
yasmin dharma prāpakam ātma hitam bhavati sādhanam bahudhā
vrata niyama tapaḥ yuktaḥ sau dharma śṛṅgāraḥ
arthasya icchā yogāt bahudhā ca eva arthataḥ rtha śṛṅgāraḥ
strī saṃprayoga viṣayeṣu artha arthā vā ratiḥ yatra
kanyā vilobhana kṛtam prāptau strīpuṃsayoḥ tu ramyam vā

original: nibhṛtaṃ sāvegaṃ vā yasya bhavetkāmaśṛṅgāraḥ // BhN_18.75 //
analyzed: nibhṛtam sa āvegam vā yasya bhavet kāma śṛṅgāraḥ
uṣṇih gāyatrī ādīni anyāni ca yāni bandha kuṭilāni
vṛttāni samavakāre kavibhiḥ tāni prayojyāni
evam kāryaḥ tad jñaiḥ nānā rasa saṃśrayaḥ samavakāraḥ
vakṣyāmi atas param aham lakṣaṇam īhāmṛgasya api
divya apuruṣa āśraya kṛtaḥ divya strī kāraṇa upagata yuddhaḥ
su vihita vastu nibaddhaḥ vipratyaya kārakaḥ ca eva
uddhata puruṣa prāyaḥ strī roṣa grathita kāvya bandhaḥ ca
saṃkṣobha vidrava kṛtaḥ saṃpheṭa kṛtaḥ tathā ca eva
īhāmṛgaḥ tu kāryaḥ su samāhita kāvya bandhaḥ ca

original: yadvyāyoge kāryaṃ ye puruṣā vṛttayo rasāścaiva /
analyzed: yat vyāyoge kāryam ye puruṣāḥ vṛttayaḥ rasāḥ ca eva

original: īhāmṛge 'pi te syuḥ kevalamamarastriyā yogaḥ // BhN_18.81 //
analyzed: īhāmṛge pi te syuḥ kevalam amara striyā yogaḥ

original: yatra tu vadhepsitānāṃ vadho hyudagro bhaveddhi puruṣāṇām /
analyzed: yatra tu vadha īpsitānām vadhaḥ hi udagraḥ bhavet hi puruṣāṇām

original: kiñcidvyājaṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ śamayitavyam // BhN_18.82 //
analyzed: kiñcid vyājam kṛtvā teṣām yuddham śamayitavyam
īhāmṛgasya lakṣaṇam uktam viprāḥ samāsa yogena

original: ḍimalakṣaṇaṃ tu bhūyo lakṣaṇayuktyā pravakṣyāmi // BhN_18.83 //
analyzed: ḍima lakṣaṇam tu bhūyas lakṣaṇa yuktyā pravakṣyāmi
prakhyāta vastu viṣayaḥ prakhyāta udātta nāyakaḥ ca eva
ṣaṣ rasa lakṣaṇa yuktaḥ catur aṅkaḥ vai ḍimaḥ kāryaḥ
śṛṅgāra hāsya varjam śeṣaiḥ sarvaiḥ rasaiḥ samāyuktaḥ
dīpta rasa kāvya yoniḥ nānā bhāva upasampannaḥ
nirghāta ulkā pātaiḥ uparāgeṇa indu sūryayoḥ yuktaḥ
yuddha niyuddha ādharṣaṇa saṃpheṭa kṛtaḥ ca kartavyaḥ
māyā indrajāla bahulaḥ bahu pusta utthāna yoga yuktaḥ ca
deva bhujaga indra rākṣasa yakṣa piśāca avakīrṇaḥ ca
ṣoḍaśa nāyaka bahulaḥ sātvatti ārabhaṭī vṛtti sampannaḥ
kāryaḥ ḍimaḥ prayatnāt nānā āśraya bhāva sampannaḥ
ḍima lakṣaṇam iti uktam mayā samāsena lakṣaṇa anugatam

original: vyāyogasya tu lakṣaṇamataḥ paraṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi // BhN_18.89 //
analyzed: vyāyogasya tu lakṣaṇam atas param saṃpravakṣyāmi
vyāyogaḥ tu vidhi jñaiḥ kāryaḥ prakhyāta nāyaka śarīraḥ
alpa strī jana yuktaḥ tu eka aha kṛtaḥ tathā ca eva

original: bahavaśca tatra puruṣā vyāyacchante yathā samavakāre /
analyzed: bahavaḥ ca tatra puruṣāḥ vyāyacchante yathā samavakāre

original: na ca divyanāyakayuktaḥ kāryastvekāṅka evāyam // BhN_18.91 //
analyzed: na ca divya nāyaka yuktaḥ kāryaḥ tu eka aṅkaḥ eva ayam
na ca divya nāyaka kṛtaḥ kāryaḥ rāja ṛṣi nāyaka nibaddhaḥ
yuddha niyuddha āgharṣaṇa saṃgharṣa kṛtaḥ ca kartavyaḥ
evaṃvidhaḥ tu kāryaḥ vyāyogaḥ dīpta kāvya rasa yoniḥ
vakṣyāmi atas param aham lakṣaṇam utsṛṣṭa aṅkasya
prakhyāta vastu viṣayaḥ tu aprakhyātaḥ kadācid eva syāt
divya puruṣaiḥ viyuktaḥ śeṣaiḥ yuktaḥ bhavet puṃbhiḥ
karuṇa rasa prāya kṛtaḥ nivṛtta yuddha udyata prahāraḥ ca
strī paridevita bahulaḥ nirvedita bhāṣitaḥ ca eva
nānā vyākula ceṣṭaḥ sātvattya ārabhaṭi kaiśikī hīnaḥ
kāryaḥ kāvya vidhi jñaiḥ satatam hi utsṛṣṭika aṅkaḥ tu
yat divya nāyaka kṛtam kāvyam saṃgrāma bandha vadha yuktam

original: tadbhārate tu varṣe kartavyaṃ kāvyabandheṣu // BhN_18.97 //
analyzed: tat bhārate tu varṣe kartavyam kāvya bandheṣu
kasmāt bhāratam iṣṭam varṣeṣu anyeṣu deva vihiteṣu

original: hṛdyā sarvā bhūmiḥ śubhagandhā kāñcanī yasmāt // BhN_18.98 //
analyzed: hṛdyā sarvā bhūmiḥ śubha gandhā kāñcanī yasmāt
upavana gamana krīḍāḥ vihāra nārī rati pramodāḥ syuḥ

original: teṣu hi varṣeṣu sadā na tatra duḥkhaṃ na vā śokaḥ // BhN_18.99 //
analyzed: teṣu hi varṣeṣu sadā na tatra duḥkham na vā śokaḥ
ye teṣām adhivāsāḥ purāṇa vādeṣu parvatāḥ proktāḥ
sambhogaḥ teṣu bhavet karma ārambhaḥ bhavet asmin

original: prahasanamapi vijñeyaṃ dvividhaṃ śuddhaṃ tathā saṅkīrṇam /
analyzed: prahasanam api vijñeyam dvividham śuddham tathā saṅkīrṇam
aṅkasya lakṣaṇam idam vyākhyātam aśeṣa yoga mātra gatam
prahasanam atas param sa lakṣaṇam saṃpravakṣyāmi
vakṣyāmi tayoḥ yuktyā pṛthak pṛthak lakṣaṇa viśeṣam
bhagavat tāpasa vipraiḥ anyaiḥ api hāsya vāda sambaddham
kāpuruṣa saṃprayuktam parihāsa ābhāṣaṇa prāyam
avikṛta bhāṣā ācāram viśeṣa bhāva upapanna carita padam

original: niyatagativastuviṣayaṃ śuddhaṃ jñeyaṃ prahasanaṃ tu // BhN_18.104 //
analyzed: niyata gati vastu viṣayam śuddham jñeyam prahasanam tu
veśyā ceṭa napuṃsaka viṭa dhūrtāḥ bandhakī ca yatra syuḥ
a nibhṛta veṣa paricchada ceṣṭita karaṇaiḥ tu saṃkīrṇam
loka upacāra yuktā yā vārtā yaḥ ca dambha saṃyogaḥ
sa prahasane prayojyaḥ dhūrta pravivāda sampannaḥ
vīthi aṅgaiḥ saṃyuktam kartavyam prahasanam yathāyogyam

original: bhāṇasyāpi tu lakṣaṇamataḥ paraṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi // BhN_18.107 //
analyzed: bhāṇasya api tu lakṣaṇam atas param saṃpravakṣyāmi
ātma anubhūta śaṃsī para saṃśraya varṇanā viśeṣaḥ tu
vividha āśrayaḥ hi bhāṇaḥ vijñeyaḥ tu eka hāryaḥ ca
paravacanam ātma saṃstham prativacanaiḥ uttama uttama grathitaiḥ
ākāśapuruṣa kathitaiḥ aṅga vikāraiḥ abhinayaiḥ ca eva
dhūrta viṭa saṃprayojyaḥ nānā avasthā antara ātmakaḥ ca eva

original: ekāṅko bahuceṣṭaḥ satataṃ kāryo budhairbhāṇaḥ // BhN_18.110 //
analyzed: eka aṅkaḥ bahu ceṣṭaḥ satatam kāryaḥ budhaiḥ bhāṇaḥ
bhāṇasya api hi nikhilam lakṣaṇam uktam tathā āgama anugatam

original: vīthyāḥ saṃprati nikhilaṃ kathayāmi yathākramaṃ viprāḥ // BhN_18.111 //
analyzed: vīthyāḥ saṃprati nikhilam kathayāmi yathākramam viprāḥ
sarva rasa lakṣaṇa āḍhyā yuktā hi aṅgaiḥ trayodaśabhiḥ

original: vīthī syādekāṅkā tathaikahāryā dvihāryā vā // BhN_18.112 //
analyzed: vīthī syāt eka aṅkā tathā eka hāryā dvi hāryā vā
adhama uttama madhyābhiḥ yuktā syāt prakṛtibhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ
uddhātyaka avalagita avaspandita nālya sat pralāpāḥ ca
vākkelī atha prapañcaḥ mṛdavādhi bale chalam trigatam
vyāhāraḥ gaṇḍaḥ ca trayodaśa aṅgāni udāhṛtāni asyāḥ
atha vīthī saṃproktā lakṣaṇam eṣām pravakṣyāmi

original: padāni tvagatārthāni ye narāḥ punarādarāt // BhN_18.115 //
analyzed: padāni tu a gata arthāni ye narāḥ punar ādarāt
yojayanti padaiḥ anyaiḥ tat uddhātyakam ucyate
yatra anyasmin samāveśya kāryam anyat prasādhyate
tat ca avalagitam nāma vijñeyam nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ
ākṣipte rthe tu kasmiṇścid śubha aśubha samutthite
kauśalāt ucyate bhavet
hāsyena upagata artha prahelikā nālikā iti vijñeyā
mūrkha jana sannikarṣe hitam api yatra prabhāṣate vidvān

original: na ca gṛhyate 'sya vacanaṃ vijñeyo 'satpralāpo 'sau // BhN_18.119 //
analyzed: na ca gṛhyate vacanam
eka dvi prativacanā vākkelī syāt prayoge smin

original: yadasadbhūtaṃ vacanaṃ saṃstavayuktaṃ dvayoḥ parasparaṃ yattu // BhN_18.120 //
analyzed: yat asat bhūtam vacanam saṃstava yuktam dvayoḥ parasparam yat tu

original: ekasya cārthahetoḥ sa hāsyajananaḥ prapañcaḥ syāt /
analyzed: ekasya ca artha hetoḥ sa hāsya jananaḥ prapañcaḥ syāt
yatkāraṇāt guṇānām doṣīkaraṇam bhavet vivāda kṛtam
doṣa guṇīkaraṇam vā tat mṛdavam nāma vijñeyam
para vacanam ātmanaḥ ca uttara uttara samudbhavam dvayoḥ yatra
anyonya artha viśeṣakam adhibalam iti tat budhaiḥ jñeyam
anya artham eva vākyam chalam abhisandhāna hāsya roṣa karam
śruti sārūpya ādyasmin bahavaḥ rthāḥ yuktibhiḥ niyujyante

original: yaddhāsyamahāsyaṃ vā tattrigataṃ nāma vijñeyam // BhN_18.124 //
analyzed: yat hāsyam ahāsyam vā tat trigatam nāma vijñeyam
pratyakṣa vṛttiḥ uktaḥ vyāhāraḥ hāsya leśa arthaḥ
saṃrambha saṃbhrama yutam vivāda yuktam tathā apavāda kṛtam
bahuvacana ākṣepa kṛtam gaṇḍam pravadanti tattva jñāḥ

original: iti daśarūpavidhānaṃ sarvaṃ proktaṃ mayā hi lakṣaṇataḥ /
analyzed: iti daśa rūpa vidhānam sarvam proktam mayā hi lakṣaṇataḥ

original: punarasya śarīragataṃ sandhividhau lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye // BhN_18.126 //
analyzed: punar asya śarīra gatam sandhi vidhau lakṣaṇam vakṣye
iti bharatīye nāṭya śāstre daśarūpanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha ekonaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
itivṛttam tu nāṭyasya śarīram parikīrtitam
pañcabhiḥ sandhibhiḥ tasya vibhāgaḥ samprakalpitaḥ
itivṛttam dvidhā ca eva budhaḥ tu parikalpayet
ādhikarikam ekam syāt prāsaṅgikam atha aparam
yat kāryam hi phala prāptyā sāmarthyāt parikalpyate
tat ādhikārikam jñeyam anyat prāsaṅgikam viduḥ
kāraṇāt phala yogyasya vṛttam syāt ādhikārikam
tasya upakaraṇa artham tu kīrtyate hi ānuṣaṅgikam
kaveḥ prayatnāt netṝṇām yuktānām viddhi upāśrayāt

original: kalpyate hi phalaprāptiḥ samutkarṣātphalasya ca // BhN_19.5 //
analyzed: kalpyate hi phala prāptiḥ samutkarṣāt phalasya ca
laukikī sukha duḥkha ākhyā yathā avasthā rasa udbhavā
daśadhā manmatha avasthāḥ vyavasthāḥ trividhā matā

original: saṃsāre phalayāge tu vyāpāraḥ kāraṇasya yaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsāre phala yāge tu vyāpāraḥ kāraṇasya yaḥ
tasya ānupūrvyā vijñeyā pañca avasthā prayoktṛbhiḥ
prārambhaḥ ca prayatnaḥ ca tathā prāpteḥ ca saṃbhavaḥ

original: niyatā ca phalaprāptiḥ phalayogaśca pañcamaḥ // BhN_19.8 //
analyzed: niyatā ca phala prāptiḥ phala yogaḥ ca pañcamaḥ
autsukya mātra bandhaḥ tu yat bījasya nibadhyate

original: mahataḥ phalayogasya sa phalārambha iṣyate // BhN_19.9 //
analyzed: mahataḥ phala yogasya sa phala ārambhaḥ iṣyate

original: apaśyataḥ phalaprāptiṃ vyāpāro yaḥ phalaṃ prati /
analyzed: a paśyataḥ phala prāptim vyāpāraḥ yaḥ phalam prati

original: paraṃ cautsukyagamanaṃ sa prayatnaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_19.10 //
analyzed: param ca autsukya gamanam sa prayatnaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
īṣat prāptiḥ yadā kācid phalasya parikalpate
bhāva mātreṇa tu prāhuḥ vidhi jñāḥ prāpti sambhavam

original: niyatāṃ tu phalaprāptiṃ yadā bhāvena paśyati /
analyzed: niyatām tu phala prāptim yadā bhāvena paśyati

original: niyatāṃ tāṃ phalaprāptiṃ saguṇāṃ paricakṣate // BhN_19.12 //
analyzed: niyatām tām phala prāptim sa guṇām paricakṣate
abhipretam samagram ca pratirūpam kriyā phalam
iti vṛtte bhavet yasmin phala yogaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
sarvasya eva hi kāryasya prārabdhasya phala arthibhiḥ
etāḥ tu anukrameṇa eva pañca avasthāḥ bhavanti hi
āsām svabhāva bhinnānām paraspara samāgamāt
vinyāsaḥ eka bhāvena phala hetuḥ prakīrtitaḥ
itivṛttam samākhyātam pratyak eva ādhikārikam

original: tadārambhādi kartavyaṃ phalāntaṃ ca yathā bhavet // BhN_19.16 //
analyzed: tad ārambha ādi kartavyam phala antam ca yathā bhavet

original: pūrṇasandhi ca kartavyaṃ hīnasandhyapi vā punaḥ /
analyzed: pūrṇa sandhi ca kartavyam hīna sandhi api vā punar
niyamāt pūrṇa sandhi syāt hīna sandhi atha kāraṇāt
eka lope caturthasya dvi lope tri caturthayoḥ
dvitīya tri caturthānām tri lope lopaḥ iṣyate
prāsaṅgike parārtha tvāt na hi eṣa niyamaḥ bhavet
yat vṛttam sambhavet tatra tat yojyam avirodhataḥ
iti vṛtte yathā avasthāḥ pañca ārambha ādikāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: arthaprakṛtayaḥ pañca tathā bījādikā api // BhN_19.20 //
analyzed: artha prakṛtayaḥ pañca tathā bīja ādikāḥ api

original: bījaṃ binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryameva ca /
analyzed: bījam binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryam eva ca

original: arthaprakṛtayaḥ pañca jñātvā yojyā yathāvidhi // BhN_19.21 //
analyzed: artha prakṛtayaḥ pañca jñātvā yojyāḥ yathāvidhi
su alpa mātram samutsṛṣṭam bahudhā yat visarpati
phala avasānam yat ca eva bījam tat parikīrtitam
prayojanānām vicchede yat aviccheda kāraṇam
yāvat samāptiḥ bandhasya sa binduḥ parikīrtitaḥ
yad vṛttam tu para artham syāt pradhānasya upakārakam

original: pradhānavacca kalpyeta sā patāketi kīrtitā // BhN_19.24 //
analyzed: pradhāna vat ca kalpyeta sā patākā iti kīrtitā
phalam prakalpyate yasyāḥ parārthāya eva kevalam
anubandha vihīna tvāt prakarī iti vinirdiśet
yadā ādhikārikam vastu samyak prājñaiḥ prayujyate
tad arthaḥ yaḥ samārambhaḥ tat kāryam parikīrtitam

original: eteṣāṃ yasya yenārtho yataśca guṇa iṣyate /
analyzed: eteṣām yasya yena arthaḥ yatas ca guṇaḥ iṣyate

original: tat pradhānaṃ tu kartavyaṃ guṇabhūtānyataḥ param // BhN_19.27 //
analyzed: tat pradhānam tu kartavyam guṇa bhūtāni atas param

original: eko 'neko 'pi vā sandhiḥ patākāyāṃ tu yo bhavet /
analyzed: sandhiḥ patākāyām tu yaḥ bhavet
pradhāna artha anuyāyi tvāt anusandhiḥ prakīrtyate
ā garbhāt ā avimarśāt vā patākā vinivartate
kasmāt yasmāt nibandho syāḥ parārthaḥ parikīrtyate
yatra arthe cintite prayujyate

original: āgantukena bhāvena patākāsthānakaṃ tu tat // BhN_19.30 //
analyzed: āgantukena bhāvena patākā sthānakam tu tat
sahasā eva artha sampattiḥ guṇavatī upakārataḥ
patākāsthānakam idam prathamam parikīrtitam
vacaḥ sa atiśayam kliṣṭam kāvya bandha samāśrayam
patākāsthānakam idam parikīrtitam
artha upakṣepaṇam yatra līnam sa vinayam bhavet
śliṣṭa pratyuttara upetam tṛtīyam idam iṣyate
dvi arthaḥ vacana vinyāsaḥ su śliṣṭaḥ kāvya yojitaḥ
upanyāsa su yuktaḥ ca tat caturtham udāhṛtam
yatra sa atiśayam vākyam artha upakṣepaṇam bhavet

original: vināśidṛṣṭamante ca patākārdhaṃ tu tadbhavet ] // BhN_19.35 //
analyzed: vināśi dṛṣṭam ante ca patākā ardham tu tat bhavet
catuṣpatākā paramam nāṭake kāryayiṣyate

original: pañcabhiḥ sandhibhiryuktaṃ tāṃśca vakṣyāmyataḥ param // BhN_19.36 //
analyzed: pañcabhiḥ sandhibhiḥ yuktam tān ca vakṣyāmi atas param

original: mukhaṃ pratimukhaṃ caiva garbho vimarśa eva ca /
analyzed: mukham pratimukham ca eva garbhaḥ vimarśaḥ eva ca

original: tathā nirvahaṇaṃ ceti nāṭake pañca sandhayaḥ // BhN_19.37 //
analyzed: tathā nirvahaṇam ca iti nāṭake pañca sandhayaḥ
pañcabhiḥ sandhibhiḥ yuktam pradhānam anu kīrtyate
śeṣāḥ pradhāna sandhīnām anugrāhi anusandhayaḥ
yatra bīja samutpattiḥ nānā artha rasa sambhavā
kāvye śarīra anugatā tat mukham parikīrtitam
bījasya udghāṭanam yatra dṛṣṭa naṣṭam iva kvacid

original: mukhanyastasya sarvatra tadvai pratimukhaṃ smṛtam // BhN_19.40 //
analyzed: mukha nyastasya sarvatra tat vai pratimukham smṛtam
udbhedaḥ tasya bījasya prāptiḥ aprāptiḥ eva vā

original: punaścānveṣaṇaṃ yatra sa garbha iti saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_19.41 //
analyzed: punar ca anveṣaṇam yatra sa garbhaḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
garbha nirbhinna bīja arthaḥ vilobhana kṛtaḥ

original: krodhavyasanajo vāpi sa vimarśa iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_19.42 //
analyzed: krodha vyasana jaḥ vā api sa vimarśaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
samānayanam arthānām mukha ādyānām sa bījinām
nānā bhāva uttarāṇām yat bhavet nirvahaṇam tu tat

original: ete tu sandhayo jñeyā nāṭakasya prayoktṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: ete tu sandhayaḥ jñeyāḥ nāṭakasya prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: tathā prakaraṇāsyāpi śeṣāṇāṃ ca nibodhata // BhN_19.44 //
analyzed: tathā prakaraṇā asya api śeṣāṇām ca nibodhata
ḍimaḥ samavakāraḥ ca catur sandhī prakīrtitau

original: na tayoravamarśastu kartavyaḥ kavibhiḥ sadā // BhN_19.45 //
analyzed: na tayoḥ avamarśaḥ tu kartavyaḥ kavibhiḥ sadā
vyāyaḥ gehāmṛgau ca api sadā kāryau tri sandhikau

original: garbhāvamarśau na syātāṃ tayorvṛttiśca kaiśikī // BhN_19.46 //
analyzed: garbhāvamarśau na syātām tayoḥ vṛttiḥ ca kaiśikī

original: dvisandhi tu prahasanaṃ vīthyaṅko bhāṇa eva ca /
analyzed: dvi sandhi tu prahasanam vīthi aṅkaḥ bhāṇaḥ eva ca

original: mukhanirvahane tatra kartavye kavibhiḥ sadā // BhN_19.47 //
analyzed: mukha nirvahane tatra kartavye kavibhiḥ sadā

original: [vīthī caiva hi bhāṇaśca tathā prahasanaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: vīthī ca eva hi bhāṇaḥ ca tathā prahasanam punar
kaiśikī vṛtti hīnāni kāryāṇi kavibhiḥ sadā

original: evaṃ hi sandhayaḥ kāryā daśarūpe prayoktṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: evam hi sandhayaḥ kāryāḥ daśa rūpe prayoktṛbhiḥ
punar eṣām tu sandhīnām aṅga kalpam nibodha data
sandhinām yāni vṛttāni pradeśeṣu anupūrvaśas
sva sampad guṇa yuktāni tāni aṅgāni upadhārayet
iṣṭasya arthasya racanā vṛttāntasya an upakṣayaḥ

original: rāgaprāptiḥ prayogasya guhyānāṃ caiva gūhanam // BhN_19.51 //
analyzed: rāga prāptiḥ prayogasya guhyānām ca eva gūhanam
āścarya vat abhikhyānam prakāśyānām prakāśanam

original: aṅgānāṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ hyetad dṝṣṭaṃ śāstre prayojanam // BhN_19.52 //
analyzed: aṅgānām ṣaḍvidham hi etat dṝṣṭam śāstre prayojanam
aṅga hīnaḥ naraḥ yadvat na eva ārambha kṣamaḥ bhavet

original: aṅgahīnaṃ tathā kāvyaṃ na prayogakṣamaṃ bhavet // BhN_19.53 //
analyzed: aṅga hīnam tathā kāvyam na prayoga kṣamam bhavet
udāttam api tat kāvyam syāt aṅgaiḥ parivarjitam

original: hīnatvāddhi prayogasya na satāṃ rañjayenmanaḥ // BhN_19.54 //
analyzed: hīna tvāt hi prayogasya na satām rañjayet manaḥ
kāvyam yat api hīna artham samyak aṅgaiḥ samanvitam

original: dīptatvāttu prayogasya śobhāmeti na saṃśayaḥ // BhN_19.55 //
analyzed: dīpta tvāt tu prayogasya śobhām eti na saṃśayaḥ
tasmāt sandhi pradeśeṣu yathāyogam yathārasam
kavinā aṅgāni kāryāṇi samyak tāni nibodhata
upakṣepaḥ parikaraḥ parinyāsaḥ vilobhanam

original: yuktiḥ prāptiḥ samādhānaṃ vidhānaṃ paribhāvanā // BhN_19.57 //
analyzed: yuktiḥ prāptiḥ samādhānam vidhānam paribhāvanā

original: udbhedaḥ karaṇaṃ bheda etānyaṅgāni vai mukhe /
analyzed: udbhedaḥ karaṇam bhedaḥ etāni aṅgāni vai mukhe

original: tathā pratimukhe caiva śṛṇutāṅgāni nāmataḥ // BhN_19.58 //
analyzed: tathā pratimukhe ca eva śṛṇuta aṅgāni nāmataḥ
vilāsaḥ parisarpaḥ ca vidhūtam tāpanam tathā

original: narma narmadyutiścaiva tathā pragayaṇaṃ punaḥ // BhN_19.59 //
analyzed: narma narmadyutiḥ ca eva tathā pragayaṇam punar
nirodhaḥ ca eva vijñeyaḥ paryupāsanam eva ca

original: puṣpaṃ vajramupanyāso varṇasaṃhāra eva ca // BhN_19.60 //
analyzed: puṣpam vajram upanyāsaḥ varṇa saṃhāraḥ eva ca
etāni vai pratimukhe garbhe ṅgāni nibodhata
a bhūta āharaṇam mārgaḥ rūpa udāharaṇe kramaḥ
saṃgrahaḥ ca anumānam ca prārthanā ākṣiptam eva ca
toṭaka ādhi bale ca eva hi udvegaḥ vidravaḥ tathā
etāni aṅgāni vai garbhe hi avamarśe nibodhata

original: apavādaśca saṃpheṭo vidravaḥ śaktireva ca // BhN_19.63 //
analyzed: apavādaḥ ca saṃpheṭaḥ vidravaḥ śaktiḥ eva ca
vyavasāyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ ca dyutiḥ khedaḥ niṣedhanam
virodhanam atha ādānam chādanam ca prarocanā
vyavahāraḥ ca yuktiḥ ca vimarśa aṅgāni amūni ca
sandhiḥ nirodhaḥ grathanam nirṇayaḥ paribhāṣaṇam
dyutiḥ prasādaḥ ānandaḥ samayaḥ hi upagūhanam

original: bhāṣaṇaṃ pūrvavākyaṃ ca kāvyasaṃhāra eva ca // BhN_19.66 //
analyzed: bhāṣaṇam pūrva vākyam ca kāvya saṃhāraḥ eva ca
praśastiḥ iti saṃhāre jñeyāni aṅgāni nāmataḥ
budhaiḥ jñeyāni etāni aṅgāni sandhiṣu
sampādana artham bījasya samyak siddhi karāṇi ca
kāryāṇi etāni kavibhiḥ vibhajya arthāni nāṭake
punar eṣām pravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni yathākramam
kāvya arthasya samutpattiḥ upakṣepaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
yat utpanna artha bāhulyam jñeyaḥ parikaraḥ tu saḥ

original: tanniṣpattiḥ parinyāso vijñeyaḥ kavibhiḥ sadā // BhN_19.70 //
analyzed: tad niṣpattiḥ parinyāsaḥ vijñeyaḥ kavibhiḥ sadā
guṇa nirvarṇanam ca eva vilobhanam iti smṛtam
sampradhāraṇam arthānām yuktiḥ iti abhidhīyate
sukha arthasya abhigamanam prāptiḥ iti abhisaṃjñitā
bīja arthasya upagamanam samādhānam iti smṛtam
sukha duḥkha kṛtaḥ yaḥ rthaḥ tat vidhānam iti smṛtam
kutūhala uttara āvegaḥ vijñeyā paribhāvanā

original: bījārthasya praroho yaḥ sa udbheda iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: bīja arthasya prarohaḥ yaḥ saḥ udbhedaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
prakṛta artha samārambhaḥ karaṇam nāma tat bhavet

original: saṃghātabhedanārtho yaḥ sa bheda iti kīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: saṃghāta bhedana arthaḥ yaḥ sa bhedaḥ iti kīrtitaḥ

original: [etāni tu mukhāṅgāni vakṣye pratimukhe punaḥ] // BhN_19.75 //
analyzed: etāni tu mukha aṅgāni vakṣye pratimukhe punar
samīhā rati bhoga arthā vilāsaḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
dṛṣṭa naṣṭa anusaraṇam parisarpaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
kṛtasya anunayasya ādau vidhūtam hi aparigrahaḥ

original: apāyadarśanaṃ yattu tāpanaṃ nāma tadbhaveet // BhN_19.77 //
analyzed: apāya darśanam yat tu tāpanam nāma tat bhavet

original: krīḍārthaṃ vihitaṃ yattu hāsyaṃ narmeti tatsmṛtam
analyzed: krīḍā artham vihitam yat tu hāsyam narma iti tat smṛtam

original: doṣapracchādanārthaṃ tu hāsyaṃ narmadyutiḥ smṛtā // BhN_19.78 //
analyzed: doṣa pracchādana artham tu hāsyam narma dyutiḥ smṛtā
uttara uttara vākyam tu bhavet pragayaṇam punar

original: yā tu vyasanasaṃprāptiḥ sa nirodhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_19.79 //
analyzed: yā tu vyasana saṃprāptiḥ sa nirodhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
kruddhasi anunayaḥ yaḥ tu bhavet tat paryupāsanam
viśeṣa vacanam yat tu tat puṣpam iti saṃjñitam
pratyakṣa rūkṣam yat vākyam vajram tat abhidhīyate

original: upapattikṛto yo 'rtha upanyāsaśca sa smṛtaḥ // BhN_19.81 //
analyzed: upapatti kṛtaḥ yaḥ rthaḥ upanyāsaḥ ca sa smṛtaḥ
cāturvarṇya upagamanam varṇa saṃhāraḥ iṣyate
kapaṭa apāśrayam vākyam abhūta āharaṇam viduḥ
tattva artha vacanam ca eva mārgaḥ iti abhidhīyate
citra artha samavāye tu vitarkaḥ rūpam iṣyate
yat sa atiśayavat vākyam tat udāharaṇam smṛtam
bhāva tattva upalabdhiḥ tu kramaḥ iti abhidhīyate
sāma dāna ādi saṃpannaḥ saṃgrahaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
rūpa anurūpa gamanam anumānam iti smṛtam
rati harṣa utsavānām tu prārthanā prārthanā bhavet
garbhasya udbhedanam yat sā ākṣiptiḥ iti abhidhīyate
saṃrambha vacanam ca eva toṭakam tu iti saṃjñitam
kapaṭena atisaṃdhānam bruvate dhi balam budhāḥ
bhayam nṛpa ari dasyu uttham udvegaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
śaṅkā bhaya trāsa kṛtaḥ vidrayaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ
doṣa prakhyāpanam yat tu saḥ upavādaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
roṣa grathita vākyam tu saṃpheṭaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
guru vyatikramaḥ yaḥ tu sa dravaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: virodhipraśamo yaśca sa śaktiḥ parikīrtitā // BhN_19.90 //
analyzed: virodhi praśamaḥ yaḥ ca sa śaktiḥ parikīrtitā
vyavasāyaḥ ca vijñeyaḥ pratijñā hetu saṃbhavaḥ
prasaṅgaḥ ca eva vijñeyaḥ gurūṇā parikīrtanam
vākyam ādharṣa saṃyuktam dyutiḥ tad jñaiḥ udāhṛtā
manaḥ ceṣṭā viniṣpannaḥ śramaḥ khedaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
īpsita artha pratīghātaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
kārya atyaya upagamanam virodhanam iti smṛtam
bīja kārya upagamanam ātānam iti saṃjñitam

original: apamānakṛtaṃ vākyaṃ kāryārthaṃ cchādanaṃ bhavet // BhN_19.94 //
analyzed: apamāna kṛtam vākyam kārya artham chādanam bhavet
prarocanā sa vijñeyā saṃhāra artha pradarśinī

original: [pratyakṣavacanaṃ yattu sa vyāhāra iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_19.95 //
analyzed: pratyakṣa vacanam yat tu sa vyāhāraḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: savicchedaṃ vaco yatra sā yuktiriti saṃjñitā /
analyzed: sa vicchedam vacaḥ yatra sā yuktiḥ iti saṃjñitā
jñeyā vicalanā tad jñaiḥ avamāna artha saṃyuta
etāni avamṛśe ṅgāni saṃhāre tu nibodhata
mukha bīja upagamanam sandhiḥ iti abhidhīyate
kāryasya anveṣaṇam yuktyā nirodhaḥ iti kīrtitaḥ
upakṣepaḥ tu kāryāṇām grathanam parikīrtitam
anubhūta artha kathanam nirṇayaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ
parivāda kṛtam yasyāt tat āhuḥ paribhāṣaṇam
labdhasya arthasya śamanam dyutim ācakṣate punar
samāgamaḥ tathā arthānām ānandaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
duḥkhasya apagamaḥ yaḥ tu samayaḥ sa nigadyate
śuśrūṣā ādi upasaṃpannaḥ prasādaḥ prītiḥ ucyate
adbhutasya tu saṃprāpti rūpa gūhanam iṣyate
sāma dāna ādi saṃpannam bhāṣaṇam samudāhṛtam
pūrva vākyam tu vijñeyam yathā ukta artha pradarśanam
vara pradāna saṃprāptiḥ kāvya saṃhāraḥ iṣyate
nṛpa deśa praśāntiḥ ca praśastiḥ abhidhīyate
yathāsandhi tu kartavyāni etāni aṅgāni nāṭake
kavibhiḥ kāvya kuśalaiḥ rasa bhāvam apekṣya tu

original: saṃmiśrāṇi kadācittu dvitriyogena vā punaḥ // BhN_19.105 //
analyzed: saṃmiśrāṇi kadācid tu dvi tri yogena vā punar
jñātvā kāryam avasthām ca kāryāṇi aṅgāni sandhiṣu
eteṣām eva ca aṅgānām saṃbaddhāni artha yuktitaḥ
sandhi antarāṇi sandhīnām viśeṣāḥ tu ekaviṃśatiḥ

original: sāmabhedastathā daṇḍaḥ pradānaṃ vadha eva ca // BhN_19.107 //
analyzed: sāma bhedaḥ tathā daṇḍaḥ pradānam vadhaḥ eva ca
pratyutpanna mati tvam ca gotra skhalitam eva ca

original: sāhasaṃ ca bhayaṃ caiva hrīrmāyā krodha eva ca // BhN_19.108 //
analyzed: sāhasam ca bhayam ca eva hrīḥ māyā krodhaḥ eva ca
ojaḥ saṃvaraṇam bhrāntiḥ tathā hetu apadhāraṇam

original: dūto lekhastathā svapnaścitraṃ mada iti smṛtam // BhN_19.109 //
analyzed: dūtaḥ lekhaḥ tathā svapnaḥ citram madaḥ iti smṛtam
viṣkambha cūlikā ca eva ca eva praveśakaḥ
aṅkāvatāraḥ ṅkamukham artha upakṣepa pañcakam
madhyama puruṣa niyojyaḥ nāṭaka mukha sandhi mātra saṃcāraḥ
viṣkambhakaḥ tu kāryaḥ purohita amātya kañcukibhiḥ

original: śuddhaḥ saṃkīrṇo vā dvividho viṣkaṃbhakastu vijñeyaḥ /
analyzed: śuddhaḥ saṃkīrṇaḥ vā dvividhaḥ viṣkaṃbhakaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ
madhyama pātraiḥ śuddhaḥ saṃkīrṇaḥ nīca madhya kṛtaḥ
antar yavanikā saṃsthaiḥ sūta ādibhiḥ anekadhā

original: arthopakṣepaṇaṃ yattu kriyate sā hi cūlikā // BhN_19.113 //
analyzed: artha upakṣepaṇam yat tu kriyate sā hi cūlikā
aṅka antara anusārī saṃkṣepa artham adhikṛtya bindūnām
prakaraṇa nāṭaka viṣaye praveśakaḥ nāma vijñeyaḥ

original: aṅkānta eva cāṅko nipatati yasmin prayogamāsādya /
analyzed: aṅka ante eva ca aṅkaḥ nipatati yasmin prayogam āsādya
bīja artha yukti yuktaḥ jñeyaḥ sau
viṣliṣṭa mukham aṅkasya striyā vā puruṣeṇa vā
yat upakṣipyate pūrvam tat aṅkamukham ucyate
anyāni api lāsya vidhau aṅgāni tu nāṭaka upayogīni
asmāt viniḥsṛtāni tu bhāṇaḥ
bhāṇa ākṛti vat lāsyam vijñeyam tu eka pātra hāryam vā
prakaraṇa vat ūhya kārya a saṃstava yuktam vividha bhāvam
geya padam sthita pāṭhyam āsīnam puṣpa gaṇḍikā

original: pracchedakaṃ trimūḍhaṃ ca saindhavākhyaṃ dvimūḍhakam // BhN_19.119 //

analyzed: uttamottamakam ca evam ukta pratyuktam eva ca
lāsye daśavidham hi etat aṅga nirdeśa lakṣaṇam
āsaneṣu upaviṣṭaiḥ yat tantrī bhāṇḍa upabṛṃhitam
śuṣkam tat geya padam ucyate
yā nṛtyati āsanā nārī geyam priya guṇa anvitam
sa aṅga upāṅga vidhānena tat geya padam ucyate
prākṛtam yat viyuktā tu paṭhet ātta rasam sthitā
bahu cārī samāyuktam pañca pāṇi kalā anugam

original: cañcatpuṭena vā yuktaṃ sthitapāṭhyaṃ vidhīyate] // BhN_19.124 //
analyzed: cañcatpuṭena vā yuktam sthita pāṭhyam vidhīyate
āsīnam āsyate yatra sarva ātodya vivarjitam
a prasārita gātram ca cintā śoka samanvitam

original: nṛttāni vividhāni syurgeyaṃ gāne ca saṃśritan /
analyzed: nṛttāni vividhāni syuḥ geyam gāne ca

original: ceṣṭābhiścāśrayaḥ puṃsā yatra sā puṣpagaṇḍikā // BhN_19.126 //
analyzed: ceṣṭābhiḥ ca āśrayaḥ puṃsā yatra sā puṣpagaṇḍikā
yatra strī nara veṣeṇa lalitam saṃskṛtam paṭhet

original: sakhīnāṃ tu vinodāya sā jñeyā puṣpagaṇḍikā // BhN_19.127 //
analyzed: sakhīnām tu vinodāya sā jñeyā puṣpagaṇḍikā

original: nṛttaṃ tu vividhaṃ yatra gītaṃ cātodyasaṃyutam /
analyzed: nṛttam tu vividham yatra gītam ca ātodya saṃyutam

original: striyaḥ puṃvacca ceṣṭante sā jñeyā puṣpagaṇḍikā] // BhN_19.128 //
analyzed: striyaḥ pum vat ca ceṣṭante sā jñeyā puṣpagaṇḍikā
pracchedakaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ yatra candra ātapa āhatāḥ

original: striyaḥ priyeṣu sajjante hyapi vipriyakāriṣu // BhN_19.129 //
analyzed: striyaḥ priyeṣu sajjante hi api vipriya kāriṣu
aniṣṭhura ślakṣṇa padam sama vṛttaiḥ alaṅkṛtam
nāṭyam puruṣa bhāva āḍhyam trimūḍhakam iti smṛtam
pātram vibhraṣṭa saṃketam su vyakta karaṇa anvitam
prākṛtaiḥ vacanaiḥ yuktam viduḥ saindhavakam budhāḥ
rūpa vādi ādi saṃyuktam pāṭhyena ca vivarjitam

original: nāṭyaṃ hi tattu vijñeyaṃ saindhavaṃ nāṭyakovidaiḥ] // BhN_19.132 //
analyzed: nāṭyam hi tat tu vijñeyam saindhavam nāṭya kovidaiḥ
mukha pratimukha upetam caturaśra pada kramam
śliṣṭa bhāva rasa upetam vaicitrya artham dvi mūḍhake
uttamottamakam vidyāt aneka rasa saṃśrayam
vicitraiḥ lokabandhaiḥ ca helā hāva vicitritam
kopa prasāda janitam sa adhikṣepa pada āśrayam
ukta pratyuktam evam syāt citra gīta artha yojitam
yatra priya ākṛtim dṛṣṭvā vinodayati mānasam
madana anala tapta aṅgī tat citra padam ucyate
dṛṣṭvā svapne priyam yatra madana anala tāpitā
karoti vividhān bhāvān tat vai bhāvikam ucyate
eteṣām lāsya vidhau vijñeyam lakṣaṇam prayoga jñaiḥ
tat iha eva tu yat na uktam prasaṅga vinivṛtta hetoḥ tu
pañca sandhi catur vṛtti catuḥṣaṣṭi aṅga saṃyutam
ṣaṭtriṃśat lakṣaṇa upetam guṇa alaṅkāra bhūṣitam
mahārasam mahā bhogam udātta vacana anvitam
mahāpuruṣa saṃcāram sādhu ācāra jana priyam
su śliṣṭa sandhi saṃyogam su prayogam sukha āśrayam

original: mṛduśabdābhidhānaṃ ca kaviḥ kuryāttu nāṭakam // BhN_19.141 //
analyzed: mṛdu śabda abhidhānam ca kaviḥ kuryāt tu nāṭakam
avasthā yā tu lokasya sukha duḥkha samudbhavā
nānā puruṣa saṃcārā nāṭake sau vidhīyate

original: na tajjñānaṃ na tacchilpaṃ na sā vidyā na sā kalā /
analyzed: na tat jñānam na tat śilpam na sā vidyā na sā kalā

original: na tat karma na vā yogo nāṭye 'simnyanna dṛśyate // BhN_19.143 //
analyzed: na tat karma na vā yogaḥ nāṭye dṛśyate
yaḥ yam svabhāvaḥ lokasya nānā avasthā antara ātmakaḥ
saḥ ṅga ādi abhinayaiḥ yuktaḥ nāṭyam iti abhidhīyate
devatānām ṛṣīnām ca rājñām ca utkṛṣṭa medhasām
pūrva vṛtta anucaritam nāṭakam nāma tat bhavet
yasmāt svabhāvam saṃtyajya sa aṅga upāṅga gati kramaiḥ

original: prayujyate jñāyate ca tasmādvai nāṭakaṃ smṛtam. // BhN_19.146 //
analyzed: prayujyate jñāyate ca tasmāt vai nāṭakam smṛtam
sarva bhāvaiḥ sarva rasaiḥ sarva karma pravṛttibhiḥ
nānā avasthā antara upetam nāṭakam saṃvidhīyate
aneka śilpa jātāni na eka karma kriayāṇi ca
tāni aśeṣāṇi rūpāṇi kartavyāni prayoktṛbhiḥ
loka svabhāvam saṃprekṣya narāṇām ca balābalam

original: saṃbhogaṃ caiva yuktiṃ ca tataḥ kāryaṃ tu nāṭakam // BhN_19.149 //
analyzed: saṃbhogam ca eva yuktim ca tatas kāryam tu nāṭakam
bhaviṣyati yuge prāyas bhaviṣyanti abudhāḥ narāḥ

original: ye cāpi hi bhaviṣyanti te yatnaśrutabuddhayaḥ // BhN_19.150 //
analyzed: ye ca api hi bhaviṣyanti te yatna śruta buddhayaḥ
karma śilpāni śāstrāṇi vicakṣaṇa balāni ca

original: sarvāṇyetāni naśyanti yadā lokaḥ praṇaśyati // BhN_19.151 //
analyzed: sarvāṇi etāni naśyanti yadā lokaḥ praṇaśyati
tat evam loka bhāṣāṇām prasamīkṣya balābalam

original: mṛduśabdaṃ sukhārthaṃ ca kaviḥ kuryāttu nāṭakam // BhN_19.152 //
analyzed: mṛdu śabdam sukha artham ca kaviḥ kuryāt tu nāṭakam
caikrīḍita ādyaiḥ śabdaiḥ tu kāvya bandhāḥ bhavanti ye

original: veśyā iva na te bhānti kamaṇḍaludharairdvijaiḥ // BhN_19.153 //
analyzed: veśyāḥ iva na te bhānti kamaṇḍalu dharaiḥ dvijaiḥ
daśa rūpa vidhānam ca mayā proktam dvijottamāḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vṛttīnāmiha lakṣaṇam // BhN_19.154 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi vṛttīnām iha lakṣaṇam

original: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre sandhinirūpaṇaṃ nāmadhyāya ekonaviṃśaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre sandhinirūpaṇam nāma adhyāyaḥ ekonaviṃśaḥ
atha viṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
samutthānam tu vṛttīnām vyākhyāmi anupūrvaśas

original: yathā vastūdbhavaṃ caiva kāvyānāṃ ca vikalpanam // BhN_20.1 //
analyzed: yathā vastu udbhavam ca eva kāvyānām ca vikalpanam
ekārṇavam jagat kṛtvā bhagavān acyutaḥ yadā

original: śete sma nāgaparyaṅke lokān saṃkṣipya māyayā // BhN_20.2 //
analyzed: śete sma nāga paryaṅke lokān saṃkṣipya māyayā
atha vīrya bala unmatau asurau madhu kaiaṭabhau
tarjayāmāsatuḥ devam tarasā yuddha kāṅkṣayā
nija bāhū bhūtabhāvanam akṣayam
jānubhiḥ muṣṭibhiḥ ca eva yodhayāmāsatuḥ prabhum
bahubhiḥ paruṣaiḥ vākyaiḥ anyonya samabhidravam
nānā adhikṣepa vacanaiḥ kampayantau iva udadhim
tayoḥ nānā prakārāṇi vacāṃsi vadatoḥ tadā
śrutvā tu abhihata manāḥ druhiṇaḥ vākyam abravīt
kim idam bharatī vṛttiḥ vāgbhiḥ eva pravartate
uttara uttara saṃbaddhāḥ nanu imau nidhanam nayaḥ
pitāmaha vacaḥ śrutvā provāca madhusūdanaḥ
kārya hetoḥ mayā brahman bhāratī iyam vinirmitā
vadatām vākya bhūyiṣṭhā bhāratī iyam bhaviṣyati
tasmāt etau nihanmi adyā iti uvāca vacanam hariḥ
śuddhaiḥ avikṛtaiḥ aṅgaiḥ sa aṅgahāraiḥ tathā bhṛśam
yodhayāmāsatuḥ daityau yuddha mārga viśāradau
bhūmi saṃyoga saṃsthānaiḥ padanyāsaiḥ hareḥ tadā
atibhāraḥ bhavat bhūmeḥ bhāratī tatra nirmitā
valgitaiḥ śārṅga dhanuṣaḥ tīvraiḥ dīpta tathaiḥ atha
satva adhikaiḥ asaṃbhrāntaiḥ sāttvatī tatra nirmitā
vicitraiḥ aṅgahāraiḥ tu devaḥ līlā samanvitaiḥ

original: babandha yacchikhāpāśaṃ kaiśikī tatra nirmitā // BhN_20.13 //
analyzed: babandha yat śikhā pāśam kaiśikī tatra nirmitā
saṃrambha āvega bahulaiḥ nānā cārī samutthitaiḥ
niyuddha karaṇaiḥ citraiḥ utpannā ārabhaṭī tatas

original: yāṃ yāṃ devaḥ samācaṣṭe kriyāṃ vṛttiṣu saṃsthitām /
analyzed: yām yām devaḥ samācaṣṭe kriyām vṛttiṣu saṃsthitām
tām tad artha anugaiḥ japyeaiḥ druhiṇaḥ pratyapūjayat
yadā hatau tau asurau hariṇā madhu kaiṭabhau
tatas bravīt padmayoniḥ nārāyaṇam arindamam
aho vicitraiḥ viṣamaiḥ sphuṭaiḥ sa lalitaiḥ api

original: aṅgahāraiḥ kṛtaṃ deva tvayā dānavanāśanam // BhN_20.17 //
analyzed: aṅgahāraiḥ kṛtam deva tvayā dānava nāśanam
tasmāt ayam hi lokasya niyuddha samaya kramaḥ
sarva śastra vimokṣeṣu nyāya saṃjñaḥ bhaviṣyati
nyāya āśritaiḥ aṅgahāraiḥ nyāyāt ca eva samutthitaiḥ
yasmāt yuddhāni vartante tasmāt nyāyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
cārīṣu ca samutpannaḥ nānā cārī samāśrayaḥ

original: nyāyasaṃjñaḥ kṛto hyeṣa druhiṇena mahātmanā // BhN_20.20 //
analyzed: nyāya saṃjñaḥ kṛtaḥ hi eṣa druhiṇena mahātmanā
tatas vedeṣu nikṣiptāḥ druhiṇena mahātmanā
punar iṣu astra jāte ca nānā cārī samākule
punar nāṭya prayogeṣu nānā bhāva samnvitāḥ
vṛtti saṃjñāḥ kṛtāḥ hi etāḥ kāvya bandha samāśrayāḥ
caritaiḥ yasya devasya japyam yat yādṛśam kṛtam
ṛṣibhiḥ tādṛśī kṛtā pāṭhya ādi saṃyutā
mayā kāvya kriaya ahetoḥ prakṣiptāḥ druhiṇa ājñayā
ṛgvedāt bhāratī kṣiptā yajurvedāt ca sāttvatī
kaiśikī sāmavedāt ca śeṣā ca ātharvaṇāt api
yā vāc pradhānā puruṣa prayojyā strī varjitā saṃkṛta pāṭhya yuktā

original: svanāmadheyairbharataiḥ prayuktā sā bhāratī nāma bhavettu vṛttiḥ // BhN_20.26 //
analyzed: sva nāmadheyaiḥ bharataiḥ prayuktā sā bhāratī nāma bhavet tu vṛttiḥ
bhedāḥ tasyāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ catvāraḥ ṅga tvam āgatāḥ

original: prarocanāmukhaṃ caiva vīthī prahasanaṃ tathā // BhN_20.27 //
analyzed: prarocanāmukham ca eva vīthī prahasanam tathā
jayābhyudayinī ca eva maṅgalyā vijayāvahā
sarva pāpa praśamanī pūrvaraṅge prarocanā
upakṣepeṇa kāvyasya hetu yukti samāśrayā

original: siddhenāmantraṇā yā tu vijñeyā sā prarocanā] // BhN_20.29 //
analyzed: siddhena āmantraṇā yā tu vijñeyā sā prarocanā

original: naṭī vidūṣako vāpi pāripārśvika eva vā /
analyzed: naṭī vidūṣakaḥ vā api pāripārśvikaḥ eva vā

original: sūtradhāreṇa sahitāḥ saṃlāpaṃ yattu kurvate // BhN_20.30 //
analyzed: sūtradhāreṇa sahitāḥ saṃlāpam yat tu kurvate
citraiḥ vākyaiḥ sva kārya āra utthaiḥ vītthi aṅgeḥ anyathā api vā

original: āmukhaṃ tattu vijñeyaṃ budhaiḥ prastāvanāpi vā // BhN_20.31 //
analyzed: āmukham tat tu vijñeyam budhaiḥ prastāvanā api vā
lakṣaṇam pūrvam uktam tu vītthyāḥ prahasanasya ca
āmukha aṅgāni atas vakṣye yathāvat anupūrvaśas
uddhātyakaḥ kathoddhātaḥ prayogātiśayaḥ tathā
pravṛttaka avalagite pañcāṅgāni āmukhasya tu
uddhātyaka avalagita lakṣaṇam kathitam mayā
śeṣāṇām lakṣaṇam viprāḥ vyākhyāsyāmi ānupūrvaśas

original: sutradhārasya vākyaṃ vā yatra vākyārthameva vā /
analyzed: sutradhārasya vākyam vā yatra vākya artham eva vā

original: gṛhītāṃ praviśetpātraṃ kathoddhātaḥ sa kīrtitaḥ // BhN_20.35 //
analyzed: gṛhītām praviśet pātram kathoddhātaḥ sa kīrtitaḥ

original: prayoge tu prayogaṃ tu sūtradhāraḥ prayojayet /
analyzed: prayoge tu prayogam tu sūtradhāraḥ prayojayet

original: tataśca praviśetpātraṃ prayogātiśayo hi saḥ // BhN_20.36 //
analyzed: tatas ca praviśet pātram prayoga atiśayaḥ hi saḥ
kāla pravṛttim āśritya varṇanā yā prayujyate
tad āśrayāt ca pātrasya praveśaḥ tat pravṛttakam
eṣām anyatamam śliṣṭam yojayitvā artha yuktibhiḥ
tasmāt aṅga dvayasya api sambhavaḥ na nivāryate
pātra granthaiḥ asaṃbādha prakuryāt āmukham tatas
evam etat budhaiḥ jñeyam āmukham vividha āśrayam

original: lakṣaṇaṃ pūrvamuktaṃ tu vīthyāḥ prahasanasya ca /
analyzed: lakṣaṇam pūrvam uktam tu vīthyāḥ prahasanasya ca
iti aṣṭārdha vikalpā vṛttiḥ iyam bhāratī mayā abhihitā
sāttvatyāḥ tu vidhānam lakṣaṇa yuktyā pravakṣyāmi

original: yā sāttvateneha guṇena yuktā nyāyena vṛttena samanvitā ca /
analyzed: yā sāttvatena iha guṇena yuktā nyāyena vṛttena samanvitā ca

original: harṣotkaṭā saṃhṛtaśokabhāvā sā sāttvatī nāma bhavettu vṛttiḥ // BhN_20.41 //
analyzed: harṣa utkaṭā saṃhṛta śoka bhāvā sā sāttvatī nāma bhavet tu vṛttiḥ
vāc aṅgā abhinayavatī sattva utthāna vacana prakaraṇeṣu
sattva adhikāra yuktā vijñeyā sāttvatī vṛttiḥ
vīra adbhuta raudra rasā nirasta śṛṅgāra karuṇa nirvedā
uddhata puruṣa prāyā paraspara ādharṣaṇa kṛtā ca
utthāpakaḥ ca parivartakaḥ ca sallāpakaḥ ca saṃghātyaḥ
catvāraḥ bhedāḥ vijñeyāḥ nāṭya kovidaiḥ
aham api utthāsyāmi tvam tāvat darśaya ātmanaḥ śaktim
iti saṃgharṣa samutthaḥ tad jñaiḥ utthāpakaḥ jñeyaḥ
utthāna samārabdhān arthān utsṛjya yaḥ ṛtha yoga vaśāt

original: anyānarthān bhajate sa cāpi parivartako jñeyaḥ // BhN_20.46 //
analyzed: anyān arthān bhajate sa ca api parivartakaḥ jñeyaḥ
nirdiṣṭa vastu viṣayaḥ prapañca baddhaḥ tri hāsya saṃyuktaḥ
saṃgharṣa viśeṣa kṛtaḥ trividhaḥ parivartakaḥ jñeyaḥ
sa ādharṣa jaḥ nirādharṣa jaḥ vā rāga vaca saṃyuktaḥ
sa adhikṣepa ālāpaḥ jñeyaḥ sallāpakaḥ saḥ pi
dharma adharma samuttham yatra bhavet rāga doṣa saṃyuktam

original: sādhikṣepaṃ ca vaco jñeyaḥ saṃlāpako nāma] // BhN_20.49 //
analyzed: sa adhikṣepam ca vacaḥ jñeyaḥ saṃlāpakaḥ nāma
mantra artha vākya śaktyā daiva vaśāt ātma doṣa yogāt vā
saṃghāta bheda jananaḥ tad jñaiḥ saṃghātyakaḥ jñeyaḥ
bahuka paṭa saṃśrayāṇām para upaghāta āśaya prayuktānām
kūṭānām saṃghātaḥ vijñeyaḥ kūṭa saṃghātyaḥ
iti aṣṭārdha vikalpā vṛttiḥ iyam sāttvatī mayā abhihitā
kaiśikyāḥ tu atha lakṣaṇam atas param saṃpravakṣyāmi
yā ślakṣṇa naipathya viśeṣa citrā strī saṃyutā yā bahu nṛtta gītā
kāma upabhoga prabhava upacārā tām kaiśikīm vṛttim udāharanti
bahuvadya nṛtta gītā śṛṅgāra abhinaya citra naipathyā

original: mālyālaṅkārayuktā praśastaveṣā ca kāntā ca // BhN_20.54 //
analyzed: mālya alaṅkāra yuktā praśasta veṣā ca kāntā ca
citra pada vākya bandhaiḥ alaṅkṛtāḥ hasita rudita roṣa ādaiḥ
strī puruṣa kāma yuktā vijñeyā kaiśikī vṛttiḥ
narma ca narmasphuñjaḥ narmasphoṭaḥ narmagarbhaḥ ca
kaiśikyāḥ catvāraḥ bhedāḥ hi ete samākhyātāḥ
āsthāpita śṛṅgāram viśuddha karaṇam nivṛtta vīra rasam
hāsya pravacana bahulam narma trividham vijānīyāt
īrṣyā krodha prāyam sa upālambha karaṇa anuviddham ca
ātma upakṣepa kṛtam sa vipralambham smṛtam narma
jñeyaḥ narma sphuñjaḥ hi avasāna bhaya ātmakaḥ ca eva
vividhānām bhavānām lavaiḥ lavaiḥ bhūṣitaḥ bahu viśeṣaiḥ
asamagra ākṣipta rasaḥ narmasphoṭaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ
vijñāna rūpa śobhāḥ dhana ādibhiḥ nāyakaḥ gaṇaiḥ yatra
pracchanām vyavaharte sau
pūrva sthitau vipadyeta nāyakaḥ yatra ca aparaḥ tiṣṭhet
tam api iha narma garbham vidyāt nāṭya prayogeṣu
iti aṣṭa arśa vikalpā vṛttiḥ iyam kaiśikī mayā abhihitā
atas ūrdhvam uddhata rasām arabhaṭim sampravakṣyami
ārabhaṭa prāya guṇā tathā eva bahu kapaṭa vañcana upetā
dambha anṛta vacanavatī tu ārabhaṭī nāma vijñeyā
āvapa atas āplulaṅgitāni chedyāni māyā kṛtam indrajālam

original: citrāṇī yuddhāni ca yatra nityaṃ tāṃ tādṛśīmārabhaṭīṃ vadanti // BhN_20.65 //
analyzed: citrāṇī yuddhāni ca yatra nityam tām tādṛśīm ārabhaṭīm vadanti
śāḍguṇya samārbdhā haṭha atisandhāna vidrava upetā
lābha a lābha artha kṛtā vijñeyā vṛttiḥ ārabhaṭī
saṃkṣiptaka avapatau vastu utthāpanam atha api saṃpheṭaḥ

original: ete hyasyā bhedā lakṣaṇameṣaṃ pravakṣyāmi // BhN_20.67 //
analyzed: ete hi asyāḥ bhedāḥ lakṣaṇam eṣam pravakṣyāmi
anvartha śilpa yuktaḥ bahu pusta utthāna citra nepathyaḥ

original: saṃkṣiptavastu viṣayo jñeyaḥ saṃkṣiptakao nāma // BhN_20.68 //
analyzed: saṃkṣipta vastu viṣayaḥ jñeyaḥ saṃkṣiptakaḥ nāma
bhaya harṣa samutthānam vidrava vinipāta sambhrama ācaraṇam
kṣipra praveśa nirgamam avapātam imam vijānīyāt
sarva rasa samāsa kṛtam
nāṭyam vibhāvyate yat tat vastu utthāpanam jñeyam
saṃrambha saṃprayuktaḥ bahu yuddha kapaṭa nirbhedaḥ
śastra prahara bahulaḥ sampheṭaḥ nāma vijñeyaḥ
evam etāḥ budhaiḥ jñeyāḥ vṛttayaḥ nāṭya saṃśrayā
rasa prayogam āsām ca kīrtyamānam nibodhata
hāsya śṛṅgara bahulā kaiśikī paricakṣitā
sattvatī ca api vijñeyā vīra adbhuta śama āśrayāḥ
raudre bhayānake ca eva vijñeyā ārabhaṭī budhaiḥ

original: bībhatse karuṇe caiva bhāratī saṃprakīrtitā // BhN_20.74 //
analyzed: bībhatse karuṇe ca eva bhāratī saṃprakīrtitā
