na hi eka rasa jam kavyam kiñcid asti prayogataḥ

original: bhāvo vāpi raso vāpi pravṛttirvṛttireva vā // BhN_20.75 //
analyzed: bhāvaḥ vā api rasaḥ vā api pravṛttiḥ vṛttiḥ eva vā
sarveṣām samavetānām yasya rūpam bhavet bahu

original: sa mantavyo rasa sthāyi śeṣāḥ sañcāriṇaḥ smṛtāḥ] // BhN_20.76 //
analyzed: sa mantavyaḥ rasa sthāyi śeṣāḥ sañcāriṇaḥ smṛtāḥ
vṛti ante eśaḥ bhinayaḥ mayā uktaḥ vāc aṅga sattva prabhavaḥ yathāvat

original: āhāryamevābhinayaṃ prayoge vakṣyāmi nepathyakṛtaṃ tu bhūyaḥ // BhN_20.77 //
analyzed: āhāryam evā abhinayam prayoge vakṣyāmi nepathya kṛtam tu bhūyas

original: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre vṛttivikalpanaṃ nāma viṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre vṛttivikalpanam nāma viṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha ekaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
āhārya abhinayam viprāḥ vyākhyāsyāmi anupūrvaśas
ysmāt prayogaḥ sarvaḥ yama āhārya abhinaye sthitaḥ
nānā avasthā prakṛtayaḥ pūrvam naipathya sādhitāḥ
aṅga ādibhiḥ abhivyaktim upagacchanti ayatnataḥ
āhārya abhinayaḥ nāma jñeyaḥ nepathya jaḥ vidhiḥ

original: tatra kāryaḥ prayatnastu nāṭyasya śubhamicchatā // BhN_21.3 //
analyzed: tatra kāryaḥ prayatnaḥ tu nāṭyasya śubham icchatā
tasmin yatnaḥ tu kartavyaḥ naipathye siddhim icchatā
nāṭyasya iha tu alaṅkāraḥ naipathyam yat prakīrtitam

original: caturvidhaṃ tu nepathyaṃ pusto 'laṅkāra eva ca /
analyzed: caturvidham tu nepathyam pustaḥ laṅkāraḥ eva ca

original: tathāṅkaracanā caiva jñeyaṃ sajjīvameva ca // BhN_21.5 //
analyzed: tathā aṅka racanā ca eva jñeyam sat jīvam eva ca
pustaḥ tu trividhaḥ jñeyaḥ nānā rūpa pramāṇataḥ
sandhimaḥ vyājimaḥ ca eva veṣṭimaḥ ca prakīrtitaḥ
kiliñja carma vastra ādyaiḥ yat rūpam kriyate budhaiḥ

original: sandhimo nāma vijñeyaḥ pusto nāṭakasaṃsśrayaḥ // BhN_21.7 //
analyzed: sandhimaḥ nāma vijñeyaḥ pustaḥ nāṭaka saṃsśrayaḥ

original: vyājimo nāma vijñeayo yantreṇa kriyate tu yaḥ /
analyzed: vyājimaḥ nāma vijñeayaḥ yantreṇa kriyate tu yaḥ

original: veṣṭyate caiva yadrupaṃ veṣṭimaḥ sa tu saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_21.8 //
analyzed: veṣṭyate ca eva yat rupam veṣṭimaḥ sa tu saṃjñitaḥ
śaila yāna vimānāni carma varma dhvajāḥ nagāḥ

original: ye kriyante hi nāṭye tu sa pusta iti saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_21.9 //
analyzed: ye kriyante hi nāṭye tu sa pustaḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
alaṅkāraḥ tu vijñeyaḥ mālya ābharaṇa vāsasām
nānāvidhaḥ samāyogaḥ pi aṅga upāṅga vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: veṣṭimaṃ vitataṃ caiva saṃghātyaṃ granthimaṃ tathā /
analyzed: veṣṭimam vitatam ca eva saṃghātyam granthimam tathā

original: prālambitaṃ tathā caiva mālyaṃ pañcavidhaṃ smṛtam // BhN_21.11 //
analyzed: prālambitam tathā ca eva mālyam pañcavidham smṛtam

original: caturvidhaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ nāṭye hyābharaṇaṃ budhaiḥ /
analyzed: caturvidham tu vijñeyam nāṭye hi ābharaṇam budhaiḥ

original: āvedhyaṃ bandhanīyaṃ ca kṣepyamāropyameva ca // BhN_21.12 //
analyzed: āvedhyam bandhanīyam ca kṣepyam āropyam eva ca
āvedhyam kuṇḍala ādi iha yat syāt śravaṇa bhūṣaṇam
āropyam hemasūtra ādi hārāḥ ca vividha āśrayāḥ
śroṇī sūtra aṅgade muktā bandhanīyāni sarvadā
prakṣepya nūpuram vidyāt vastra ābharaṇam eva ca
bhūṣaṇānām vikalpam hi puruṣa strī samāśrayam
pravakṣyāmi deśa jāti samudbhavam
cūḍāmaṇiḥ sa mukuṭaḥ śirasaḥ bhūṣaṇam smṛtam
kuṇḍalam mocakam kīlā karṇa ābharaṇam iṣyate
vetikā aṅguli mudrā ca syāt aṅguli vibhūṣaṇam
valayam ca eva bāhu nālī vibhūṣaṇam
rucakaḥ cūlikā kāryā maṇibandha vibhūṣaṇam
keyūre aṅgade ca eva kūrpara upari bhūṣaṇe
trisaraḥ ca eva hāraḥ ca tathā vakṣaḥ vibhūṣaṇam
vyālamba mauktikaḥ hāraḥ mālā ca eva aṅgabhūṣaṇam
talakam sūtrakam ca eva bhavet kaṭi vibhūṣaṇam
ayam puruṣa niryogaḥ kāryaḥ tu ābharaṇa āśrayaḥ

original: devānāṃ pārthivānāṃ ca punarvakṣyāmi yoṣitām // BhN_21.21 //
analyzed: devānām pārthivānām ca punar vakṣyāmi yoṣitām
śikhā pāśam śikhā vyālam piṇḍī patram tathā eva ca
śirasaḥ bhūṣaṇam ca eva vicitram śīrṣa jolakam

original: kaṇḍakaṃ śikhipatraṃ ca veṇīpucchaḥ sadorakaḥ // BhN_21.23 //
analyzed: kaṇḍakam śikhi patram ca veṇī pucchaḥ sa dorakaḥ
lalāṭa tilakam ca eva nānā śilpa prayojitam
bhrū guccha upari gucchaḥ ca kusuma anukṛtiḥ tathā
karṇikā karṇa valayam tathā syāt patrakarṇikā

original: kuṇḍalaṃ karṇamudrā ca karṇotkīlakameva ca // BhN_21.25 //
analyzed: kuṇḍalam karṇa mudrā ca karṇa utkīlakam eva ca
nānā ratna vicitrāṇi danta patrāṇi ca eva hi
karṇayoḥ bhūṣaṇam hi etat karṇapūraḥ tathā eva ca
tilakāḥ patra lekhāḥ ca bhavet gaṇḍa vibhūṣaṇam
trivaṇī ca eva vijñeyam bhavet vakṣaḥ vibhūṣaṇam
netrayoḥ añjanam jñeyam adharasya ca rañjanam

original: dantānāṃ vividho rāgaścaturṇāṃ śuklatāpi vā // BhN_21.28 //
analyzed: dantānām vividhaḥ rāgaḥ caturṇām śukla tā api vā
rāga antara vikalpaḥ śobhanena adhikaḥ jvalaḥ
mugdhānām sundarīṇām ca muktā bhāsita śobhanāḥ
su raktāḥ syuḥ padma pallava rañjanāḥ
aśma rāga uddyotitaḥ syāt adharaḥ pallava prabhaḥ
vilāsaḥ ca bhavet tāsām sa vibhrānta nirīkṣitam
dvi saraḥ tri saraḥ ca eva catur sarakam eva ca
tathā śṛṅkhalikā ca eva bhavet kaṇṭha vibhūṣaṇam
aṅgadam valayam ca eva bāhumūla vibhūṣaṇam
nānā śilpa kṛtāḥ ca eva hārāḥ vakṣaḥ vibhūṣaṇam
maṇi jāla avanaddham ca bhavet stana vibhūṣaṇam

original: kalāpī kaṭakaṃ śaṅkho hastapatraṃ sapūrakam // BhN_21.35 //
analyzed: kalāpī kaṭakam śaṅkhaḥ hasta patram sa pūrakam
mudrā aṅgulīyakam ca eva hi aṅgulīnām vibhūṣaṇam
muktā jāla āḍhya talakam mekhalā kāñcikā api vā
raśanā ca kalāpaḥ ca bhavet śroṇī vibhūṣaṇam
eka yaṣṭiḥ bhavet kāñcī mekhalā tu aṣṭa yaṣṭikā
dvis aṣṭa yaṣṭi raśanā kalāpaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
dvātriṃśat ca catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ śatam aṣṭa uttaram tathā
muktā hārāḥ bhavanti ete deva pārthiva yoṣitām
nūpuraḥ kiṅkiṇīkāḥ ca ghaṇṭikāḥ ratna jālakam
sa ghoṣe kaṭake ca eva gulpha upari vibhūṣāṇam
jaṅghayoḥ pāda patram syāt aṅgulīṣu aṅgulīyakam
aṅguṣṭha tilakāḥ ca eva pādayoḥ ca vibhūṣaṇam
tathā alaktaka rāgaḥ ca nānā bhakti niveśitaḥ
aśoka palā avacchāyaḥ syāt svābhāvikaḥ eva ca
etat vibhūṣaṇam nāryāḥ ā keśāt ā nakhāt api
yathā bhava rasa avastham vijñeyam dvijasattamāḥ

original: āgamaśca pramāṇaṃ ca rūpanirvarṇanaṃ tathā // BhN_21.43 //
analyzed: āgamaḥ ca pramāṇam ca rūpa nirvarṇanam tathā
viśvakarma matāt kāryam su buddhyā api prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: na hi śakyaṃ suvarṇena muktābhirmaṇibhistathā // BhN_21.44 //
analyzed: na hi śakyam suvarṇena muktābhiḥ maṇibhiḥ tathā
svādhīnam iti rucyā eva kartum aṅgasya bhūṣaṇam
vibhāgataḥ bhi prayuktam aṅga śobhā karam bhavet
yathā sthāna antara gatam bhūṣaṇam ratna saṃyutam

original: na tu nāṭyaprayogeṣu kartavyaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ guru // BhN_21.46 //
analyzed: na tu nāṭya prayogeṣu kartavyam bhūṣaṇam guru
khedam janayate tat hi sa vyāyata viceṣṭanāt

original: gurubhāvāvasannasya svedo mūrchā ca jāyate // BhN_21.47 //
analyzed: guru bhāva avasannasya svedaḥ mūrchā ca jāyate

original: gurvābharaṇasanno hi ceṣṭāṃ na kurute punaḥ /
analyzed: guru ābharaṇa sannaḥ hi ceṣṭām na kurute punar
tasmāt tanu tvaca kṛtam sauvarṇam bhūṣaṇam bhavet
ratna vat jatu baddham vā na kheda jananam bhavet
sva icchayā bhūṣaṇa vidhiḥ divyānām upadiśyate
yatna bhāva viniṣpannam mānuṣāṇām vibhūṣaṇam

original: [veṣṭitaṃ vitataṃ caiva saṃghātyaṃ grathimaṃ tatha // BhN_21.50 //
analyzed: veṣṭitam vitatam ca eva saṃghātyam grathimam tatha

original: lambaśobhi tathā caiva mālyaṃ pañcavidhaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: lamba śobhi tathā ca eva mālyam pañcavidham smṛtam
ācchādanam bahuvidham nānā pattana saṃbhavam

original: tajjñeyaṃ triprakāraṃ tu śuddhaṃ raktaṃ vicitritam] /
analyzed: tat jñeyam tri prakāram tu śuddham raktam vicitritam
divyānām bhūṣaṇa vidhiḥ yaḥ eṣa parikīrtitaḥ
mānuṣāṇām tu kartavyaḥ nānā deśa samāśrayaḥ
bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca api veṣaiḥ ca nānā avasthā samāśrayaiḥ
divya aṅganānām kartavyā vibhaktiḥ sva sva bhūmi jā
vidyādharīṇām yakṣīṇām apsaraḥ nāga yoṣitām
ṛṣi daivata kanyānām veṣaiḥ nānātvam iṣyate
tathā ca siddha gandharva rākṣasa asura yoṣitām
divyānām nara nārīṇām tathā eva ca śikhaṇḍakam
śikhā puṭa śikhaṇḍam tu muktā bhūyiṣṭha bhūṣaṇam
vidyādharīṇām kartavyaḥ śuddhaḥ veṣa paricchadaḥ
psaraḥ ca eva ratna vibhūṣaṇāḥ
samastānām bhavet veṣaḥ yakṣīṇā kevalam śikhā
kartavyam nāga strīṇām vibhūṣaṇam
muktāmaṇi latā prāyāḥ phaṇāḥ tāsām tu kevalāḥ
kāryam tu muni kanyānām eka veṇī dharam śiraḥ
na ca api vibhūṣaṇa vidhiḥ tāsām veṣaḥ vana ucitaḥ
muktā marakata prāyam maṇḍanam siddha yoṣitām
tāsām tu ca eva kartavyam pīta vastra paricchadam
padmarāga maṇi prāyam gandharvīṇām vibhūṣaṇam
vīṇā hastaḥ ca kartavyaḥ kausumbha vasanaḥ tathā
indranīlaiḥ tu kartavyam rākṣasīṇām vibhūṣaṇam
sita daṃṣṭrā ca kartavyā kṛṣṇa vastra paricchadam
vaiḍūrya muktā ābharaṇāḥ kartavyā sura yoṣitām
śuka piñcha nibhaiḥ arvastraiḥ kāryaḥ tāsām paricchadaḥ
puṣyarāgaiḥ tu maṇibhiḥ kvacid vaiḍūrya bhūṣitaiḥ
divya vānara nārīṇām kāryaḥ nīla paricchadaḥ

original: evaṃ śṛṅgāriṇaḥ kāryā veṣā divyāṅganāśrayāḥ // BhN_21.65 //
analyzed: evam śṛṅgāriṇaḥ kāryāḥ veṣāḥ divya aṅganā āśrayāḥ
avasthā antam āsādya śuddhāḥ kāryāḥ punar tathā
mānuṣīṇām tu kartavyāḥ nānā deśa samudbhavāḥ
veṣa ābharaṇa saṃyogān gadataḥ tān nibodhata
āvantya yuvatīnām tu śiraḥ sālaka kuntalam
gauḍīya āmalaka prāyam sa śikhā pāśa veṇikam

original: ābhīrayuvatīnāṃ tu dviveṇīdhara eva tu // BhN_21.68 //
analyzed: ābhīra yuvatīnām tu dvi veṇī dharaḥ eva tu
śiraḥ parigamaḥ kāryaḥ nīla prāyam atha ambaram
tathā samunnaddha śikhaṇḍakam
ā keśa ācchādanam tāsām deśa karmaṇi kīrtitam
tathā eva dakṣiṇa strīṇām kāryam ullekhya saṃśrayam
kumbhībandhaka saṃyuktam tathā āvarta lalāṭikam
gaṇikānām tu kartavyam icchā vicchitti maṇḍanam
deśa jāti vidhānena śeṣāṇām api kārayet

original: veṣaṃ tathā cābharaṇaṃ kṣurakarma paricchadam // BhN_21.72 //
analyzed: veṣam tathā ca ābharaṇam kṣura karma paricchadam
āgamam ca api naipathye nāṭyasya evam prayojayet

original: adeśayukto veṣo hi na śobhāṃ janayiṣyati // BhN_21.73 //
analyzed: adeśa yuktaḥ veṣaḥ hi na śobhām janayiṣyati
mekhalā urasi baddhā tu hāsyam samupapādayet
tathā proṣita kāntāsu vyasana abhihatāsu ca

original: veṣo vai malinaḥ kārya ekaveṇīdharaṃ śiraḥ /
analyzed: veṣaḥ vai malinaḥ kāryaḥ eka veṇī dharam śiraḥ

original: vipralambhe tu nāryāstu śuddho veṣo bhavediha // BhN_21.75 //
analyzed: vipralambhe tu nāryāḥ tu śuddhaḥ veṣaḥ bhavet iha
na ati ābharaṇa saṃyuktaḥ na ca api mṛjayā anvitaḥ
evam strīṇām bhavet veṣaḥ deśa avasthā samudbhavaḥ
puruṣāṇām punar ca eva veṣān vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ
tatra aṅka racanā pūrvam kartavyā nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ
tatas param prayoktavyāḥ veṣāḥ deśa samudbhavāḥ

original: sito nīlaśca pītaśca caturtho rakta eva ca // BhN_21.78 //
analyzed: sitaḥ nīlaḥ ca pītaḥ ca caturthaḥ raktaḥ eva ca

original: ete svabhāvajā varṇā yaiḥ kāryaṃ tvaṅgavartanam /
analyzed: ete svabhāva jāḥ varṇāḥ yaiḥ kāryam tu aṅga vartanam

original: saṃyogajāḥ punaścānye upavarṇā bhavanti hi // BhN_21.79 //
analyzed: saṃyoga jāḥ punar ca anye upavarṇāḥ bhavanti hi
tān aham sampravakṣyāmi yathākāryam prayoktṛbhiḥ
sita nīla samāyoge kāraṇḍavaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
sita pīta sāma āyogāt pāṇḍu varṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
siti a rakta samāyoge padma varṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
pīta nīla samāyogāt haritaḥ nāma jāyate
nīla rakta samāyogāt kaṣāyaḥ nāma jāyate
rakta pīta samāyogāt gaura varṇaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
ete saṃyoga jāḥ varṇāḥ hi upavarṇāḥ tathā apare
tri catur varṇa saṃyuktāḥ bahavaḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ

original: balastho yo bhavedvarṇastasya bhāgo bhavettataḥ // BhN_21.84 //
analyzed: bala sthaḥ yaḥ bhavet varṇaḥ tasya bhāgaḥ bhavet tatas

original: durbalasya ca bhāgau dvau nīlaṃ muktvā pradāpayet /
analyzed: durbalasya ca bhāgau dvau nīlam muktvā pradāpayet
nīlasya ekaḥ bhavet bhāgaḥ catvāraḥ nye tu varṇake
balavān sarva varṇānām nīlaḥ eva prakīrtitaḥ
evam varṇa vidhim jñātvā nānā saṃyoga saṃśrayam
tatas kuryāt yathāyogam aṅgānām vartanam budhaḥ
vartana chādanam rūpam sva veṣa parivarjitam
nāṭya dharma pravṛttam tu jñeyam tat prakṛti sthitam
sva varṇam ātmanaḥ chādyam varṇakaiḥ veṣa saṃśrayaiḥ
ākṛtiḥ tasya kartavyā yasya prakṛtiḥ āsthitā

original: yathā jantuḥ svabhāvaṃ svaṃ parityajyānyadaihikam // BhN_21.89 //
analyzed: yathā jantuḥ svabhāvam svam parityajya anya daihikam
tad svabhāvam hi bhajate deha antaram upāśritaḥ
veṣeṇa varṇakaiḥ ca eva chāditaḥ puruṣaḥ tathā
para bhāvam prakurute yasya veṣam samāśritaḥ
deva dānava gandharva yakṣa rākṣasa pannagāḥ
prāṇi saṃjñāḥ smṛtāḥ hi ete jīva bandhāḥ ca ye pare

original: [strībhāvāḥ parvatāḥ nadyaḥ samudrā vāhanāni ca // BhN_21.92 //
analyzed: strī bhāvāḥ parvatāḥ nadyaḥ samudrāḥ vāhanāni ca
nānā śastrāṇi api tathā vijñeyāḥ prāṇi saṃjñayā
śaila prāsāda yantrāṇi carma varma dhvajāḥ tathā
nānā praharaṇa ādyāḥ ca te prāṇinaḥ iti smṛtāḥ
athavā kāraṇa upetāḥ bhavanti ete śarīriṇaḥ
veṣa bhāṣā āśraya upetāḥ nāṭya dharmam avekṣya tu

original: varṇānāṃ tu vidhiṃ jñātvā vayaḥ prakṛtimeva ca // BhN_21.95 //
analyzed: varṇānām tu vidhim jñātvā vayaḥ prakṛtim eva ca
kuryāt aṅgasya racanām deśa jāti vayaḥ śrita tām
devāḥ gaurāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ yakṣāḥ ca apsaraḥ tathā
rudra arka druhiṇa skandāḥ tapanīya prabhāḥ smṛtāḥ
somaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ śukraḥ varuṇaḥ tārakā gaṇāḥ
samudra himavat gaṅgāḥ śvetāḥ hi syuḥ balaḥ tathā
raktam aṅgārakam vidyāt pītau budha hutāśanau
nārāyaṇaḥ naraḥ ca eva śyāmaḥ nāgaḥ ca vāsukiḥ

original: daityāśca dānavāścaiva rākṣasā guhyakā nagāḥ // BhN_21.99 //
analyzed: daityāḥ ca dānavāḥ ca eva rākṣasāḥ guhyakāḥ nagāḥ
piśācāḥ jalam ākāśam asitāni tu varṇataḥ

original: bhavanti ṣaṭsu dvīpeṣu puruṣaścaiva varṇataḥ // BhN_21.100 //
analyzed: bhavanti ṣaṭsu dvīpeṣu puruṣaḥ ca eva varṇataḥ
kartavyāḥ nāṭya yogena niṣṭapta kanaka prabhāḥ

original: jāmbūdvīpasya varṣe tu nānāvarṇāśrayā narāḥ // BhN_21.101 //
analyzed: jāmbūdvīpasya varṣe tu nānā varṇa āśrayāḥ narāḥ
uttarān tu kuruḥ tyaktvā te ca api kanaka prabhāḥ
bhadrāśva puruṣāḥ śvetāḥ kartavyāḥ varṇataḥ tathā

original: ketumāle narā nīlā gaurāḥ śeṣeṣu kīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: ketumāle narāḥ nīlāḥ gaurāḥ śeṣeṣu kīrtitāḥ

original: nānāvarṇāḥ smṛtā bhūtā gandharvā yakṣapannagāḥ // BhN_21.103 //
analyzed: nānā varṇāḥ smṛtāḥ bhūtāḥ gandharvāḥ yakṣa pannagāḥ
vidyādharāḥ tathā ca eva pitaraḥ tu samāḥ narāḥ
punar ca bhārate varṣe tān tān varṇān nibodhata
rājānaḥ padma varṇāḥ tu gaurāḥ śyāmāḥ tathā eva ca

original: ye cāpi sukhino martyā gaurā kāryāstu vaiḥ budhaiḥ // BhN_21.105 //
analyzed: ye ca api sukhinaḥ martyāḥ gaurā kāryāḥ tu baiḥ budhaiḥ
ku karmiṇaḥ graha grastāḥ vyādhitāḥ tapasi sthitāḥ
āyasta karmiṇaḥ ca eva hi asitāḥ ca ku jātayaḥ
ṛṣyayaḥ ca eva kartavyāḥ nityam tu badara prabhāḥ
tapaḥ sthitāḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ nityām eva asitāḥ budhaiḥ
kāraṇa vyapadeśena tathā ca ātma icchayā punar
varṇaḥ tatra prakartavyaḥ deśa jati vaśa anugaḥ

original: deśaṃ karma ca jātiṃ ca pṛthivyuddeśasaṃśrayam /
analyzed: deśam karma ca jātim ca pṛthivī uddeśa saṃśrayam

original: vijñāya vartanā kāryā puruṣāṇāṃ prayogataḥ // BhN_21.109 //
analyzed: vijñāya vartanā kāryā puruṣāṇām prayogataḥ
kirāta barbara andhrāḥ ca draviḍāḥ kāśi kosalāḥ

original: pulindā dākṣiṇātyāśca prāyeṇa tvasitāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_21.110 //
analyzed: pulindāḥ dākṣiṇātyāḥ ca prāyeṇa tu asitāḥ smṛtāḥ
śakāḥ ca yavanāḥ ca eva pahlavāḥ vāhlikāḥ ca ye

original: prāyeṇa gaurāḥ kartavyā uttarā ye śritā diśam // BhN_21.111 //
analyzed: prāyeṇa gaurāḥ kartavyāḥ uttarāḥ ye śritāḥ diśam
pāñcālāḥ śaurasenāḥ ca māhiṣāḥ ca oḍra māgadhāḥ

original: aṅgā vaṅgāḥ kaliṅgāśca śyāmāḥ kāryāstu varṇataḥ // BhN_21.112 //
analyzed: aṅgāḥ vaṅgāḥ kaliṅgāḥ ca śyāmāḥ kāryāḥ tu varṇataḥ
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ ca eva gaurāḥ kāryāḥ tathā eva hi

original: vaiśyāḥ śūdrāstathā caiva śyāmāḥ kāryāstu varṇataḥ // BhN_21.113 //
analyzed: vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ tathā ca eva śyāmāḥ kāryāḥ tu varṇataḥ
evam kṛtvā yathānyāyam mukha aṅga upāṅga vartanām
śmaśrukarma prayuñjīta deśa kāla vayaḥ nugam

original: śuddhaṃ vicitraṃ śyāmaṃ ca tathā romaśameva ca /
analyzed: śuddham vicitram śyāmam ca tathā romaśam eva ca
bhavet caturvidham śmaśru nānā avasthā antara ātmakam
śuddham tu liṅginām kāryam tathā amātya purodhasām

original: madhyasthā ye ca puruṣā ye ca dīkṣāṃ samāśritāḥ // BhN_21.116 //
analyzed: madhyasthāḥ ye ca puruṣāḥ ye ca dīkṣām samāśritāḥ
divyāḥ ye puruṣāḥ kecid siddha vidyādhara ādayaḥ

original: pārthivāśca kumārāśca ye ca rājopajīvinaḥ // BhN_21.117 //
analyzed: pārthivāḥ ca kumārāḥ ca ye ca rāja upajīvinaḥ
śṛṅgāriṇaḥ ca ye martyāḥ yauvana unmādinaḥ ca ye

original: teṣāṃ vicitraṃ kartavyaṃ śmaśru nāṭyaprayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_21.118 //
analyzed: teṣām vicitram kartavyam śmaśru nāṭya prayoktṛbhiḥ
a nistīrṇa pratijñānām duḥkhitānām tapasvinām

original: vyasanābhihatānāṃ ca śyāmaṃ śmaśru prayojayet // BhN_21.119 //
analyzed: vyasana abhihatānām ca śyāmam śmaśru prayojayet

original: ṛṣīṇāṃ tāpasānāṃ ca ye ca dīrghavratā narāḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām tāpasānām ca ye ca dīrgha vratāḥ narāḥ

original: tathā ca cīrabaddhānāṃ romaśaṃ śmaśru kīrtitam // BhN_21.120 //
analyzed: tathā ca cīra baddhānām romaśam śmaśru kīrtitam

original: evaṃ nānāprakāraṃ tu śmaśru kāryaṃ prayoktṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: evam nānā prakāram tu śmaśru kāryam prayoktṛbhiḥ
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi veṣān nānā prayoga jān
śuddhaḥ vicitraḥ malinaḥ trividhaḥ veṣaḥ ucyate
teṣām niyogam vakṣyāmi yathāvat anupūrvaśas
deva abhigamane ca eva maṅgale niyama sthite
tithi nakṣatra yoge ca vivāha karaṇe tathā

original: dharmapravṛttaṃ yatkarma striyo vā puruṣasya vā /
analyzed: dharma pravṛttam yat karma striyaḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: veṣasteṣāṃ bhavecchuddho ye ca prāyatnikā narāḥ // BhN_21.124 //
analyzed: veṣaḥ teṣām bhavet śuddhaḥ ye ca prāyatnikāḥ narāḥ
deva dānava yakṣāṇām gandharva uraga rakṣasām

original: nṛpāṇāṃ karkaśānāṃ ca citro veṣa udāhṛtaḥ // BhN_21.125 //
analyzed: nṛpāṇām karkaśānām ca citraḥ veṣaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
vṛddhānām brāhmaṇānām ca śreṣṭhi amātya purodhasām

original: vaṇijāṃ kāñcukīyānāṃ tathā caiva tapasvinām // BhN_21.126 //
analyzed: vaṇijām kāñcukīyānām tathā ca eva tapasvinām
vipra kṣetriya vaiśyānām sthānīyāḥ ye ca mānavāḥ
śuddhaḥ vastra vidhiḥ teṣām kartavyaḥ nāṭaka āśrayaḥ
unmattānām pramattānām adhvagānām tathā eva ca

original: vyasanopahatānāṃ ca malino veṣa ucyate // BhN_21.128 //
analyzed: vyasana upahatānām ca malinaḥ veṣaḥ ucyate
śuddha rakta vicitrāṇi vāsāṃsi ūrdhva ambarāṇi ca
yojayet nāṭya tattva jñaḥ veṣayoḥ śuddha citrayoḥ

original: kuryādveṣe tu maline malinaṃ tu vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: kuryāt veṣe tu maline malinam tu vicakṣaṇaḥ
muni nirgrantha śākyeṣu yati pāśupateṣu ca
vrata anugaḥ tu kartavyaḥ veṣaḥ loka svabhāvataḥ
cīra valkala carmāṇi tāpasānām tu yojayet
parivāṭ muniṣkyānām vāsaḥ kāṣāyam iṣyate
nānā citrāṇi vāsāṃsi kuryāt pāśupateṣu atha
ku jātayaḥ ca ye proktāḥ teṣām ca eva yathārhataḥ

original: antaḥpurapraveśe ca viniyuktā hi ye narāḥ // BhN_21.133 //
analyzed: antaḥpura praveśe ca viniyuktāḥ hi ye narāḥ
kāṣāya kañcuka paṭāḥ kāryāḥ te yathāvidhi
avasthāna tarataḥ ca eva nṛṇām veṣaḥ bhavet atha
veṣaḥ sāṃgrāmikaḥ ca eva śūrāṇām saṃprakīrtitaḥ
vicitra śastra kavacaḥ baddha tūṇaḥ dhanuḥ dharaḥ

original: citro veṣastu kartavyo nṛpāṇāṃ nityameva ca /
analyzed: citraḥ veṣaḥ tu kartavyaḥ nṛpāṇām nityam eva ca
kevalaḥ tu bhavet śuddhaḥ nakṣatra utpāta maṅgale
evam eṣa bhavet veṣaḥ deśa jāti vayaḥ nugaḥ
uttama adhama madhyānām strīṇām nṛṇām atha api ca
evam vastra vidhiḥ kāryaḥ prayoge nāṭaka āśraye
nānā avasthām samāsādya śubha aśubha kṛtaḥ tathā
tathā pratiśiras ca api kartavyam nāṭaka āśrayam
divyānām mānuṣāṇām ca deśa jāti vayaḥ śritam
pārśva āgatāḥ mastakinaḥ tathā ca eva kirīṭinaḥ
trividhaḥ mukuṭaḥ jñeyaḥ divya pārthiva saṃśritaḥ
deva gandharva yakṣāṇām pannagānām sa rakṣasām
kartavyāḥ pārśva maulayaḥ

original: uttamā ye ca divyānāṃ te ca kāryāḥ kirīṭinaḥ /
analyzed: uttamāḥ ye ca divyānām te ca kāryāḥ kirīṭinaḥ
madhyamāḥ maulinaḥ ca eva kaniṣṭhāḥ
narādhipānām kartavyāḥ mastake mukuṭāḥ budhaiḥ

original: vidyādharāṇāṃ ca siddhānāṃ cāraṇānāṃ tathaiva ca // BhN_21.143 //
analyzed: vidyādharāṇām ca siddhānām cāraṇānām tathā eva ca
granthimat keśa mukuṭāḥ kartavyāḥ tu prayoktṛbhiḥ
rākṣaḥ dānava daityānām piṅga keśa īkṣaṇāni hi
ca tathā mukuṭa āsyāni kārayet

original: uttamaścāpi ye tatra te kāryāḥ pārśvamaulinaḥ // BhN_21.145 //
analyzed: uttamaḥ ca api ye tatra te kāryāḥ pārśvamaulinaḥ
kasmāt tu mukuṭāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ prayoge divi pārthive

original: keśānāṃ chedanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vedavāde yathāśruti // BhN_21.146 //
analyzed: keśānām chedanam dṛṣṭam veda vāde yathāśruti
bhadrīkṛtasya vā yajñe śirasaḥ chādana icchayā
keśānām api adīrgha tvāt smṛtam mukuṭa dhāraṇam
senāpateḥ punar ca api yuvarājasya ca eva hi
yojayet ardha mukuṭam mahāmātrāḥ ca ye narāḥ
amātyānām kañcukinām tathā śreṣṭhi purodhasām
veṣṭana ābaddha paṭṭāni pratiśīrṣāṇi kārayet
piśāca unmatta bhūtānām sādhakānām tapasvinām
anistīrṇa pratijñānām lamba keśam bhavet śiraḥ
śākya śrotriya nirgrantha parivrāj dīkṣiteṣu ca

original: śiromuṇḍaṃ tu kartavyaṃ yajñadīkṣānviteṣu ca // BhN_21.151 //
analyzed: śiraḥ muṇḍam tu kartavyam yajña dīkṣā anviteṣu ca

original: tathā vratānugaṃ caiva śeṣānāṃ liṅgināṃ śiraḥ /
analyzed: tathā vrata anugam ca eva śeṣānām liṅginām śiraḥ

original: muṇḍaṃ vā kuñcitaṃ vāpi lambakeśamathāpi vā // BhN_21.152 //
analyzed: muṇḍam vā kuñcitam vā api lamba keśam atha api vā

original: dhūrtānāṃ caiva kartavyaṃ ye ca rātryupajīvinaḥ /
analyzed: dhūrtānām ca eva kartavyam ye ca rātri upajīvinaḥ
śṛṅgāra cittāḥ puruṣāḥ teṣām kuñcita mūrdhajāḥ
bālānām api kartavyam tri śikhaṇḍa vibhūṣitam

original: jaṭāmakuṭabaddhaṃ ca munīnāṃ tu bhavecchiraḥ // BhN_21.154 //
analyzed: jaṭā makuṭa baddham ca munīnām tu bhavet śiraḥ
ceṭānām api kartavyam tri śikham muṇḍam eva vā
vidūṣakasya khalatiḥ syāt kākapadam eva vā
śeeṣāṇām artha yogena deśa jāti samāśrayam
śiraḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ kāryam nānā avasthā antara āśrayam
bhūṣaṇaiḥ varṇakaiḥ vastraiḥ mālyaiḥ ca eva yathāvidhi
evam nānā prakāraiḥ tu buddhyā veṣān prakalpayet
pūrvam tu prakṛtim sthāpya prayoga guṇa saṃbhavām

original: strīṇāṃ vā puruṣāṇāṃ vāpyavasthāṃ prāpya tādṛśīm // BhN_21.158 //
analyzed: strīṇām vā puruṣāṇām vā api avasthām prāpya tādṛśīm
sarve bhāvāḥ ca divyānām kāryāḥ mānuṣa saṃśrayāḥ

original: teṣāṃ cānimiṣatvādi naiva kāryaṃ prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_21.159 //
analyzed: teṣām ca animiṣa tva ādi nā eva kāryam prayoktṛbhiḥ
iha bhāva rasāḥ ca eva dṛṣṭibhiḥ saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ
dṛṣṭyā eva sthāpitaḥ hi arthaḥ paścāt aṅgaiḥ vibhāvyate
evam jñeyā aṅga racanā nānā prakṛti saṃbhavā

original: sajīva iti yaḥ proktastasya vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam // BhN_21.161 //
analyzed: sa jīvaḥ iti yaḥ proktaḥ tasya vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam

original: yaḥ prāṇināṃ praveśo vai sajīva iti saṃjñitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ prāṇinām praveśaḥ vai sajīvaḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
dvipadaḥ tathā ca eva āpadaḥ smṛtaḥ
uragān apadān vidyāt dvipadān khaga mānuṣān

original: grāmyā āraṇyāḥ paśavo vijñeyāḥ syuścatuṣpadāḥ // BhN_21.163 //
analyzed: grāmyāḥ āraṇyāḥ paśavaḥ vijñeyāḥ syuḥ catuṣpadāḥ
ye te tu yaddha saṃpheṭaiḥ uparodhaiḥ tathā eva ca
nānā praharaṇa upetāḥ prayojyāḥ nāṭake budhaiḥ
āyudhāni ca kāryāṇi puruṣāṇām pramāṇataḥ
tāni aham vartayiṣyāmi yathā pusta pramāṇataḥ
bhiṇḍiḥ dvādaśa tālaḥ syāt daśa kuntaḥ bhavet atha

original: aṣṭau śataghnī śūlaṃ ca tomaraḥ śaktireva vā // BhN_21.166 //
analyzed: aṣṭau śataghnī śūlam ca tomaraḥ śaktiḥ eva vā
aṣṭau tālāḥ dhanuḥ jñeyam āyāmaḥ dvi hastakaḥ

original: śaro gadā ca vajrā ca catustālaṃ vidhīyate // BhN_21.167 //
analyzed: śaraḥ gadā ca vajrā ca catur tālam vidhīyate
aṅgulāni tu asiḥ kāryaḥ catvāriṃśat pramāṇataḥ

original: dvādaśāṅgulakaṃ cakraṃ tato 'rdhaṃ prāsa iṣyate // BhN_21.168 //
analyzed: dvādaśa aṅgulakam cakram tatas ṛdham prāsaḥ iṣyate
prāsa vat paṭṭasam vidyāt daṇḍaḥ ca eva tu viṃśatiḥ
viṃśatiḥ kaṇayaḥ ca eva hi aṅgulāni pramāṇataḥ
śoḍaṣa aṅgula vistīrṇam sa balam saṃpraghaṇṭikam
triṃśat aṅguli mānena kartavyam kheṭakam budhaiḥ
jarjaraḥ daṇḍa kāṣṭham ca tathā eva pratiśīrṣakam

original: chatraṃ cāmaraṃ caiva dhvajo śṛṅgāra eva ca // BhN_21.171 //
analyzed: chatram cāmaram ca eva śṛṅgāraḥ eva ca
yat kiñcid mānuṣe loke dravyam puṃsām prayojakam
yat ca upakaraṇam sarve nāṭye tat saṃprakīrtitam
yat yasya viṣaya prāptam tena uhyam tasya lakṣaṇam

original: jarjare daṇḍakāṣṭhe ca saṃpravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam // BhN_21.173 //
analyzed: jarjare daṇḍa kāṣṭhe ca saṃpravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam
māhendrāḥ vai proktāḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ viśvakarmaṇā
eṣā anyatamam kuryāt jarjaram dāru karmataḥ
athavā vṛkṣayoniḥ syāt prarohaḥ vā api jarjaraḥ
veṇuḥ eva bhavet śreṣṭhaḥ tasya vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam
śveta bhūmyām tu yaḥ jātaḥ puṣya nakṣatra jaḥ tathā
saṃgrāhyaḥ vai bhavet veṇuḥ jarjara arthe prayatnataḥ
pramāṇam aṅgulānām tu śatam aṣṭa uttaram bhavet
pañca parvā catur granthiḥ tāla mātraḥ tathā eva ca

original: sthūlagranthirna kartavyo na śākhī na ca kīṭavān /
analyzed: sthūlagranthiḥ na kartavyaḥ na śākhī na ca kīṭavān

original: na kṛmikṣataparvā ca na hīnaścānyaveṇubhiḥ // BhN_21.178 //
analyzed: na kṛmi kṣata parvā ca na hīnaḥ ca anya veṇubhiḥ
madhu sarpiḥ sarṣapa aktam mālya dhūpa puraskṛtam
upāsya vidhivat veṇum gṛhṇiyāt jarjaram prati

original: yo vidhiryaḥ kramaścaiva māhebdre tu dhvaje smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vidhiḥ yaḥ kramaḥ ca eva māhebdre tu dhvaje smṛtaḥ
sa jarjarasya kartavyaḥ puṣya veṇu samāśrayaḥ
bhavet yaḥ dīrgha parvā tu tanu patraḥ tathā eva ca
parvāgrataṇḍulaḥ ca eva puṣyaveṇuḥ sa kīrtitaḥ
vidhiḥ eṣa mayā proktaḥ jarjarasya

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi daṇḍakāṣṭhasya lakṣaṇam // BhN_21.182 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi daṇḍa kāṣṭhasya lakṣaṇam
kapittha bilva vaṃśebhyaḥ daṇḍa kāṣṭham bhavet atha

original: vakraṃ caiva hi kartavyaṃ tribhāge lakṣaṇānvitam // BhN_21.183 //
analyzed: vakram ca eva hi kartavyam tri bhāge lakṣaṇa anvitam

original: kīṭairnopahataṃ yacca vyādhinā na ca pīḍitam /
analyzed: kīṭaiḥ na upahatam yat ca vyādhinā na ca pīḍitam

original: mandaśākhaṃ bhavedyacca daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ tu tadbhavet // BhN_21.184 //
analyzed: manda śākham bhavet yat ca daṇḍakāṣṭham tu tat bhavet
yaḥ tu ebhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ hīnam daṇḍa kāṣṭham sa jarjaram
kārayet sa tu apacayam mahāntam prāpnuyāt dhruvam
atha śīrṣa vibhāga artham ghaṭī kāryā prayatnataḥ
sva pramāṇa vinirdiṣṭāḥ dvātriṃśati aṅgulāni vai
bilva madhyena kartavyā ghaṭī sira samāśrayā

original: svinnena bilvakalkena draveṇa ca samanvitā // BhN_21.187 //
analyzed: svinnena bilva kalkena draveṇa ca samanvitā
bhasmanā vā tuṣaiḥ vā api kārayet pratiśīrṣakam
saṃchādya tu tatas vastraiḥ bilva dugdhaiḥ ghaṭa āśrayaiḥ
bilva kalkena cīram tu digdhvā saṃyojayet ghaṭīm

original: na sthūlāṃ nānatāṃ tanvīṃ dīrghāṃ naiva ca kārayet. // BhN_21.189 //
analyzed: na sthūlām na ānatām tanvīm dīrghām na eva ca kārayet
tasyām ātapa śuṣkāyām su śuṣkāyām atha api vā

original: chedyaṃ budhāḥ prakurvanti vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā // BhN_21.190 //
analyzed: chedyam budhāḥ prakurvanti vidhi dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: sutīkṣṇena tu śastreṇa ardhārdhaṃ pravibhajya ca /
analyzed: su tīkṣṇena tu śastreṇa ardha ardham pravibhajya ca
sva pramāṇa vinirdiṣṭam lalāṭa kṛta koṇakam

original: ardhāṅgulaṃ lalāṭaṃ tu kāryaṃ chedyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulam /
analyzed: ardha aṅgulam lalāṭam tu kāryam chedyam ṣaṣ aṅgulam
ardha ardham aṅgulam chedyam kaṭayoḥ dvi aṅgulam bhavet
kaṭānte karṇanālasya chedyam dvi adhikam aṅgulam

original: tryaṅgulaṃ karṇavivaraṃ tathā syācchedyameva hi // BhN_21.193 //
analyzed: tri aṅgulam karṇa vivaram tathā syāt chedyam eva hi
tatas ca eva avaṭuḥ kāryā su samā dvādaśa aṅgulā

original: ghaṭyāṃ hyetatsadā cchedye vidhānaṃ vihitaṃ mayā // BhN_21.194 //
analyzed: ghaṭyām hi etat sadā chedye vidhānam vihitam mayā
tasya upari gatā kāryā mukuṭāḥ bahu śilpa jāḥ
nānā ratna praticchannāḥ bahu rūpa upaśobhitāḥ
tathā upakaraṇāni iha nāṭya yoga kṛtāni vai
bahu prakāra yuktāni kurvīta prakṛtim prati
yat kiñcid asmin loke tu carācara samanvite

original: vihitaṃ karma śilpaṃ vā tattūpakaraṇaṃ smṛtam // BhN_21.197 //
analyzed: vihitam karma śilpam vā tattu upakaraṇam smṛtam
yat yasya viṣayam prāptam tat tat eva abhigacchati
puruṣāṇām hi nāṭya upakaraṇa āśraye
yat yena utpāditam karma śilpa yoga kriyā api vā

original: tasya tena kṛtā sṛṣṭiḥ pramāṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tathā // BhN_21.199 //
analyzed: tasya tena kṛtā sṛṣṭiḥ pramāṇam lakṣaṇam tathā
yā kāṣṭha yantra bhūyiṣṭhā kṛtā sṛṣṭiḥ mahātmanā

original: na sāsmākaṃ nāṭyayoge kasmātkhedāvahā hi sā // BhN_21.200 //
analyzed: na sā asmākam nāṭya yoge kasmāt kheda āvahā hi sā
yat dravyam jīva loke tu nānā lakṣaṇa lakṣitam
tasya anukṛti saṃsthānam bhavet
prāsāda gṛha yānāni nānā praharaṇāni ca

original: na śakyaṃ tāni vai kartuṃ yathoktānīha lakṣaṇaiḥ // BhN_21.202 //
analyzed: na śakyam tāni vai kartum yathā uktāni iha lakṣaṇaiḥ
loka dharmī bhavet tu anyā nāṭya dharmī tathā aparā

original: svabhāvo lokadharmī tu vibhāvo nāṭyameva hi // BhN_21.203 //
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ loka dharmī tu vibhāvaḥ nāṭyam eva hi

original: āyasaṃ na tu kartavyaṃ na ca sāramayaṃ tathā /
analyzed: āyasam na tu kartavyam na ca sāra mayam tathā
nāṭya upakaraṇam tad jñaiḥ guru kheda kara bhavet
kāṣṭha carmasu vastrṣu jatu veṇu daleṣu ca
nāṭya upakaraṇāni iha laghu karmāṇi kārayet
carma varma dhvajāḥ śailāḥ prāsādāḥ devatāgṛhāḥ
haya vāraṇa yānāni vimānāni gṛhāṇi ca
pūrvam veṇu dalaiḥ kṛtvā kṛtīḥ bhāva samāśrayāḥ
tatas su raṅgaiḥ acchādya vastraiḥ sārūpyam ānayet
athavā yadi vastrāṇām asānnidhyam bhavet iha
tālīyaiḥ vā kiliñjaiḥ vā ślakṣṇaiḥ vastra kriyā bhavet
tathā praharaṇāni syuḥ tṛṇa veṇu dala ādibhiḥ
jantu bhāṇḍa kriyābhiḥ ca nānā rūpāṇi nāṭake
pratipādam pratiśiras pratihastam pratitvacam

original: tṛṇaiḥ kiliñjairbhāṇḍairvā sārūpyāṇi tu kārayet // BhN_21.210 //
analyzed: tṛṇaiḥ kiliñjaiḥ bhāṇḍaiḥ vā sārūpyāṇi tu kārayet
yat yasya sadṛśam rūpam sārūpya guṇa saṃbhavam

original: mṛṇmayaṃ tattu kṛtsnaṃ tu nānārūpaṃ tu kārayet // BhN_21.211 //
analyzed: mṛṇmayam tat tu kṛtsnam tu nānā rūpam tu kārayet
bhāṇḍa vastra madhūcchiṣṭaiḥ lākṣayā abhra dalena ca
nāgāḥ te vividhāḥ kāryāḥ hi atasī śaṇa bilva jaiḥ
nānā kusuma jātīḥ ca phalāni vividhāni ca
bhāṇḍa vastra madhūcchiṣṭaiḥ lākṣayā vā api kārayet
bhāṇḍa vastra madhūcchiṣṭaiḥ tāmra patraiḥ tathā eva ca
samyak ca nīlī rāgeṇa api abhra patreṇa ca eva hi
rañjitena abhra patreṇa maṇīḥ ca eva prakārayet
upāśrayam atha api eṣam śulba vaṅgena kārayet

original: vividhā mukuṭā divā pūrvaṃ ye gaditā mayā /
analyzed: vividhāḥ mukuṭāḥ divā pūrvam ye gaditāḥ mayā
te bhra patra ujvalāḥ kāryāḥ maṇī vyāla upaśobhitāḥ

original: na śāstraprabhavaṃ karma teṣāṃ hi samudāhṛtam /
analyzed: na śāstra prabhavam karma teṣām hi samudāhṛtam
ācārya buddhyā kartavyam ūha apoha prayojitam
eṣa martya kriyā yogaḥ bhaviṣyat kalpitaḥ mayā
kasmāt alpa bala tvam hi manuṣyeṣu bhaviṣyati
martyānām api no śakyāḥ vibhāvāḥ sarva kāñcanāḥ

original: neṣṭāḥ suvarṇaratnaistu mukuṭā bhūṣaṇāni vā // BhN_21.219 //
analyzed: na iṣṭāḥ suvarṇa ratnaiḥ tu mukuṭāḥ bhūṣaṇāni vā
yuddhe niyuddhe nṛtte vā vṛṣṭi vyāpāra karmaṇi

original: gurubhāvāvasannasya svedo mūrchā ca jāyate // BhN_21.220 //
analyzed: guru bhāva avasannasya svedaḥ mūrchā ca jāyate
sveda mūrchā klama ārtasya prayogaḥ tu vinaśyati
prāṇātyayaḥ kadācid ca bhavet vyāyata ceṣṭayā
tasmāt tāmra mayaiḥ patraiḥ abhrakaiḥ rañjitaiḥ api
bheṇḍaiḥ api madhūcchiṣṭaiḥ kāryāṇi ābharaṇāni tu
evam loka upacāreṇa sva buddhi vibhavena ca
nāṭya upakaraṇāni iha budhaḥ samyak prayojayet

original: na bhedyaṃ naiva ca cchedyaṃ na prahartavyameva ca /
analyzed: na bhedyam na eva ca chedyam na prahartavyam eva ca

original: raṅge praharaṇaiḥ kāryaṃ saṃjñāmātraṃ tu kārayet // BhN_21.224 //
analyzed: raṅge praharaṇaiḥ kāryam saṃjñā mātram tu kārayet
athavā yoga śikṣābhiḥ vidyā māyā kṛtena vā
śastra mokṣaḥ prakartavyaḥ raṅga madhye prayoktṛbhiḥ
evam nānā prakāraiḥ tu āyudha ābharaṇāni ca

original: noktāni yāni ca mayā lokād grāhyāṇi tānyapi // BhN_21.226 //
analyzed: na uktāni yāni ca mayā lokāt grāhyāṇi tāni api
āhārya abhinayaḥ hi eṣa mayā proktaḥ samāsatas

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi sāmānyābhinayaṃ prati // BhN_21.227 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi sāmānya abhinayam prati
iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre āhāryābhinayaḥ nāma ekaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha dvāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
sāmānya abhinayaḥ nāma jñeyaḥ vāc aṅga sattva jaḥ

original: tatra kāryaḥ prayatnastu nāṭyaṃ sattve pratiṣṭhitam // BhN_22.1 //
analyzed: tatra kāryaḥ prayatnaḥ tu nāṭyam sattve pratiṣṭhitam
sattva atiriktaḥ bhinayaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ iti abhidhīyate
sama sattvaḥ bhavet madhyaḥ satva hīnaḥ dhamaḥ smṛtaḥ
avyakta rūpam sattvam hi vijñeyam bhāva saṃśrayam
yathāsthāna rasa upetam romāñca asra ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ
alaṅkārāḥ tu nāṭya jñaiḥ jñeyāḥ bhāva rasa āśrayāḥ
yauvane bhyadhikāḥ strīṇām vikārāḥ vaktra gātra jāḥ
ādau trayaḥ ṅga jaḥ teṣām daśa svābhāvikāḥ pare
ayatna jāḥ punar sapta rasa bhāva upabṛṃhitāḥ
deha ātmakam bhavet sattvam sattvāt bhāvaḥ samutthitaḥ
bhāvāt samutthitaḥ hāvaḥ hāvāt helā samutthitā
helā hāvaḥ ca bhāvaḥ ca paraspara samutthitāḥ
sattva bhede bhavanti ete śarīre prakṛti sthitāḥ
vāc aṅga mukha rāgaiḥ ca sattvena abhinayena ca
kaveḥ antargatam bhāvam bhāvayan bhāvaḥ ucyate
bhāvasya atikṛtam sattvam vyatiriktam sva yoniṣu
na eka avasthā antara kṛtam bhāvam tam iha nirdiśet
tatra akṣi bhrū vikāra āḍhyaḥ śṛṅgāra ākāra sūcakaḥ
sa grīvā recakaḥ jñeyaḥ hāvaḥ sthita samutthitaḥ

original: yo vai hāvaḥ sa evaiṣā śṛṅgārarasasaṃbhavā /
analyzed: yaḥ vai hāvaḥ saḥ eva eṣā śṛṅgāra rasa saṃbhavā
samākhyātā budhaiḥ helā lalitā abhinaya ātmikā

original: moṭṭāyitaṃ kuṭṭimitaṃ bibboko lalitaṃ tathā // BhN_22.12 //
analyzed: moṭṭāyitam kuṭṭimitam bibbokaḥ lalitam tathā

original: vihṛtaṃ ceti vijñeyā daśa strīṇāṃ svabhāvajāḥ /
analyzed: vihṛtam ca iti vijñeyāḥ daśa strīṇām svabhāva jāḥ
punar eṣām svarūpāṇi pravakṣyāmi pṛthak pṛthak
vāc aṅga alaṅkāraiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ prīti prayojitaiḥ madhuraiḥ
iṣṭa janasya anukṛtiḥ līlā jñeyā prayoga jñaiḥ
sthāna āsana gamanānām hasta bhrū netra karmaṇām ca eva

original: utpadyate viśeṣo yaḥ śliṣṭaḥ sa tu vilāsaḥ syāt // BhN_22.15 //
analyzed: utpadyate viśeṣaḥ yaḥ śliṣṭaḥ sa tu vilāsaḥ syāt
mālya ācchādana bhūṣaṇa vilepanānām anādara nyāsaḥ

original: svalpo 'pi parāṃ śobhāṃ janayati yasmāttu vicchitiḥ // BhN_22.16 //
analyzed: su alpaḥ pi parām śobhām janayati yasmāt tu vicchitiḥ
vividhānām arthānām vāc aṅga āhārya sattvānām
mada rāga harṣa janitaḥ vyatyāsaḥ vibhramaḥ jñeyaḥ
smita rudita hasita bhaya harṣa garva duḥkha śrama abhilāṣāṇām
saṅkara karaṇam harṣāt asakṛt kilikiñcitam jñeyam
iṣṭa janasya kathāyām līlā helā ādi darśane vā api
tad bhāva bhāvanā kṛtam uktam moṭṭāyitam nāma
keśa stana dharā ādi grahaṇāt ati harṣa saṃbhrama utpannam
kuṭṭa mitam sukham api duḥkha upacāreṇa
iṣṭānām bhāvānām prāptau abhimāna garva saṃbhūtaḥ
strīṇām anādara kṛtaḥ bibbokaḥ nāma vijñeyaḥ
hasta pāda aṅga vinyāsaḥ bhrū netra uṣṭha prayojitaḥ
saukumāryāt bhavet yaḥ tu lalitam tat prakīrtitam
kara caraṇa aṅga nyāsaḥ sa bhrū netra uṣṭha saṃprayuktaḥ tu
sukumāra vidhānena strībhiuḥ iti idam smṛtam lalitam
vākyānām prīti yuktānām prāptānām yat abhāṣaṇam

original: vyājātsvabhāvato vāpi vihṛtaṃ nāma tadbhavet // BhN_22.24 //
analyzed: vyājāt svabhāvataḥ vā api vihṛtam nāma tat bhavet
prāptānām api vacasām kriyate yat abhāṣaṇam hriyā strībhiḥ
vyājāt svabhāvataḥ vā api etat samudāhṛtam vihṛtam

original: śobhā kāntiśca dīptiśca tathā mādhuryameva ca /
analyzed: śobhā kāntiḥ ca dīptiḥ ca tathā mādhuryam eva ca
dhairyam prāgalbhyam audāryam iti ete syuḥ ayatna jāḥ
rūpa yauvana lāvaṇyaiḥ upabhoga upabṛṃhitaiḥ
alaṅkaraṇam aṅgānām śobhā iti parikīrtitā
vijñeyā ca tathā kāntiḥ śobhā eva āpūrṇa manmathā
kāntiḥ eva ati vistīrṇā dīptiḥ iti abhidhīyate
sarva avasthā viśeṣeṣu dīpteṣu laliteṣu ca
anulbaṇa tvam ceṣṭāyāḥ mādhuryam iti saṃjñitam
cāpalena anupahatā sarva artheṣu a vikatthanā
svābhāvikī citta vṛttiḥ dhairyam iti abhidhīyate
prayoga nissādhvasa tā prāgalbhyam samudāhṛtam

original: audāryaṃ praśrayaḥ proktaḥ sarvāvasthānugo budhaiḥ // BhN_22.31 //
analyzed: audāryam praśrayaḥ proktaḥ sarva avasthā anugaḥ budhaiḥ
sukumāre bhavanti ete prayoge lalita ātmike

original: vilāsalalite hitvā dīpte 'pyete bhavanti hi // BhN_22.32 //
analyzed: vilāsa lalite hitvā dīpte pi ete bhavanti hi

original: śobhā vilāso mādhuryaṃ sthairyaṃ gāmbhīryameva ca /
analyzed: śobhā vilāsaḥ mādhuryam sthairyam gāmbhīryam eva ca
lalitā audārya tejāṃsi sattva bhedāḥ tu pauruṣāḥ
dākṣyam śauryam atha utsāhaḥ nīca artheṣu jugupsanam

original: uttamaiśca guṇaiḥ spardhā yataḥ śobheti sā smṛtā // BhN_22.34 //
analyzed: uttamaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ spardhā yatas śobhā iti sā smṛtā
smita pūrvam atha ālāpaḥ vilāsaḥ iti kīrtitaḥ
abhyāsat karaṇānām tu śliṣṭa tvam yatra jāyate
mahatsu api vikāreṣu tat mādhuryam iti smṛtam
dharrma artha kāma saṃyuktāt śubha aśubha samutthitāt
vyavasāyāt acalanam sthairyam iti abhisaṃjñitam
yasya prabhāvāt ākārāḥ harṣa krodha bhaya ādiṣu
bhāveṣu nā upalakṣyante tat gāmbhīryam iti smṛtam
a buddhi pūrvakam yat tu nirvikāra svabhājam
śṛṅgāra ākāra ceṣṭa tvam lalitam tat udāhṛtam
dānam abhyupapattiḥ ca tathā ca priya bhāṣaṇam

original: svajane ca pare vāpi tadaudāryaṃ prakīrtitam // BhN_22.40 //
analyzed: sva jane ca pare vā api tat audāryam prakīrtitam
adhikṣepa avamāna ādeḥ prayuktasya pareṇa yat
prāṇatyaye pi asahanam tat tejaḥ samudāhṛtam
sattva jaḥ pūrvam mayā dvijottamāḥ
śārīram vyākhyāsyāmi anupūrvaśas
ṣaṣ ātmakaḥ tu śārīraḥ vākyam sūcāṅkuraḥ tathā

original: śākhā nāṭyāyitaṃ caiva nivṛttyaṅkura eva ca // BhN_22.43 //
analyzed: śākhā nāṭyāyitam ca eva nivṛtti aṅkuraḥ eva ca
nānā rasa artha yuktaiḥ vṛtta nibandhaiḥ kṛtaḥ sa cūrṇa padaiḥ
prākṛta saṃskṛta pāṭhaḥ vākya abhinayaḥ budhaiḥ jñeyaḥ

original: vākyartho vākyaṃ vā sattvāṅgaiḥ sūcyate yadā pūrvam /
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ vākyam vā sattva aṅgaiḥ sūcyate yadā pūrvam
paścāt vākya abhinayaḥ sūcā iti abhisaṃjñitā sā tu
hṛdaya sthaḥ nirvacanaiḥ aṅga abhinayaḥ kṛtaḥ nipuṇa sādhyaḥ
sūcā eva utpatti kṛtaḥ vijñeyaḥ tu aṅkura abhinayaḥ
yat tu śiraḥ mukha jaṅghā ūru pāṇi pādaiḥ yathākramam kriyate
śākhā darśana mārgaḥ śākhā abhinayaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ
nāṭyāyitam upacāraiḥ yaḥ kriyate bhinaya sūcayā nāṭye
kāla prakarṣa hetoḥ praveśakaiḥ saṃgamaḥ yāvat
sthāne dhruvāsu abhinayaḥ yaḥ kriyate harṣa śoka roṣa ādyaiḥ
bhāva rasa saṃprayuktaiḥ jñeyam nāṭyāyitam tat api
yatra anya uktam vākyam sūcā abhinayena yojayet anyaḥ
tad saṃbandha artha katham bhavet nivṛtti aṅkuraḥ
eteṣām tu bhavet mārgaḥ yathā bhāva rasa anvitaḥ
kāvya vastuṣu nirdiṣṭaḥ dvādaśa abhinaya ātmakaḥ
ālāpaḥ ca pralāpaḥ ca vilāpaḥ syāt tathā eva ca
saṃlāpaḥ tu apalāpaḥ tathā eva ca
sandeśāḥ ca atideśaḥ ca nirdeśaḥ syāt tathā aparaḥ
upadeśaḥ upadeśaḥ ca vyapadeśaḥ ca kīrtitaḥ

original: ābhāṣaṇaṃ tu yadvākyamālāpo nāma sa smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ābhāṣaṇam tu yat vākyam ālāpaḥ nāma sa smṛtaḥ

original: anarthakaṃ vaco yattu pralāpaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ // BhN_22.54 //
analyzed: anarthakam vacaḥ yat tu pralāpaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ

original: karuṇaprabhavo yastu vilāpaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: karuṇa prabhavaḥ yaḥ tu vilāpaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ
bahuśas bhihitam vākyam anulāpaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
ukti pratyukti saṃyuktaḥ saṃlāpaḥ iti kīrtitaḥ
pūrva uktasya anyathāvādaḥ hi apalāpaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
tat idam vacanam brūhi iti eṣa sandeśaḥ ucyate

original: yattvayoktaṃ mayoktaṃ tatso 'tideśa iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_22.57 //
analyzed: yat tvayā uktam mayā uktam tat saḥ tideśaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: sa eṣo 'haṃ bravīmīti nirdeśa iti kīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eṣaḥ ham bravīmi iti nirdeśaḥ iti kīrtitaḥ
vyāja antareṇa kathanam vyapadeśaḥ iha ucyate
idam kuru gṛhāṇa iti hi upadeśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: anyārthakathanaṃ yat syāt so 'padeśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_22.59 //
analyzed: anya artha kathanam yat syāt saḥ upadeśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
ete mārgāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ sarva abhinaya yojakāḥ
sapta prakāram eteṣām punar vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam
pratyakṣaḥ ca parokṣaḥ ca tathā kāla kṛtāḥ trayaḥ

original: ātmasthaśca parasthaśca prakārāḥ sapta eva tu // BhN_22.61 //
analyzed: ātma sthaḥ ca para sthaḥ ca prakārāḥ sapta eva tu

original: eṣā bravīmi nāhaṃ bho vadāmīti ca yadvacaḥ /
analyzed: eṣā bravīmi na aham bho vadāmi iti ca yat vacaḥ
pratyakṣaḥ ca parokṣaḥ ca vartamānaḥ ca tat bhavet

original: ahaṃ karomi gacchāmi vadāmi vacanaṃ tava /
analyzed: aham karomi gacchāmi vadāmi vacanam tava

original: ātmastho vartamānaśca pratyakṣaścaiva sa smṛtaḥ // BhN_22.63 //
analyzed: ātma sthaḥ vartamānaḥ ca pratyakṣaḥ ca eva sa smṛtaḥ
kariṣyāmi gamiṣyāmi vadiṣyāmi iti yat vacaḥ

original: ātmasthaśca parokṣaśca bhaviṣyatkāla eva ca // BhN_22.64 //
analyzed: ātma sthaḥ ca parokṣaḥ ca bhaviṣyat kālaḥ eva ca

original: hatā jitā ca bhagnāśca mayā sarve dviṣadgaṇāḥ /
analyzed: hatā jitā ca bhagnāḥ ca mayā sarve dviṣat gaṇāḥ

original: ātmasthaśca parokṣaśca vṛttakālaśca sa smṛtaḥ // BhN_22.65 //
analyzed: ātma sthaḥ ca parokṣaḥ ca vṛtta kālaḥ ca sa smṛtaḥ
tvayā hata jitāḥ ca iti yaḥ vadet nāṭya karmaṇi
parokṣaḥ ca parasthaḥ ca vṛttakālaḥ tathā eva ca
eṣa bravīmi kurute gacchati ityādi yat vacaḥ
para sthaḥ vartamānaḥ ca pratyakṣaḥ ca
bhavet tathā
sa gacchati karoti iti vacanam yat uta āhṛtam

original: parasthaṃ vartamānaṃ ca parokṣaṃ caiva tadbhavet // BhN_22.68 //
analyzed: para stham vartamānam ca parokṣam ca eva tat bhavet
kariṣyanti gamiṣyanti vadiṣyanti iti yat vacaḥ

original: parasthameṣyatkālaṃ ca parokṣaṃ caiva tadbhavet] // BhN_22.69 //
analyzed: para stham eṣyat kālam ca parokṣam ca eva tat bhavet
hastam antarataḥ kṛtvā yat vadet nāṭya karmaṇi

original: ātmasthaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ ca parokṣaṃ caiva tanmatam // BhN_22.70 //
analyzed: ātma stham hṛdaya stham ca parokṣam ca eva tat matam
pareṣām ātmanaḥ ca eva kālasya ca viśeṣaṇāt
sapta prakārasya asya eva bhedāḥ jñeyāḥ anekadhā
ete prayogāḥ vijñeyāḥ mārga abhinaya yojitāḥ
eteṣu iha viniṣpannaḥ vividhaḥ bhinayaḥ bhavet
śiraḥ hasta kaṭī vakṣaḥ jaṅghā ūru karaṇeṣu tu

original: samaḥ karmavibhāgo yaḥ sāmānyābhinayastu saḥ // BhN_22.73 //
analyzed: samaḥ karma vibhāgaḥ yaḥ sāmānya abhinayaḥ tu saḥ
lalitaiḥ hasta saṃcāraḥ tathā mṛdu aṅga ceṣṭitaiḥ
abhineyaḥ tu nāṭya jñaiḥ rasa bhāva samanvitaiḥ
anuddhatam asaṃbhrāntam an āviddha aṅga ceṣṭitam
laya tāla kalā pāta pramāṇa niyata ātmakam
su vibhakta pada ālāpam aniṣṭhuram akāhalam

original: yadīdṛśaṃ bhavennāṭyaṃ jñeyamābhyantaraṃ tu tat // BhN_22.76 //
analyzed: yadi īdṛśam bhavet nāṭyam jñeyam ābhyantaram tu tat
etat eva viparyastam svacchanda gati ceṣṭitam
anibaddha gīta vādyam nāṭyam bāhyam iti smṛtam
lakṣaṇa abhyantara tvāt hi tat ābhyantaram iṣyate
śāstra bāhyam bhavet yat tu tat bāhyam iti bhaṇyate

original: anena lakṣyate yasmāt prayogaḥ karma caiva hi /
analyzed: anena lakṣyate yasmāt prayogaḥ karma ca eva hi
tasmāt lakṣaṇam etat hi nāṭye smin saṃprayojitam

original: anācāryoṣitā ye ca ye ca śāstrabahiṣkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: an ācārya uṣitāḥ ye ca ye ca śāstra bahiṣkṛtāḥ

original: bāhyaṃ prayuñjate te tu ajñātvācāryakīṃ kriyām // BhN_22.80 //
analyzed: bāhyam prayuñjate te tu a jñātvā ācāryakīm kriyām

original: śabdaṃ sparśaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca rasaṃ gandhaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: śabdam sparśam ca rūpam ca rasam gandham tathā eva ca
indriyāni indriya arthān ca bhāvaiḥ abhinayet budhaḥ

original: kṛtvā sācīkṛtāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śiraḥ pārśvanataṃ tathā /
analyzed: kṛtvā sācīkṛtām dṛṣṭim śiraḥ pārśva natam tathā

original: tarjanī karṇadeśe ca budhaḥ śabdaṃ vinirdiśet // BhN_22.82 //
analyzed: tarjanī karṇa deśe ca budhaḥ śabdam vinirdiśet
kiñcid ākuñcite netre kṛtvā bhrū kṣepam eva ca
tathā aṃsa gaṇḍayoḥ sparśāt sparśam evam vinirdiśet
kṛtvā patākau mūrdha sthau kiṃcid pracalita ānanaḥ

original: nirvarṇayantyā dṛṣṭyā ca rūpaṃ tvabhinayed budhaḥ // BhN_22.84 //
analyzed: nirvarṇayantyā dṛṣṭyā ca rūpam tu abhinayet budhaḥ
kiñcid ākuñcite netre kṛtvā utphullām ca nāsikām

original: ekocchvāsena ceṣṭau tu rasagandhau vinirdiśet // BhN_22.85 //
analyzed: eka ucchvāsena ca iṣṭau tu rasa gandhau vinirdiśet
pañcānām indriyārthānām bhāvāḥ hi ete nubhāvinaḥ

original: śrotratvaṅnetrajihvānāṃ ghrāṇasya ca tathaiva hi // BhN_22.86 //
analyzed: śrotra tvac netra jihvānām ghrāṇasya ca tathā eva hi
indriya arthāḥ samanasaḥ bhavanti hi anubhāvinaḥ

original: na vetti hyamanāḥ kiṃcidviṣayaṃ pañcadhāgatam // BhN_22.87 //
analyzed: na vetti hi amanāḥ kiṃcid viṣayam pañcadhā gatam
manasaḥ trividhaḥ bhāvaḥ vijñeyaḥ bhinaye budhaiḥ

original: iṣṭastathā hyaniṣṭaśca madhyasthaśca tathaiva hi // BhN_22.88 //
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ tathā hi aniṣṭaḥ ca madhyasthaḥ ca tathā eva hi
prahlādanena gātrasya tathā pulakitena ca
vadanasya vikāsena kuryāt iṣṭa nidarśanam

original: iṣṭe śabde tathā rūpe sparśe gandhe tathā rase /
analyzed: iṣṭe śabde tathā rūpe sparśe gandhe tathā rase
indriyaiḥ manasā prāptaiḥ saumukhyam saṃpradarśayet
parāvṛttena śirasā netra nāsā vikarṣaṇaiḥ
cakṣuṣaḥ ca apradānena hi aniṣṭam abhinirdiśet
na ati hṛṣṭena manasā na ca atyartha jugupsayā
madhyasthanā eva bhāvena madhyastham abhinirdiśet

original: tenedaṃ tasya vāpīdaṃ sa evaṃ prakaroti vā /
analyzed: tena idam tasya vā api idam saḥ evam prakaroti vā

original: parokṣābhinayo yastu madhyastha iti sa smṛtaḥ // BhN_22.93 //
analyzed: parokṣa abhinayaḥ yaḥ tu madhyasthaḥ iti sa smṛtaḥ

original: ātmānubhāvī yo 'rthaḥ syādātmastha iti sa smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ātma anubhāvī yaḥ ṛthaḥ syāt ātma sthaḥ iti sa smṛtaḥ

original: parārthavarṇanā yatra parasthaḥ sa tu saṃjñitaḥ // BhN_22.94 //
analyzed: para artha varṇanā yatra para sthaḥ sa tu saṃjñitaḥ
prāyeṇa sarva bhāvānām kāmāt niṣpattiḥ iṣyate
sa ca icchā guṇa sampannaḥ bahudhā parikalpitaḥ
dharma kāmaḥ ṛtha kāmaḥ ca mokṣa kāmaḥ tathā eva ca

original: strīpuṃsayostu yogo yaḥ sa tu kāma iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_22.96 //
analyzed: strīpuṃsayoḥ tu yogaḥ yaḥ sa tu kāmaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
sarvasya eva hi lokasya sukha duḥkha nibarhaṇaḥ

original: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ dṛṣyate kāmaḥ sa sukhaṃ vyasaneṣvapi // BhN_22.97 //
analyzed: bhūyiṣṭham dṛṣyate kāmaḥ sa sukham vyasaneṣu api
yaḥ strī puruṣa saṃyogaḥ rati saṃbhoga kārakaḥ

original: sa śṛṅgāra iti jñeya upacārakṛtaḥ śubhaḥ // BhN_22.98 //
analyzed: sa śṛṅgāraḥ iti jñeyaḥ upacāra kṛtaḥ śubhaḥ
bhūyiṣṭham eva lokaḥ yam sukham icchati sarvadā

original: sukhasya hi striyo mūlaṃ nānā śīlāścā tāḥ punaḥ // BhN_22.99 //
analyzed: sukhasya hi striyaḥ mūlam nānā śīlāḥ ca tāḥ punar
deva dānava gandharva rakṣaḥ nāga patatriṇām
piśāca yakṣa vyālānām nara vānara hastinām
mṛga mīna uṣṭra makara khara sūkara vājinām
mahīṣa ajagava ādīnām tulya śīlāḥ striyaḥ smṛtāḥ
snigdhaiḥ aṅgaiḥ upāṅgaiḥ ca sthirā manda nimeṣiṇi
arogā dīpti upetā ca dāna sattva ārjava anvitā
alpa svedā sama ratā su alpa bhuj surata priyā
gandha puṣpa ratā hṛdyā deva śīla aṅganā smṛtā
adharma śāṭhya abhiratā sthira krodha ati niṣṭhurā
madya māṃsa priayā nityam kopanā ca ati māninī
capalā ca ati lubdhā ca paruṣā kalaha priyā
īrṣyā śīlā cala snehā ca āsuram śīlam āśritā
krīḍā parā cāru netrā nakha dantaiḥ su puṣpitaiḥ

original: svaṅgī ca sthirabhāṣī ca mandāpatyā ratipriyā // BhN_22.106 //
analyzed: su aṅgī ca sthira bhāṣī ca manda apatyā rati priyā

original: gīte vādye ca nṛtte ca ratā hṛṣṭā mṛjāvatī /
analyzed: gīte vādye ca nṛtte ca ratā hṛṣṭā mṛjāvatī
gandharvasattvā vijñeyā snigdha tvac keśa locanā
bṛhat vyāyata sarva aṅgī rakta vistīrṇa locanā
khara romā divāsvapna niratā ati ucca bhāṣiṇī
niśā vihāra śīlā ca rākṣasam śīlam āśritā
tīkṣṇa nāsā agra daśanā su tanuḥ tāmra locanā
nīlotpala savarṇā ca svapna śīlā ati kopanā
tiryak gatiḥ cala ārambhā bahu śvāsā ati māninī
gandha mālya āsava ratā nāga sattva aṅganā smṛtā
atyanta vyāvṛta āsyā ca tīkṣṇa śīlā sarit priyā
surā āsava kṣīra ratā bahu apatyā phala priyā
nityam śvasana śīlā ca tathā udyāna vana priyā
capalā śākunam sattvam āśritā
ūna adhika aṅguli karāḥ rātrau niṣkuṭa cāriṇi
bāla udvejana śīlā ca piśunā kliṣṭa bhāṣiṇi
surate kutsita ācārā romaśa aṅgī mahā svanā
piśāca sattvā vijñeyā madya māṃsa bali priyā
svapna prasvedana aṅgī ca sthira śayyā āsana priyā
cira dṛṣṭeṣu harṣam ca kṛtajña tvāt upaiti sā
adīrgha śāyinī ca eva yakṣa śīlā aṅganā smṛtā
tulya māna avamānā yā paruṣa tvac khara svarā
śaṭha anṛta uddhata kathā vyāla sattvā ca piṅga dṛś
vibhakta aṅgī kṛtajñā ca guru deva dvija priyā
dharma kāma artha niratā hi ahaṅkāāra vivarjitā

original: suhṛtpriyā suśīlā ca mānuṣaṃ sattvamāśritā // BhN_22.120 //
analyzed: suhṛd priyā su śīlā ca mānuṣam sattvam āśritā
saṃhata alpa tanuḥ hṛṣṭā piṅga romā chala priyā
su alpam api upakāram tu nityam yā bahu manyate
prasahya rati śīlā ca vānaram sattvam āśritā
mahā hanu lalāṭā ca śarīra upacaya anvitā
piṅgākṣī romaśāṅgī ca gandha mālya āsava priyā
kopanā sthira cittā ca jala udyāna vana priyā
madhura abhiratā ca eva hastisattvā prakīrtitā
su alpa udarī bhagna nāsā tanu jaṅghā vana priyā
cala vīstīrṇa nayanā capalā śīghra gāminī
divātrāsa parā nityam gīta vādya rati priyā
nivāsa sthira cittā ca mṛgasattvā prakīrtitā
dīrgha pīna unnata uraskā calā na ati nimeṣiṇī
bahu bhṛtyā bahu sutā matsya sattvā jala priyā
udbandha kaṭi pārśvā ca khara niṣṭhura bhāṣiṇī
sthūla śīrṣa āñcita grīvā dārita āsyā maha svanā

original: jñeyā makarasattvā ca krūrā matsyaguṇairyutā // BhN_22.130 //
analyzed: jñeyā makara sattvā ca krūrā matsya guṇaiḥ yutā
sthūla jihvā uṣṭha daśanā rūkṣa tvac kaṭu bhāṣiṇī
rati yuddha karī dhṛṣṭā nakha danta kṣata priyā
sapatnī dveṣiṇī dakṣā capalā śīghra gāminī

original: sarogā bahvapatyā ca kharasattvā prakīrtitā // BhN_22.132 //
analyzed: sa rogā bahu apatyā ca khara sattvā prakīrtitā
dīrgha pṛṣṭha udara mukhī roma śālī bala anvitā
su saṃkṣipta lalāṭā ca kanda mūla phala priyā
kṛṣṇā daṃṣṭa utkaṭa mukhī hrasva udara śiroruhā
hīna ācārā bahu apatyā saukaram sattvam āśritā
sthirā vibhakta pārśva ūru kaṭī pṛṣṭha śirodharā
subhagā dāna śīlā ca ṛju sthūla śiroruhā
kṛśā cañcala cittā ca snigdha vāc śīghra gāminī
kāma krodha parā ca eva haya sattva aṅganā smṛtā
sthūla pṛṣṭha akṣi daśanā tanu pārśva udarā sthirā
kiñcid unnata vaktrā ca jala krīḍā vana priyā
bṛhat lalāṭā su śroṇī māhiṣam sattvam āśritā
kṛśā tanu bhuja uraskā niṣṭabdha sthira locanā
saṃkṣipta pāṇi pādā ca sūkṣma roma samācitā
bhaya śīlā jala udvignā bahu apatyā vana priyā
cañcalā śīghra gamanā hi aja sattva aṅganā smṛtā
udbandha gātra nayanā vijṛmbhaṇa parāyaṇā
dīrgha alpa vadanā su alpa pāṇi pāda vibhūṣitā
uccaḥsvanā su alpa nidrā krodhanā sukṛta priyā

original: hīnācārā kṛtajñā ca śvaśīlā parikīrtitā // BhN_22.142 //
analyzed: hīna ācārā kṛtajñā ca śvaśīlā parikīrtitā
saṃkṣipta pāṇi pādā ca dṛḍha ārambhā prajā hitā
pitṛ deva arcana ratā satya śauca guru priyā

original: sthirā parikleśasahā gavāṃ sattvaṃ samāśritā // BhN_22.144 //
analyzed: sthirā parikleśa sahā gavām sattvam samāśritā

original: nānāśīlāḥ striyo jñeyāḥ svaṃ svaṃ sattvaṃ samāśritāḥ /
analyzed: nānā śīlāḥ striyaḥ jñeyāḥ svam svam sattvam samāśritāḥ

original: vijñāya ca yathāsattvamupaseveta tāḥ punaḥ // BhN_22.145 //
analyzed: vijñāya ca yathāsattvam upaseveta tāḥ punar
upacāraḥ yathāsattvam strīṇām alpaḥ pi harṣa daḥ
mahān api anyathā yuktaḥ na eva tuṣṭi karaḥ bhavet
yathā saṃprarthita avāptyā ratiḥ samupajāyate
strīpuṃsayoḥ ca rati artham upacāraḥ vidhīyate

original: dharmārthaṃ hi tapaścaryā sukhārthaṃ dharma iṣyate /
analyzed: dharma artham hi tapaḥ caryā sukha artham dharmaḥ iṣyate

original: sukhasya mūlaṃ pramadāstāsu sambhoga iṣyate // BhN_22.148 //
analyzed: sukhasya mūlam pramadāḥ tāsu sambhogaḥ iṣyate
kāma upabhāgaḥ dvividhaḥ nāṭya dharme bhidhīyate
bāhya abhyantarataḥ ca eva nārī puruṣa saṃśrayaḥ

original: ābhyantaraḥ pārthivānāṃ sa ca kāryastu nāṭake /
analyzed: ābhyantaraḥ pārthivānām sa ca kāryaḥ tu nāṭake

original: bāhyo veśyāgataścaiva sa ca prakaraṇe bhavet // BhN_22.150 //
analyzed: bāhyaḥ veśyā gataḥ ca eva sa ca prakaraṇe bhavet
tatra rāja upabhogam tu vyākhyāsyāmi anupūrvaśas
upacāra vidhim samyak kāmatantra samutthitam
trividhā prakṛtiḥ strīṇām nānā sattva samudbhavā
bāhyā ca abhyantarā ca eva syāt bāhyā abhyantarā aparā
kulīnā abhyantarā jñeyā bāhyā veśyā aṅganā smṛtā

original: kṛtaśaucā tu yā nārī sā bāhyābhyantarā smṛtā // BhN_22.153 //
analyzed: kṛta śaucā tu yā nārī sā bāhya abhyantarā smṛtā
antaḥpura upacāre tu kula jā kanyakā api vā

original: na hi rājopacāre tu bāhyastrībhoga iṣyate // BhN_22.154 //
analyzed: na hi rāja upacāre tu bāhya strī bhogaḥ iṣyate
ābhyantaraḥ bhavet rājñaḥ bāhyaḥ bāhya janasya ca

original: divyaveśāṅganānāṃ hi rājñāṃ bhavati saṅgamaḥ // BhN_22.155 //
analyzed: divya veśa aṅganānām hi rājñām bhavati saṅgamaḥ
kula jā kāmitam yat ca tat jñeyam kanyakāsu api

original: yā cāpi veśyā sāpyatra yathaiva kulajā tathā // BhN_22.156 //
analyzed: yā ca api veśyā sā api atra yathā eva kula jā tathā
iha

original: strīṇāṃ vā puruṣāṇāṃ vā uttamādhamamadhyamā // BhN_22.157 //
analyzed: strīṇām vā puruṣāṇām vā uttama adhama madhyamā
śravaṇāt darśanāt rūpāt aṅga līlā viceṣṭitaiḥ
madhuraiḥ ca samālāpaiḥ kāmaḥ samupajāyate
rūpa guṇa ādi sametam kalā ādi vijñāna yauvana upetam

original: dṛṣṭvā puruṣaviśeṣaṃ nārī madanāturā bhavati // BhN_22.159 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā puruṣa viśeṣam nārī madana āturā bhavati
tatas kāmayamānānām nṛṇām strīṇām atha api ca
kāma abhāva iṅgitāni iha tad jñaḥ samupalakṣayet

original: lalitā calapakṣmā ca tathā ca mukulekṣaṇā /
analyzed: lalitā cala pakṣmā ca tathā ca mukula īkṣaṇā
srasta uttara puṭā ca eva kāmyā dṛṣṭiḥ bhavet iha
valita antā sa lālitya saṃmitaiḥ vyañjitaiḥ aḥ tathā

original: dṛṣṭiḥ sā lalitā nāma strīṇāmardhāvalokane] // BhN_22.161 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ sā lalitā nāma strīṇām ardha avalokane
īṣ saṃrakta gaṇḍaḥ tu sa sveda lava citritaḥ
praspandamāna romāñcaḥ mukha rāgaḥ bhavet iha
kāmyena aṅga vikāreṇa sakaṭākṣa nirīkṣitaiḥ
tathā ābharaṇa saṃsparśaiḥ karṇa kaṇḍuyanaiḥ api
aṅguṣṭha agra vilikhanaiḥ stana nābhi pradarśanaiḥ
nakha nistodanāt ca eva keśa saṃyamanāt api
veśyām evaṃvidhaiḥ bhāvaiḥ lakṣayet madana āturām
kula jāyāḥ tathā ca eva pravakṣyāmi iṅgitāni tu
prahasantī iva netrābhyām pratatam ca nirīkṣate

original: smayate sā nigūḍhaṃ ca vācaṃ cādhomukhī vadet // BhN_22.167 //
analyzed: smayate sā nigūḍham ca vācam ca adhomukhī vadet
smita uttarā manda vākyā sveda ākāra nigūhanī

original: praspanditādharā caiva cakitā ca kulāṅganā // BhN_22.168 //
analyzed: praspandita adharā ca eva cakitā ca kula aṅganā
evaṃvidhaiḥ kāma liṅgaiḥ aprāpta surata utsavā
daśa sthāna gatam kāmam nānā bhāvaiḥ pradarśayet

original: prathame tvabhilāṣaḥ syād dvitīye cintanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: prathame tu abhilāṣaḥ syāt dvitīye cintanam bhavet
anusmṛtiḥ tṛtīye tu caturthe guṇa kīrtanam

original: udvegaḥ pañcame prokto vilāpaḥ ṣaṣṭha ucyate /
analyzed: udvegaḥ pañcame proktaḥ vilāpaḥ ṣaṣṭhe ucyate
unmādaḥ saptame jñeyaḥ bhavet vyādhiḥ tathā aṣṭame

original: navame jaḍatā caiva daśame maraṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: navame jaḍa tā ca eva daśame maraṇam bhavet
strīpuṃsayoḥ eṣa vidhiḥ lakṣaṇam ca nibodhata
vyavasāyāt samārabdhaḥ saṃkalpa icchā samudbhavaḥ
samāgama upāya kṛtaḥ saḥ bhilāṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: niryāti viśati ca muhuḥ karoti cākārameva madanasya /
analyzed: niryāti viśati ca muhur karoti ca ākāram eva madanasya

original: tiṣṭhati ca darśanapathe prathamasthāne sthitā kāme // BhN_22.174 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhati ca darśana pathe prathama sthāne sthitā kāme
kena upāyena saṃprāptiḥ katham vā asau bhavet mama
dūtī niveditaiḥ bhāvaiḥ iti cintām nidarśayet
ā kekara ardha viprekṣitāni valaya raśanā parāmarśaḥ

original: nīvīnābhyāḥ saṃsparśanaṃ ca kāryaṃ dvitīye tu // BhN_22.176 //
analyzed: nīvīnābhyāḥ saṃsparśanam ca kāryam dvitīye tu
su muhur muhur niḥśvasitaiḥ manoratha vicintanaiḥ
pradveṣāt ca anya kāryāṇām anusmṛtiḥ udāhṛtā

original: naivāsane na śayane dhṛtimupalabhate svakarmaṇi vihastā /
analyzed: na eva āsane na śayane dhṛtim upalabhate sva karmaṇi vihastā
tad cintā upagata tvāt tṛtīyam eva prayuñjīta
aṅga pratyaṅga līlābhiḥ vāc ceṣṭā hasita īkṣitaiḥ
na asti anyaḥ sadṛśaḥ tena iti etat syāt guṇa kīrtanam
guṇa kīrtana ullukasanaiḥ aśru sveda apamārjanaiḥ ca api
dūtya viraha visrambhaiḥ abhinaya yogaḥ caturthe tu

original: āsane śayane cāpi na tuṣyati na tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: āsane śayane ca api na tuṣyati na tiṣṭhati
nityam evā utsukā ca syāt udvega sthānam āśritā
cintā niḥśvāsa khedena hṛd dāha abhinayena ca
kuryāt tat evam atyantam udvega abhinayena ca

original: iha sthita ihāsīna iha copagato mayā /
analyzed: iha sthitaḥ iha āsīnaḥ iha ca upagataḥ mayā
iti taiḥ taiḥ vilapitaiḥ vilāpam saṃprayojayet
udvignā atyartham autsukyāt adhṛtyā ca vilāpinī
tatas tatas ca bhramati vilāpa sthānam āśritā
tad saṃśritām kathām yuṅkte sarva avasthā gatā api hi
puṃsaḥ pradveṣṭi ca api anyān unmādaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ
tiṣṭhati animiṣa dṛṣṭiḥ dīrgham niḥśvasiti gacchati dhyānam
roditi vihāra kāle nāṭyam idam syāt tathā unmāde
sāma dāna artha saṃbhogaiḥ kāmyaiḥ saṃpreṣaṇaiḥ api
sarvaiḥ nirākṛtaiḥ paścāt vyādhiḥ samupajāyate

original: muhyati hṛdayaṃ kvāpi prayāti śirasaśca vedanā tīvrā /
analyzed: muhyati hṛdayam kvāpi prayāti śirasaḥ ca vedanā tīvrā

original: na dhṛtiṃ cāpyupalabhate hyaṣṭamamevaṃ prayuñjīta // BhN_22.188 //
analyzed: na dhṛtim ca api upalabhate hi aṣṭamam evam prayuñjīta

original: pṛṣṭā na kiñcit prabrate na śṛṇoti na paśyati /
analyzed: pṛṣṭā na kiñcid prabrate na śṛṇoti na paśyati
hākaṣṭa vākyā tūṣṇīkā jaḍa tāyām gata smṛtiḥ
akāṇḍe datta huṃkārā tathā praśithila aṅgikā
śvāsa grasta ānanā ca eva jaḍa tā abhinaye bhavet
sarvaiḥ kṛtaiḥ pratīkāraiḥ yadī na asti samāgamaḥ

original: kāmāgninā pradīptāyā jāyate maraṇaṃ tataḥ // BhN_22.191 //
analyzed: kāma agninā pradīptāyāḥ jāyate maraṇam tatas

original: evaṃ sthānāni kāryāṇi kāmatantraṃ samīkṣya tu /
analyzed: evam sthānāni kāryāṇi kāmatantram samīkṣya tu

original: aprāptau yāni kāmasya varjayitvā tu naidhanam // BhN_22.192 //
analyzed: aprāptau yāni kāmasya varjayitvā tu naidhanam
vividhaiḥ puruṣaḥ pi evam vipralambha samudbhavaiḥ
bhāvaiḥ etāni kāmasya nānā rūpāṇi yojayet
evam kāmayamānānām strīṇām nṛṇām atha api vā
sāmānya guṇa yogena yuñjīta abhinayam budhaḥ
cintā niḥśvāsa khedena hṛd dāha abhinayena ca
tathā anugam annāt ca api tathā eva adhva nirīkṣaṇāt
ākāśa vīkṣaṇāt ca api tathā dīna prabhāṣaṇāt
sparśanāt moṭanāt ca api tathā sa apāśraya āśrayāt
ebhiḥ nānā āśraya utpannaiḥ vipralambha samudbhavaiḥ
kāmasthānāni sarvāṇi bhūyiṣṭham samprayojayet
srajaḥ bhūṣaṇa gandhān ca gṛhāṇi upavanāni ca
kāma agninā dahyamānaḥ śītalāni niṣevate
pradahyamānaḥ kāma ārtaḥ bahu sthānasa marditaḥ
preṣayet kāmatas dūtīm ātma avasthā pradarśinīm
sandeśam ca eva dūtyāḥ tu pradadyāt madana āśrayam
tasya iyam samavasthā iti kathayet vinayena sā
atha āvedita bhāva arthaḥ rati upāyam vicintayet
ayam vidhiḥ vidhāna jñaiḥ kāryaḥ pracchanna kāmite
vidhim rāja upacārasya punar vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ
abhyantara gatam samyak kāma tantra samutthitam
sukha duḥkha kṛtān bhāvān nānā śīla samutthitān

original: yānyān prakurute rājā tānstān lokānuvartate // BhN_22.203 //
analyzed: yān yān prakurute rājā tān stān lokān anuvartate
na durlabhāḥ pārthivānām strī artham ājñā kṛtāḥ guṇāḥ

original: dākṣiṇyāttu samudbhūtaḥ kāmo ratikaro bhavet // BhN_22.204 //
analyzed: dākṣiṇyāt tu samudbhūtaḥ kāmaḥ rati karaḥ bhavet
bahu mānena devīnām vallabhānām bhayena ca

original: pracchannakāmitaṃ rājñā kāryaṃ parijanaṃ prati // BhN_22.205 //
analyzed: pracchanna kāmitam rājñā kāryam parijanam prati
yadi api asti narendrāṇām kāmatantram anekadhā

original: pracchannākāmitaṃ yattu tadvai ratikaraṃ bhavet // BhN_22.206 //
analyzed: pracchanna a kāmitam yat tu tat vai rati karam bhavet
yat vāma abhiniveśi tvam yatas ca vinivāryate

original: durlabhatvaṃ ca yannāryāḥ sā kāmasya parā ratiḥ // BhN_22.207 //
analyzed: durlabha tvam ca yat nāryāḥ sā kāmasya parā ratiḥ
rājñām antaḥpura jane divā sambhogaḥ iṣyate

original: vāsoapacāro yaścaiaṣāṃ sa rātrau parikīrtitaḥ // BhN_22.208 //
analyzed: vāsaḥ apacāraḥ sa rātrau parikīrtitaḥ

original: paripāṭyāṃ phalārthe vā nave prasava eva vā /
analyzed: paripāṭyām phala arthe vā nave prasave eva vā

original: duḥkhe caiva pramode ca ṣaḍete vāsakāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_22.209 //
analyzed: duḥkhe ca eva pramode ca ṣaṭ ete vāsakāḥ smṛtāḥ
ucite vāsake strīnām ṛtu kāle vā nṛpaiḥ
preṣyāṇām athavā iṣṭānām kāryam ca eva upasarpaṇam
tatra vāsaka sajjā ca viraha utkaṇṭhitā api vā
svādhīna bhartṛkā ca api kalaha antaritā api vā
khaṇḍitā vipralabdhā vā tathā proṣita bhartṛkā

original: tathābhisārikā caiva jñeyāstvaṣṭau tu nayikāḥ // BhN_22.212 //
analyzed: tathā abhisārikā ca eva jñeyāḥ tu aṣṭau tu nayikāḥ
ucite yā tu rati saṃbhoga lālasā

original: maṇḍanaṃ kurute hṛṣṭā sā vai vāsakasajjikā // BhN_22.213 //
analyzed: maṇḍanam kurute hṛṣṭā sā vai vāsakasajjikā
aneka kārya vyāsaṅgāt yasyāḥ na āgacchati priyaḥ
tad anāgata duḥkha ārtā viraha utkaṇṭhitā tu sā
surata ati rasaiḥ baddhaḥ yasyāḥ pārśve tu nāyakaḥ
sāndra āmoda guṇa prāptā bhavet svādhīna bhartṛkā
īrṣyā kalaha niṣkrāntaḥ yasyāḥ nā āgacchati priyaḥ
sā amarṣa vaśa saṃprāptā kalaha antaritā bhavet
vyāsaṅgāt ucite yasyāḥ vāsake na āgataḥ priyaḥ
tad anāgama duḥkha ārtā khaṇḍitā sā prakīrtitā

original: yasyā dūtīṃ priyaḥ preṣya dattvā saṃketameva vā /
analyzed: yasyāḥ dūtīm priyaḥ preṣya dattvā saṃketam eva vā

original: nāgataḥ kāraṇeneha vipralabdhā tu sā bhavet // BhN_22.218 //
analyzed: na agataḥ kāraṇena iha vipralabdhā tu sā bhavet

original: nānākāryāṇi sandhāya yasyā vai proṣitaḥ priyaḥ /
analyzed: nānā kāryāṇi sandhāya yasyāḥ vai proṣitaḥ priyaḥ
sā ārūḍha alaka keśāntā bhavet proṣita bhartṛkā

original: hitvā lajjāṃ tu yā śliṣṭā madena madanena ca /
analyzed: hitvā lajjām tu yā śliṣṭā madena madanena ca
abhisārayate kāntam sā bhavet abhisārikā
āsu avasthāsu vijñeyā nāyikā nāṭaka āśrayā
etāsām ca eva vakṣyāmi kāmatantram anekadhā
cintā niḥśvāsa khedena hṛd dāha abhinayena ca
sakhībhiḥ saha saṃlāpaiḥ ātma avasthā avalokanaiḥ
glāni dainya aśru pātaiḥ ca roṣasya āgamanena ca
nirbhūṣaṇa mṛjā tvena duḥkhena ruditena ca
khaṇḍitā vipralabdhā vā kalaha antaritā api vā

original: tathā proṣitakāntā ca bhāvānetān prayojayet // BhN_22.224 //
analyzed: tathā proṣita kāntā ca bhāvān etān prayojayet
vicitra ujjvala veṣā tu pramoda udyotita ānanā

original: udīrṇaśobhā ca tathā kāryā svādhīnabhartṛkā // BhN_22.225 //
analyzed: udīrṇa śobhā ca tathā kāryā svādhīna bhartṛkā
veśyāyāḥ kula jāyāyāḥ ca preṣyāyāḥ ca prayoktṛbhiḥ
ebhiḥ bhāva viśeṣaiḥ tu kartavyam abhisāraṇam
sa madā mṛdu ceṣṭā ca tathā parijana āvṛtā
nānā ābharaṇa citra aṅgī gacchet veśyā aṅganā śanais
saṃlīnā sveṣu gātreṣu trastā vinamita ānanā
avakuṇṭhana saṃvitā hacchet tu kula ja aṅganā
mada skhalita saṃlāpā vibhrama utphulla locanā
āviddha gati saṃcārā gacchet preṣyā samuddhatam

original: gatvā sā cedyadā tatra paśyetsuptaṃ priyaṃ tadā /
analyzed: gatvā sā ced yadā tatra paśyet suptam priyam tadā
anena tu upacāreṇa tasya kuryāt prabodhanam
alaṅkāreṇa kula jāḥ veśyāḥ gandhaiḥ tu śītalaiḥ

original: preṣyā tu vastravyajanaiḥ kurvīta pratibodhanam // BhN_22.231 //
analyzed: preṣyā tu vastra vyajanaiḥ kurvīta pratibodhanam
kula aṅganānām eva ayam na uktaḥ kāma āśrayaḥ vidhiḥ
sarva avasthā anubhāvyam hi yasmāt bhavati nāṭakam
nava kāma pravṛttāyāḥ kruddhāyāḥ vā samāgame
sa apadeśaiḥ upāyaiḥ tu vāsakam saṃprayojayet
nānā alaṅkara vastrāṇi gandha mālyāni ca eva hi
priya yojita bhuktāni niṣeveta mudā anvitaḥ

original: na tathā bhavati manuṣyo madanavaśaḥ kāminīmalabhamānaḥ /
analyzed: na tathā bhavati manuṣyaḥ madana vaśaḥ kāminīm alabhamānaḥ

original: dviguṇopajātaharṣo bhavati yatha saṅgataḥ priyayā // BhN_22.235 //
analyzed: dviguṇa upajāta harṣaḥ bhavati saṅgataḥ priyayā
vilāsa bhāva iṅgita vākya līlā mādhurya vistāra guṇa upapannaḥ
paraspara prema nirīkṣitena samāgamaḥ kāma kṛtaḥ tu kāryaḥ
tatas pravṛtte madane upacāra samudbhave
vāsa upacāraḥ kartavyaḥ nāyaka āgamanam prati
gandha mālye gṛhītvā tu cūrṇa vāsaḥ tathā eva ca

original: ādarśo līlayā gṛhyaśchandato vā punaḥ punaḥ // BhN_22.238 //
analyzed: ādarśaḥ līlayā gṛhyaḥ chandataḥ vā punar punar
vāsa upacāre na atyartham bhūṣaṇa grahaṇam bhavet
raśanā nūpura prāyam svanavat ca praśasyate

original: nāmbaragrahaṇaṃ raṅge na snānaṃ na vilepanam /
analyzed: na ambara grahaṇam raṅge na snānam na vilepanam
na añjanam na aṅga rāgaḥ ca keśa saṃyamanam tathā
na aprāvṛttāḥ na eka vastrāḥ na rāgam adharasya tu

original: uttamā madhyamā vāpi kurvīta pramadā kvacit // BhN_22.241 //
analyzed: uttamā madhyamā vā api kurvīta pramadā kvacid

original: adhamānāṃ bhavedeṣa sarva eva vidhiḥ sadā /
analyzed: adhamānām bhavet eṣa sarvaḥ eva vidhiḥ sadā
kāraṇa antaram āsādya tasmāt api na kārayet

original: preṣyādīnāṃ ca nārīṇāṃ narāṇāṃ vāpi nāṭake /
analyzed: preṣya ādīnām ca nārīṇām narāṇām vā api nāṭake
bhūṣaṇa grahaṇam kāryam puṣpa grahaṇam eva ca
gṛhīta maṇḍanā ca api pratīkṣeta priya āgamam

original: līlayā maṇḍitaṃ veṣaṃ kuryādyanna virudhyate // BhN_22.244 //
analyzed: līlayā maṇḍitam veṣam kuryāt yat na virudhyate
vidhivat vāsakam kuryāt nāyikā nāyaka āgame
pratīkṣamāṇā ca tatas nālikā śabdam ādiśet
śrutvā tu nālikā śabdam nāyaka āgama viklavā

original: viṣaṇṇā vepamānā ca gacchettoraṇameva ca // BhN_22.246 //
analyzed: viṣaṇṇā vepamānā ca gacchet toraṇam eva ca
toraṇam vāma hastena kavāṭam dakṣiṇena ca
gṛhītvā toraṇa āśliṣṭā saṃpratīkṣeta nāyakam
śaṅkām cintām bhayam ca eva prakuryāt toraṇa āśritā

original: adṛṣṭvā ramaṇaṃ nārī viṣaṇṇā ca kṣaṇaṃ bhavet // BhN_22.248 //
analyzed: a dṛṣṭvā ramaṇam nārī viṣaṇṇā ca kṣaṇam bhavet
dīrgham ca eva viniḥśvasya nayana ambu nipātayet

original: sannaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ kṛtvā visṛjetadaṅgamāsane // BhN_22.249 //
analyzed: sannam ca hṛdayam kṛtvā visṛjeta aṅgam āsane
vyākṣepāt vimṛśet ca api nāyaka āgamanam prati
taiḥ taiḥ vicāraṇā upāyaiḥ śubha aśubha samutthitaiḥ
guru kāryeṇa mitraiḥ vā mantriṇā rājya cintayā

original: anubaddhaḥ priyaṃ kiṃ nu vṛto vallabhayāpi vā // BhN_22.251 //
analyzed: anubaddhaḥ priyam kim nu vṛtaḥ vallabhayā api vā
utpātān nirdiśet ca api śubha aśubha samutthitān
nimitaiḥ ātma saṃsthaiḥ tu sphuritaiḥ tathā

original: śobhaneṣu tu kāryeṣu nimittaṃ vāmataḥ striyāḥ /
analyzed: śobhaneṣu tu kāryeṣu nimittam vāmatas striyāḥ

original: aniṣṭeṣvatha sarveṣu nimittaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ bhavet // BhN_22.253 //
analyzed: aniṣṭeṣu atha sarveṣu nimittam dakṣiṇam bhavet

original: savyaṃ netraṃ lalāṭaṃ ca bhrūnāsoṣṭhaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: savyam netram lalāṭam ca bhrū nāsā uṣṭham tathā eva ca
uru bāhu stanam ca eva sphuret yadi samāgamaḥ
eteṣam anyathābhāve durnimittam vinirdiśet

original: darśane durnimittasya mohaṃ gacchetkṣaṇaṃ tataḥ // BhN_22.255 //
analyzed: darśane durnimittasya moham gacchet kṣaṇam tatas
anāgame nāyakasya kāryaḥ gaṇḍa āśrayaḥ karaḥ

original: bhūṣaṇe cāpyavajñānaṃ rodanaṃ ca samācaret // BhN_22.256 //
analyzed: bhūṣaṇe ca api avajñānam rodanam ca samācaret
atha ced śobhanam tat syāt nimittam nāyaka āgame
sūcyaḥ nāyikayā āsannaḥ gandha āghrāṇena nāyakaḥ
dṛṣṭvā ca utthāya saṃhṛṣṭā pratyudgacchet yathāvidhi
tatas kāntam nirīkṣeta praharṣa utphulla locanā
sakhī skandha arpita karā kṛtvā sthānakam āyatam

original: darśayeta tataḥ kāntaṃ sacihnaṃ sarasavraṇam // BhN_22.159 //
analyzed: darśayeta tatas kāntam sa cihnam sa rasa vraṇam
yadi syāt aparāddhaḥ tu kṛtaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ upakramaiḥ
upālambha kṛataiḥ vākyaiḥ upālabhyaḥ tu nāyakaḥ
māna apamāna saṃmohaiḥ avahittha bhaya kramaiḥ
vacanasya samutpattiḥ strīṇām īrṣyā kṛtā bhavet
visraṃbha sneha rāgeṣu sandehe praṇaye tathā

original: paritoṣe ca gharṣe ca dākṣiṇyākṣepavibhrame // BhN_22.262 //
analyzed: paritoṣe ca gharṣe ca dākṣiṇya ākṣepa vibhrame
dharma artha kāma yogeṣu pracchanna vacaneṣu ca

original: hāsye kutūhale caiva saṃbhrame vyasane tathā // BhN_22.263 //
analyzed: hāsye kutūhale ca eva saṃbhrame vyasane tathā
strīpuṃsayoḥ krodha kṛte pṛthak miśre tathā api vā

original: anābhāṣyo 'pi saṃbhāṣyaḥ priya ebhistu kāraṇaiḥ // BhN_22.264 //
analyzed: an ābhāṣyaḥ u pi saṃbhāṣyaḥ priyaḥ ebhiḥ tu kāraṇaiḥ
yatra snehaḥ bhavet tatra hi īrṣyā madana saṃbhavā
catasraḥ yonayaḥ tasyāḥ kīrtyamānāḥ nibodhata

original: vaimanasyaṃ vyalīkaṃ ca vipriyaṃ manyureva ca /
analyzed: vaimanasyam vyalīkam ca vipriyam manyuḥ eva ca
eteṣām saṃpravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni yathākramam
nidrā kheda alasa gatim sa cihnam sa rasa vraṇam

original: evavidhaṃ priyaṃ dṛṣṭvā vaimanasyaṃ bhavet striyāḥ // BhN_22.267 //
analyzed: evavidham priyam dṛṣṭvā vaimanasyam bhavet striyāḥ
nidrā abhyasūyi tā avekṣaṇena roṣa prakampamāna aṅgyā

original: sādhviti suṣṭhviti vacanaiḥ śobhata ityevamabhineyam // BhN_22.268 //
analyzed: sādhu iti suṣṭhu iti vacanaiḥ śobhate iti evam abhineyam
bahudhā vāryamāṇaḥ pi yaḥ tasmin eva dṛśyate
saṃgharṣa matsarāt tatra vyalīkam jāyate striyāḥ
kṛtvā urasi vāma karam dakṣiṇa hastam tathā vidhunvantyā

original: caraṇaviniṣṭhambhena ca kāryo 'bhinayo vyalīke tu // BhN_22.270 //
analyzed: caraṇa viniṣṭhambhena ca kāryaḥ bhinayaḥ vyalīke tu

original: jīvantyā tvayi jīvāmi dāso 'haṃ tvaṃ ca me priyā /
analyzed: jīvantyā tvayi jīvāmi dāsaḥ ham tvam ca me priyā

original: uktvaivaṃ yo 'nyathā kuryādvipriyaṃ tatra jāyate // BhN_22.271 //
analyzed: uktvā evam yaḥ nyathā kuryāt vipriyam tatra jāyate
dūtī lekha prativacana bhedanaiḥ krodha hasita ruditaiḥ ca
vipriya karaṇe bhinayaḥ sa śiraḥ kampaiḥ ca kartavyaḥ
pratipakṣa sakāśāt tu yaḥ saubhāgya vikatthanaḥ
upasarpet sacid hnaḥ tu manyuḥ tatra upajāyate
valaya parivartanaiḥ atha su śithalam utkṣepeṇa ina raśanāyāḥ
manyuḥ tu abhinetavyaḥ sa śaṅkitam bāṣpa pūrṇa akṣyā
dṛṣṭvā sthitam priyatamam sa śaṅkitam sa aparādham ati lajjam
īrṣyā vacana samutthaiḥ khedayitavyaḥ hi upālambhaiḥ

original: na ca niṣṭhuramabhibhāṣyo na cāpyatikrodhanastu parihāsaḥ /
analyzed: na ca niṣṭhuram abhibhāṣyaḥ na ca api ati krodhanaḥ tu parihāsaḥ
bāṣpa unmiśraiḥ vacanaiḥ ātma upanyāsa saṃyuktaiḥ
madhyāṅguli aṅguṣṭha agra vicyavāt pāṇinā urasi kṛtena
udvartita netra tayā pratataiḥ abhivīkṣaṇaiḥ ca api
kaṭi hasta vivartanayā vicchinna tayā tathā añjaleḥ karaṇāt
mūrdha bhramaṇa nihañcita nipāta saṃśleaṣṇāt ca api
avahittha vīkṣaṇāt vā aṅguli bhaṅgena tarjanaiḥ lalitaiḥ
ebhiḥ bhāva viśeṣaiḥ anunayaneṣu abhinayaḥ kāryaḥ

original: śobhase sādhu dṛṣṭo 'si gaccha tvaṃ kiṃṃ vilambase /
analyzed: śobhase sādhu dṛṣṭaḥ si gaccha tvam kim vilambase

original: mā māṃ sprākṣīḥ priyā yatra tatra yā te hṛdi sthitā // BhN_22.280 //
analyzed: mā mām sprākṣīḥ priyā yatra tatra yā te hṛdi sthitā
gaccha iti uktvā parāvṛtya vinivṛtta antareṇa tu
kenacid vacana arthena praharṣam yojayet punar
rabhasa grahaṇāt ca api haste vastre ca mūrdhani

original: kāryaṃ prasādanaṃ nāryā hyaparādhaṃ samīkṣya tu // BhN_22.282 //
analyzed: kāryam prasādanam nāryāḥ hi aparādham samīkṣya tu
haste vastre keśānte nāryā api atha gṛhītayā
kāntam evā upasarpantyā kartavyam mokṣaṇam śanais
gṛhītāya atha keśānte haste vastre punar

original: huṃ muñcetyupasarpantyā vācyaḥ sparśālasaṃ priyaḥ // BhN_22.284 //
analyzed: hum muñca iti upasarpantyā vācyaḥ sparśa alasam priyaḥ
pāda agra sthitayā nāryā kiṃcid kuṭṭamita utkaṭam

original: aśvakrāntena kartavyaṃ keśānāṃ mokṣaṇaṃ śanaiḥ // BhN_22.285 //
analyzed: aśvakrāntena kartavyam keśānām mokṣaṇam śanais
amucyamāne keśānte saṃjāta sveda leśayā

original: haṃ hu muñcāpasarpeti vācyaḥ sparśālasāṅgayā // BhN_22.286 //
analyzed: haṃ hu muñca apasarpa iti vācyaḥ sparśa alasa aṅgayā
gaccha iti roṣa vākyena gatvā pratinivṛtya ca

original: kenacidvacanārthena vācyaṃ yāsyasi neti ca // BhN_22.287 //
analyzed: kenacid vacana arthena vācyam yāsyasi nā iti ca
vidhūnanena hastena huṃkāram saṃprayojayet

original: sa cāvadhūnane kāryaḥ śapathairvyāja eva ca // BhN_22.288 //
analyzed: sa ca avadhūnane kāryaḥ śapathaiḥ vyājaḥ eva ca
akṣṇoḥ saṃvaraṇe kāryam pṛṣṭhatas ca upagūhanam
nāryāḥ tu apahṛte vastre dīpa chādanam eva ca
tāvat khedayitavyaḥ tu yāvat pāda gataḥ bhavet
tatas caraṇayoḥ yāte kuryāt dūtī nirīkṣaṇam
utthāpya āliṅgayet ca eva nāyikā nāyakam tatas
rati bhoga gatā hṛṣṭā śayana abhimukhī vrajet
etat gīta vidhānena sukumāreṇa yojayet
yadā śṛṅgāra saṃyuktam rati sambhoga kāraṇam
yadā ca ākāśa puruṣa para stha vacana āśrayam

original: bhavetkāvyaṃ tadā hyeṣa kartavyo 'bhinayaḥ striyā // BhN_22.293 //
analyzed: bhavet kāvyam tadā hi eṣa kartavyaḥ bhinayaḥ striyā
yat anta pura sambandham kāryam bhavati nāṭake
śṛṅgāra rasa saṃyuktam tatra api eṣa vidhiḥ bhavet

original: na kāryaṃ śayanaṃ raṅge nāṭyadharmaṃ vijānatā /
analyzed: na kāryam śayanam raṅge nāṭya dharmam vijānatā
kenacid vacana arthena aṅka chedaḥ vidhīyate
yat vā śayīta artha vaśāt ekākī vā

original: cumbanāliṅganaṃ caiva tatha guhyaṃ ca yadbhavet // BhN_22.296 //
analyzed: cumbana āliṅganam ca eva guhyam ca yat bhavet
danta chedyam nakha chedyam nīvī sraṃsanam eva ca

original: stanāntaravimardaṃ ca raṅgamadhye na kārayet // BhN_22.297 //
analyzed: stanāntara vimardam ca raṅga madhye na kārayet

original: bhojanaṃ salilakrīḍā tathā lajjākaraṃ ca yat /
analyzed: bhojanam salila krīḍā tathā lajjā karam ca yat
evaṃvidham bhavet yat yat tat tat raṅge na kārayet
pitā putra snuṣā śvaśrū dṛśyam yasmāt tu nāṭakam
tasmāt etāni sarvāṇi varjanīyāni yatnataḥ
vākyaiḥ sa atiśayaiḥ śravyaiḥ madhuraiḥ na ati niṣṭhuraiḥ
hita upadeśa saṃyuktaiḥ tad jñaḥ kuryāt tu nāṭakam
evam antaḥpura kṛtaḥ kāryaḥ tu abhinayaḥ budhaḥ
samāgame nārīṇām vācyāni madana āśraye
priyeṣu vacanāni iha yāni tāni nibodhata

original: priayaḥ kānto vinītaśca nāthaḥ svāmyatha jīvitam // BhN_22.302 //
analyzed: kāntaḥ vinītaḥ ca nāthaḥ svāmī atha jīvitam
nandanaḥ ca iti abhiprīte vacanāni bhavanti hi

original: duḥśīlo 'tha durācāraḥ śaṭho vāmo vikatthanaḥ // BhN_22.303 //
analyzed: duḥśīlaḥ tha durācāraḥ śaṭhaḥ vāmaḥ vikatthanaḥ
nirlajjaḥ niṣṭhuraḥ ca eava priyaḥ krodhe bhidhīyate

original: yo vipriyaṃ na kurute na cāyuktaṃ prabhāṣate // BhN_22.304 //
analyzed: yaḥ vipriyam na kurute na ca ayuktam prabhāṣate

original: anyanārīsamudbhūtaṃ cihnaṃ yasya na dṛṣyate // BhN_22.305 //
analyzed: anya nārī samudbhūtam cihnam yasya na dṛṣyate

original: adhare vā śarīre vā sa kānta iti bhāṣyate /
analyzed: adhare vā śarīre vā sa kāntaḥ iti bhāṣyate

original: saṃkruddhe 'pi hi yo nāryā nottaraṃ pratipadyate // BhN_22.306 //
analyzed: saṃkruddhe hi yaḥ na āryāḥ na uttaram pratipadyate

original: paruṣaṃ vā na vadati vinītaḥ sā'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: paruṣam vā na vadati vinītaḥ sā abhidhīyate

original: hitaiṣī rakṣaṇe śakto na mānī na ca matsarī // BhN_22.307 //
analyzed: hita eṣī rakṣaṇe śaktaḥ na mānī na ca matsarī
sarva kāryeṣu asaṃmūḍhaḥ sa nāthaḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
sāma dāna artha saṃbhogaiḥ tathā lālana pālanaiḥ
nārīm niṣevate yaḥ tu sa svāmī iti abhidhīyate

original: karoti yastu saṃbhoge sa jīvitamiti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: karoti yaḥ tu saṃbhoge sa jīvitam iti smṛtaḥ
kulīnaḥ dhṛtimān dakṣaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ vāc viśāradaḥ
ślāghanīyaḥ sakhī madhye nandanaḥ saḥ abhidhīyate
ete vacana vinyāsāḥ rati prīti karāḥ smṛtāḥ
tathā ca aprīti vākyāni gadataḥ me nibodhata
niṣṭhuraḥ ca ahiṣṇuḥ ca māni dhṛṣṭaḥ vikatthanaḥ
anavasthita cittaḥ ca duḥśīlaḥ iti sa smṛtaḥ

original: tāḍanaṃ bandhanaṃ cāpi yo vimṛśya samācaret // BhN_22.313 //
analyzed: tāḍanam bandhanam ca api yaḥ vimṛśya samācaret

original: vācaiava madhuro yastu karmaṇa nopapādakaḥ // BhN_22.314 //
analyzed: madhuraḥ yaḥ tu karmaṇa na upapādakaḥ

original: vāryate yatra yatrārthe tattadeva karoti yaḥ // BhN_22.315 //
analyzed: vāryate yatra yatra arthe tat tat eva karoti yaḥ

original: viparītaniveśī ca sa vāma iti saṃjñitaḥ /
analyzed: viparīta niveśī ca sa vāmaḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ

original: atimānī tathā stabdho vikatthana iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: atimānī tathā stabdhaḥ vikatthanaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: sacihnāḥ sāparādhaśca sa nirlajja iti smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sa cihnāḥ sa aparādhaḥ ca sa nirlajjaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
parāddhaḥ tu sahasā nārīm sevitum icchati
a prasādana buddhiḥ ca niṣṭhuraḥ saḥ abhidhīyate
ete vacana vinyāsāḥ priya apriya vibhāṣitāḥ
nartakī saṃśritāḥ kāryāḥ bahavaḥ nye nāṭake

original: eṣa gītavidhāne tu sukumāre vidhirbhavet // BhN_22.320 //
analyzed: eṣa gīta vidhāne tu sukumāre vidhiḥ bhavet
yat ca eva ākāśapuruṣam para stha vacana āśrayam

original: śṛṅgāra evaṃ vācyaṃ syāttatrāpyeṣa kramo bhavet /
analyzed: śṛṅgāraḥ evam vācyam syāt tatra api eṣa kramaḥ bhavet

original: yadvā purusaṃbandhaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati nāṭake // BhN_22.322 //
analyzed: yat vā puru saṃbandham kāryam bhavati nāṭake
śṛṅgāra rasa saṃyuktam tatra api eṣa kramaḥ bhavet
evam antaḥpura gataḥ prayojyaḥ bhinayaḥ bhavet

original: nityamevojvalo veṣo nityaṃ pramuditaṃ manaḥ // BhN_22.324 //
analyzed: nityam eva ujvalaḥ veṣaḥ nityam pramuditam manaḥ

original: na cairṣyā naiva ca krodho nāsūyā na prasādanam // BhN_22.325 //
analyzed: na ca erṣyā nā eva ca krodhaḥ nā asūyā na prasādanam

original: divyānāṃ dṛṣyate puṃsāṃ śṛṅgāre yoṣitāṃ tathā /
analyzed: divyānām dṛṣyate puṃsām śṛṅgāre yoṣitām tathā

original: ye bhāvā mānuṣāṇāṃ syuryadaṅgaṃ yacca ceṣṭitam // BhN_22.326 //
analyzed: ye bhāvāḥ mānuṣāṇām syuḥ yat aṅgam yat ca ceṣṭitam

original: yadā mānuṣasaṃbhogo divyānāṃ yoṣitāṃ bhavat // BhN_22.327 //
analyzed: yadā mānuṣa saṃbhogaḥ divyānām yoṣitām bhavat

original: tadā sarvāḥ prakartavyā ye bhāvā mānuṣāśrayāḥ /
analyzed: tadā sarvāḥ prakartavyāḥ ye bhāvāḥ mānuṣa āśrayāḥ
śāpa bhraṃśāt tu divyānām tathā ca apatya lipsayā
kāryaḥ mānuṣa saṃyogaḥ śṛṅgāra rasa saṃśrayaḥ
puṣpaiḥ bhūṣaṇa jaiḥ śabdaiḥ adṛśyā api pralobhayet
punar saṃdarśanam dattvā kṣaṇāt antaritā bhavet
vastra ābharaṇa mālya ādyaiḥ lekha saṃpreṣaṇaiḥ api
īdṛśaiḥ upacāraiḥ tu samunmādyaḥ tu nāyakaḥ
unmādanāt samudbhūtaḥ kāmaḥ rati karaḥ bhavet
svabhāva upagataḥ yaḥ tu na asau atyartha bhāvikaḥ
evam rāja upacāraḥ hi kartavyaḥ bhyantara āśrayaḥ

original: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre sāmānyābhinayo nāmādhyāyo dvāviṃśaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre sāmānyābhinayaḥ nāma adhyāyaḥ dvāviṃśaḥ
atha trayoviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
viśeṣayet kalāḥ sarvāḥ yasmāt tasmāt tu vaiśikaḥ
veśa upacāre sādhuḥ vā vaiśikaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
yaḥ hi sarva kalā upetaḥ sarva śilpa vicakṣaṇaḥ
strī citta grahaṇa abhijñaḥ vaiśikaḥ sa bhavet pumān
guṇaḥ tasya tu vijñeyāḥ sva śarīra samutthitāḥ
āhāryāḥ sahajāḥ ca eva trayastriṃśat samāsatas
śāstra vid śilpa saṃpannaḥ rūpavān priya darśanaḥ
vikrāntaḥ dhṛtimān ca eva vayaḥ veṣa kula anvitaḥ

original: aśaṅkitaḥ priyābhāṣī caturaḥ śubhadaḥ śuciḥ // BhN_23.5 //
analyzed: a śaṅkitaḥ priya ābhāṣī caturaḥ śubha daḥ śuciḥ
kāma upacāra kuśalaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ deśa kāla vid

original: adīnavākyaḥ smitavān vāgmī dakṣaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ // BhN_23.6 //
analyzed: adīna vākyaḥ smitavān vāgmī dakṣaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ
strī lubdhāḥ saṃvibhāgī ca śraddha dhānaḥ dṛḍha smṛtiḥ

original: gamyāsu cāpyavisrambhī mānī ceti hi vaiśikaḥ // BhN_23.7 //
analyzed: gamyāsu ca api avisrambhī mānī ca iti hi vaiśikaḥ
anuyuktaḥ śuciḥ dakṣaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ pratipattimān
bhavet citra abhidhāyī ca vayasyaḥ tasya tad guṇaḥ

original: prātiveśyā sakhī dāsī kumārī kāruśilpinī // BhN_23.9 //
analyzed: prātiveśyā sakhī dāsī kumārī kāru śilpinī
dhātrī pāṣaṇḍinī ca eva tathā raṅgopajīvinī

original: na jaḍaṃ rūpasampannaṃ nārthavantaṃ na cāturam // BhN_23.12 //

original: na cākāmapravṛttāyāḥ kṛddhāyā vāpi saṅgamaḥ // BhN_23.14 //

original: dhātrigṛheṣu sakhyā vā tathā caiva nimantraṇe /
analyzed: dhātri gṛheṣu sakhyāḥ vā tathā ca eva nimantraṇe
vyādhita vyapadeśena śunī āgāra niveśane

original: evaṃ samāgamaṃ kṛtvā sopāyaṃ vidhipūrvakam // BhN_23.17 //
analyzed: evam samāgamam kṛtvā sa upāyam vidhi pūrvakam

original: karoti nibhṛtāṃ līlāṃ nityaṃ sā madanāturā /

original: sakhīmadhye guṇān brūte svadhanaṃ ca prayacchati // BhN_23.19 //

original: gamāgame sakhīnāṃ yā hṛṣṭā bhavati cādhikam // BhN_23.20 //

original: supte tu paścāt svapiti cumbitā praticumbati // BhN_23.21 //
analyzed: supte tu paścāt svapiti cumbitā praticumbati

original: uttiṣṭhatyapi pūrvaṃ ca tathā kleśasahāpi ca /

original: utsave muditā yā ca vyasane yā ca duḥkhitā // BhN_23.22 //
analyzed: utsave muditā yā ca vyasane yā ca duḥkhitā
evaṃvidhaiḥ guṇaiḥ yuktā tu anuraktā tu sā smṛtā

iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre trayoviṃśaḥ

samāsatas tu prakṛtiḥ trividhā parikīrtitā

rūkṣa vācaḥ tha duḥśīlāḥ ku sattvāḥ sthūla buddhayaḥ
krodhana āghātakāḥ ca eva mitra ghnāḥ chidra māninaḥ
piśunāḥ tu uddhataiḥ vākyaiḥ akṛtajñāḥ tathā alasāḥ

sūcakāḥ pāpa karmāṇaḥ para dravya apahāriṇaḥ
ebhiḥ doṣaiḥ tu saṃpannāḥ bhavanti iha adhamāḥ narāḥ

original: evaṃ tu śīlato nṝṇāṃ prakṛtistrividhā smṛtā /

strīṇām punar ca prakṛtim vyākhyāsyāmi anupūrvaśas

original: gurūṇāṃ vacane dakṣā salajjā vinayānvitā // BhN_24.9 //

rūpa abhijana mādhuryaiḥ guṇaiḥ svābhāvikeḥ yutā

original: alpadoṣānuviddhā ca madhyamā prakṛtiḥ smṛtā // BhN_24.11 //
analyzed: alpa doṣa anuviddhā ca madhyamā prakṛtiḥ smṛtā
adhamā prakṛtiḥ yā tu puruṣāṇām prakīrtitā

napuṃsakaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ saṃkīrṇaḥ dhamaḥ eva ca

original: saṃkīrṇāste 'pi vijñeyā hyadhamā nāṭake budhaiḥ // BhN_24.14 //
analyzed: saṃkīrṇāḥ te vijñeyāḥ hi adhamāḥ nāṭake budhaiḥ

original: āsāṃ tu saṃpravakṣyāmi vidhānaṃ śīlasaṃśrayam // BhN_24.15 //
analyzed: āsām tu saṃpravakṣyāmi vidhānam śīla saṃśrayam
atra catvāraḥ eva syuḥ nāyakāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
madhyama uttama prakṛtau nānā lakṣaṇa lakṣitāḥ

dhīra praśāntakāḥ ca eva nāyakāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
devāḥ dhīra uddhatāḥ jñeyāḥ syuḥ dhīra lalitāḥ nṛpāḥ
senāpatiḥ amātyaḥ ca dhīra udāttau prakīrtitau
dhīra praśāntāḥ vijñeyāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vāṇijaḥ tathā
eteṣām tu punar jñeyāḥ catvāraḥ tu vidūṣakaḥ
liṃgī dvijaḥ rāja jīvī śiṣyaḥ ca iti yathākramam
