original: vyasanī prāpya duḥkhaṃ vā yujyate 'bhyudayena yaḥ // BhN_24.21 //
analyzed: vyasanī prāpya duḥkham vā yujyate bhyudayena yaḥ
tathā puruṣam āhuḥ tam pradhānam nāyakam budhāḥ

original: sapuṣṭau yatra tau syātāṃ na bhavettatra nāyakaḥ /
analyzed: sa puṣṭau yatra tau syātām na bhavet tatra nāyakaḥ

original: divyā ca nṛpapatnī ca kulastrī gaṇikā tathā // BhN_24.23 //
analyzed: divyā ca nṛpa patnī ca kula strī gaṇikā tathā

original: dhīrā ca lalitā ca syādudāttā nibhṛtā tathā // BhN_24.24 //
analyzed: dhīrā ca lalitā ca syāt udāttā nibhṛtā tathā

original: udāttā nibhṛtā caiva bhavettu kulajāṅganā // BhN_24.25 //
analyzed: udāttā nibhṛtā ca eva bhavet tu kula jā aṅganā

original: prakṛtīnāṃ tu sarvāsāmupacārād dvidhā smṛtāḥ // BhN_24.26 //
analyzed: prakṛtīnām tu sarvāsām upacārāt dvidhā smṛtāḥ

original: tatra rājopacāro yo bhavedābhyantaro hi saḥ // BhN_24.27 //
analyzed: tatra rāja upacāraḥ yaḥ bhavet ābhyantaraḥ hi saḥ

original: tato vākyopacārastu yasya bāhyaḥ sa ucyate /

original: mahādevī tathā devyaḥ svāminyaḥ sthāpitā api /
analyzed: mahādevī tathā devyaḥ svāminyaḥ sthāpitāḥ api
bhoginyaḥ śilpa kāriṇyaḥ nāṭakīyāḥ sa nartakāḥ
anucārikāḥ ca vijñeyāḥ tathā ca paricārikāḥ

mahattaryaḥ pratīhāryaḥ kumāryaḥ sthavirāḥ api
āyuktikāḥ ca nṛpateḥ ayam antaḥpuraḥ janaḥ
atra mūrdhābhiṣiktā yā kula śīla samanvitā

original: guṇairyuktā vayassthā ca madhyasthā krodhanā tathā // BhN_24.33 //
analyzed: guṇaiḥ yuktā vayaḥsthā ca madhyasthā krodhanā tathā
muktā īrṣyā nṛpa śīla jñā sukha duḥkha sahā samā
śānti svastyayanaiḥ bhartuḥ satatam maṅgala eṣiṇī
śāntā pativratā dhīrā antaḥpura hite ratā
ebhiḥ guṇaiḥ tu saṃyuktā mahadevī iti udāhṛtā
ebhiḥ eva guṇaiḥ yuktāḥ tad saṃskāra vivarjitāḥ
garvitāḥ ca ati saubhāgyāḥ pati saṃbhoga tatparāḥ
śuci nitya ujvala ākārāḥ pati pakṣa abhyasūyakāḥ

original: vayorūpaguṇāḍhyā yāstā devya iti bhāṣitāḥ // BhN_24.37 //
analyzed: vayaḥ rūpa guṇa āḍhyāḥ yāḥ tāḥ devyaḥ iti bhāṣitāḥ
senāpateḥ amātyānām bhṛtyānām athavā punar
bhaveyuḥ tanayāḥ yāḥ tu pratisammāna varjitāḥ
śīla rūpa guṇaiḥ yāḥ tu saṃpannāḥ nṛpateḥ hitāḥ

original: svaguṇairlabdhasammānā svāminya iti tāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_24.39 //
analyzed: sva guṇaiḥ labdha sammānā svāminyaḥ iti tāḥ smṛtāḥ
rūpa yauvana śālinyaḥ karkaśāḥ vibhrama anvitāḥ
rati saṃbhoga kuśalāḥ pratipakṣa abhyasūyakāḥ
dakṣāḥ bhartuḥ ca citta jñāḥ gandha mālya ujvalāḥ sadā
nṛpateḥ chanda vartinyaḥ na hi īrṣyā māna garvitāḥ
utthitāḥ ca pramattāḥ ca tyakta ālasyāḥ na niṣṭhurāḥ

original: mānyāmānyaviśeṣajñāḥ sthāpitā iti tāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_24.42 //
analyzed: mānya amānya viśeṣa jñāḥ sthāpitāḥ iti tāḥ smṛtāḥ
kula śīla labdha pūjā mṛdavaḥ na ati ca udbhaṭāḥ

original: madhyasthā nibhṛtāḥ kṣāntā bhoginya iti tāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_24.43 //
analyzed: madhyasthāḥ nibhṛtāḥ kṣāntāḥ bhoginyaḥ iti tāḥ smṛtāḥ
nānā kalā viśeṣa jñāḥ nānā śilpa vicakṣaṇāḥ
gandha puṣpa vibhāga jñāḥ lekhya ālekhya vikalpikāḥ
śayana āsana bhāga jñāḥ caturāḥ madhurāḥ tathā

original: dakṣāḥ saumyāḥ sphuṭāḥ śliṣṭhā nibhṛtāḥ śilpakārikāḥ // BhN_24.45 //
analyzed: dakṣāḥ saumyāḥ sphuṭāḥ śliṣṭhāḥ nibhṛtāḥ śilpa kārikāḥ
graha mokṣa laya jñāḥ yāḥ rasa bhāva vikalpikāḥ
catura ānāṭya kuśalāḥ ca ūha apoha vicakṣaṇāḥ
rūpa yauvana saṃpannāḥ nāṭakīyāḥ tu tāḥ smṛtāḥ
helā bhāva viśeṣa āḍhyā satvena abhinayena ca
mādhuryena ca saṃpannā hi ātodya kuśalā tathā
aṅga pratyaṅga saṃpannā catuṣṣaṣṭhi kalā anvitā
caturāḥ praśnayā upetāḥ strī doṣaiḥ ca vivarjitāḥ

original: sadā pragalbhā ca tathā tyaktālasyā jitaśramā // BhN_24.49 //
analyzed: sadā pragalbhā ca tathā tyakta ālasyā jita śramā
nānā śilpa prayoga jñā nṛtta gīta vicakṣaṇā
atha rūpa guṇa audārya dhairya saubhāgya śīla saṃpannā
peśala madhura snigdha anunādi kala citra kaṇṭhā ca
samāgatāsu nārīṣu rūpa yauvana kantibhiḥ

original: na dṛśyate guṇairstulyā yasyāḥ sā nartakī smṛtā /
analyzed: na dṛśyate guṇaiḥ stulyā yasyāḥ sā nartakī smṛtā

original: sarvāvasthopacāreṣu yā na muñcati parthivam. // BhN_24.52 //
analyzed: sarva avasthā upacāreṣu yā na muñcati parthivam
vijñeyā dakṣiṇā dakṣā nāṭya jñaiḥ anucārikā
śayyā pālī chatra dhārī tathā vyajana dhāriṇī
saṃvāhikā gandha yoktrī tathā ca eva prasādhikā
tathā ābharaṇa yoktrī ca mālya saṃyojikā tathā

original: evaṃ vidhā bhaveyuryāḥ tā jñeyāḥ paricārikāḥ /
analyzed: evaṃvidhāḥ bhaveyuḥ yāḥ tāḥ jñeyāḥ paricārikāḥ
nānā kakṣyāḥ vicāriṇyaḥ
devatāyatana krīḍā prāsāda paricārikāḥ

original: yāmakinyastathā caiva yāścaivaṃ lakṣaṇāḥ striyaḥ // BhN_24.56 //
analyzed: yāmakinyaḥ tathā ca eva yāḥ ca evam lakṣaṇāḥ striyaḥ
saṃcārikāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ nāṭya jñaiḥ samudāhṛtāḥ
preṣaṇe kāma saṃyukte guhya aguhya samutthite
nṛpaiḥ yāḥ tu niyujyante tāḥ jñeyāḥ paricārikāḥ
sarva antaḥpura rakṣāsu stuti svastyayanena ca
yāḥ vṛddhim abhinandanti tāḥ vijñeyāḥ mahattarāḥ
sandhi vigraha saṃbaddha nānā ācāra samutthitam

original: nivedayanti yāḥ kāryaṃ pratihāryastu tāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: nivedayanti yāḥ kāryam pratihāryaḥ tu tāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: aprāptarasasaṃbhogā na saṃbhrāntā na codbhaṭāḥ // BhN_24.60 //
analyzed: aprāpta rasa saṃbhogāḥ na saṃbhrāntāḥ na ca udbhaṭāḥ
nibhṛtāḥ ca sa lajjāḥ ca kumāryaḥ bālikāḥ smṛtāḥ
purvarājana yajñāḥ yāḥ purvarāja abhipūjitāḥ
purva rāja anucaritāḥ tāḥ vṛddhāḥ iti su jñitāḥ
bhāṇḍāgāreṣu adhikṛtāḥ ca āyudha adhikṛtāḥ tathā
phala mūla oṣadhīnām ca tathā ca eva anvavekṣakī
gandha ābharaṇa vastrāṇām mālyānām ca eva cintikā

original: bahvāśraye tathā yuktā jñeyā hyāyuktikāstu tāḥ /
analyzed: bahu āśraye tathā yuktāḥ jñeyāḥ hi āyuktikāḥ tu tāḥ
iti antaḥpura cāriṇyaḥ striyaḥ proktā samāsatas
viśeṣaṇa viśeṣeṇa tāsām vakṣyāmi vai dvijāḥ
anuraktāḥ ca bhaktāḥ ca nānā pārśva samutthitāḥ

original: yā niyuktā niyogeṣu kāryeṣu vividheṣu ca /
analyzed: yāḥ niyuktāḥ niyogeṣu kāryeṣu vividheṣu ca

original: na codbhaṭā asaṃbhrāntā na lubdhā nāpi niṣṭhurāḥ // BhN_24.66 //
analyzed: na ca udbhaṭāḥ asaṃbhrāntāḥ na lubdhāḥ na api niṣṭhurāḥ
dāntāḥ kṣāntāḥ prasannāḥ ca jita krodhāḥ jita indriyāḥ
akāmāḥ lobha ḍīnāḥ ca strī doṣaiḥ ca vivarjitāḥ
sā tu antaḥpura saṃcāre yojyā pārthiva veśmani

original: kārukāḥ kañcukīyāśca tathā varṣavarāḥ punaḥ // BhN_24.68 //
analyzed: kārukāḥ kañcukīyāḥ ca tathā varṣavarāḥ punar
aupasthāyika nirmuṇḍā strīṇā preṣaṇa karmaṇi

original: rakṣaṇaṃ ca kumārīṇāṃ bālikānāṃ prayojayet // BhN_24.69 //
analyzed: rakṣaṇam ca kumārīṇām bālikānām prayojayet
antaḥpura adhikāreṣu rāja caryā anuvarttinām
sarva vṛttānta saṃvāhāḥ pati āgāre niyojayet

original: vinītāḥ svalpasattvā ye klībā vai strīsvabhāvikāḥ /
analyzed: vinītāḥ su alpa sattvāḥ ye klībāḥ vai strī svabhāvikāḥ

original: jātyā na doṣiṇaścaiva te vai varṣavarāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_24.71 //
analyzed: jātyāḥ na doṣiṇaḥ ca eva te vai varṣavarāḥ smṛtāḥ
brahmāṇāḥ kuśalāḥ vṛddhāḥ kāma doṣa vivarjitāḥ

original: prayojaneṣu devīnāṃ prayoktavyā nṛpaiḥ sadā // BhN_24.72 //
analyzed: prayojaneṣu devīnām prayoktavyāḥ nṛpaiḥ sadā
etat aṣṭādaśavidham proktam antaḥpuram mayā

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi bāhyaṃ puruṣasaṃbhavam // BhN_24.73 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi bāhyam puruṣa saṃbhavam
rājā senāpatiḥ ca eva purodhāḥ mantriṇaḥ tathā
sacivāḥ prāḍvivākāḥ ca kumārādhikṛtāḥ tathā

original: eke cānye ca bahavo mānyā jñeyā nṛpasya tu /
analyzed: eke ca anye ca bahavaḥ mānyāḥ jñeyāḥ nṛpasya tu
veśeṣam eṣām vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇena nibodhata
balavān buddhi saṃpannaḥ satya vādī jita indriyaḥ

original: dakṣaḥ pragalbho dhṛtimān vikrānto matimāñchuciḥ // BhN_24.76 //
analyzed: dakṣaḥ pragalbhaḥ dhṛtimān vikrāntaḥ matimān śuciḥ
dīrgha darśī mahā utsāhaḥ kṛtajñaḥ priya vāc mṛduḥ
utthitaḥ ca apramattaḥ ca vṛddha sevī arthaśāstra vid
para bhāva iṅgita abhijñaḥ śūraḥ rakṣā samanvitaḥ
ūha apoha vicārī ca nānā śilpa prayojakaḥ
nīti śāstra artha kuśalaḥ tathā ca eva anurāgavān
dharma jñaḥ vyasanī ca eva guṇaiḥ eteḥ bhavet nṛpaḥ
kulīnāḥ buddhi saṃpannāḥ nānā śāstra vipaścitāḥ
snigdhā pareḥ ahāryaḥ ca na pramattāḥ ca deśa jāḥ
alubdhāḥ ca vinītāḥ ca śucayaḥ dhārmikāḥ tathā
purodhaḥ mantriṇaḥ tu ebhiḥ guṇaiḥ yuktāḥ bhavanti hi
buddhimān nīti saṃpannaḥ tyakta ālasyaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ
para randhra vidhi jñaḥ ca yātrā kāla viśeṣa vid
artha śāstra artha kuśalaḥ hi anuraktaḥ kula udbhavaḥ
deśa vid kāla vid ca eva kartavyaḥ kṣitipaiḥ sadā
vyavahāra artha tattva jñāḥ buddhimantaḥ bahu śrutāḥ
madhyasthāḥ dhārmikāḥ dhīrāḥ kārya akārya vivekinaḥ

original: kṣāntā dāntā jitakrodhā sarvatra samadarśinaḥ // BhN_24.85 //
analyzed: kṣāntā dāntā jita krodhā sarvatra sama darśinaḥ
īdṛśaḥ prāḍvivākāḥ tu sthāpyāḥ dharma āsane dvijāḥ
utthitāḥ ca pramattāḥ ca tyakta ālasyāḥ jita śramāḥ
snigdhā śāntāḥ vinītāḥ ca madhyasthāḥ nipuṇāḥ tathā
naya jñāḥ vinaya jñāḥ ca ūha apoha vicakṣaṇāḥ
sarva śātrā artha saṃpannāḥ kumāra adhikṛtāḥ tathā
bṛhaspati matāt eṣām guṇān ca abhikāṃkṣayet

original: vijñeyaṃ copahāryaṃ ca sabhyānāṃ ca vikalpanam /
analyzed: vijñeyam ca upahāryam ca sabhyānām ca vikalpanam

original: ityeṣa vo mayā proktaḥ prāḍvivākanirṇayaḥ // BhN_24.89 //
analyzed: iti eṣa vaḥ mayā proktaḥ prāḍvivāka nirṇayaḥ
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi citra abhinayanam punar
iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāsre puṃstryupacāraḥ nāma adhyāyaḥ caturviṃśaḥ
pañcaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
aṅga abhinayasya eva yaḥ viśeṣaḥ kvacid kvacid
anuktaḥ ucyate citraḥ citra abhinayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: uttānau tu karau kṛtvā svastikau pārśvasaṃsthitau /
analyzed: uttānau tu karau kṛtvā svastikau pārśva saṃsthitau
udvāhitena śirasā tathā ca ūrdhva nirīkṣaṇāt

original: prabhātaṃ gaganaṃ rātriḥ pradoṣaṃ divasaṃ tathā /
analyzed: prabhātam gaganam rātriḥ pradoṣam divasam tathā

original: ṛtūn ghanān vanāntāṃśca vistīrṇāṃśca jalāśayān // BhN_25.3 //
analyzed: ṛtūn ghanān vana antān ca vistīrṇān ca jalāśayān

original: diśo grahān sanakṣatrān kiñcit svasthaṃ ca yadbhavet /
analyzed: diśaḥ grahān sa nakṣatrān kiñcid svastham ca yat bhavet
tasya tu abhinayaḥ kāryaḥ nānā dṛṣṭi samanvitaḥ
ebhiḥ eva karaiḥ bhūyas tena eva śirasā punar
adhas nirīkṣaṇena atha bhūmi sthān saṃpradarśayet
sparśasya grahaṇena eva tathā ullukasanena ca

original: candrajyostnāṃ sukhaṃ vāyuṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ ca nirdiśet // BhN_25.6 //
analyzed: sukham vāyum rasam gandham ca nirdiśet
vastra avakuṇṭhanāt sūryam rajaḥ dhūma anilān tathā
bhūmi tāpam atha uṣṇam ca kuryāt chāyā abhilāṣataḥ
ūrdhvā kekara dṛṣṭiḥ tu madhyāhne sūryam ādiśet
udaya asta gatam ca eva vismaya arthaiḥ pradarśayet
yāni saumya artha yuktāni su svabhāva kṛtāni ca
gātra sparśaiḥ sa romāñcaiḥ teṣām abhinayaḥ bhavet
yāni syuḥ tīkṣṇa rūpāṇi tāni ca abhinayet sudhīḥ
asaṃsparśaiḥ tathā udvegaiḥ tathā mukha vikuṇṭhanaiḥ
gambhīra udāta saṃyuktān arthān abhinayet budhaḥ
sa āṭopaiḥ ca sa garvaiḥ ca gātraiḥ sauṣṭhava saṃyutaiḥ
yajñopavīta deśa stham arālam hāsam ādiśet
svastikau vicyutau hāra sragdāma arthān nidarśayet
bhramaṇena pradarśinyāḥ dṛṣṭeḥ parigamena ca
śravyam śravaṇa yogena dṛśyam dṛṣṭi vilokanaiḥ

original: ātmasthaṃ parasaṃsthaṃ vā madhyasthaṃ vā vinirdiśet // BhN_25.14 //
analyzed: ātma stham para saṃstham vā madhya stham vā vinirdiśet
vidyut ulkā ghana ravā viṣphuliṃga arciṣaḥ tathā
trasta aṃga akṣi nimeṣaiḥ ca te bhineyāḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
udveṣṭita kara āvṛttau karau kṛtvā natam śiraḥ
a saṃsparśe tathā aniṣṭe jihma dṛṣṭena kārayet
vāyum uṣṇam tamaḥ tejaḥ mukha pracchādanena ca
reṇu toya pataṃgān ca bhramarān ca nivārayet
kṛtvā svastika saṃsthānau padma kośau adhomukhau
siaṃha ṛkṣa vānara vyāghra śvāpadān ca nirūpayet
svastikau tri patākau tu gurūṇām pāda vandane
khaṭaka svasthikau ca api pratoda grahaṇe smṛtau

original: ekaṃ dvi trīṇi catvāri pañca ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭadhā /
analyzed: ekam dvi trīṇi catvāri pañca ṣaḍ sapta ca aṣṭadhā

original: nava vā daśa vāpi syurgaṇanāṃgulibhirbhavet // BhN_25.20 //
analyzed: nava vā daśa vā api syuḥ gaṇanā aṃgulibhiḥ bhavet
daśa ākhyāḥ ca śata ākhyāḥ ca sahasra ākhyāḥ tathā eva ca

original: patākābhyāṃ tu hastābhyāṃ prayojyāstāḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_25.21 //
analyzed: patākābhyām tu hastābhyām prayojyāḥ tāḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ
daśa ākhya gaṇanāyāḥ tu paratas yā bhavet iha
vākya arthena eva sādhyā asau parokṣa abhinayena ca
chatra dhvaja patākāḥ ca nirdeśyāḥ daṇḍa dhāraṇāt
nānā praharaṇam ca atha nirdeśyam dhāraṇā āśrayam
eka cittaḥ hi adhas dṛṣṭiḥ kiñcid nata śirāḥ tathā

original: savyahastaśca saṃdaṃśaḥ smṛte dhyāne vitarkite // BhN_25.24 //
analyzed: savya hastaḥ ca saṃdaṃśaḥ smṛte dhyāne vitarkite
udvāhitam śiraḥ kṛtvā haṃsa pakṣau pradakṣiṇau
apatya rūpaṇe kāryau ucchrayau ca prayoktṛbhiḥ
udvāhitam śiraḥ kṛtvā haṃsa vaktram tathā ūrdhva gam

original: prasādayacca yaṃ mānaṃ dīrghasatvaṃ ca nirdiśet // BhN_25.26 //
analyzed: prasādayat ca yam mānam dīrghasatvam ca nirdiśet

original: arālaṃ ca śirasthāne samudvāhya tu vāmakam /
analyzed: arālam ca śira sthāne samudvāhya tu vāmakam

original: gate nirvṛtte dhvaste ca śrāntavākye ca yojayet // BhN_25.27 //
analyzed: gate nirvṛtte dhvaste ca śrānta vākye ca yojayet
sarva indriya svastha tayā prasanna vadanaḥ tathā
vicitra bhū tala ālokaiḥ śaradam tu vinirdiśet
gātra saṃkocanāt ca api sūrya agni paṭu sevanāt
hemantaḥ tu abhinetavyaḥ puruṣaiḥ madhyama adhamaiḥ
śiraḥ danta uṣṭha kampena gātra saṃkocanena ca
kūjitaiḥ ca sa śītkāraiḥ adhamaḥ śītam ādiśet
avasthā antaram āsādya kadācid tu uttamaraiḥ api
śīta abhinayanam kūryāt devāt vyasana saṃbhavam
ṛtu jānām tu puṣpāṇām gandha ghrāṇaiḥ tathā eva ca

original: rūkṣasya vāyoḥ sparśācca śiśiraṃ rūpayedbudhaḥ // BhN_25.32 //
analyzed: rūkṣasya vāyoḥ sparśāt ca śiśiram rūpayet budhaḥ
pramoda janana āraṃbhaiḥ upabhogaiḥ pṛthak vidhiḥ
vasantaḥ tu abhinetavyaḥ nānā puṣpa pradarśanāt
sveda pramārjanaiḥ ca eva bhūmi tāpaiḥ sa vījanaiḥ

original: uṣṇasya vāyoḥ sparśena grīṣmaṃ tvabhinayedbudhaḥ // BhN_25.34 //
analyzed: uṣṇasya vāyoḥ sparśena grīṣmam tu abhinayet budhaḥ
kadamba nīpa kuṭapaiḥ śādvalaiḥ sa indragopakaiḥ
megha vātaiḥ sukha sparśaiḥ prāvṛṣ kālam pradarśayet
megha ogha nādaiḥ gambhīraiḥ dhārā prapatanaiḥ tadā
vidyut nirghāta ghoṣaiḥ ca varṣārātram samādiśet

original: yadyasya cihnaṃ veṣo vā karma vā rūpameva vā /
analyzed: yat yasya cihnam veṣaḥ vā karma vā rūpam eva vā
nirdeśyaḥ saḥ ṛtuḥ tena iṣṭa aniṣṭa artha darśanāt
etān ṛtūn artha vaśāt darśayet hi rasa anugān
sukhinaḥ tu sukha upetān suḥkha arthān duḥkha saṃyutān
yaḥ yena bhāvena āviṣṭaḥ sukha dena itareana vā

original: sa tadāhitasaṃkāraḥ sarvaṃ paśyati tanmayam // BhN_25.39 //
analyzed: sa tad āhita saṃkāraḥ sarvam paśyati tad mayam
bhāva abhinayanam kuryāt vibhāvānām nidarśanaiḥ
tathā eva ca anubhāvānām bhāvasiddhiḥ pravartitā
vibhāvena āhṛtam kāryam anubhāvena nīyate
ātma anubhavanam bhāvaḥ vibhāvaḥ para darśanam

original: gururmitraṃ sakhā snigdhaḥ saṃbandhī bandhureva vā /
analyzed: guruḥ mitram sakhā snigdhaḥ saṃbandhī bandhuḥ eva vā

original: āvedyate hi yaḥ prāptaḥ sa vibhāva iti smṛtaḥ // BhN_25.42 //
analyzed: āvedyate hi yaḥ prāptaḥ sa vibhāvaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
yat tu asya saṃbhrama utthānaiḥ arghya pādya āsana ādibhiḥ

original: pūjanaṃ kriyate bhaktyā so 'nubhāvaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BhN_25.43 //
analyzed: pūjanam kriyate bhaktyā saḥ nubhāvaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
evam anyeṣu api jñeyaḥ nānā kārya pradarśanāt

original: vibhāvo vāpi bhāvo vā vijñeyo 'rthavaśādbudhaiḥ // BhN_25.44 //
analyzed: vibhāvaḥ vā api bhāvaḥ vā vijñeyaḥ ṛtha vaśāt budhaiḥ
yaḥ tu api pratisaṃdeśaḥ dūtasya iha pradīyate
saḥ nubhāvaḥ iti jñeyaḥ pratisandeśa darśitaḥ
evam bhāvaḥ vibhāvaḥ vā api anubhāvaḥ ca kīrtitaḥ
puruṣaiḥ abhineyaḥ syāt pramadābhiḥ atha api vā

original: svabhāvābhinaye sthānaṃ puṃsāṃ kāryaṃ tu vaiṣṇavam /
analyzed: svabhāva abhinaye sthānam puṃsām kāryam tu vaiṣṇavam

original: āyataṃ vāvahitthaṃ vā strīṇāṃ kāryaṃ svabhāvataḥ // BhN_25.47 //
analyzed: āyatam vā avahittham vā strīṇām kāryam svabhāvataḥ
prayojana vaśāt ca eva śeṣāṇi api bhavanti hi
nānā bhava abhinayanaiḥ prayogaiḥ ca pṛthagvidhaiḥ
dhairya līlā aṅga saṃpannam puruṣāṇām viceṣṭitam

original: mṛdulīlāṅgahāraiśca strīṇāṃ kāryaṃ tu ceṣṭitam // BhN_25.49 //
analyzed: mṛdu līlā aṅgahāraiḥ ca strīṇām kāryam tu ceṣṭitam
kara pāda aṅga sañcārāḥ strīṇām tu lalitāḥ smṛtāḥ
su dhīraḥ ca uddhataḥ ca eva puruṣāṇām prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: yathā rasaṃ yathā bhāvaṃ strīṇāṃ bhāvapradarśanam /
analyzed: yathā rasam yathā bhāvam strīṇām bhāva pradarśanam

original: narāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ ca bhāvābhinayanaṃ pṛthak // BhN_25.51 //
analyzed: narāṇām pramadānām ca bhāva abhinayanam pṛthak
bhāva anubhāvanam yuktam vyākhyāsyāmi anupūrvaśas

original: āliṅganena gātrāṇāṃ sasmitena ca cakṣuṣā // BhN_25.52 //
analyzed: āliṅganena gātrāṇām sa smitena ca cakṣuṣā
tathā ulluka sānat ca api harṣam saṃdarśayet naraḥ
kṣipra san jāta romāñcāt bāṣpeṇa āvṛta locanā

original: kurvīta nartakī harṣaṃ prītyā vākyaiśca sasmitaiḥ /
analyzed: kurvīta nartakī harṣam prītyā vākyaiḥ ca sa smitaiḥ
udvṛtta rakta netraḥ ca sandaṣṭa adharaḥ eva ca
niśvāsa kaṃpita aṃgaḥ ca krodham ca abhinayet naraḥ
netrābhyām bāṣpa pūrṇābhyām cibuka oṣṭha prakaṃpanāt
śirasaḥ kaṃpanāt ca eva bhrukuṭī karaṇena ca
maunena aṅguli bhaṅgena mālya ābharaṇa varjanāt
īrṣyā krodhe bhavet striyāḥ
niśvāsa ucchvāsa bahulaiḥ adhomukha vicintanaiḥ
ākāśa vacanāt ca api duḥkham puṃsām tu yojayet
ruditaiḥ śvasitaiḥ ca eva śiraḥ abhihananena ca
bhūmipāta abhighātaiḥ ca duḥkham strīṣu prayojayet

original: ānandajaṃ cārtijaṃ vā īrṣyāsaṃbhūtameva vā // BhN_25.59 //
analyzed: ānanda jam ca ārti jam vā īrṣyā saṃbhūtam eva vā
yat pūrvam uktam ruditam tat strī nīceṣu yojayet
saṃbhrama āvega ceṣṭābhiḥ śastra saṃpātanena ca
puruṣāṇām bhayam kāryam dhairya āvega bala ādibhiḥ
cala tāraka netra tvāt gātraiḥ sphurita kampitaiḥ
santrasta hṛdaya tvāt ca pārśvābhyām avalokanaiḥ
bhartṛ ranveṣaṇāt ca evam uccais ākrandanāt api
priyasya āliṃganāt ca eva bhayam kāryam bhavet striyāḥ

original: madā ye 'bhihitāḥ pūrvaṃ te strīnīceṣu yojayet // BhN_25.63 //
analyzed: madāḥ ye bhihitāḥ pūrvam te strī nīceṣu yojayet
mṛdubhiḥ skhalitaiḥ nityam ākāśasya avalaṃbanāt
netra avaghūrṇanaiḥ ca eva sa ālasyaiḥ kathitaiḥ tathā
gātrāṇām kaṃpanaiḥ ca eva madaḥ kāryaḥ bhavet striyāḥ

original: anena vidhinā kāryaḥ prayogāḥ kāraṇotthitāḥ // BhN_25.65 //
analyzed: anena vidhinā kāryaḥ prayogāḥ kāraṇa utthitāḥ

original: pauruṣaḥ strīkṛto vāpi bhāvā hyabhinayaṃ prati /
analyzed: pauruṣaḥ strī kṛtaḥ vā api bhāvāḥ hi abhinayam prati

original: sarve salalitā bhāvāsstrībhiḥ kāryāḥ prayatnataḥ // BhN_25.66 //
analyzed: sarve sa lalitāḥ bhāvāḥ strībhiḥ kāryāḥ prayatnataḥ
dhairya mādhurya saṃpannāḥ bhāvāḥ kāryāḥ tu pauruṣāḥ
tripatākā aṅgulībhyām tu valitābhyām prayojayet

original: śukāśca sārikāścaiva sūkṣmā ye cāpi pakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: śukāḥ ca sārikāḥ ca eva sūkṣmāḥ ye ca api pakṣiṇaḥ
śikhi sārasa haṃsa ādyāḥ sthūlāḥ ye svabhāvataḥ
recakaiḥ aṅgahāraiḥ ca teṣām abhinayaḥ bhavet
khara uṣṭra aśvatara siṃha vyāghra go mahiṣa ādaya
gati pracaraiḥ aṅgaiḥ ca te bhineyāḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: bhūtāḥ piśācā yakṣāśca dānavāḥ saharākṣasaiḥ // BhN_25.70 //
analyzed: bhūtāḥ piśācāḥ yakṣāḥ ca dānavāḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ
aṅgahāraiḥ avinirdeśyāḥ nāma saṃkīrtanāt api
aṅgahāraiḥ vinirdeśyāḥ apratyakṣāḥ bhavanti ye
pratyakṣāḥ tu abhinetavyāḥ bhaya udvegaiḥ sa vismayaiḥ
devāḥ ca cihnaiḥ ca praṇāma karaṇaiḥ bhāvaiḥ ca viceṣṭitaiḥ
abhineyaḥ hi artha vaśāt apratyakṣāḥ prayoga jñaiḥ

original: savyotthitena hastena hyarālena śiraḥ spṛśet // BhN_25.73 //
analyzed: savya utthitena hastena hi arālena śiraḥ spṛśet
nare hi abhivādanam hi etat apratyakṣe vidhīyate
khaṭakāvardhamānena kapota ākhyena vā punar
daivatāni gurūn ca eva pramadāḥ ca abhivādayet

original: divaukasaśca ye pūjyāḥ pratyakṣāśca bhavanti ye // BhN_25.75 //
analyzed: divaukasaḥ ca ye pūjyāḥ pratyakṣāḥ ca bhavanti ye
tān pramāṇaiḥ prabhāvaiḥ ca gaṃbhīra arthaiḥ ca yojayet
mahājanam sakhī vargam viṭa dhūrta janam tathā
parimaṇḍala saṃsthena
parvatān prāṃśu yogena vṛkṣān ca eva samucchritān
prasāritābhyām bāhubhyām utkṣiptābhyām prayojayet
samūha sāgaram senā bahu vistīrṇam eva ca
patākābhyām tu hastābhyām utkṣiptābhyām pradarśayet

original: śauryaṃ dhairyaṃ ca garvaṃ ca darpamaudāryamucchrayam // BhN_25.79 //
analyzed: śauryam dhairyam ca garvam ca darpam audāryam ucchrayam
lalāṭa deśa sthānena tvarālena abhidarśayet
vakṣaḥ deśāt apāviddhau karau tu mṛga śīrṣakau
vistīrṇa pradruta utkṣepau yojyau
adhomukha uttāna talau hastau kiñcid prasāritau
kṛtvā tu abhinayet velām bila dvāram gṛham guhān
kāmam śāpa graha grastān jvara upahata cetasaḥ
eteṣām ceṣṭitam kuryāt aṅga ādyaiḥ sadṛśaiḥ budhaiḥ
dolā abhinayanam kuryāt dolāyāḥ tu vilokanaiḥ
saṃbhokṣeṇa ca gātrāṇām ca

original: yadā cāṅgavatī ḍolā pratyakṣā pustajā bhavet // BhN_25.84 //
analyzed: yadā ca aṅgavatī ḍolā pratyakṣā pusta jā bhavet
āsaneṣu praviṣṭānām kartavyam tatra ḍolanam
ākāśa vacanāni iha vakṣyāmi ātma gatāni ca
apavāritakam ca eva janāntikam atha api ca
dūra stha ābhāṣaṇam yat syāt aśarīra nivedanam
parokṣa antaritam vākyam ākāśa vacanam tu tat
tatra uttara kṛtaiḥ vākyaiḥ saṃlāpam saṃprayojayet
nānā kāraṇa saṃyuktaiḥ kāvya bhāva samutthitaiḥ
hṛdayasya vacaḥ tat ātma gatam īṣyate
sa vitarkam ca tat yojyam prāyaśas nāṭaka ādiṣu
nigūḍha bhāva saṃyuktam apavāritakam smṛtam
kārya vaśāt aśravaṇam pārśva gataiḥ yat jana antikam tat syāt
hṛdaya stham sa vikalpam bhāva stham ca ātma gatam eva
iti gūḍha artha yuktāni vacanāni iha nāṭake

original: janāntikāni karṇe tu tāni yojyāni yoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_25.91 //
analyzed: jana antikāni karṇe tu tāni yojyāni yoktṛbhiḥ

original: pūrvavṛttaṃ tu yatkāryaṃ bhūyaḥ kathyaṃ tu kāraṇāt /
analyzed: pūrva vṛttam tu yat kāryam bhūyas kathyam tu kāraṇāt
karṇa pradeśe tat vācyam mā agāt tat punarukta tām
avyabhicāreṇa paṭhet ākāśa jana antika ātma gata pāṭhyam
pratyakṣa parokṣa kṛtānām ātma samutthān para kṛtān ca
hastam antaritam kṛtvā tri patākam prayoktṛbhiḥ
jana antikam prayoktavyam apavāritakam tathā
svapnāyita vākya arthaiḥ tu abhineyaḥ na khalu hasta saṃcāraiḥ

original: suptābhihitaireva tu vākyārthaiḥ so 'bhineyaḥ syāt // BhN_25.95 //
analyzed: supta abhihitaiḥ eva tu vākya arthaiḥ saḥ bhineyaḥ syāt
manda svara sañcāraiḥ vyakta avyaktam punarukta vacana artham
pūrva anusmaraṇa kṛtam kāryam svapnāñcite pāṭhyam
praśithila guru karuṇa akṣara ghaṇṭā anusvarita vākya gadgada jaiḥ
hikkā śvasa upetām kākum kuryāt maraṇa kāle
hikkā śvāsa upetām mūrcchā upagame maraṇa vat kathayet

original: atimatteṣvapi kāryaṃ tadvatsvapnāyite yathā pāṭhyam // BhN_25.98 //
analyzed: ati matteṣu api kāryam tadvat svapnāyite yathā pāṭhyam
vṛddhānām yojayet pāṭhyam gadgada skhalita akṣaram

original: asamāptākṣaraṃ caiva bālānāṃ tu kalasvanam // BhN_25.99 //
analyzed: asamāpta akṣaram ca eva bālānām tu kala svanam
nānā bhāva upagatam maraṇa abhinaye bahu kīrtitam tu
vikṣipta hasta pādaiḥ nibhṛtaiḥ sannaiḥ tathā kāryam
vyādhi plute ca maraṇam niṣaṇṇa gātraiḥ tu saṃprayoktavyam
hikkā śvāsa upetam tathā para adhīna gātra saṃcāram
viṣa pīte ca maraṇam kāryam vikṣipta gātra kara caraṇam
viṣa vega saṃprayuktam visphurita aṃga kriyā upetam

original: pratheme vege kārśyaṃ tvabhineye vepathurdvitīye tu /
analyzed: pratheme vege kārśyam tu abhineye vepathuḥ dvitīye tu

original: dāhastathā tṛtīye vilallikā syāccaturthe tu // BhN_25.103 //
analyzed: dāhaḥ tathā tṛtīye vilallikā syāt caturthe tu

original: phenastu pañcamasthe tu grīvā ṣaṣṭhe tu bhajyate /
analyzed: phenaḥ tu pañcama sthe tu grīvā ṣaṣṭhe tu bhajyate

original: jaḍatā saptame tu syānmaraṇaṃ tvaṣṭame bhavet // BhN_25.104 //
analyzed: jaḍa tā saptame tu syāt maraṇam tu aṣṭame bhavet
tatra prathama vege tu kṣāma vakra kapola tā
kṛśa tve bhinayaḥ kāryaḥ vākyānām alpa bhāṣaṇam
sarva aṅga vepathum ca kaṇḍūyanam tathā aṅgānām
vikṣipta hasta gātram dāham ca eva api abhinayet tu
udvṛtta nimeṣa tvāt udgāra chardanaiḥ tathā ākṣepaiḥ
avyakta akṣara kathanaiḥ vilallikām abhinayet evam
udgāra vamana yogaiḥ śirasaḥ ca vilolanaiḥ anekavidhaiḥ
phenaḥ tu abhinetavyaḥ niḥsaṃjña tayā nimeṣaiḥ ca
aṃsa kapola sparśaḥ vināmanam
sarva indriya saṃmohāt jaḍa tām evam tu abhinayet tu
saṃmīlita netra tvāt vyādhi vivṛddhau bhujaṅga daśanāt vā

original: evaṃ hi nāṭyadharme maraṇāni budhaiḥ prayojyāni // BhN_25.110 //
analyzed: evam hi nāṭya dharme maraṇāni budhaiḥ prayojyāni
saṃbhrameṣu atha roṣeṣu śoka āveśa kṛteṣu ca

original: yāni vākyāni yujyante punaruktaṃ na teṣviha // BhN_25.111 //
analyzed: yāni vākyāni yujyante punaruktam na teṣu iha

original: sādhvaho māṃ ca heheti kiṃ tvaṃ māmāvadeti ca /
analyzed: sādhu aho mām ca hehā iti kim tvam mām āvada iti ca
evaṃvidhāni kāryāṇi dvi tri saṃkhyāni kārayet
pratyaṅga hīnam yat kāvyam vikṛtam ca prayujyate
na lakṣaṇa kṛtaḥ tatra kāryaḥ tu abhinayaḥ budhaiḥ

original: bhāvo yatrottamānāṃ tu na taṃ madhyeṣu yojayet /
analyzed: bhāvaḥ yatra uttamānām tu na tam madhyeṣu yojayet

original: yo bhāvaścaiva madhyānāṃ na te nīceṣu yojayet // BhN_25.114 //
analyzed: yaḥ bhāvaḥ ca eva madhyānām na te nīceṣu yojayet
pṛthak pṛthak bhāva rasaiḥ ātma ceṣṭā samutthitaiḥ

original: jyeṣṭhamadhyamanīceṣu nāṭyaṃ rāgaṃ hi gacchati // BhN_25.115 //
analyzed: jyeṣṭha madhyama nīceṣu nāṭyam rāgam hi gacchati
ete bhinaya viśeṣāḥ kartavyāḥ sattva bhāva saṃyuktāḥ

original: anye tu laukikā ye tu te sarve lokavatkāryāḥ // BhN_25.116 //
analyzed: anye tu laukikāḥ ye tu te sarve loka vat kāryāḥ
nānāvidhaiḥ yathā puṣpaiḥ mālām grathnāti mālyakṛt
aṃga upāṃgaiḥ rasaiḥ bhāvaiḥ tathā nāṭyam prayojayet

original: yā yasya līlā niyatā gatiśca raṅgapraviṣṭasya nidhānayuktaḥ /
analyzed: yā yasya līlā niyatā gatiḥ ca raṅga praviṣṭasya nidhāna yuktaḥ
tām eva kuryāt avimukta sattvaḥ yāvat naraṅgāt pratinirvṛtaḥ syāt

original: evamete mayā proktā nāṭye cābhinayāḥ kramāt /
analyzed: evam ete mayā proktāḥ nāṭye ca abhinayāḥ kramāt

original: anye tu laukikā ye te lokādgrāhyāḥ sadā budhaiḥ // BhN_25.119 //
analyzed: anye tu laukikāḥ ye te lokāt grāhyāḥ sadā budhaiḥ
lokaḥ vedaḥ tathā adhyātmam pramāṇam trividham smṛtam
veda adhyātma padārtheṣu prāyas nāṭyam pratiṣṭhitam
veda adhyātma upapannam tu śabda chandaḥ samanvitam

original: lokasiddhaṃ bhavetsiddhaṃ nāṭyaṃ lokātmakaṃ tathā // BhN_25.121 //
analyzed: loka siddham bhavet siddham nāṭyam loka ātmakam tathā

original: na ca śakyaṃ hi lokasya sthāvarasya carasya ca /
analyzed: na ca śakyam hi lokasya sthāvarasya carasya ca

original: śāstreṇa nirṇayaṃ kartuṃ bhāvaceṣṭāvidhiṃ prati // BhN_25.122 //
analyzed: śāstreṇa nirṇayam kartum bhāva ceṣṭā vidhim prati
nānā śīlāḥ prakṛtayaḥ śīle nāṭyam
tasmāt loka pramāṇam hi vijñeyam nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ

original: etān vidhīṃścābhinayasya samyagvijñāya raṅge manujaḥ prayuṅkte /
analyzed: etān vidhīn ca abhinayasya samyak vijñāya raṅge manujaḥ prayuṅkte

original: sa nāṭyatattvābhinayaprayoktā saṃmānamagryaṃ labhate hi loke // BhN_25.124 //
analyzed: sa nāṭya tattva abhinaya prayoktā saṃmānam agryam labhate hi loke
evam ete hi abhinayāḥ vāc nepathya aṅga saṃbhavāḥ
prayoga jñena kartavyā nāṭake siddhim icchatā
ṣaḍviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
anurūpā virūpā ca tathā rūpa anurūpiṇī
tri prakārā iha pātrāṇām prakṛtiḥ ca vibhāvitā
nānā avasthā kriyā upetā bhūmikā prakṛtiḥ tathā
bhṛśam udyotayet nāṭyam svabhāva karaṇa āśrayam
bahu bāhu bahu mukhāḥ tathā ca vikṛta ānanāḥ
paśu śvāpada vaktrāḥ ca khara uṣṭrāḥ ca gaja ānanāḥ

original: ete cānye ca bahavo nānārūpā bhavanti ye /
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ nānā rūpāḥ bhavanti ye

original: ācāryeṇa tu te kāryā mṛtkāṣṭhajatucarmabhiḥ // BhN_26.4 //
analyzed: ācāryeṇa tu te kāryāḥ mṛd kāṣṭha jatu carmabhiḥ
svābhāvikena rūpena praviśet raṅga maṇḍalam
ātma rūpam avacchādya varṇakaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ api

original: yādṛśaṃ yasya yadrūpaṃ prakṛtyā tatra tādṛśam /
analyzed: yādṛśam yasya yat rūpam prakṛtyā tatra tādṛśam
vayaḥ veṣa anurūpeṇa prayojyam nāṭya karmaṇi
yathā jīvat svabhāvam hi parityajya anya dehikam
para bhāvam prakurute para bhāvam samāśritaḥ

original: evaṃ budhaḥ paraṃbhāvaṃ so 'smīti manasā smaran /
analyzed: evam budhaḥ paraṃbhāvam saḥ smi iti manasā smaran
yeṣām vāc aṅga līlābhiḥ ceṣṭābhiḥ tu samācaret
sukumāra prayogaḥ yaḥ rājñām āmoda saṃbhavaḥ
śṛṅgāra rasam āsādya tat nārīṣu prayojayet
yuddha uddhata aviddha kṛtā saṃraṃbha ārabhaṭāḥ ca ye

original: na te strībhiḥ prayoktavyāḥ yoktavyāḥ puruṣeṣu te // BhN_26.10 //
analyzed: na te strībhiḥ prayoktavyāḥ yoktavyāḥ puruṣeṣu te
an udbhaṭam a saṃbhrāntam an āviddha aṅga ceṣṭitam
laya tāla kalā pāta pramāṇa niyata akṣaram
su vibhakta pada ālāpam aniṣṭhuram akāhalam
īdṛśam yat bhavet nāṭyam nārībhiḥ ca prayojayet
evam kāryam prayoga jñaiḥ bhūmikā viniveśanam

original: striyo hi strīgato bhāvaḥ pauruṣaḥ puruṣasyaca // BhN_26.13 //
analyzed: striyaḥ hi strī gataḥ bhāvaḥ pauruṣaḥ puruṣasya ca
yathā vayaḥ yathāvastham anurūpā iti sā smṛtā

original: puruṣaḥ strīkṛtaṃ bhāvaṃ rūpātprakurute tu yaḥ // BhN_26.14 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ strī kṛtam bhāvam rūpāt prakurute tu yaḥ
rūpa anurūpā sā jñeyā prayoge prakṛtiḥ budhaḥ

original: chandataḥ pauruṣīṃ bhūmiṃ strī kuryādanurūpataḥ // BhN_26.15 //
analyzed: chandataḥ pauruṣīm bhūmim strī kuryāt anurūpataḥ
na paraspara ceṣṭāsu kāryau sthavira bāliśau

original: pāṭhyaprayoge puruṣāḥ prayoktavyā hi saṃskṛte // BhN_26.16 //
analyzed: pāṭhya prayoge puruṣāḥ prayoktavyāḥ hi saṃskṛte

original: strīṇāṃ svabhāvamadhurāḥ kaṇṭhāḥ puṃsāṃ tu balavantaḥ /
analyzed: strīṇām svabhāva madhurāḥ kaṇṭhāḥ puṃsām tu balavantaḥ

original: yadyapi puruṣo vidyāt gītavidhānaṃ ca lakṣaṇopetam // BhN_26.17 //
analyzed: yadi api puruṣaḥ vidyāt gīta vidhānam ca lakṣaṇa upetam
mādhurya guṇa vihīnam śobhām janayet na tat gītam

original: yatra strīṇāṃ pāṭhyādguṇairnarāṇāṃ ca kaṇṭhamādhuryam // BhN_26.18 //
analyzed: yatra strīṇām pāṭhyāt guṇaiḥ narāṇām ca kaṇṭha mādhuryam
prakṛti viparyaya janitau vijñeyau tau alaṅkārau
prāyeṇa deva pārthiva senāpati mukhya puruṣa bhavaneṣu
strī jana kṛtāḥ prayogāḥ bhavanti puruṣa svabhāvena
rambhā urvaśī prabhṛtiṣu svarge nāṭyam pratiṣṭhitam
tathā eva mānuṣe loke rājñām antaḥpureṣu iha
upadeṣṭavyam ācāryaiḥ prayatnena aṅganā jane

original: na svayaṃ bhūmikābhyāso budhaiḥ kāryastu nāṭake /
analyzed: na svayam bhūmikā abhyāsaḥ budhaiḥ kāryaḥ tu nāṭake

original: strīṣu yojyaḥ prayatnena prayogaḥ puruṣāśrayaḥ // BhN_26.22 //
analyzed: strīṣu yojyaḥ prayatnena prayogaḥ puruṣa āśrayaḥ
yasmāt svabhāva upagataḥ vilāsaḥ strīṣu vidyate
tasmāt svabhāva madhuram aṅgam sulabha sauṣṭhavam

original: lalitaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ yacca so 'laṅkāraḥ paro mataḥ /
analyzed: lalitam sauṣṭhavam yat ca saḥ laṅkāraḥ paraḥ mataḥ
prayogaḥ dvividhaḥ ca eva vijñeyaḥ nāṭaka āśrayaḥ
sukumāraḥ tathā viddhaḥ nānā bhāva rasa āśrayaḥ

original: nāṭakaṃ saprakaraṇaṃ bhāṇo vīthyaṅka eva ca // BhN_26.25 //
analyzed: nāṭakam sa prakaraṇam bhāṇaḥ vīthi aṅkaḥ eva ca
jñeyāni sukumārāṇi mānuṣaiḥ āśritāni tu
su kumāra prayogaḥ yam rājñām āmoda kārakaḥ
śṛṅgārasam āsādya strīṇām tat tu prayojayet
yuddha uddhata aviddha kṛta a saṃraṃbha ārabhaṭāḥ ca ye

original: na te strīṇāṃ prakartavyāḥ kartavyāḥ puruṣairhi te /
analyzed: na te strīṇām prakartavyāḥ kartavyāḥ puruṣaiḥ hi te
yathā āviddha aṅgahāram tu bhedya bhedya āhava ātmakam
puruṣa prāya saṃcāram alpa strīkam atha uddhatam
sātvatī ārabhaṭī yuktam nāṭyam āviddha saṃjñitam
ḍimaḥ samavakāraḥ ca vyāyaḥ gehāmṛgau tathā
etāni āviddha saṃjñāni vijñeyāni prayoktṛbhiḥ
eṣām prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ deva dānava rākṣasaiḥ
uddhatāḥ ye ca puruṣāḥ śaurya vīrya samanvitāḥ

original: yogyaḥ sa ca prayatnaḥ kartavyaḥ satatapramādena // BhN_26.32 //
analyzed: yogyaḥ sa ca prayatnaḥ kartavyaḥ satata pramādena

original: na hi yogyayā vinā bhavati ca bhāvarasasauṣṭhavaṃ kiṃcit /
analyzed: na hi yogyayā vinā bhavati ca bhāva rasa sauṣṭhavam kiṃcid

original: saṃgītaparikleśo nityaṃ pramadājanasya guṇa eva // BhN_26.33 //
analyzed: saṃgīta parikleśaḥ nityam pramadā janasya guṇaḥ eva
yat madhura karkaśa tvam labhate nāṭya prayogeṇa
pramadāḥ nāṭya vilāsaiḥ labhate yat kusumaiḥ vicitra lāvaṇyam

original: kāmopacārakuśalā bhavanti ca kāmyā viśeṣeṇa // BhN_26.34 //
analyzed: kāma upacāra kuśalāḥ bhavanti ca kāmyāḥ viśeṣeṇa
gītam vṛttam tathā vādyam prastāra gamana kriyā
śiṣya niṣpādanam ca eva ṣaṭ ācārya guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: etāni pañca yo vetti sa ācāryaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: etāni pañca yaḥ vetti saḥ ācāryaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: ūhāpohau matiścaiva smṛtirmedhā tathaiva ca // BhN_26.36 //
analyzed: ūha apohau matiḥ ca eva smṛtiḥ medhā tathā eva ca
medhā smṛtiḥ guṇa ślāghā rāgaḥ saṃgharṣaḥ eva ca

original: utsāhaśca ṣaḍevaitān śiṣyasyāpi guṇān viduḥ // BhN_26.37 //
analyzed: utsāhaḥ ca ṣaṭ eva etān śiṣyasya api guṇān viduḥ
evam kāryam prayoga jñaiḥ nānā bhūmi vikalpanam

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi siddhīnāmapi lakṣaṇam // BhN_26.38 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi siddhīnām api lakṣaṇam

original: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre vikṛtivikalpo nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre vikṛtivikalpaḥ nāma ṣaḍviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha saptaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
siddhīnām tu pravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam nāṭaka āśrayam
yasmāt prayogaḥ sarvaḥ yam siddhi artham saṃpradarśitaḥ
siddhiḥ tu dvividhā jñeyā vāc manaḥ oṅga samudbhavā

original: daivī ca mānuṣī caiva nānābhāvasamutthitā // BhN_27.2 //
analyzed: daivī ca mānuṣī ca eva nānā bhāva samutthitā

original: daśāṅgā mānuṣī siddhīrdaivī tu dvividhā smṛtā /
analyzed: daśa aṅgā mānuṣī siddhīḥ daivī tu dvividhā smṛtā
nānā sattva āśraya kṛtā vāc naipathya śarīra jā
smita apahāsinī hāsā sādhu aho kaṣṭam eva ca

original: prabaddhanādā ca tathā siddhirjñeyātha vāṅmayī // BhN_27.4 //
analyzed: prabaddha nādā ca tathā siddhiḥ jñeyā atha vāc mayī
pulakaiḥ ca sa romāñcaiḥ abhyutthānaiḥ tathā eva ca
cela dāna aṅguli kṣepaiḥ śārīrī siddhiḥ iṣyate
kiñcid śiṣṭaḥ rasaḥ hāsyaḥ nṛtyadbhiḥ yatra yujyate

original: smitena sa pratigrāhyaḥ prekṣakairnityameva ca // BhN_27.6 //
analyzed: smitena sa pratigrāhyaḥ prekṣakaiḥ nityam eva ca
kiñcid aspaṣṭa hāsyam yat tathā vacanam eva ca
artha hāsyena tat grāhyam prekṣakaiḥ nityam eva hi
vidūṣaka uccheda kṛtam bhavet śilpa kṛtam ca yat
ati hāsyena tat grāhyam prekṣakaiḥ nityam eva tu
ahokāraḥ tathā kāryaḥ nṛṇām prakṛti saṃbhavaḥ
yad dharma pada saṃyuktam yathā atiśaya saṃbhavam

original: tatra sādhviti yadvākyaṃ prayoktavyaṃ hi sādhakaiḥ /
analyzed: tatra sādhu iti yat vākyam prayoktavyam hi sādhakaiḥ
vismaya āviṣṭa bhāveṣu praharṣa artheṣu ca eva hi
prayoktavyam kaṣṭam śāstra kṛtena tu

original: prabaddhanādā ca tathā vismayārtheṣu nityaśaḥ // BhN_27.11 //
analyzed: prabaddha nādā ca tathā vismaya artheṣu nityaśas
sa adhikṣepeṣu vākyeṣu praspandita tanūruhaiḥ
kutūhala uttarā vedhaiḥ bahu mānena sādhayet
dīpta pradeśam yat kāryam chedya bhedya āhava ātmakam
sa vidravam atha utphullam tathā yuddha niyuddha jam
prakampita aṃsa śīrṣam ca sa aśram sa utthānam eva ca
tat prekṣakaiḥ tu kuśalaiḥ sādhyam evam vidhānataḥ
evam sādhayitavyā eṣā tad jñaiḥ siddhiḥ tu mānuṣī

original: daivikīñca punaḥ siddhiṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tattvataḥ // BhN_27.15 //
analyzed: daivikīm ca punar siddhim saṃpravakṣyāmi tattvataḥ
yā bhāva atiśaya upetā sattva yuktā tathā eva ca

original: sā prekṣakaistu kartavyā daivī siddhiḥ prayogataḥ // BhN_27.16 //
analyzed: sā prekṣakaiḥ tu kartavyā daivī siddhiḥ prayogataḥ

original: na śabdo na yatra na kṣobho na cotpātanidarśanam /
analyzed: na śabdaḥ na yatra na kṣobhaḥ na ca utpāta nidarśanam

original: saṃpūrṇatā ca raṃgasya daivī siddhistu sā smṛtā // BhN_27.17 //
analyzed: saṃpūrṇa tā ca raṃgasya daivī siddhiḥ tu sā smṛtā

original: daivī ca mānuṣī caiva siddhireṣā mayoditā /
analyzed: daivī ca mānuṣī ca eva siddhiḥ eṣā mayā uditā
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi
daiva ātma para samutthā trividhā ghātāḥ budhaiḥ tu vijñeyā
autpātikaḥ caturthaḥ kadācid atha saṃbhavati eṣu
vāta agni varṣa kuñjara bhujaṅga maṇḍapa nipātāḥ
kīṭa vyāla pipīlika paśu praveśanāḥ ca daivaka kṛtā
ghātanataḥ param aham para yuktān saṃpravakṣyāmi
vaivarṇyam ca aceṣṭam vibhramita tvam smṛti pramohaḥ ca
anya vacanam ca kāvyam tathā aṃga doṣaḥ vihasta tvam

original: ete tvātmasamutthā ghātā jñeyā prayogajñaiḥ] // BhN_27.22 //
analyzed: ete tu ātma samutthāḥ ghātāḥ jñeyā prayoga jñaiḥ
mātsaryāt dveṣāt vā tad pakṣa tvāt tathā artha bheda tvāt

original: ete tu parasamutthā jñeyā ghātā budhairnityam // BhN_27.23 //
analyzed: ete tu para samutthāḥ jñeyāḥ ghātāḥ budhaiḥ nityam
ati hasita rudita visphoṭita anyathā utkṛṣṭa nālikā pātāḥ
gomaya loṣṭa pipīlikā vikṣepāḥ ca ari saṃbhūtāḥ
autpatikāḥ ca ghātāḥ matta unmatta praveśa liṅga kṛtaḥ
punar ātma samutthāḥ ye ghātān tān tān pravakṣyāmi
vailakṣaṇyam aceṣṭita vibhūmika tvam smṛti pramoṣaḥ ca

original: anyavacanaṃ ca kāvyaṃ tathārtanādo vihastatvam // BhN_27.26 //
analyzed: anya vacanam ca kāvyam tathā ārta nādaḥ vihasta tvam
ati hasita rudita visvara pipīlikā kīṭa paśu virāvāḥ ca
mukuṭa ābharaṇa nipātā puṣkara jāḥ kāvya doṣāḥ ca
ati hasita rudita hasitāni siddhaiḥ bhāvasya dūṣakāṇi syuḥ
kīṭa pipīlika pātā siddhim sarva ātmanā ghnānta
vivasvaram ajāta tālam varṇa svara saṃpadā ca parihīṇam
ajñāta sthāna layam svara gatam evaṃvidham hanyāt
mukuṭa ābharaṇa nipātaḥ prabaddha nādaḥ ca nāśanaḥ bhavati

original: paśuviśasanaṃ tatha a syādbahuvacanaghnaṃ prayogeṣu // BhN_27.30 //
analyzed: paśu viśasanam syāt bahuvacana ghnam prayogeṣu
viṣamam māna vihīnam vimārjanam ca ākula prahāram ca
avibhakta graha mokṣam puṣkara gatam īdṛśam hanti
punaruktaḥ hi asamāsaḥ vibhakti bhedaḥ pārthaḥ
trailiṅga jaḥ ca doṣaḥ pratyakṣa parokṣa saṃmohāḥ

original: etāni yathā sthūlaṃ ghātasthānāni kāvyasya // BhN_27.33 //
analyzed: etāni yathā sthūlam ghāta sthānāni kāvyasya

original: jñeyau tu kāvyajātau dvau ghātāvapratikriyau nityam /
analyzed: jñeyau tu kāvya jātau dvau ghātau apratikriyau nityam
prakṛti vyasana samutthaḥ śeṣa udaka nālika tvam
apratibhāgam skhalanam visvaram uccāraṇam ca kāvyasya
asthāna bhūṣaṇa tvam patanam mukuṭasya vibhraṃśaḥ
vāji syandana kuñjara khara uṣṭra śibikā vimāna yānānām
ārohaṇa avataraṇeṣu anabhijña tvam vihastvam
praharaṇa kavacānām api ayathā grahaṇam vidhāraṇam ca api
a mukuṭa bhūṣaṇa yogaḥ cira praveśaḥ raṅge
ebhiḥ sthāna viśeṣaiḥ ghātāḥ lakṣyāḥ tu sūribhiḥ kuśalaiḥ
yūpa agni cayana darbha straj bhāṇḍa parigrahān muktvā
siddhyā miśraḥ ghātaḥ sarva gataḥ ca eka deśa jaḥ vā api

original: nāṭyakuśalaiḥ salekhyā siddhirvā syādvighāto vā // BhN_27.39 //
analyzed: nāṭya kuśalaiḥ sa lekhyā siddhiḥ vā syāt vighātaḥ vā
na ālekhyaḥ bahu dina jaḥ sarva gataḥ vyakta lakṣaṇa viśeṣaḥ
yaḥ tu a eka divasa jātaḥ sa lekhyaḥ syāt
jarjaramokṣyasya ante siddheḥ mokṣaḥ tu nālikāyāḥ tu
kartavyaḥ tu iha satatam nāṭya jñaiḥ prāśnikaiḥ vidhinā

original: dainye dīnatvamāyānti te nāṭye prekṣakāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: dainye dīna tvam āyānti te nāṭye prekṣakāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ye tuṣṭau tuṣṭimāyānti śoke śokaṃ vrajanti ca // BhN_27.42 //
analyzed: ye tuṣṭau tuṣṭim āyānti śoke śokam vrajanti ca

original: yo 'nyasya mahe mūrdho nāṃdīślokaṃ paṭheddhi devasya /
analyzed: yaḥ nyasya mahe mūrdhaḥ nāṃdī ślokam paṭhet hi devasya
sva vaśena pūrvaraṅge siddheḥ ghātaḥ prayogasya
yaḥ deśa bhāva rahitam bhāṣā kāvyam prayojayet buddhyā
tasya api abhilekhyaḥ syāt ghātaḥ deśaḥ prayoga jñaiḥ
kaḥ śaktaḥ nāṭya vidhau yathāvat upapādanam prayogasya

original: kartuṃ vyagramanā vā yathāvaduktaṃ parijñātam // BhN_27.45 //
analyzed: kartum vyagra manāḥ vā yathāvat uktam parijñātam
tasmāt gambhīra arthāḥ śabdāḥ ye loka veda saṃsiddhāḥ

original: sarvajanena grāhyā yojyā nāṭake vidhivat // BhN_27.46 //
analyzed: sarva janena grāhyā yojyā nāṭake vidhivat

original: na ca kiñcidguṇahīnaṃ doṣaiḥ parivarjitaṃ na cākiñcit /
analyzed: na ca kiñcid guṇa hīnam doṣaiḥ parivarjitam na ca akiñcit
tasmāt nāṭya prakṛtau doṣāḥ nāṭya arthataḥ grāhyā

original: na ca nādarastu kāryo naṭena vāgaṅgasattvanepathye /
analyzed: na ca na ādaraḥ tu kāryaḥ naṭena vāc aṅga sattva nepathye
rasa bhāvayoḥ ca gīteṣu ātodye loka yuktyām ca
evam etat tu vijñeyam siddhīnām lakṣaṇam budhaiḥ

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi prāśnikānāṃ tu lakṣaṇam // BhN_27.49 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi prāśnikānām tu lakṣaṇam
cāritra abhijana upetāḥ śānta vṛttāḥ kṛta śramāḥ
yaśaḥ dharma parāḥ ca eva madhyastha vayasā anvitāḥ
ṣaḍaṅga nāṭya kuśalāḥ prabuddhāḥ śucayaḥ samāḥ
catur ātodya kuśalāḥ vṛtta jñāḥ tattva darśinaḥ
deśa bhāṣā vidhāna jñāḥ kalā śilpa prayojakāḥ
caturtha abhinaya upetāḥ rasa bhāva vikalpakāḥ
śabda chandaḥ vidhāna jñāḥ nānā śāstra vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: evaṃ vidhāstu kartavyāḥ prāśnikā daśarūpake // BhN_27.53 //
analyzed: evaṃvidhāḥ tu kartavyāḥ prāśnikāḥ daśa rūpake
avyagraiḥ indriyaiḥ śuddhaḥ ūha apoha viśāradaḥ

original: tyaktadoṣonuarāgī ca sa nāṭye prekṣakaḥ smṛtaḥ // BhN_27.54 //
analyzed: ca sa nāṭye prekṣakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: na caivete guṇāḥ samyak sarvasmin prekṣake smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: na ca eva ite guṇāḥ samyak sarvasmin prekṣake smṛtāḥ
vijñeyasya aprameya tvāt saṃkīrṇānām ca pārṣadi
yadi asya śilpam nepathyam karma ceṣṭitam eva vā

original: tattathā tena kāryaṃ tu svakarmaviṣayaṃ prati // BhN_27.56 //
analyzed: tat tathā tena kāryam tu sva karma viṣayam prati
nānā śīlāḥ prakṛtayaḥ śīle nāṭyam vinirmitam
uttama adhama madhyānām vṛddha bāliśa yoṣitām
tuṣyanti taruṇāḥ kāme vidagdhāḥ
artheṣu artha parāḥ ca eva mokṣe ca atha virāgiṇaḥ
śūrāḥ tu vīra raudreṣu niyuddheṣu āhaveṣu ca
dharma ākhyāne purāṇeṣu vṛddhāḥ tuṣyanti nityaśas
na śakyam adhamaiḥ jñātum uttamānām viceṣṭitam

original: tattvabhāveṣu sarveṣu tuṣyanti satataṃ budhāḥ // BhN_27.60 //
analyzed: tattva bhāveṣu sarveṣu tuṣyanti satatam budhāḥ
bālāḥ mūrkhāḥ striyaḥ ca eva hāsya naipathyayoḥ sadā

original: yastuṣṭo tuṣṭimāyāti śoke śokamupaiti ca // BhN_27.61 //
analyzed: yaḥ tuṣṭaḥ tuṣṭim āyāti śoke śokam upaiti ca

original: kruddhaḥ krodhe bhaye bhītaḥ sa śreṣṭhaḥ prekṣakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kruddhaḥ krodhe bhaye bhītaḥ sa śreṣṭhaḥ prekṣakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: evaṃ bhāvānukaraṇe yo yasmin praviśennaraḥ // BhN_27.62 //
analyzed: evam bhāva anukaraṇe yaḥ yasmin praviśet naraḥ
sa tatra prekṣakaḥ jñeyaḥ guṇaiḥ ebhiḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ

original: evaṃ hi prekṣakā jñeyāḥ prayoge daśarūpataḥ // BhN_27.63 //
analyzed: evam hi prekṣakāḥ jñeyāḥ prayoge daśa rūpataḥ
saṃgharṣe tu samutpanne prāśnikān saṃnibodhata
yajña vid nartakaḥ ca eva chandaḥ vid śabda vid tathā
yajña vid yajña yoge tu nartakaḥ bhinaye smṛtaḥ
chandaḥ vid vṛtta bandheṣu śabda vid pāṭhya vistare

original: iṣvastravitsauṣṭhave tu nepathye caiva citrakṛt // BhN_27.66 //
analyzed: iṣu astra vid sauṣṭhave tu nepathye ca eva citra kṛt
kāma upacāre veśyā ca gāndharvaḥ svarakarmaṇi

original: sevakastūpacāre syādete vai prāśnikāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_27.67 //
analyzed: sevakaḥ tu upacāre syāt ete vai prāśnikāḥ smṛtāḥ
ebhiḥ dṛṣṭānta saṃyuktaiḥ doṣāḥ vācyāḥ tathā guṇāḥ
a śāstra jñāḥ vivādeṣu yathā prakṛti karmataḥ

original: athaite praśnikā jñeyāḥ kathitā ye mayānaghāḥ /
analyzed: athā ete praśnikāḥ jñeyāḥ kathitāḥ ye mayā anaghāḥ
śāstra jñānāt yadā tu syāt saṃgharṣaḥ śāstra saṃśrayaḥ
śāstra prāmāṇa nirmāṇaiḥ vyavahāraḥ bhavet tadā
bhartṛ niyogāt anyaḥ nyavigrāt spardhayā api bharatānām
arthapatākāḥ hetoḥ saṃgharṣaḥ nāma saṃbhavati
teṣām kāryam vyavahāra darśanam pakṣapāta viraheṇa

original: kṛtvā paṇaṃ patākāṃ vyavahāraḥ sa bhavitavyastu /
analyzed: kṛtvā paṇam patākām vyavahāraḥ sa bhavitavyaḥ tu
sarvaiḥ ananya matibhiḥ sukha upaviṣṭaiḥ ca śuddha bhāvaiḥ ca
yaiḥ lekhaka gamaka sahāyāḥ saha siddhibhiḥ ghātāḥ
na ati āsanaiḥ na dūra saṃsthitaiḥ prekṣakaiḥ tu bhavitavyam
teṣām āsana yogaḥ dvādaśa hasta sthitaḥ kāryaḥ

original: yāni vihitāni pūrvaṃ siddhisthānāni tāni lakṣyāṇi // BhN_27.74 //
analyzed: yāni vihitāni pūrvam siddhisthānāni tāni lakṣyāṇi
ghātāḥ ca lakṣaṇīyāḥ prayogataḥ nāṭya yoge tu
daivāt ghāta samutthāḥ para utthitāḥ vā budhaiḥ navaiḥ lekhyāḥ
ghātāḥ nāṭya samutthāḥ hi ātma samutthāḥ tu lekhyāḥ syuḥ

original: ghātā yasya tvalpāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ siddhayaśca bahulāḥ syuḥ // BhN_27.76 //
analyzed: ghātāḥ yasya tu alpāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ siddhayaḥ ca bahulāḥ syuḥ

original: viditaṃ kṛtvā rājñastasmai deyā patākā hi /
analyzed: viditam kṛtvā rājñaḥ tasmai deyā patākā hi
sidhi atiśayāt patākā sama siddhau pārthiva ājñayā deyā

original: atha narapatiḥ samaḥ syādubhayorapi sā tadā deyā /
analyzed: atha narapatiḥ samaḥ syāt ubhayoḥ api sā tadā deyā
evam vidhi jñaiḥ yaṣṭavyaḥ vyavahāraḥ samañjasām
su viśiṣṭaiḥ guṇa arthibhiḥ
vimṛśya prekṣakaiḥ grāhyam sarva rāga para aṅga mukhaiḥ
sādhana dūṣaṇa ābhāsaḥ prayoga samaya āśritaiḥ
sama tvam aṅga mādhuryam pāṭhyam prakṛtayaḥ rasāḥ
vādyam gānam sa nepathyam etat jñeyam prayatnataḥ
gīta vāditra tālena kalā antara kalāsu ca
kriyate nāṭyam samantāt samamucyate
aṅga upāṅga samāyuktam gīta tāla laya anvitam
gāna vādya sama tvam ca tat budhaiḥ samam ucyate
sa nirbhugnam uraḥ kṛtvā caturaśra krutau karau
grīvā āñcitā tathā tu aṅga mādhuryam eva ca

original: pūrvroktānīha śeṣāṇi yāni dravyāṇi sādhakaiḥ // BhN_27.84 //
analyzed: pūrvra uktāni iha śeṣāṇi yāni dravyāṇi sādhakaiḥ
vadya ādīnām punar vuprāḥ lakṣaṇam san nibodhata
vādya prabhṛtayaḥ gānam vādyamāṇāni nirdiśet

original: yāni sthānāni siddhīnāṃ taiḥ siddhiṃ tu prakāśayet /
analyzed: yāni sthānāni siddhīnām taiḥ siddhim tu prakāśayet
harṣāt aṅga samudbhūtām nānā rasa samutthitām
vārakālāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ nāṭya jñaiḥ vividha āśrayāḥ
divasaiḥ ca eva rātriḥ ca tayoḥ vārān nibodhata
pūrvāhṇaḥ tu atha madhyāhnaḥ tu aparāhṇaḥ tathā eva ca

original: divā samutthā vijñeyā nāṭyavārāḥ prayogataḥ // BhN_27.88 //
analyzed: divā samutthāḥ vijñeyāḥ nāṭyavārāḥ prayogataḥ
prādoṣikā ardharātriḥ ca tathā paraḥ
nāṭya vārāḥ bhavanti ete rātrau iti anupūrvaśas
eteṣām atra yat yojyam nāṭya kāryam rasa āśrayam
tat aham saṃpravakṣyāmi vāra kāla samāśrayam
yat śrotra ramaṇīyam syāt dharma utthana kṛtam ca yat

original: pūrvāhṇe tatprayoktavyaṃ śuddhaṃ vā vikṛtaṃ tathā // BhN_27.91 //
analyzed: pūrvāhṇe tat prayoktavyam śuddham vā vikṛtam tathā
sattva utthāna guṇaiḥ yuktam vādya bhūyiṣṭham eva ca

original: puṣkalaṃ sattvayuktaṃ ca aparāhṇe prayojayet // BhN_27.92 //
analyzed: puṣkalam sattva yuktam ca aparāhṇe prayojayet
nṛtya vāditra gīta āḍhyam pradoṣe nāṭyam iṣyate
yat narma hāsya bahulam karuṇa prāyam eva ca
prabhāta kāle tat kāryam nāṭyam nidrā vināśanam
ardharātre niyuñjīta sa madhyāhne tathā eva ca

original: sandhyābhojanakāle ca nāṭyaṃ naiva prayojayet // BhN_27.95 //
analyzed: sandhyā bhojana kāle ca nāṭyam nā eva prayojayet

original: evaṃ kālaṃ ca deśaṃ ca samīkṣya ca balābalam /
analyzed: evam kālam ca deśam ca samīkṣya ca balābalam

original: nityaṃ nāṭyaṃ prayuñjīta yathābhāvaṃ yathārasam // BhN_27.96 //
analyzed: nityam nāṭyam prayuñjīta yathābhāvam yathārasam

original: athava deśakālau ca na parīkṣyau prayoktṛbhiḥ
analyzed: athavā deśa kālau ca na parīkṣyau prayoktṛbhiḥ
yathā eva ājñāpayet bhartā tadā yojyam asaṃśayam
tathā samudiātāḥ ca eva vijñeyāḥ nāṭaka āśritāḥ

original: pātraṃ prayogamṛddhiśca vijñeyāstu trayo guṇāḥ // BhN_27.98 //
analyzed: pātram prayogam ṛddhiḥ ca vijñeyāḥ tu trayaḥ guṇāḥ
buddhimat tvam surūpa tvam laya tāla jña tā tathā
rasa bhāva jña tā ca eva vayaḥstha tvam kutūhalam
grahaṇam dhāraṇam ca eva gātra avaikalyam eva ca
nija sādhvasa tā utsāhaḥ iti pātra gataḥ vidhiḥ
su vādya tā su gāna tvam su pāṭhya tvam tathā eva ca
śāstra karma samāyogaḥ prayogaḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
śuci bhūṣaṇa tāyām tu mālya ābharaṇa vāsasām
vicitra racanā ca eva samṛddhiḥ iti saṃjñitā

original: yadā samuditāḥ sarve ekībhūtā bhavanti hi /
analyzed: yadā samuditāḥ sarve ekībhūtāḥ bhavanti hi
alaṅkārāḥ sa kutapāḥ mantavyaḥ nāṭaka āśrayāḥ
etat uktam dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ siddhīnām lakṣaṇam mayā
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi ātodyānām vikalpanam

original: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre siddhivyañjako nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāratīye nāṭya śāstre siddhivyañjakaḥ nāma saptaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha aṣṭāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ātodya vidhim idānīm vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tataṃ caivāvanaddhaṃ ca ghanaṃ suṣirameva ca /
analyzed: tatam ca eva avanaddham ca ghanam suṣiram eva ca
caturvidham tu vijñeyam ātodyam lakṣaṇa anvitam
tatam tantrīkṛtam jñeyam avanaddham tu pauṣkaram

original: ghanaṃ tālastu vijñeyaḥ suṣiro vaṃśa ucyate // BhN_28.2 //
analyzed: ghanam tālaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ suṣiraḥ vaṃśaḥ ucyate
prayogaḥ trividhaḥ hi eṣām vijñeyaḥ nāṭaka āśrayaḥ

original: tataṃ caivāvanaddhaṃ ca tathā nāṭyakṛto 'paraḥ // BhN_28.3 //
analyzed: tatam ca eva avanaddham ca tathā paraḥ
tatas kutapa vinyāsaḥ gāyanaḥ sa parigrahaḥ
vaipañcikaḥ vaiṇikaḥ ca vaṃśa vādaḥ tathā eva ca
mārdaṅgikaḥ pāṇavikaḥ tathā dārdurikaḥ budhaiḥ
avanaddha vidhau eṣa kutapaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ
uttama adhama madhyābhiḥ tathā prakṛtibhiḥ yutaḥ
kutapaḥ nāṭya yoge tu nānā deśa samāśrayaḥ

original: evaṃ gānaṃ ca vādyaṃ ca nāṭyaṃ ca vividhāśrayam /
analyzed: evam gānam ca vādyam ca nāṭyam ca vividha āśrayam
alāta cakra pratimam kartavyam nāṭya yoktṛbhiḥ
yat tu tantrīkṛtam proktam nānā todya samāśrayam
gāndharvam iti tat jñeyam svara tāla pada ātmakam
atyartham iṣṭam devānām tathā prīti karam punar
gandharvāṇām ca yasmāt hi tasmāt gandharvam ucyate
asya yoniḥ bhavet gānam vīṇā vaṃśaḥ tathā eva ca

original: eteṣāṃ caiva vakṣyāmi vidhiṃ svarasamutthitam // BhN_28.10 //
analyzed: eteṣām ca eva vakṣyāmi vidhim svara samutthitam
gāndharvam trividham vidyāt svara tāla pada ātmakam

original: trividhasyāpi vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇaṃ karma caiva hi // BhN_28.11 //
analyzed: trividhasya api vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam karma ca eva hi
dvi adhiṣṭhānāḥ svarāḥ vaiṇāḥ śārīrāḥ ca prakīrtitāḥ
eteṣām saṃpravakṣyāmi vidhānam lakṣaṇa anvitam

original: svarā grāmau mūrcchanāśca tānāḥ sthānāni vṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: svarāḥ grāmau mūrcchanāḥ ca tānāḥ sthānāni vṛttayaḥ

original: śuṣkaṃ sādhāraṇe varṇā hyalaṅkārāśca dhātavaḥ // BhN_28.13 //
analyzed: śuṣkam sādhāraṇe varṇāḥ hi alaṅkārāḥ ca dhātavaḥ
śrutayaḥ yatayaḥ ca eva nityam svara gata ātmakāḥ
dāravyām samavāyaḥ tu vīṇāyām samudāhṛtaḥ
svarāḥ grāmau alaṅkārāḥ varṇāḥ sthānāni jātayaḥ

original: sādhāraṇe ca śarīryāṃ vīṇāyāmeṣa saṃgrahaḥ // BhN_28.15 //
analyzed: sādhāraṇe ca śarīryām vīṇāyām eṣa saṃgrahaḥ
vyañjanāni svarāḥ varṇāḥ sandhayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ
nāma ākhyāta upasargāḥ ca nipātāḥ taddhitāḥ kṛtaḥ
chandaḥ vidhiḥ alaṅkārāḥ jñeyaḥ pada gataḥ vidhiḥ

original: nibaddhaṃ cānibaddhaṃ ca dvividhaṃ tatpadaṃ smṛtam // BhN_28.17 //
analyzed: nibaddham ca anibaddham ca dvividham tat padam smṛtam
dhruvaḥ tu āvāpa niṣkāmau praveśanam

original: śamyā tālaḥ sannipātaḥ parivartaḥ savastukaḥ // BhN_28.18 //
analyzed: śamyā tālaḥ sannipātaḥ parivartaḥ savastukaḥ
mātrā prakaraṇa aṅgāni vivārī yatayaḥ layāḥ
gītayaḥ vayavāḥ mārgāḥ pāda mārgāḥ sa pāṇayaḥ
iti ekaviṃśatividham jñeyam tālagatam budhaiḥ

original: gāndharvasaṃgraho hyeṣa vistaraṃ tu nibodhata // BhN_28.20 //
analyzed: gāndharva saṃgrahaḥ hi eṣa vistaram tu nibodhata
tatra svarāḥ
ṣaḍjaḥ ca ṛṣabhaḥ ca eva gāndhāraḥ madhyamaḥ tathā
pañcamaḥ dhaivataḥ ca eva niṣādavān
caturvidha tvam eteṣām vijñeyam gāna yoktṛbhiḥ

original: vādī caivātha saṃvādī vivādī cānuvādyapi // BhN_28.22 //
analyzed: vādī ca eva atha saṃvādī vivādī ca anuvādī api
saṃvādaḥ madhyama grāme pañcamasya ṛṣabhasya ca

original: ṣaḍjagrāme tu ṣaḍjasya saṃvādaḥ pañcamasya ca // BhN_28.23 //
analyzed: ṣaḍja grāme tu ṣaḍjasya saṃvādaḥ pañcamasya ca

original: tisro dve ca catasraśca catasrastisra eva ca /
analyzed: tisraḥ dve ca catasraḥ ca catasraḥ tisraḥ eva ca

original: dve caivādya catasraśca ṣaḍjagrāme bhavedvidhiḥ // BhN_28.24 //
analyzed: dve ca eva adya catasraḥ ca ṣaḍja grāme bhavet vidhiḥ
catur śrutiḥ bhavet ṣaḍjaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ tri śrutiḥ smṛtaḥ
dvi śrutiḥ ca eva gāndhāraḥ madhyamaḥ ca catur śrutiḥ
pañcamaḥ tadvat eva syāt tri śrutiḥ dhaivataḥ mataḥ

original: dviśrutiśca niṣādaḥ syāt ṣaḍjagrāme vidhirbhavet // BhN_28.26 //
analyzed: dvi śrutiḥ ca niṣādaḥ syāt ṣaḍja grāme vidhiḥ bhavet
atha mūrcchanāḥ dvaigrāmikyaḥ caturdaśa
ādau uttara mandrā syāt rajanī ca uttara āyatā

original: caturthī śuddhaṣaḍjā tu pañcamī matsarīkṛtā // BhN_28.27 //
analyzed: caturthī śuddha ṣaḍjā tu pañcamī matsarīkṛtā
aśvakrāntā tathā ṣaṣṭhī saptamī ca ābhiḥ udgatā
ṣaḍja grāma āśritāḥ hi etāḥ vijñeyāḥ sapta mūrcchanāḥ
ṣaḍje ca uttara mandrā syāt ṛṣabhe ca ābhiḥ udgatā

original: aśvakrāntā tu gāndhāre madhyame matsarīkṛtā // BhN_28.29 //
analyzed: aśva krāntā tu gāndhāre madhyame matsarīkṛtā

original: niṣāde rajanī ca syādityetāḥ ṣaḍjamūrcchanāḥ // BhN_28.30 //
analyzed: niṣāde rajanī ca syāt iti etāḥ ṣaḍja mūrcchanāḥ
atha madhyama grāme
sauvīrī hariṇāśvā ca syāt kalā upanatā tathā

original: śuddhamadhyā tathā mārgī pauravī hṛṣyakā tathā /
analyzed: śuddhamadhyā tathā mārgī pauravī hṛṣyakā tathā
madhyama grāma jāḥ hi etāḥ vijñeyāḥ sapta mūrcchanāḥ
api ca
krama yuktāḥ svarāḥ sapta mūrcchanā iti abhisaṃjñitāḥ
ṣaṣ pañca svaraka āstānāḥ ṣāḍava auḍuvita āśrayāḥ
sādhāraṇa kṛtāḥ ca eva kākalī samalaṅkṛtāḥ
antara svara saṃyuktā mūrcchanā grāmayoḥ dvayoḥ
yathā

original: chāyāsu bhavati śītaṃ prasvedo bhavati cātapasthasya /
analyzed: chāyāsu bhavati śītam prasvedaḥ bhavati ca ātapa sthasya

original: na ca nāgato vasanto na ca niḥśeṣaḥ śiśirakālaḥ // BhN_28.34 //
analyzed: na ca na āgataḥ vasantaḥ na ca niḥśeṣaḥ śiśira kālaḥ
bhavataḥ ca atra
antara svara saṃyogaḥ nityam ārohi saṃśrayaḥ

original: kāryo hyalpo viśeṣeṇa nāvarohī kadācana // BhN_28.35 //
analyzed: kāryaḥ hi alpaḥ viśeṣeṇa na avarohī kadācana

original: kriyamāṇo 'varohī syādalpo vā yadi vā bahuḥ /
analyzed: kriyamāṇaḥ varohī syāt alpaḥ vā yadi vā bahuḥ

original: jātirāgaṃ śrutiṃ caiva nayante tvantarasvarāḥ // BhN_28.36 // iti
analyzed: jāti rāgam śrutim ca eva nayante tu antara svarāḥ iti
jātīḥ idānīm vakṣyāmaḥ
svara sādhāraṇa gatāḥ tisraḥ jñeyāḥ tu jātayaḥ

original: madhyamā pañcamī caiva ṣaḍjamadhyā tathaiva ca // BhN_28.37 //
analyzed: madhyamā pañcamī ca eva ṣaḍja madhyā tathā eva ca

original: yathā svaṃ durbalatarā vyaktā sā pañcamī tathā // BhN_28.38 //
analyzed: yathā svam durbalatarā vyaktā sā pañcamī tathā
jātayaḥ ṣṭādaśa iti evam brahmaṇā abhihitam purā
tāḥ tu aham vartayiṣyāmi graha aṃśa ādi vibhāgataḥ
ṣāḍjī ca eva ārṣabhī ca eva dhaivatī atha niṣādinī

original: ṣaḍjodīcyavatī caiva tathā vai ṣaḍjakaiśikī // BhN_28.40 //
analyzed: ṣaḍja udīcyavatī ca eva tathā vai ṣaḍja kaiśikī
ṣaḍja madhyā tathā ca eva ṣaḍja grāma samāśrayāḥ
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi madhyamagrāma saṃśritāḥ
gāndhārī madhyamā ca eva gāndhārā udīcyavā tathā
pañcamī raktagāndhārī tathā gāndhārapañcamī
ca eva nandayanti tathā eva ca

original: karmāravī ca vijñeyā tathāndhrī kaiśikī matā // BhN_28.43 //
analyzed: karmāravī ca vijñeyā tathā āndhrī kaiśikī matā

original: madhyamā ṣaḍjamadhyā ca pañcamī caiva sūribhiḥ // BhN_28.44 //
analyzed: madhyamā ṣaḍja madhyā ca pañcamī ca eva sūribhiḥ
āsām aṃśāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ ṣaḍja madhyama pañcamāḥ
yathāsvam durbalataram vyatyāsāt tu atra pañcamī
śuddhāḥ vikṛtāḥ ca eva hi samavāyāt jātayaḥ tu jāyante

original: tāsāṃ yannirvṛttāḥ svareṣvathāṃśeṣu jātiṣu ca jātiḥ /
analyzed: tāsām yat nirvṛttāḥ svareṣu atha aṃśeṣu jātiṣu ca jātiḥ
tat vakṣyāmi yathāvat saṃkṣepeṇa krameṇa iha
paraspara viniṣpannāḥ jñeyāḥ hi evam tu jātayaḥ

original: catasro jātayo nityaṃ jñeyāḥ saptasvarā budhaiḥ /
analyzed: catasraḥ jātayaḥ nityam jñeyāḥ sapta svarāḥ budhaiḥ

original: catasraḥ ṣaṭsvarā jñeyāḥ smṛtāḥ pañcasvarā daśa // BhN_28.49 //
analyzed: catasraḥ ṣaṣ svarāḥ jñeyāḥ smṛtāḥ pañca svarāḥ daśa
ca eva tathā vai ṣaḍja kaiśikī

original: kārmāravī ca saṃpūrṇā tathā gāndhārapañcamī // BhN_28.50 //
analyzed: kārmāravī ca saṃpūrṇā tathā gāndhārapañcamī
ṣāḍjī āndhrī nandayantī ca gāndhārā udīcyavā tathā

original: catasraḥ ṣaṭsvarā hyetāḥ jñeyāḥ pañca svarā daśa // BhN_28.51 //
analyzed: catasraḥ ṣaṣ svarāḥ hi etāḥ jñeyāḥ pañca svarāḥ daśa
naiṣādī ca ārṣabhī ca eva dhaivatī ṣaḍja madhyamā

original: ṣaḍjodīcyavatī caiva pañca ṣaḍjāśritāḥ smṛtāḥ // BhN_28.52 //
analyzed: ṣaḍja udīcyavatī ca eva pañca ṣaḍja āśritāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: yāstāḥ saptasvarā jñeyā yāścaitāḥ ṣaṭsvarāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ sapta svarāḥ jñeyāḥ yāḥ ca etāḥ ṣaṣ svarāḥ smṛtāḥ
kadācid ṣāḍavībhūtāḥ kadācid ca auḍuve matāḥ
ṣaḍja grāme tu sampūrṇā vijñeyā ṣaḍjakaiśikī

original: ṣaṭsvarā caiva vijñeyā ṣāḍjī gāndhārayogataḥ // BhN_28.55 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ svarā ca eva vijñeyā ṣāḍjī gāndhāra yogataḥ
gāndhārapañcamī ca eva madhyamā udīcyavā tathā

original: punaśca ṣaṭsvarā jñeyā gāndhārodīcyavā budhaiḥ // BhN_28.56 //
analyzed: punar ca ṣaṣ svarāḥ jñeyāḥ gāndhāra udīcyavāḥ budhaiḥ
āndhrī ca nandayantī ca madhyama grāma saṃśrayāḥ
evam etāḥ budhaiḥ jñeyāḥ jātayaḥ
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi tāsām aṃśa vikalpanam

original: ṣaṭsvarāḥ saptame hyaṃśe neṣyante ṣaḍjamadhyamāḥ // BhN_28.58 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ svarāḥ saptame hi aṃśe na iṣyante ṣaḍja madhyamāḥ
saṃvādya lopāt gāndhāre tadvat eva hi nā iṣyate
gāndhārī rakta gāndhārī kaiśikīnām tu pañcamaḥ
ṣaḍjāyām ca eva gāndhāram aṃśakam viddhi ṣāḍavam
ṣāḍavam dhaivate na asti ṣaḍja udīcyām atha aṃśake
saṃvādya lopāt saptā etāḥ ṣāṭsvaryeṇa vivarjitāḥ
gāndhārī raktagāndhāryoḥ ṣaḍja madhyama pañcamāḥ
saptamaḥ ca eva vijñeyaḥ yeṣu na auḍuvitam bhavet

original: dvau ṣaḍjamadhyamāṃśo tu gāndhāro 'tha niṣādavān // BhN_28.62 //
analyzed: dvau tu
ṛṣabhaḥ ca eva pañcamyām kaiśikyām ca eva dhaivataḥ

original: evaṃ tu dvādaśaiveha varjyāḥ pañca svarāḥ sadā // BhN_28.63 //
analyzed: evam tu dvādaśa eva iha varjyāḥ pañca svarāḥ sadā
tāḥ tu anauḍuvitāḥ nityam kartavyāḥ hi svara āśrayāḥ
sarva svarāṇām nāśaḥ tu vihitaḥ tu atha jātiṣu

original: na madhyamasya nāśastu kartavyo hi kadācana /
analyzed: na madhyamasya nāśaḥ tu kartavyaḥ hi kadācana
sarva svarāṇām pravaraḥ hi anāśī madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: gāndharvakalpe vihitaḥ sāmasvapi ca madhyamaḥ // BhN_28.65 //
analyzed: gāndharva kalpe vihitaḥ sāmasu api ca madhyamaḥ
daśakam jāti lakṣaṇam

original: grahāṃśau tāramandrau ca nyāso 'panyāsa eva ca /
analyzed: graha aṃśau tāra mandrau ca nyāsaḥ upanyāsaḥ eva ca

original: alpatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ ca ṣāḍavauḍuvite tathā // BhN_28.66 //
analyzed: alpatvam ca bahutvam ca ṣāḍava auḍuvite tathā
atha grahāḥ
grahāḥ tu sarva jātīnām aṃśa vat parikīrtitāḥ
yat pravṛttam bhavet geyam aṃśaḥ graha vikalpitaḥ
tatra aṃśaḥ nāma
yasmin bhavati rāgaḥ ca yasmāt ca eva pravartate
mandraḥ ca tāra mandraḥ ca tyartham ca upalabhyate
anuvṛttaḥ ca yasya iha saḥ oṃśaḥ syāt daśa lakṣaṇaḥ
pañca svara parā tāra gatiḥ yathā
aṃśāt tāra gatim vidyāt ā caturtha svarāt iha
ā pañcamāt pañcamāt vā na atas param iha iṣyate
tridhā mandra gatiḥ
aṃśa parā nyāsa parā apara nyāsa parā ca iti

original: mandrastvaṃśaparo nāsti nyāsau tu dvau vyavasthitau /
analyzed: mandraḥ tu aṃśa paraḥ na asti nyāsau tu dvau vyavasthitau
gāndhāranyāsa liṅge tu dṛṣṭam ārṣabha sevanam
atha nyāsaḥ ekaviṃśati saṅkhyaḥ
aṅga samāptau nyāsaḥ
tadvat apanyāsaḥ hi aṅga madhye ṣaṭpañcāśat saṅkhyaḥ
yathā
nyāsaḥ ṅga samāptau sa ca ekaviṃśati saṅkhyaḥ tathā
akṣarāṇi ṣaṭpañcāśat saṃkhyā upanyāsaḥ ṅga madhye bhavet
tatra prathamam vidārī madhye nyāsa svara prayuktaḥ tu
vivadana śīlam muktvā saṃnyāsaḥ saḥ abhidhātavyaḥ
kṛtvā pada avasāne vinyāsāt kvāpi vinyāsaḥ
tathā
alpa tve tha bahu tve balavat abala tā viniścayāt eva
jāti svaraiḥ tu nityam jāti alpatvam dvividham etat
sañcāra aṃśe balasthānām alpatve durbalāsu ca
nyāsaḥ ca antara mārgaḥ tu jātīnām vyakti kārakaḥ
pañca svaram auḍuvitam vijñeyam daśavidham prayoga jñaiḥ
triṃśat prakāra vihitam pūrva uktam lakṣaṇam ca asya
ṣaṣ svarasya prayogaḥ sti tathā pañca svarasya ca
catur svara prayogaḥ hi avakṛṣṭa dhruvāsu iha
dvaigrāmikīṇām jātīnām sarvāsām api nityaśas
aṃśāḥ triṣaṣṭiḥ vijñeyāḥ teṣām ca eva aṃśa vat grahāḥ
aṃśa graham idānīm vakṣyāmaḥ
tatra
madhyama udīcya vāyāḥ tu nandayantyāḥ tathā eva ca
tathā gāndhāra pañcamyāḥ pañcama ūṃśaḥ grahaḥ tathā
dhaivatyāḥ ca tathā hi aṃśau vijñeyau dhaivata ṛṣabhau

original: pañcamyāśca tathā jñeyau grahāṃśau pañcamarṣabhau // BhN_28.80 //
analyzed: pañcamyāḥ ca tathā jñeyau graha aṃśau pañcama ṛṣabhau
gāndhāra udīcya vāyāḥ tu graha aṃśau ṣaḍja madhyamau
ārṣabhyāḥ ca grahāḥ aṃśāḥ dhaivata ṛṣabha saptamāḥ
gāndhāraḥ ca niṣādaḥ ca hi ārṣabhaḥ ca tathā aparaḥ

original: niṣādinyāstrayo hyete grahā aṃśāśca kīrtitāḥ // BhN_28.82 //
analyzed: niṣādinyāḥ trayaḥ hi ete grahāḥ aṃśāḥ ca kīrtitāḥ
ṣaḍja pañcama gāndhāraiḥ tribhiḥ eva prakīrtitāḥ
aṃśaiḥ grahaiḥ tathā ca eva vijñeyā ṣaḍja kaiśikī
ṣaḍjaḥ ca madhyamaḥ ca eva niṣādaḥ dhaivataḥ tathā
ṣaḍja udīcyavatī jāteḥ grahāḥ aṃśāḥ ca kīrtitāḥ
pañcamaḥ ca ārṣabhaḥ ca eva niṣādaḥ dhaivataḥ tathā
kārmāravyāḥ budhaiḥ aṃśāḥ grahāḥ ca parikīrtitāḥ
gāndhāraḥ ca ārṣabhaḥ ca eva niṣādavān

original: catvaroṃśā bhavantyāndhryā grahāścaiva tathaiva hi // BhN_28.86 //
analyzed: catvara ūṃśāḥ bhavanti āndhryāḥ grahāḥ ca eva tathā eva hi
ṣaḍjaḥ ca atha ṛṣabhaḥ ca eva madhyamaḥ pañcamaḥ tathā

original: madhyamāyā grahā jñeyā aṃśāścaiva sadhaivatāḥ // BhN_28.87 //
analyzed: madhyamāyāḥ grahāḥ jñeyāḥ aṃśāḥ ca eva sa dhaivatāḥ
niṣāda ṣaḍja gāndhāra madhyamāḥ pañcamaḥ tathā
gāndhārī raktagāndhāryoḥ grahāḥ aṃśāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
ṣaḍjī dhaivata gāndhāra ṣaḍja madhyama pañcamaiḥ
grahaiḥ aṃśaiḥ ca vijñeyā vikṛtā svara yogataḥ

original: kaiśikyāścārṣabhaṃ hitvā grahāṃśāḥ ṣaṭ svarāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: kaiśikyāḥ ca ārṣabham hitvā graha aṃśāḥ ṣaṭ svarāḥ smṛtāḥ
sapta svara graha aṃśā tu vijñeyā ṣaḍja madhyamā
ete triṣaṣṭiḥ vijñeyāḥ sarvāsu aṃśāḥ tu jātiṣu
aṃśa vat ca grahāḥ tāsām sarvāsām eva nityaśas
sarvāsām eva jātīnām tri jātiḥ tu gaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: te ca sapta gaṇā jñeyā vardhamānasvarā budhaiḥ // BhN_28.92 //
analyzed: te ca sapta gaṇāḥ jñeyāḥ vardhamāna svarāḥ budhaiḥ
eka svaraḥ dvi svaraḥ ca catur svaraḥ
pañca svaraḥ caturthā syāt ekadhā sapta ṣaṣ svarau
etat uktam mayā tu āsām graha aṃśa parikalpanam
punar ca eva pravakṣyāmi nyāsa apanyāsa yogataḥ
pañca aṃśā tu bhavet ṣāḍjī niṣāda ṛṣabha varjitā
apanyāsaḥ bhavet atra gāndhāraḥ pañcamaḥ tathā

original: nyāsaścātra bhavet ṣaḍjo lopyaḥ saptama eva ca /
analyzed: nyāsaḥ ca atra bhavet ṣaḍjaḥ lopyaḥ saptamaḥ eva ca
ṣaḍja gāndhāra sañcāraḥ ṣaḍja dhaivatayoḥ tathā
ṣāḍavam saptama upetam alpau vai saptama ṛṣabhau

original: gāndhārasya ca bāhulyaṃ tvatra kāryaṃ prayoktubhiḥ // BhN_28.97 //
analyzed: gāndhārasya ca bāhulyam tu atra kāryam prayoktubhiḥ
ārṣabhyām ṛṣabhaḥ tu aṃśaḥ niṣādaḥ dhaivataḥ tathā
ete eva hi apanyāsāḥ nyāsaḥ ca api ṛṣabhaḥ smṛtaḥ
ṣaṣ pañca svara tā ca atra ṣaḍja pañcamayoḥ vinā
dhaivatyām dhaivataḥ nyāsaḥ tu aṃśāvṛṣabhadhaivataḥ
apanyāsāḥ bhavanti atra dhaivata ārṣabha madhyamāḥ
ṣaḍja pañcama hīnam tu pāñcsvaryam vidhīyate

original: pañcamena vinā caiva ṣāḍavaṃ parikīrtitam // BhN_28.100 //
analyzed: pañcamena vinā ca eva ṣāḍavam parikīrtitam

original: ārohiṇau ca tau kāryau laṅghanīyau tathaiva ca /
analyzed: ārohiṇau ca tau kāryau laṅghanīyau tathā eva ca
niṣādaḥ ca ṛṣabhaḥ ca eva gāndhāraḥ balavān tathā
niṣādinyām sa gāndhāra ṛṣabhaḥ tathā

original: eta eva hyapanyāsā nyāsaścaivātra saptamaḥ // BhN_28.102 //
analyzed: ete eva hi apanyāsāḥ nyāsaḥ ca eva atra saptamaḥ
dhaivatyāḥ iva kartavye ṣāḍava auḍuvite tathā

original: tadvacca laṅghanīyau tu balavantau tathaiva ca // BhN_28.103 //
analyzed: tadvat ca laṅghanīyau tu balavantau tathā eva ca
aṃśāḥ tu ṣaḍja kaiśikyāḥ ṣaḍja gāndhāra pañcamāḥ
apanyāsāḥ bhavanti atra ṣaḍja pañcama saptamāḥ

original: gāndhāraśca bhavennyāso hainasvaryaṃ na cātra tu /
analyzed: gāndhāraḥ ca bhavet nyāsaḥ hainasvaryam na ca atra tu

original: daurbalyaṃ cātra kartavyaṃ dhaivatasyārṣabhasya ca // BhN_28.105 //
analyzed: daurbalyam ca atra kartavyam dhaivatasya ārṣabhasya ca
madhyama
ṣaḍjaḥ ca madhyamaḥ ca eva niṣādaḥ dhaivataḥ tathā

original: syuḥ ṣaḍjodīcyavāṃśāstu nyāsaścaiva tu madhyamaḥ // BhN_28.106 //
analyzed: syuḥ ṣaḍja udīcya vāṃśāḥ tu nyāsaḥ ca eva tu madhyamaḥ

original: apanyāso bhavatyasya dhaivataḥ ṣaḍja eva ca /
analyzed: apanyāsaḥ bhavati asya dhaivataḥ ṣaḍjaḥ eva ca
paraspara aṃśa gamanam iṣṭataḥ ca vidhīyate
ṣāṭsvaryam ṛṣabha apetam kāryam gāndharva vedibhiḥ

original: pañcamārṣabhahīnaṃ tu pāñcasvaryaṃ tu tatra vai // BhN_28.108 //
analyzed: pañcama ārṣabha hīnam tu pāñcasvaryam tu tatra vai
ṣaḍjaḥ ca api ṛṣabhaḥ ca eva gāndhāraḥ ca balī bhavet

original: gāndhārasya ca bāhulyaṃ mandrasthāne vidhīyate // BhN_28.109 //
analyzed: gāndhārasya ca bāhulyam mandra sthāne vidhīyate
sarva iṃśāḥ ṣaḍja madhyāyām apanyāsāḥ tathā eva ca

original: ṣaḍjaśca madhyamaścāpi nyāsau nāryau prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_28.110 //
analyzed: ṣaḍjaḥ ca madhyamaḥ ca api nyāsau nāryau prayoktṛbhiḥ
