original: ṣāḍavaṃ saptamāpetaṃ kāryaṃ cātra prayogataḥ // BhN_28.111 //
analyzed: ṣāḍavam saptama apetam kāryam ca atra prayogataḥ
sarva svarāṇām sañcāraḥ iṣṭataḥ tu vidhīyate

original: ṣaḍjagrāmāśritā hyetā vijñeyāḥ sapta jātayaḥ // BhN_28.112 //
analyzed: ṣaḍja grāma āśritāḥ hi etāḥ vijñeyāḥ sapta jātayaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi madhyamagrāma saṃśrayāḥ
gāndhāryāḥ pañca eva aṃśāḥ dhaivata ṛṣabha varjitāḥ
ṣaḍjaḥ ca pañcamaḥ ca eva hi apanyāsau prakīrtitau

original: gāndhāraśca bhavennyāsaḥ ṣāḍavaṃ carṣabhaṃ vinā // BhN_28.114 //
analyzed: gāndhāraḥ ca bhavet nyāsaḥ ṣāḍavam ca ṛṣabham vinā
dhaivata ṛṣabhayoḥ hīnam tathā ca oḍuvitam bhavet
laṅghanīyau ca tau nityam ārṣabhāt haivatam vrajet
vihitaḥ tu iti gāndhāryāḥ svaranyāsa aṃśa gocaraḥ
lakṣaṇam rakta gāndhāryāḥ gāndhāryāḥ eva yat smṛtam

original: dhaivato balavānatra daurbalyaṃ tasya lopataḥ // BhN_28.116 //
analyzed: dhaivataḥ balavān atra daurbalyam tasya lopataḥ
gāndhāra ṣaḍjayoḥ ca atra sañcāraḥ ca ārṣabhāt vinā
apanyāsaḥ tathā ca eva madhyamaḥ tu vidhīyate
gāndhāra udīcya vāṃśau tu vijñeyau ṣaḍja madhyamau

original: pāñcasvaryaṃ na caivātra ṣāṭsvaryamṛṣabhaṃ vinā // BhN_28.118 //
analyzed: pāñcasvaryam na ca eva atra ṣāṭsvaryam ṛṣabham vinā
kāryaḥ ca antara mārgaḥ ca nyāsa upanyāsaḥ eva ca
ṣaḍja udīcyavatī vat tu pāñca svaryeṇa jātucit
madhyamāyāḥ bhavanti aṃśāḥ vinā gāndhāra saptamau

original: eta eva hyapanyāsā nyāsaścaiva tu madhyamaḥ // BhN_28.120 //
analyzed: ete eva hi apanyāsāḥ nyāsaḥ ca eva tu madhyamaḥ
gāndhāra saptama apetam pāñcasvaryam vidhīyate

original: ṣāḍavaṃ cāpyagāndhāraṃ kartavyaṃ tu prayogataḥ // BhN_28.121 //
analyzed: ṣāḍavam ca api a gāndhāram kartavyam tu prayogataḥ
ṣaḍja madhyamayoḥ ca atra kāryam bāhulyam eva hi

original: gāndhāralaṅghanaṃ cātra kāryaṃ nityaṃ prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_28.122 //
analyzed: gāndhāra laṅghanam ca atra kāryam nityam prayoktṛbhiḥ
pūrṇā hi aṃśaḥ ekaḥ tu pañcamaḥ

original: śeṣo vidhistu kartavyo gāndhārodīcyavāṃ gataḥ // BhN_28.123 //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ vidhiḥ tu kartavyaḥ gāndhāra udīcya vām gataḥ
dvau aṃśau atha pañcamyām ṛṣabhaḥ pañcamaḥ tathā
sa ṛ niṣādau apanyāsau nyāsaḥ ca eva tu pañcamaḥ
madhyamā vat tu kartavye ṣāḍava auḍuvite tathā
daurbalyam ca atra kartavyam ṣaḍja gāndhāra madhyamaiḥ
kuryāt api atra sañcāram pañcamasya ārṣabhasya ca

original: gāndhāragamanaṃ caiva kāryaṃ tvalpaśca saptamaḥ // BhN_28.126 //
analyzed: gāndhāra gamanam ca eva kāryam tu alpaḥ ca saptamaḥ
lpam ca saptamāt
atha gāndhāra pañcamyāḥ pañcamaḥ oṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
tāra gatyā tu ṣaḍjaḥ pi kadācid na ativartate
ṛṣabhaḥ pañcamaḥ ca eva hi apanyāsau prakīrtitau

original: nyāsaścaiva tu gāndhāro sā ca pūrṇasvarā sadā /
analyzed: nyāsaḥ ca eva tu sā ca pūrṇa svarā sadā

original: pañcamyā yaśca gāndhāryāḥ sañcāraḥ sa vidhīyate // BhN_28.128 //
analyzed: pañcamyāḥ yaḥ ca gāndhāryāḥ sañcāraḥ sa vidhīyate
pañcamaḥ ca ārṣabhaḥ ca eva niṣādavān
catvāraḥ oṃśāḥ bhavanti āndhryām apanyāsāḥ te eva hi
gāndhāraḥ ca bhavet nyāsaḥ ṣaḍja apetam tu ṣāḍavam
gāndhāra ārṣabhayoḥ ca api sañcāraḥ tu parasparam
saptamasya ca ṣaṣṭhasya nyāsaḥ gati anupūrvaśas

original: ṣaḍjasya laṅghanaṃ cātra nāsti cauḍuvitaṃ sadā // BhN_28.131 //
analyzed: ṣaḍjasya laṅghanam ca atra na asti cauḍuvitam sadā
nandayantyāḥ kramāt nyāsa apanyāsa aṃśāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
gāndhāraḥ madhyamaḥ ca eva pañcamaḥ ca eva nityaśas
ṣaḍjaḥ lopyaḥ ca laṅghyaḥ ca na āndhrī sañcaraṇam bhavet

original: laṅghanaṃ hyṛṣabhasyāpi tacca mandragataṃ smṛtam // BhN_28.133 //
analyzed: laṅghanam hi ṛṣabhasya api tat ca mandra gatam smṛtam
tāra gatyā tu ṣaḍjaḥ tu kadācid na ativartate

original: gāndhāro vā grahaḥ kāryastathā nyāsaśca nityaśaḥ // BhN_28.134 //
analyzed: gāndhāraḥ vā grahaḥ kāryaḥ tathā nyāsaḥ ca nityaśas
kārmāravyāḥ smṛtāḥ hi aṃśāḥ ārṣabhaḥ pañcamaḥ tathā
dhaivataḥ ca niṣādaḥ ca api apanyāsāḥ te eva tu

original: pañcamaśca bhavennyāso hainasvaryaṃ na cātra tu // BhN_28.135 //
analyzed: pañcamaḥ ca bhavet nyāsaḥ hainasvaryam na ca atra tu

original: gāndhārasya viśeṣeṇa sarvato gamanaṃ bhavet // BhN_28.136 //
analyzed: gāndhārasya viśeṣeṇa sarvatas gamanam bhavet

original: kaiśikyāstu tathā hyaṃśāḥ sarve caivārṣabhaṃ vinā /
analyzed: kaiśikyāḥ tu tathā hi aṃśāḥ sarve ca eva ārṣabham vinā

original: eta eva hyapanyāsā nyāsau gāndhārasaptamau // BhN_28.137 //
analyzed: ete eva hi apanyāsāḥ nyāsau gāndhāra saptamau

original: dhaivateṃśe niṣāde ca nyāsaḥ pañcama iṣyate /
analyzed: dhaivata iṃśe niṣāde ca nyāsaḥ pañcamaḥ iṣyate
apanyāsaḥ kadācid tu vidhīyate
ārṣabhe ṣāḍavam ca atra dhaivata ṛṣabha varjitam

original: tathā cauḍuvitaṃ kuryād balinau cāntyapañcamau // BhN_28.139 //
analyzed: tathā ca oḍuvitam kuryāt balinau ca antya pañcamau
daurbalyam ṛṣabhasya atra laṅghanam ca viśeṣataḥ
aṃśa vat kalpitaḥ ca anyaiḥ ṣāḍave tu vidhīyate
ṣaḍja madhyā vat atra api sañcāraḥ tu bhavet iha
evam etāḥ budhaiḥ jñeyāḥ jātayaḥ daśa lakṣaṇāḥ

original: yathā yasmin rase yāśca gadato me nibodhata // BhN_28.141 //
analyzed: yathā yasmin rase yāḥ ca gadataḥ me nibodhata
iti jātivikalpa adhyāyaḥ ṣṭāviṃśaḥ samāptaḥ
atha ekonatriṃśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṣaḍja udīcyavatī ca eva ṣaḍja madhyā tathā eva ca
madhya pañcama bāhulyāt kāryā śṛṅgāra hāsyayoḥ
ṣāḍjī tu atha ārṣabhī ca eva sva svara aṃśa parigrahāt
vīra raudra adbhuteṣu ete prayojye gāna yoktṛbhiḥ
niṣāde ṃśe tu naiṣādī gāndhāre ṣaḍja kaiśikī

original: karuṇe tu rase kāryā jātigānaviśāradaiḥ // BhN_29.3 //
analyzed: karuṇe tu rase kāryā jāti gāna viśāradaiḥ
dhaivatī dhaivata aṃśe tu bībhatse sa bhayānake
dhruvā vidhāne kartavyā jātiḥ gāne prayatnataḥ

original: rasaṃ kāryamavasthāṃ ca jñātvā yojyā prayoktṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: rasam kāryam avasthām ca jñātvā yojyā prayoktṛbhiḥ

original: ṣaḍjagrāmāśritā hyetāḥ prayojyā jātayo budhaiḥ // BhN_29.4 //
analyzed: ṣaḍja grāma āśritāḥ hi etāḥ prayojyāḥ jātayaḥ budhaiḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi madhyamagrāma saṃśrayāḥ
gāndhārī raktagāndhāryau gāndhāra aṃśa upapattitaḥ

original: karuṇe tu rase kārye niṣāde 'ṃśe tathaiva ca // BhN_29.5 //
analyzed: karuṇe tu rase kārye niṣāde ṃśe tathā eva ca

original: madhyamā pañcamī caiva nandayantī tathaiva ca /
analyzed: madhyamā pañcamī ca eva nandayantī tathā eva ca
gāndhārapañcamī ca eva madhyamā udīcyavā tathā
madhyama pañcama bāhulyāt kāryāḥ śṛṅgāra hāsyayoḥ
kārmāravī tathā cāndhrī gāndhārā udīcyavā tathā
vīre raudre dbhute kāryāḥ ṣaḍja ṛṣabha aṃśa yojitāḥ

original: kaiśikī dhaivatāṃśe tu bībhatse sabhayānake // BhN_29.7 //
analyzed: kaiśikī dhaivata aṃśe tu bībhatse sa bhayānake
ekā eva ṣaḍja madhyā jñeyā sarva rasa saṃśrayā jātiḥ

original: tasyāstvaṃśāḥ sarve svarāstu vihitāḥ prayogavidhau // BhN_29.8 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu aṃśāḥ sarve svarāḥ tu vihitāḥ prayoga vidhau

original: yo yadā balavān yasmin svaro jātisamāśrayāt /
analyzed: yaḥ yadā balavān yasmin svaraḥ jāti samāśrayāt

original: tatpravṛttaṃ rase kāryaṃ gānaṃ geye prayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_29.9 //
analyzed: tat pravṛttam rase kāryam gānam geye prayoktṛbhiḥ
madhya pañcama bhūyiṣṭham gānam śṛṅgāra hāsyayoḥ
ṣaḍja ṛṣabha prāya kṛtam vīra raudra adbhuteṣu ca
gāndhāraḥ saptamaḥ ca ayam karuṇe gānam iṣyate
tathā dhaivata bhūyiṣṭham bībhatse sa bhayānake
ekā eva ṣaḍja madhyā vijñeyā akhila rasa āśrayā jātiḥ

original: tasyāstvaṃśāḥ sarve svarāśca vihitāḥ prayogavidhau // BhN_29.12 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu aṃśāḥ sarve svarāḥ ca vihitāḥ prayoga vidhau
sarveṣu aṃśeṣu rasāḥ niyama vidhānena saṃprayoktavyāḥ
kākalī antara vihitāḥ viśeṣa yuktāḥ tu balavantaḥ
evam etāḥ budhaiḥ jñeyāḥ jātayaḥ nāṭya saṃśrayāḥ
pāṭhya prayoga vihitān svarān ca api nibodhata
hāsya śṛṅgārayoḥ kāryau svarau madhyama pañcamau
ṣaḍja ṛṣabhau ca kartavyau vīra raudra adbhuteṣu atha

original: gāndhāraśca niṣādaśca kartavyau karuṇe rase // BhN_29.13*2 //
analyzed: gāndhāraḥ ca niṣādaḥ ca kartavyau karuṇe rase
dhaivataḥ ca prayoga jñaiḥ bībhatse sa bhayānake
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi varṇa alaṅkāra lakṣaṇam
ārohī ca avarohī ca sthāyi sañcāriṇau tathā
varṇāḥ catvāraḥ eva ete hi alaṅkārāḥ tad āśrayāḥ

original: ārohanti svarā yatrārohīti sa tu saṃjñitaḥ /
analyzed: ārohanti svarāḥ yatra ārohī iti sa tu saṃjñitaḥ
yatra ca eva avarohanti saḥ varohī prakīrtitaḥ

original: sthirāḥ svarāḥ samā yatra sthāyī varṇaḥ sa ucyate /
analyzed: sthirāḥ svarāḥ samāḥ yatra sthāyī varṇaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: sañcaranti svarā yatra sa sañcārīti kīrtitaḥ // BhN_29.16 //
analyzed: sañcaranti svarāḥ yatra sa sañcārī iti kīrtitaḥ
śārīra svara sambhūtāḥ tri sthāna guṇa gocarāḥ
catvāraḥ lakṣaṇa upetāḥ varṇāḥ tatra prakīrtitāḥ
evam lakṣaṇa saṃyuktam yadā varṇaḥ nu karṣati
tadā varṇasya niṣpattiḥ jñeyā svara samudbhavā
ete varṇāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ catvāraḥ gīta yojakāḥ
etān samāśritān samyak alaṅkārān nibodhata
prasanna ādiḥ prasanna antaḥ prasanna ādi antaḥ eva ca
prasanna madhyaḥ ca tathā krama recitaḥ eva ca
prastāraḥ ca prasādaḥ ca saptā ete sthāyi varṇa gāḥ
atha sañcāri jān bhūyas kīrtyamānān nibodhata
mandraḥ tathā prasanna ādiḥ preṅkhitaḥ binduḥ eva ca

original: sannivṛttaḥ pravṛttaśca recitaḥ kampitaḥ samaḥ // BhN_29.21 //
analyzed: sannivṛttaḥ pravṛttaḥ ca recitaḥ kampitaḥ samaḥ
kuharaḥ ca eva veṇuḥ ca rañcitaḥ hi avalokitaḥ
āvartakaḥ parāvṛttaḥ sañcāriṇyaḥ caturdaśa
niṣkarṣaḥ abhyucayaḥ ca eva hasitaḥ binduḥ eva ca
preṅkholitaḥ tathā ākṣiptaḥ vistīrṇa uddhaṭitaḥ tathā
hrāda mānaḥ sampradānaḥ sandhiḥ pracchādanaḥ tathā
prasanna ādiḥ prasanna antaḥ iti ārohe trayodaśa
vidhūtaḥ ca tri varṇaḥ ca tathā udvāhitaḥ eva ca
udgītaḥ ca tathā veṇiḥ vijñeyāḥ hi avarohiṇaḥ
sapta rūpa gatāḥ jñeyāḥ alaṅkārāḥ budhaiḥ tu ime
na ete sarve dhruvāsu iṣṭāḥ śruti varṇa prakarṣaṇāt
na hi varṇa prakarṣaḥ tu dhruvāṇām siddhiḥ iṣyate

original: śyeno vāpyathavā bindurye cānyeti prakarṣiṇaḥ // BhN_29.27 //
analyzed: śyenaḥ vā api athavā binduḥ ye ca anye iti prakarṣiṇaḥ

original: te dhruvāṇāṃ prayogeṣu na kāryāḥ svapramāṇataḥ /
analyzed: te dhruvāṇām prayogeṣu na kāryāḥ sva pramāṇataḥ

original: taddhruvāṇāṃ prayoge tu kāryā hyārohiṇaḥ svarāḥ // BhN_29.28 //
analyzed: tad dhruvāṇām prayoge tu kāryāḥ hi ārohiṇaḥ svarāḥ
yasmāt artha anurūpā hi dhruvā kārya artha darśikā

original: varṇānāṃ tu punaḥ kāryaṃ kṛśatvaṃ padasaṃśrayam // BhN_29.29 //
analyzed: varṇānām tu punar kāryam kṛśa tvam pada saṃśrayam

original: ye 'tra prayoge gacchanti tāṃśca varṇān nibodhata /
analyzed: ye tra prayoge gacchanti tān ca varṇān nibodhata

original: prasannādiḥ prasannāntaḥ prasannādyanta eva ca // BhN_29.30 //
analyzed: prasanna ādiḥ prasanna antaḥ prasanna ādi antaḥ eva ca
prasanna madhyamaḥ ca eva binduḥ kampita recitau

original: tāraścaiva hi mandraśca tathā tārataraḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: tāraḥ ca eva hi mandraḥ ca tathā tārataraḥ punar
preṅkholitaḥ tāramandraḥ mandra tāraḥ samaḥ tathā
sannivṛttaḥ pravṛttaḥ ca eva ca
ūrmiḥ preṅkhaḥ valokaḥ ca iti ete sarva varṇa gāḥ
sthāyi varṇāt ṛte ca eṣām saṃpravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam

original: kramaśo dīpito yaḥ syāt prasannādiḥ sa kathyate // BhN_29.33 //
analyzed: kramaśas dīpitaḥ yaḥ syāt prasanna ādiḥ sa kathyate
vyasta uccāritaḥ eva eṣa prasanna antaḥ vidhīyate
ādi antayoḥ prasanna tvāt prasanna ādi antaḥ iṣyate
prasanna madhyaḥ madhye tu prasanna tvāt udāhṛtaḥ

original: sarvasāmyāt samo jñeyaḥ sthitastvekasvaro 'pi yaḥ // BhN_29.35 //
analyzed: sarva sāmyāt samaḥ jñeyaḥ sthitaḥ tu eka svaraḥ yaḥ
ādi madhya layaḥ yatra sa ca ūrmiḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
śrutayaḥ n tyāt dvitīyasya mṛdu madhya āyatāḥ svarāḥ
āyata tvam bhavet nīce mṛdu tvam tu viparyaye
sve svare madhyama tvam ca mṛdu madhyamayoḥ tathā
dīptāyate karuṇānām śrutīnām eṣa niścayaḥ
binduḥ eka kalaḥ jñeyaḥ kampitaḥ ca kalā dvayam

original: gatāgatapravṛtto yaḥ sa preṅkholita iṣyate // BhN_29.38 //
analyzed: gatāgata pravṛttaḥ yaḥ sa preṅkholitaḥ iṣyate

original: yastu kaṇṭhe svaro 'dhaḥ syāt sa tu tāraḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu kaṇṭhe svaraḥ dhaḥ syāt sa tu tāraḥ prakīrtitaḥ
uraḥ gataḥ tathā mandraḥ mūrdhni tārataraḥ tathā

original: kramāgatastu yastāraḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pañcama eva vā /
analyzed: krama āgataḥ tu yaḥ tāraḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pañcamaḥ eva vā

original: tāramandraprasannastu jñeyo mandragataḥ sa ca // BhN_29.40 //
analyzed: tāramandraprasannaḥ tu jñeyaḥ mandra gataḥ sa ca

original: laṅghayitvā parān mandrāt parāṃ tāragatiṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: laṅghayitvā parāt mandrāt parām tāra gatim gataḥ
mandra tāra prasannaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ hi avarohaṇāt

original: prasannāntaḥ svaro yatra prasādaḥ sa tu saṃjñitaḥ /
analyzed: prasanna antaḥ svaraḥ yatra prasādaḥ sa tu saṃjñitaḥ
apāṅgakiḥ tu vijñeyaḥ svarāṇām atha sañcarāt

original: recitaḥ śirasi jñeyaḥ kampitaṃ tu kalātrayam /
analyzed: recitaḥ śirasi jñeyaḥ kampitam tu kalā trayam

original: kaṇṭhe niruddhapavanaḥ kuharo nāma jāyate // BhN_29.43 //
analyzed: kaṇṭhe niruddha pavanaḥ kuharaḥ nāma jāyate
evam ete tu alaṅkārāḥ vijñeyāḥ varṇa saṃśrayāḥ
atha gītīḥ pravakṣyāmi chando kṣara samanvitāḥ

original: śaśinā rahiteva niśā vijaleva nadī latā vipuṣpeva /
analyzed: śaśinā rahitā iva niśā vijalā iva nadī latā vipuṣpā iva

original: avibhūṣiteva ca strī gītiralaṅkārahīnā syāt // BhN_29.45 //
analyzed: a vibhūṣitā iva ca strī gītiḥ alaṅkāra hīnā syāt
prathamā māgadhī jñeyā dvitīyā ca ardhamāgadhī

original: sambhāvitā tṛtīyā tu caturthī pṛthulā smṛtā // BhN_29.46 //
analyzed: sambhāvitā tṛtīyā tu caturthī pṛthulā smṛtā

original: trinivṛttapragītā yā gītiḥ sā māgadhī smṛtā /
analyzed: tri nivṛtta pragītā yā gītiḥ sā māgadhī smṛtā

original: ardhataḥ sannivṛttā ca vijñeyā hyardhamāgadhī // BhN_29.47 //
analyzed: ardhataḥ sannivṛttā ca vijñeyā hi ardhamāgadhī
sambhāvitā ca vijñeyā guru akṣara samanvitā

original: pṛthulākhyā ca vijñeyā nityaṃ laghvakṣarānvitā // BhN_29.48 //
analyzed: pṛthula ākhyā ca vijñeyā nityam laghu akṣara anvitā

original: etāstu gītayo jñeyā dhruvāyogaṃ vinaiva hi /
analyzed: etāḥ tu gītayaḥ jñeyāḥ dhruvā yogam vinā eva hi

original: gāndharva eva yojyāstu nityaṃ gānaprayoktṛbhiḥ // BhN_29.49 //
analyzed: gāndharve eva yojyāḥ tu nityam gāna prayoktṛbhiḥ
gītayaḥ gaditāḥ samyak dhātūn ca eva nibodhata
vistāraḥ karaṇaḥ ca syāt āviddhaḥ vyañjanaḥ tathā
catvāraḥ dhātavaḥ jñeyāḥ vāditra karaṇa āśrayāḥ
saṅghāta jaḥ samavāya jaḥ ca vistāra jaḥ nubandha kṛtaḥ
jñetaḥ catuṣprakāraḥ dhātuḥ vistāra saṃjñaḥ ca

original: vidhayastu smṛtāstasya pūrvaṃ vistāra eva ca /
analyzed: vidhayaḥ tu smṛtāḥ tasya pūrvam vistāraḥ eva ca

original: saṅghātasamavāyau tu vijñeyau tau dviatrikau // BhN_29.52 //
analyzed: saṅghāta samavāyau tu vijñeyau tau dvi atrikau
pūrvaḥ caturvidhaḥ tatra paścimaḥ ṣṭavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: karaṇānāṃ viśeṣeṇa vijñeyau tau pṛthak pṛthak // BhN_29.53 //
analyzed: karaṇānām viśeṣeṇa vijñeyau tau pṛthak pṛthak
adhas ca ūrdhvam ca vijñeyau adhara uttara jau svarau

original: saṅghātajo vidhistveṣa vijñeyo vādanaṃ prati // BhN_29.54 //
analyzed: saṅghāta jaḥ vidhiḥ tu eṣa vijñeyaḥ vādanam prati
dvis uttaraḥ dvis adharaḥ tu adhara ādiḥ ca uttara avasānaḥ ca
jñeyaḥ tathā uttara ādiḥ punar api adhara avasānaḥ ca
samavāya jaḥ tathā syāt tris uttaraḥ tris adharaḥ ca vijñeyaḥ
dviradhara uttara adhara antaḥ dviradharaḥ ca uttara virāmaḥ ca
uttara mukhaḥ dvis adharaḥ dvis uttara avasānaḥ ca
madhya uttaraḥ dvis adharaḥ dvis uttaraḥ pi adhara madhyaḥ ca
anubandhaḥ tu jñeyaḥ vyāsa samāsāt ca niyatam eṣām hi
evam caturdaśavidhaḥ vistāraḥ dhātuḥ ākhyātaḥ
hrādaḥ tu tathā anubandhaḥ syāt
pañcavidhaḥ vijñeyaḥ vīṇā vādye karaṇa dhātuḥ
trika pañca sapta navakaiḥ yathākramam saṃyutaḥ bhavet vā ādye
sarvaiḥ anubandha kṛtaiḥ guru antaḥ syāt karaṇa dhātuḥ
kṣepaḥ ti pātaḥ ti kīrṇam anubandha saṃjñitaḥ ca eva

original: āviddho viṣṭo yo dhāturvai pañcavidha eva // BhN_29.61 //
analyzed: āviddhaḥ viṣṭaḥ yaḥ dhātuḥ vai pañcavidhaḥ eva
dvi tri catuṣka navakaiḥ prahāraiḥ kramaśas kṛtaiḥ
āviddhadhātuḥ vijñeyaḥ sa anubandha vibhūṣitaḥ
vyañjana dhātoḥ puṣpam kala tala niṣkoṭitam tathā uddhṛṣṭam
rephaḥ nu bandha saṃjñaḥ nu svanitam binduḥ avamṛṣṭam
kaniṣṭhā aṅguṣṭha saṃyuktam puṣpam iti abhisaṃjñitam

original: aṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ samaṃ tantryoḥ sparśanaṃ yat kalaṃ tu tat // BhN_29.64 //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhābhyām samam tantryoḥ sparśanam yat kalam tu tat
vāmena pīḍanam kṛtvā dakṣiṇena āhatiḥ tale
savya aṅguṣṭha prahāraḥ tu niṣkoṭitam iha ucyate
prahāraḥ vāma tarjanyāḥ uddhṛṣṭam iti saṃjñitam
sarva aṅguli samākṣepaḥ rephaḥ iti abhisaṃjñitaḥ
tala sthāne dhaḥ tantrīṇām anusvanitam ucyate
guru akṣara kṛtā tantrī binduḥ iti abhisaṃjñitaḥ
kaniṣṭhā aṅguṣṭhakābhyām tu dakṣiṇābhyām adhomukham
tantrīṣu tri prahāram ca api avamṛṣṭam prakīrtitam
vyāsa samāsāt eṣām anubandhaḥ sārvadhātukaḥ jñeyaḥ

original: iti daśavidhaḥ prayojyo vīṇāyāṃ vyañjano dhātuḥ // BhN_29.69 //
analyzed: iti daśavidhaḥ prayojyaḥ vīṇāyām vyañjanaḥ dhātuḥ
iti ete dhātavaḥ proktāḥ catvāraḥ lakṣaṇa anvitāḥ

original: tisṛṇāmapi vṛttīnāṃ yeṣu vādyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // BhN_29.70 //
analyzed: tisṛṇām api vṛttīnām yeṣu vādyam pratiṣṭhitam
tisraḥ tu vṛttayaḥ citrā dakṣiṇā vṛtti saṃjñitāḥ
vādya gīta ubhaya guṇāḥ nirdiṣṭa antāḥ yathākramam
tisraḥ gīti vṛttayaḥ prādhānyena grāhyāḥ
citrā vṛttiḥ dakṣiṇā ca iti
tāsām tāla gīti laya yati mārga prādhānyāni yathāsvam vyañjakāni bhavanti
tatra citrāyām saṅkṣipta vādya tāla druta laya samāyati nāgata grahāṇām prādhānyam
tathā
vṛttau gīta vāditra dvi kalā tāla madhya laya srotaḥ gata āyati sama graha mārgāṇām prādhānyam
dakṣiṇāyām gīti catuṣkala tāla vilambita laya gopuccha āyati atīta graha mārgāṇām prādhānyam
sarvāsām eva vṛttīnām lalitā ādyāḥ tu jātayaḥ

original: dhātubhiḥ saha saṃyuktā bhavanti guṇavattarāḥ // BhN_29.72 //
analyzed: dhātubhiḥ saha saṃyuktāḥ bhavanti guṇavattarāḥ
eteṣām dhātūnām samavāyāt jātayaḥ tu jāyante
syāt udātta lalita ribhita ghana saṃjñāḥ catasraḥ tu
tatra udātāḥ vistāra dhātu viṣayāḥ hi udātta tvāt
lalitā vyañjana dhātoḥ lalita tvāt eva saṃprayoktavyā
āviddha dhātu viṣayā ribhitā laghu sañcayāt vinirdiṣṭā

original: karaṇaviṣayā ca ghanasaṃjñā gurulaghusañcayāttu syāt // BhN_29.75 //
analyzed: karaṇa viṣayā ca ghana saṃjñā guru laghu sañcayāt tu syāt

original: trividhaṃ gīte kāryaṃ vādyaṃ vīṇāsamudbhavaṃ tajjñaiḥ /
analyzed: trividham gīte kāryam vādyam vīṇā samudbhavam tad jñaiḥ
tattvam hi anugata moghaḥ sthāna eka karaṇa samāyuktāḥ
laya tāla varṇa pada yati gīti akṣara bhāvakam bhavet tattvam
gītam tu yat anugacchati anugatam iti tat bhavet vādyam
āviddha karaṇa bahulam hi upari upari pāṇikam druta layam ca
an apekṣita gīta artham vādyam tu oghe vidhātavyam

original: evaṃ jñeyā vaiṇe vādyavidhāne tu dhātavastajjñaiḥ /
analyzed: evam jñeyāḥ vaiṇe vādya vidhāne tu dhātavaḥ tad jñaiḥ
lakṣyāmi atas param aham nirgīta vidhāna samavāyam
āśrāvaṇā tathā ārambhaḥ vaktrapāṇiḥ tathā eva ca

original: saṅkhoṭanā tathā kāryaṃ punaśca parighaṭṭanā // BhN_29.80 //
analyzed: saṅkhoṭanā tathā kāryam punar ca parighaṭṭanā
mārga āsāritam etat syāt līlākṛtam atha api ca

original: āsāritāni ca tathā triprakārakṛtāni tu // BhN_29.81 //
analyzed: āsāritāni ca tathā tri prakāra kṛtāni tu
etāni tu bahis gītāni āhuḥ vādya vidaḥ janāḥ

original: satālāni hyatālāni cittavṛttau kṛtāni tu // BhN_29.82 //

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi hyavanaddhavidhiṃ punaḥ // BhN_33.22 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi hi avanaddha vidhim punar

original: pūrvaṃ yaduktaṃ prapitāmahena kuryāt ya evaṃ tu naraḥ prayoge sammānamagrayaṃ labhate sa loke // BhN_33.23 //
analyzed: pūrvam yat uktam prapitāmahena kuryāt yaḥ evam tu naraḥ prayoge sammānam agrayam labhate sa loke
iti bharatīye nāṭya śāstre guṇadoṣavicāraḥ nāma adhyāyaḥ trayastriṃśaḥ
atha pañcatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
vinyāsam bhūmikānām ca sampravakṣyāmi nāṭake

original: yādṛśo yasya kartavyo vinyāso bhūmikāsvatha // BhN_35.1 //
analyzed: yādṛśaḥ yasya kartavyaḥ vinyāsaḥ bhūmikāsu atha
gati vāc aṅga ceṣṭābhiḥ sattva śīla svabhāvataḥ

original: parīkṣya pātraṃ tajjñastu yuñjyād bhūminiveśane // BhN_35.2 //
analyzed: parīkṣya pātram tad jñaḥ tu yuñjyāt bhūmi niveśane
tasmin anviṣya hi guṇavān kāryā pātra samāśrayā
na kheda jananam buddheḥ ācāryasya bhaviṣyati
ācāryaḥ pātra jān ca eva guṇān jñātvā svabhāva jān

original: tataḥ kuryād yathāyogaṃ nṛṇāṃ bhūminiveśanam // BhN_35.4 //
analyzed: tatas kuryāt yathāyogam nṛṇām bhūmi niveśanam
aṅga pratyaṅga saṃyuktam ahīna aṅgam vayaḥ nvitam

original: na sthūlaṃ na kṛśaṃ caiva na dīrghaṃ na ca mantharam // BhN_35.5 //
analyzed: na sthūlam na kṛśam ca eva na dīrgham na ca mantharam
śliṣṭa aṅgam dyutimantam ca su svaram priya darśanam
etaiḥ guṇaiḥ ca saṃyuktam deva bhūmiṣu yojayet
sthūlam prāṃśum bṛhat deham megha gambhīra nisvanam
raudra svabhāva netram ca svabhāva bhrukuṭī mukham
rakṣaḥ dānava daityānām bhūmikāsu prayojayet
puruṣāṇām prayogaḥ tu tathā aṅga kriyayā anvitaḥ
su netra su bhruvaḥ su aṅgāḥ su lalāṭāḥ su nāsikāḥ

original: svoṣṭhāḥ sugaṇḍāḥ sumukhāḥ sukaṇṭhāḥ suśirodharāḥ // BhN_35.9 //
analyzed: su oṣṭhāḥ su gaṇḍāḥ su mukhāḥ su kaṇṭhāḥ su śirodharāḥ

original: svaṅgapratyaṅgasaṃyuktā na dīrghā na ca mantharāḥ /
analyzed: su aṅga pratyaṅga saṃyuktāḥ na dīrghāḥ na ca mantharāḥ

original: na sthūlā na kṛśāścaiva svabhāvena vyavasthitāḥ // BhN_35.10 //
analyzed: na sthūlāḥ na kṛśāḥ ca eva svabhāvena vyavasthitāḥ
su śīlāḥ jñānavantaḥ ca tathā ca priya darśanāḥ
kumāra rāja bhūmau tu saṃyojyāḥ ca nara uttamāḥ
aṅgaiḥ avikalaiḥ dhīram sphuṭam vasana karmaṇi

original: na dīrghaṃ naiva ca sthūlamūhāpohavicakṣaṇam // BhN_35.12 //
analyzed: na dīrgham nā eva ca sthūlam ūha apoha vicakṣaṇam
adīnam ca pragalbham ca pratyutpanna viniścayam
senāpateḥ amātyānām bhūmikāsu prayojayet
piṅga akṣam ghoṇa nāsam ca netram uccam atha api vā
kañcuki śrotriya ādīnām bhūmikāsu niyojayet
evam anyeṣu api tathā nāṭya dharma vibhāgataḥ
deśa veṣa anurūpeṇa pātram yojyam sva bhūmiṣu
mantharam vāmanam kubjam vikṛtam vikṛta ānanam
viṣṭabdha netram kāṇa akṣam sthūlam cipiṭa nāsikam
durjanam dusvabhāvam ca vikṛta ācāram eva ca
dāsa bhūmau prayuñjīta budhaḥ dāsa aṅga sambhavam
prakṛtyā ati kṛśam kṣāmam tapaḥ śrānteṣu yojayet

original: tathā ca puruṣaṃ sthūlamuparodheṣu yojayet // BhN_35.18 //
analyzed: tathā ca puruṣam sthūlam uparodheṣu yojayet

original: yadi vā nedṛśāḥ santi prakṛtyā puruṣā dvijāḥ /
analyzed: yadi vā na īdṛśāḥ santi prakṛtyā puruṣāḥ dvijāḥ
ācārya buddhyā yojyāḥ tu bhāva ceṣṭā svabhāvataḥ
yā yasya sadṛśī ceṣṭā hi uttama adhama madhyamā
sa tathā ācārya yogena niyamyā bhāva bhāvinī
atas param pravakṣyāmi bharatānām vikalpanam
bharata āśrayāḥ ca bharataḥ vidūṣakaḥ saurikaḥ tathā nāndī
nandī sa sūtradhāraḥ nāṭya rasaḥ nāyakaḥ ca eva
mukuṭa ābharaṇa vikalpau vijñeyaḥ mālya vastu vividhaiḥ ca
kāraka kuśīlava ādyāḥ vijñeyāḥ nāmataḥ ca eva
dhurya vat ekaḥ yasmāt uddhāraḥ neka bhūmikā yuktaḥ
bhāṇḍa graha upakaraṇaiḥ nāṭyam bharataḥ bhavet tasmāt

original: nānāśrayāṃ prakurute tathā ca nārī tu sarvatra // BhN_35.24 //
analyzed: nānā āśrayām prakurute tathā ca nārī tu sarvatra
pratyutpanna pratibhaḥ narma kṛtaḥ narmagarbha nirbhedaḥ
cheda vidūṣita vacanaḥ vidūṣakaḥ nāma vijñeyaḥ
tūryatiḥ tu naraḥ sarva ātodya pravādane kuśalaḥ
tūra parigraha yuktaḥ vijñeyaḥ taurikaḥ nāma
naṭa nṛti dhātvarthaḥ yam bhūtam nāṭayati loka vṛttāntam
rasa bhāva satva yuktam yasmāt tasmāt naṭaḥ bhavati
stuti abhivādana kṛtaiḥ madhuraiḥ vākyaiḥ su maṅgala ācāraiḥ

original: sarva stauti hi lokaṃ yasmāt tasmādbhavedvādī // BhN_35.28 //
analyzed: sarvaḥ stauti hi lokam yasmāt tasmāt bhavet vādī
bhāvebhyaḥ bahudhā asmin rasāḥ vadati nāṭya yogeṣu

original: prākṛtasaṃskṛtapāṭhyo nandī nāmeti sa jñeyaḥ // BhN_35.29 //
analyzed: prākṛta saṃskṛta pāṭhyaḥ nandī nāma iti sa jñeyaḥ

original: gītasya ca vādyasya ca pāṭhyasya ca naikabhāvavihitasya /
analyzed: gītasya ca vādyasya ca pāṭhyasya ca na eka bhāva vihitasya
śiṣṭa upadeśa yogāt sūtrajñaḥ sūtradhāraḥ tu
yasmāt yathā upadiṣṭān rasān ca bhāvān ca satva saṃyuktān
bhūmi vikalpaiḥ nayati ca nāṭyakaraḥ kīrtitaḥ tasmāt
catur ātodya vidhānam sarvasya tu
nāṭyasya antam gacchati tasmāt vai nāyakaḥ bhihitaḥ
nānā prakṛti samuttham karoti yaḥ śīrṣakam mukuṭa yoge

original: vividhairveṣaviśeṣaiḥ sa ca kuṭakārastu vijñeyaḥ // BhN_35.33 //
analyzed: vividhaiḥ veṣa viśeṣaiḥ sa ca kuṭakāraḥ tu vijñeyaḥ
bhāṇḍaka vādya jñā yā laya tāla jñā rasa anuviddhā ca

original: sarvāṅgasundarī vai kartavyā nāṭakīyā tu // BhN_35.34 //
analyzed: sarvāṅgasundarī vai kartavyā nāṭakīyā tu
yaḥ tu ābharaṇam kuryāt bahuvidha vihitam sa ca ābharaṇaḥ
yaḥ ca upakaraṇa yogāt sa tena nāmnā abhidhātavyaḥ

original: yo vai mālyaṃ kurute paṅcavidhaṃ mālyākṛt sa vijñeyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vai mālyam kurute paṅcavidham mālyā kṛt sa vijñeyaḥ

original: yaścāpi veṣayogaṃ kurute sa ca veṣakārī tu // BhN_35.36 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca api veṣa yogam kurute sa ca veṣa kārī tu
citrajñaḥ citrakaraḥ vastrasya rañjānāt tathā rajakaḥ
jatu aśma loha kāṣṭhaiḥ dravya karaiḥ kārukaḥ ca eva
nānā ātodya vidhāne prayoga yuktaḥ pravādane kuśalaḥ

original: atodye 'pyatikuśalo yasmāt sa kuśalavo jñeyaḥ // BhN_35.38 //
analyzed: atodye pi ati kuśalaḥ yasmāt sa kuśa lavaḥ jñeyaḥ

original: yadyat samāśrayante śilpaṃ vā karma vā prayogaṃ vā /
analyzed: yat yat samāśrayante śilpam vā karma vā prayogam vā
tanā eva upagata guṇāḥ vijñeyāḥ nāmataḥ puruṣāḥ
evam tu nāṭaka vidhau jātiḥ naṭa saṃśrayā budhaiḥ jñeyā
nāṭya upakaraṇa yuktā nānā śilpa prasaktā ca
uktaḥ tra bhūmikā nyāsaḥ prayoktāraḥ ca yogataḥ

original: ādiṣṭaṃ nāṭyaśāstraṃ ca munayaḥ kimihocyatām // BhN_35.41 //
analyzed: ādiṣṭam nāṭya śāstram ca munayaḥ kim iha ucyatām
iti bharatīye nāṭya śāstre bhūmikā vikalpa adhyāyaḥ pañcatriṃśaḥ
atha ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha ātreyaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ca pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
aṅgirāḥ gautamaḥ gastyaḥ manuḥ āyuḥ tathā ātmavān
viśvāmitraḥ sthūlaśirāḥ saṃvartaḥ pramatiḥ danuḥ
uśanāḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vyāsaḥ cyavanaḥ kāśyapaḥ dhruvaḥ
durvāsāḥ jāmadagnyaḥ ca mārkaṇḍeyaḥ gālavaḥ
bharadvājaḥ ca raibhyaḥ ca yavakrītaḥ tathā eva ca
sthūlākṣaḥ śakalākṣaḥ ca kāṇvaḥ meghātithiḥ kratuḥ
nāradaḥ parvataḥ ca eva suvarmā atha ekajaḥ dvijaḥ
nitambuḥ bhuvanaḥ saumyaḥ śatānandaḥ kṛtavraṇaḥ
jāmadagnyaḥ tathā rāmaḥ kacaḥ ca iti evamādayaḥ

original: evaṃ te munayaḥ śrutvā sarvajñaṃ bharataṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: evam te munayaḥ śrutvā sarvajñam bharatam tatas
punar ūcuḥ idam vākyam kutūhala purogamam
yaḥ tvayā gaditaḥ hi eṣa nāṭya vedaḥ purātanaḥ

original: ekacittaiḥ sa cāsmābhiḥ samyak samupadhāritaḥ // BhN_36.7 //
analyzed: ekacittaiḥ sa ca asmābhiḥ samyak samupadhāritaḥ
ekaḥ ca saṃśayaḥ smākam tam naḥ vyākhyātum arhasi

original: ko vānyo nāṭyavedasya niścayaṃ vaktumarhati // BhN_36.8 //
analyzed: kaḥ vā anyaḥ nāṭya vedasya niścayam vaktum arhati

original: na vayaṃ parihāsena na virodhena na cerṣyayā /
analyzed: na vayam parihāsena na virodhena na ca īrṣyayā
pṛcchāmaḥ bhagavat nāṭyam upadeśa artham eva tu
asmābhiḥ ca tadā nā uktam kathā chedaḥ bhavet iti
idānīm tu upaśikṣā artham nāṭya guhyam nidarśaya
lokasya caritam nāṭyam iti avocaḥ tvam īdṛśam

original: teṣāṃ tu lokaṃ guhyānāṃ niścayaṃ vaktumarhasi // BhN_36.11 //
analyzed: teṣām tu lokam guhyānām niścayam vaktum arhasi
devasya kasya caritam pūrvaraṅge dvijarṣabha

original: kimarthaṃ bhujyate hyeṣa prayuktaḥ kiṃ karoti vā // BhN_36.12 //
analyzed: kimartham bhujyate hi eṣa prayuktaḥ kim karoti vā

original: kasmāccaiva punaḥ śaucaṃ samyak carati sūtradṛk /
analyzed: kasmāt ca eva punar śaucam samyak carati sūtradṛś
katham urvī tale nāṭyam svargāt nipatitam vibho
katham tava ayam vaṃśaḥ ca naṭa saṃjñaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
sarvam eva yathātattvam kathayasva mahā mune

original: teṣaṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā munīnāṃ bharato muniḥ /
analyzed: tu vacanam śrutvā munīnām bharataḥ muniḥ
pratyuvāca punar vākyam guhya artha abhinayam prati

original: bravīmi vaḥ kathāṃ guhyāṃ yanmāṃ pṛcchan suvratāḥ /
analyzed: bravīmi vaḥ kathām guhyām yat mām pṛcchan suvratāḥ

original: pūrvaraṅgavidhānasya tāṃ ca me sannibodhata // BhN_36.16 //
analyzed: pūrvaraṅga vidhānasya tām ca me san nibodhata
proktavān asmi yat pūrvam śubham vighna nibarhaṇam
tasya anubandhena mayā pūrvaraṅgaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
śastrāṇām pratikāra artham śarīra āvaraṇam yathā

original: kriyate hi tathā pāpaṃ hutenaiva praśāmyati // BhN_36.18 //
analyzed: kriyate hi tathā pāpam hutena eva praśāmyati
evam japyaiḥ ca homaiḥ ca devatā abhyarcanena ca
sarva ātodya vidhānaiḥ ca tathā gīta svanena ca
stutya āśīrvacanaiḥ śāntaiḥ karma bhāva anukīrtanaiḥ
mayā pāpa apaharaṇaiḥ kṛte vighna nibarhaṇe
stuti gīta ādi saṃsṛṣṭaiḥ devaiḥ abhihitaḥ smi aham

original: nitarāṃ parituṣṭāḥ smaḥ prayogeṇāmunā ca te // BhN_36.21 //
analyzed: nitarām parituṣṭāḥ smaḥ prayogeṇa amunā ca te
devatā asuram ānandya yasmān lokaḥ ca nandati
tasmāt ayam prayogaḥ tu nāndī nāmā bhaviṣyati
gīta vādya anunādaḥ hi yatra kāku svanaḥ śubhaḥ

original: tasmin deśe vipāpmāno māṅgalyaṃ ca bhaviṣyati // BhN_36.23 //
analyzed: tasmin deśe vipāpmānaḥ māṅgalyam ca bhaviṣyati
yāvat tam pūrayet deśam dhvaniḥ nāṭya samāśrayaḥ

original: na sthāsyanti hi rakṣāṃsi taṃ deśaṃ na vināyakāḥ // BhN_36.24 //
analyzed: na sthāsyanti hi rakṣāṃsi tam deśam na vināyakāḥ

original: āvāhe ca vivāhe ca yajñe nṛpatimaṅgale /
analyzed: āvāhe ca vivāhe ca yajñe nṛpati maṅgale

original: nāndīśabdamupaśrutya hiṃsrā naśyanti caiva hi // BhN_36.25 //
analyzed: nāndī śabdam upaśrutya hiṃsrāḥ naśyanti ca eva hi

original: pāṭhyaṃ nāṭyaṃ tathā geyaṃ citravāditrameva ca /
analyzed: pāṭhyam nāṭyam tathā geyam citra vāditram eva ca
veda mantra artha vacanaiḥ samam hi etat bhaviṣyati
śrutam mayā devadevāt tattvataḥ śaṅkarāt hitam
snāna japya sahasrebhyaḥ pavitram gīta vāditam
yasmin ātodya nāṭyasya gīta pāṭhya dhvaniḥ śubhaḥ

original: bhaviṣyatyaśubhaṃ deśe naiva tasmin kadācana // BhN_36.28 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati aśubham deśe nā eva tasmin kadācana
evam pūjā adhikāra artham pūrvaraṅgaḥ kṛtaḥ mayā
nānā stuti kṛtaiḥ vākyaiḥ devatā abhyarcanena ca
yatas bhivādanam kliṣṭam śiṣṭam tat raṅga maṇḍale

original: tatastasya hi tacchaucaṃ vihitaṃ tu dvijottamāḥ // BhN_36.30 //
analyzed: tatas tasya hi tat śaucam vihitam tu dvijottamāḥ

original: śaucaṃ kṛtvā yato mantraṃ pūjanaṃ jarjarasya tu /
analyzed: śaucam kṛtvā yatas mantram pūjanam jarjarasya tu
ucyate pūrvaraṅge smin tasmāt śaucam prakīrtitam
yathā avatāritam ca eva nāṭyam etat mahī tale

original: vaktavyaṃ sarvametaddhi na śakyaṃ hi nigūhitum // BhN_36.32 //
analyzed: vaktavyam sarvam etat hi na śakyam hi nigūhitum
mama ete tanayāḥ sarve nāṭya veda samanvitāḥ
sarva lokam prahasanaiḥ bādhante nāṭya saṃśrayaiḥ
kasyacid tu atha kālasya śilpakam grāmyadharmakam
ṛṣīṇām vyaṅgya karaṇam kurvadbhiḥ guṇa saṃśrayam
a śrāvyam tat durācāram grāmya dharma pravartitam

original: niṣṭhuraṃ cāprastutaṃ ca kāvyaṃ saṃsadi yojitam // BhN_36.35 //
analyzed: niṣṭhuram ca aprastutam ca kāvyam saṃsadi yojitam
tat śrutvā munayaḥ sarve bhīma roṣa prakampitāḥ

original: ūcustān bharatān kruddhā nirdahanta ivāgnayaḥ // BhN_36.36 //
analyzed: ūcuḥ tān bharatān kruddhāḥ nirdahantaḥ iva agnayaḥ
mā tāvat bho dvijāḥ yuktam idam asmad viḍambanam

original: ko nāmāyaṃ paribhavaḥ kiñca nāsmāsu sammatam // BhN_36.37 //
analyzed: kaḥ nāma ayam paribhavaḥ kiñca na asmāsu sammatam
yasmāt jñāna mada unmattāḥ na vettha avinaya āśritāḥ
tasmāt etat hi bhavatām kujñānam nāśam eṣyati
ṛṣīṇām brāhmaṇānām ca samavāya samāgatāḥ

original: nirāhutā vinā homaiḥ śūdrācārā bhaviṣyatha // BhN_36.39 //
analyzed: nirāhutāḥ vinā homaiḥ śūdra ācārāḥ bhaviṣyatha
a pāṅkteyāḥ kutsitāḥ ca avamāḥ eva bhaviṣyatha

original: yaśca vo bhavitā vaṃśaḥ sarvāśauco bhaviṣyati // BhN_36.40 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca vaḥ bhavitā vaṃśaḥ sarva āśaucaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: ye ca vo vaṃśajāste 'pi bhaviṣyantyatha nartakāḥ /
analyzed: ye ca vaḥ vaṃśa jāḥ te bhaviṣyanti atha nartakāḥ
para upasthānavantaḥ ca śastra paṇya upajīvinaḥ

original: śāpaṃ dattaṃ tathā jñātvā sutebhyo me tadā surāḥ /
analyzed: śāpam dattam tathā jñātvā sutebhyaḥ me tadā surāḥ

original: sarve vimanaso bhūtvā tānṛṣīn samupasthitāḥ // BhN_36.42 //
analyzed: sarve vimanasaḥ bhūtvā tān ṛṣīn samupasthitāḥ
yācamānaiḥ tatas proktam devaiḥ śakra purogamaiḥ
idānīm duḥkham utpannam nāṭyam etat vinaṅkṣati

original: ṛṣibhiśca tataḥ proktaṃ na caitaddhi vinakṣyati /
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ ca tatas proktam na ca etat hi vinakṣyati

original: śeṣamanyatra yad proktaṃ sarvametad bhaviṣyati // BhN_36.44 //
analyzed: śeṣam anyatra yat proktam sarvam etat bhaviṣyati
etat śrutvā tu vacanam munīnām ugra tejasām

original: viṣṇṇāste tataḥ sarve śrutvā māṃ samupasthitāḥ // BhN_36.45 //
analyzed: viṣṇṇāḥ te tatas sarve śrutvā mām samupasthitāḥ
proktavantaḥ ca mām putrāḥ tvayā aho nāśitāḥ vayam

original: anena nāṭyadoṣeṇa śūdrācārā hi yat kṛtāḥ // BhN_36.46 //
analyzed: anena nāṭya doṣeṇa śūdra ācārāḥ hi yat kṛtāḥ
mayā api sāntvayitvā uktāḥ mā krodham vrajata anaghāḥ
smākam nūnam eṣa vidhiḥ sutāḥ

original: munīnāṃ hi mṛṣā vākyaṃ bhaviṣyati kadācana /
analyzed: munīnām hi mṛṣā vākyam bhaviṣyati kadācana

original: nidhane ca mano mā bhūd yuṣmākamiti sāntvitāḥ // BhN_36.48 //
analyzed: nidhane ca manaḥ mā bhūt yuṣmākam iti sāntvitāḥ
jānīdhvam tat tathā nāṭyam brahmaṇā saṃpravartitam
śiṣyebhyaḥ ca tad anyebhyaḥ prayacchāmaḥ prayogataḥ
mā vai praṇaśyatām etat nāṭyam duḥkha pravartitam
mahā āśrayam mahā puṇyam vedāṅga upāṅga sambhavam
apsarobhyaḥ idam ca eva yathātattvam yathāśrutam

original: nāṭyaṃ dattvā tataḥ sarve prāyaścittaṃ cariṣyatha // BhN_36.51 //
analyzed: nāṭyam dattvā tatas sarve prāyaścittam cariṣyatha

original: iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre nāṭyaśāpo nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti bharatīye nāṭya śāstre nāṭyaśāpaḥ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atha saptatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
kasyacid tu atha kālasya nahuṣaḥ nāma pārthivaḥ
prāptavān deva rājyam hi naya buddhi parākramaḥ
praśaśāsa tadā rājyam devaiḥ vyuṣṭim avāpnuvan

original: gāndharvaṃ caia nāṭyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā cintāmupāgamat // BhN_37.2 //
analyzed: gāndharvam nāṭyam ca dṛṣṭvā cintām upāgamat

original: sa cintayitvā manasā kathameṣa gṛhe mama /
analyzed: sa cintayitvā manasā katham eṣa gṛhe mama

original: nāṭyaprayogo hi bhavediti sādara eva san // BhN_37.3 //
analyzed: nāṭya prayogaḥ hi bhavet iti sādaraḥ eva san
kṛtāñjaliḥ prayoga artham proktavān tu surān nṛpaḥ

original: apsarobhiridaṃ sārdhaṃ nāṭyaṃ bhavatu me gṛhe // BhN_37.4 //
analyzed: apsarobhiḥ idam sārdham nāṭyam bhavatu me gṛhe
pratyuktaḥ ca tatas devaiḥ bṛhaspati purogamaiḥ

original: divyāṅganānāṃ naiveha mānuṣaiḥ saha saṅgatiḥ // BhN_37.5 //
analyzed: divya aṅganānām nā evā iha mānuṣaiḥ saha saṅgatiḥ

original: hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca vaktavyo bhavān svargādhipo hi yat /
analyzed: hitam pathyam ca vaktavyaḥ bhavān svarga adhipaḥ hi yat

original: ācāryāstatra gacchantu gatvā kurvantu te priyam // BhN_37.6 //
analyzed: ācāryāḥ tatra gacchantu gatvā kurvantu te priyam

original: proktavāṃstu tato māṃ tu nṛpatiḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ /
analyzed: proktavān tu tatas mām tu nṛpatiḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ
idam icchāmi bhagavat nāṭyam urvyām pratiṣṭhitam
pūrvam ācāryakam ca eva bhavatā abhihitam śrutam
vyakta bhāvāt tu idam labdham tvad sakāśāt dvijottama
pitāmaha gṛhe smākam tad antaḥpure jane
pitāmaha kriyā yukta murvaśyām sampravartitam
tasyāḥ praṇāśa śokena unmāda uparate nṛpe
vipanne ntaḥpura jane punar nāśam upāgatam
prakāśam etat icchāmaḥ bhūyas tat saṃprayojitam

original: tithiyajñakriyāsvetad yathā syān maṅgalaiḥ śubhaiḥ // BhN_37.11 //
analyzed: tithi yajña kriyāsu etat yathā syāt maṅgalaiḥ śubhaiḥ
tasmin mama gṛhe baddham nānā prakṛti saṃśrayam
strīṇām lalita vinyāsaiḥ yatas naḥ prathayiṣyati
tathā astu iti mayā proktaḥ nahuṣaḥ pārthivaḥ tadā

original: sutāścāhūya samproktā sāmapūrvaṃ suraiḥ saha // BhN_37.13 //
analyzed: sutāḥ ca āhūya samproktā sāma pūrvam suraiḥ saha

original: ayaṃ hi nahuṣo rājā yācate naḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ /
analyzed: ayam hi nahuṣaḥ rājā yācate naḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: gamyatāṃ sahitairbhūmiṃ prayoktuṃ nāṭyameva ca // BhN_37.14 //
analyzed: gamyatām sahitaiḥ bhūmim prayoktum nāṭyam eva ca
kariṣyamaḥ ca śāpa antam asmin samyak prayojite

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ nṛpāṇāṃ ca bhaviṣyatha na kutsitāḥ // BhN_37.15 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām nṛpāṇām ca bhaviṣyatha na kutsitāḥ
tatra gatvā prayujyantām prayogān vasudhā tale

original: na śakyaṃ cānyathā kartuṃ vacanaṃ pārthivasya hi // BhN_37.16 //
analyzed: na śakyam ca anyathā kartum vacanam pārthivasya hi
asmākam ca eva sarveṣām nahuṣasya mahātmanaḥ

original: ātmopadeśasiddhaṃ hi nāṭyaṃ proktaṃ svayaṃbhuvā // BhN_37.17 //
analyzed: ātma upadeśa siddham hi nāṭyam proktam svayaṃbhuvā
śeṣam uttara tantreṇa kohalaḥ tu kariṣyati

original: prayogaḥ kārikāścaiva niruktāni tathaiva ca // BhN_37.18 //
analyzed: prayogaḥ kārikāḥ ca eva niruktāni tathā eva ca
apsarobhiḥ idam sārdham krīḍanīyaka hetukam

original: adhiṣṭhitaṃ mayā svarge svātinā nāradena ca // BhN_37.19 //
analyzed: adhiṣṭhitam mayā svarge svātinā nāradena ca

original: tataśca vasudhāṃ gatvā nahuṣasya gṛhe dvijāḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca vasudhām gatvā nahuṣasya gṛhe dvijāḥ

original: strīṇāṃ prayogaṃ bahudhā baddhavanto yathākramam // BhN_37.20 //
analyzed: strīṇām prayogam bahudhā baddhavantaḥ yathākramam
atra upabhogataḥ te tu mānuṣīṣu mām ātmajāḥ
baddhavantaḥ dhika sneham tāsu tat dvijasattamāḥ

original: putrānutpādya vadhvā ca prayogaṃ ca yathākramam /
analyzed: putrān utpādya vadhvā ca prayogam ca yathākramam

original: brahmaṇā samanujñātāḥ prāptāḥ svargaṃ punaḥ sutāḥ // BhN_37.22 //
analyzed: brahmaṇā samanujñātāḥ prāptāḥ svargam punar sutāḥ
evam urvī tale nāṭyam śiṣyaiḥ samavatāritam

original: bharatānāṃ ca vaṃśo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca pravartitaḥ // BhN_37.23 //
analyzed: bharatānām ca vaṃśaḥ yam bhaviṣyam ca pravartitaḥ
kohala ādibhiḥ evam tu vatsa śāṇḍilya dhūrtitaiḥ
mati adharma kriyā yuktaiḥ kaścid kālam avasthitaiḥ
etat śātram praṇītam hi nārāṇām buddhi vardhanam
trailokyasya kriyā upetam sarva śāstra nidarśanam

original: maṅgalyaṃ lalitaṃ caiva brahmaṇo vadanodbhavam // BhN_37.25 //
analyzed: maṅgalyam lalitam ca eva brahmaṇaḥ vadana udbhavam

original: ya idaṃ śruṇuyān nityaṃ proktaṃ cedaṃ svayambhuvā /
analyzed: yaḥ idam śruṇuyāt nityam proktam ca idam svayambhuvā
kuryāt prayogam yaḥ ca evam athavā adhītavān naraḥ
yā gatiḥ veda viduṣām yā gatiḥ yajña kāriṇām

original: yā gatirdānaśīlānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ prāpnuyāddhi saḥ // BhN_37.27 //
analyzed: yā gatiḥ dāna śīlānām tām gatim prāpnuyāt hi saḥ

original: dānadharmeṣu sarveṣu kīrtyate tu mahat phalam /
analyzed: dāna dharmeṣu sarveṣu kīrtyate tu mahat phalam
prekṣaṇīya pradānam hi sarva dāneṣu śasyate
na tathā gandha mālyena devāḥ tuṣyanti pūjitāḥ
yathā nāṭya prayoga sthaiḥ nityam tuṣyanti maṅgalaiḥ

original: gāndharvaṃ ceha nāṭyaṃ ca yaḥ samyak paripālayet /
analyzed: gāndharvam ca iha nāṭyam ca yaḥ samyak paripālayet

original: sa īśvaragaṇeśānāṃ labhate sadgatiṃ parām // BhN_37.30 //
analyzed: saḥ īśvara gaṇa īśānām labhate sat gatim parām
evam nāṭya prayoge bahu vidhi vihitam karma śāstram praṇītam
na uktam yat ca atra lokāt anukṛti karaṇāt
saṃvibhāvyam tu tad jñaiḥ

original: kiṃ cānyat samprapūrṇā bhavatu vasumatī naṣṭadurbhikṣarogā /
analyzed: kim ca anyat samprapūrṇā bhavatu vasumatī naṣṭa durbhikṣa rogā

original: śāntirgobrāhmaṇānāṃ bhavatu narapatiḥ pātu pṛthvīṃ samagrām // BhN_37.31 //
analyzed: śāntiḥ go brāhmaṇānām bhavatu narapatiḥ pātu pṛthvīm samagrām
iti bharatīye nāṭya śāstre guhyatattvakathanādhyāyaḥ saptatriṃśaḥ
nāṭya śāstram saṃpūrṇam
